GSP27moksop_u:3625: akṣobhaikapraharaṇād abuddhānyo'nyaceṣṭitam / saṃrambhāṇveṣaṇaprajñaṃ raṇaṃ suptam iva sthitam //MU_3,34.44//
GSP27moksop_u:3628: atirabhasarasadvidāritūrya pratiravapūritalokapālalokaḥ / raṇagirir ayam ugrapakṣadakṣaḥ pravisṛtanṛtta ivāmbare yugānte //MU_3,34.47//
GSP27moksop_u:3629: hā hā dhik pravikaṭakaṅkaṭāṭanodyatproḍḍīnaprakaṭataḍicchaṭāḥ pradīptāḥ / kreṅkārasphuritaguṇeritā raṇanto nārācāś śikhariśilābhido vahanti //MU_3,34.48//
GSP27moksop_u:3630: chinnecchā ccham iti na yāvad aṅgabhaṅgaṃ kurvanti jvaladanalojjvalāḥ pṛṣatkāḥ / tāvad drāg drutam ita ehi mitra yāmo yāmo 'yaṃ pravahati vāsaraś caturthaḥ //MU_3,34.49//
GSP27moksop_u:3633: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha proḍḍayanodyuktaturaṅgamataraṅgakaḥ / uttāṇḍava ivāmatto babhūva sa raṇārṇavaḥ //MU_3,35.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3646: sa saṅgrāmo 'mbaragrāma ivāścaryakaro nṛṇām / abhūt pralayabhūkampakampitācalacañcalaḥ //MU_3,35.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3660: śūlāsicakraśaraśaktigadābhusuṇḍīprāsādayo vidalanena mitho dhvanantaḥ / dīptā dadhur daśadiśaṃ śataśo bhramantaḥ kalpāntavātaparivṛttapadārthalīlām //MU_3,35.28//
GSP27moksop_u:3663: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha śṛṅgopamāneṣu sthiteṣu śavarādiṣu / gaṅgātulyāsu jātāsu vahadraktanadīṣu ca //MU_3,36.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3664: nṛtyatsu loladordaṇḍaṃ kabandheṣu sabandhuṣu / bruḍatsu narahastyaśvaratheṣu rudhirāmbhasi //MU_3,36.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3665: sarvasainyeṣu yāteṣu viralatvaṃ visāriṣu / sarvabhīruṣu bhagneṣu vidruteṣu diśo daśa //MU_3,36.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3667: mahatāṃ dharmaniṣṭhānāṃ śīlaujassattvaśālinām / śuddhānāṃ kulapadmānāṃ vīrāṇām anivartinām //MU_3,36.5//
GSP27moksop_u:3668: dvandvayuddhāni jātāni meghānām iva garjatām / mitho nigaraṇotkāni milatsāgarapūravat //MU_3,36.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3669: sapañjaraḥ pañjariṇā gajaughena gajoccayaḥ / savanas savanenādrir adriṇevāmilad balāt //MU_3,36.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3670: aśvaugho 'milad aśvānāṃ vṛndenārāviraṃhasā / taraṅgoghena ghoreṇa taraṅgogha ivārṇave //MU_3,36.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3671: narānīko narānīkaṃ samāyudham ayodhayat / veṇvaugham iva veṇvaugho marullolo maruccalam //MU_3,36.9//
GSP27moksop_u:3672: rathaughaś ca rathaughena niṣpipeṣākhilaṃ vapuḥ / nagaraṃ nagareṇeva daivenoḍḍīnam ambaram //MU_3,36.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3674: viṣamāyudhayuddheṣu yoddhāraḥ pelavāśayāḥ / yadā yuktyā palāyante raṇakalpānale tadā //MU_3,36.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3675: militāś cakriṇaś cakrair dhanurdhārair dhanurdharāḥ / khaḍgibhiḥ khaḍgayoddhāro bhusuṇḍībhir bhusuṇḍinaḥ //MU_3,36.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3676: musulair musuloddhārāḥ kuntinaḥ kuntadhāribhiḥ / ṛṣṭyāyudhā ṛṣṭidharaiḥ prāsibhiḥ prāsapāṇayaḥ //MU_3,36.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3677: samudgarā mudgaribhis sagadair vilasadgadāḥ / prāsamārgavidaḥ prāsaiḥ paraśūtkāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ //MU_3,36.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3678: laguḍaughair laguḍina upalair upalāyudhāḥ / pāśibhiḥ pāśaparamāś śaṅkubhiś śaṅkudhāriṇaḥ //MU_3,36.16//
GSP27moksop_u:3679: kṣurikābhis sakṣurikā bhiṇḍipālaiś ca tadbhṛtaḥ / vajramuṣṭidharās tatsthair aṅkuśair aṅkuśoddhṛtāḥ //MU_3,36.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3680: halair halanikāṣajñās triśūlaiś ca triśūlinaḥ / śṛṅkhalājālino jālaiś śārṅkhalair alikomalaiḥ //MU_3,36.18//
GSP27moksop_u:3681: śāktīkaiś śaktiyoddhāraś śūlaiś śūlaviśāradāḥ / kṣubhitāḥ kalpavikṣubdhasāgarormighaṭā iva //MU_3,36.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3682: kṣubdhaś cakrajalāvartaiś śaraśīkaramārutaiḥ / prabhramaddhetimakaro vyomaikārṇava ābabhau //MU_3,36.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3684: digaṣṭakajanānīkaṃ pakṣadvayatayā tayā / ardhenārdhena kuṣitaṃ bhūpālābhyāṃ tathā sthitam //MU_3,36.22//
GSP27moksop_u:3685: paśya deśādisaṅkhyena prāgdigbhāgagatān imān / līlānāthasya padmasya pakṣe janapadāñ śṛṇu //MU_3,36.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3686: pūrvasyāṃ kāśimagadhāḥ kosalā mithilotkalāḥ / mekalāḥ kavaṭāḥ puṇḍrās tathauṇḍrās samagauḍakāḥ //MU_3,36.24//
GSP27moksop_u:3687: drimayo madrasuhmāś ca tāmraliptās tathaiva ca / prāgjyotiṣā vājimukhā ambaṣṭhāḥ puruṣādakāḥ //MU_3,36.25//
GSP27moksop_u:3688: karṇākṣaṣṭhā aviśrotrā āmamīnāśanās tathā / vyāghravaktrāḥ kirātāś ca śavarā ekapādakāḥ //MU_3,36.26//
GSP27moksop_u:3689: mālyavān nāma śailo 'tra śibivāñ jñāna eva ca / vṛṣabhadhvajapadmādyās tathodayakaro giriḥ //MU_3,36.27//
GSP27moksop_u:3690: atha prāgdakṣiṇāyāṃ tu ime vindhyādrivāsinaḥ / cedayo vatsadāśārṇā aṅgavaṅgopavaṅgakāḥ //MU_3,36.28//
GSP27moksop_u:3691: kaliṅgapuṇḍrajaṭharā vidarbhā mekhalās tathā / śavarā nagnaparṇāś ca kaṇṭhatripurapūrakāḥ //MU_3,36.29//
GSP27moksop_u:3692: kaṇṭakasthalanāmānaḥ pṛthudvīpakakomalāḥ / kaṇṭhadrāś śoṇikāś caiva tathā carmaṇvatā api //MU_3,36.30//
GSP27moksop_u:3693: kokakā hemakuḍyāś ca tathā śmaśrudharā iti / baligrīvamahāgrīvāḥ kiṣkindhā nārikelinaḥ //MU_3,36.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3694: atha līlāpater asya dakṣiṇasyām ime 'drayaḥ / vindhyo 'tha kusumāpīḍo mahendro dunduras tathā //MU_3,36.32//
GSP27moksop_u:3695: malayas sūryavāṃś caiva gaṇarājyanṛrājyakāḥ / avantir iti vikhyātā tathā sāmbavatīti ca //MU_3,36.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3696: daśapuryā ekakacchā ṛṣikās turuṣkāś śakāḥ / vanavāsopagirayas te bhadragirayas tathā //MU_3,36.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3697: nāgarā daṇḍakāś caiva gaṇarājyā nṛrājyakāḥ / sahārā ṛṣyamūkāś ca kārkoṭā vanatimbilāḥ //MU_3,36.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3698: padmā nivāsinaś caiva caurakāḥ karkavīrakāḥ / vairikāḥ pāśikāś caiva dharmapattanapāṃsikāḥ //MU_3,36.36//
GSP27moksop_u:3699: śākikāḥ kṛṣṇacelūrā nārmadās tāmraparṇakāḥ / gonandāḥ kanakāś caiva cīnapattananāmakāḥ //MU_3,36.37//
GSP27moksop_u:3700: tālīkaṭās saritkīrṇā rahakā veṇṇakārhaṇāḥ / vaivuṇḍakās tumbavanā lājinadvīpakarṇakāḥ //MU_3,36.38//
GSP27moksop_u:3701: karṇikārāś ca śivayaḥ kuṅkuṇāś citrakūṭakāḥ / karṇāṭamañcakaṭakā mahākaṭavikās tathā //MU_3,36.39//
GSP27moksop_u:3702: āndhrāś ca kollaśinayaś śivātakacavairikāḥ / baladevāḥ pattanakāḥ krauñcāṣ ṭīvās tathaiva ca //MU_3,36.40//
GSP27moksop_u:3703: śilākṣā radato nandanandanāmalayābhidhāḥ / te citrakūṭaśikharā laṅkārakṣogaṇāspadāḥ //MU_3,36.41//
GSP27moksop_u:3704: atha pratyagdakṣiṇāyāṃ mahārāṣṭrasurāṣṭrakāḥ / sindhusauvīraśūdrākhyā ābhīrā dramiḍās tathā //MU_3,36.42//
GSP27moksop_u:3705: koṭakāṣ ṣaṇḍasindhvākhyās tathā kaliruhā api / atra hemagiriś śailas tathā raivatako giriḥ //MU_3,36.43//
GSP27moksop_u:3706: nabhukākhyaṃ mayavanaṃ yavanās tatra jantavaḥ / pahlavā mārgaṇāvartā dhūmrāmbaṣṭhakanāmakāḥ //MU_3,36.44//
GSP27moksop_u:3707: tathā lājakaṇāś caiva tathāmragirivāsinaḥ / tato 'bdhir aurvāgniyutā ete līlāpater janāḥ //MU_3,36.45//
GSP27moksop_u:3708: atha tatpratipakṣasthān imāñ janapadāñ śṛṇu / paścimāyāṃ diśi prauḍhā ime tāvan mahādrayaḥ //MU_3,36.46//
GSP27moksop_u:3709: matimān nāma śailendraḥ kṣurārpaṇagiris tathā / vanaukahā meghavāṃś ca cakravān astaparvataḥ //MU_3,36.47//
GSP27moksop_u:3710: janāḥ pañcanadā nāma kāśā brahmāvasātakāḥ / tathaiva tārakṣatayaḥ pāravāś śāntikās tathā //MU_3,36.48//
GSP27moksop_u:3711: pārśve vatakapokrāṇāṃ girivānavamās tathā / santyaktadharmamaryādās te 'dhamā mlecchajātayaḥ //MU_3,36.49//
GSP27moksop_u:3712: tato janapadā bhūmir yojanānāṃ śatadvayam / tato mahendraśikharī muktā maṇimayāvaniḥ //MU_3,36.50//
GSP27moksop_u:3713: vṛto mahīdharaśatair athāsto nāma parvataḥ / tato mahārṇavo bhīmāḥ pāriyātragires taṭe //MU_3,36.51//
GSP27moksop_u:3714: paścimottaradigbhāge deśo girimatis sthitaḥ / tathā veṇumatiś caiva tatas turamatir mahī //MU_3,36.52//
GSP27moksop_u:3715: tathā phalgunakāś caiva māṇḍavyā ekanetrakāḥ / purukundās tukhārāś ca tālamallalahāvahāḥ //MU_3,36.53//
GSP27moksop_u:3716: vandilā navilā vālā dīrghakeśāṅgabāhavaḥ / raṅgāḥ khamūnikāḥ kampā guruhāś cāruhās tathā //MU_3,36.54//
GSP27moksop_u:3717: tatas strīrājyam atulaṃ govṛṣāpatyabhājanam / athottarasyāṃ himavān kāñjo 'tha madhumān giriḥ //MU_3,36.55//
GSP27moksop_u:3718: kailāso vasumān merus tatpatheṣu janā ime / madrapauravayaudheyā mālavāś śūrasenakāḥ //MU_3,36.56//
GSP27moksop_u:3719: rājanyāś ca tathāśvinyā arjunāvanayas tathā / trigartakekayaḥ kṣudramācelāścūstavāsinaḥ //MU_3,36.57//
GSP27moksop_u:3720: ambalāḥ prasthalāś śākāḥ kṣemadhūrtaya eva ca / antaradvīpagāndhāras tathā vandivaṭastavaḥ //MU_3,36.58//
GSP27moksop_u:3721: atha takṣaśilā nāma tato 'pi lavaṇāvatī / puṣkalāvatideśaś ca yaśovatimahī tataḥ //MU_3,36.59//
GSP27moksop_u:3722: tato maṇimatī bhūmiś śyāmākā khacarās tathā / dāśadānā gavyasanā daṇḍahavyasanās tathā //MU_3,36.60//
GSP27moksop_u:3723: dānadāś śūrakāś caiva vāṭādhārās tathaiva ca / kohakaṃ nagaraṃ caiva surabhūtipuraṃ tathā //MU_3,36.61//
GSP27moksop_u:3724: tato vai taṭakādarśā danturādarśa eva ca / tataḥ piṇḍalamālavyayāyaneyābhidhānakāḥ //MU_3,36.62//
GSP27moksop_u:3725: mālahālā hūnahematālāśvās svamukhās tathā / himavān vasumān kauñjaḥ kailāsaś cetyagās tathā //MU_3,36.63//
GSP27moksop_u:3726: tato janapadā bhūmir aśītiśatayojanā / atha prāguttarasyāṃ tvam imāñ janapadāñ śṛṇu //MU_3,36.64//
GSP27moksop_u:3727: kaulūtā brahmaputrāś ca kuvindāś ca dinādanāḥ / maḍavā naṣṭarājyāś ca vanarāṣṭrās tathaiva ca //MU_3,36.65//
GSP27moksop_u:3728: kaiḍabhallās siṃhapurās tathā cāmavataṅganāḥ / sārpātakāḥ pārvatakāḥ kaśmīrā daradās tathā //MU_3,36.66//
GSP27moksop_u:3729: abhisārajadārvākāḥ pallolukaciroḍunāḥ / kirātāḥ paśupālāś ca cīnās svarṇamahī tataḥ //MU_3,36.67//
GSP27moksop_u:3730: devasthalopavanabhūs tadanūditaśrīr viśvāvasos tadanu mandiram uttamarddhi / kailāsabhūs tadanu muñjavanaś ca śailo vidyādharāmaravihāravimānabhūmiḥ //MU_3,36.68//
GSP27moksop_u:3733: vasiṣṭhaḥ: raṇe rabhasanirlūnanaravāraṇadāruṇe / ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti vṛndānupātini //MU_3,37.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3734: ete cānye ca bahavas tatra bhasmatvam āgatāḥ / praviśantaḥ prayatnena śalabhā iva pāvake //MU_3,37.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3735: atrānye madhyadeśīyā janā nodāhṛtā mayā / tān imāñ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi pakṣyāṃl līlāmahībhṛtaḥ //MU_3,37.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3736: uddehikāś śūrasenā guḍā aśvatthanīpakāḥ / uttamajyotikadrāṇi padamadhyamikādayaḥ //MU_3,37.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3737: sālvakāḥ ketakā matsyā dauleyakakapiṣṭalāḥ / māṇḍavyapāṇḍunagarasauragrīvā gurugrahāḥ //MU_3,37.5//
GSP27moksop_u:3738: pāriyātrāḥ kurāḍhyaś ca yāmunoḍumbarā api / gajāhvā ujjihānāś ca kālakoṭikamāthurāḥ //MU_3,37.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3739: kapoladharmāraṇyāś ca tathaivottaradakṣiṇāḥ / pāñcālakāḥ kurukṣetrās tathā sārasvatā janāḥ //MU_3,37.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3740: avantīsyandanaśreṇīkuntaiḥ pañcanaderitāḥ / syandamānā vidravantī nipapāta mahābhṛgau //MU_3,37.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3741: kāśā brahmāvasātāś ca chinnās sāmbavatījanaiḥ / bhūmau nipatitās santo mathitā mattavāraṇaiḥ //MU_3,37.9//
GSP27moksop_u:3742: śūrā daśapurāś śastrair nikṛttodārakandharāḥ / tārakṣatibhir ākramya yojitā yojane hrade //MU_3,37.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3743: ṛṣyakārurukacchāś ca śaivyaśaṅkuśatāṅkitāḥ / paṅkile paṅkatāṃ yātā bhūtale sainyamardanaiḥ //MU_3,37.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3744: vanavāsopagirayo 'nilaye nilayārthinaḥ / paritaḥ paridhāvantaḥ patitā yamunāhrade //MU_3,37.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3746: udravair bhadragiribhis saṅgrāmādhvani dīkṣitaiḥ / kṣoṇīgarteṣu nikṣiptā rasalāḥ kamalā iva //MU_3,37.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3747: vidrutyeva dravadraktā vidrāvitamahārathāḥ / daṇḍakāntrāniloddhūtā hehayā hariṇā iva //MU_3,37.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3748: dantidantavinirbhinnā dāradā dalitārayaḥ / nītā raktamahānadyā drumāṇāṃ pallavā iva //MU_3,37.16//
GSP27moksop_u:3749: nārācaiś carvitāś cīnā jīrṇajarjarajīvitāḥ / jahur jalanidhau dehān bhārabhūtān avasthitān //MU_3,37.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3750: karṇāṭasubhaṭoḍḍīnakuntakartitakandarāḥ / terur ābhīraśūrāḥ khe tārakānikarā iva //MU_3,37.18//
GSP27moksop_u:3752: daśārṇād āśanir muktaśṛṅkhalā jālabhīravaḥ / nilīnā raktajambāle vaitastās timayo yathā //MU_3,37.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3754: siṣicuś śastrakāṣodyadvidyud dyaunirgatā dravāt / śaradhārāvanānīva mīnahetipradāmbudāt //MU_3,37.22//
GSP27moksop_u:3755: bhusuṇḍīmaṇḍaloddyotaśyāmārkotpātabhīruṣu / ābhīreṣv arayaḥ petur gogaṇā hariteṣv iva //MU_3,37.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3757: raṇadgaganagāsajjacakricakravikartanaiḥ / taṅganāḥ kaṇaśaḥ kīrṇāḥ kaṅkagṛddhreṣu rudrakaiḥ //MU_3,37.25//
GSP27moksop_u:3758: laguḍāloḍanoḍḍīnaṃ gauḍaṃ guḍaguḍāravam / śrutvā gāndhāragāvogre dudruvuḥ pramitā iva //MU_3,37.26//
GSP27moksop_u:3761: yad ambudair ivoḍḍīnaṃ śastravṛndair nabho'ṅgane / tad dṛṣṭaṃ vīcivalayair lolaiḥ plutam ivārṇave //MU_3,37.29//
GSP27moksop_u:3762: śatacandraṃ sitacchatraiś śaraiś śalabhanirbharam / śaktibhiḥ kākanīrandhraṃ dṛṣṭam ākāśakānanam //MU_3,37.30//
GSP27moksop_u:3763: līnāś cīracayākrandakāriṇaḥ kekayāḥ kṛtāḥ / kaṅkaiḥ kaṅkakulākrāntair vyomocchalitamastakāḥ //MU_3,37.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3764: himavacchailakanyānāṃ kāmaṃ kalakalāravaiḥ / aṅgair anaṅgatāṃ nītvā bhairavair iva garjitam //MU_3,37.32//
GSP27moksop_u:3765: kāśair uddehakākrāntā adṛśyair dayayā khagaiḥ / nirdhūtapakṣaiḥ kṣubhitaiḥ pavanair iva pāṃsavaḥ //MU_3,37.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3766: unmattāstravinirdhūtās tyaktahetiraṇāmbarāḥ / nandanānandanirmātṛ nanṛtur jahasur jaguḥ //MU_3,37.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3767: prakvaṇatkiṅkiṇījālaṃ śaktivarṣam upāgatam / sālvabāṇāniloddhūtam agamat pṛṣadākṛtim //MU_3,37.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3768: śaivyāstraiḥ khaṇḍitāḥ kauntā bhramatkuntair vighaṭṭitāḥ / śavībhūtā divaṃ nītā dṛṣṭā vidyādharā iva //MU_3,37.36//
GSP27moksop_u:3769: dharādharaṇadharmiṇyā dhīrayā vīrasenayā / loṭhitāḥ pāṇḍunagarāś calanollāsamātrataḥ //MU_3,37.37//
GSP27moksop_u:3770: uddehakāḥ pañcanadair dalitā mattakāśibhiḥ / kuntadantakṣatoddāmaiḥ padmā iva mataṅgajaiḥ //MU_3,37.38//
GSP27moksop_u:3771: brahmavāsantakānīkaiḥ kṛttāś cakrair gatā mahīm / māhāryāḥ krakacotkṛttā vṛkṣāḥ kusumitā iva //MU_3,37.39//
GSP27moksop_u:3772: bhokkāṇakānanaṃ lūnaṃ kuṭhārair jaṭhareritaiḥ / patad dadāha pārśvastho bhadreśaś śaravahninā //MU_3,37.40//
GSP27moksop_u:3773: kāśayo vandilālānalagnā jīrṇamataṅgajāḥ / layam ājagmur ābuddham iddhe 'gnāv indhanaṃ yathā //MU_3,37.41//
GSP27moksop_u:3774: trigartāvartagarteṣu bhramitvauṇḍrās tṛṇopamāḥ / viviśur vyastamūrdhānaḥ pātālāntaṃ palāyitāḥ //MU_3,37.42//
GSP27moksop_u:3775: mandānilācalāmbhodhibhāsure māgadhe bale / nimagnā vandilā mandāḥ paṅke jīrṇagajā iva //MU_3,37.43//
GSP27moksop_u:3776: cedayac cetanāṃ jahnus taṅganānāṃ raṇāṅgane / puṣpāṇāṃ pathi śīrṇānāṃ saukumāryam ivātapāḥ //MU_3,37.44//
GSP27moksop_u:3777: kosalāḥ pauravārāvam asahanto 'rbhakā iva / terur muktagadāprāsaśaraśaktyṛṣṭivṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_3,37.45//
GSP27moksop_u:3778: babhur bhallanikṛttāṅgā drimayo vidrumadrumāḥ / ivādrau vidravatsvāntrasāndrāsṛksravamūrtayaḥ //MU_3,37.46//
GSP27moksop_u:3779: nārācaughā mahāhetimārutādhūtamūrtayaḥ / babhramur bhramarānīkabhāsurā jaladhāv iva //MU_3,37.47//
GSP27moksop_u:3780: śaradhārādharāmeghāś śarorṇāpūrṇamecakāḥ / śarapatrāvṛtā vṛkṣā bhremur udgarjanā javāḥ //MU_3,37.48//
GSP27moksop_u:3781: vanarājyo javāj jīrṇāḥ kaṭakasthalajantavaḥ / atruṭan paramākṛṣṭāḥ pelavā iva tantavaḥ //MU_3,37.49//
GSP27moksop_u:3782: ratheṣūrdhvasthacakreṣu nikhātonmagnamūrdhasu / nipetur janasaṅghātā meghā iva vanādriṣu //MU_3,37.50//
GSP27moksop_u:3783: sālatālavanaṃ prāpya janatālavanaṃ ghanam / bhujāvakartanaṃ cāsīd uttālasthāṇukānanam //MU_3,37.51//
GSP27moksop_u:3784: nanandur nandanodyānasundaryo mattayauvanāḥ / vanopavanadeśeṣu meror vīravarāśritāḥ //MU_3,37.52//
GSP27moksop_u:3785: tāvat tārāravaṃ reje sainyakānanam unnatam / yāvan na parapakṣeṇa krāntaṃ kalpānalaujasā //MU_3,37.53//
GSP27moksop_u:3786: chinnān piśācasaṃyuktā hūnāpahṛtahetayaḥ / pātayitvā yayuḥ karṇān daśārṇās tarṇakā iva //MU_3,37.54//
GSP27moksop_u:3787: jahur bhagnasvarāḥ kāntiṃ tājikājijanaujasā / kāśayaḥ kamalānīva śuṣkasrotassvinojasā //MU_3,37.55//
GSP27moksop_u:3788: bhukhārā mekhalaiḥ kīrṇāś śaraśaktyṛṣṭimudgaraiḥ / vidrutā narake kṣiptāḥ kārkoṭasthalanāmani //MU_3,37.56//
GSP27moksop_u:3789: kaurukṣetrāsthas tavasaiś chadmayodhibhir āvṛtāḥ / guṇā iva khalākrāntā gatā vyaktam aśaktatām //MU_3,37.57//
GSP27moksop_u:3790: drimayo vaṭadhānānāṃ kṣaṇenādāya mastakam / bhallaiḥ palāyyāśu gatā vilūnakamalā iva //MU_3,37.58//
GSP27moksop_u:3791: mithas sārasvatādityā ādināntaṃ kṛtājayaḥ / paṇḍitā iva vādeṣu nodvignā na parājitāḥ //MU_3,37.59//
GSP27moksop_u:3792: kavāṭāḥ kharvitakṣudrāvāṭadhānaiḥ parāvṛtāḥ / tejaḥ paramam ājagmuś śāntāgnaya ivendhanaiḥ //MU_3,37.60//
GSP27moksop_u:3793: kiyadākhyāyata etaj jihvānicayaiḥ kilālam ākulitam / vāsukir api varṇayituṃ na samartho raṇavaraṃ nāma //MU_3,37.61//
GSP27moksop_u:3796: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evam atyākule yuddhe sāsphoṭabhaṭasaṅkaṭe / ādināntam asaṃruddhe raṭatkaṭhinakaṅkaṭe //MU_3,38.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3797: vahantīṣūtpatantīṣu patantīṣv aśmavṛṣṭiṣu / nadīṣu kṣepaṇotthāsu caṭatketvabjapaṅktiṣu //MU_3,38.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3798: mithaḥ phalāgraṭaṅkotthavahniśīkariṇīsu khe / āyāntīṣu patantīṣu dūraṃ śaranadīṣu ca //MU_3,38.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3801: aṣṭabhāgadaśāśeṣaṃ pratāpamadhurākṛtiḥ / śastraghātaujasā vīra ivāhas tanutāṃ yayau //MU_3,38.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3802: śrāntāśvena prabhagnāgrahetisaṅghātadīptayaḥ / dineśena samaṃ senā yayur mandapratāpatām //MU_3,38.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3803: atha senādhināthābhyāṃ vicārya saha mantribhiḥ / dūtāḥ parasparaṃ dattā yuddhaṃ saṃhriyatām iti //MU_3,38.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3804: tataś śramavaśān mandapattraśastraparākramaiḥ / raṇasaṃharaṇaṃ kāle sarvair evorarīkṛtam //MU_3,38.9//
GSP27moksop_u:3805: tato mahārathottuṅgaketuprānte kṛtāspadam / balayor ārurohaika eko yodho dhruvo yathā //MU_3,38.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3806: aṃśukaṃ bhrāmayām āsa sarvadiṅmaṇḍalekṣitam / dyām eva dīrgham indvaṃśuṃ yuddhaṃ saṃhriyatām iti //MU_3,38.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3807: tato dundubhayaś śemuḥ pratidhvanitadiṅmukhāḥ / mahāpralayasaṃśāntau puṣkarāvartakā iva //MU_3,38.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3808: śarādihetisarito vistīrṇe gaganasthale / pravṛttāś śoṣam āgantuṃ śāradyas sarito yathā //MU_3,38.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3809: yodhadordrumasañcāras tanutām āyayau śanaiḥ / bhūkampānte vanaspanda ivāvāta ivārṇavaḥ //MU_3,38.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3810: vinirgantuṃ pravavṛte raṇāraṇyād baladvayam / vāripūraś caturdikkaṃ pralayaikārṇavād iva //MU_3,38.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3811: utkṣiptamandarakṣīrasamudravalanākulam / sainyaṃ praśamadāvartaṃ śanais sāmyam upāyayau //MU_3,38.16//
GSP27moksop_u:3812: krameṇāsīn muhūrtena vikaṭodarabhīṣaṇam / agastyapītārṇavavac chūnyam eva raṇāṅganam //MU_3,38.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3840: kalpadagdhajagatprakhyaṃ munipītārṇavopamam / ativṛṣṭihato deśa iva procchinnamānavam //MU_3,38.45//
GSP27moksop_u:3853_1: saśailaṃ kalpānte jagad iva viparyastam akhilam //MU_3,38.58 //
GSP27moksop_u:3856: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha vīra ivāraktaḥ kālenāstamito raviḥ / śaśvattejaḥparimlānapratāpo 'bdhau samujjhitaḥ //MU_3,39.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3858: bhūpātālanabhodigbhyaḥ pralayābdhijalaughavat / samājagmus tamastālā vetālavalayā iva //MU_3,39.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3860: nissattveṣu tamo'ndheṣu sarassv arasaśāliṣu / saṅkocam āyayuḥ padmā mṛtānāṃ hṛdayeṣv iva //MU_3,39.5//
GSP27moksop_u:3861: mīlatpakṣāḥ kṣaṇāt suptāḥ kacchavruḍitakandharāḥ / kulāyeṣu khagā āsan sarvāṅgeṣv iva hetayaḥ //MU_3,39.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3862: āsannacandrasubhagālokāḥ kumudapaṅktayaḥ / ullasaddhṛdayā jātā vīrapakṣeṣv iva śriyaḥ //MU_3,39.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3864: upary abhūd vyomasaras tārākumudamaṇḍitam / adhas tv abhūd vāriviyat sphuratkumudatārakam //MU_3,39.9//
GSP27moksop_u:3865: tamāṃsy apītakāryāṇi bhūtāni cākhilāny alam / payāṃsīva viserūni prasṛtāni diśaṃ prati //MU_3,39.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3888: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ niśācarācāraciraghore raṇāṅgane / ullasantīṣu vetālakṣveḍāsūḍḍāmarāravaiḥ //MU_3,40.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3889: nabhaḥprekṣakasenāsu pragatāsu yathāgatam / viśrānteṣv iva bhūpeṣu rathādiṣu nijāspade //MU_3,40.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3890: mahāsarojala iva jane dṛśye raṇāṅgane / ahanīva janācāre sthite śyāmācarehite //MU_3,40.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3892: niśśabdaśāntasañcāre nidrāmudre kakubgaṇe / līlāpatir udārātmā kiñcit khinnamanā iva //MU_3,40.5//
GSP27moksop_u:3893: prātaḥkāryaṃ vicāryāśu mantribhir mantrakovidaiḥ / dīrghacandrasamākāre śayane himaśītale //MU_3,40.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3894: candrodayanibhe vāsagṛhe śiśirakoṭare / nidrāṃ muhūrtam agaman mudritekṣaṇapuṣkaraḥ //MU_3,40.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3895: atha te lalane vyoma tat parityajya tad gṛham / randhrair viviśatur vātalekho 'bjamukulaṃ yathā //MU_3,40.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3896: rāmaḥ: iyanmātram idaṃ sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ vāgvidāṃ vara / randhreṇa tantutanunā kathaṃ praviśati prabho //MU_3,40.9//
GSP27moksop_u:3897: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ādhibhautikadeho 'yam iti yasya matibhramaḥ / tasyāsāv aṇurandhreṇa gantuṃ śaknoti nānagha //MU_3,40.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3898: rodhito 'ham aneneti na māmy atreti yasya dhīḥ / anubhūtānubhavinī bhavatīty anubhūyate //MU_3,40.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3899: yenānubhūtaṃ pūrvārdhaṃ gacchāmīti sa tatkriyaḥ / kathaṃ bhavati paścārdhagamanonmukhacetanaḥ //MU_3,40.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3900: vāri naivordhvam āyāti nādho gacchati pāvakaḥ / yā yathaiva pravṛttā cit sā tathaivāvatiṣṭhate //MU_3,40.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3901: chāyāyām upaviṣṭasya kutas tāpānubhūtayaḥ / anyasaṃvedano 'nyo'rthaḥ kenacin nānubhūyate //MU_3,40.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3902: yā yathā sampravṛttā cit sā tathaiva sthitiṃ gatā / parameṇa prayatnena nīyate 'nyāṃ daśāṃ punaḥ //MU_3,40.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3903: sarpaikapratyayo rajjvām asatyapratyayād balāt / nivartate 'nyathā tv eṣa tiṣṭhaty eva yathāsthitam //MU_3,40.16//
GSP27moksop_u:3904: yathā saṃvit tathā cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ tathehitam / bālaṃ praty api saṃsiddham etat ko nānubhūyate //MU_3,40.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3905: yaḥ punas svapnasaṅkalpapuruṣapratimākṛtiḥ / ākāśamātrakākāras sa kathaṃ kena rodhyate //MU_3,40.18//
GSP27moksop_u:3906: cittamātraśarīraṃ tu sarvasyaiva hi sarvataḥ / vidyate vedanātve tat kvacid etīva hṛdgatāt //MU_3,40.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3907: yathābhimatam evāsya bhavaty astamayodayam / ādisarge svabhāvotthaṃ paścād dvaitaikyabhāvanam //MU_3,40.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3908: cittākāśaṃ cidākāśam ākāśaṃ ca tṛtīyakam / viddhy etat trayam evaikam avinābhāvatāvaśāt //MU_3,40.21//
GSP27moksop_u:3909: etac cittaśarīraṃ tvaṃ viddhi sarvagatodayam / yathā saṃvedanecchatvād yathā saṃvedanodayam //MU_3,40.22//
GSP27moksop_u:3910: vasati trasareṇvantar nīyate gaganodare / līyate 'ṅkurakośeṣu rasībhavati pallave //MU_3,40.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3911: ullasaty ambuvīcitve pranṛtyati śilodare / pravarṣaty ambudo bhūtvā śilībhūyāvatiṣṭhate //MU_3,40.24//
GSP27moksop_u:3912: yatheccham ambare yāti jaṭhare 'pi ca bhūbhṛtām / anantam ākāśavapur dhatte 'tha paramāṇutām //MU_3,40.25//
GSP27moksop_u:3913: bhavaty adrivarādhāro baddhapīṭho nabhaśśiraḥ / dehasyāntar bahir api dadhadvaratanūruham //MU_3,40.26//
GSP27moksop_u:3914: bhavaty ākāśam ādhatte koṭīḥ padmajasadmanām / ananyās svātmanāmbhodhir āvartaracana iva //MU_3,40.27//
GSP27moksop_u:3915: anudbhinnaprabodho 'sau sargādau cittadehakaḥ / ākāśātmā mahān bhūtvā vetti prakṛtitāṃ gataḥ //MU_3,40.28//
GSP27moksop_u:3916: asatyam eva vāritvaṃ buddhvodetīva tattayā / vandhyāputro 'yam asmīti yathā svapnabhrame naraḥ //MU_3,40.29//
GSP27moksop_u:3917: rāmaḥ: kiṃ cittam etad bhavati kiṃ vā bhavati no katham / katham evaṃmayād rūpān nānyad bhavati vā kṣaṇāt //MU_3,40.30//
GSP27moksop_u:3918: vasiṣṭhaḥ: pratyekam eva yac cittaṃ tad evaṃrūpaśaktimat / pṛthak pratyekam uditāḥ praticittaṃ jagadbhramāḥ //MU_3,40.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3919: kṣaṇakalpajagatsaṅgāt samudyanti galanti ca / nimeṣāt kasyacit kalpāt kasyacit tat kramaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,40.32//
GSP27moksop_u:3920: maraṇāder mahāmohād anantaram iyaṃ sthitiḥ / kṣaṇāc cirād vodety āśu tatremaṃ tvaṃ kramaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,40.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3921: maraṇādimayī mūrchā pratyekenānubhūyate / yaivaitāṃ viddhi sumate mahāpralayayāminīm //MU_3,40.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3922: tadante tanute sargaṃ sarva eva pṛthak pṛthak / sahajasvapnasaṅkalpasambhramācalavṛttivat //MU_3,40.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3923: mahāpralayarātryante virāḍātmā manovapuḥ / yathedaṃ tanute tadvat pratyekaṃ mṛtyanantaram //MU_3,40.36//
GSP27moksop_u:3924: rāmaḥ: mṛter anantaraṃ sargo yathā smṛtyānubhūyate / virāṭ tathānubhavati nāto viśvam akāraṇam //MU_3,40.37//
GSP27moksop_u:3925: vasiṣṭhaḥ: mahati pralaye rāma sarve hariharādayaḥ / videhamuktatāṃ yānti smṛteḥ ka iva sambhavaḥ //MU_3,40.38//
GSP27moksop_u:3926: asmadādiprabuddhātmā kilāvaśyaṃ vimucyate / kathaṃ bhavantu vāmuktā videhāḥ padmajādayaḥ //MU_3,40.39//
GSP27moksop_u:3927: adyatve te hi ye jīvās teṣāṃ maraṇajanmasu / smṛtiḥ kāraṇatām eti mokṣābhāvavaśād iha //MU_3,40.40//
GSP27moksop_u:3928: jīvo hi mṛtimūrchānte yad antaḥ pronmiṣann iva / anunmiṣita evāste tat pradhānam udāhṛtam //MU_3,40.41//
GSP27moksop_u:3929: tad vyoma prakṛtis soktā tad avyaktaṃ jaḍājaḍam / saṃsṛter asmṛteś caiva krama eṣa bhavodaye //MU_3,40.42//
GSP27moksop_u:3930: bodhonmukhatve hi mahat tat prabuddhaṃ yadā bhavet / tadā tanmātradikkālakriyābhūtādy udeti khāt //MU_3,40.43//
GSP27moksop_u:3931: tad evocchūnam ābuddhaṃ bhavatīndriyapañcakam/ tad eva budhyate dehaṃ sa eṣo 'sty ātivāhikaḥ //MU_3,40.44//
GSP27moksop_u:3932: cirakālapratyayataḥ kalpanāparipīvaraḥ / ādhibhautikatābodham ādhatte 'thaiṣa eva vaḥ //MU_3,40.45//
GSP27moksop_u:3933: tato dikkālakalanās tadādhāratayā sthitāḥ / udyanty anuditā eva vāyau spandakriyā iva //MU_3,40.46//
GSP27moksop_u:3934: vṛddhim ittham ayaṃ yāto mudhaiva bhuvanabhramaḥ / svapnāṅganāsaṅgasamas svanubhūto 'py asanmayaḥ //MU_3,40.46 [sic!]//
GSP27moksop_u:3935: yadaiva mriyate jantuḥ paśyaty āśu tadaiva saḥ / tatraiva bhuvanābhogam idam ittham avasthitam //MU_3,40.47//
GSP27moksop_u:3936: vyomnaivānubhavaty accham ahaṃ jagad iti bhramam / vyomarūpaṃ vyomarūpī jīvo jāta ivātmavān //MU_3,40.48//
GSP27moksop_u:3939: ahaṃ jāto 'munā pitrā kilātrety āttaniścayam / iyaṃ mātā dhanam idaṃ mamety uditavāsanam //MU_3,40.51//
GSP27moksop_u:3940: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ceti mameti kṛtakalpanam / bālo 'bhūvam ahaṃ tv adya yuveti vilasan hṛdi //MU_3,40.52//
GSP27moksop_u:3941: pratyekam evam uditas saṃsāravanaṣaṇḍakaḥ / tārākusumito nīlameghacañcalapallavaḥ //MU_3,40.53//
GSP27moksop_u:3944: yatraiṣa mriyate jīvas tatraivaṃ paśyati kṣaṇāt / pratyekam uditeṣv evaṃ jagatṣaṇḍeṣu bhūriśaḥ //MU_3,40.56//
GSP27moksop_u:3946: yātā yāsyanti yānty etā dṛṣtayo 'naṣṭarūpiṇi / yā brahmaṇy upabṛṃhāḍhye tāḥ ke gaṇayituṃ kṣamāḥ //MU_3,40.58//
GSP27moksop_u:3947: evaṃ kuḍyamayaṃ viśvaṃ nāsty eva mananād ṛte / mananaṃ ca kham evātas tad idānīṃ vicāraya //MU_3,40.59//
GSP27moksop_u:3948: yad eva tac cidākāśaṃ tad eva paramaṃ smṛtaṃ / mananaṃ ca cidākāśaṃ tad eva paramaṃ padam //MU_3,40.60//
GSP27moksop_u:3949: yad evāmbu sa āvarto na tv asty āvarta vastusat / dṛṣṭvaivāste dṛśyam iva dṛśyaṃ na tv asti vastusat //MU_3,40.61//
GSP27moksop_u:3950: cidvyomno bhūtanabhasi kacanaṃ yan maṇer iva / taj jagad bhāti nānātmaratnaṃ śvabhram ivāmbare //MU_3,40.62//
GSP27moksop_u:3951: madbuddhārtho jagacchabdo vidyate paramaṃ padam / tvadbuddhārthas tu nāsty eva tvamahaṃśabdakāv api //MU_3,40.63//
GSP27moksop_u:3952: tasmāl līlāsarasvatyāv ākāśavapuṣau sthite / sarvage paramātmācche sarvatrāpratighe 'naghe //MU_3,40.64//
GSP27moksop_u:3953: yatra tatra tadā vyomni yathākāśaṃ yathepsitam / udayaṃ kurutas tena tadgṛhe te sthitiṃ gate //MU_3,40.65//
GSP27moksop_u:3954: sarvatra sambhavati cidgaganaṃ tadantas tadvedanaṃ kalanam āmananaṃ visāri / tac cātivāhikam ihāhur akuḍyam eva dehaṃ kathaṃ ka iva taṃ vada kiṃ ruṇaddhi //MU_3,40.66//
GSP27moksop_u:3957: tayoḥ praviṣṭayor devyoḥ padmasadma babhūva tat / candradvayodayoddyotadhavalodarasundaram //MU_3,41.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3959: saubhāgyanandanodyānaṃ vidrutavyādhivedanam / savasantaṃ vanam iva phullaṃ prātar ivāmbujam //MU_3,41.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3960: tayor dehaprabhāpūraiś śaśiniṣṣyandaśītalaiḥ / āhlādito 'sau bubudhe rājokṣita ivāmṛtaiḥ //MU_3,41.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3961: āsanadvayaviśrāntaṃ sa dadarśāpsarodvayam / meruśṛṅgadvaye līnaṃ candradvayam ivoditam //MU_3,41.5//
GSP27moksop_u:3962: nimeṣam iva sañcintya sa vismitamanā nṛpaḥ / uttasthau śayanāc cheṣād iva cakragadādharaḥ //MU_3,41.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3964: upadhānapradeśasthāt svayaṃ paṭalakodarāt / baddhapadmāsano bhūmau bhūtvovācedam ānataḥ //MU_3,41.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3966: tayor uktveti tatyāja pādayoḥ kusumāñjalim / tīradrumo vikasitaṃ padminyoḥ padmayor iva //MU_3,41.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3967: līlāyai bhūpajanmātha vaktuṃ mantriṇam īśvarī / bodhayām āsa pārśvasthaṃ saṅkalpena sarasvatī //MU_3,41.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3968: prabuddho 'psarasau dṛṣṭvā praṇamya kusumāñjalim / tayoḥ pādeṣu santyajya viveśa purato nataḥ //MU_3,41.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3969: uvāca devī he rājan kas tvam kasya sutaḥ kadā / iha jāta iti śrutvā sa mantrī vākyam abravīt //MU_3,41.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3970: devyau yuṣmatprasādo 'yaṃ bhavatyor api yat puraḥ / vaktuṃ śaknomi tad idaṃ śrūyatāṃ janma matprabhoḥ //MU_3,41.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3971: āsīd ikṣvākuvaṃśottho rājā rājīvalocanaḥ / śrīmatkundaratho nāma dośchāyācchāditāvaniḥ //MU_3,41.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3972: tasyābhūd induvadanaḥ putro bhadrarathābhidhaḥ / tasya viśvarathaḥ putras tasya putro bṛhadrathaḥ //MU_3,41.16//
GSP27moksop_u:3973: tasya sindhurathaḥ putras tasya śailarathas sutaḥ / tasya kāmarathaḥ putras tasya putro mahārathaḥ //MU_3,41.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3974: tasya viṣṇurathaḥ putras tasya putraḥ kalārathaḥ / tasya sūryarathaḥ putras tasya putro nabhorathaḥ //MU_3,41.18//
GSP27moksop_u:3975: ayam asmatprabhus tasya putraḥ pūrṇāmaladyuteḥ / amṛtāpūritarathaḥ kṣīrodasyeva candramāḥ //MU_3,41.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3976: mahadbhiḥ puṇyasambhārair vidūratha iti śrutaḥ / jāto mātus sumitrāyā gauryā guha ivāparaḥ //MU_3,41.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3977: pitāsya daśavarṣasya dattvā rājyaṃ vanaṃ gataḥ / pālayaty eṣa bhūpīṭhaṃ tataḥprabhṛti dharmataḥ //MU_3,41.21//
GSP27moksop_u:3978: bhavantyāv adya samprāpte phalite sukṛtadrume / devyau dīrghatapaḥkleśaśataduṣprāpadarśane //MU_3,41.22//
GSP27moksop_u:3979: ity ayaṃ vasudhādhīśo vidūratha iti śrutaḥ / adya yuṣmatprasādena parāṃ pāvanatāṃ gataḥ //MU_3,41.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3980: ity uktvā saṃsthite tūṣṇīṃ mantriṇy avanipe tathā / kṛtāñjalau natamukhe baddhapadmāsane 'vanau //MU_3,41.24//
GSP27moksop_u:3981: rājan smara vivekena pūrvajātim imāṃ svayam / vadantī mūrdhni pasparśa taṃ kareṇa sarasvatī //MU_3,41.25//
GSP27moksop_u:3982: atha hārdatamomāyā padmasya kṣayam āyayau / savikāsaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ jñaptisparśād athābhavat //MU_3,41.26//
GSP27moksop_u:3983: sasmāra pūrvavṛttāntam antassphurad iva sthitam / anyadehaikarājatvaṃ līlāvilasitānvitam //MU_3,41.27//
GSP27moksop_u:3984: jñātvā prajñaptivṛttāntaṃ līlāyatnavijṛmbhitam / ātmodantaṃ babhūvāsāv uhyamāna ivārṇave //MU_3,41.28//
GSP27moksop_u:3985: uvācātmani saṃsāre bata māyeyam ātatā / parijñātā prasādena devyor iha mayādhunā //MU_3,41.29//
GSP27moksop_u:3986: he devyau kim idaṃ nāma dinam ekaṃ mṛtasya me / gatam adyeha yātāni vayo varṣāṇi saptatiḥ //MU_3,41.30//
GSP27moksop_u:3987: smarāmy anekakāryāṇi smarāmi prapitāmaham / smarāmi bālyaṃ tāruṇyaṃ mitrabandhuparicchadam //MU_3,41.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3988: jñaptiḥ: rājan mṛtimahāmohamūrchāyās samanantaram / tasmiṃl lokāntare 'tīte tasminn eva muhūrtake //MU_3,41.32//
GSP27moksop_u:3989: tasminn eva gṛhe 'thāsmin naiva vetsy atha vacmi te / ayaṃ tasya gṛhasyāntar vyomany eva kila sthitaḥ //MU_3,41.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3990: girigrāmakaviprasya gṛhe 'ntar bhūpamaṇḍapaḥ / tasyāntar idam ābhāti pratyekaṃ ca jagadgṛham //MU_3,41.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3991: kila brāhmaṇagehāntar jīvas te madvarāt sthitaḥ / tatraiva tasya bhūpīṭhaṃ tasmiṃś ca nijamaṇḍapaḥ //MU_3,41.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3992: tasyaiva ca gṛhasyāntar idaṃ saṃsāramaṇḍalam / tatraivedaṃ tava gṛhaṃ sthitam ārambhamantharam //MU_3,41.36//
GSP27moksop_u:3993: tatraiva cetasi tava nirmalākāśanirmale / pratibhāsāgatam idaṃ vyavahārabhramaṃ tatam //MU_3,41.37//
GSP27moksop_u:3994: vidūrathaḥ: yathedaṃ nāma me janma tathekṣvākukulaṃ mama / etannāmāna ete me purābhūvan pitāmahāḥ //MU_3,41.38//
GSP27moksop_u:3995: jāto 'ham abhavaṃ bālo daśavarśasya me pitā / parivrāḍ vipinaṃ yāta iha rājye 'bhiṣicya mām //MU_3,41.39//
GSP27moksop_u:3996: tato digvijayaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā rājyam akaṇṭakam / amībhir mantribhiḥ pauraiḥ pālayāmi vasundharām //MU_3,41.40//
GSP27moksop_u:3997: yajñakriyākramavato dharme pālayataḥ prajāḥ / vayasas samatītāni mama varṣāṇi saptatiḥ //MU_3,41.41//
GSP27moksop_u:3998: idaṃ parabalaṃ prāptaṃ mama dāruṇavigraham / yuddhaṃ kṛtvedam āyāto gṛham asmi yathāsthitam //MU_3,41.42//
GSP27moksop_u:3999: ime devyau gṛhaṃ prāpte mamaite pūjayāmy aham / pūjitā hi prayacchanti devatās svaṃ samīhitam //MU_3,41.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4000: mameyam etayor ekā jñānaṃ jātismṛtipradam / iha dattavatī devī bhābjasyeva vikāsanam //MU_3,41.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4001: idānīṃ kṛtakṛtyo 'smi jāto 'smi gatasaṃśayaḥ / śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam //MU_3,41.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4002: sarasvatī: itīyam ātatā bhrāntir bhavato bhūrisambhramā / nānāhāravihārāḍhyā salokāntarasañcarā //MU_3,41.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4003: yasminn eva muhūrte tvaṃ mṛtim abhyāgataḥ purā / tadaiva pratibhaiṣā te svayam abhyuditā hṛdi //MU_3,41.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4004: ekām āvartavalanāṃ tyaktvādhatte yathāparām / kṣipram eva nadīvāhaś citpravāhas tathaiva vaḥ //MU_3,41.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4005: āvartāntarasaṃmiśro yathāvartaḥ pravartate / kadācid evaṃ sargaśrīr miśrāmiśrā ca vardhate //MU_3,41.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4006: tasmin mṛtimuhūrte te pratibhānam upāgatam / etaj jālam asadrūpaṃ cidbhāge sad iva sthitam //MU_3,41.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4007: yathā svapnamuhūrte 'ntas saṃvatsaraśatakramaḥ / yathā saṅkalpanirmāṇe jīvitān maraṇaṃ punaḥ //MU_3,41.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4008: yathā gandharvanagare kuḍyamaṇḍapakuṭṭanam / yathā nauyānasaṃrambhe vṛkṣaparvatacopanam //MU_3,41.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4009: yathā svadhātusaṅkṣobhe puraparvatanartanam / yathā samañjasaṃ svapne svaśiraḥparikartanam //MU_3,41.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4010: mithyaiveyam iha prauḍhā bhrāntir ātatarūpiṇī / vastutas tu na jāto 'si na mṛto 'si kadācana //MU_3,41.54//
GSP27moksop_u:4011: śuddhavijñānarūpas tvaṃ śāntam ātmani tiṣṭhasi / paśyasīvaitad akhilaṃ na ca paśyasi kiñcana //MU_3,41.55//
GSP27moksop_u:4012: sarvātmakatayā nityaṃ prakacasy ātmanātmani / mahāmaṇir ivodāra āloka iva bhāsuraḥ //MU_3,41.56//
GSP27moksop_u:4013: vastutas tu na bhūpīṭham idam na ca bhavān ayam / na ceme girayo grāmā na ceha na ca vai vayam //MU_3,41.57//
GSP27moksop_u:4014: girigrāmakaviprasya maṇḍapākāśake kila / tal līlāpatirājyāḍhyaṃ jagad ābhāti bhāsuram //MU_3,41.58//
GSP27moksop_u:4015: tatra līlārājadhānīmaṇḍapo maṇḍitākṛtiḥ / bhāti tasyodare vyomni tavedaṃ vitataṃ jagat //MU_3,41.59//
GSP27moksop_u:4016: yasmiñ jagati gehe 'ntar yasmin vayam iha sthitāḥ / evaṃ teṣāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vyoma vyomaiva nirmalam //MU_3,41.60//
GSP27moksop_u:4017: teṣu maṇḍapakheṣv asti na mahī na ca pattanam / na vanāni va śailaughā na meghasaridarṇavāḥ //MU_3,41.61//
GSP27moksop_u:4018: kevalaṃ tatra niśśūnye viharanti gṛhe janāḥ / na paśyanti jagan nāpi pārthivān na ca bhūdharān //MU_3,41.62//
GSP27moksop_u:4019: vidūrathaḥ: evaṃ cet tat kathaṃ devi mamehānucarā ime / sampannā ātmanā santi te kim ātmani nāthavā //MU_3,41.63//
GSP27moksop_u:4020: jagat svapnārthavad bhāti tatra svapne navādrayaḥ / katham ātmani satyās syur nāsatyā veti me vada //MU_3,41.64//
GSP27moksop_u:4021: devī: rājan viditavedyeṣu śuddhabodhaikarūpiṣu / na kiñcid etat sadrūpaṃ cidvyomātmasu jāgatam //MU_3,41.65//
GSP27moksop_u:4022: śuddhabodhātmano bhāti kuto nāma jagadbhramaḥ / rajjvāṃ sarpabhrame śānte punas sarpabhramaḥ kutaḥ //MU_3,41.66//
GSP27moksop_u:4023: asadbhāte parijñāte kutas sattā jagadbhrame / parijñāte marujale punar jalamatiḥ kutaḥ //MU_3,41.67//
GSP27moksop_u:4024: svapnakāle parijñāte sve svapnamaraṇe kutaḥ / svasvapne svapnamṛtibhīr amṛtasyaiva jāyate //MU_3,41.68//
GSP27moksop_u:4025: buddhasya śuddhasya śarannabhaśśrīsvacchāvadātasya ghanāśayasya / ahaṃ jagac ceti kuśabdakārthavarjaṃ yad asty aṅganavācikaṃ tat //MU_3,41.69//
GSP27moksop_u:4026: vālmīkiḥ: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma / snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,41.70//
GSP27moksop_u:4029: yas tv abuddhamatir mūḍho rūḍho na vitate pade / vajrasāram idaṃ tasya jagad asty asad eva sat //MU_3,42.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4030: yathā bālasya vetālo mṛtiparyantaduḥkhadaḥ / asad eva sadākāraṃ tathā mūḍhamater jagat //MU_3,42.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4031: tāpa eva yathā vāri mṛgāṇāṃ bhramakāraṇam / asatyam eva satyābhaṃ tathā mūḍhadhiyāṃ jagat //MU_3,42.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4032: yathā svapne mṛtir jantor asatyā satyarūpiṇī / nārthakriyākarī bhāti tathedaṃ durvidāṃ jagat //MU_3,42.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4033: avyutpannasya kanake kānake kaṭake yathā / kaṭakajñaptir evāsti na manāg api hemadhīḥ //MU_3,42.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4034: yathājñasya purāgāranaganāgendrakalpanā / iyaṃ dṛśyadṛg evāsti na tv anyā paramārthadṛk //MU_3,42.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4035: yathā nabhasi muktālīpiñchakeśoṇḍukādayaḥ / asatyās satyatāṃ yātā tathedaṃ durdṛśāṃ jagat //MU_3,42.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4036: dīrghasvapnam idam viśvaṃ viddhy ahantādisaṃyutam / atrānye svapnapuruṣā yathā satyās tathā śṛṇu //MU_3,42.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4037: asti sarvagataṃ śāntaṃ paramārthaghanaṃ śuci / acetyacinmātravapuḥ paramākāśam ātatam //MU_3,42.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4038: tat sarvagaṃ sarvaśakti sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ svayam / yatra yatra yathodeti tathāste tatra tatra vai //MU_3,42.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4039: tena svapnapure draṣṭā yān vetti puravāsinaḥ / narān iti narā eva kṣaṇāt tasya bhavanti te //MU_3,42.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4040: yad draṣṭuś citsvarūpaṃ tat svapnākāśāntarasthitam / svapnākāśacitāhaṃ hi naro 'neneti bhāvitam //MU_3,42.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4041: citpakṣataikyavaśato narataivāvabudhyate / ātmany ato digdvayena dvayor apy eti satyatā //MU_3,42.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4042: rāmaḥ: svapne te svapnapuruṣā na satyās syur mune yadā / vada tat ko bhaved doṣo māyāmātraśarīriṇi //MU_3,42.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4043: vasiṣṭhaḥ: svapne 'nyapuravāstavyā vastutas satyarūpiṇaḥ / pramāṇam atra śṛṇu me pratyakṣaṃ nāma netarat //MU_3,42.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4044: sargādāv ātmabhūr bhāti svapnābho 'nubhavātmakaḥ / tatsaṅkalpakalā viśvam evaṃ svapnābham eva tat //MU_3,42.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4045: evaṃ viśvam idaṃ svapnas tatra satyaṃ bhavān mama / yathaiva tvaṃ tathaivānye svapne svapnaṃ tathā nṛṇām //MU_3,42.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4046: svapne nagaravāstavyās satyā na syur ime yadi / tad ihāpi tadākāre na satyaṃ me bhavān api //MU_3,42.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4047: yathāhaṃ tava satyātmā satyam evaṃ bhavān mama / svapnopalambhe saṃsāre mithas siddhyai prathedṛśī //MU_3,42.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4048: saṃsāravipule svapne yathā satyam ahaṃ tava / tathā tvam api me satyaṃ sarvasvapneṣv iti kramaḥ //MU_3,42.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4049: rāmaḥ: svapnadraṣṭari nirnidre tad dṛṣṭaṃ svapnapattanam / sadrūpatvāt tathaivāste mamaivaṃ bhagavan matiḥ //MU_3,42.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4050: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evam etat tathaivāste satyatvāt svapnapattanam / svapnadraṣṭari nirnidre 'py ākāśaviṣadākṛtiḥ //MU_3,42.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4051: etad āstām idaṃ tāvad yaj jāgrad iti manyase / viddhi tat svapnam evāntar deśakālādyapūrakam //MU_3,42.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4052: evaṃ sarvam idaṃ bhāti na satyaṃ satyavat sthitam / rañjayaty api mithyaiva svapnastrīsuratopamam //MU_3,42.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4053: sarvatra vartate sarvaṃ dehasyāntar bahis tathā / yat tu vetti yathā saṃvit tat tathāśv eva paśyati //MU_3,42.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4054: yat kośe vidyate dravyaṃ tad dṛṣṭvā labhyate yathā / tathāsti sarvaṃ cidvyomni labhyate yat pracetyate //MU_3,42.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4055: vasiṣṭhaḥ: anantaram uvācedaṃ devī jñaptir vidūratham / kṛtvā bodhāmṛtāsekair vivekāṅkurasundaram //MU_3,42.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4056: sarasvatī: tad evam eṣa rājaṃs tvaṃ līlārtham upavarṇitaḥ / svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāvo dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_3,42.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4057: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti proktaṃ sarasvatyā girā madhuravarṇayā / uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān bhūmipālo vidūrathaḥ //MU_3,42.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4058: mamāpi darśanaṃ devi moghaṃ bhavati nārthini / mahāphalapradāyās tu kathaṃ tava bhaviṣyati //MU_3,42.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4059: ahaṃ dehaṃ samutsṛjya lokāntaram itaḥ param / nijam āyāmi he devi svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yathā //MU_3,42.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4060: atrādiśāśu māṃ mātaḥ prapannaṃ śaraṇāgatam / bhakte 'vahelā varade mahatāṃ na virājate //MU_3,42.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4061: yaṃ pradeśam aham yāmi tam evāyātv ayaṃ mama / mantrī kumārī caiveyaṃ bāleti kuru me dayām //MU_3,42.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4062: sarasvatī: āgaccha rājyam ucitāṅgavicāracāru prāgjanmamaṇḍalavare kuru nirviśaṅkam / asmābhir arthijanakāmanirākṛtir hi dṛṣṭā na kācana kadācid apīti viddhi //MU_3,42.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4065: sarasvatī: asmin raṇavare rājan mṛtavyaṃ bhavatādhunā / prāptavyaṃ prāktanaṃ rājyam etat pratyakṣam eva me //MU_3,43.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4066: kumāryā mantriṇā caiva tvayā ca prāktanaṃ puram / āgantavyaṃ śavībhūtaṃ prāptavyaṃ taccharīrakam //MU_3,43.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4067: āvāṃ yāvo yathāyātaṃ vātarūpeṇa ca tvayā / āgantavyaś ca taddeśaḥ kumāryā mantriṇāpi ca //MU_3,43.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4068: anyaiva gatir aśvasya gatir anyā kharoṣṭrayoḥ / madaklinnakapolasya gatir anyaiva dantinaḥ //MU_3,43.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4069: prastuteti kathā yāvan mitho madhurabhāṣiṇoḥ / tāvad praviśya sambhrānta uvācordhvaṃ sthito naraḥ //MU_3,43.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4070: deva sāyakacakrāsigadāparighavṛṣṭimat / mahat parabalaṃ prāptam ekārṇava ivoddhataḥ //MU_3,43.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4072: nagare nagasaṅkāśe lagno 'gnir vyāptadiktaṭaḥ / dahaṃś caṭacaṭāsphoṭaiḥ pātayaty uttamāḥ purīḥ //MU_3,43.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4073: kalpāmbudaghaṭātulyā vyomni dhūmamahādrayaḥ / balāt proḍḍayanaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttā garuḍā iva //MU_3,43.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4074: vasiṣṭhaḥ: sasambhramaṃ vadanty evaṃ puruṣe paruṣārave / udabhūt pūrayann āśā bahiḥ kolāhalo mahān //MU_3,43.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4075: balād ākṛṣṭakarṇānāṃ dhanuṣāṃ śaravarṣiṇām / bṛhatāṃ mattamattānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ tarasvinām //MU_3,43.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4076: pure caṭacaṭāsphoṭair vellatāṃ jātavedasām / paurāṇāṃ dagdhadārāṇāṃ mahāhalahalāravaiḥ //MU_3,43.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4077: taratām agnikhaṇḍānāṃ ṣvakkārakaṭhināravam / jvalantīnāṃ parispandād dhvagadhvagiti cārciṣām //MU_3,43.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4078: atha vātāyanād devyau mantrī rājā vidūrathaḥ / dadṛśuḥ pronnamannādaṃ mahāniśi mahāpuram //MU_3,43.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4092: atha śuśrāva tatrāsau giro rājā vidūrathaḥ / yodhānāṃ dahyamānānāṃ paśyatām abhidhāvatām //MU_3,43.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4093: hā mattamarud ūrdhvasthān aṅgāragṛhapādapān / raṇatkhagavaralīnajvalanān pātayan sthitaḥ //MU_3,43.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4094: hā khaḍgadhārā prāleyaśītā deheṣu dantinām / lagnā manassu mahatām iva vijñānasūktayaḥ //MU_3,43.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4095: hā tāta hetayo lagnās taruṇīkavarītṛṇe / jvalanti śuṣkaparṇaughā iva vīrānaleritāḥ //MU_3,43.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4096: āvartavartinī dīrghā vahaty ūrdhvaṃ taraṅginī / paśyeyaṃ dhūmayamunā vyomagaṅgāṃ pradhāvati //MU_3,43.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4098: asya mātā pitā bhrātā jāmātā tanayas sutā / asmin sadmani nirdagdhā dagdhaiṣām antam icchati //MU_3,43.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4099: hā hā hā gaccha bhoś śīghram etad aṅgāramandiram / itaḥ pravṛttaṃ patituṃ sumeroś śikharaṃ yathā //MU_3,43.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4100: aho śaraśilāśaktikuntaprāsāsihetayaḥ / jvālāsandhyabhrapaṭalaṃ viśanti śalabhā iva //MU_3,43.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4101: hetipravāhā jvalanaṃ nabhas sarve viśanty aho / vaḍavānalam ujjvālam arṇaḥpūrā ivārṇavāt //MU_3,43.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4102: dhūmāyante mahābhrāṇi jvālāśikharakoṭiṣu / sarasāny api śuṣyanti hṛdayānīva rāginām //MU_3,43.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4103: ālānatvaruṣaivaitā dantibhir vṛkṣapaṅktayaḥ / sphuṭatkaṭakaṭārāvaṃ pātyante kṛtapītkṛtaiḥ //MU_3,43.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4104: pluṣṭapuṣpaphalaskandhagandhaśrīkā gṛhadrumāḥ / gatā nirdagdhasarvasvā gṛhasthā iva dīnatām //MU_3,43.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4105: mātāpitṛvinirmuktā bālakās timirāvalīḥ / mathnanto 'ṅgeṣu rathyāsu kuḍyapātena hā hatāḥ //MU_3,43.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4106: vata vidrāvitāndhasya kariṇo raṇamūrdhani / patadaṅgārakāgārabhāriṇaḥ kaṭukūjitam //MU_3,43.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4107: hā kaṣṭham asinirbhinnaskandhe sannadṛḍholmuke / patito yantrapāṣāṇaḥ puruṣasyāśanir yathā //MU_3,43.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4108: gavāśvamahiṣājoṣṭraśvaśṛgālavṛkair aho / ghoro raṇa ihārabdho mārgarodhaka ākulaiḥ //MU_3,43.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4109: paṭaiḥ paṭapaṭāśabdair jvalajjvālālimārutaiḥ / ākrandinyas striyo yānti sthalapadmācitā iva //MU_3,43.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4110: strīṇāṃ jvālālavāḥ paśya lihanty alakavallarīḥ / kurvanto 'śokapuṣpābhāṃ karabhā iva pannagīḥ //MU_3,43.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4111: hā hā hariṇaśāvākṣyāḥ pakṣmalekṣaṇapakṣmasu / kuśāgreṣv iva viśrāntim eti kārṣāṇavī śikhā //MU_3,43.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4112: dahyamāno 'pi niryāti na kalatraṃ vinā naraḥ / aho bata durucchedāḥ prāṇināṃ snehavāgurāḥ //MU_3,43.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4113: karī rabhasanirbhinnajvaladaṅgārapādapaiḥ / pluṣṭapuṣkarakaḥ kopān mathnāty utpuṣkaraṃ saraḥ //MU_3,43.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4115: iha dhūmas sphuradvahnikaṇa āvartavṛttimān / sthita āpīḍavān vyomni ratnapūra ivāmbare //MU_3,43.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4116: gauram ambaram ābhāti jvālāśikharatejasā / mṛtyor ivotsave dattaḥ kuṅkumāṅkaḥ kadarthakaḥ //MU_3,43.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4117: aho nu viṣamaṃ vairaṃ vartate vṛttivarjitam / hriyante rājanāryo 'pi varavīrair udāyudhaiḥ //MU_3,43.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4123: ka ivāsmatparitrātā syād ity ādīnavīkṣitaiḥ / utpalair iva varṣadbhiḥ pariroditasainikāḥ //MU_3,43.59//
GSP27moksop_u:4125: ālolamālyavasanābharaṇāṅgarāgā īrṣyākulānanacalālakavallarīkāḥ / ānandasundaraniraṅkuśamathyamānāt kāmārṇavāt samuditā iva rājalakṣmyaḥ //MU_3,43.61//
GSP27moksop_u:4128: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etasminn antare rājamahiṣī mattayauvanā / tad viveśa gṛhaṃ lakṣmīr iva paṅkajakoṭaram //MU_3,44.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4129: ālolamālyavasanā cchinnahāralatākulā / anuyātā vayasyābhir dāsībhir bhayavihvalā //MU_3,44.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4130: candrānanāvadātāṅgī śvāsotkampipayodharā / tārakākāradaśanā sthitā dyaur iva rūpiṇī //MU_3,44.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4131: atha tasyā vayasyaikā rājānaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat / vṛtrasaṅgrāmasaṃrabhdam amarendram ivāpsarāḥ //MU_3,44.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4132: deva devī sahāsmābhiḥ palāyyāntaḥpurāntarāt / śaraṇaṃ devam āyātā vātārteva latā drumam //MU_3,44.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4133: rājadārā hṛtās stenair balavadbhir udāyudhaiḥ / ūrmijālair mahābdhīnāṃ tīre drumalatā iva //MU_3,44.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4134: antaḥpurādhipās sarve piṣṭāś śatrubhir uddhataiḥ / aśaṅkitābhipatitair vātair iva vanadrumāḥ //MU_3,44.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4135: pūreṇāśaṅkam āyātaiḥ parair naḥ puram āhṛtam / rātrau varṣāsv ivodgārair udakaplavavāribhiḥ //MU_3,44.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4136: dhūmravarmabhir unnādair lelihānāgrahetibhiḥ / vahnibhir naḥ puraṃ vyāptaṃ parayodhaiś ca bhūribhiḥ //MU_3,44.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4137: parivāravilāsinyo devya āhṛtya mūrdhajaiḥ / ākrandantyo balān nītāḥ kurarya iva dhīvaraiḥ //MU_3,44.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4138: iti no yeyam āyātā śākhā prasaraśālinī / āpat tām alam uddhartuṃ devasyaivāsti śaktitā //MU_3,44.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4139: ity ākarṇyāvalokyāsau devyau yuddhāya yāmy aham / kṣamyatāṃ mama bhāryeyaṃ yuṣmatpādābjaṣaṭpadī //MU_3,44.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4140: ity uktvā niryayau rājā kopākulitacetanaḥ / mattebhanirbhinnavanaḥ kandarād iva keśarī //MU_3,44.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4141: līlā līlāṃ dadarśātha svākārasadṛśākṛtim / pratibimbam ivāyātām ādarśe cārudarśanām //MU_3,44.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4142: prabuddhalīlā: kim idaṃ devi me brūhi kasmād iyam ahaṃ sthitā / yā sābhavam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ kathaṃ seyam iha sthitā //MU_3,44.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4143: mantriprabhṛtayaḥ paurā yodhās sabalavāhanāḥ / sarva eva ta eveme sthitās tatra tathaiva ye //MU_3,44.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4144: tatrāpīdam ayaṃ devi sarve katham iha sthitāḥ / bahir antaś ca makura ivaite kiṃ pracetanāḥ //MU_3,44.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4145: devī: yathā jñaptir udety antas tathānubhavati kṣaṇāt / citiś cetyārthatām eti cittaṃ cittārthatām iva //MU_3,44.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4146: yādṛgbhāvana evāntaścetanas tanute smṛtim / tādṛgarthajagadrūpas tatraivodeti tatkṣaṇāt //MU_3,44.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4147: na deśakāladīrghatvaṃ na vaicitryaṃ padārthajam / bāhyam asty antaraṃ bhāti svapnārtho 'tra nidarśanam //MU_3,44.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4148: yad antas svapnasaṅkalpapuravat kacanaṃ citeḥ / tad etad bāhyanāmnaiva svābhyāsāt susphuṭaṃ sthitam //MU_3,44.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4149: yādṛgbhāvo mṛto bhartā tava tasmiṃs tadā pure / tādṛgbhāvas tam evārthaṃ tatraiva samupāgataḥ //MU_3,44.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4150: anya eva hy amī bhṛtyās tebhyas tatsadṛśā api / sadrūpā eva caitasya svapnasaṅkalpasainyavat //MU_3,44.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4151: avisaṃvādi sarvārtharūpaṃ yad anubhūyate / tasya tāvad vada kathaṃ kīdṛśī vāpy asatyatā //MU_3,44.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4152: athavottarakāle tu bhaṅguratvān na vastusat / tad īdṛk sarvam evedaṃ tatra kā nāstikādhikā //MU_3,44.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4153: svapno jāgraty asadrūpas svapne jāgrad asadvapuḥ / mṛtir janmany asadrūpā mṛtau janmāpy asanmayam //MU_3,44.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4154: vicāraviśarārutvād anubhūteś ca sundari / evaṃ na san nāsad idaṃ bhrāntimātraṃ vibhāsate //MU_3,44.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4155: mahākalpāntasampattāv apy adyānyayuge 'thavā / na kadācana yan nāśi tad brahmaivāsti taj jagat //MU_3,44.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4156: tasmin madhye kacantīmā bhrāntayas sṛṣṭināmikāḥ / vyomni keśoṇḍukānīva na kacanti tu vastutaḥ //MU_3,44.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4157: yathā taraṅgā jaladhau tathemās sṛṣṭayaḥ pare / utpatyotpatya līyante rajāṃsīva mahānile //MU_3,44.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4158: tasmād bhrāntimayābhāse mithyātvam ahamātmake / mṛgatṛṣṇājalaraye kevāsthā sargabhasmani //MU_3,44.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4159: bhrāntayaś ca na tatrānyās tās tā eva paraṃ padam / ghane tamasi yakṣābhā tama eva na yakṣakāḥ //MU_3,44.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4160: tasmāj janma mṛtir moho vyomāhaṃ tvam idaṃ tatam / sarvaṃ tac ca mahākalpaśāntau yad avaśiṣyate //MU_3,44.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4161: nātas satyam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na cāsatyaṃ kadācana / dvayam evaitad atha vā brahma tatraiva sambhavat //MU_3,44.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4162: ākāśaparamāṇvantar dravyāder aṇuke 'pi vā / jīvāṇur yatra tatredaṃ jagad vetti nijaṃ vapuḥ //MU_3,44.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4163: agnir auṣṇyaṃ yathā vetti nijabhāvakramoditam / paśyatīdaṃ tathaivātmā svātmabhūtaṃ viśuddhacit //MU_3,44.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4164: yathā sūryātape gehe bhramanti trasareṇavaḥ / tatheme paramākāśe brahmāṇḍatrasareṇavaḥ //MU_3,44.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4165: yathā vāyau sthitas spanda āmodaś śaityam ambare / piṇḍagrahavinirmuktaṃ tathā viśvaṃ sthitam pare //MU_3,44.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4167: sākārasyeva bodhāya vijñeyā bhavatādhunā / ananyās svātmanas te syus taror avayavā iva //MU_3,44.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4168: yathāsthitam idaṃ viśvaṃ nijabhāvakramoditam / riktaṃ tad viśvaśabdārthair ananyad brahmaṇi sthitam //MU_3,44.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4169: na tat satyaṃ na cāsatyaṃ rajjvāṃ sarpabhramopamam / mithyānubhūtitas satyam asatyaṃ tat parīkṣaṇāt //MU_3,44.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4170: paramaṃ kāraṇaṃ vittvāj jīvatvam iva vetty alam / atas tad evānubhavañ jīvatvaṃ vindate sphuṭam //MU_3,44.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4171: satyaṃ bhavaty asatyaṃ vā khe 'pi bhātam idaṃ jagat / rañjayaty eva jīvāṇuṃ svotthābhir anubhūtibhiḥ //MU_3,44.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4172: anubhūtaya etās tu kāścit pūrvānubhūtitaḥ / apūrvānubhavāḥ kāścit samāś caivāsamāś ca tāḥ //MU_3,44.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4173: kvacit kadācit tā eva kvacid eva samā api / kacanty asatyās satyābhā jīvākāśe 'nubhūtayaḥ //MU_3,44.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4174: tatkulās tatsamācārās tajjanmānas tadīhitāḥ / ta eva mantriṇaḥ paurāḥ pratibhāne bhavanti vaḥ //MU_3,44.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4175: te caivātmany alaṃ satyā deśakālehitais samāḥ / sarvagātmasvarūpāyāḥ pratibhāyā iti sthitiḥ //MU_3,44.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4176: yathā rājātmani vyomni pratibhodeti sanmayī / tathānv agagragodeti satyaiva pratibhāsvare //MU_3,44.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4177: tvacchīlā tvatsamācārā tvatkulā tvadvapuṣmayī / iti līleyam ābhāti pratibhā pratibimbajā //MU_3,44.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4178: sarvage saṃvidādarśe pratibhā pratibimbati / yādṛśī yatra sā tatra tathodeti nirantarā //MU_3,44.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4179: jīvākāśasya yāntassthā pratibhā kacati svayam / sā bahiḥ khe cidādarśapratibimbād iyaṃ sthitā //MU_3,44.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4180: eṣā tvam ambaram ahaṃ bhuvanaṃ dharādi rājeti sarvam ajam eva vibhātamātram / cidvyoma bilvajaṭharaṃ vidur aṅga viddhi tvaṃ ceti śāntam alam āssva yathāsthiteha //MU_3,44.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4183: sarasvatī: vidūrathas te bhartaiṣa tanuṃ tyaktvā raṇāṅgane / tad evāntaḥpuraṃ prāpya tādṛgātmā bhaviṣyati //MU_3,45.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4184: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity ākarṇya vaco devyā līlā sā tatpurāspadā / punaḥ prahvā sthitovāca vacanaṃ vihitāñjaliḥ //MU_3,45.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4185: dvitīyalīlā: devī bhagavatī jñaptir nityam eva mayārcitā / svapneṣu darśanaṃ devi sā dadāti niśāsu me //MU_3,45.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4186: sā yādṛg eva deveśi tādṛg eva tvam ambike / tvaṃ me kṛpaṇakāruṇyād varaṃ dehi varānane //MU_3,45.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4187: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktā sā tadā jñaptis smṛtvā tad bhaktibhāvanām / idaṃ prasannā provāca tāṃ līlāṃ tatpurāspadām //MU_3,45.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4188: devī: ananyayā bhāvanayā yāvajjīvam ajīrṇayā / parituṣṭāsmi te vatse gṛhāṇābhīpsitaṃ varam //MU_3,45.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4189: taddeśalīlā: raṇe dehaṃ parityajya yatra tiṣṭhati me patiḥ / anenaiva śarīreṇa tatra syām etadaṅganā //MU_3,45.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4190: devī: evam astu tvayāvighnaṃ pūjitāsmi sute ciram / ananyabhāvayā devi puṣpadhūpasaparyayā //MU_3,45.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4191: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha taddeśalīlāyāṃ phullāyāṃ tadvarodayāt / pūrvalīlābravīd devīṃ sandehalulitāśayā //MU_3,45.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4192: pūrvalīlā: ye satyakāmās satyaikasaṅkalpā brahmarūpiṇaḥ / tvādṛśās sarvam evāśu teṣāṃ siddhyaty abhīpsitam //MU_3,45.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4193: tat tenaiva śarīreṇa kim arthaṃ nāham īśvari / lokāntaram imaṃ nītā taṃ girigrāmakaṃ ca vā //MU_3,45.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4194: devī: na kiñcit kasyacid ahaṃ karomi varavarṇini / sarvaṃ sampādayaty āśu svayaṃ jīvas samīhitam //MU_3,45.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4195: ahaṃ hi sarale jñaptis saṃvinmātrādhidevatā / pratyekam asmi cicchaktir jīvaśaktisvarūpiṇī //MU_3,45.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4196: jīvasyodety ahaṃśaktir yasya yasya yathā yathā / bhāti tatphaladā nityaṃ tasya tasya tathā tathā //MU_3,45.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4197: māṃ samārādhayanty āśu jīvaśaktis tathoditā / yathā bhavaty adehāsyāṃ muktāsmīti ciraṃ tadā //MU_3,45.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4198: tena tena prakāreṇa tvaṃ mayā samprabodhitā / tayā yuktyāmalaṃ bhāvaṃ nītāsi varavarṇini //MU_3,45.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4199: anayaivaṃ bhāvanayā bodhitāsmi ciraṃ yadā / tam evārthaṃ prāpnuvatī tadā svacitiśaktitaḥ //MU_3,45.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4200: yasya yasya yathodeti svacitprayatanaṃ ciram / phalaṃ dadāti kālena tasya tasya tathā tathā //MU_3,45.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4201: tapo vā devatā vāpi bhūtvā saiva cid avyayā / phalaṃ dadāty atha svairaṃ nabhaḥphalanipātavat //MU_3,45.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4202: svasaṃviddyotanād anyan na kiñcana kadācana / phalaṃ bhavati tenāśu yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_3,45.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4203: cidbhāva eva nanu sarvagato 'ntarātmā yaś cetati prayatate ca tad eti tacchrīḥ / ramyaṃ na ramyam athaveti vicārya tasmād yat pāvanaṃ tad avabudhya tad antar āssva //MU_3,45.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4206: rāmaḥ: evaṃ saṅkathayantīṣu tāsu tasmin gṛhodare / vidūrathaḥ kim akaron nirgatya kupito gṛhāt //MU_3,46.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4207: vasiṣṭhaḥ: vidūrathas svasadanān nirgatya parivāritaḥ / parivāreṇa mahatā ṛkṣaughenaiva candramāḥ //MU_3,46.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4208: sannaddhasarvāvayavo lagnahāravibhūṣaṇaḥ / mahājayajayārāvais surendra iva nirgataḥ //MU_3,46.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4209: samādiśan yodhagaṇaṃ śṛṇvan maṇḍalasaṃsthitim / ālokayan vīraraṇān āruroha nṛpo ratham //MU_3,46.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4212: sugrīvair lakṣaṇopetaiḥ praśastair dhavalaiḥ kṛśaiḥ / javonnayanavegena prasravadbhiḥ khurān iva //MU_3,46.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4213: vāyūn apīva sahajān asahadbhir gatikramaiḥ / projjhadbhir iva paścārdham āpibadbhir ivāmbaram //MU_3,46.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4214: yojitair iva saṃpūrṇaiś candraiś cāmaradīptibhiḥ / aśvair aṣṭabhir ābaddham āśāpūrakaheṣitaiḥ //MU_3,46.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4221: garbhavāsam ivāpannaṃ tenāsīt tanmahāpuram / mūrkhatvaṃ yauvaneneva ghanatām āyayau tamaḥ //MU_3,46.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4222: prayayuḥ kvāpi dīpaughā divaseneva tārakāḥ / āyayur balam ālolā naiśabhūtaparamparāḥ //MU_3,46.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4223: dadṛśus tanmahāyuddhaṃ dve līle sā kumārikā / prasphuraddhṛdayenaitā devīdattamahādṛśā //MU_3,46.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4224: praśemur atha geheṣu prodyatkaṭakaṭāravāḥ / ekārṇavapayaḥpūrair vāḍavā iva vahnayaḥ //MU_3,46.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4225: śarais senāṃ samākarṣan rājā parabalāntaram / viveśa pakṣaproḍḍīno merur ekam ivārṇavam //MU_3,46.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4226: athodabhūd guṇadhvānaś caṭaccaṭad iti sphuṭam / racitātmamayāmbhodās teruś śaraparamparāḥ //MU_3,46.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4227: yayur ambaram āśritya nānāhetivihaṅgamāḥ / prasasrur alam āśāsu mihikāś śastradīptayaḥ //MU_3,46.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4228: babhramuś śastrasaṅghaṭṭajvalanā ulmukāgnivat / jagarjuś śaradhāraughān varṣanto vīravāridāḥ //MU_3,46.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4229: vileguḥ kaṅkavatkrūrā vīrāṅgeṣu ca hetayaḥ / petuḥ paṭapaṭārāvaṃ hetiniṣpiṣṭayo 'mbare //MU_3,46.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4230: jagmuś śamaṃ tamāṃsy āśu śastrajvalanadīpakaiḥ / babhūvur akhilās senā navanārācaromaśāḥ //MU_3,46.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4231: uttasthur nṛttayātrāyāṃ kabandhanaṭapaṅktayaḥ / jagur uccai raṇadrohaṃ piśācyo raṇadārikāḥ //MU_3,46.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4232: udagur mattasaṅghaṭṭatkreṅkārā dantināṃ bale / ūhuḥ kṣepaṇapāṣāṇamattanadyo nabhastale //MU_3,46.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4233: petuś ca rathasaṅghātās saṃśuṣkavanaparṇavat / niryayur lohitā nadyo raṇādrer mṛtivarṣiṇaḥ //MU_3,46.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4234: praśemuḥ pāṃsavo raktais tamāṃsy āyudhavahnibhiḥ / yuddhaikadhyānataś śabdā bhayāni mṛtiniścayaiḥ //MU_3,46.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4235: abhavat kevalaṃ yuddhaṃ saśabdam asamaṃ bhramam / anākulāmbuvāhābhakhaḍgavīcisajhāṅkṛtam //MU_3,46.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4236: ṣavaṣavaravasaṃvahaccharaughaṃ kaṭakaṭaravasaṃpatadbhusuṇḍi / jhaṇajhaṇaravasaṃmilanmahāstraṃ niśi navaraṇam āsa suptavat tat //MU_3,46.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4239: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etasmin vartamāne tu ghore samarasambhrame / līlādvayam uvācedaṃ jñaptiṃ bhagavatīṃ puraḥ //MU_3,47.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4240: līlādvayam: devi kasmād akasmān no bhartā jayati no raṇe / vada tvayy api tuṣṭāyām asmin vidrutavāraṇe //MU_3,47.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4241: sarasvatī: ciram ārādhitānena vidūrathanṛpāriṇā / ahaṃ pratijayārthena na vidūrathabhūbhujā //MU_3,47.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4242: tenāsāv eva jayati jīyate na vidūrathaḥ / jñaptir antargatā saṃvid eṣāsau yad yathā yadā //MU_3,47.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4243: codayaty āśu tat tasya tadā sampādayāmy aham / yo yathā codayati māṃ tasya tiṣṭhāmi tatphalā //MU_3,47.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4244: na svabhāvodyataṃ dhatte vahner auṣṇyam ivaiṣa me / jayas syān mama saṃgrāma ity anenāsmi pūjitā //MU_3,47.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4245: pratimārūpiṇī tena phalam āpnoty asau tathā / vidūrathenaitam arthaṃ asañcintyāsmi bodhitā //MU_3,47.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4246: anena caiva muktas syām aham ity asmi bhāvitā / tasmād vidūratho dehaṃ taṃ prāpya saha bhāryayā //MU_3,47.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4247: tvayānayā ca kālena bāle mukto bhaviṣyati / etadīyas tv ayaṃ śatrus sindhunāma mahīpatiḥ / hatvainaṃ vasudhāpīṭhe jayī rājyaṃ kariṣyati //MU_3,47.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4248: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ devyāṃ vadantyāṃ tu balayor yudhyamānayoḥ / ravir draṣṭum ivāścaryam ājagāmodayācalam //MU_3,47.11 [sic!]//
GSP27moksop_u:4249: celus timirasaṃghātā balānīvālirūpiṇaḥ / asṛjīva śavāny āsan sandhyāyāṃ tārakā divi //MU_3,47.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4250: śanair vikaṭatāṃ jagmū raṇākāśādribhūmayaḥ / bhuvanaṃ kajjalāmbhodher ivotkṣiptam arājata //MU_3,47.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4251: petuḥ kanakaniṣṣyandasundarā raviraśmayaḥ / śaileṣu varavīreṣu raṇaraktacchaṭā iva //MU_3,47.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4252: adṛśyata tato vyoma tathā raṇamahītalam / bāhubhir bhrāntabhujagaṃ prabhābhiḥ kīrṇakāñcanam //MU_3,47.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4253: kuṇḍalaiḥ kīrṇaratnaughaṃ śirobhir vṛddhapaṅkajam / āyudhaiḥ khaganīrandhraṃ śaraiś śarabhanirbharam //MU_3,47.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4254: raktābhāsthirasandhyāḍhyaṃ sasiddhapuruṣaṃ śavaiḥ / hārais sasarpanirmokaṃ paṭair evāṃśusaṅkulam //MU_3,47.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4255: lasallatāpatākābhir ūrubhiḥ kṛtatoraṇam / hastapādaiḥ pallavitaṃ śaraiś śaravanopamam //MU_3,47.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4256: śastrāṃśuśādvalaśyāmaṃ śastratārṇais sasaikatam / kīrṇam āyudhamālābhir unmattam iva bhairavam //MU_3,47.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4259: etasminn antare senās sarvās saṅkṣayam āyayuḥ / āsīd raṇāṅganaṃ śūnyam ivālpobhayasainikam //MU_3,47.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4263: śūnye raṇāṅgane dīptau padmasindhurathau calau / adṛśyetāṃ nabhaścihnau candrasūryau divīva tau //MU_3,47.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4269: bhārān dadhadbhiḥ kuntānāṃ śarāṇāṃ dhanuṣām api / śaktīnāṃ prāsaśaṅkūnāṃ cakrāṇāṃ kacatāṃ rucā //MU_3,47.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4270: tatra tau kṣaṇam āvṛtya maṇḍalair bhūrimaṇḍalaiḥ / ubhau vyatibabhūvāte saṃmukhāv āyudhāmbudau //MU_3,47.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4272: tayoḥ praharator bāṇān vasudhā narasiṃhayoḥ / pāṣāṇamusulākārā vyomavistāriṇo 'bhavan //MU_3,47.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4273: karavālaphalāḥ kecin mudgarānanakāḥ pare / śitacakramukhāḥ kecit kecit paraśuvaktrakāḥ //MU_3,47.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4274: kecic chaktimukhā bāṇāḥ kecit kṣuramukhā api / kecit kuntographalakā ardhacandramukhās tathā //MU_3,47.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4275: siṃhopalamukhāḥ kecit kecic chūlaśikhāmukhāḥ / triśūlavadanāḥ kecit sthūlā iva mahāśilāḥ //MU_3,47.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4276: pralayapavanapātitāḥ śilaughā iva vicaranti śilīmukhās tadā sma / pramilitam abhavat tayos tadānīṃ pralayavijṛmbhitasindhusaṃbhrameṇa //MU_3,47.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4279: vasiṣṭhaḥ: prāpya rājā puraḥ prāptaṃ sindhum uddhurakandharam / madhyāhnatapanābhena kopena vitato 'bhavat //MU_3,48.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4280: dhanur āsphālayām āsa parirāvitadiṅmukham / kalpāntapavanāsphoṭa ivāmaragires taṭam //MU_3,48.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4281: visasarjorjito rājā prātar arkaḥ karān iva / tūṇīrarajanībaddhāś śilīmukhaparamparāḥ //MU_3,48.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4282: eka eva viniryāti guṇāt tasya śaro mahān / sahasraṃ patati vyomni gacchan patati lakṣaśaḥ //MU_3,48.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4283: sindhor api tathaivāsīc chaktir lāghavam eva ca / raver ānanasāmyaṃ vai viṣṇor dhānuṣkatā tayoḥ //MU_3,48.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4284: musulā nāma te bāṇā musulākṛtayo 'mbaram / chādayām āsur unnādāḥ kalpāntagirayo yathā //MU_3,48.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4285: rejuḥ kanakanārācarājayo vyomni tasya tāḥ / śaravyāḥ kalpavātārtāḥ patantya iva tārakāḥ //MU_3,48.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4286: vidūrathāc charāsārā ajasram abhiniryayuḥ / abdher iva payaḥpūrās sūryād iva marīcayaḥ //MU_3,48.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4288: dhārāḥ payomuca iva śīkarā iva nirjharāt / tatpurāgnimahādāhāt sphuliṅgā iva bhāsvarāḥ //MU_3,48.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4289: tayoś caṭacaṭāsphoṭaṃ śṛṇvan kodaṇḍayor dvayoḥ / baladvayam abhūt prekṣāmūkaṃ śānta ivāmbudhiḥ //MU_3,48.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4290: vahanti sma śarāpūrā gaṅgāpūra ivāmbare / sindhor abhimukhaṃ yakṣaghargharāravaraṃhasaḥ //MU_3,48.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4291: kacatkanakanārācaśaravarṣāṇy anāratam / vahacchavaśavāśabdaṃ niryayur dhanur ambudāt //MU_3,48.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4292: bāṇamandākinīpūraṃ vrajantaṃ sindhupūraṇe / vātāyanāt tam ālokya līlā tatpuravāsinī //MU_3,48.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4293: tena bāṇasamūhena jayam āśaṅkya bhartari / uvāca vākyam ānandavikasanmukhapaṅkajā //MU_3,48.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4294: jaya devi jayaty eṣa nātho 'smākaṃ vilokaya / kilānena śaraughena merur apy eti cūrṇatām //MU_3,48.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4295: tasyām evaṃ vadantyāṃ tu ghanasneharavākulam / prekṣaṇavyagrayor devyor hasantyor mānuṣaṃ hṛdā //MU_3,48.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4296: tac charārṇavam āmattam apibat sindhuvāḍavaḥ / śaroṣmaṇāpy agamyena jahnur mandākinīm iva //MU_3,48.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4297: bāṇavarṣeṇa sakalaṃ sāyakaughaṃ ghanaṃ ghanam / bhittvā tato 'py adhaḥkṛtvā cikṣepa gaganārṇave //MU_3,48.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4298: yathā dīpasya śāntasya na parijñāyate gatiḥ / tasya sāyakasaṅghasya na vijñātā tathā gatiḥ //MU_3,48.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4299: taṃ chittvā sāyakāsāraṃ svaśarāmbudharaṃ ghanam / vyomni prasārayām āsa saracchavaśavānvitam //MU_3,48.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4300: vidūrathas tam apy āśu vyadhamat sāyakottamaiḥ / sāmānyajaladaṃ mattakalpāntapavano yathā //MU_3,48.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4301: kṛtapratikṛtair evaṃ bāṇavarṣair mahīpatī / vyarthīkṛtair anayatāṃ prahāram avirāmiṇau //MU_3,48.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4302: athādade mohanāstraṃ sindhur gandharvasauhṛdāt / prāptaṃ tena yayur lokā vinā mohaṃ vidūratham //MU_3,48.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4303: nyastaśastrāmbarā mūkā viṣaṇṇavadanekṣaṇāḥ / mṛtā ivābhavan yodhāś citranyastā ivāthavā //MU_3,48.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4304: yāvad vidūratharatho mohenāyāti mandatām / tāvad vidūratho rājā prabodhāstram upādadhe //MU_3,48.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4305: tataḥ prabodham āpannā prajā prātar ivābjinī / vidūrathe 'bhavat sindhuḥ kruddhotka iva rākṣase //MU_3,48.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4306: nāgāstram ādadhe bhīmaṃ pāśabandhanakhedadam / tenābhavan nabho vyāptaṃ bhogibhiḥ parvatopamaiḥ //MU_3,48.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4307: sarpair vivalitā bhūmir mṛṇālais sarasī yathā / sampannā girayas sarve kṛṣṇapannagakambalāḥ //MU_3,48.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4308: padārthās sarva eveme pihitā ahivigrahaiḥ / saparvatavanābhogā yayau vivaśatāṃ mahī //MU_3,48.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4309: dhūtāṅgārakaṇākīrṇā viṣavegasya śaṃsinī / vavur uṣṇoṣṇanīhārā vātajvalanareṇavaḥ //MU_3,48.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4310: vidūratho 'tha sauparṇam ādadhe 'straṃ mahāstravit / udagur garuḍās tena sauvarṇā iva parvatāḥ //MU_3,48.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4313: bhūpūrakaṃ tu sarpaughaṃ sa suparṇaghano 'pibat / kṛṣṭaṃ śalaśalāyantam agastya iva vāridhim //MU_3,48.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4314: sarpakambalanirmuktaṃ bhūmaṇḍalam arājata / viśālam iva nīrandhram iva nirvāri rāśi vā //MU_3,48.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4315: tatas tadgaruḍānīkaṃ kvāpy agacchad adṛśyatām / dīpaugha iva vātena śaradīvābhramaṇḍalam //MU_3,48.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4316: vajrabhītyeva pakṣāḍhyaṃ parvataprakaraṃ punaḥ / svapnadṛṣṭaṃ jagad iva saṅkalpapurapūravat //MU_3,48.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4317: tatas tamo'stram asṛjat sindhur andhāndhakāradam / tenāndhakāro vavṛdhe kṛṣṇābhrajaṭharopamaḥ //MU_3,48.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4318: rodorandhre pravisṛta ekārṇava ivābhavat / matsyā ivābhavañ śailās tārāś ca maṇayo 'bhavan //MU_3,48.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4319: andhakāraḥ pravavṛdhe maṣīpaṅkārṇavopamaḥ / kajjalācalasambhāro dhutaḥ kalpāntarair api //MU_3,48.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4320: andhakūpe nipatitā ivāsan sakalāḥ prajāḥ / kalpānta iva saṃśemur vyavahārā diśāṃ prati //MU_3,48.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4321: vidūratho 'tha mārtāṇḍam astraṃ brahmāṇḍamaṇḍape / dadāv astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puṣṭamantraviceṣṭitaḥ //MU_3,48.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4322: athoditas tamo'mbhodhim arkāgastyo gabhastibhiḥ / apibat kṛṣṇam ambhodaṃ śaratkāla ivāmalaḥ //MU_3,48.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4323: andhakārāmbaronmuktā virejur amalā diśaḥ / bhūpateḥ purataḥ kāntā iva ramyapayodharāḥ //MU_3,48.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4324: yayuḥ prakaṭatām antar akhilā vanarājayaḥ / lobhakajjalajālena muktā iva satāṃ dhiyaḥ //MU_3,48.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4325: atha kopākulas sindhū rākṣasāstraṃ mahābhayam / kṣaṇād udīrayām āsa mantroditaśarātmakam //MU_3,48.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4326: udagur bhīṣaṇā digbhyas saruṣo vanarākṣasāḥ / pātālagajahūṅkārakṣubdhā iva mahārṇavāḥ //MU_3,48.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4327: kapilordhvajaṭādhūmrās sphuṭaccaṭacaṭāravāḥ / agnayo lelihānograjihvā ardrendhanā iva //MU_3,48.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4328: sāvartavṛttayo vyomni bhīmaḍakkāraṭāṅkṛtāḥ / agnidāhamahādhūmavipulā iva solmukāḥ //MU_3,48.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4330: nigirantaḥ pradhāvanto garjantas tarjitāśayāḥ / jaṭojjvālitaḍitpuñjajaladās sajalā iva //MU_3,48.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4331: etasminn antare tasmiṃl līlānātho vidūrathaḥ / nārāyaṇāstraṃ pradadau duṣṭabhūtanivāraṇam //MU_3,48.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4332: udīryamāṇa evāsminn astrarāje tu rājayaḥ / rākṣasānāṃ praśemus tā andhakārā ivodaye //MU_3,48.54//
GSP27moksop_u:4333: pramṛṣṭarākṣasānīkam abhavad bhuvanatrayam / śaradīva gatāmbhodaṃ vyoma nirmalam ābabhau //MU_3,48.55//
GSP27moksop_u:4334: atha sindhur mumocāstram āgneyaṃ jvalitāmbaram / jajvaluḥ kakubhas tena kalpāgnivalitā iva //MU_3,48.56//
GSP27moksop_u:4335: dhūmāmbudabharacchannā babhūvus sakalā diśaḥ / gaganaprotthapātālatimirākulitā iva //MU_3,48.57//
GSP27moksop_u:4336: babhuḥ prajvālitākārā girayaḥ kāñcanā iva / praphullanavanīrandhracaṇpakaughavanā iva //MU_3,48.58//
GSP27moksop_u:4337: yayur vyomādridikkuñjā jvālājālajaṭālatām / kuṅkumenotsave mṛtyos samālabdhā ivāsṛjā //MU_3,48.59//
GSP27moksop_u:4338: jvalitā janatāntaikaśaṅkināsannabhasspṛśā / sahasrākṛtinor veṇavalitā iva sāgarāḥ //MU_3,48.60//
GSP27moksop_u:4339: jitvā ripuṃ punar asau yathā praharate tathā / vāruṇaṃ visasarjāstraṃ pūjayitvā vidūrathaḥ //MU_3,48.61//
GSP27moksop_u:4340: āyayus salilāpūrās tamaḥpūrā ivābhitaḥ / adhastād ūrdhvato digbhyo dravarūpā ivādrayaḥ //MU_3,48.62//
GSP27moksop_u:4341: bhāgā iva śaradvyomno drutapātā ivāmbudāḥ / mahārṇavā ivordhvasthāḥ kulaśailaśilā iva //MU_3,48.63//
GSP27moksop_u:4342: tamālaughā ivoḍḍīnās sañcitā iva rātrayaḥ / kajjalaughā ivoddhūtā lokāloka ivottaṭaḥ //MU_3,48.64//
GSP27moksop_u:4344: tāpāgnisantatilatāṃ sā cacāmāmbusaṃhatiḥ / bhuvanavyāpinī sandhyām āśu kṛṣṇeva yāminī //MU_3,48.66//
GSP27moksop_u:4345: tām agnisantatiṃ pītvā pūrayām āsa bhūtalam / jalaśrīs santataṃ dehaṃ nirdravavyaktim īyuṣī //MU_3,48.67//
GSP27moksop_u:4346: evaṃvidhān astramohān viruddhān eva netare / mitho māyāmayān agre paśyanty anubhavanti ca //MU_3,48.68//
GSP27moksop_u:4347: hetibhāravahās sindhoś cakrarakṣās tato 'mbhasā / tṛṇānīva gatāḥ prohya rathaś cāsyābhavat plutaḥ //MU_3,48.69//
GSP27moksop_u:4348: etasminn antare sindhur astraṃ sasmāra śoṣaṇam / āpattrāṇakaraṃ devaṃ dadau ca śararūpiṇam //MU_3,48.70//
GSP27moksop_u:4349: śaśāmāmbumayī māyā tena yāmeva bhāsvatā / ye mṛtās te mṛtā eva babhūvuś śoṣitā bhuvaḥ //MU_3,48.71//
GSP27moksop_u:4350: atha mūrkharuṣā tulyatāpas santāpayan prajāḥ / jajṛmbhe jarjarājīrṇavanavistārakarkaśaḥ //MU_3,48.72//
GSP27moksop_u:4352: tena gharmamayīṃ mūrchām ājagmus tadvirodhinaḥ / grīṣmadāvānalottaptā mṛdavaḥ pallavā iva //MU_3,48.74//
GSP27moksop_u:4353: vidūratho raṇaddīrghatārakreṅkāramānasam / kodaṇḍaṃ kuṇḍalīkṛtya parjanyāstram athādadhe //MU_3,48.75//
GSP27moksop_u:4354: udaguḥ paṅktayo 'bdānāṃ yāminya iva sañcitāḥ / tamālavipinoḍḍīnasaṃrambhārambhamantharāḥ //MU_3,48.76//
GSP27moksop_u:4357: prasphurus trastasauvarṇasarpāpasaraṇopamāḥ / vidyuto divi daityastrīkaṭākṣavalanā iva //MU_3,48.79//
GSP27moksop_u:4359: mahāmusuladhārābhiḥ petur āsāravṛṣṭayaḥ / kaṣṭaṭāṅkārakaṭhināḥ kṛtāntasyeva dṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_3,48.81//
GSP27moksop_u:4360: udabhūt prathamaṃ bāṣpa uṣṇoṣṇo 'drinibho bhuvaḥ / pātālād abhravṛndānāṃ yuddhāyevābhravibhramāḥ //MU_3,48.82//
GSP27moksop_u:4361: tato nimeṣamātreṇa praśemur mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ / parabodharasāpūrair yathā saṃsāravāsanāḥ //MU_3,48.83//
GSP27moksop_u:4362: āsīt paṅkāṅkam akhilaṃ bhūmaṇḍalam asañcaram / pūritaḥ pūrṇadhārābhis sindhus sindhum ivāmbunā //MU_3,48.84//
GSP27moksop_u:4364: vavur aśaninipātapiṇḍitāṅgā dalitaśilāśakalāḥ kakummukheṣu / pralayasamayasūcakā bhaṭānāṃ kṛtakaṭuṭāṅkṛtaṭaṅkinas samīrāḥ //MU_3,48.86//
GSP27moksop_u:4367: vasiṣṭhaḥ: vavur valitanīhārā vikīrṇaghanapallavāḥ / vāyavo dhūtavṛkṣaughāḥ patanotpāṭanodbhaṭāḥ //MU_3,49.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4369: uhyamāno 'bhavan nadyā yathā jarjarapallavaḥ / vidūratho 'tha tatyāja parvatāstraṃ mahāstravit //MU_3,49.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4370: vyomāpi ghanatāṃ yena samādhātum ivodyatam / tena śailāstraghātena virarāma samīraṇaḥ //MU_3,49.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4371: śamaṃ ca tena śāntena prayayau vāyunā yataḥ / antarikṣagatā vṛkṣapaṅktayaḥ patitā bhuvi //MU_3,49.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4372: nānājanāśanavyūhe kākānām iva koṭayaḥ / śemuś śītkāraḍakkārabhākkārokkārakā diśām //MU_3,49.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4373: pralāpā iva vidhvastaprathāḥ pavanavīrudhām / girīn apaśyan nabhasaḥ patataḥ parṇapattravat //MU_3,49.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4374: sindhus sindhur ivotpannān mainākādīn itas tataḥ / vajrāstram asṛjad dīptaṃ terur vajraghanās tataḥ //MU_3,49.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4375: pibanto 'drīn pratigiraṃ vahnidāhād ivāgnayaḥ / te girīṇāṃ purīṇāṃ ca koṭituṇḍāvakhaṇḍanaiḥ //MU_3,49.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4376: śirāṃsi śātayām āsuḥ phalānīvolbanānilāḥ / vidūratho 'tha vajrāstraśāntyai brahmāstram abhyadāt //MU_3,49.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4377: tato brahmāstravajrāstre samaṃ praśamam āgate / śyāmāśyāmaṃ piśācāstram atha sindhur acodayat //MU_3,49.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4378: tenodaguḥ piśācānāṃ paṅktayo 'nantabhītidāḥ / sandhyāyām iva bhītyeva divasaś śyāmatāṃ yayau //MU_3,49.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4379: piśācā bhuvanaṃ jahrur andhakārabharā iva / bhāsmanastambhasadṛśās tālottālavilāsinaḥ //MU_3,49.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4380: dṛśyamānamahākārā muṣṭigrāhyā nakiñcana / ūrdhvakeśāḥ kṛśāṅgāś ca kecic ca śmaśrulā api //MU_3,49.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4381: kṛśāṅgā malināṅgāś ca grāmyā iva nabhaścarāḥ / sabhāyāṃ mūḍhadṛṣṭāś ca yatkiñcanakarāḥ khalāḥ //MU_3,49.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4382: dīnā bahvāśinaḥ krūrā dīnā grāmyajanā iva / tarukardamarathyāntaśśūnyagehagṛhāś calāḥ //MU_3,49.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4383: lelihānāḥ pretarūpāḥ kṛṣṇāṅgāś śvapacā iva / jagṛhus te tadā mattā hataśiṣṭam arer balam //MU_3,49.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4384: āsannasainikās tatra vitrastakṣubdhacetanāḥ / tyaktāyudhatanutrāṇās trastaprāṇās skhaladgamāḥ //MU_3,49.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4385: netrair aṅgair mukhaiḥ pādair vikārabhayakāriṇaḥ / tyaktakaupīnavasanā nirnagnā hasanottarāḥ //MU_3,49.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4386: viṣṭhāṃ mūtraṃ ca kurvantas sthiram ārabdhanartanāḥ / piśācarājo rājānam atha yāvadvidūratham //MU_3,49.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4387: samākrāmati tāvat sa māyāṃ tāṃ bubudhe budhaḥ / piśācasaṅgrāmakarīṃ māyāṃ vetti sa bhūmipaḥ //MU_3,49.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4388: tayā piśācasainyaṃ tat parasainye nyayojayat / tatas svasainikās svasthāḥ parayodhāḥ piśācinaḥ //MU_3,49.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4389: tasyātha rūpikāstraṃ tad dadau cānyad asau ruṣā / udagur bhūtalād vyomno rūpikās stabdhamūrdhajāḥ //MU_3,49.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4390: nirnagnā vikarālākṣyo lambaśroṇipayodharāḥ / udbhinnayauvanā vṛddhāḥ pīvarāṅgyo 'tha jarjarāḥ //MU_3,49.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4394: śvakākolūkavadanā nimnavaktrahanūdarāḥ / jagṛhus tāḥ piśācāṃs tān durbalān duśśiśūn iva //MU_3,49.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4395: piśācarūpikāsainyaṃ tadāsīd ekatāṃ gatam / nirnagnaṃ nartanottānavadanāṅgavilocanam //MU_3,49.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4396: parasparākrāntikaraṃ bhīṣayaṃś ca parasparam / niṣkāsitamahājihvaṃ nānāmukhavikāradam //MU_3,49.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4397: śavabhārāḍhyam anyo'nyaṃ hriyamāṇaśavāṅgakam / rudhirāmbhasi majjat tadunmajjac ca lasattanu //MU_3,49.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4398: lambodaraṃ lambabhujaṃ lambakarṇoṣṭhanāsikam / raktamāṃsavasāpaṅkeṣv anyo'nyaṃ vellanātma tat //MU_3,49.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4399: mandaroddhūtadugdhābdhilasatkalakalākulam / yathaiva māyāsañcāras tena tasya kṛtaḥ punaḥ //MU_3,49.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4400: tenāpi tasyāśu tathā kṛto buddhvāśu lāghavam / vetālāstraṃ tato dattaṃ tenottasthuś śavavrajāḥ //MU_3,49.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4402: udbabhūva balaṃ bhīmam ūrvīnigaraṇakṣamam / athetaro 'pi bhūpālo māyāṃ sañcārya cāparām //MU_3,49.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4403: rākṣasāstraṃ sasarjāśu trailokyākramaṇonmukham / udaguḥ parvatākārās sarvatas sthūlarākṣasāḥ //MU_3,49.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4404: deham āśritya niṣkrāntāḥ pātālān narakā iva / athābhūt tad balaṃ bhīmaṃ sasurāsurabhītidam //MU_3,49.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4407: vetālatālasollāsaṃ lasaddhāma piśācakam / medomāṃsavasādyāḍhyaṃ rudhirāsavasundaram / kṣībavetālakumbhāṇḍayakṣatāṇḍavasaṅkaṭam //MU_3,49.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4411: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tasmiṃs tadā vartamāne ghore samrambhavibhrame / sarvārisainyanāśārtham ekas svabalaśāntaye //MU_3,50.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4412: sasmāra smṛtimān antar anantodāradhairyabhṛt / astram astreśvaraṃ śrīmad vaiṣṇavaṃ śaṅkaropamam //MU_3,50.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4413: atha yo 'sau śaras tena vaiṣṇavāstrābhimantritaḥ / muktas tasya phalaprāntād ulmukānīva niryayuḥ //MU_3,50.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4414: paṅktayas sphāracakrāṇāṃ śatārkīkṛtadiktaṭāḥ / gadānām abhiyāntīnāṃ śatavaṃśīkṛtāmbarāḥ //MU_3,50.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4415: vajrāṇām urudhārāṇāṃ śaracchṛṅgīkṛtāmbarāḥ / paṭṭisānāṃ ca paṭṭānāṃ tīravṛkṣīkṛtāmbarāḥ //MU_3,50.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4416: atha rājā dvitīyo 'pi vaiṣṇavāstrapraśāntaye / dadau vaiṣṇavam evāstraṃ śastraniṣṭhīvapūrakam //MU_3,50.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4417: tato 'pi niryayur nadyo hetīnāṃ hatahetayaḥ / śaraśaktigadāprāsapaṭṭisādipayorayāḥ //MU_3,50.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4418: śastrāstrasaritāṃ tāsāṃ vyomni yuddham avartata / rodorandhrakṣayakaraṃ kulaśailendradāraṇam //MU_3,50.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4427: sadastravāraṇenaiva yātaḥ kālo balātmanaḥ / svayaṃ kiyadbala iti sindhau tiṣṭhati helayā //MU_3,50.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4428: vidūratho 'stram āgneyaṃ tatyājāśaniśabdavat / jvālayām āsa sa rathaṃ sindhoḥ kakṣam ivārasam //MU_3,50.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4429: etasminn antare vyomni hetinirvivarodare / sa sannāha iva prāvṛṭpayodapaṭinīva vā //MU_3,50.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4430: astrarājekṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā yuddhaṃ paramadāruṇaṃ / anyo'nyaṃ śamam āyātau savīryau subhaṭāv iva //MU_3,50.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4431: etasminn antare 'strāgnī rathaṃ kṛtvāśu bhasmasāt / prāpa dagdhvā vanaṃ sindhuṃ mṛgendram iva kandarāt //MU_3,50.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4432: sindhur abhyāśato 'gnyastraṃ vāruṇāstreṇa śātayan / rathaṃ tyaktvāvaniṃ prāpya khaḍgakheṭakavān abhūt //MU_3,50.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4433: akṣṇor nimeṣamātreṇa rathāśvānāṃ ripoḥ khurān / lulāva karavālena mṛṇālānīva lāghavāt //MU_3,50.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4434: vidūratho 'pi viratho babhūva kheṭakāsimān / samāyudhau samotsāhau ceratur maṇḍalānvitau //MU_3,50.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4435: khaḍgau krakacatāṃ yātau mithaḥ praharatos tayoḥ / dantamāleyam asyeva calecarcayataḥ prajāḥ //MU_3,50.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4436: śaktim ādāya cikṣepa khaḍgaṃ tyaktvā vidūrathaḥ / sindhāv udghargharārāvaṃ mahotpāta ivāśanim //MU_3,50.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4437: avicchinnaṃ samāyāntī patitā sāsya vakṣasi / apriyasya yathā bhartur anicchantī svakāminī //MU_3,50.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4438: tena śaktiprahāreṇa nāsau maraṇam āptavān / kevalaṃ rudhirasroto nāgo jalam ivātyajat //MU_3,50.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4439: taddeśalīlā taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagnaṃ tama ivendunā / savikāsā ghanānandā pūrvalīlām uvāca ha //MU_3,50.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4440: devi paśya nṛsiṃhena hato bhartāyam āvayoḥ / śaktikoṭinakhair daityas sindhur uddhurakandharaḥ //MU_3,50.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4441: sarastalasthanāgendravarahūṅkṛtavārivat / diṣṭyorasy asya niryāti raktaṃ śuluśulāravaiḥ //MU_3,50.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4442: hā kaṣṭaṃ ratham ānītaṃ sindhur āroḍhum udyataḥ / sauvarṇaṃ mairavaṃ śṛṅgaṃ puṣkarāvartako yathā //MU_3,50.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4443: paśya devi ratho 'syāsau mudgareṇāvacūrṇitaḥ / bhramatparvatapātena sauvarṇaṃ nagaraṃ yathā //MU_3,50.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4444: pravṛtto ratham ānītam āroḍhuṃ patir eṣa me / kaṣṭaṃ vajram ivendreṇa musulaṃ sindhuneritam //MU_3,50.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4445: vañcayitvā vilāsena ratham āruhya lāghavāt / paśya bhartā madīyo 'sau cakāsti nitarāṃ raṇe //MU_3,50.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4446: hā dhik kaṣṭam asau sindhur āryaputrarathaṃ balāt / hariś śvabhram ivarūḍhaḥ plavenontar iva drumam //MU_3,50.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4447: khaḍgenārohato 'syāṃsacchinno bhartā vilokaya / padmarāgagirir dyotam iva muñcati śoṇitam //MU_3,50.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4448: hā hā dhik kaṣṭam etena sindhunā khaḍgadhārayā / jaṅghayor me patiś chinnaḥ krakaceneva pādapaḥ //MU_3,50.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4449: hā hā hatāsmi dagdhāsmi mṛtāsmy apahatāsmi ca / mṛṇāle iva lūne me patyur dve api jānunī //MU_3,50.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4450: ity uktvā sā tadālokya bhartṛbhāvabhayāturā / latā paraśukṛtteva mūrchitā patitā bhuvi //MU_3,50.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4451: vidūratho 'pi nirjānuḥ praharann eva vidviṣi / papāta syandane 'py āśu chinnamūla iva drumaḥ //MU_3,50.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4452: patann evaiṣa sūtena rathenaivāpavāhitaḥ / yadā tadāhatiṃ tasya kaṇṭhe 'dāt sindhur uddhataḥ //MU_3,50.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4453: ardhavicchinnakaṇṭho 'sāv anuyāto 'tha sindhunā / syandanenāviśat sadma padmam evendirā yathā //MU_3,50.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4454: sarasvatīprabhāvāḍhyaṃ tat praveṣṭum asau gṛham / nāśakan maṣako matto mahājvālāntaraṃ yathā //MU_3,50.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4455: khaḍgāvakṛttagalagartagalatsavātaraktacchaṭācchuritavastratanutragātram / tatyāja taṃ bhagavatīm abhito gṛhāntas sūtaḥ praviśya mṛtitalpatale gatārim //MU_3,50.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4458: vasiṣṭhaḥ: hato rājā hato rājā pratirājena saṃyuge / iti śabde samudbhūte rāṣṭram āsīd bhayākulam //MU_3,51.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4471: mṛtabandhujanākrandair śrutatūryaravair api / hayebharathaśabdaiś ca piṇḍagrāhyaghanadhvani //MU_3,51.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4472: sindhudevo jayaty ekacchattrabhūmaṇḍalādhipaḥ / ity anantaram āremur bheryaḥ pratipuraṃ tadā //MU_3,51.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4473: rājadhānīṃ viveśātha sindhur uddhatakandharaḥ / prajās sraṣṭuṃ yugasyānte manur jagad ivāparaḥ //MU_3,51.16//
