GSP27moksop_u:4474: pravṛttā daśadigbhyo 'tha praveṣṭuṃ saindhavaṃ puram / narāḥ karihayāgārai ratnapūrā ivāmbhudhim //MU_3,51.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4475: nibandhanāni cihnāni śāsanāni diśāṃ prati / kṣaṇaṃ niveśayām āsur maṇḍalaṃ prati mantriṇaḥ //MU_3,51.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4476: udabhūd acireṇaiva deśe deśe pure pure / jīvite maraṇe māne niyamo yamato yathā //MU_3,51.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4477: atha śemur nimeṣeṇa deśopaplavavibhramāḥ / praśāntotpātapavanāḥ padārthāvṛttayo yathā //MU_3,51.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4478: saumyatām ājagāmāśu deśo daśadiganvitaḥ / kṣīrodaḥ kṣubhitāvarto drāg ivodvṛttamandaraḥ //MU_3,51.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4479: vavur alakacayān vilolayanto mukhakamalālimukhāni saindhavīnām / jalalavavalanākulās samīrā aśivaguṇā iva sarvataḥ kṣaṇena //MU_3,51.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4482: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etasminn antare līlā samuvāca sarasvatīm / śvāsāvaśeṣam ālokya pūrvaṃ bhartāram agragam //MU_3,52.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4483: pravṛtto deham utsraṣṭuṃ madbhartāyam ihāmbike / sthitā ca mṛtakalpeyaṃ līlā nisspandagātrikā //MU_3,52.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4484: dehenānena gantavyam anayā vīrabhāryayā / yatrāvābhyāṃ ca tat sthānaṃ kathaṃ gantavyam ambike //MU_3,52.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4485: jñaptiḥ: evaṃrūpamahārambhe saṅgrāme rāṣṭrasambhrame / saṃpanne 'pi sthite 'py uccair vicitrārambhamanthare //MU_3,52.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4486: na kiñcid api saṃpannaṃ rāṣṭraṃ na ca mahītalam / na sthitaṃ kvacanāpy evaṃ svapnātmakam idaṃ yataḥ //MU_3,52.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4487: tasya tvanmaṇḍapasyāntaś śavasya nikaṭāmbare / itthaṃ bhūrāṣṭram ābhāti bhartṛjīvasya te 'naghe //MU_3,52.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4488: antaḥpuragṛhaṃ te tad idaṃ rāṣṭrānvitodaram / vasiṣṭhavipragehe 'ntaś śavagehe jagat sthitam //MU_3,52.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4489: evam eṣa mahārambho jagattrayamayo bhramaḥ / tvayā mayānayānena saṃyuktas sārṇavāvaniḥ //MU_3,52.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4490: girigrāmakagehe 'ntar madhye gaganakośake / khātmāvakacati vyakto na kacaty eva vā kvacit //MU_3,52.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4491: evam ārambhaghanayor api maṇḍapayos tayoḥ / udare śūnyam ākāśam evāsti na jagadbhramaḥ //MU_3,52.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4492: bhramadraṣṭur abhāve hi kīdṛśī bhramatā bhrame / nāsty eva bhramasattā tu yad asti tad ajaṃ padam //MU_3,52.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4493: bhrame dṛśyam asat tasya draṣṭur draṣṭṛdaśā kutaḥ / draṣṭṛdṛśyakramābhāvād atra yat sahajaṃ hi tat //MU_3,52.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4494: tat padaṃ paramaṃ viddhi nāśotpādavivarjitam / svakaṃ kacati cābhātaṃ śāntam ādyam anāmayam //MU_3,52.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4495: kila maṇḍapagehāntas svasvabhāvoditātmani / viharanti janās tatra svagṛhe saṃvyavasthayā //MU_3,52.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4496: na jagat tatra no sargaḥ kaścit tair anubhūyate / tenāhaṃ jagad ākāśam ajam ity eva vacmi te //MU_3,52.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4497: sarvaṃ śūnyātmavijñānaṃ mervādigirijālakam / nedaṃ kuḍyamayaṃ kiñcid yathā svapne mahāpuram //MU_3,52.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4498: deśe prādeśamātre 'pi girijālamayāny api / vajrasārāṇi khāny eva sambhavanty aṇuke 'ṇuke //MU_3,52.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4499: kadalīpallavāpīḍasanniveśena bhūriśaḥ / trijagac cidaṇāv antar asti svapnapuraṃ yathā //MU_3,52.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4500: tasyāpy antar vibhāgena kramād ekaikaśo jagat / teṣāṃ yasmiñ jagaty eva padmo rājā śavas sthitaḥ //MU_3,52.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4501: līlā tava sapatnī taṃ prāptā pūrvataraṃ śubhe / yadaiva mūrchām āyātā līleyaṃ puratas tava / tadaiva bhartuḥ padmasya śavasya nikaṭe sthitā //MU_3,52.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4502: līlā: katham eṣā gatā devi sampannā tatra dehinī / kathaṃ kathaṃ vā tatpatnībhāvam āptavatī sthitā //MU_3,52.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4503: te vāsyā vada kiṃ rūpaṃ paśyanty atha vadanti kim / tadgehavaravāstavyās samāseneti me vada //MU_3,52.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4504: devī: śṛṇu sarvaṃ samāsena yathādṛṣṭaṃ vadāmi te / līle līlāsvavṛttāntam antadaṃ dṛśyadurdṛśām //MU_3,52.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4505: padma eva sa bhartaiṣa bhrāntiṃ tāvat tatām imām / itthaṃ jaganmayīṃ svasminn eva sadmani paśyati //MU_3,52.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4506: bhrāntiyuddham idaṃ yuddham ime bhrāntijanā janāḥ / bhrāntyaivāstīha maraṇam eṣa caiva bhramātmakaḥ //MU_3,52.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4507: bhramakrameṇānenaiva līlāsya dayitā sthitā / tvaṃ caiṣā ca varārohe svapnamātrā varāṅgane //MU_3,52.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4508: tathā bhavatyor bhartaiṣa tathaivāham api svayam / jagacchobhaiva saṃsāre dṛśyase tad ihocyate //MU_3,52.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4509: etad eva parijñātaṃ dṛśyaśabdārtham ujjhati / evam eṣā tvam evaṃ ca sampannaivam asau nṛpaḥ //MU_3,52.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4510: ahaṃ cātmani satyatvagatās sarvatayātmanaḥ / ime vayam ihānyo'nyaṃ sampannās svoditā iva //MU_3,52.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4511: itthaṃ sarvātmakatayā mahācidghanasaṃsthiteḥ / evam eṣā sthitā rājñī hārihāsavilāsinī //MU_3,52.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4514: kāntakāñcanagaurāṅgī pakvabimbaphalādharā / tvatsaṅkalpātmakasyaiṣā yathā bhartur manaḥkalā //MU_3,52.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4515: tadā tvatsadṛśākārā sthitaiṣā ciccamatkṛtau / tvadbhartṛmaraṇe kṣipraṃ samanantaram eva hi //MU_3,52.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4516: tvadbhartaiṣā puro dṛṣṭā tvatsaṅkalpātmanāṇunā / yadādhibhautikaṃ bhāvaṃ ceto 'nubhavati svayam //MU_3,52.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4517: vetty asanmayam evāta ātivāhikakalpanam / yadādhibhautikaṃ bhāvaṃ vetty etaṃ tu na sanmayam //MU_3,52.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4518: ātivāhikasaṅkalpas tadā so 'nyasya jāyate / ato maraṇasaṃvittyā punarjanmamaye bhrame //MU_3,52.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4519: tvaṃ hi saṃviditānena tvayāvagata eṣa saḥ / itthaṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭavān eṣa dṛṣṭaś caiṣa tvayeti ca //MU_3,52.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4520: tvam asyātmani saṃpannā sarvagatvāc cidātmanaḥ / brahma sarvagataṃ yasmād yathā yatra yadoditam //MU_3,52.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4521: bhavaty āśu tathā tatra tat svaśaktyaiva paśyati / sarvatra sarvaśaktitvād yatra yāṃ śaktim unnayan //MU_3,52.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4522: āste tatra tathā bhāti tīvrasaṃvegahetutaḥ / mṛtimohakṣaṇenaiva tad etau dampatī sthitau //MU_3,52.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4523: tadaivābhyām idaṃ buddhaṃ pratibhāsavaśād dhṛdi / āvayoḥ pitarāv etāv ime caivāpi mātarau //MU_3,52.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4524: deha eṣa dhanaṃ cedaṃ karmedaṃ pūrvam īdṛśam / āvāṃ vivāhitāv evam evaṃ nāmaikatāṃ gatau //MU_3,52.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4525: etayoś cāpi janatā yātā tatraiva satyatām / tathaivātrāsti dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratyakṣas svapnavedanam //MU_3,52.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4526: ity evaṃbhāvayā līle līlayāham athārcitā / māhaṃ syāṃ vidhavety evaṃ varo datto mayāpy asau //MU_3,52.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4527: ity arthīva mṛtā pūrvam eṣeha khalu bālikā / bhavatāṃ cetanāṃśānām ahaṃ cetanadharmiṇī //MU_3,52.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4528: kuladevī sadā pūjyāpy ata etat karomy aham / athāsyā jīvako dehāt prāṇamārutarūpadhṛt //MU_3,52.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4529: manasā valitaḥ prāpto mukhāgraṃ tyaktadehakaḥ / tato maraṇamūrchānte gṛhe 'sminn eva caitayā / buddho bhāvita ākāro dṛṣṭo jīvātmanā tataḥ //MU_3,52.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4530_0: sampannaiṣā hariṇanayanā pūrṇacandrānanaśrīr mānonnaddhā dayitavalitā kāntam ābhoktukāmā / pūrvasmṛtyā sarabhasamukhī saṃyatāntassvabhāvā
GSP27moksop_u:4533: vasisṭhaḥ: atha labdhavarā dehenānenaiva mahīpatim / patiṃ prāptuṃ prayāmy eṣā nabhomārgeṇa viṣṭapam //MU_3,53.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4534: iti sañcintya sānandam uddāmamakaradhvajā / pupluve peśalākārā pakṣiṇīva nabhastale //MU_3,53.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4535: kumārī tatra sā prāpa jñaptyaiva prahitāṃ hitām / svasaṅkalpamahādarśāt purato nirgatām iva //MU_3,53.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4536: kumārī: duhitāsmi sakhi jñapte svāgataṃ te 'stu sundari / pratīkṣamāṇā tvām eva sthitāsmīha nabhaḥpathe //MU_3,53.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4537: līlā: devi bhartṛsamīpaṃ māṃ naya nīrajalocane / mahatāṃ darśanaṃ yasmān na kadācana niṣphalam //MU_3,53.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4538: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ehi tatraiva gacchāva ity uktvā sā kumārikā / puras tasyās sthitā vyomni mārgadarśanatatparā //MU_3,53.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4539: tatas tadanuyātā sā prāpa koṭaram ambaram / nirmalaṃ karavālāṅgaṃ yathā lakṣaṇalekhikā //MU_3,53.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4540: meghamārgam athollaṅghya vātaskandhāntarotthitā / sūryamārgād atigatā tārāmārgamahīm itā //MU_3,53.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4541: vāyvindrasurasiddhānāṃ lokān ullaṅghya lāghavāt / brahmaviṣṇumaheśānāṃ prāpa brahmāṇḍakarparam //MU_3,53.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4542: himaśaityaṃ yathāntassthaṃ kumbhabhitter bahir bhavet / tathā saṅkalpasiddhā sā brahmāṇḍān nirgatā bahiḥ //MU_3,53.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4543: svacittamātradehaiṣā svasaṅkalpaprabhāvajam / antare vānubhavati kilaivaṃ nāma vibhramam //MU_3,53.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4544: tato brahmāṇḍapārasthāñ jalādyāvaraṇān nava / samullaṅghya puraḥ prāpa mahācidgaganāntaram //MU_3,53.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4545: adṛṣṭapāraparyantam ativegena dhāvatā / sarvato garuḍenāpi kalpakoṭiśatair api //MU_3,53.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4546: tatra brahmāṇḍalakṣāṇi santy asaṅkhyāni bhūriśaḥ / anyo'nyaṃ tāny adṛṣṭāni phalānīva mahāvane //MU_3,53.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4547: tatraikasmin purassaṃsthe vitatāvaraṇānvite / vedhayitvā viveśāntar vadanaṃ krimiko yathā //MU_3,53.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4548: punar brahmendraviṣṇvādi lokān ullaṅghya bhāsurān / sā mahīmaṇḍalaṃ śrīmat prāpa tārāpathād adhaḥ //MU_3,53.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4549: tatra tan maṇḍalaṃ prāpya tatpuraṃ taṃ ca maṇḍapam / praviśya puṣpaguptasya śavasya nikaṭe sthitā //MU_3,53.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4550: etasminn antare sātra na dadarśa kumārikām / māyām iva parijñātāṃ kvāpi yātāṃ varānanā //MU_3,53.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4551: mukham ālokya sā tasya svabhartuś śavarūpinaḥ / idaṃ buddhavatī satyaṃ pratibhāvaśatas svataḥ //MU_3,53.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4552: ayaṃ sa bhartā saṃgrāme nihato mama sindhunā / vīralokān imān prāpya kṣaṇaṃ śete yathāsukham //MU_3,53.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4553: ahaṃ devyāḥ prasādena saśarīrainam īdṛśam / iha prāptavatī dhanyā madanyā nāsti kācana //MU_3,53.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4554: iti sañcintya sā haste gṛhītvā cārucāmaram / vījayām āsa cāndreṇa taṃ dyaur vāvanimaṇḍalam //MU_3,53.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4555: līlā: te bhṛtyās tāś ca vā dāsyas sa rājā vā prabuddhavān / vakṣyanti vadatāṃ devi kiṃ kayeva kathaṃ dhiyā //MU_3,53.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4556: devī: sa rājā sā ca te bhṛtyās sarva eva parasparam / cidākāśaikatāyogād āvayoś ca prabhāvataḥ //MU_3,53.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4557: mahācitpratibhāsāś ca mahāniyatiniścayāt / anyo'nyam evaṃ vetsyanti mithas sampratibimbitam //MU_3,53.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4558: iyaṃ me sahajā bhāryā mameyaṃ sahajā sakhī / mameyaṃ sahajā rājñī bhṛtyo 'yaṃ sahajo mama //MU_3,53.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4559: kevalaṃ tvam ahaṃ sā ca yathāvṛttam akhaṇḍitam / jñāsyāma mahadāścaryaṃ na tu kaścid apītaraḥ //MU_3,53.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4560: līlā: amunaiva śarīreṇa kimarthaṃ nāgatā patim / eṣā vare 'pi saṃprāpte līlā lalitavādini //MU_3,53.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4561: devī: aprabuddhadhiyas siddhalokān puṇyavaśoditān / na samarthās svadehena prāptuṃ chāyā ivātapān //MU_3,53.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4562: ādisarge hi niyatis sthāpiteti prabodhibhiḥ / yathā satyam alīkena na milaty eva kiñcana //MU_3,53.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4563: yāvad vetālasaṅkalpo bālasya kila vidyate / nirvetāladhiyas tāvad udayas tasya kaḥ katham //MU_3,53.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4564: avivekajvaroṣṇatvaṃ vidyate yāvad ātmani / tāvad vivekaśītāṃśuśaityaṃ kuta udety alam //MU_3,53.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4565: ahaṃ pṛthvyādidehaḥ khegatir nāsti mamottamā / iti niścayavān yo 'ntaḥ kathaṃ syāt so 'nyaniścayaḥ //MU_3,53.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4566: ato jñānavivekena puṇyenātha vareṇa vā / puṇyadehe na gacchanti paraṃ lokam anena no //MU_3,53.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4567: śuṣkaparṇaṃ kilāṅgāre patad evāśu dahyate / ayaṃ devamayīṃ dehaḥ prāpta eva viśīryate //MU_3,53.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4568: etāvad eva bhavati varalābhavijṛmbhitaiḥ / yathā saṃvit sa evāhaṃ tathā smṛta iti sthitiḥ //MU_3,53.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4569: yas sarpapratyayo rajjvāṃ sa kathaṃ sarpakāryakṛt / ātmany eva hi yo nāsti tasya kā kāryakāritā //MU_3,53.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4570: yat tv etan mṛta ity eva mithyā samanubhūyate / prāgabhyāsasya puṣṭasya nāmaitat pravijṛmbhitam //MU_3,53.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4571: svānubhūte jagajjāle sugame saṃsṛtibhramaḥ / nānyasaṅkalpite nāma sargādyabhyāsa īdṛśaḥ //MU_3,53.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4572: antar anubhūyamānās saṃsṛtayo bāhyabhūtajālānām / aviditavedyadṛśām atidūre puṃsām ivaindavaṃ bimbam //MU_3,53.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4575: devī: tasmād ye vedyavettāro ye vā dharmaṃ paraṃ śritāḥ / ātivāhikadehatvaṃ prāpnuvanty eva netare //MU_3,54.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4576: ādhibhautikadehatvaṃ mithyā bhramamayātmakam / katham anye sthitiṃ yātu cchāyās te katham ātape //MU_3,54.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4577: līlā viditavedyā no paramaṃ dharmam āśritā / kevalaṃ tena sā bhartṛkalpitaṃ nagaraṃ gatā //MU_3,54.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4578: līlā: evam eṣā prayātā tu bhartā paśya mamāmbike / pravṛttaḥ prāṇasantyāge kartavyam kim ihādhunā //MU_3,54.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4579: bhāvābhāveṣu bhāvānāṃ kathaṃ niyatir āgatā / kathaṃ bhūyo 'py aniyatir mṛtijanmādiṣūcitā //MU_3,54.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4580: kathaṃ svabhāvasaṃsiddhiḥ kathaṃ sattā padārthagā / katham agnyādiṣūṣṇatvaṃ pṛthvyādau sthiratā katham //MU_3,54.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4581: himādiṣu kathaṃ śaityaṃ kā sattā kālakhādiṣu / bhāvābhāvagrahotsargas sthūlasūkṣmadṛśaḥ katham //MU_3,54.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4582: katham atyantam ucchrāyaṃ tṛṇagulmāṅkurādikam / vastunāyāty anaṣṭe 'pi sthite svocchrāyakāraṇe //MU_3,54.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4583: devī: mahāpralayasaṃpattau sargāsthāstamaye sati / anantākāśam āśāntaṃ sad brahmaivāvatiṣṭhate //MU_3,54.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4584: taccidrūpatayā tejaḥkaṇo 'ham iti cetati / svapne saṃvid yathā hi tvam ākāśagamanādi vā //MU_3,54.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4585: tejaḥkaṇo sausthūlatvam ātmanātmani vindati / asatyam eva satyābhaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ tad idaṃ smṛtam //MU_3,54.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4586: tatrāntar brahma tad vetti brahmāham ayam ity atha / manorājyaṃ sa kurute khātmaiva tad idaṃ jagat //MU_3,54.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4587: tasmin prathamatas sarge yā yathā yatra saṃvidaḥ / kathitās tās tathā tatra sthitā adyāpi niścalāḥ //MU_3,54.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4588: yad yathā sphuritaṃ cittvaṃ tat tathānyatma cid bhavet / svayam evāniyamitas tatas syān neha kiñcana //MU_3,54.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4589: na ca nāma nakiñcittvaṃ yujyate citsvarūpiṇaḥ / tyaktvā samastasaṃsthānaṃ hi saṃtiṣṭhatu vai katham //MU_3,54.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4590: sargādau svayam evāntaś cid yathā kacitātmani / himāgnyāditayādyāpi sā tathāste svasattayā //MU_3,54.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4591: tasmāt svasattāsantyāgas sataḥ kartuṃ na yujyate / yadā cidādes teneyaṃ niyatir na vinaśyati //MU_3,54.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4592: yad yathā kacitaṃ yatra vyomarūpy api pārthivam / sargādau tasya calitum adya yāvan na yujyate //MU_3,54.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4593: yā yathā cit prakacitā pratipakṣavidaṃ vinā / na sā tataḥ pracalati vedanābhyāsatas svayam //MU_3,54.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4594: jagadādāv anutpannaṃ yac cedam anubhūyate / tat saṃvidvyomakacanaṃ svapnastrīsurataṃ yathā //MU_3,54.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4595: asatyam eva satyābhaṃ pratibhānam iti sthitam / iti svabhāvasaṃvittir itthaṃ bhūtānubhūtayaḥ //MU_3,54.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4596: sargādau yā yathā rūḍhā saṃvitkacanasantatiḥ / sādyāpi cālitānyena sthitā niyatir dṛśyate //MU_3,54.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4597: gṛhītavyomatāsaṃvic cidvyoma vyomatāṃ gatam / gṛhītakālatāsaṃvic cinnabhaḥ kālatāṃ gatam //MU_3,54.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4598: gṛhītajalasaṃvid cidvyoma vāri vyavasthitam / svapne tathā hi puruṣaḥ paśyaty ātmani vāritām //MU_3,54.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4599: svamarutsaṃvidā bhāti bhavaty eṣā yathāsthitā / ciccamatkāracāturyam asad etat samūhate //MU_3,54.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4600: khatvaṃ maruttvam urvītvam aptvam agnitvam apy asat / vetty antas svapnasaṅkalpadhyāneṣv iva citis svayam //MU_3,54.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4601: maraṇānantaraṃ karmaphalānubhavanakramam / sarvakarmehaśāntyarthaṃ śrutaṃ śreyaskaraṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,54.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4602: rūḍhādisarge niyatir yaikadvitricaturmitā / puṣṭyādiṣv āyuṣaḥ puṃsāṃ tasyātha niyatiṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,54.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4603: deśakālakriyādravyaśuddhyaśuddhī svakarmaṇām / ūnatve cādhikatve ca nṛṇāṃ kāraṇam āyuṣaḥ //MU_3,54.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4604: svakarmadharme hrasati hrasaty āyur nṛṇām iha / vṛddhe vṛddhim upāyāti samam eva bhavet same //MU_3,54.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4605: bālamṛtyupradair bālo yuvā yauvanamṛtyudaiḥ / vṛddhamṛtyupradair vṛddhaḥ karmabhir mṛtim ṛcchati //MU_3,54.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4606: yo yathā śāstram ārabdhaṃ svadharmam anutiṣṭhati / bhājanaṃ bhavati śrīmān sa yathāśāstram āyuṣaḥ //MU_3,54.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4607: evaṃ karmānusāreṇa jantur antyāṃ daśām itaḥ / bhavaty astaṅgatavaco dṛṅmarmacchedivedanaḥ //MU_3,54.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4608: līlā: maraṇaṃ me samāsena kathayendusamānane / kiṃ sukhaṃ maraṇaṃ kiṃ vā duḥkhaṃ mṛtvā ca kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,54.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4609: devī: trividhāḥ puruṣās santi dehasyānte mumūrṣavaḥ / mūrkho 'tha dhāraṇābhyāsī yuktimān puruṣas tathā //MU_3,54.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4610: abhyasya dhāraṇāś ceṣṭā dehaṃ tyaktvā yathāsukham / prayāti dhāraṇābhyāsī yuktiyuktas tathaiva ca //MU_3,54.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4611: dhāraṇā yasya nābhyāsaṃ prāptā naiva sa muktibhāk / mūrkhas svamṛtikāle 'sau duḥkham ety avaśāśayaḥ //MU_3,54.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4612: vāsanāveśavaivaśyaṃ bhāvayan viṣayāśayaḥ / dīnatāṃ paramām eti parilūnam ivāmbujam //MU_3,54.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4613: aśāstrasaṃskṛtamatir asajjanaparāyaṇaḥ / mṛtāv anubhavaty antar dāham agnāv iva cyutaḥ //MU_3,54.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4614: yadā ghargharakaṇṭhatvaṃ vairūpyaṃ dṛṣṭivarṇajam / gacchaty eṣa vināśātmā tadā bhavati dīnadhīḥ //MU_3,54.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4617: parivṛttakakupcakra uhyamāna ivārṇave / nīyamāna ivākāśe ghananidronmukhāśayaḥ //MU_3,54.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4618: andhakūpam ivāpannaś śilāntar iva yojitaḥ / svayaṃ jaḍībhavajjihvo vikartita ivāśaye //MU_3,54.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4619: patatīva nabhomārgād ghuṇāvarta ivārpitaḥ / rathadruta ivārūḍho himavadgalanonmukhaḥ //MU_3,54.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4620: jyotkurvann iva saṃsāraṃ vahnimadhyaṃ spṛśann iva / bhramitaḥ kṣepaṇeṇeva vātayantra iva sthitaḥ //MU_3,54.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4621: bhramito vā bhrama iva kṛṣṭo raśanayeva vā / bhramann iva jalāvarte śastrayantra ivārpitaḥ //MU_3,54.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4622: prohyamānas tṛṇam iva mahaty arṇavamārute / dūroḍho vāripūreṇa nipatann iva vāḍave //MU_3,54.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4623: anantagagane śvabhre cakrāvarte patann iva / adridyūrvīviparyāsadaśām anubhavan sthitaḥ //MU_3,54.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4624: patann ivānavarataṃ protpatann iva vābhitaḥ / ghūtkārākarṇanodbhrāntaḥ pūrṇasarvendriyavrajaḥ //MU_3,54.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4625: kramāc chyāmalatāṃ yānti tasya sarvārthasaṃvidaḥ / yathāstaṅgacchanti ravau mandālokatayā diśaḥ //MU_3,54.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4626: pūrvāparaṃ na jānāti smṛtis tānavam āgatā / yathā pāścātyasandhyānte naṣṭā dṛṣṭir digaṣṭake //MU_3,54.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4627: manaḥkalpanasāmarthyaṃ jahāty asya vimohitaḥ / avivekena tenāsau mahāmohe nimajjati //MU_3,54.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4628: yadeṣanmoham ādatte nādatte pavanas tadā / na tv ādatte yathā prāṇān moham āyāty alaṃ tadā //MU_3,54.54//
GSP27moksop_u:4629: anyo'nyaṃ puṣṭatāṃ yātair mohāt saṃvedanabhramaiḥ / jantuḥ pāṣāṇatām eti sthitam ity ādisargataḥ //MU_3,54.55//
GSP27moksop_u:4630: līlā: vyathāṃ vimohaṃ mūrchāṃ ca bhramaṃ vyādhim acetanam / kim artham ayam āyāti deho khaṇḍāṅgavān api //MU_3,54.56//
GSP27moksop_u:4631: devī: evaṃ saṃviditaṃ karma sargādau spandanaṃ vidaḥ / yady asmin samaye duḥkhaṃ kālenaitāvatedṛśam //MU_3,54.57//
GSP27moksop_u:4632: syāt kacaty eva viṭapagucchavat tat svabhāvajam / vetti cittvavijṛmbhotthaṃ nānyad atrāsti kāraṇam //MU_3,54.58//
GSP27moksop_u:4633: yadā vyathāvaśān nāḍyas svasaṅkocavikāsane / tyajanti maruto dehāt pariyānti nijāṃ sthitim //MU_3,54.59//
GSP27moksop_u:4634: praviṣṭā na viniryānti niryātāḥ praviśanti no / yadā vātā vināḍitvāt tadāspandān mṛtir bhavet //MU_3,54.60//
GSP27moksop_u:4635: na viśaty eva vā naiva niryāti pavano yadā / śarīrān nāḍivaidhurye mṛta ity ucyate tadā //MU_3,54.61//
GSP27moksop_u:4636: āgantavyaṃ mayā nāśaṃ kālenaitāvateti yā / pūrvaṃ saṃviditā saṃvid yāti taccoditā mṛtim //MU_3,54.62//
GSP27moksop_u:4637: īdṛśena mayehetthaṃ bhāvyam ity ādisargajā / saṃvid bījakalānāśaṃ na kadācana gacchati //MU_3,54.63//
GSP27moksop_u:4638: saṃvido vedanaṃ nāma svabhāvo 'vyatirekavān / tasmāt svabhāvasaṃvitter nānyan maraṇajanmanī //MU_3,54.64//
GSP27moksop_u:4639: kvacid āvartavad daussthyaṃ kvacin nadyāṃ jalaṃ yathā / kvacit saumyaṃ kvacij jīvadharmīdaṃ cetanaṃ tathā //MU_3,54.65//
GSP27moksop_u:4640: yathā latāyāḥ parvāṇi dīrghāyā madhyamadhyataḥ / tathā cetanasattāyā janmāni maraṇāni ca //MU_3,54.66//
GSP27moksop_u:4641: na jāyate na mriyate cetanaṃ puruṣaḥ kvacit / svapnasambhramavad bhrāntam etat paśyati kevalam //MU_3,54.67//
GSP27moksop_u:4642: puruṣaś cetanāmātraṃ sa kadā kveva naśyati / cetanavyatiriktaṃ ca vadānyat kiṃ pumān bhavet //MU_3,54.68//
GSP27moksop_u:4643: kvādya yāvan mṛtaṃ brūhi cetanaṃ kasya kiṃ katham / mriyante dehalakṣāṇi cetanaṃ sthitam akṣayam //MU_3,54.69//
GSP27moksop_u:4644: amariṣyat tu cec cittvam ekasminn eva tanmṛte / abhaviṣyan sarva eva mṛtā ekamṛtāv iha //MU_3,54.70//
GSP27moksop_u:4645: vāsanāmātravaicitryaṃ yaj jīvo 'nubhavet svayam / tasyaiva janmamaraṇe nāmanī parikalpite //MU_3,54.71//
GSP27moksop_u:4646: evaṃ na kiñcin mriyate jāyate na ca kaścana / vāsanāvartagarteṣu jīvo luṭhati kevalam //MU_3,54.72//
GSP27moksop_u:4647: atyantāsambhavād eva dṛśyasyāsau ca vāsanā / nāsty eveti vicāreṇa dṛḍhajñāne vinaśyati //MU_3,54.73//
GSP27moksop_u:4648: anuditam uditaṃ jagatprabandhaṃ bhavabhayato vyasanair vilokya samyak / alam anuditavāsano hi jīvo bhavati vimukta itīha satyam astu //MU_3,54.74//
GSP27moksop_u:4651: līlā: yathaiṣa jantur mriyate jāyate ca yathā punaḥ / tan me kathaya deveśi punar bodhavivṛddhaye //MU_3,55.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4652: devī: nāḍīpravāhe vidhure yadā vātavisaṃsthatām / jantuḥ prāpnoti hi tadā śāmyatīvāsya cetanam //MU_3,55.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4653: śuddhaṃ hi cetanaṃ nityaṃ nodeti na ca śāmyati / sthāvare jaṅgame vyomni śaile 'gnau pavane sthitam //MU_3,55.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4654: kevalaṃ vātasaṃrodhād yadā spandaḥ praśāmyati / mṛta ity ucyate dehas tadā sa jaḍanāmakaḥ //MU_3,55.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4655: tasmin dehe śavībhūte vāte khānilatāṃ gate / cetanaṃ vāsanāyuktaṃ khātma tatraiva tiṣṭhati //MU_3,55.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4656: jīva ity ucyate tasya nāmāṇor vāsanāvataḥ / tatraivāste sa ca śavāgāre gaganake tathā //MU_3,55.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4657: tato 'sau pretaśabdena procyate vyavahāribhiḥ / cetano vāsanāmiśras sāmodānilavat sthitaḥ //MU_3,55.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4658: idaṃ sarvaṃ parityajya yadāste darśanāntare / sa svapna iva saṅkalpa iva nānākṛtis tadā //MU_3,55.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4659: tasminn eva pradeśe 'ntaḥ pūrvavat smṛtibhāg bhavet / tadaiva mṛtimūrchānte paśyaty anyac charīrakam //MU_3,55.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4660: ātmany asthighaṭāpuṣṭam anyasya vyoma kevalam / ādhāre bhūtale sārkam ākāśajanavāsanam //MU_3,55.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4661: bhavanti yadvidhāḥ pretās teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu / sāmānyapāpino madhyapāpinas sthūlapāpinaḥ //MU_3,55.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4662: sāmānyadharmā madhyasthadharmā cottamadharmavān / eteṣāṃ kasyacid bhedo dvau trayo 'py atha kasyacit //MU_3,55.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4663: kaścin mahāpātakavān vatsarān mṛtimūrchanām / vimūḍho 'nubhavaty antaḥ pāṣāṇahṛdayopamām //MU_3,55.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4664: tataḥ kālena sambuddho vāsanājaṭharoditam / anubhūya ciraṃ kālaṃ vāsanāduḥkham akṣatam //MU_3,55.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4665: bhuktvā yoniśatāny uccair duḥkhād duḥkhāntaraṃ gataḥ / kadācid imam āyāti saṃsārasvapnavibhramam //MU_3,55.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4666: atha vā mṛtimohānte jaḍāṃ duḥkhaśatākulāṃ / kṣaṇād vṛkṣāditām eva hṛtsthām anubhavanti te //MU_3,55.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4667: svavāsanānurūpāṇi duḥkhāni narake punaḥ / anubhūyātha yonīṣu jāyante bhūtale cirāt //MU_3,55.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4668: atha madhyamapāpo yo mṛtimohād anantaram / sa śilājaṭharaṃ jāḍyaṃ kañcit kālaṃ prapaśyati //MU_3,55.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4669: tataḥ prabudhya kālena kenacid vā tathaiva vā / tiryagādikramair bhuktvā yonīs saṃsāram eṣyati //MU_3,55.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4670: mṛta evānubhavati kaścit sāmānyapātakī / svavāsanānusāreṇa dehaṃ sampannam akṣatam //MU_3,55.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4671: saṅkalpa iva saṅkalpa iva vetti sa tādṛśam / tasminn eva kṣaṇe tasya smṛtir ittham udety api //MU_3,55.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4672: ye tūttamamahāpuṇyamṛtimohād anantaram / svargaṃ vidyādharapuraṃ smṛtyāsv anubhavanti te //MU_3,55.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4673: tato 'nyakarmasadṛśaṃ bhuktvānyatra nijaṃ phalam / jāyante mānuṣe loke saśrīke sajjanāspade //MU_3,55.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4674: ye 'tha madhyamadharmāṇo mṛtimohād anantaram / ta ihottāraṃ kurvantas sthitaṃ paśyanti dehakam //MU_3,55.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4675: ye 'tha sāmānyadharmāṇo mṛtimohād anantaram / te vyomavāyuvalitāḥ prayānty oṣadhipallavān //MU_3,55.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4676: tatra cāruphalaṃ bhūtvā praviśya hṛdayaṃ nṛṇām / tatas tām adhitiṣṭhanti garbhe jātikramodite //MU_3,55.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4677: svavāsanānusāreṇa pretā etāṃ vyavasthitiṃ / mūrchānte 'nubhavanty antaḥ krameṇaivākrameṇa ca //MU_3,55.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4678: ādau mṛtā vayam iti budhyante tadanukramāt / bandhupiṇḍādidānena protpannā iti vedinaḥ //MU_3,55.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4679: tato yamabhaṭā ete kālapāśānvitās tathā / nīyamāno vrajāmy ebhiḥ kṣaṇād yamapuraṃ tv iti //MU_3,55.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4680: udyānāni vimānāni śobhanāni punaḥ punaḥ / svakarmabhir upāttāni puṇyānīty eva puṇyavān //MU_3,55.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4681: imāni kaṇṭakaśvabhraśastrapattravanāni ca / svakarmaduṣkṛtotthāni saṃprāptānīti pāpavān //MU_3,55.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4682: iyaṃ me saumyasaṃpātā dharaṇiś śītaśādvalā / snigdhacchāyāsavāpīkā purassaṃstheti madhyamaḥ //MU_3,55.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4683: ayaṃ prāpto yamapuram ayam eṣa sa bhūtapaḥ / ayaṃ karmavicāro me kṛta ity anubhūtimān //MU_3,55.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4684: iti pratyekam abhyeti pṛthus saṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ / yathāsaṃsthitaniśśeṣapadārthācārabhāsuraḥ //MU_3,55.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4685: ākāśa eva niśśūnye śūnyātmaivaṃ vibhodhavān / deśakālakriyādairghyabhāsuro 'pi na kiñcana //MU_3,55.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4686: ito 'yam aham ādiṣṭas svakarmaphalabhojane / gacchāmy āśu śubhaṃ svargam ito narakam eva vā //MU_3,55.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4687: ayaṃ svargo mayā bhukto bhukto 'yaṃ narako 'thavā / imās tā yonayo tyaktā jāye 'haṃ saṃsṛtau punaḥ //MU_3,55.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4688: ayaṃ śālir ahaṃ jātaḥ kramāt phalam iha sthitam / ity udarkaprabodhena buddhyamāno bhaviṣyati //MU_3,55.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4689: saṃsuptavāsanas tv evaṃ bījatāṃ yāty asau nare / tadbījaṃ yonigalitaṃ garbho bhavati mātari //MU_3,55.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4690: sa garbho jāyate loke pūrvakarmānusārataḥ / bhavyo bhavaty abhavyo vā bālako lalitākṛtiḥ //MU_3,55.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4691: tato 'nubhavatīdaṃ hi yauvanaṃ madanonmukham / tato jarāṃ padmamukhe himāśanim iva cyutām //MU_3,55.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4692: tato 'pi vyādhimaraṇaṃ punar maraṇamūrchanam / punas svapnavad āyātaṃ piṇḍair dehaparigraham //MU_3,55.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4693: yāmyaṃ yāti punar lokaṃ punar enaṃ bhramakramam / bhūyo bhūyo 'nubhavati vyomny eva vyomarūpavān //MU_3,55.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4694: līlā: ādisarge yathā devi bhrama eva pravartate / tathā kathaya me bhūyaḥ prasādād bodhavṛddhaye //MU_3,55.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4695: devī: paramārthaghanaṃ śailāḥ paramārthaghanaṃ drumāḥ / paramārthaghanaṃ pṛthvī paramārthaghanaṃ nabhaḥ //MU_3,55.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4696: sarvātmakatvāt sa yato yathodeti cidīśvaraḥ / paramākāśaśuddhātmā tathā tatra bhavaty alam //MU_3,55.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4697: sargādau svapnapuruṣanyāyenādiprajāpatiḥ / yathā sphuratprakacitas tathādyāpi sthitā sthitiḥ //MU_3,55.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4698: prathamo 'sau praticchandaḥ padārthānāṃ hi bimbakam / pratibimbitam etasmād yat tad adyāpi saṃsthitam //MU_3,55.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4699: yan nāma suśiraṃ sthānaṃ dehānāṃ tadgato 'nilaḥ / karoty aṅgaparispandaṃ jīvatīty ucyate tataḥ //MU_3,55.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4700: sargādāv eva me vaiṣā jaṅgame 'dhiṣṭhitā sthitiḥ / cetanā api nisspandās tena te pādapādayaḥ //MU_3,55.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4701: cidākāśo 'yam evāṃśaṃ kurute cetanoditam / sa eva saṃvid bhavati śeṣaṃ tad api naiva tat //MU_3,55.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4702: naro yadi khuraprāntaṃ cetaty akṣipaṭaṃ na tu / tat tasya nākṣiṇirjīvaṃ nājīvaty eva sarvataḥ //MU_3,55.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4703: tathā khaṃ khatayā bhūmir bhūmitvenāptayā jalam / yad yathā cetati svairaṃ tad vetty eva tathāvapuḥ //MU_3,55.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4704: iti sarvaśarīreṇa jaṅgamatvena jaṅgamam / sthāvaraṃ sthāvaratvena sarvātmā bhāvayan sthitaḥ //MU_3,55.54//
GSP27moksop_u:4705: tasmād yaj jaṅgamaṃ nāma tat sacopanarūpadhṛt / tena buddhaṃ tatas tadvat tad evādyāpi saṃsthitam //MU_3,55.55//
GSP27moksop_u:4706: yaj jaḍābhidham ābuddhaṃ sthāvaraṃ tena vai punaḥ / jaḍam adyāpi saṃviddhi śilātarutṛṇādi tat //MU_3,55.56//
GSP27moksop_u:4707: na tu jāḍyaṃ pṛthak kiñcid asti nāpi ca cetanam / nāsti bhedo 'tra sargādau sattāsāmānyakena tu //MU_3,55.57//
GSP27moksop_u:4708: vṛkṣāṇām upalānāṃ yā nāmāntassthās svasaṃvidaḥ / buddhyādīnīhitāny eva tāni teṣām iha sthitiḥ //MU_3,55.58//
GSP27moksop_u:4709: vido 'ntas sthāvarāder yās tasyā buddhyādayo hi te / anyābhidhānās tv anyārthās saṅketair aparais sthitāḥ //MU_3,55.59//
GSP27moksop_u:4710: krimikīṭapataṅgānāṃ yeṣām antas svasaṃvidaḥ / tāny eva teṣāṃ buddhyādīny anyābhikhyārthakāni tu //MU_3,55.60//
GSP27moksop_u:4711: yathottarābdhijanatā dakṣiṇābdhijanasthitim / na kiñcid api jānāti nijasaṃvedanād ṛte //MU_3,55.61//
GSP27moksop_u:4712: svasaṃjñānubhave līnās tathā sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ / parasparajaḍās sarve svasaṅketaparāyaṇāḥ //MU_3,55.62//
GSP27moksop_u:4713: yathā śilāntassaṃsthānāṃ bahissthānāṃ ca vedanam / asaj jaḍaṃ ca bhekānāṃ mitho'ntas tasthuṣāṃ tathā //MU_3,55.63//
GSP27moksop_u:4714: tatra sarvagataṃ cittvāc cidvyomnā yat pracetitam / sargādau copanaṃ vāyus sa ihādyāpi saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,55.64//
GSP27moksop_u:4715: viditaṃ yat tu sauśiryaṃ tan nabhas tatra mārutaḥ / spandātmetyādi sa mahān padārtheṣv iti copanam //MU_3,55.65//
GSP27moksop_u:4716: cittvaṃ tu paramārthena sthāvare jaṅgame sthitam / copanāny anilair eva bhavanti na bhavanti ca //MU_3,55.66//
GSP27moksop_u:4717: evaṃ bhrāntimayaṃ viśvaṃ padārthās saṃvidaṃśavaḥ / sargādiṣu yathaivāsaṃs tathaivādyāpi saṃsthitāḥ //MU_3,55.67//
GSP27moksop_u:4718: yathā viśvapadārthānāṃ svabhāvasya vijṛmbhaṇam / asatyam eva satyābhaṃ tad etat kathitaṃ tava //MU_3,55.68//
GSP27moksop_u:4719: ayam astaṅgataprāyaḥ paśya rājā vidūrathaḥ / mālāśavasya padmasya patyus te yāti hṛdguhām //MU_3,55.69//
GSP27moksop_u:4720: līlā: kena mārgeṇa deveśi yāntyau vai śavamaṇḍapam / enam evāśu paśantyāv āvāṃ gacchāva uttame //MU_3,55.70//
GSP27moksop_u:4721: devī: manuṣyavāsanāntassthaṃ mārgam āśritya gacchati / eṣo 'ham aparaṃ lokaṃ dūraṃ yāmīti cinmayam //MU_3,55.71//
GSP27moksop_u:4722: mārgeṇāvāsanenaiva yā vas tenaiva sammatam / parasparecchā saṃvittir na hi sauhārdabandhinī //MU_3,55.72//
GSP27moksop_u:4723: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti vihitakathāśamakramāyāṃ paramadṛśi prasṛte prabodhabhānau / nṛpativarasutāmanasy udāre vigalitavij jaraḍho vidūratho 'bhūt //MU_3,55.73//
GSP27moksop_u:4726: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etasminn antare rājā parivṛttākṣitārakaḥ / babhūvaikatanuprāṇas sadyaś śuṣkasitādharaḥ //MU_3,56.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4729: citranyasta ivākāramātradṛśyo vicetanaḥ / nisspandasarvāvayavas samutkīrṇa ivopale //MU_3,56.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4730: bahunātra kim uktena tāludeśena taṃ jahau / prāṇaḥ pipatiṣuṃ vṛkṣaṃ supakṣīvāntarikṣagaḥ //MU_3,56.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4731: taṃ te dadṛśatur bāle divyadṛṣṭī nabhogatam / jīvaṃ prāṇamayaṃ saṃvidgandhaleśam ivānile //MU_3,56.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4732: sā jīvasaṃvid gaganavātenāvalitā satī / khe dūraṃ gantum ārebhe vāsanānuvidhāyinī //MU_3,56.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4733: tām evānusasārātha strīdvayaṃ jīvasaṃvidam / bhramarīyugalaṃ vātalagnāṃ gandhakalām iva //MU_3,56.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4734: tato muhūrtamātreṇa śānte maraṇamūrchane / sāmbare bubudhe saṃvid gandhalekheva vayunā //MU_3,56.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4735: apaśyat puruṣān yāmyān nīyamānaṃ ca tair vapuḥ / bandhupiṇḍapradānena śarīraṃ jātam ātmanaḥ //MU_3,56.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4736: mārge karmaphalollāsavati dūratare sthitam / vaivasvatapuraṃ gantuṃ pravṛttam anivāritam //MU_3,56.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4737: prāptaṃ vaivasvatapuram ādiṣṭaṃ ca tato yathā / asya karmāṇy aśubhrāṇi naiva santi kadācana //MU_3,56.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4738: nityam evāvadātānāṃ kartāyaṃ śubhakarmaṇām / bhagavatyās sarasvatyā vareṇāyaṃ vivardhitaḥ //MU_3,56.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4739: prāktano 'sya śavībhūto deho 'sti kusumāmbaraḥ / praviśatv eṣa taṃ gatvā tyajyatām ity avekṣya saḥ //MU_3,56.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4740: tatas tyakto nabhomārgaṃ yantropala iva plutaḥ / atha jīvakalā līlā jñaptiś ceti trayaṃ nabhaḥ //MU_3,56.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4741: pupluve jīvalekhā tv arūpiṇy ete na paśyati / tam evānusarantyau te samullaṅghya nabhastalam //MU_3,56.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4742: lokāntarāṇy atītyātha vinirgatya jagadgṛhāt / dvitīyaṃ jagad āsādya bhūmaṇḍalam upetya ca //MU_3,56.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4743: kānte saṅkalparūpiṇyau saṅgate jīvalekhayā / padmarājapuraṃ prāpya līlāntaḥpuramaṇḍapam //MU_3,56.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4744: kṣaṇād viviśatus svairaṃ vāyulekhe yathāmbudam / sūryātapo yathāmbhojaṃ sugandhaḥ pavanaṃ yathā //MU_3,56.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4745: rāmaḥ: brahman prāptaḥ katham asau śavasya nikaṭaṃ gṛham / kathaṃ tena parijñāto mārgo mṛtaśarīriṇā //MU_3,56.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4746: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tasya svavāsanāntasstham avaśyaṃ kila rāghava / tat sarvaṃ hṛdgataṃ tasmān māsau prāpnotu tat katham //MU_3,56.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4747: bhrāntimātram asaṅkhyeyaṃ jagajjīvakaṇodare / bīje vaṭatarum iva sthitaṃ ko vai na paśyati //MU_3,56.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4748: svabhāvabhūtaṃ cidaṇus trailokyanicayaṃ tathā / naro yathaikadeśastho dūradeśāntarasthitam //MU_3,56.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4749: saṃpaśyati nidhānaṃ svaṃ manasānārataṃ sadā / yathā jīvadvapur jīvamakuraṃ hṛdi paśyati //MU_3,56.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4750: tathā svavāsanāntasstham abhīṣṭhaṃ paripaśyati / jīvo jātiśatāḍhyo 'pi bhrame parigato 'pi vā //MU_3,56.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4751: rāmaḥ: bhagavan piṇḍadānādivāsanārahitākṛtiḥ / kīdṛk saṃpadyate dehaḥ piṇḍo yasmai na dīyate //MU_3,56.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4752: vasiṣṭhaḥ: piṇḍo 'tha dīyatāṃ mātre piṇḍo datto mameti cet / vāsanā hṛdi saṃrūḍhā tat piṇḍaphalabhāṅ naraḥ //MU_3,56.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4753: yaccittas tanmayo jantur bhavatīty anubhūtayaḥ / sadeheṣu videheṣu na bhavanty anyathā kvacit //MU_3,56.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4754: sapiṇḍo 'smīti saṃvittyā niṣpiṇḍo 'pi hi piṇḍavān / niṣpiṇḍo 'smīti saṃvittyā sapiṇḍo 'pi na piṇḍavān //MU_3,56.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4755: yathābhāvanam eteṣāṃ padārthānāṃ hi satyatā / bhāvanā ca padārthebhyaḥ kāraṇebhya udeti hi //MU_3,56.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4756: yathā vāsanayā jantor viṣam apy amṛtāyate / asatyas satyatām eti padārtho bhāvanāt tathā //MU_3,56.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4757: kāraṇena vinodeti na kadācana kasyacit / kāryatā kācid api bho iti niścayavān bhava //MU_3,56.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4758: kāraṇena vinā kāryam ā mahāpralayaṃ kvacit / na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ kiñcit svayaṃ svaikatayā ṛte //MU_3,56.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4759: vid eva vāsanā saiva dhatte svapna ivārthatām / kāryakāraṇatām eti saivam anyeva tiṣṭhati //MU_3,56.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4760: rāmaḥ: dharmo nāsti mamety eva yaḥ preto vāsanānvitaḥ / tasya cet suhṛdā bhūridharmā kṛtvā samarpitaḥ //MU_3,56.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4761: tatra cātra sa kiṃ dharmo naṣṭas syād uta bhāvanam / satyārthād vāpy asatyārthād bhāvanāt kiṃ balādhikam //MU_3,56.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4762: vasiṣṭhaḥ: deśakālakriyādravyasampadbhyaś ceti bhāvanā / yatraivābhyuditā sāmyāt sa dvayor adhiko jayī //MU_3,56.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4763: dharmadātuḥ pravṛddhā ced vāsanā tat tayā kṣaṇāt / āpūryate pretamatir no cet pretadhiyāśu sā //MU_3,56.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4764: evaṃ parasparajayo jayaty atrātivīryavān / tasmāc chubhena yatnena śubhābhyāsam upāharet //MU_3,56.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4765: rāmaḥ: deśakālādhikā brahman vāsanā samudeti cet / tan mahākalpasargādau deśakālodayaḥ kutaḥ //MU_3,56.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4766: kāraṇais samudetīdaṃ kais tadā sahakāribhiḥ / sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve vāsanā kutaḥ //MU_3,56.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4767: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evam etan mahābhāga satyātmani kadācana / mahāpralayasargādau deśakālādi kiñcana //MU_3,56.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4768: sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve sati dṛśyadhīḥ / neyam asti na cotpannā na ca sphurati kācana //MU_3,56.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4769: dṛśyasyāsambhavād dhetoḥ kiñcid yad dṛśyate tv idam / tad brahmaiva kacadrūpaṃ sthitam ittham anāmayam //MU_3,56.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4770: etac cāgre yuktiśataiḥ kathayiṣyāma eva te / etadarthaṃ prayatno 'yaṃ vartamānakathāṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,56.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4771: tat te dadṛśatuḥ prāpte mandiraṃ sundarodaram / kīrṇaṃ puṣpopakāreṇa vasantam iva śītalam //MU_3,56.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4775: sampūrṇacandraśakalodarakāntikāntasaundaryanirjitapurandaramandirarddhi / vairiñcapadmamukulāntaracāruśobhā niśśabdam abdam iva nirmalam indukāntam //MU_3,56.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4778: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tato dadṛśatus tatra śavaśayyaikapārśvagām / līlāṃ vidūrathasyāgre mṛtāṃ tāṃ prathamāgatām //MU_3,57.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4780: prāksmṛtyavayavaspandāṃ prāgambaraparāvṛtām / prāgbhūṣaṇabharacchannāṃ kevalaṃ tatra saṃsthitām //MU_3,57.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4781: gṛhītacāmarāṃ cāru vījayantīṃ mahīpatim / maunasthāṃ vāmahastasthavadanendutayānatām //MU_3,57.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4782: bhūṣaṇāṃśulatāpuṣpaiḥ phullām iva vanasthalīm / kurvāṇāṃ vīkṣaṇair dikṣu mālatyutpalavarṣaṇam //MU_3,57.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4783: sṛjantīm ātmalāvaṇyād bindūn indūn ivoditān / narādhipātmano viṣṇor lakṣmīm iva samāgatām //MU_3,57.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4784: uditāṃ puṣpasambhārād iva puṣpākaraśriyam / bhartur vadanavinyastadṛṣṭim iva viceṣṭitām //MU_3,57.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4785: kiñcitpramlānavadanāṃ mlānacandrāṃ niśām iva / tābhyāṃ sā lalanā dṛṣṭā tayā te tu na lakṣite / yasmāt te satyasaṅkalpe sā na tāvat tathoditā //MU_3,57.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4786: rāmaḥ: tasmin pradeśe sā pūrvalīlā saṃsthāpya dehakam / dhyānena jñaptisahitā gatābhūd iti varṇitam //MU_3,57.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4787: kim idānīṃ ca līlā yā dehas tatra na varṇitaḥ / kiṃ sampannaḥ kva vāyāta iti me kathaya prabho //MU_3,57.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4788: vasiṣṭhaḥ: kvāsīl līlāśarīraṃ tat kutas tasya hi satyatā / sā kila bhrāntir evābhūj jalabuddhir marāv iva //MU_3,57.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4789: yathaiva bodhe līlāsau pariṇāmam itā kramāt / pare tathaiva tasyās tad dhimavadgalitaṃ vapuḥ //MU_3,57.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4790: ātivāhikadehasya kālenābhyudito bhramaḥ / ādhibhautikadeho 'ham iti rajjubhujaṅgavat //MU_3,57.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4791: ātivāhikadehena dṛśyaṃ yad avakalpitam / bhūmyādi nāma tasyaiva kṛtaṃ tat tv ādhibhautikam //MU_3,57.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4792: vāstavena tu rūpeṇa bhūmyādyātmādhibhautikaḥ / na śabdena na cārthena śabdārthau śaśaśṛṅgavat //MU_3,57.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4793: puṃso hariṇako 'smīti svapne yasyoditā matiḥ / sa kim anviṣyati mṛgaṃ svamṛgatvaparikṣaye //MU_3,57.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4794: udety asatyam evāśu tathāsatyam pralīyate / bhrāntir hi bhramato rajjvām iva sarpatvasaṅgrahe //MU_3,57.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4795: samastasyāprabuddhasya manojātasya kasyacit / viḍambena dṛg eveyaṃ mithyārūḍhim upāgatā //MU_3,57.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4796: svapnopalambhaṃ sargākhyaṃ svaṃ sarvo 'nubhavan sthitaḥ / ciram āvṛttadehātmā bhūcakrasphuraṇaṃ yathā //MU_3,57.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4797: rāmaḥ: brahmaṃl lokaiḥ purassthasya gacchato yogino nijām / ātivāhikatāṃ dehaḥ kīdṛśo 'yaṃ vilokyate //MU_3,57.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4798: vasiṣṭhaḥ: dehād dehāntaraprāptiḥ pūrvadehavināśadā / ātivāhikadehe hi svapneṣv iva vikasvarā //MU_3,57.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4799: yathātāpe himakaṇaś śaradvyomni sito 'mbudaḥ / dṛśyamāno 'py adṛśyatvam ety evaṃ yogidehakaḥ //MU_3,57.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4800: jhagity evāthavā kaścid yogideho na lakṣyate / sayogibhiḥ puro vegāt proḍḍīna iva khe khagaḥ //MU_3,57.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4801: svavāsanākrameṇaiva kvacit kecit kadācana / mṛto 'yam iti paśyanti kaṃcid yoginam agragāḥ //MU_3,57.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4802: bhrāntimātraṃ tu dehātma teṣāṃ tad upaśāmyati / satyabodhena rajjūnāṃ sarpabuddhir ivātmani //MU_3,57.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4803: ko dehaḥ kasya vā sattā kasya nāśaḥ kathaṃ kutaḥ / sthiraṃ tad evaṃ yad abhūd abodhaḥ kevalaṃ gataḥ //MU_3,57.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4804: rāmaḥ: ātivāhikatāṃ yāti ādhibhautika eva kim / utānya iti me brūhi yenohya iva na prabho //MU_3,57.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4805: vasiṣṭhaḥ: bahuśo 'py uktam etan me na gṛhṇāsi kim uttaram / ātivāhika evāsti nāsty evehādhibhautikaḥ //MU_3,57.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4806: tasyaivābhyāsato 'bhyeti sādhibhautikatāmatiḥ / yadā śāmyati saivāsya tadā pūrvā pravartate //MU_3,57.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4807: tadā gurutvaṃ kāṭhinyaṃ bhittimattvaṃ mudhāgrahaḥ / śāmyet svapne narasyeva boddhur bodhān nirāmayāt //MU_3,57.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4808: laghutūlasamāpattis tatas samupajāyate / svapne svapnaparijñānād yathā deho laghūbhavet //MU_3,57.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4809: tathā bodhād ayaṃ dehas sthūlavat plutimān bhavet / anekadinasaṅkalpadehe pariṇatātmanām //MU_3,57.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4810: asmin dehe śave dagdhe tatraiva sthitim īyuṣām / laghudehānubhavanam avaśyaṃbhāvi vai tathā //MU_3,57.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4811: prabodhātiśayād eti jīvatām api yoginām / uditāyāṃ smṛtau tatra saṅkalpātmāham ity alam //MU_3,57.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4812: yādṛśas sa bhaved dehas tādṛśo 'yaṃ prabodhinaḥ / bhrāntir evam iyaṃ bhāti rajjvām iva bhujaṅgatā / kiṃ naṣṭam asyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ jātāyāṃ kiṃ prajāyate //MU_3,57.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4813: rāmaḥ: anantaraṃ te vāstavyā līle paśyanti te yadi / tat satyasaṅkalpatayā budhyante kiṃ tataḥ prabho //MU_3,57.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4814: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ jñāsyanti te rājñī duḥkhiteyam iha sthitā / vayasyā kācid anyeyaṃ kuto 'py asyā upāgatā //MU_3,57.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4815: sandehaḥ ka ivātraiṣāṃ paśavo hy avivekinaḥ / yathādṛṣṭaṃ viceṣṭante kuta eṣāṃ vicāraṇā //MU_3,57.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4816: yathā loṣṭo luṭhan vṛkṣaṃ vañcayitvāśu gacchati / ajñātvaivājñajanatā tathādryagnisurādikam //MU_3,57.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4817: yathā svapnavapur bodhena jāne kveva gacchati / asatyam eva tad yasmāt tathaivehādhibhautikam //MU_3,57.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4818: rāmaḥ: bhagavan svapnaśikharī prabodhe kveva gacchati / iti me saṃśayaṃ chindhi śaradabhram ivānilaḥ //MU_3,57.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4819: vasiṣṭhaḥ: svapne bhrame 'tha saṅkalpe padārthāḥ parvatādayaḥ / saṃvido 'ntar milanty ete spandanāny anilaṃ yathā //MU_3,57.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4820: aspandasya yathā vāyos svaspando 'ntar viśaty alam / asphurantī tu tenaiva yāty ekatvaṃ tadātmikā //MU_3,57.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4821: saṃvitsvapnārthayor dvitvaṃ na kadācana labhyate / yathā dravatvapayasor yathā vā spandavātayoḥ //MU_3,57.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4822: yas tv atra syād dvitābodhas tad ajñānam anuttamam / saiṣā saṃsṛtir ity uktā mithyājñānātmikoditā //MU_3,57.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4823: sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve kila kīdṛśī / saṃvit svapnapadārthānāṃ dvitvaṃ svapne nirarthakam //MU_3,57.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4824: yathā svapnas tathā jāgrad idaṃ nātrāsti saṃśayaḥ / svapne puram asad bhāti sargādau bhāti asaj jagat //MU_3,57.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4825: na cārtho bhavituṃ śaktas satyatve svapnacoditaḥ / saṃvido nityasatyatvaṃ svapnārthānām asatyatā //MU_3,57.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4826: jhagity eva yathākāśaṃ bhavati svapnaparvataḥ / krameṇa vā tathā bodhe khaṃ bhavaty ādhibhautikaḥ //MU_3,57.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4827: uḍḍīno 'yaṃ mṛto veti paśyanti nikaṭe sthitāḥ / jñānātivāhikībhūtasvasvabhāvahatā yataḥ //MU_3,57.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4828: mithyādṛṣṭaya evemās sṛṣṭayo mohadṛṣṭayaḥ / māyāmātradṛśo bhānti śūnyās svapnānubhūtayaḥ //MU_3,57.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4829: svapnānubhūtaya imā maraṇāntarbodhabhātetarabhramadṛśas sphuṭasargabhāsaḥ / bhānty ātivāhikaśarīragatās samastā mithyoditā mṛganadīmaraṇakrameṇa //MU_3,57.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4831: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etasminn antare jñaptir jīvaṃ vaidūrathaṃ puraḥ / saṅkalpena rurodhāśu manasas spandanaṃ yathā //MU_3,58.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4832: līlā: vada devi kiyat kālo gato 'yam iha mandire / samādhau mayi līnāyāṃ mahīpālaśave sthite //MU_3,58.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4833: jñaptiḥ: iha māsas tv atikrānta iha dāsyāv ime ubhe / rakṣārthaṃ vāsakagṛhe svapato vahite sthite //MU_3,58.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4834: śṛṇu dehasya kiṃ vṛttaṃ taveha varavarṇini / śarīraṃ kila pakṣeṇa cotklinnasnāyutāṃ gatam //MU_3,58.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4835: nirjīvaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau saṃśuṣkam iva pallavam / kāṣṭhakuḍyopasaṃjātaṃ śavaṃ tuhinaśītalam //MU_3,58.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4836: tato mantribhir āgatya mṛtaiveyam iti svayam / kledalokād vinirṇīya bhītyā niṣkālitaṃ gṛhāt //MU_3,58.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4837: bahunātra kim uktena nītvā candanadārubhiḥ / citau prakṣipya saghṛtaṃ sahasā bhasmasātkṛtam //MU_3,58.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4838: tato rājñī mṛte 'tyuccaiḥ kṛtvā rodanam ākulaḥ / parivāras tavāśeṣaḥ kṛtavān aurdhvadehikam //MU_3,58.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4839: idānīṃ tvām ihālokya saśarīrām ihāgatām / paralokād āgateti mahac citraṃ bhaviṣyati //MU_3,58.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4840: tvaṃ tu tenaiva dehena satyasaṅkalpatas sute / dṛśyase svavadātena tena cittaṃ tavopari //MU_3,58.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4841: yadvāsanā tvam abhavo dehaṃ prati tad eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:4842: rūpam abhyuditaṃ bāle tena prāksadṛśaṃ tava //MU_3,58.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4843: svavāsanānusāreṇa sarvas sarvaṃ hi paśyati / dṛṣṭānto 'trāvisaṃvādī bālavetāladarśanam //MU_3,58.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4844: ātivāhakadehāsi sampannā siddhasundarī / vismṛtas tava deho 'sau prāktano nayatas svayam //MU_3,58.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4845: dṛḍhātivāhikadṛśaḥ praśāmyaty ādhibhautikaḥ / buddhasya dṛśyamāno 'pi śaranmegha ivāmbare //MU_3,58.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4846: rūḍhātivāhikībhāvaś śavo bhavati dehakaḥ / nirjalāmbhodasadṛśo nirgandhakusumopamaḥ //MU_3,58.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4847: adyārabhya prarūḍhāyām ātivāhikasaṃvidi / deho vismṛtim āyāti garbhasaṃstheva yauvane //MU_3,58.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4848: ekatriṃśe 'dya divase prāptā vayam ihāmbaram / prabhāte mohite dāsyau mayaite nidrayādhunā //MU_3,58.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4849: tad ehi yāval līlāyai līle saṅkalpalīlayā / ātmānaṃ darśayāvo 'syai vyavahāraḥ pravartatām //MU_3,58.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4850: āvāṃ tāvad ime līlā paśyatv ity eva cintite / jñaptyā devyau tatas tatra dṛśye dīpte babhūvatuḥ //MU_3,58.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4851: sā vidūrathalīlātha samākulavilocanā / gṛham ālokayām āsa tat tejaḥpuñjabhāsuram //MU_3,58.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4852: candrabimbād ivotkīrṇaṃ dhautaṃ hemadravair iva / jvālāyā iva śītāyās sumadhyam iva bhittimat //MU_3,58.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4853: gṛham ālokya purato līlājñaptī vilokyate / utthāya sambhramavatī tayoḥ pādeṣu sāpatat //MU_3,58.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4854: majjayāyāgate devyau jayataṃ jīvitaprade / iha pūrvam ahaṃ prāptā bhavatyor mārgaśodhinī //MU_3,58.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4855: ity uktavatyāṃ tasyāṃ tā māninyo mattayauvanāḥ / upāviśan viṣṭareṣu latā meruśirassv iva //MU_3,58.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4856: jñaptiḥ: sute vada kathaṃ prāptā tvam imaṃ deśam āditaḥ / kiṃ vṛttaṃ te tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ kim ivādhvani kutra vā //MU_3,58.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4857: vidūrathalīlā: devi tasmin pradeśe sā jātamūrchā tadābhavam / dvitīyendukalevāhaṃ kalpāntajvālayāvṛtā //MU_3,58.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4858: na cetitaṃ mayā kiñcit samaṃ viṣamam eva vā / tatas taralapakṣmānte vinimīlya vilocane //MU_3,58.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4859: tato maraṇamūrchānte paśyāmi parameśvari / yāvad abhyutthitāsmy āśu plutā ca gaganodaram //MU_3,58.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4860: bhūtākāśe 'nilarathaṃ samārūḍhāsmy ahaṃ tathā / ānītā gandhalekheva tenāham imam ālayam //MU_3,58.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4861: iha paśyāmi sadanaṃ nāyakenābhyalaṅkṛtam / dīptadīpaṃ viviktaṃ ca mahārhaśayanānvitam //MU_3,58.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4862: patim ālokayāmīmaṃ yāvad eṣa vidūrathaḥ / śete kusumaguptāṅgo madhuḥ puṣpavane yathā //MU_3,58.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4863: atha saṅgrāmasaṃrambhaśramārto 'yaṃ svapity alam / iti nidrā mayāsyaivaṃ deveśvari na vāritā //MU_3,58.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4864: anantaram imaṃ deśaṃ prāpte devyāv ime tv iti / yathānubhūtaṃ kathitaṃ madanugrahakāriṇi //MU_3,58.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4865: jñaptiḥ: he haṃsahārigāminyau līle lalitalocane / utthāpayāmo nṛpatiṃ śavatalpatalād imam //MU_3,58.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4866: sety uktvā mumuce jīvam āmodam iva padminī / sa samīralavākāras tannāsānikaṭaṃ yayau //MU_3,58.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4867: ghrāṇakośaṃ viveśāśu vaṃśarandhram ivānilaḥ / svavāsanāśatāny antar dadhad abdhir maṇīn iva //MU_3,58.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4868: antassthajīvaṃ vadanaṃ tasya tatkāntim āyayau / padmasyāvagrahe padmaṃ praviṣṭam iva vāriṇi //MU_3,58.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4869: kramād aṅgāni sarvāṇi sarasāni cakāśire / tasya puṣpākara iva latājālāni būbhṛtaḥ //MU_3,58.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4870: athābabhau kalāpūrṇas sa rākāyām ivoḍurāṭ / bhāsayan bhavanaṃ bhūri vadanendumarīcibhiḥ //MU_3,58.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4871: sphārayām āsa so 'ṅgāni rasavanti mṛdūni ca / kanakojjvalakāntīni pallavānīva mādhavaḥ //MU_3,58.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4872: unmīlayam āsa dṛśau vimalālokakāraṇe / hāriṇyau subhagābhoge candrārkau bhuvanaṃ yathā //MU_3,58.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4873: uttasthau prollasatkāyo vindhyādrir iva vṛddhimān / uvāca kas sthita iha prabhākapiśitālayaḥ //MU_3,58.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4874: līlādvayam athāsyāgre provācādiśyatām iti / sa dadarśa puro namraṃ līlādvayam avasthitam //MU_3,58.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4875: samādhāraṃ samākāraṃ samarūpaṃ samasthiti / samavākyaṃ samodyogaṃ samānandaṃ samodayam //MU_3,58.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4876: kā tvaṃ keyaṃ kutaś ceyam ity āha sa vilokayan / tasmai līlāha he deva śrūyatāṃ yad vadāmy aham //MU_3,58.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4877: mahilā tava līlāhaṃ prāktanī saha vardhitā / vāg arthasyeva saṃsaktā sthitā saṃśleṣaśālinī //MU_3,58.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4878: iyaṃ līlā dvitīyā te mahilā helayā mayā / upārjitā tvadarthena kathayiṣye 'ham īdṛśam //MU_3,58.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4879: śirobhāgopaviṣṭeyaṃ yeha hemamahāsanā / eṣā sarasvatī devī trailokyajananī śivā //MU_3,58.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4880: asmākaṃ puṇyasaṃbhārair iha sākṣād upāgatā / anayāsi parāl lokād ihānīto mahīpatiḥ //MU_3,58.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4881: ity ākarṇya samutthāya rājā rājīvalocanaḥ / lambamālyāmbaradharaḥ papāta jñaptipādayoḥ //MU_3,58.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4882: sarasvati namas tubhyaṃ sarvalokahitaprade / prayaccha varade medhāṃ dīrgham āyur dhanāni ca //MU_3,58.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4883: ity uktavantaṃ hastena pasparśa jñaptidevatā / tvaṃ putrābhimatārthāḍhyo bhaveti vacanānvitaḥ //MU_3,58.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4884_0: sarasvatī: sarvāpadas sakaladuṣkṛtadṛṣṭayaś ca gacchantu vaś śamam anantasukhāni samyak / āyāntu nityamuditā janatā bhavantu
GSP27moksop_u:4884_1: rāṣṭre sthirāś ca vilasantu sadaiva lakṣmyaḥ //MU_3,58.53 //
GSP27moksop_u:4887: vasiṣṭhaḥ: sarasvatī tadetyuktvā tatraivāntardhim āyayau / prabhāte paṅkajais sārdhaṃ bubudhe sakalo janaḥ //MU_3,59.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4888: āliliṅga ghanaṃ līlāṃ līlā ca dayitaṃ kramāt / punaḥ punar mahānando mṛtaprojjīvito nṛpaḥ //MU_3,59.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4894: vikīrṇapāṭitakṣaumaṃ mantrisāmantanāgaraiḥ / sthalapadmamayaṃ vyoma raktais tāṇḍavinīkaraiḥ //MU_3,59.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4897: paralokād upānīto rājñātmā patir eva ca / ity evaṃ vṛttagāthābhir jagur deśāntare janāḥ //MU_3,59.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4898: padmo bhūmipatiś śrutvā vṛttāntakathanaṃ manāk / cakre snānaṃ samānītaiś catussāgaravāribhiḥ //MU_3,59.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4899: tato 'bhiṣiṣicur viprā mantriṇo bhūbhujaś śatam / labdhodayam ananteham amarendram ivāmarāḥ //MU_3,59.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4900: līlā līlā ca rājātha jīvanmuktā mahādhiyaḥ / remire pūrvavṛttāntakathanais suratair iva //MU_3,59.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4901: sarasvatyāḥ prasādena svapauruṣakṛtena tat / prāptaṃ lokadvayaṃ śreyaḥ padmeneti mahībhujā //MU_3,59.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4902: prajñaptijñānasaṃbuddho rājā līlādvayānvitaḥ / cakre varṣāyutāny aṣṭau tatra rājyam aninditam //MU_3,59.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4903: jīvanmukto jitamanā jitapañcendriyabhramaḥ / asaṃsaktamanā maunī yathāprāptānuvṛttimān //MU_3,59.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4904: tasya lāvaṇyajaladher bindur indur ivoddhṛtaḥ / tasya pratāpakalpāgner bhānuḥ kaṇa ivotthitaḥ //MU_3,59.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4905: jīvanmuktās ta ity evaṃ rājyaṃ varṣāyutāṣṭakam / kṛtvā videhamuktatvam āsedus siddhasaṃvidaḥ //MU_3,59.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4906: yad udayi viśadaṃ vidagdhamugdhaṃ samuditam ātmahitaṃ ca peśalaṃ ca / tad akhilajanatoṣadaṃ svarājyaṃ ciram anupālya sudampatī vimuktau //MU_3,59.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4909: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etat te kathitaṃ rāma dṛśyadoṣanivṛttaye / līlopākhyānam anagha ghanatāṃ jagatas tyaja //MU_3,60.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4910: śāntaiva dṛśyasattāsyāś śamanaṃ nopayujyate / sato hi mārjanaṃ kleśo nāsatas tu kadācana //MU_3,60.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4911: jñānenākāśarūpeṇa dṛśyaṃ jñeyaṃ kharūpakam / ity ekībhūtam ālokya jñas tiṣṭhaty ambaropamaḥ //MU_3,60.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4912: pṛthvyādirahitenedaṃ cidbhāsaiva svayambhuvā / sādhitaṃ yad asiddhena tan na dvyātma na sādhitam //MU_3,60.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4913: saṃvid yathā yā yatate sā tathā bāhyalekhikā / visṛtā sṛṣṭicinnadyāṃ yāvad yatnān na bodhitā //MU_3,60.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4914: cidākāśāvabhāso 'yaṃ jagad ity eva budhyate / cidvyomnaivātmani svacche paramāṇukaṇaṃ prati //MU_3,60.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4915: evam asyā mudhābhrānteḥ kā sattā keva vāsanā / kāsthā kā niyatiḥ kehā kāvaśyambhāvitocyatām //MU_3,60.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4916: sarvaṃ caitad yathādṛṣṭaṃ sthitam ittham akhaṇḍitam / māyaivaivam ananteyaṃ na ca māyāsti kācana //MU_3,60.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4917: rāmaḥ: aho nu paramā dṛṣṭir darśitā bhagavaṃs tvayā / dāvārcirdṛśyakakṣyāṇāṃ dāhaśāntau kalaindavī //MU_3,60.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4918: aho nu sucireṇaitaj jñātaṃ jñātavyam akṣatam / mayā yathedaṃ yac cedaṃ yādṛk cedaṃ yato yadā //MU_3,60.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4919: śāmyāmīva dvijaśreṣṭha nirvāmīvāvikalpanaḥ / etad āścaryam ākhyānaṃ vyākhyānaṃ śāstradṛṣṭiṣu //MU_3,60.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4920: idaṃ me bhagavan brūhi saṃśayaṃ sarvakovida / tava pātuṃ na tṛpto 'smi śrotrapātrair vaco'mṛtam //MU_3,60.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4921: sa sargatritaye kālo līlābhartur hi yogataḥ / sa kvacit kim ahorātraḥ kvacit kiṃ māsamātrakaḥ //MU_3,60.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4922: kvacit kiṃ bahuvarṣāṇi kasyacit kiṃ supelavaḥ / kasyacit kiṃ mahādīrghaḥ kasyacit kiṃ kṣaṇasthitaḥ //MU_3,60.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4923: iti me bhagavan brūhi tvaṃ yathāvad anugrahāt / sakṛc chrutaṃ na viśrāntim eti loṣṭe yathā jalam //MU_3,60.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4924: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yena yena yadā yad yad yathā saṃvedyate 'nagha / tena tena tadā tat tat tathā samanubhūyate //MU_3,60.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4925: amṛtatvaṃ viṣaṃ yāti sadaivāmṛtavedanāt / śatrur mitratvam āyāti mitrasaṃvittivedanāt //MU_3,60.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4926: yathābhāvitam eteṣāṃ padārthānāṃ nijaṃ vapuḥ / tad eva hi cirābhyāsān niyater vaśam āgatam //MU_3,60.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4927: kacanaikātmikaiṣā cid yathā kacati yādṛśam / tathā tatrāśu bhavati tat svabhāvaikakāraṇāt //MU_3,60.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4928: nimeṣe yadi kalpaughaṃ pravidan parivindate / nimeṣa eva tat kalpībhavaty atra na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,60.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4929: kalpe yadi nimeṣatvaṃ vetti kalpo 'py asau tataḥ / nimeṣībhavati kṣipraṃ tādṛgrūpātmikā hi cit //MU_3,60.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4930: duḥkhitasya niśā kalpas sukhinas saiva ca kṣaṇaḥ / kṣaṇas svapne bhavet kalpaḥ kalpaś ca bhavati kṣaṇaḥ //MU_3,60.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4931: tathā ca mṛtvā jāto 'haṃ taruṇo 'ham avasthitaḥ / yāto 'smi yojanaśataṃ svapna ity anubhūyate //MU_3,60.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4932: rātriṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi hariścandro 'nubhūtavān / lavaṇo bhuktavān āyur ekarātryāṃ samāś śatam //MU_3,60.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4933: yo nimeṣaḥ prajeśasya sa manor jīvitaṃ muneḥ / jīvitaṃ yad viriñcasya tad dinaṃ kila cakriṇaḥ //MU_3,60.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4934: dhyāne prakṣīṇacittasya na dināni na rātrayaḥ / na padārthā na ca jagat satyaṃ nātmāpi yoginaḥ //MU_3,60.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4935: madhuraṃ kaṭutām eti kaṭubhāvena cintitam / kaṭv apy āyāti mādhuryaṃ madhuratvena cetitam //MU_3,60.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4936: mitrabuddhyā dviṣan mitraṃ ripubuddhyā ripus suhṛt / bhavatīti mahābāho yathāsaṃvedanaṃ jagat //MU_3,60.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4937: anabhyastāḥ padārthā ye śāstrapāṭhajapādayaḥ / eṣāṃ saṃvedanābhyāsān nūnam abhyeti sātmatā //MU_3,60.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4938: naur yāyināṃ bhramārtānāṃ vedanāt tu vivartate / avedanād bhramārtānām api naiṣā vivartate //MU_3,60.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4939: śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti vedanāt svapnadṛkṣv iva / vedanāt pītam ānīlaṃ śuklaṃ vāpy anubhūyate //MU_3,60.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4940: āpadvad utsavaḥ khedaṃ karoti parimohinaḥ / kuḍye 'pi kha ivācāro dṛṣṭo dhātuvikāriṇaḥ //MU_3,60.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4941: asadyakṣo vimūḍhānāṃ prāṇān apy apakarṣati / vedanāt svapnavanitā jāgratīva ratipradā //MU_3,60.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4942: yad yathābhyāsam āyātaṃ tat tathā sthiratāṃ gatam / asad eva nabhasy eva nabha eva cidātmani //MU_3,60.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4943: śatahastakhuracchāyānaṭavṛttam ivātatam / gagane mānasaṃ spandaṃ jagad viddhi na vastu tat //MU_3,60.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4944: mithyājñānapiśācasya sandarśanam anākṛti / kāyāmātrakam evedam arodhakam abhittimat //MU_3,60.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4945: idaṃ bhāsvaram ābhāsaṃ svapnasandarśanaṃ citaḥ / apūrvam eva suptāyā narasyevoditaṃ viduḥ //MU_3,60.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4946: akhātāś cetati stambho yādṛśaṃ sālabhañjikāḥ / paramārthamahāstambhas sṛṣṭīś cetati tādṛśam //MU_3,60.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4947: yādṛśo mānavaḥ pārśve svapne kṣubdho mahābhaṭaiḥ / tādṛśo brahmaṇas sargo buddha eva suṣuptavat //MU_3,60.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4948: tṛṇagulmalatāyuktaś śiśirānte yathā rasaḥ / vāsantas saṃsthito bhūmau tathā sargaḥ pare pade //MU_3,60.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4949: yathā dravatvaṃ kanake sthitam antar anunmiṣat / tathā sthitaḥ pare sargaḥ khātmā valgann aṇāv aṇau //MU_3,60.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4950: sanniveśo yathāṅgānām aṅgino 'nanyad ātmanaḥ / jagad evam anaṅgasya khātmanaḥ khātma brahmaṇaḥ //MU_3,60.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4951: yādṛg ekanarasvapnayuddham anyanaraṃ prati / tādṛśaṃ sadasadrūpaṃ khātmedaṃ vyomagaṃ jagat //MU_3,60.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4952: mahākalpāntasargādau citsvabhāva idaṃ vapuḥ / kāraṇatvaṃ mithaḥ paścād asad vetti na vāstavam //MU_3,60.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4953: mukte 'smin brahmaṇi yadi brahmānyas smṛtijo bhavet / tatsmṛtir jñaptije sarge sthiteva jñaptimātrataḥ //MU_3,60.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4954: rāmaḥ: paurāṇāṃ mantrimukhyānāṃ vidūrathakulakramaḥ / samam eva kathaṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ pratibhāsitaḥ //MU_3,60.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4955: vasiṣṭhaḥ: citas samanuvartante mukhyāyās sarvasaṃvidaḥ / yathā vipulavātyāyās sāmānyā vātalekhikāḥ //MU_3,60.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4956: parasparānubhāvena tathārūpeṇa saṃvidaḥ / kacitās tāḥ prajāpālaprajāvāstavyamantriṇām //MU_3,60.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4957: evaṃrūpāt kulāj jāto rājāsmākam ayaṃ tv asau / kacitā iti vāstavyavido vaidūrathe pure //MU_3,60.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4958: kacane citsvabhāvasya na ca kāraṇamārgaṇam / yuktaṃ mahāmaṇer bhāsām ivānyat svasvabhāvataḥ //MU_3,60.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4959: aham eva kulācāro rājāsyā bhuva ity api / vidūrathavido ratnād uditā pratibhāprabhā //MU_3,60.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4960: yāvanto jantavo yasmin ye ye sarge yadā yadā / te sarvagatvāc ciddhātor anyo'nyādarśatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_3,60.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4961: tīvravegavatī yā syāt tatra saṃvid akalpitā / saivāyāti paraṃ sthairyaṃ sāmokṣatvaikarūpiṇī //MU_3,60.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4962: balavadvidvilāsānām anuvṛttyā parasparam / svabhāvāḥ pratibimbanti cidādarśasvabhāvataḥ //MU_3,60.54//
GSP27moksop_u:4963: tatrātiyatnā jayati sānyās saṃvida ātmasāt / kurvatī sarid ambhodhigāminīs sarito yathā //MU_3,60.55//
GSP27moksop_u:4964: ye samās tv atra te tāvad yatante citsvabhāvataḥ / yāvad eko jayet tatra dvitīyas sannimajjati //MU_3,60.56//
GSP27moksop_u:4965: jāyamāneṣu naśyatsu vartamāneṣu bhūriśaḥ / evaṃ sargasahasreṣu paramāṇukaṇaṃ prati //MU_3,60.57//
GSP27moksop_u:4966: na kiñcit kenacid vyāptaṃ na ca kiñcit kvacit sthitam / cidākāśam ajaṃ śāntam etat sarvam abhittimat //MU_3,60.58//
GSP27moksop_u:4967: ayam ābhāsate svapno nirnidro draṣṭṛvarjitaḥ / avaśyambhāvabodhaś ca so 'nubhūto 'py asanmayaḥ //MU_3,60.59//
GSP27moksop_u:4968: puṣpapattraphalāṃśātmā yathaikas svāsthito drumaḥ / anantasarvaśaktyātmā caika eva tathā vibhuḥ //MU_3,60.60//
GSP27moksop_u:4969: mātṛmeyapramāṇādimayātmakam ajaṃ padam / buddhaṃ vismṛtim āyāti na kadācana kasyacit //MU_3,60.61//
GSP27moksop_u:4970: śūnyodayāstamayavastu tamaḥprakāśadikkālarūpy api sad ekam anādiśuddham / ādyantamadhyarahitaṃ sthitam accham ambusomyatvavīcivalanāḍhyam ivaikam eva //MU_3,60.62//
GSP27moksop_u:4971: ahaṃ tvam ityādi jagatsvarūpā viśuddhabodhaikavibhā vibhāti / ākāśakośe nijaśūnyataiva dvaitaikyasaṅkalpavikalpanāḥ kva //MU_3,60.63//
GSP27moksop_u:4974: rāmaḥ: ahaṃ jagad iti bhrāntiḥ parasmāt kāraṇaṃ vinā / yathodeti tathā brahman bhūyaḥ kāthaya sādhu me //MU_3,61.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4975: vasiṣṭhaḥ: samastās samam evāntas saṃvido vindate yataḥ / sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvātmaikam ajas tataḥ //MU_3,61.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4976: sarvādiśabdārthakalā brahmaivaitāḥ pṛthaṅ na tu / sarvārthaśabdādikalārūpam āsāṃ na vidyate //MU_3,61.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4977: kaṭakatvaṃ pṛthag ghemnas taraṅgatvaṃ pṛthag jalāt / yathā na sambhavaty evaṃ na jagat pṛthag īśvarāt //MU_3,61.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4978: īśa eva jagadrūpaṃ jagadrūpaṃ tu neśvaraḥ / hemaiva kaṭakāditvaṃ kaṭakatvaṃ tu hema no //MU_3,61.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4979: yathāvayavino rūpam anekāvayavātmakam / tathānavayavāyās tu cittvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ citaḥ //MU_3,61.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4980: yat tulyakālam akhilaṃ tanmātrāvedanaṃ pare / antassthaṃ tad idaṃ bhāti jagad ity aham ity api //MU_3,61.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4981: lekhaughānāṃ yathā bhedī sanniveśaś śilodare / tathānanyaj jagad ahaṃ cety antaś cidghane ghanam //MU_3,61.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4982: sthitās taraṅgās salile yathāntarataraṅgite / sṛṣṭiśabdārtharahitās tathāntas sṛṣṭayaḥ pare //MU_3,61.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4983: nāsargaṃ tiṣṭhati paraṃ sargas tiṣṭhati nāparaḥ / avayavāvayavivat sattānavayavaitayoḥ //MU_3,61.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4984: cidrūpeṇa khasaṃvittyā khatanmātraṃ vibhāvyate / svam eva rūpaṃ hṛdayaṃ vātena spandanaṃ yathā //MU_3,61.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4985: tatkālam eṣa śabdāṇuś ciccamatkārarūpadhṛt / cetyate śaminaivāntas saṅkalpa iva cetasā //MU_3,61.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4986: tadaivānilatāṃ vetti nijasattātmikāṃ svayam / antargataspandarasāṃ pavanas spandatām iva //MU_3,61.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4987: tadaivābhāsatām eti nijasattātmikāṃ svayam / kośasthitālokalavāṃ tejaḥ prakaṭatām iva //MU_3,61.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4988: tadaivāptāṃ cetayate nijasattātmikām ajaḥ / hṛtsaṃstharasatanmātrāṃ salilaṃ dravatām iva //MU_3,61.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4989: tadaivāvanitāṃ vetti svacittaikātmikām ajaḥ / antassthagandhatanmātrām urvī sthairyakalām iva //MU_3,61.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4990: tulyakālanimeṣāṃśalakṣabhāgaṃ pratītayaḥ / nityaṃ citaḥ prakacanaṃ tat sargaughaparamparāḥ //MU_3,61.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4991: evaṃ sakṛt svabhāvāntar dṛśyamadhyam anāmayam / udayāstamayonmuktaṃ brahma tiṣṭhaty aniṣṭhitam //MU_3,61.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4992: buddhaṃ sad apasargaṃ tat sasargam api tat samam / abuddhaṃ sargarūpātma visargam api tat sadā //MU_3,61.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4993: cidbrahma yad yathā yena vindate svatvam ātmani / tat tat tathānubhavati sarvaṃ tat sarvaśaktimat //MU_3,61.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4994: tat satyaṃ vidvilāsatvān nityānubhavarūpataḥ / tad asatyaṃ manaṣṣaṣṭhaṃ sarvākhyātigataṃ yataḥ //MU_3,61.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4995: yathā tat saraṇaṃ vāyau tathā sargas sthitaḥ pare / asatkalpe tv asatkalpas satye 'satya ivāpi ca //MU_3,61.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4996: anyarūpā yathānanyā tejasy ālokatodare / tathā brahmaṇi viśvaśrīs satyāsatyātmikātmani //MU_3,61.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4997: anutkīrṇā yathā paṅke putrikā vātha dāruṇi / varṇā yathā maṣīkalke tathā sargās sthitāḥ pare //MU_3,61.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4999: brahmaṇā cinmayenātmāsargātmaiva vibhāvyate / na bhāvyate cānanyatvād bījenāntar iva drumaḥ //MU_3,61.26//
GSP27moksop_u:5000: yathā kṣīrasya mādhuryaṃ tīkṣṇatvaṃ maricasya ca / dravatvaṃ payasaś caiva spando 'ntaḥ pavanasya ca //MU_3,61.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5001: sthito 'nanyo 'py athānyas san na sthitaś ca tathātmani / sargo 'nargalacidrūpaḥ paramātmātmarūpadhṛt //MU_3,61.28//
GSP27moksop_u:5002: kacanaṃ brahmaratnasya jagad ity eva yat sthitam / tad akāraṇakaṃ tasmāt tena na vyatiricyate //MU_3,61.29//
GSP27moksop_u:5003: vāsanācittajīvādivedanaṃ vedanoditam / nodety avedanād eva yan nānātmaiva pauruṣam //MU_3,61.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5004: nāstam eti na codeti kvacit kiñcit kadācana / sarvaṃ śāntam ajaṃ brahma cidghanaṃ suśilāghaṇam //MU_3,61.31//
GSP27moksop_u:5005: parāṇuṃ prati sargaughāś cittvād bhānti sahasraśaḥ / teṣv anye 'ṇāv aṇāv antaḥ kaivātra gaṇanā katham //MU_3,61.32//
GSP27moksop_u:5006: yathā jalāntar ūrmyādyā guptāguptās svaśaktayaḥ / jāgratsvapnasuṣuptādyās tathā jīve 'ntar āsthitāḥ //MU_3,61.33//
GSP27moksop_u:5007: jātā ced aratir bhogān prati manāg api / tadāsau tāvataivoccaiḥ padaṃ prāpta iti śrutiḥ //MU_3,61.34//
GSP27moksop_u:5008: yato yato viyujyate tatas tato vimucyate / ato 'ham ity asaṃvidaḥ ka eti janmasaṃvidam //MU_3,61.35//
GSP27moksop_u:5009: citaṃ parāparām ajām arūpikām anāmikām / carācarādharāmayīṃ vidanti ye jayanti te //MU_3,61.36//
GSP27moksop_u:5010: pare cid asty aprakaṭādvitīyā svāvartalekheva jaladrave 'ntaḥ / sā hanta yena trijaganti dhatte na santi nāsanti parātmakāni //MU_3,61.37//
GSP27moksop_u:5011: ahammayī padmajabhāvanā cit saṅkalpabhedāt pratanoti viśvam / antar mudhaivānubhavaty anantaṃ nimeṣakoṭyaṃśavidhau yugāntam //MU_3,61.38//
GSP27moksop_u:5014: vasiṣṭhaḥ: paramāṇunimeṣāṇāṃ lakṣāṃśakalanāsv api / jagatkalpasahasrāṇi satyānīva vibhānty alam //MU_3,62.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5015: teṣv apy antas tathaivāntaḥ paramāṇukaṇaṃ prati / bhrāntir evam anantāho iyam ity avabhāsate //MU_3,62.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5016: vahantīmāḥ parā sattā śāntās sargaparamparāḥ / saliladravatevāntar asphuṭāvartavartikāḥ //MU_3,62.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5017: mithyātmikaiva sargaśrīr vahatīha mahāmarau / tīradrumalatonmuktapuṣpāṇīva taraṅgiṇī //MU_3,62.4//
GSP27moksop_u:5018: svapnendrajālapuravat saṅkathehāpurādrivat / saṅkalpavad asatyaiva bhāti sargānubhūtibhūḥ //MU_3,62.5//
GSP27moksop_u:5019: rāmaḥ: aikātmyaikatayaivaṃ hi jāte samyagvicāraṇāt / nirvikalpātmani jñāne parijñānavatāṃ vara //MU_3,62.6//
GSP27moksop_u:5020: kimartham iha tiṣṭhanti dehās tattvavidām api / daiveneva samākrāntā daivam atra ca kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,62.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5021: vasiṣṭhaḥ: astīha niyatir brāhmī cicchaktisparśarūpiṇī / avaśyambhavitavyaikasattā sakalakalpagā //MU_3,62.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5022: ādisarge hi niyatir bhāvavaicitryam akṣayam / anenetthaṃ sadā bhāvyam iti sampadyate param //MU_3,62.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5023: mahāsatteti kathitā mahācitir iti smṛtā / mahāśaktir iti khyātā mahādṛṣṭir iti sthitā //MU_3,62.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5024: mahākriyeti gaditā mahodbhava iti śrutā / mahāspanda iti prauḍhā mahātmaikatayoditā //MU_3,62.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5025: tṛṇānīti jagantīti daityā iti surā iti / iti nāgā iti nagā ity ākalpam iti sthitiḥ //MU_3,62.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5026: kadācid brahmasattāyā vyabhicāro 'numīyate / citram ākāśakośe vā nānyathā niyates sthitiḥ //MU_3,62.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5027: viriñcādyātmabhir buddhair bodhāyāviditātmanām / bṛṃhaṇāt saiva niyatis sargo 'yam iti kathyate //MU_3,62.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5028: acalaṃ calavad dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇy āryavyavasthitam / anādimadhyaparyantaṃ śāstro vṛkṣa ivāmbaram //MU_3,62.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5029: pāṣāṇodaralekhaughanyāyenātmani tiṣṭhatā / brahmaṇā niyatis sargo buddho bodhayateva kham //MU_3,62.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5030: dehe yathāṅgināṅgādi spṛśyate citsvabhāvataḥ / brahmaṇā padmajatvena niyatyādyaṅgakaṃ tathā //MU_3,62.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5031: eṣā daivam iti proktā sarvaṃ sakalakālagam / padārtham alam ākramya śuddhā cid iti saṃsthitā //MU_3,62.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5032: spanditavyaṃ padārthena bhāvyaṃ vā bhoktṛtāpadam / anenettham anenettham avaśyam iti daivadhīḥ //MU_3,62.19//
GSP27moksop_u:5033: eṣaiva puruṣaspandatṛṇagulmādi cākhilam / eṣaiva sarvabhūtādi jagatkālakriyādi ca //MU_3,62.20//
GSP27moksop_u:5034: anayā pauruṣī sattā sattāsyāḥ pauruṣeṇa ca / lakṣyete bhavanaṃ yāte dve ekātmatayeti hi //MU_3,62.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5035: nareṇa pauruṣeṇaiva kārye sattātmike ubhe / īdṛśy eva hi niyatir evaṃ niyatipauruṣam //MU_3,62.22//
GSP27moksop_u:5036: praṣṭavyo 'haṃ tvayā rāma daivapauruṣanirṇayam / maduktaṃ pauruṣaṃ pālyaṃ tvayeti niyatis sthitā //MU_3,62.23//
GSP27moksop_u:5037: bhojayiṣyati māṃ daivam iti daivaparāyaṇaḥ / yat tiṣṭhaty akriyo maunaṃ niyater eṣa niścayaḥ //MU_3,62.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5038: pauruṣeṇa samāhṛtya bhogān bhuṅkte naraś ca yat / rājyādīn mokṣaparyantān niyater eṣa niścayaḥ //MU_3,62.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5039: muktir bhavati saṃsārān na kalpanicayair api / bhramatāṃ yac charīraughair niyater eṣa niścayaḥ //MU_3,62.26//
GSP27moksop_u:5040: nāsyā buddhir na karmāṇi na vikārādi nākṛtiḥ / kevalaṃ tv ittham ākalpaṃ sthityā bhāvyam iti sthitam //MU_3,62.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5041: avaśyaṃ bhavitā hy evam idam ittham iti sthitiḥ / na śakyate laṅghayitum api rudrādibuddhibhiḥ //MU_3,62.28//
GSP27moksop_u:5042: pauruṣam na parityājyam enām āśritya dhīmatā / pauruṣeṇaiva rūpeṇa niyatir hi niyāmikā //MU_3,62.29//
GSP27moksop_u:5043: apauruṣaṃ hi niyatiḥ pauruṣaṃ saiva sargagā / niṣphalāpauruṣākārā saphalā pauruṣātmikā //MU_3,62.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5044: niyatyā mūkatāhetuniṣpauruṣatayākriyaḥ / yas tiṣṭhati prāṇamarutspandas tasya kva gacchati //MU_3,62.31//
GSP27moksop_u:5045: atha prāṇakriyārodham api kṛtvā virāmadam / yadi tiṣṭhati tat sādhur mukta eva kim ucyate //MU_3,62.32//
GSP27moksop_u:5046: pauruṣaikātmatā śreyo mokṣo 'tyantam akarmatā / ābhyāṃ tu śabalaḥ pakṣo duḥkhāyaiva mahātmanām //MU_3,62.33//
GSP27moksop_u:5047: niyatir brahmatattvābhā tasyāṃ cet pariṇamyate / nūnaṃ paramaśuddhāyāṃ tat prāptaiva parā gatiḥ //MU_3,62.34//
GSP27moksop_u:5048: etair niyatyādimahāvilāsair brahmaiva visphūrjati sarvagātma / tṛṇādivallītarugulmajālais satteva toyasya dharāntarasthā //MU_3,62.35//
GSP27moksop_u:5051_0: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etad brahmatattvaṃ sarvathā sarvadaiva sarvata eva sarvaśakti sarvākāraṃ sarveśvaraṃ sarvagaṃ sarvam eveti / eṣa
GSP27moksop_u:5051_1: tv ātmā sarvaśaktitvād anantaśaktitvāc ca kvacic cicchaktiṃ prakaṭayati kvacij jaḍaśaktiṃ kvacid ullāsaṃ kvacic chāntiṃ kvacit
GSP27moksop_u:5051_2: kiñcit kvacin nakiñcit prakaṭayati / yatra yadā yad evāsau yathā bhāvayati tatra tadā tad evāsau tathā paśyati / (MU_3,63.1)
GSP27moksop_u:5052: sarvaśakter hi yā yaiva yathodeti tathaiva sā / tadā svaśaktir nānābhārūpiṇī sā svabhāvataḥ //MU_3,63.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5053_0: imāś śaktayo 'yam ātmety evaṃ vikalpajālaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ dhīmadbhiḥ parikalpitaṃ loke na tv ātmani vidyate bhedaḥ / yathormitaraṅgaiḥ
GSP27moksop_u:5053_1: payasāṃ kaṭakāṅgadakeyūrair vā hemnaḥ avayavāvayavinos saṃvit kālpanikī dvidhā na vāstavī / yathā yac cetyate tathaiva tan
GSP27moksop_u:5053_2: na bāhyato nāntarataś cetanaṃ samudeti hi / sarvātmatvāt svam ābhāsaṃ kvacit kiñcit prapaśyati sarvākāramayaṃ brahmaivedaṃ
GSP27moksop_u:5053_3: tatra mithyājñānavadbhiś śaktiśaktimatte avayavāvayavirūpe kalpite na pāramārthike sad vā bhavatv asad vā cid yat saṅkalpayaty
GSP27moksop_u:5053_4: abhiniviṣṭā tat tatpaśyati sakalaṃ tat tat sadvastuvad bhāti / (MU_3,63.3)
GSP27moksop_u:5056: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yo 'yaṃ sarvagato devaḥ paramātmā maheśvaraḥ / svacchas svānubhavānandarūpo 'ntādivivarjitaḥ //MU_3,64.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5057: etasmāt paramānandāc chuddhacinmātrarūpiṇaḥ / jīvas sañjāyate pūrvaṃ sa cittaṃ tat tato jagat //MU_3,64.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5058: rāmaḥ: svānubhūtipramāṇe 'smin brahman brahmaṇi bṛṃhite / kathaṃ sattām avāpnoti jīvako dvaitavarjite //MU_3,64.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5059: vasiṣṭhaḥ: asadābhāsam adhyātma brahmāstīha prabṛṃhitam / bṛṃhaccidbhairavavapur ānandābhidham avyayam //MU_3,64.4//
GSP27moksop_u:5060: tasya yat samam āpūrṇaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvam acihnitam / tadvidām apy anirdeśyaṃ tac chāntaṃ paramaṃ padam //MU_3,64.5//
GSP27moksop_u:5061: tasyaivodyan mahāśānti yat sattvaṃ saṃvidātmakam / svabhāvāt spandanaṃ tat taj jīvaśabdena kathyate //MU_3,64.6//
GSP27moksop_u:5062: tatremāḥ paramādarśe cidvyomny anubhavātmikāḥ / asatyāḥ pratibimbanti jagajjālaparamparāḥ //MU_3,64.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5063: brahmaṇas sphuraṇaṃ kiñcid yad avātāmbudher iva / dīpasya vāpy avātasya taj jīvaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_3,64.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5064: śāntatvāpagame 'cchasya manāksaṃvedanātmakam / svābhāvikaṃ yat sphuraṇaṃ cidvyomnas so 'ṅga jīvakaḥ //MU_3,64.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5065: yathā vātasya calanaṃ kṛśāṇor uṣṇatā yathā / śītatā vā tuṣārasya tathā jīvatvam ātmanaḥ //MU_3,64.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5066: cidrūpasyātmatattvasya svabhāvavaśatas svayam / manāksaṃvedanaṃ pūrvaṃ yat taj jīva iti smṛtaḥ //MU_3,64.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5067: tad eva ghanasaṃvitti yāty ahantām anukramāt / vahnyaṇus svendhanādhikyāt svāṃ prakāśakatām iva //MU_3,64.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5068: yathāsya tārakāsarge vyomnas sphurati nīlimā / śūnyasyāpy asya jīvasya tathāhambhāvabhāvanā //MU_3,64.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5069: jīvo 'haṅkṛtim ādatte saṅkalpakalayeddhayā / svayaiva vā ghanatayā nīlimānam ivāmbaram //MU_3,64.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5070: ahambhāvo hi dikkālavyavacchedāṅkitākṛtiḥ / khasthas saṅkalpavaśato vātaspanda iva sphuran //MU_3,64.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5071: saṅkalponmukhatāṃ yātas tv ahaṅkārābhidhas sthitaḥ / cittaṃ jīvo mano māyā prakṛtiś ceti nāmabhiḥ //MU_3,64.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5072: tatsaṅkalpātmakaṃ ceto bhūtamātrātmakalpanam / kurvaṃs tattāṃ vrajaty eva saṅkalpād yāti pañcatām //MU_3,64.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5073: tanmātrapañcakākāraṃ cittaṃ tejaḥkaṇo bhavet / ajātajagati vyomni tārakā pelavā yathā //MU_3,64.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5074: tejaḥkaṇatvam ādatte cittaṃ tanmātrakalpanāt / śanais svasmāt parispandād bījam aṅkuratām iva //MU_3,64.19//
GSP27moksop_u:5075: asau tejaḥkaṇo 'ṇḍākhyāt kalpanāt kaścid aṇḍatām / prayāty antassphuradbrahmā jalam āpīḍatām iva //MU_3,64.20//
GSP27moksop_u:5076: kaścid drāgiti dehādikalpanād yāti dehatām / bhrāntyutthāṃ tadatadrūpāṃ gandharveccheva pūśśriyam //MU_3,64.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5077: kaścit sthāvaratām eti kaścij jaṅgamatām api / kaścid yāti khavāryādirūpaṃ saṅkalpatas svajāt //MU_3,64.22//
GSP27moksop_u:5078: sargādāv ādijo deho jīvasaṅkalpasambhavaḥ / krameṇa padam āsādya vairiñcaṃ kurute jagat //MU_3,64.23//
GSP27moksop_u:5079: ātmabhūḥ kalanātmābho yat saṅkalpayati kṣaṇāt / tat svabhāvavaśād eva jātam eva prapaśyati //MU_3,64.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5080: citsvabhāvāt svam āyātaṃ brahmatvaṃ sarvakāraṇam / saṃsṛtau kāraṇaṃ paścāt karma nirmāya saṃsthitam //MU_3,64.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5081: cittvaṃ svabhāvāt sphurati citaḥ phena ivāmbhasaḥ / karmabhir badhyate paścād diṇḍīram iva rajjubhiḥ //MU_3,64.26//
GSP27moksop_u:5082: saṅkalpaḥ karmaṇo bījaṃ tadātmaiva hi jīvakaḥ / karma paścāt tanoty uccair utthāyākarmakakramam //MU_3,64.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5083: kroḍīkṛtāṅkurāṃ pūrvaṃ bījaṃ dhatte svabījatām / paścān nānātvam āyāti pattrāṅkuraphalabhramaiḥ //MU_3,64.28//
GSP27moksop_u:5084: anye kha eva ye jīvā evam evākṛtiṃ gatāḥ / pūrvotpanne jagati te yānti bhūtāśritās sthitim //MU_3,64.29//
GSP27moksop_u:5085: svakarmabhis tato janmamṛtikāraṇatāṃ gataiḥ / prayānty ūrdhvam adhastād vā karma citspanda ucyate //MU_3,64.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5086: citspandanaṃ bhavati karma tad eva daivaṃ cittaṃ tad eva ca tad eva śubhāśubhādi / tasmād bhavanti bhuvanāni jaganti pūrvaṃ bhūtāni cāśu kusumāni taror ivādyāt //MU_3,64.31//
GSP27moksop_u:5089: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etasmāt kāraṇād evaṃ manaḥ prathamam utthitam / mananātmakam ābhogi tatstham eva sthitiṃ gatam //MU_3,65.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5090: bhāvābhāvarddhimaddolas tenāyam avalokyate / sargas sadasadābhāsaḥ pūr gandharvecchayā yathā //MU_3,65.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5091: na kaścid vidyate bhedo dvaitaikyakalanātmakaḥ / brahmajīvamanomāyākartṛkarmajagaddṛśām //MU_3,65.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5092: apāravānavistārasaṃvitsalilavalganaiḥ / cidekārṇava evāyaṃ svayam ātmā vijṛmbhate //MU_3,65.4//
GSP27moksop_u:5093: asatyam asthairyavaśāt satyaṃ svapratibhāsataḥ / yathā svapnas tathā citte jagat sadasadātmakam //MU_3,65.5//
GSP27moksop_u:5094: na san nāsann ayaṃ jātaś cetaso jāgato bhramaḥ / oṣadhīsamavāyānām indrajālam ivotthitam //MU_3,65.6//
GSP27moksop_u:5095: dīrghas svapnas sthitiṃ yātas saṃsārākhyo manovaśāt / asamyagdarśanāt sthāṇāv iva pumpratyayo mudhā //MU_3,65.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5096: anātmālokanāc cittaṃ cittatvenānuśocati / vetālakalpanād bāla iva saṅkalpite bhaye //MU_3,65.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5097: anākhyasya svarūpasya sarvāṃśātigatātmanaḥ / cetyonmukhatayā cittvaṃ cittvāj jīvatvakalpanam //MU_3,65.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5098: jīvatvād apy ahambhāvas tv ahambhāvāc ca cittatā / cittatvād indriyāditvaṃ tato dehādivibhramaḥ //MU_3,65.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5099: dehādimohatas svarganarakau mokṣabandhane / bījāṅkuravad ārambhas saṃrūḍho dehakarmaṇoḥ //MU_3,65.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5100: dvaitaṃ yathā nāsti cidātmatattvayos tathaiva bhedo 'sti na jīvacittayoḥ / yathaiva bhedo 'sti na jīvacittayos tathaiva bhedo 'sti na dehakarmaṇoḥ //MU_3,65.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5101: karmaiva deho nanu deha eva cittaṃ tad evāham itīva jīvaḥ / sa jīva eveśvaracit sa ātmā sarvaṃ śivāt tv ekapadottham etat //MU_3,65.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5104: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evam ekaṃ paraṃ vastu rāmānānātvam apy alam / nānātvam iva saṃyātaṃ dīpād dīpaśataṃ yathā //MU_3,66.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5105: yathābhūtam asadrūpam ātmānaṃ yadi paśyati / vicārya cetas tad ahambhāvahīnaṃ na śocati //MU_3,66.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5106: cittamātraṃ naras tasmin śānte śāntam idaṃ jagat / upānadrūḍhapādasya nanu carmāvṛtaiva bhūḥ //MU_3,66.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5107: pattramātrād ṛte nānyat kadalyā vidyate yathā / bhramamātrād ṛte nānyaj jagatāṃ vidyate tathā //MU_3,66.4//
GSP27moksop_u:5108: jāyate bālatām eti yauvanaṃ vārdhakaṃ tathā / mṛtiṃ svargaṃ ca narakaṃ bhramāc ceto hi nṛtyati //MU_3,66.5//
GSP27moksop_u:5109: vicitrabudbudollāse svātmano 'vyatirekiṇi / yathā surāyās sāmarthyaṃ tathā cittasya saṃsṛtau //MU_3,66.6//
GSP27moksop_u:5110: yathā dvitvaṃ śaśāṅkādau paśyaty akṣi malābilam / cic cetanakalākrāntā tathaiva paramātmani //MU_3,66.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5111: yathā madavaśād bhrāntān kṣīvaḥ paśyati pādapān / tathā cetanavikṣubdhā saṃsārāṃś cit prapaśyati //MU_3,66.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5112: yathā līlābhramād bālaḥ kumbhakṛccakravaj jagat / bhrāntaṃ paśyati cittvāt tu cid vai dṛśyaṃ tathaiva hi //MU_3,66.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5113: yadā cic cetati dvitvaṃ tadā dvaitaikyavibhramaḥ / yadā na cetati dvitvaṃ tadā dvaitaikyayoḥ kṣayaḥ //MU_3,66.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5114: yac cetyate tad itarad vyatiriktaṃ cito 'sti no / kiñcin nāstīti saṃśāntyā citaś śāmyati cetanam //MU_3,66.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5115: cidghanenaikatām etya yadā tiṣṭhasi niścalaḥ / śāmyan vyavaharan vāpi tadā saṃśānta ucyase //MU_3,66.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5116: tanvī cetayate cetyaṃ ghanā cin nāṅga cetati / alpakṣīvaḥ kṣobham eti ghanakṣīvo hi śāmyati //MU_3,66.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5117: cidghanaikyaṃ prayātasya rūḍhasya parame pade / nairātmyaśūnyavādādyaiḥ paryāyaiḥ kathanaṃ bhavet //MU_3,66.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5118: cic cetanena cetyatvam ity evaṃ paśyati bhramam / jāye jīvāmi naśyāmi saṃsarāmīty asanmayam //MU_3,66.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5119: svabhāvād vyatiriktaṃ tu na citaś cāsti cetanam / spandād ṛte yathā vāyāv ataḥ kiṃ kena cetyate //MU_3,66.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5120: cetye tv asambhavaty eva kiñcid yac cetyate citā / rajjos sarpabhramābhāsaṃ tad avidyābhramaṃ viduḥ //MU_3,66.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5121: saṃvinmātracikitsye 'smin vyādhau saṃsāranāmani / cittamātraparispande saṃrambho 'nagha kiṃ tava //MU_3,66.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5122: yadi sarvaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhasy utkrāntavāsanam / amunaiva nimeṣeṇa tan mukto 'si na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,66.19//
GSP27moksop_u:5123: yathā rajjvāṃ bhujaṅgāśā vināṅgacalanaṃ kṣaṇāt / saṃvinmātravivartena naśyaty evaṃ hi saṃsṛtiḥ //MU_3,66.20//
GSP27moksop_u:5124: yatrābhilāṣas tan nūnaṃ santyajya sthīyate yadi / prāpta evāṅga tan mokṣaḥ kim etāvati duṣkaram //MU_3,66.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5125: api prāṇāṃs tṛṇam iva tyajantīha mahāśayāḥ / yatrābhilāṣas tanmātratyāge kṛpaṇatā katham //MU_3,66.22//
GSP27moksop_u:5126: yatrābhilāṣas tat tyaktvā cetasā niravagraham / prāptaṃ karmendriyair gṛhṇaṃs tyajann iṣṭaṃ ca tiṣṭha bhoḥ //MU_3,66.23//
GSP27moksop_u:5127: yathā karatale bilvaṃ yathā vā parvataḥ puraḥ / pratyakṣam evam asyālam ajatvaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,66.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5128: ātmaiva bhāti jagad ity uditas taraṅgaiḥ kalpānta eka iva vāridhir aprameyaḥ / jñātas sa eva hi dadāti vimokṣasiddhim ajñāta eva manasā cirabandhanāya //MU_3,66.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5131: rāmaḥ: manastvayogyo jīvo 'yaṃ ko bhavet paramātmanaḥ / kathaṃ vāsmin samutpannaḥ ko vāyaṃ vada me punaḥ //MU_3,67.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5132: vasiṣṭhaḥ: samastaśaktikacitaṃ brahma sarveśvaraṃ sadā / yayaiva śaktyā sphurati prāptāṃ tām eva paśyati //MU_3,67.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5133: svayaṃ yāṃ vetti sarvātmā citiṃ cetanarūpiṇīm / sā proktā jīvaśabdena saiva saṅkalpakāriṇī //MU_3,67.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5134: svabhāvakāraṇaṃ dvitve pūrvaṃ saṅkalpya cit svayam / nānākāraṇatāṃ paścād yāti janmamṛtisthitau //MU_3,67.4//
