GSP27moksop_u:6488: tenaivātha krameṇāsau ruditvā samprahasya ca / aṅgair viśīrṇatām etya yayāv alam alakṣyatām //MU_3,98.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6489: vicārya niyateś śaktiṃ tato gantum upasthitaḥ / dṛṣṭavān aham ekānte punar anyaṃ tathā naram //MU_3,98.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6490: praharaṃs tadvad evāsau svayam eva palāyate / palāyamānaḥ patito mahaty andho 'ndhakūpake //MU_3,98.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6491: tatrāhaṃ suciraṃ kālam avasaṃ tatpratīkṣakaḥ / yāvat sa sucireṇāpi kūpād abhyutthitaś śaṭhaḥ //MU_3,98.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6492: athāham udyato gantuṃ dṛṣṭavān puruṣaṃ punaḥ / tādṛśaṃ tādṛśācāraṃ prayatantaṃ tathaiva ca //MU_3,98.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6493: avaṣṭabhya tathaivāśu tasya proktaṃ punar mayā / tathaivotpalapatrākṣa nāsau tad avabuddhavān //MU_3,98.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6494: kevalaṃ mām asau mūḍho naiva jānāmi kiñcana / āḥ pāpa durdvijety uktvā svavyāpārapāro yayau //MU_3,98.36//
GSP27moksop_u:6495: atha tasmin mahāraṇye tathā viharatā mayā / bahavas tādṛśā dṛṣṭāḥ puruṣā doṣakāriṇaḥ //MU_3,98.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6496: matpṛṣṭāḥ kecid āyānti svapnasambhramavac chamam / maduktaṃ nābhinandanti kecic chvavirutaṃ yathā //MU_3,98.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6497: vinipatyāndhakūpebhyaḥ kecin na protthitāḥ punaḥ / kadalīṣaṇḍakāt kecic cireṇāpi na nirgatāḥ //MU_3,98.39//
GSP27moksop_u:6498: kecid antarhitās sphāre karañjavanakuñjake / na kvacit sthitim āyānti kecid bhramaparāyaṇāḥ //MU_3,98.40//
GSP27moksop_u:6499: evaṃvidhā sā vitatā raghūdvaha mahāṭavī / adyāpi vidyate yasyām itthaṃ te puruṣās sthitāḥ //MU_3,98.41//
GSP27moksop_u:6500: sā ca dṛṣṭāṭavī rāma tvayeha vyavahāriṇā / bālyāt tu buddhitattvasya na tvaṃ smarasi rāghava //MU_3,98.42//
GSP27moksop_u:6501: sā bhīṣaṇā vividhasaṅkaṭasaṅkaṭāṅgī ghorāṭavī ghanatamogahanā ca lokaiḥ / āgatya nirvṛtim abuddhihatair na tajjñair āsevyate kusumagulmakavāṭikeva //MU_3,98.43//
GSP27moksop_u:6504: rāmaḥ: kāsau mahāṭavī brahman kadā dṛṣṭā kathaṃ mayā / ke ca te puruṣās tatra kiṃ tat kartuṃ kṛtodyamāḥ //MU_3,99.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6505: vasiṣṭhaḥ: raghunātha mahābāho śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te 'khilam / na sā mahāṭavī nāma dūre naiva ca te narāḥ //MU_3,99.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6506: yeyaṃ saṃsārapadavī gambhīrāsārakoṭarā / tāṃ tvaṃ śūnyāṃ vikārāḍhyāṃ viddhi rāma mahāṭavīm //MU_3,99.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6507: vicārālokalabhyena yadaikenaiva vastunā / pūrṇā nānyena saṃyuktā kevalaiva tadaiva sā //MU_3,99.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6508: tatra ye te mahākārāḥ puruṣāḥ prasaranti hi / manāṃsi tāni viddhi tvaṃ duḥkhe nipatitāny alam //MU_3,99.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6509: draṣṭā yo 'yam ahaṃ teṣāṃ saviveko mahāmate / vivekena mayā tāni dṛṣṭāny anyāni rāghava //MU_3,99.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6510: mayā tāny eva budhyante vivekena manāṃsi hi / satataṃ svaprakāśena kamalānīva bhānunā //MU_3,99.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6511: matprabodhaṃ samāsādya matprasādān mahāmate / manāṃsi kānicit tāni gatāny upaśamāt param //MU_3,99.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6512: kānicin nābhinandanti māṃ vivekaṃ vimohataḥ / mattiraskāravaśataḥ kūpeṣv eva patanty uta //MU_3,99.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6513: ye te 'ndhakūpā gahanā narakās te raghūdvaha / manāṃsi tāni teṣv antar nipatanty utpatanti ca //MU_3,99.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6514: yat tat karañjagahanaṃ tat kalatrarasaṃ viduḥ / duḥkhakaṇṭakasambādhaṃ mānuṣyaṃ trividhaiṣaṇam //MU_3,99.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6515: karañjagahanaṃ yāni praviṣṭāni manāṃsi tu / mānuṣye tāni jātāni tatraikarasikāni ca //MU_3,99.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6516: kadalīkānanaṃ yat tac chaśāṅkakaraśītalam / tan manohlādanakaraṃ svargaṃ viddhi raghūdvaha //MU_3,99.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6517: kadalīkānanaṃ yāni sampraviṣṭāni tāni tu / svargaikarasikāni tvaṃ manāṃsi jñātum arhasi //MU_3,99.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6518: praviṣṭāny andhakūpāntar nirgatāni na yāni tu / mahāpātakayuktāni tāni cittāni rāghava //MU_3,99.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6519: karañjavanayātāni nirgatāni na yāni tu / tāni mānuṣyajātāni cittāni raghunandana //MU_3,99.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6520: kānicit samprabuddhāni tatra muktāni bandhanāt / kānicid bahurūpāṇi yoner yoniṃ viśanti hi //MU_3,99.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6521: kānicit puṇyapūtena tapasā dāruṇātmanā / dhārayanti śarīrāṇi saṃsthitāny ucitāny ca //MU_3,99.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6522: yair ahaṃ pumbhir abudhair durdvijeti tiraskṛtaḥ / tair manobhir anātmajñais svavivekatiraskṛtaḥ //MU_3,99.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6523: tvayā dṛṣṭo vinaṣṭo 'smi śatrur me tvam iti drutam / yad uktaṃ tad dhi cittena galatā paridevitam //MU_3,99.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6524: ruditaṃ yan mahākrandaṃ puṃsā bahvasru rāghava / tad bhogajālaṃ tyajatā manasā rodanaṃ kṛtam //MU_3,99.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6525: ardhaprāptavivekasya na prāptasyāmalaṃ padam / cetasas tyajato bhogān paritāpo bhṛśaṃ bhavet //MU_3,99.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6526: rudatāṅgāni dṛṣṭāni kāruṇyenāvabodhinā / kaṣṭam etāni santyajya kiṃ prayāmīti cetasā //MU_3,99.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6527: ardhaprāptavivekasya na prāptasyāmalaṃ padam / cetasas tyajato 'ṅgāni paritāpo hi vardhate //MU_3,99.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6528: hasitaṃ yat tad ānandi puṃsā madavabodhataḥ / pariprāptavivekena tat tuṣṭaṃ rāma cetasā //MU_3,99.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6529: pariprāptavivekasya tyaktasaṃsārasaṃsṛteḥ / cetasas tyajato rūpam ānando hi vivardhate //MU_3,99.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6530: hasatāṅgāni dṛṣṭāni puṃsā yāny upahāsataḥ / tāni dṛṣṭāni manasā vipralambhapradāni hi //MU_3,99.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6531: mithyāvikalparacitair vipralabdham ahaṃ ciram / ity aṅgāny upahāsena dṛṣṭāni svāni cetasā //MU_3,99.28//
GSP27moksop_u:6532: manaḥ prāptavivekaṃ hi viśrāntaṃ vitate pade / prāktanīṃ dīnatāṃ dhīraṃ hasat paśyati dūrataḥ //MU_3,99.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6533: yadāsau samavaṣṭabhya mayā pṛṣṭaḥ prayatnataḥ / tad viveko balāc cittam ādatta iti darśitam //MU_3,99.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6534: yad aṅgāni viśīrṇāni gatāny antardhim agrataḥ / tac cittena vinārthecchāś śāmyantīti pradarśitam //MU_3,99.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6535: sahasranetrahastatvaṃ yat puṃsaḥ parivarṇitam / tad anantākṛtitvaṃ hi cetasaḥ paridarśitam //MU_3,99.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6536: yad ātmani prahāraughaiḥ pumān praharati svayam / tat tatkukalpanāghātaiḥ praharaty ātmano manaḥ //MU_3,99.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6537: palāyate yat puruṣas svātmanaḥ praharan svayam / svavāsanāprahārebhyas tan manaḥ prapalāyate //MU_3,99.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6538: svayaṃ praharati svāntaṃ svayam eva svayecchayā / palāyate svayaṃ caiva paśyājñānavijṛmbhitam //MU_3,99.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6539: svavāsanopataptāni sarvāṇy eva manāṃsi hi / svayam eva palāyante gantum utkāni tat padam //MU_3,99.36//
GSP27moksop_u:6540: yad idaṃ vitataṃ duḥkhaṃ tat tanoti svayaṃ manaḥ / svayam evātikhinnātma punas tasmāt palāyate //MU_3,99.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6541: saṅkalpavāsanājāle svayam āyāti bandhanam / mano lālāmayair vālaiḥ kośakārakrimir yathā //MU_3,99.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6542: yathānartham avāpnoti tathā krīḍati cañcalam / bhāvi duḥkham apaśyan svaṃ durlīlābhir ivārbhakaḥ //MU_3,99.39//
GSP27moksop_u:6543: apaśyan kāṣṭharandhrasthavṛṣaṇākramaṇaṃ yathā / kīlotpāṭī kapir duḥkham etīdaṃ hi manas tathā //MU_3,99.40//
GSP27moksop_u:6544: cirapālanayā cetaś cirabhāvanayā tathā / abhyāsāt svasthatām etya na bhūyaḥ pariśocati //MU_3,99.41//
GSP27moksop_u:6545: manaḥpramādād vardhante duḥkhāni girikūṭavat / tadvaśād eva naśyanti sūryasyāgre himaṃ yathā //MU_3,99.42//
GSP27moksop_u:6546_0: yāvajjīvam anindyayā varamate śāstrārthasañjātayā pālyaṃ vāsanayā mano hi munivan maunena rāgādiṣu / paścāt pāvanapāvanaṃ
GSP27moksop_u:6546_1: padam ajaṃ tat prāpyate śītalam yatsaṃsthena na śocyate punar alaṃ puṃsā mahāpatsv api //MU_3,99.43 //
GSP27moksop_u:6549: vasiṣṭhaḥ: cittam etad upāyātaṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramāt padāt / atanmayaṃ tanmayaṃ ca taraṅgas sāgarād iva //MU_3,100.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6550: prabuddhānāṃ mano rāma brahmaiveha na cetarat / jalasāmānyabuddhīnām abdher nānyas taraṅgakaḥ //MU_3,100.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6552: aprabuddhadhiyāṃ pakṣe tatprabodhāya kevalam / vācyavācakasambandhakṛto bhedaḥ prakalpyate //MU_3,100.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6553: sarvaśakti paraṃ brahma nityam āpūrṇam avyayam / na tad asti na tasmin yad vidyate vitatātmani //MU_3,100.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6554: sarvaśaktir hi bhagavān yaiva tasmai hi rocate / śaktis tām eva vitatāṃ prakāśayati sarvagaḥ //MU_3,100.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6555: cicchaktir brahmaṇo rāma śarīreṣv abhidṛśyate / spandaśaktiś ca vāteṣu jaḍaśaktis tathopale //MU_3,100.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6556: dravaśaktir athāmbhassu tejaśśaktis tathānale / śūnyaśaktir athākāśe bhāvaśaktir bhavasthitau //MU_3,100.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6557: brahmaṇas sarvaśakter hi dṛśyate daśadiggatā / nāśaśaktir vināśyeṣu śokaśaktiś ca śokiṣu //MU_3,100.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6558: ānandaśaktir mudite vīryaśaktir mahābhaṭe / sargeṣu sargaśaktiś ca kalpānte sarvahāritā //MU_3,100.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6559: phalapuṣpalatāpattraśākhāviṭapaparvavān / vṛkṣabīje yathā vṛkṣas tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam //MU_3,100.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6560: pratibhāsavaśād eva madhyasthaṃ cittvajāḍyayoḥ / jīvetarābhidhaṃ cittam antar brahmaṇi dṛśyate //MU_3,100.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6561: nānātarulatāgulmajālapallavaśālayaḥ / yathartau śaktayas tadvaj jīvehā brahmaṇi sthitāḥ //MU_3,100.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6562: vyuptasarvartukusumā kṣmā deśavidhibhedataḥ / yathā dadāti puṣpāṇi tathā cittāni lokakṛt //MU_3,100.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6563: kvacit kāścit kadācic ca tasmād āyānti śaktayaḥ / deśakālāt tu vaicitryāt kṣmātalād iva śālayaḥ //MU_3,100.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6564: nirvikalpakacinmātranāmāvijñātakalpanam / brahmaivedam ahaṃ tvaṃ ca jagadāśāś ca rāghava //MU_3,100.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6565: sa ātmā sarvago rāma nityoditamahāvapuḥ / yan manāṅmananāṃ śaktiṃ dhatte tan mana ucyate //MU_3,100.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6566: piñchabhrāntir yathā vyomni payasy āvartadhīr yathā / pratibhāsakalāmātraṃ mano jīvas tathātmani //MU_3,100.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6567: yad etan manaso rūpam uditaṃ mananātmakam / brāhmī śaktir asau tasmād brahmaiva tad arindama //MU_3,100.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6568: idaṃ tad aham ity eva vibhāgaḥ pratibhāsajaḥ / manaso brahmaṇo 'nyatve mohaḥ paramakāraṇam //MU_3,100.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6569: yad yac caitanmananatā kiñcit sadasadātmakam / śabditaṃ sarvaśaktes sā śaktir brahmaiva tāṃ viduḥ //MU_3,100.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6570: manassattātmakaṃ nāma yad etan manasi sthitam / taj jātaṃ pratibhāsena tenaivānyena naśyati //MU_3,100.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6571: pratiyogivyavacchedasaṅkhyārūpādayaś ca ye / manaśśabdaiḥ prakalpyante brahmajān brahma viddhi tān //MU_3,100.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6572: yathā yathāsya manasaḥ pratibhāsaḥ pravartate / tathā tathaiva bhavati dṛṣṭānto 'tra kilaindavāḥ //MU_3,100.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6573: svayam akṣubdhavimale yathā spando mahāmbhasi / saṃsārakāraṇaṃ jīvas tathāyaṃ paramātmani //MU_3,100.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6574: jñasya sarvacitā rāma brahmaivāvartate sadā / kallolormitaraṅgoghair abdher jalam ivātmani //MU_3,100.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6575: dvitīyā nāsti sattaiva nāmarūpakriyātmikā / pare nānātaraṅge 'bdhau kalpaneva jaletarā //MU_3,100.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6576: jāyate naśyati tathā yad idaṃ yāti tiṣṭhati / tad idaṃ brahmaṇi brahma brahmaṇaiva vivartate //MU_3,100.28//
GSP27moksop_u:6577: svātmany evātapas tīvro mṛgatṛṣṇikayā yathā / vaicitryeṇāvicitro 'pi sphuraty ātmātmanā tathā //MU_3,100.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6578: kāraṇaṃ karma kartā ca jananaṃ maraṇaṃ sthitiḥ / sarvaṃ brahmaiva nānyo 'sti tad vinā kalanārthataḥ //MU_3,100.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6579: na lobho 'sti na moho 'sti na tṛṣṇāsti nirañjanāḥ / ka ātmany ātmano lobhas tṛṣṇā moho 'thavā kutaḥ //MU_3,100.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6580: ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam ātmaiva kalanākramaḥ / hemāṅgadatayevāyam ātmodeti manastayā //MU_3,100.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6581: abuddhaṃ brahma yad rāma tac cittaṃ jīva ucyate / aparijñāta evāśu bandhur āyāty abandhutām //MU_3,100.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6582: cinmayenātmanājñena svasaṅkalpanayā svayam / śūnyatā gaganeneva jīvatā prakaṭīkṛtā //MU_3,100.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6583: ātmaivānātmavad iha jīvo jagati rājate / dvīndutvam iva durdṛṣṭes sac cāsac ca samutthitam //MU_3,100.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6584: mohādiśabdārthadṛśor etayor atyasambhavāt / sarvatvād ātmanaś caiva kvātmā baddhaḥ kva mucyate //MU_3,100.36//
GSP27moksop_u:6585: nityāsambhavabandhasya bandho 'stīti kukalpanā / yasya kālpanikas tasya mokṣo mithyā na satyataḥ //MU_3,100.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6586: rāmaḥ: mano yanniścayaṃ yāti tat tad bhavati nānyathā / tena kālpaniko nāsti bandhaḥ katham iva prabho //MU_3,100.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6587: vasiṣṭhaḥ: mithyākālpanikaiveyaṃ mūrkhāṇāṃ bandhakalpanā / mithyaivābhyuditā teṣām itarā mokṣakalpanā //MU_3,100.39//
GSP27moksop_u:6588: evam ajñānakalane bandhamokṣadṛśau smṛte / vastutas tu na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti mahāmate //MU_3,100.40//
GSP27moksop_u:6589: kalpanāyā avastutvaṃ samprabuddhamatiṃ prati / rajjvaher iva he prājña na tv abuddhamatiṃ prati //MU_3,100.41//
GSP27moksop_u:6590: bandhamokṣādisammoho na prājñasyāsti kaścana / sammoho bandhamokṣādir ajñasyaivāsti rāghava //MU_3,100.42//
GSP27moksop_u:6591: ādau manas tadanu bandhavimokṣadṛṣṭī paścāt prapañcaracanā bhuvanābhidhānā / ityādikā sthitir iyaṃ hi gatā pratiṣṭhām ākhyāyikā bhavati bālajanociteva //MU_3,100.43//
GSP27moksop_u:6594: rāmaḥ: kim ucyate muniśreṣṭha bālakākhyāyikākramaḥ / krameṇa kathayaitan me manovarṇanakāraṇam //MU_3,101.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6595: vasiṣṭhaḥ: mugdhamugdhamatir bālo dhātrīṃ pṛcchati rāghava / kāñcit karṇapathāyātāṃ varṇayākhyāyikām iti //MU_3,101.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6596: sā bālasya vinodāya dhātrī tasya mahāmate / ākhyāyikāṃ kathayati prasannamadhurākṣarām //MU_3,101.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6597: kvacit santi mahātmāno rājaputrās trayaś śubhāḥ / vistīrṇe śūnyanagare vyomnīvojjvalatārakāḥ //MU_3,101.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6598: dvau na jātau tathaikaś ca garbha eva hi na sthitaḥ / śubhācārāś śubhākārā iti bhāntīndavo yathā //MU_3,101.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6599: athātyuttamalābhārtham ekadā samavāyataḥ / nirbandhavaḥ khinnamukhāś śokopahatacetasaḥ //MU_3,101.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6600: te tasmāc chūnyanagarān nirgatā vikṛtānanāḥ / gaganād iva saṃśliṣṭā budhaśukraśanaiścarāḥ //MU_3,101.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6601: śirīṣasukumārāṅgāḥ pṛṣṭhato 'rkeṇa tāpitāḥ / mārge glāniṃ gatā grīṣmatāpārtyā pallavā iva //MU_3,101.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6602: santaptamārgasikatādagdhapādasaroruhāḥ / hā tātāmbeti śocanto mṛgā yūthacyutā iva //MU_3,101.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6603: darbhāgrabhinnacaraṇās tāpasvinnāṅgasandhayaḥ / ullaṅghya dūram adhvānaṃ dhūlidhūsaramūrtayaḥ //MU_3,101.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6604: mañjarījālajaṭilaṃ phalapallavitāmbaram / mṛgapakṣigaṇādhāraṃ prāpur mārge tarutrayam //MU_3,101.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6605: tasmin vṛkṣatraye vṛkṣau dvau na jātau manāg api / bījam eva tṛtīyasya svārohasya na vidyate //MU_3,101.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6606: viśrāntās te pariśrāntās tatraikasya taror adhaḥ / pārijātatale svarge śakrānilayamā iva //MU_3,101.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6607: phalāny amṛtasṛṣṭāni bhuktvā pītvā ca tadrasam / kṛtvā gulucchakair mālāś ciraṃ viśramya te yayuḥ //MU_3,101.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6608: punar dūrataraṃ gatvā madhyāhne samupasthite / sarittritayam āsedus taraṅgataralāravam //MU_3,101.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6609: tatraikā pariśuṣkaiva manāg apy ambu na dvayoḥ / vidyate saritor dṛṣṭir andhalocanayor iva //MU_3,101.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6610: pariśuṣkā bhṛśaṃ yāsau tasyāṃ te sasnur ādṛtāḥ / gharmārtā divi gaṅgāyāṃ viṣṇubrahmaharā iva //MU_3,101.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6611: ciraṃ kṛtvā jalakrīḍāṃ pītvāmṛtasamaṃ payaḥ / jagmus te rājatanayāḥ prahṛṣṭamanasas sukham //MU_3,101.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6612: athāsedur dinasyānte lambamāne divākare / bhaviṣyan navanirmāṇaṃ nagaraṃ nagasannibham //MU_3,101.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6614: dadṛśus tatra ramyāṇi trīṇi sadvibhavāni te / maṇikāñcanagehāni śṛṅgāṇīva mahāgireḥ //MU_3,101.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6615: anirmite dve sadane ekaṃ nirbhitti tatra vai / abhittimandiraṃ cāru praviṣṭās te narās trayaḥ //MU_3,101.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6616: sampraviśyopaviśyāśu viharanto varānanāḥ / prāpus sthālītrayaṃ tatra taptakāñcananirmitam //MU_3,101.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6617: yatra karparatāṃ yāte dve ekā cūrṇatāṃ gatā / jagṛhuś cūrṇarūpāṃ tāṃ sthālīṃ te dīrghabuddhayaḥ //MU_3,101.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6618: droṇair navanavatyā tais tasyāṃ droṇena cāndhasaḥ / tatra droṇaśataṃ hīnaṃ randhitaṃ bahubhojibhiḥ //MU_3,101.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6619: tato bhuktaṃ janaśatair brāhmaṇānāṃ śatais tathā / tribhis tai rājaputraiś ca parāṃ nirvṛtim āgataiḥ //MU_3,101.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6620: bhaviṣyannagare tasmin rājaputrās trayo 'pi te / sukham adya sthitāḥ putra mṛgayāvyavahāriṇaḥ //MU_3,101.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6621: ākhyāyikaiṣā kathitā mayā ramyā tavānagha / etāṃ hṛdi kuru prājña vidagdhas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi //MU_3,101.28//
GSP27moksop_u:6622: dhātryeti kathitā rāma bālāyākhyāyikā śubhā / tuṣṭiṃ jagāma bālaś ca śubhākhyāyikayānayā //MU_3,101.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6623: eṣā hi kathitā rāma cittākhyānakathāṃ prati / bālakākhyāyikā tubhyaṃ mayā kamalalocana //MU_3,101.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6624: iyaṃ saṃsāraracanā sthitim evam upāgatā / bālakākhyāyikevograis saṅkalpair vyarthakalpitaiḥ //MU_3,101.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6626: saṅkalpamātrād itarad vidyate neha kiñcana / saṅkalpavaśataḥ kiñcin nakiñcit kiñcid eva vā //MU_3,101.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6627: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaḥ parvatās sarito diśaḥ / saṅkalpakalitaṃ sarvam etat svapnavad ātmanaḥ //MU_3,101.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6628: rājaputrās trayo nadyo bhaviṣyannagaraṃ tathā / yathā saṅkalparacanā tatheyaṃ trijagatsthitiḥ //MU_3,101.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6629: saṅkalpamātram abhitaḥ parisphurati cañcalam / payomātrātmako 'mbhodhir ambhasīvātmanātmani //MU_3,101.36//
GSP27moksop_u:6630: saṅkalpamātram utpannaṃ prathamaṃ paramātmani / tad idaṃ sphāratāṃ yātaṃ vyāpārair divasaṃ yathā //MU_3,101.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6631: saṅkalpajālakalanaiva jagat samagraṃ saṅkalpam eva nanu viddhi vilāsi cetyam / saṅkalpamātram alam utsṛja nirvikalpam āśritya niścayam avāpnuhi rāma śāntim //MU_3,101.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6634: vasiṣṭhaḥ: svasaṅkalpavaśān mūḍho moham eti na paṇḍitaḥ / ayakṣe yakṣasaṅkalpān muhyate śiśunaiva hi //MU_3,102.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6635: rāmaḥ: ko 'sau saṅkalpitaḥ kena yakṣo brahmavidāṃ vara / asataiva mahāmohaṃ yenādatte sadaiva hi //MU_3,102.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6636: vasiṣṭhaḥ: amunā bhūtasaṅgena yakṣo 'haṅkārarūpadhṛt / vetālaś śiśuneveha mithyaiva parikalpitaḥ //MU_3,102.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6637: ekasminn eva sarvasmin sthite paramavastuni / kutaḥ ko 'yam ahaṃ nāma kathaṃ nāma kiloditaḥ //MU_3,102.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6638: vastuto nāsty ahaṅkāraḥ paramātmany abhedataḥ / asamyagdarśanān mārgī sarit tīvrātape yathā //MU_3,102.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6639: manomaṇir mahārambhas saṃsāra iti lakṣyate / ātmanātmānam āśritya sphuraty ambu yathāmbunā //MU_3,102.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6640: asamyagdarśanaṃ tena tyaja rāma nirāśrayam / sāśrayaṃ satyam ānandi samyagdarśanam āśraya //MU_3,102.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6641: dhiyā vicāradharmiṇyā mohasaṃrambhahīnayā / vicārayādhunā satyam asatyaṃ samparityaja //MU_3,102.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6642: abaddho baddha ity uktvā kiṃ śocasi mudhaiva hi / anantasyātmatattvasya kiṃ kathaṃ kena badhyate //MU_3,102.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6643: nānānānātvakalanāsv avibhinne mahātmani / sarvasmin brahmatattve 'smin kiṃ baddhaṃ kiṃ vimucyate //MU_3,102.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6644: anārto 'py ārtisadbhāvāc chinne 'ṅge kiṃ ca tāmyasi / bhedābhedavikārārtiḥ kācin nātmani vidyate //MU_3,102.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6645: dehe naṣṭe kṣate kṣīṇe kātmanaḥ kṣatir āgatā / bhastrāyāṃ paridagdhāyāṃ tatsthaṃ hema na naśyati //MU_3,102.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6646: dehaḥ patatu vodetu kā naḥ kṣatir upāgatā / ko naṣṭaḥ prakṣate puṣpe āmodo vyomasaṃśrayaḥ //MU_3,102.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6647: āpatantu vapuḥpadmaṃ sukhaduḥkhahimaśriyaḥ / ākāśoḍḍayane 'līnāṃ kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā //MU_3,102.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6648: dehaḥ patatu vodetu yātu vā gaganāntaram / tadvilakṣaṇarūpasya kāsau bhavati te kṣatiḥ //MU_3,102.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6649: yathā payodamarutor yathā ṣaṭpadapadmayoḥ / tathā rāghava sambandhas tvaccharīratvadātmanoḥ //MU_3,102.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6650: mano nāma śarīraṃ hi jagatas sakalasya ca / ātmaśaktiś cid asyātmā na naśyati kadācana //MU_3,102.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6651: yo 'sāv ātmā mahāprājña naśyatīty avagacchasi / na naśyati kadācid sa kiṃ mudhā paritapyase //MU_3,102.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6652: viśīrṇe 'bhre yathā vātaś śuṣke 'bje ṣaṭpado yathā / yāty anantapadaṃ vyoma tathātmā dehasaṅkṣaye //MU_3,102.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6653: saṃsāre 'smin viharato mano 'pi hi na naśyati / jñānāgninā vinā jantor ātmanāśe tu kā kathā //MU_3,102.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6654: yaḥ kuṇḍabadaranyāyo yo ghaṭākāśayoḥ kramaḥ / sthitir dehātmanos saiva savināśāvināśayoḥ //MU_3,102.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6655: badaraṃ hastam āyāti yathā sphuṭati kuṇḍake / ātmā gaganam āyāti tathā calati dehake //MU_3,102.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6656: kumbhe gacchaty akumbhatvaṃ kumbhākāśo yathāmbare / tiṣṭhaty evam ayaṃ dehī dehe kṣīṇe nirāmayaḥ //MU_3,102.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6657: mano deho hi jantūnāṃ deśakālatirohitaḥ / muhur mṛtipaṭācchannaś śete kiṃ paridevanā //MU_3,102.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6658: deśakālatirodhāne mūḍho 'pi maraṇe naraḥ / kiṃ bibheti mahābāho neha naśyati kaścana //MU_3,102.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6659: atas tvaṃ vāsanāṃ rāma mithyaivāham iti sthitām / tyaja pakṣīśvaro vyomagamanotka ivāṇḍakam //MU_3,102.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6660: yaiṣā hi mānasī śaktir iṣṭāniṣṭānubandhinī / anayedaṃ mudhā bhrāntyā svapnavat parikalpitam //MU_3,102.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6661: avidyaiṣā durantaiṣā duḥkhāyaiṣā hi vardhate / aparijñāyamānaiṣā tanotīdam asanmayam //MU_3,102.28//
GSP27moksop_u:6662: eṣā kuḍyavad ākāśaṃ tuṣāram analaṃ yathā / paripaśyati vibhrāntā svarūpasya svabhāvataḥ //MU_3,102.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6663: asad evedam ārambhamantharaṃ sad ivotthitam / kalpitaṃ jagad ābhogi dīrghasvapna ivaitayā //MU_3,102.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6664: bhāvanāmātram evāsyās svarūpaṃ kartṛtāṃ gatam / jagatām ākulaṃ cakṣur vyomni piñchakatām iva //MU_3,102.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6665: layam asyās svarūpaṃ tvaṃ naya rāma vicāraṇāt / yathā himaśilāyās tu tapanād divasādhipaḥ //MU_3,102.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6666: himābhāvārthino 'rkasya svodayena hitaṃ yathā / sidhyaty evaṃ vicāreṇa manonāśārthino 'rthitam //MU_3,102.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6667: avidyā sampravṛttā hi vitatānarthadurgamā / nānendrajālakalaṇaṃ śāmbarī hema varṣati //MU_3,102.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6668: svavināśakriyāṃ caitāṃ mana eva karoty alam / mano hy ātmavadhaṃ nāma nāṭakaṃ parinṛtyati //MU_3,102.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6669: ātmānam īkṣate cetas svavināśāya kevalam / na hi jānāti durbuddhir vināśaṃ pratyupasthitam //MU_3,102.36//
GSP27moksop_u:6670: asaṅkalpanamātreṇa svavikalpadaśām idam / manas saṃsādhayaty āśu kleśo nātropayujyate //MU_3,102.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6671: svaṃ vikalpya vikalpyāśu vivekopahitaṃ manaḥ / santyajya rūpam ārambhi karoty ātmāvabodhanam //MU_3,102.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6672: mahodayo manonāśo mahotpāto 'sya tūdayaḥ / manonāśe prayatnaṃ tvaṃ kuru mā manaso jave //MU_3,102.39//
GSP27moksop_u:6673: aviralasukhaduḥkhavṛkṣaṣaṇḍe viṣamakṛtāntamahorage vane 'smin / prabhur idam akhile vivekahīnaṃ subhaga mano mahad āpadekahetuḥ //MU_3,102.40//
GSP27moksop_u:6674: vālmīkiḥ: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma / snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,102.41//
GSP27moksop_u:6676: vasiṣṭhaḥ: parasmād utthitaṃ cetaḥ kaṇo lola ivārṇavāt / sphāratām etya bhuvanaṃ tanotīdam itas tataḥ //MU_3,103.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6677: hrasvaṃ dīrghīkaroty āśu dīrghaṃ nayati kharvatām / svatāṃ nayaty anyad alaṃ svaṃ tathaivānyatām api //MU_3,103.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6678: prādeśamātram api yad vastu bhāvanayaiva tat / svayaṃ sampannayaivāśu karoty adrīndrabhāsuram //MU_3,103.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6679: labdhapratiṣṭhaṃ paramāt padād ullasitaṃ manaḥ / nimeṣeṇaiva saṃsārān karoti na karoti ca //MU_3,103.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6680: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāsnu cariṣṇu ca / sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ cittād etad upāgatam //MU_3,103.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6681: deśakālakriyādravyaśaktiparyākulīkṛtam / bhāvād bhāvāntaraṃ yāti lolatvān naṭavan manaḥ //MU_3,103.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6682: sad asattāṃ nayaty āśu sattāṃ cāsan nayaty alam / tādṛśāny eva cādatte sukhaduḥkhāni bhāvitam //MU_3,103.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6683: yathāniścayam ādatte yathaiva capalaṃ manaḥ / hastapādādisaṅghātas tathā prayatate sadā //MU_3,103.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6684: tatas saiva kriyā cittasamīhitam alaṃ phalam / kṣaṇāt prayacchati latā kāle sikteva tādṛśam //MU_3,103.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6685: citrāṃ krīḍanakaśreṇīṃ yathā paṅkād gṛhe śiśuḥ / karoty evaṃ mano rāma vikalpāt kurute jagat //MU_3,103.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6686: manaśśiśujanakrīḍāmṛdūdgāralaveṣv ataḥ / kim ekaṃ tatpadārtheṣu rūpaṃ jagati kalpyate //MU_3,103.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6687: karoty ṛtukaraḥ kālo yathā rūpānyatāṃ taroḥ / cittam evaṃ padārthānāṃ teṣām evānyatām iha //MU_3,103.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6688: manorathe tathā svapne saṅkalpakalanāsu ca / goṣpadaṃ yojanavyūhas svāsu līlāsu cetasaḥ //MU_3,103.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6689: kalpaṃ kṣaṇīkaroty etat kṣaṇaṃ nayati kalpatām / manas tadāyattam ato deśakālakramaṃ viduḥ //MU_3,103.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6690: tīvramandatvasaṃvegād bahutvālpatvabhedataḥ / vilambate na ca ciraṃ na ca cittam aśaktitaḥ //MU_3,103.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6691: vyāmohasambhramānarthadeśakālagamāgamāḥ / cetasaḥ prabhavanty ete pādapād iva pallavāḥ //MU_3,103.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6692: jalam eva yathāmbhodhir auṣṇyam eva yathānalaḥ / tathā vividhasaṃrambhas saṃsāraś cittam eva hi //MU_3,103.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6693: sakartṛkarmakaraṇaṃ yad idaṃ cetyam ātatam / draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyāḍhyaṃ tat sarvaṃ cittam eva vaḥ //MU_3,103.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6694: cittaṃ jaganti bhuvanāni vanāntarāṇi saṃlakṣyate svayam upāgatam ātmabhedaiḥ / keyūramaulikaṭakais tadatatsvarūpaṃ tyaktaikakāñcanadhiyeva janena hema //MU_3,103.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6697: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atra te śṛṇu vakṣyāmi vṛttāntam imam adbhutam / jāgatīhendrajālaśrīś cittāyattā sthitā yathā //MU_3,104.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6698: asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe nānānagavanākulaḥ / uttarāḥ pāṇḍavā nāma sphīto janapado mahān //MU_3,104.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6706: darīgṛhaviniṣkrāntasiddhacāraṇavanditaḥ / svargād iva samāhūya lāvaṇyam abhinirmitaḥ //MU_3,104.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6708: tatrāsti lavaṇo nāma rājā paramadhārmikaḥ / hariścandrakulodbhūto bhūmāv iva divākaraḥ //MU_3,104.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6709: yadyaśaḥkusumottaṃsapāṇḍuraskandhamaṇḍalāḥ / tatra śailā virājante harāḥ proddhūlitā iva //MU_3,104.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6711: yasyodārasamārambham āryalokānupālanam / caritaṃ saṃsmariṣyanti harer iva ciraṃ janāḥ //MU_3,104.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6712: yasyāpsarobhir adrīndramūrdhasv amarasadmasu / vikāsipulakollāsaṃ gīyante guṇagītayaḥ //MU_3,104.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6713: yasya svassundarīgītā lokapālaciraśrutāḥ / viriñcahaṃsair dhvanyante svābhyāsād guṇagītayaḥ //MU_3,104.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6714: svapneṣv api na sāmānyā yasyodāracamatkṛteḥ / rāma dṛṣṭāś śrutā vāpi dainyadoṣamarīcayaḥ //MU_3,104.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6715: jihmatāṃ yo na jānāti na dṛṣṭā yena gṛdhnutā / udāratā yena dhṛtā brahmaṇevākṣamālikā //MU_3,104.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6716: dināṣṭabhāga ākāśa āgate divasādhipe / kadācit sa sabhāsthāne siṃhāsanagato 'bhavat //MU_3,104.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6717: sukhopaviṣṭe tatrāsmin rājanīndāv ivāmbare / praviśantīṣu sāmantasenāsu ca sasambhramam //MU_3,104.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6718: gāyantīṣv atha kāntāsu sūpaviṣṭeṣu rājasu / manoharati sāhlāde vīṇāvaṃśakalārave //MU_3,104.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6719: cārucāmarahastāsu savilāsāsu rājani / devāsuraguruprakhye viśrānte mantrimaṇḍale //MU_3,104.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6720: prastuteṣu prakṛṣṭeṣu rājakāryeṣu mantribhiḥ / proktāsu deśavārtāsu nipuṇaiś cāratantribhiḥ //MU_3,104.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6721: itihāsamaye puṇye vācyamāne ca pustake / paṭhatsu ca stutīḥ puṇyāḥ puraḥprahveṣu vandiṣu //MU_3,104.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6722: sabhāṃ viveśa sāṭopaḥ kaścit tām aindrajālikaḥ / varṣaṇāhitasaṃrambho vasudhām iva vāridaḥ //MU_3,104.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6723: sa nanāma mahīpālaṃ śikharodārakandharam / pādopāntagataḥ kāntaṃ śailaṃ phalatarur yathā //MU_3,104.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6724: sacchāyasyonnatāṃsasya phalinaḥ puṣpadhāriṇaḥ / saṃviveśa puro rājñas taror agre kapir yathā //MU_3,104.28//
GSP27moksop_u:6725: capalo lampaṭo 'rthānāṃ sāmodasukhamārutam / uvācotkandharaṃ bhūpaṃ sa padmam iva ṣaṭpadaḥ //MU_3,104.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6726: vilokaya vibho tāvad ekām iha kharolikām / pīṭhastha eva sāścaryāṃ vyomnaś candra ivāvanim //MU_3,104.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6727: ity uktvā bhramitā tena piñchikā bhramadāyinī / nānāviracanābījaṃ māyeva paramātmanā //MU_3,104.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6728: tāṃ dadarśa mahīpālas tejorekhāvirājitām / śakras suravimānasthas svakārmukalatām iva //MU_3,104.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6729: sabhāṃ saindhavasāmanto viveśāsmin kṣaṇe tadā / tārāpatikarākīrṇāṃ vyomavīthīm ivāmbudaḥ //MU_3,104.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6730: taṃ caivānujagāmāśvaś śasyaḥ paramavegavān / devalokonmukhas tv abdheś śakram uccaiśśravā iva //MU_3,104.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6731: sa tam aśvam upādāya pārthivaṃ samuvāca ha / soccaiśśravā iva kṣīrasāgaro marutāṃ patim //MU_3,104.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6732: idam uccaiśśravaḥprakhyaṃ hayaratnaṃ mahīpate / jave jayanaśīle tu mūrtimān iva mārutaḥ //MU_3,104.36//
GSP27moksop_u:6733: aśvo 'yam asmatprabhuṇā prabho samprahitas tvayi / rājate hi padārthaśrīr mahatām arpaṇāc chubhā //MU_3,104.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6734: ity uktavati tasmiṃs tu pratyuvācaindrajālikaḥ / jaladastanite śānte cātako bhūdharaṃ yathā //MU_3,104.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6735: sadaśvam enam āruhya bhuvanaṃ vihara prabho / svapratāpāhitānalpaśobhām urvīṃ ravir yathā //MU_3,104.39//
GSP27moksop_u:6736: aśvam ālokayām āsa tenokta iti pārthivaḥ / nirhrādasūcitaṃ meghaṃ sa mayūra ivotsukaḥ //MU_3,104.40//
GSP27moksop_u:6737: athānimeṣayā dṛṣṭyā rājā citropamākṛtiḥ / babhūvālokayann aśvaṃ lipikarmārpitopamam //MU_3,104.41//
GSP27moksop_u:6738: kṣaṇam ālokya piñchāśvau tasthau sa sthagitekṣaṇaḥ / dṛṣṭakṣubdhasamudrādrir bhīrur ekataro yathā //MU_3,104.42//
GSP27moksop_u:6739: tasthau muhūrtayugmaṃ tu dhyānāsakta ivātmani / vītarāgo munir buddhaḥ parānanda iva sthitaḥ //MU_3,104.43//
GSP27moksop_u:6740: bodhitaḥ kenacin nāsau svapratāpajitorjitaḥ / bhayāt kām apy ayaṃ bhūpaś cintāṃ cintayatīti ha //MU_3,104.44//
GSP27moksop_u:6741: babhūvuḥ kevalaṃ tatra nisspandasitacāmarāḥ / cāmariṇyo hi śarvaryas stambhitendukarā iva //MU_3,104.45//
GSP27moksop_u:6742: virejur vismayāpūrṇā nisspandās te sabhāsadaḥ / nisspandakiñjalkadalāḥ padmāḥ paṅkakṛtā iva //MU_3,104.46//
GSP27moksop_u:6743: praśaśāma sabhāsthāne janakolāhalaś śanaiḥ / praśāntaprāvṛṣo vyomnas sāmbhodam iva garjitam //MU_3,104.47//
GSP27moksop_u:6744: sandehasāgaronmagnā jagmuś cintāṃ sumantriṇaḥ / viṣīdati gadāpāṇāv asurājāv ivāmarāḥ //MU_3,104.48//
GSP27moksop_u:6745: vitatavismayajihmatayā tayā janatayā bhavamohaniṣaṇṇayā / stimitacakṣuṣi bhūmipatau sthite mukulitābjavanasya dhṛtā dyutiḥ //MU_3,104.49//
GSP27moksop_u:6748: vasiṣṭhaḥ: muhūrtadvitayenātha bodham āpa mahīpatiḥ / prāvṛṣeṇyāmbunirmuktam ambhoruham ivottamam //MU_3,105.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6749: āsanāt sāṅgadottaṃsaḥ prabuddho 'sāv akampata / savanābhogaśṛṅgāgro bhūkampa iva parvataḥ //MU_3,105.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6750: babhāv ardhaprabuddho 'sāv āsane parikampitaḥ / vikṣubdha iva pātālāvaraṇe mandarācalaḥ //MU_3,105.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6751: patantaṃ dhārayām āsus taṃ purogā nṛpaṃ bhujaiḥ / meruṃ pralayavikṣubdhaṃ kulaśailās taṭair iva //MU_3,105.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6752: purogair dhāryamāṇo 'sau paryākulamatir nṛpaḥ / vīcivikṣobhitasyendor babhāra vadane śriyam //MU_3,105.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6753: ko 'yaṃ pradeśaḥ kasyeyaṃ sabheti sa nṛpaś śanaiḥ / dadhvāna majjadambhojakośastha iva ṣaṭpadaḥ //MU_3,105.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6754: athovāca sabhā deva kim etad iti sādaram / raṇanmadhukarī bhānuṃ dṛṣṭarāhum ivābjinī //MU_3,105.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6755: athainaṃ paripapracchuḥ purogā mantriṇas tathā / pralayollāsasantrastaṃ mārkāṇḍeyam ivāmarāḥ //MU_3,105.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6756: tvayītthaṃ saṃsthite deva vayam atyantam ākulāḥ / abhedyam api bhindanti nirnimittabhramā manaḥ //MU_3,105.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6757: āpātaramaṇīyeṣu paryantaviraseṣu ca / bhogeṣv iva vikalpeṣu keṣu te luṭhitaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,105.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6758: satatodāravṛttāsu kathāsu pariśīlitam / manas te nirmalaṃ kasmāt sambhrameṣu nimajjati //MU_3,105.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6759: tucchālambanam ālūnaviśīrṇaṃ lokavṛttiṣu / mano moham upādatte na mahattvavijṛmbhitam //MU_3,105.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6760: sātatyena hi yaivāsya manaso vṛttir utthitā / śarīramadamattāsu tām evānuvidhāvati //MU_3,105.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6761: atucchālambanaṃ śuddhaṃ prabuddhaṃ guṇahāri ca / tavāpi hi manaś citram ālūnam iva lakṣyate //MU_3,105.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6762: anabhyastavivekaṃ hi deśakālavaśānugam / mantrauṣadhavaśaṃ yāti mano nodāravṛttimat //MU_3,105.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6763: nityam āttavivekasya katham ālūnaśīrṇatā / dunoti vitataṃ ceto vātyeva vibudhācalam //MU_3,105.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6764: iti jātāsu gīrṣv asya bhūpateḥ kāntir ānanam / bhūṣayām āsa śītāṃśuṃ māsānta iva pūrṇatā //MU_3,105.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6765: rarāja rājā sāścaryam unmīlitavilocanaḥ / gate himartau prollāsipuṣpaugha iva mādhavaḥ //MU_3,105.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6766: athātisambhramāścaryakhinnasmitamukho babhau / āsannamṛtyum ālokya rāhum indur ivāmbare //MU_3,105.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6767: aindrajālikam ālokya provācātha hasann iva / babhruṃ hiṃsātmakaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarparūpīva takṣakaḥ //MU_3,105.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6768: jālma jālaṃ jaṭālena kim etad bhavatā kṛtam / mīnaspandāprasanno 'bdhiḥ kṣaṇād eti prasannatām //MU_3,105.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6769: citraṃ citrā hi devasya padārthaśataśaktayaḥ / suśaktam api me cittam ābhir mohe niveśitam //MU_3,105.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6770: kva vayaṃ lokaparyāyavṛttāntaparidevinaḥ / kva manomohadāyinyo vitatāḥ prākṛtāpadaḥ //MU_3,105.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6771: apy abhyastamahājñānaṃ manas tiṣṭhati dehake / kadācin moham ādatte kṣaṇaṃ matimatām api //MU_3,105.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6772: idam āścaryam ākhyānaṃ śṛṇutātha sabhāsadaḥ / mama śāmbarikeṇeha yan muhūrtaṃ pradarśitam //MU_3,105.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6773: dṛṣṭavān aham etasmin bahvīḥ kāryadaśāś calāḥ / muhūrte protthitadhvastaśakrās sṛṣṭīr ivābjajaḥ //MU_3,105.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6774: ity uktvonmukhanetreṣu sabhyeṣu sa hasann iva / rājā varṇayituṃ citraṃ vṛttāntam upacakrame //MU_3,105.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6775: rājā: iha vividhapadārthasaṅkulāyāṃ hradanadaparvatapattanākulāyām / kulaśikharisamudrasaṅkaṭāyāṃ bhuvi vibhavāvalito 'sty ayaṃ pradeśaḥ //MU_3,105.28//
GSP27moksop_u:6778: rājā: asti tāvad ayaṃ deśo nānāvananadīyutaḥ / vasudhāmaṇḍalasyāsya sahodara ivānujaḥ //MU_3,106.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6779: asmiṃś cāyam aham rājā paurābhimatavṛttimān / indras svarga ivāsyāṃ tu sabhāyām adya saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,106.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6780: yāvad abhyāgato dūrāt kaścic chāmbarikas tv ayam / rasātalād abhyutthito māyī maya iva svayam //MU_3,106.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6781: anena bhrāmitaiṣeha piñchikā rājirājitā / kalpāntapavanābhreṇa śakracāpalatā yathā //MU_3,106.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6782: ālokyaitām ahaṃ lolām asyāśvasya purassthiteḥ / pṛṣṭham ārūḍhavān eka ātmanā bhrāntamānasaḥ //MU_3,106.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6783: tato 'driṃ pralayakṣubdhaṃ puṣkarāvartako yathā / tathā calantaṃ calitas svaśvam ārūḍhavān aham //MU_3,106.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6784: gantuṃ pravṛtto mṛgayām eko 'ham atha raṃhasā / urvarām iva nirbhettuṃ kallolaḥ pralayāmbudheḥ //MU_3,106.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6785: tenānilavilolena dūraṃ nīto 'smi vājinā / bhogābhyāsajaḍenājño mugdhas svamanasā yathā //MU_3,106.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6786: akiñcanamanaśśūnyaṃ strīcittam iva durbhagam / tataḥ pralayanirdagdhajagadāspadabhīṣaṇam //MU_3,106.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6787: niṣpakṣi kṣāranīhāraṃ nirvṛkṣam ajalaṃ mahat / samprāpto 'ham aparyantam araṇyaṃ tāntavāhanaḥ //MU_3,106.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6788: tad dvitīyam ivākāśaṃ tathāṣṭamam ivāmbudhim / pañcamaṃ sāgaram iva saṃśuṣkaṃ śūnyakoṭaram //MU_3,106.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6789: jñasyeva vitataṃ ceto mūrkhasyeva ruṣo 'javam / adṛṣṭajanasaṃsargam ajātatṛṇapallavam //MU_3,106.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6790: araṇyaṃ mahad āsādya matir me khedam āgatā / lalanevaitya dāridryaṃ nirannaphalabāndhavam //MU_3,106.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6791: kacanmarumarīcyambupūraplutakakubmukhe / āsūryāntaṃ dinaṃ tatra prakrāntaṃ sīdatā mayā //MU_3,106.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6792: tad araṇyaṃ mayātītam atikṛcchreṇa khedinā / vivekineva saṃsāro madhyaśūnyātatākṛtiḥ //MU_3,106.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6793: taddinenātivāhyāhaṃ prāptavāñ jaṅgalaṃ mahat / astādrisānuṃ khinnaḥ khaṃ śūnyaṃ bhrāntveva bhāskaraḥ //MU_3,106.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6794: jambūkadambaprāyeṣu kalālāpāḥ patatriṇaḥ / yatra sphuranti ṣaṇḍeṣu pānthānām iva bandhavaḥ //MU_3,106.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6795: yatra śaṣpaśikhāśreṇyo dṛśyante 'viralās sthale / kadarthalakṣmyā jihmasya hṛdīvānandavṛttayaḥ //MU_3,106.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6796: pūrvād araṇyād arasāt tad dhi kiñcit sukhāvaham / atyantaduḥkhān maraṇād varaṃ vyādhir hi jantuṣu //MU_3,106.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6797: tatra jambīraṣaṇḍasya talaṃ samprāptavān aham / mārkāṇḍeya ivāgendram ekārṇavavihārataḥ //MU_3,106.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6798: ālambitā mayā tatra skandhasaṃsaṅginī latā / nīlā jaladamāleva tāpataptena bhūbhṛtā //MU_3,106.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6799: mayi pralambamāne 'syāṃ prayātas sa turaṅgamaḥ / gaṅgāvalambini jane yathā duṣkṛtasañcayaḥ //MU_3,106.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6800: ciradīrghādhvagaḥ khinnas tatra viśrāntavān aham / bhānur astācalotsaṅge tale kalpataror iva //MU_3,106.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6801: yāvat samastasaṃsāravyavahārabharais samam / ravir viśramaṇāyeva niviṣṭo 'stācalāṅgane //MU_3,106.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6802: śanaiś śyāmikayā graste samaste bhuvanodare / rātrisaṃvyavahāreṣu sampravṛtteṣu jaṅgale //MU_3,106.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6803: ahaṃ tanutṛṇe tasmin pelave ṣaṇḍakodare / nilīno 'viralālasyas svanīḍe vihago yathā //MU_3,106.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6804: vipadbhraṣṭavivekasya cchinnāśasya galatsmṛteḥ / vikrītasyeva dīnasya magnasyevāndhakūpake //MU_3,106.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6805: tatra kalpasamā rātrir mohamagnasya me gatā / ekārṇavohyamānasya mārkāṇḍeyamuner iva //MU_3,106.28//
GSP27moksop_u:6806: na snātavān na sthitavān na tadā bhuktavān aham / kevalaṃ me gatā rātris sāpadāṃ dhuri tiṣṭhataḥ //MU_3,106.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6807: vinidrasya vidhairyasya sphuratas saha pallavaiḥ / mama duḥkhātidairghyeṇa sā vyatīyāya śarvarī //MU_3,106.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6808: tatas timiralekhāsu saha tārendukairavaiḥ / mayīvāpadyamānāsu mlānatām alasānanaiḥ //MU_3,106.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6809: śāmyantīṣu ca vetālakṣveḍāsv ajanajaṅgale / saha śītārtimaddantapaṅktiṭāṅkārasītkṛtaiḥ //MU_3,106.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6810: mām abantaranirmagnaṃ hasantīm iva dṛṣṭavān / ahaṃ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ prātar madhupānāruṇām iva //MU_3,106.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6811: kṣaṇād ajña iva jñānaṃ daridra iva kāñcanam / dṛṣṭavān aham arkaṃ khavāraṇārohaṇonmukham //MU_3,106.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6812: utthāya vāravāṇaṃ ca tata āsphoṭitaṃ mayā / hasticarma hareṇeva sandhyānṛttānurāgiṇā //MU_3,106.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6813: pravṛttas tām ahaṃ sphārāṃ vihartuṃ jaṅgalasthalīm / kālo jagatkuṭīṃ kalpadagdhabhūtagaṇām iva //MU_3,106.36//
GSP27moksop_u:6814: na kiñcid dṛśyate tatra bhūtaṃ jaraḍhajaṅgale / abhijāto guṇalavo yathā mūrkhaśarīrake //MU_3,106.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6815: kevalaṃ vigatāśaṅkaṃ ṣaṇḍabhramaṇacañcalāḥ / cīcīkūcīcīvacanā viharanti vihaṅgamāḥ //MU_3,106.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6816: athāṣṭabhāgam āpanne vyomno divasanāyake / śuṣkāvaśyāyaleśāsu snātāsv iva latāsu ca //MU_3,106.39//
GSP27moksop_u:6817: bhramatātra mayā dṛṣṭā dārikaudanadhāriṇī / gṛhītāmṛtasatkumbhā dānaveneva mādhavī //MU_3,106.40//
GSP27moksop_u:6818: tarattārakanetrāṃ tāṃ śyāmām adhavalāmbarām / aham abhyāgatas tatra śarvarīm iva candramāḥ //MU_3,106.41//
GSP27moksop_u:6819: mahyam odanam āśv etad bāle balavadāpade / dehi dīnārtiharaṇāt sphāratāṃ yānti sampadaḥ //MU_3,106.42//
GSP27moksop_u:6820: kṣud antar dahatīyaṃ māṃ bāle vṛddhim upeyuṣī / kṛṣṇasarpī prasūteva koṭarasthā jaraddrumam //MU_3,106.43//
GSP27moksop_u:6821: yācñayāpi tayā mahyam itthaṃ dattaṃ na kiñcana / yatnaprārthitayā lakṣmyā yathā duṣkṛtine dhanam //MU_3,106.44//
GSP27moksop_u:6822: kevalaṃ cirakālena mayy atyantānugāmini / ṣaṇḍāt ṣaṇḍaṃ nipatati cchāyābhūte purassthite //MU_3,106.45//
GSP27moksop_u:6823: tayokto hārakeyūriṃś caṇḍālīṃ viddhi mām iti / rākṣasīm iva sukrūrāṃ puruṣāśvagajānanām //MU_3,106.46//
GSP27moksop_u:6824: rājan yācanamātreṇa matto nāpnoṣi bhojanam / grāmyād anabhijātehāt saujanyam iva sundara //MU_3,106.47//
GSP27moksop_u:6825: ity uktavatyā gacchantyā skhalantyeva pade pade / kuñjakeṣu nimajjantyā līlāvanatayoditam //MU_3,106.48//
GSP27moksop_u:6826: dadāni bhojanam idaṃ bhartā bhavasi cen mama / loko nopakaroty arthaṃ sāmānyas snigdhatāṃ vinā //MU_3,106.49//
GSP27moksop_u:6827: vāhayaty atra me dāntān uḍḍāre pukkasaḥ pitā / śmaśāna iva vetālaḥ kṣudhito dhūlidhūsaraḥ //MU_3,106.50//
GSP27moksop_u:6828: tasyedam annaṃ bhavati bhartṛtve dīyate sthite / prāṇair api hi sampūjyā vallabhāḥ puruṣā yataḥ //MU_3,106.51//
GSP27moksop_u:6829: athoktā sā mayā bhartā bhavāmi tava suvrate / kenāpadi vicāryante varṇadharmakulakramāḥ //MU_3,106.52//
GSP27moksop_u:6830: tatas tayaudanād ardhaṃ mahyam ekaṃ samarpitam / mādhavīvāmṛtād ardham indrāyāgnimate purā //MU_3,106.53//
GSP27moksop_u:6831: jambūphalarasaḥ pītas sa bhuktaḥ pukkasaudanaḥ / viśrāntaṃ ca mayā tatra mohāpahṛtacetasā //MU_3,106.54//
GSP27moksop_u:6832: māṃ taḍākam ivāpūrya sā prāvṛṭśyāmalā gatā / hastena samupādāya prāṇaṃ bahir iva sthitam //MU_3,106.55//
GSP27moksop_u:6833: durākṛtiṃ durārambham āsasāda bhayapradam / pitaraṃ pīvarākāram avīcim iva śāsanā //MU_3,106.56//
GSP27moksop_u:6834: tayā madanuṣaṅgiṇyā svārthas tasmai niveditaḥ / mātaṅgāya bhramaryeva nissvanenālilagnayā //MU_3,106.57//
GSP27moksop_u:6835: sa tasyā bāḍham ity uktvā dinānte samupasthite / mumoca dāntāv ābaddhau kṛtāntaḥ kiṅkarāv iva //MU_3,106.58//
GSP27moksop_u:6836: nīhārābhrakaḍārāsu dikṣu proddhūlitāsv iva / vetālavad vanāt tasmād dinānte calitā vayam //MU_3,106.59//
GSP27moksop_u:6837: kṣaṇena pakkaṇaṃ prāptās sandhyāyāṃ dīrghajaṅgalāt / śmaśānād iva vetālāś śmaśānam itaran mahat //MU_3,106.60//
GSP27moksop_u:6842: tat praviṣṭā vayaṃ kīrṇaśiro'ntraṃ bhīmapakkaṇam / mṛtabhūtaṃ jagat kalpe kṛtāntānucarā iva //MU_3,106.65//
GSP27moksop_u:6843: sambhramopahitānalpakadalīdalapīṭhake / aham āsthitavāṃs tatra nave śvaśuramandire //MU_3,106.66//
GSP27moksop_u:6844: śvaśrvā me kekarākṣyās tu tenāsrulavacakṣuṣā / jāmātāyam iti proktaṃ tayā tad abhinanditam //MU_3,106.67//
GSP27moksop_u:6845: atha viśramya caṇḍālabhojanāny ajināsane / sañcitāny upabhuktāni duṣkṛtānīva bhūriśaḥ //MU_3,106.68//
GSP27moksop_u:6846: anantaduḥkhabījāni namanojñatarāṇy api / tāni praṇayavākyāni śrutāny asubhagāny alam //MU_3,106.69//
GSP27moksop_u:6847: nirabhrāmbaranakṣatre kasmiṃścin divase tataḥ / tais tair ārambhasaṃrambhais tair vastravibhavārpaṇaiḥ //MU_3,106.70//
GSP27moksop_u:6848: dattātha tena sā mahyaṃ kumārī bhayadāyinī / sukṛṣṇā kṛṣṇavarṇena duṣkṛteneva śāsanā //MU_3,106.71//
GSP27moksop_u:6849: sarabhasam abhito vinedur atra prasṛtamahāmadirāsavāś śvapākāḥ / hatapaṭupaṭahā vilāsavantas svayam iva duṣkṛtarāśayo mahāntaḥ //MU_3,106.72//
GSP27moksop_u:6852: rājā: bahunātra kim uktena svotsavāvarjitāśayaḥ / tataḥprabhṛti tatrāhaṃ sampannaḥ puṣṭapukkasaḥ //MU_3,107.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6853: saptarātrotsavasyānte kramān māsāṣṭakaṃ gatam / puṣpitā sātha sampannā sthitā garbhavatī tataḥ //MU_3,107.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6854: prāsūta duḥkhadāṃ kanyāṃ vipad duḥkhakriyām iva / sā kanyā vavṛdhe śīghraṃ mūrkhacinteva pīvarī //MU_3,107.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6855: punaḥ prāsūta sā varṣais tribhiḥ putram aśobhanam / anartham iva durbuddhir āśāpāśavidhāyakam //MU_3,107.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6856: punaḥ prāsūta kanyāṃ ca punar apy arbhakaṃ tataḥ / kalatravān ahaṃ jāto vane jaraḍhapukkasaḥ //MU_3,107.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6857: tayā saha samās tatra mayā bahvyo 'tivāhitāḥ / narake cintayā sārdhaṃ brahmaghneneva naśyatā //MU_3,107.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6858: śītavātātapakleśavivaśena vanāntare / ciraṃ vilulitaṃ vṛddhakacchapeneva palvale //MU_3,107.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6859: kalatracintāhatayā dhiyā sandahyamānayā / dṛṣṭāḥ kaṣṭasamārambhā diśaḥ prajvalitā iva //MU_3,107.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6860: kṣaumānekasamākṣīṇapaṭakhaṇḍakadhāriṇā / kāṣṭhabhāro vane vyūḍho yo mūrtam iva duṣkṛtam //MU_3,107.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6862: kalatrāpūraṇotkena jarjareṇa himānilaiḥ / hemante durdureṇeva nilīnaṃ vanakukṣiṣu //MU_3,107.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6864: yāminyo vipine klinnavarāhāmiṣabhojinā / śilātalakuṭīkoṇe nītā jaladaviplutāḥ //MU_3,107.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6865: kāle kṣayaṃ gate snehe kalatre 'ghanatāṃ gate / asauhārdena bandhūnāṃ kalahaiś cātisantataiḥ //MU_3,107.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6866: sarvatra jātaśaṅkena kulīlāmukharārbhake / mayā kṛpaṇacittena nītāḥ paragṛhe samāḥ //MU_3,107.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6867: caṇḍālīkalahodvignacaṇḍacaṇḍālatarjanaiḥ / mukhaṃ jarjaratāṃ yātam indū rāhuradair iva //MU_3,107.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6868: carvitāḥ kharvitoṣṭhena dvīpīpiśitapeśayaḥ / narakāhṛtavikrītā nārakyo rasanā iva //MU_3,107.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6869: himavatkandarodgīrṇāś caṇḍā hemantavāyavaḥ / aṅge nirambare soḍhā mṛtyumuktā iveṣavaḥ //MU_3,107.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6870: jarajjaraḍhamūḍhena mūlāni kṣīṇabhūruhām / sukṛtānām ivaikena samutkhātāni bhūriśaḥ //MU_3,107.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6871: śarāvakeṣv aṭavyāṃ ca palalaṃ pakvam ādarāt / amṛṣṭena janair bhuktaṃ kukalatravatā mayā //MU_3,107.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6872: grahītṛtejaḥkṣataye bahuvaktravikāriṇā / bhāgadheyam ivātmīyaṃ vikrītaṃ paṇyam anyataḥ //MU_3,107.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6873: prāṇyaṅgavapuṣas svasya protkṛtyotkṛtya peśayaḥ / āyuṣaḥ pari vikrītā vindhyapakkaṇabhūmiṣu //MU_3,107.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6874: janmāntarasahasrotthaṃ svaṃ pāpam iva vṛddhaye / avakīrṇaṃ ca saṅkīrṇaṃ maṇḍalārāmabhūmiṣu //MU_3,107.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6875: dṛṣṭaṃ kuddālakaṃ dṛṣṭyā ṛjvyā snehasamutkayā / rauravāpatiteneva tatkākas snigdhatāṃ gataḥ //MU_3,107.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6876: vindhyakandaragulmānāṃ bandhutvam iva gacchatā / pulindavapuṣā pattrapaṅktayo 'ṅge samarpitāḥ //MU_3,107.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6877: tarpitā laguḍāsphālajitakauleyaraṃhasā / putradārāḥ kadannena grāmyakād yācitena ca //MU_3,107.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6878: dhārāsāraraṇatpattraśuṣkatālatale niśāḥ / nītā raṇitadantena sārdhaṃ vipinavānaraiḥ //MU_3,107.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6879: romabhiḥ koṭiṣu proccaiś śītenoddhṛṣitasya me / varṣāsu muktākaṇavad dhṛtās salilabindavaḥ //MU_3,107.28//
GSP27moksop_u:6880: ajājimūlakhaṇḍārthaṃ kṣutkṣobhakṣīṇakukṣiṇā / kalatreṇa mahāṭavyāṃ kṛtaḥ kalaha ākulaḥ //MU_3,107.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6882: sarittīreṣu matsyārthaṃ bhrāntaṃ baḍiśadhāriṇā / kalpe jagatsu bhūtārthaṃ kṛtānteneva pāśinā //MU_3,107.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6883: pītaṃ bahūpavāsena samyakkṛttān mṛgorasaḥ / tatkālakoṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ mātus stanapayo yathā //MU_3,107.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6884: śmaśānasaṃsthitān matto raktaraktāt palāśinaḥ / vidrutā vanavetālāś caṇḍikābhidrutā iva //MU_3,107.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6885: vāgurā vipine vyuptā bandhārthaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇām / āśā iva vivṛddhyarthaṃ putradārakalatrajāḥ //MU_3,107.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6886: mayā māyāmayair lokās sūtrajālamayaiḥ khagāḥ / jālair jarjaratāṃ nītā diśaś ca sukṛtāyuṣām //MU_3,107.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6887: tatrātidattaprasare manaso duṣkṛtodaye / āśā prasāritā dūraṃ prāvṛṣīva taraṅgiṇī //MU_3,107.36//
GSP27moksop_u:6888: karabhyā iva sarpeṇa vidrutaṃ dūrato hriyā / dūre tyaktā dayā dehād bhujaṅgeneva kañcukam //MU_3,107.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6889: krauryaṃ mukharasaṃrambhi śaravarṣi ninādi ca / aṅgīkṛtaṃ nidāghānte nabhasevāsitāmbudaḥ //MU_3,107.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6890: vikāsinyo 'kṣatākārā dūraṃ parihṛtā janaiḥ / śvabhreṇeva kumañjaryaś ciram ūḍhā mayāpadaḥ //MU_3,107.39//
GSP27moksop_u:6891: śvakākākulakoṇāsu narakoḍḍārabhūmiṣu / uptā duṣkṛtabījānāṃ muṣṭayo mohavṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_3,107.40//
GSP27moksop_u:6892: vāgurāsimatā vindhyakandarasthena nirdayam / bhūteṣv iva kṛtāntena mṛgeṣu parivalgitam //MU_3,107.41//
GSP27moksop_u:6893: pāmarīkaṇṭhakuḍyeṣu viśrāntaśirasā mayā / suptam astavivekena śeṣāṅgeṣv iva śauriṇā //MU_3,107.42//
GSP27moksop_u:6895: kṛṣṇadehena yaukāḍhyā kanthā skandhe mayā ciram / grīṣmeṣūḍhā balodbhūtā varāheṇa yathorvarā //MU_3,107.44//
GSP27moksop_u:6897: lohaliṅgā yathā rogān anarthān iva durgrahāḥ / prasūtās tatra me dārā duḥkhāny api sutān api //MU_3,107.46//
GSP27moksop_u:6898: tribālaputrikeṇaikatanayena tadā mayā / nītā nīrandhradoṣeṇa ṣaṣṭiḥ kalpasamās samāḥ //MU_3,107.47//
GSP27moksop_u:6899: ākruṣṭam uddhataravaṃ ruditaṃ vipatsu bhuktaṃ kadannam uṣitaṃ hatapakkaṇeṣu / kālāntaraṃ bahu mayopahatena tatra durvāsanānigaḍabandhagatena sabhyāḥ //MU_3,107.48//
GSP27moksop_u:6902: rājā: atha gacchati kāle 'tra jarājarjaritāyuṣi / tuṣārapūrṇaśaṣpaughasamaśmaśrudhṛte mayi //MU_3,108.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6903: karmavātāvanunneṣu saraseṣv araseṣv api / patatsu vāsaraugheṣu śīrṇaparṇagaṇeṣv iva //MU_3,108.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6904: ājāv iva śaraugheṣu sukhaduḥkheṣv anāratam / kalaheṣv atha kāryeṣu āgacchatsu vrajatsu ca //MU_3,108.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6905: vikalpakalanāvartavartinīva jagadbhrame / samudra iva kallolabhare bhramati cetasi //MU_3,108.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6906: calaṃ cintācitaṃ cakram ārūḍhe bhrānta ātmani / prohyamāne tṛṇa iva sāvarte kālasāgare //MU_3,108.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6907: vindhyorvīvraṇakīṭasya grāmaikaśaraṇasya ca / dvibāhor gardabhasyātra kṣīṇa itthaṃ samāgaṇe //MU_3,108.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6908: vismṛte mama bhūpatve śavasyeva mahājvare / caṇḍālatve sthirībhūte chinnapakṣa ivācale //MU_3,108.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6909: saṃsāram iva kalpānto dāvāgnir iva kānanam / sāgarormis taṭam iva śuṣkavṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ //MU_3,108.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6911: na varṣati ghanavrāte dṛṣṭanaṣṭe kvacit sthite / pūtāṅgārakaṇonmiśragatau vahati mārute //MU_3,108.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6912: śīrṇamarmaraparṇāsu dāvāgnivalitāsu ca / vanasthalīṣu śūnyāsu cirapravrajitāsv iva //MU_3,108.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6913: akāṇḍam abhavad bhīmam uddāmadavapāvakam / śoṣitāśeṣagahanaṃ bhasmaśeṣatṛṇolapam //MU_3,108.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6930: tad akāṇḍaṃ sphuṭaṃ prāpya sa deśaś śuṣkakoṭaraḥ / dvādaśārkāgnidagdhasya jagato 'nukṛtiṃ yayau //MU_3,108.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6931: jvaladanalajaṭālavṛkṣaṣaṇḍaḥ prasṛtamarutprasarāpanunnalokaḥ / jvalanatapanabhāskarātmajānāṃ ramaṇagṛhānukṛtiṃ jagāma deśaḥ //MU_3,108.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6934: rājā: tasmiṃs tadā vartamāne kaṣṭe vidhiviparyaye / akālolbaṇakalpānte nitāntātapadāyini //MU_3,109.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6935: janāḥ kecana niṣkramya sakalatrasuhṛjjanāḥ / gatā deśāntaraṃ vyomnaś śaradīva payodharāḥ //MU_3,109.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6936: dehāvayavasaṃlīnaputradārāgryabāndhavāḥ / śīrṇāḥ kecana tatraiva cchinnā iva vane drumāḥ //MU_3,109.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6937: bhuktāḥ kecana digvyāghrair nirgacchantas svamandirāt / ajātapakṣakāś śyenaiḥ khagā nīḍodgatā iva //MU_3,109.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6938: praviṣṭāḥ kecid analaṃ jvalitaṃ śalabhā iva / kecic chvabhreṣu patitāś śilāś śailacyutā iva //MU_3,109.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6939: ahaṃ tu tān parityajya śvaśurādīn svakāñ janān / kalatramātram ādāya kṛcchrād deśād vinirgataḥ //MU_3,109.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6940: analān anilāṃś caiva rakṣakān bhakṣakān api / vañcayitvā bhayān mṛtyos sadāro 'haṃ vinirgataḥ //MU_3,109.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6941: prāpya taddeśaparyantaṃ tatra tālataros tale / avaropya sutān skandhāt tān anarthān ivolbaṇān //MU_3,109.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6942: viśrānto 'smi ciraśrānto rauravād iva nirgataḥ / grīṣmadāvanidāghārto grīṣme padma ivājalaḥ //MU_3,109.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6943: atha caṇḍālakanyāyāṃ viśrāntāyāṃ taros tale / suptāyāṃ śītalacchāye dvau samāliṅgya dārakau //MU_3,109.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6944: thutthako nāma tanayo mamaikaḥ puratas sthitaḥ / atyantavallabho 'smākaṃ kanīyān kāntimān iti //MU_3,109.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6945: sa mām uvāca dīnātmā bāṣpapūrṇavilocanaḥ / āpta dehy āśu me māṃsaṃ pānaṃ ca rudhiraṃ kṣaṇāt //MU_3,109.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6946: punaḥ punar vadann evaṃ sa bālas tanayo mama / prāṇāntikīṃ daśāṃ prāptas sākrando hi punaḥ kṣudhā //MU_3,109.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6947: tasyoktaṃ hi mayā putra māṃsaṃ nāstīti bhūriśaḥ / tathāpi māṃsaṃ dehīti vadaty eva sudurmatiḥ //MU_3,109.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6948: atha vātsalyamūḍhena mayā duḥkhātibhāriṇā / tasyoktaṃ putra manmāṃsaṃ pakvaṃ sambhujyatām iti //MU_3,109.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6949: tad apy aṅgīkṛtaṃ tena dehīti vadatā punaḥ / manmāṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ kṣīṇavṛttinā ślathakṛttinā //MU_3,109.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6951: grīṣmatāpopataptāni kāṣṭhāny āhṛtya jaṅgalāt / maraṇāyātmanas tatra citā viracitā mayā //MU_3,109.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6952: lelihānānalajvālā citā prajvālitātha sā / kṣaṇāc caṭacaṭāsphoṭais sthitā madabhikāṅkṣiṇī //MU_3,109.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6953: mayoktaṃ tanayāsyāṃ tu citāyāṃ patitāt punaḥ / utkṛtyotkṛtya bhoktavyaṃ matto māṃsaṃ kṣaṇāt tvayā //MU_3,109.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6954: ity uktvā yāvad ātmānaṃ svaṃ citāyāṃ kṣipāmy aham / luṭhito 'smi javāt tāvad asmāt siṃhāsanān nṛpaḥ //MU_3,109.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6955: tatas tūryaninādena jayaśabdena cābhitaḥ / bhṛśam eva prabuddho 'haṃ smṛtyā ca valitas sthitaḥ //MU_3,109.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6956: iti śāmbarikeṇeha moha utpādito mama / ajñāneneva jīvasya daśāśatasamanvitaḥ //MU_3,109.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6957: ātmodantaṃ bhavatsv ittham enaṃ kathitavān aham / mārkāṇḍeya ivānantaṃ kalpaduḥkhaṃ surājasu //MU_3,109.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6958: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktavati rājendre lavaṇe bhūritejasi / antardhānaṃ jagāmāsau tatra śāmbarikaḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_3,109.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6960: aho nu khalu citreyaṃ māyā nanu vilakṣaṇā / ko nu śāmbariko nāma kva cāsāv agrato gataḥ //MU_3,109.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6961: sarvaśakter vicitrā hi śaktayaś śataśo vidheḥ / yad vivekimano 'py eṣa vimohayati māyayā //MU_3,109.28//
GSP27moksop_u:6962: vijñātalokavṛttāntaḥ kva nāmāyaṃ mahīpatiḥ / kva sāmānyamanovṛttiyogyā vipulasambhramāḥ //MU_3,109.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6963: na ca śāmbarikottheyaṃ māyā manasi mohanī / arthasya gṛdhnavo hy ete nityaṃ śāmbarikāḥ kila //MU_3,109.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6964: yatnena prārthayante 'rthaṃ nāntardhānaṃ vrajanti te / iti sandehadolāyāṃ saṃsthitau luṭhitā vayam //MU_3,109.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6965: sabhāyām avasaṃ tasyām ahaṃ rāma tadā kila / tena pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ mayaitan nāptataś śrūtam //MU_3,109.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6966: atibahukalanāvivardhitāṅgaṃ naya nijacittam idaṃ śamaṃ mahātman / śamam upagamite paraṃ svabhāve paramam upaiṣyasi pāvanaṃ padaṃ tat //MU_3,109.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6969: vasiṣṭhaḥ: parasmāt kāraṇād ādau cic cetyapadapātinī / kalanāpadam āsādya kalaṅkakalanāntaram //MU_3,110.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6970: asatsv eva vimoheṣu rāmaivamprāyavṛttiṣu / ghaneṣu tucchatām etya cirāya parimajjati //MU_3,110.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6971: asad eva manovṛttir mlānā vistārayaty alam / duḥkhaṃ doṣasahasreṇa vetālam iva bālakaḥ //MU_3,110.3//
GSP27moksop_u:6972: sad eva hi mahāduḥkham asattāṃ nayati kṣaṇam / niṣkalaṅkā manovṛttir andhakāram ivārkaruk //MU_3,110.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6973: nayad abhyāśatāṃ dūram abhyāśaṃ dūratāṃ nayat / mano valgati bhūteṣu bālo bālakhageṣv iva //MU_3,110.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6974: abhayaṃ bhayam ajñasya cetaso vāsanāvataḥ / dūrato mugdhapānthasya sthāṇur yāti piśācatām //MU_3,110.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6975: śatrutvaṃ śaṅkate mitre kalaṅkamalinaṃ manaḥ / madāviṣṭamatir jantur bhramat paśyati bhūtalam //MU_3,110.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6976: paryākule hi manasi śaśino jāyate 'śaniḥ / amṛtaṃ viṣabhāvena bhuktaṃ yāti viṣakriyām //MU_3,110.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6977: purapattananirmāṇam asat sad iva paśyati / vāsanāvalitaṃ cetas svapnavaj jāgrad eva hi //MU_3,110.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6978: mohaikakāraṇaṃ jantor manaso vāsanolbaṇā / utkhātavyā prayatnena mūlacchedena caiva sā //MU_3,110.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6979: vāsanāvāgurākṛṣṭo manohariṇako nṛṇām / parāṃ vivaśatām eti saṃsāravanagulmake //MU_3,110.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6980: yenocchinnā vicāreṇa jīvasya jñena vāsanā / nirabhrasyeva sūryasya tasyāloko virājate //MU_3,110.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6981: atas tvaṃ mana evedaṃ naraṃ viddhi na dehakam / jaḍo deho manas tv atra na jaḍaṃ nājaḍaṃ viduḥ //MU_3,110.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6982: yat kṛtaṃ manasā rāma tat kṛtaṃ viddhi rāghava / yat tyaktaṃ manasā rāma tat tyaktaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_3,110.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6983: manomātraṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ manaḥ parvatamaṇḍalam / mano vyoma mano bhūmir mano vāyur mano mahān //MU_3,110.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6984: mano yadi padārthaṃ tu tadbhāvena na yojayet / tatas sūryādayo 'py ete na prakāśāḥ kadācana //MU_3,110.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6985: mano moham upādatte yasyāsau mūḍha ucyate / śarīre moham āpanne na śave mūḍha ucyate //MU_3,110.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6986: manaḥ paśyad bhavaty akṣi śṛṇvac śravaṇatāṃ gatam / tvagbhāvaṃ sparśanād eti ghrāṇatām eti śiṅghanāt //MU_3,110.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6987: rasanād rasatām eti vicitrāsv atra vṛttiṣu / nāṭake naṭavad dehe mana evābhivartate //MU_3,110.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6988: laghu dīrghaṃ karoty etat sattāsattāṃ ca gacchati / kaṭutāṃ nayati svādu ripuṃ nayati mitratām //MU_3,110.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6989: ya eva pratibhāso 'sya cetaso vṛttivartinaḥ / tat sad eva hi pratyakṣaṃ tanmātrānubhavād iha //MU_3,110.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6990: pratibhāsavaśād eva svapnārthalitacetasaḥ / hariścandrasya sampannā rātrir dvādaśavārṣikī //MU_3,110.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6991: cittānubhāvavaśato muhūrtatvaṃ gataṃ yugam / indradyumnasya vairiñcapurābhyantaravartinaḥ //MU_3,110.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6992: manojñayā manovṛttyā sukhatāṃ yāti rauravam / prātaḥprāpyasvarājyasya subaddhasyeva bandhanam //MU_3,110.24//
GSP27moksop_u:6993: jite manasi sarvaiva vijitaivendriyāvalī / śīryate ca yathā tantau dagdhe sauktikamālikā //MU_3,110.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6994: sarvatas sthitayā svaccharūpayā nirvikārayā / samayā sūkṣmayā nityaṃ cicchaktyā sākṣibhūtayā //MU_3,110.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6995: sarvabhāvānugatayā na cetyārthavibhinnayā / rāmātmasattayāmūkam api dehasamaṃ jaḍam //MU_3,110.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6997: jāgrac cābhimataṃ vastu nayaty amṛtamṛṣṭatām / anīhitaṃ ca viṣatāṃ nayaty amṛtam apy alam //MU_3,110.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6998: prasṛjya sarvabhāvānām alam ātmacamatkṛtim / manas tv abhimatākāraṃ rūpaṃ sṛjati vastuṣu //MU_3,110.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6999: spandeṣu vāyutām eti prakāśeṣu prakāśatām / draveṣu dravatām eti cicchakticchuritaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,110.31//
GSP27moksop_u:7000: pṛthvyāṃ kaṭhinatām eti śūnyavṛttiṣu śūnyatām / sarvatrecchāsthitau yāti cicchakticchuritaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,110.32//
GSP27moksop_u:7001: śuklaṃ kṛṣṇīkaroty etat kṛṣṇaṃ nayati śuklatām / vinaiva deśakālābhyāṃ śaktiṃ paśyāsya cetasaḥ //MU_3,110.33//
GSP27moksop_u:7002: manasy anyatra saṃsakte carvitasyāpi jihvayā / bhojanasyātimṛṣṭasya na svādo hy anubhūyate //MU_3,110.34//
GSP27moksop_u:7003: yac cittadṛṣṭaṃ tad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tadalokitam / andhakāre yathā rūpam indriyaṃ nirmanas tathā //MU_3,110.35//
GSP27moksop_u:7004: indriyeṇa vinodeti mano nendriyam unmanaḥ / indriyāṇi prasūtāni manaso nendriyān manaḥ //MU_3,110.36//
GSP27moksop_u:7005: atyantabhinnayor aikyaṃ yeṣām cittaśarīrayoḥ / jñātajñeyā mahātmāno namasyās te supaṇḍitāḥ //MU_3,110.37//
GSP27moksop_u:7007: manasy anyatra saṃsakte vītarāgeṇa kānane / kravyādacarvito 'ṅgasthas svakaro 'pi na lakṣitaḥ //MU_3,110.39//
GSP27moksop_u:7008: sukhīkartuṃ suduḥkhāni duḥkhīkartuṃ sukhāni ca / sukhenaivāśu yujyante manaso 'tiśayān muneḥ //MU_3,110.40//
GSP27moksop_u:7009: manasy anyatra saṃsakte kathyamānāpi yatnataḥ / latā paraśukṛtteva kathā vicchidyate bata //MU_3,110.41//
GSP27moksop_u:7010: manasy adritaṭārūḍhe gṛhasthenāpi jantunā / śvabhrābhrakandarabhrāntiduḥkhaṃ samanubhūyate //MU_3,110.42//
GSP27moksop_u:7011: manasy ullasite svapne hṛdy eva puraparvatāḥ / ākāśa iva vistīrṇe dṛśyante nirmitāḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_3,110.43//
GSP27moksop_u:7012: mano vilulitaṃ svapne hṛdy evādripurāvalīm / tanoti calito 'mbhodhir vīcīcayam ivātmani //MU_3,110.44//
GSP27moksop_u:7013: antar abdher jalād yadvat taraṅgāpīḍavīcayaḥ / dehāntar manasas tadvat svapnādripurarājayaḥ //MU_3,110.45//
GSP27moksop_u:7014: aṅkurasya yathā pattralatāpuṣpaphalaśriyaḥ / manaso 'sya tathā jāgratsvapnavibhramabhūtayaḥ //MU_3,110.46//
GSP27moksop_u:7015: vyatiriktā yathā hemno na haimavanitā tathā / jāgratsvapnakriyālakṣmīr vyatiriktā na cetasaḥ //MU_3,110.47//
GSP27moksop_u:7016: dhārākaṇormiphenaśrīr yathā saṃlakṣyate 'mbhasaḥ / tathā vicitravibhavā nānāteyaṃ hi cetasaḥ //MU_3,110.48//
GSP27moksop_u:7017: svacittavṛttir eveyaṃ jāgratsvapnadṛśoditā / rasāveśād upādatte śailūṣa iva bhūmikām //MU_3,110.49//
GSP27moksop_u:7018: caṇḍālatvaṃ hi lavaṇaḥ pratibhāsavaśād yathā / tathedaṃ jagad ābhogi manomananamātrakam //MU_3,110.50//
GSP27moksop_u:7019: yad yat saṃvedyate kiñcit tena tenāśu bhūyate / manomanananirmāṇaṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_3,110.51//
GSP27moksop_u:7020: nānāpurasaricchailarūpatām etya dehinām / tanoty antasstham evedaṃ jāgratsvapnabhramaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,110.52//
GSP27moksop_u:7021: suratvād daityatām eti nāgatvān nagatām api / pratibhāsavaśāc cittam āpadaṃ lavaṇo yathā //MU_3,110.53//
GSP27moksop_u:7022: naratvād eti nārītvaṃ pitṛtvāt putratāṃ punaḥ / yathā kṣipraṃ prati naṭas svasaṅkalpāt tathā manaḥ //MU_3,110.54//
GSP27moksop_u:7023: saṅkalpataḥ pramriyate saṅkalpāj jāyate punaḥ / manaś ciratarābhyastāj jīvatām ety anākṛti //MU_3,110.55//
GSP27moksop_u:7024: mano mananasammūḍham ūḍhavāsanamārutāt / saṅkalpād yonim āyāti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhayābhaye //MU_3,110.56//
GSP27moksop_u:7025: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca manasi tile tailam iva sthitam / tad deśakālavaśato ghanaṃ vā tanu vā bhavet //MU_3,110.57//
GSP27moksop_u:7026: tailaṃ tilasya ca krāntyā sphuṭatām eti śāśvatīm / cetaso mananāsaṅgād ghanībhūte sukhāsukhe //MU_3,110.58//
GSP27moksop_u:7027: deśakālābhidhānena rāma saṅkalpa eva hi / kathyate tadvaśād yasmād deśakālau sthitiṃ gatau //MU_3,110.59//
GSP27moksop_u:7028: praśāmyaty ullasaty eti yāti nandati valgati / manaś śarīrasaṅkalpe phalite na śarīrakam //MU_3,110.60//
GSP27moksop_u:7029: nānāsphālasamullāsais svasaṅkalpopakalpitaiḥ / mano valgati dehe 'smin svaśvavāra ivājire //MU_3,110.61//
GSP27moksop_u:7030: cāpale prasaras tasmād antar yena na dīyate / mano vinayam ādhatte tasyālāna iva dvipaḥ //MU_3,110.62//
GSP27moksop_u:7031: na spandate mano yasya śastrastambha ivottamaḥ / sadvastuno 'sau puruṣaś śiṣṭāḥ kardamakīṭakāḥ //MU_3,110.63//
GSP27moksop_u:7032: yasyācāpalatāṃ yātaṃ mana ekatra saṃsthitam / anuttamapadenāsau dhyānenānugato 'naghaḥ //MU_3,110.64//
GSP27moksop_u:7033: saṃyamān manasaś śāntim eti saṃsārasambhramaḥ / mandare 'spandatāṃ yāte yathā kṣīramahārṇavaḥ //MU_3,110.65//
GSP27moksop_u:7034: manaso vṛddhayo yā yā bhogasaṅkalpavibhramaiḥ / saṃsāraviṣavṛkṣasya tā evāṅkurayonayaḥ //MU_3,110.66//
GSP27moksop_u:7035: cittaṃ calatkuvalayaṃ valayanta ete mūḍhā mahājaḍajave madamohamandāḥ / āvartavartini vilūnaviśīrṇacittāś cakrabhrame puruṣadurbhramarāḥ patanti //MU_3,110.67//
GSP27moksop_u:7038: vasiṣṭhaḥ: asya cittamahāvyādheś cikitsāyāṃ varauṣadham / svāyattaṃ śṛṇu yuktyātmasusādhaṃ svātmani sthitam //MU_3,111.1//
GSP27moksop_u:7039: svenaiva pauruṣeṇāśu svasaṃvedanarūpiṇā / yatnena cittavetālas tyaktveṣṭaṃ vastu jīyate //MU_3,111.2//
GSP27moksop_u:7040: tyajann abhimataṃ vastu yas tiṣṭhati nirāmayaḥ / jitam eva manas tena kudānta iva dantinā //MU_3,111.3//
GSP27moksop_u:7041: svasaṃvedanayatnena pālyate cittabālakaḥ / avastuno vastuni ca yojyate bodhyate 'pi ca //MU_3,111.4//
GSP27moksop_u:7042: śāstrasaṅgamadhīreṇa cintātaptam atāpinā / chinddhi tvam ayasevāyo manasaiva mano mune //MU_3,111.5//
GSP27moksop_u:7043: ayatnena yathā bāla itaś cetaś ca yujyate / bhavyais tathaiva ceto 'ntaḥ kim ivātrātiduṣkaram //MU_3,111.6//
GSP27moksop_u:7044: satkarmaṇi samākrāntam udarkodayadāyini / svapauruṣeṇaiva manaś cetanena niyojayet //MU_3,111.7//
GSP27moksop_u:7045: svāyattam ekāntahitaṃ svepsitatyāgavedanam / yasya duṣkaratāṃ yātaṃ dhik taṃ puruṣakīṭakam //MU_3,111.8//
GSP27moksop_u:7046: aramyaṃ ramyarūpeṇa bhāvayitvā svasaṃvidā / malleneva śiśuś cittam ayatnenaiva jīyate //MU_3,111.9//
GSP27moksop_u:7047: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena cittam āśv eva jīyate / acittenāsapatnena padaṃ brahmaṇi dhīyate //MU_3,111.10//
GSP27moksop_u:7048: svāyattaṃ ca susādhaṃ ca svacittākrāntimātrakam / śaknuvanti na ye kartuṃ dhik tān puruṣajambukān //MU_3,111.11//
GSP27moksop_u:7049: svapauruṣaikasādhyena svepsitatyāgarūpiṇā / manaḥpraśamamantreṇa vināsti na śubhā gatiḥ //MU_3,111.12//
GSP27moksop_u:7050: manomāraṇamātreṇa sādhyena svātmasaṃvidā / nissapatnam anādyantam aniṅganam ihoṣyatām //MU_3,111.13//
GSP27moksop_u:7051: īpsitāvedanāṅgyāṃ tu manaḥpraśamanaśriyi / gurūpadeśaśāstrārthamantrādyā yuktayas tṛṇam //MU_3,111.14//
GSP27moksop_u:7052: sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ śāntaṃ brahma sampadyate tadā / asaṅkalpanaśastreṇa cchinnaṃ cittagadaṃ yadā //MU_3,111.15//
GSP27moksop_u:7053: svasaṃvedanasādhye 'smin saṅkalpānarthanāśane / śāntasyācchābhravapuṣi puṃsaḥ keva kadarthanā //MU_3,111.16//
GSP27moksop_u:7054: nūnaṃ daivam anādṛtya mūḍhasaṅkalpakalpitam / puruṣārthena saṃvittyā naya cittam acittatām //MU_3,111.17//
GSP27moksop_u:7055: tāṃ mahāpadavīm ekāṃ kām apy anusaraṃś ciram / cittaṃ cidbhakṣitaṃ kṛtvā cittvād api paraṃ bhava //MU_3,111.18//
GSP27moksop_u:7056: bhavabhāvanayā mukto yuktaḥ paramayā dhiyā / dhārayātmānam avyagro 'grastacittaṃ citaḥ param //MU_3,111.19//
GSP27moksop_u:7057: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya nītvā cittam acittatām / tāṃ mahāpadavīm ehi yatra nāsi na cetarat //MU_3,111.20//
GSP27moksop_u:7058: saṃvedanaviparyāsarūpiṇārir ivābalaḥ / jetum āśu mano rāma pauruṣenaiva śakyate //MU_3,111.21//
GSP27moksop_u:7059: anudvegaś śriyo mūlam anudvegāt pravartate / jantor manojayo yena trilokīvijayas tṛṇam //MU_3,111.22//
GSP27moksop_u:7060: na śastradahanotpātapātā yasyāṃ manāg api / svabhāvamātravyāvṛttau tasyāṃ keva kadarthanā //MU_3,111.23//
GSP27moksop_u:7061: api svavedanākrāntāv aśaktā ye narādhamāḥ / kathaṃ vyavahariṣyanti vyavahāradaśāsu te //MU_3,111.24//
GSP27moksop_u:7062: pumān dṛto 'smi jāto 'smi jīvāmīti kudṛṣṭayaḥ / cetaso vṛttayo yānti capalasyāsadutthitāḥ //MU_3,111.25//
GSP27moksop_u:7063: na kaścaneha mriyate jāyate neha kaścana / svayaṃ vetti mṛtiṃ dehe lokam anyaṃ gataṃ manaḥ //MU_3,111.26//
GSP27moksop_u:7064: ito yātaṃ pare loke sphuraty anyatayā manaḥ / na naśyaty etad āmokṣam ato mṛtibhayaṃ kutaḥ //MU_3,111.27//
GSP27moksop_u:7065: deharūpeṇa vicarad ihaloke paratra ca / cittam āmokṣam āste 'sya rūpam anyan na vidyate //MU_3,111.28//
GSP27moksop_u:7066: sute bhrātari bhṛtyādau kleśa ākramaṇaṃ nṛṇām / na svacitte svacaitanyavyāvṛttyātmeti me matiḥ //MU_3,111.29//
GSP27moksop_u:7067: tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca bhūyo bhūyo vicāritam / yāvan nāsti kilopāyaś cittopaśamanād ṛte //MU_3,111.30//
GSP27moksop_u:7068: ṛte pathye tate śuddhe bodhe hṛdy udite citi / manovilayamātreṇa viśrāntir upajāyate //MU_3,111.31//
GSP27moksop_u:7069: dhyāyate hṛdayākāśe citiś ciccakradhārayā / mano māraya niśśaṅkaṃ tvāṃ pramathnanti nādhayaḥ //MU_3,111.32//
GSP27moksop_u:7070: yadi ramyam aramyatve tvayā saṃviditaṃ vidā / chinnāny eva tad aṅgāni cittasyeti matir mama //MU_3,111.33//
GSP27moksop_u:7071: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me etāvanmātrakaṃ manaḥ / tadabhāvanamātreṇa dātreṇeva vilūyate //MU_3,111.34//
GSP27moksop_u:7072: chinnābhram amale vyomni yathā śaradi dhūyate / nirvikalpe pare tattve tathā nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,111.35//
GSP27moksop_u:7073: vahanti yatra śastrāgnipavanās tatra bhīr bhavet / svāyatte mṛduni svacche kim asaṅkalpane bhayam //MU_3,111.36//
GSP27moksop_u:7074: idaṃ śreya idaṃ neti siddham ābālam akṣatam / bālaṃ putram ivodāre manaś śreyasi yojayet //MU_3,111.37//
GSP27moksop_u:7075: akṣapañcānanaṃ cetassiṃhaṃ saṃsṛtibṛṃhaṇam / ghnanti ye te jayantīha nirvāṇapadapātinaḥ //MU_3,111.38//
GSP27moksop_u:7076: bhīmās sambhramadāyinyas saṅkalpakalanād imāḥ / vipadas samprasūyante mṛgatṛṣṇā maror iva //MU_3,111.39//
GSP27moksop_u:7077: kalpāntapavanā vāntu yantu caikatvam arṇavāḥ / tapantu dvādaśādityā nāsti nirmanasaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_3,111.40//
GSP27moksop_u:7078: manobījāt samudyanti śubhāśubhaphalapradāḥ / saṃsāraṣaṇḍakā ete lokasaptakapallavāḥ //MU_3,111.41//
GSP27moksop_u:7080: prayacchaty uttamānandaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ manaḥ kramāt / kaṣakṣīṇāṅgako 'ṅgāro yathāṅgārakṣayārthinaḥ //MU_3,111.43//
GSP27moksop_u:7081: api brahmakuṭīlakṣyaṃ manasaś cet samīhitam / tad aṇor antare vyaktaṃ vibhaktaṃ paridṛśyate //MU_3,111.44//
GSP27moksop_u:7082: saṅkalpamātravibhavena kṛtātyanarthaṃ saṅkalpaśāntivibhavena susādhitārtham / santoṣamātravibhavena mano vijitya nityoditena jayam ehi nirīhitena //MU_3,111.45//
GSP27moksop_u:7083: paramapāvanayā vimanastayā samatayā matayātmavidām ati / śamitayā mitayāntar ahantayā yad avaśiṣṭam ajaṃ padam astu tat //MU_3,111.46//
GSP27moksop_u:7086: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yasmin yasmin padārthe hi yena yena yathā tathā / tīvrasaṃvegasampannaṃ manaḥ paśyati vāñchitam //MU_3,112.1//
GSP27moksop_u:7087: jāyate mriyate caiṣā manasas tīvravegitā / saumyāmbubudbudālīva nirnimittā svabhāvataḥ //MU_3,112.2//
GSP27moksop_u:7088: śītatā tuhinasyeva kajjalasyeva kṛṣṇatā / lolatā manaso rūpaṃ tīvrātīvraikarūpiṇaḥ //MU_3,112.3//
GSP27moksop_u:7089: rāmaḥ: katham asyātilolasya vegāvegaikakāraṇam / calatā manaso brahman balato vinivāryate //MU_3,112.4//
GSP27moksop_u:7090: vasiṣṭhaḥ: neha cañcalatāhīnaṃ manaḥ kvacana dṛśyate / cañcalatvaṃ manodharmo vahnidharmo yathoṣṇatā //MU_3,112.5//
GSP27moksop_u:7091: yaiṣā hi cañcalā spandaśaktiś cittatvasaṃsthitā / tāṃ viddhi mānasīṃ śaktiṃ jagadāḍambarātmikām //MU_3,112.6//
GSP27moksop_u:7092: spandasparśād ṛte vāyor yathā sattaiva nohyate / tathāsti cittasattā no cañcalaspandanād ṛte //MU_3,112.7//
GSP27moksop_u:7093: yat tu cañcalatāhīnaṃ tan mano mṛtam ucyate / sa eva ca tapaśśāstraprasiddho mokṣa ucyate //MU_3,112.8//
GSP27moksop_u:7094: manovilayamātreṇa duḥkhaśāntir avāpyate / manojananamātreṇa duḥkhaṃ param avāpyate //MU_3,112.9//
GSP27moksop_u:7095: duḥkham utpādayaty uccair utthitaś cittarākṣasaḥ / sukhāyānantabhogyāya taṃ prayatnena pātaya //MU_3,112.10//
GSP27moksop_u:7096: tasya cañcalatā yaiṣā hy avidyā nāma socyate / vāsanāparanāmnī tāṃ vicāreṇa vināśaya //MU_3,112.11//
GSP27moksop_u:7097: avidyayā vāsanayā tayāntaś cittaśāntayā / vilīnayā tyāgavaśāt paraṃ śreyo 'dhigamyate //MU_3,112.12//
GSP27moksop_u:7098: yat tat sadasator madhyaṃ yan madhyaṃ cittvajāḍyayoḥ / tan manaḥ procyate rāma dvayadolāyitākṛti //MU_3,112.13//
GSP27moksop_u:7099: jāḍyānusandhānahṛtaṃ jāḍyātmakatayeddhayā / ceto jaḍatvam āyāti dṛḍhābhyāsavaśena hi //MU_3,112.14//
GSP27moksop_u:7100: vivekaikānusandhānāc cidaṃśātmatayā manaḥ / citaikatām upāyāti dṛḍhābhyāsavaśāt sthiram //MU_3,112.15//
GSP27moksop_u:7101: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yasminn eva pade manaḥ / pātyate tat padaṃ prāpya bhavaty abhyāsalohitam //MU_3,112.16//
GSP27moksop_u:7102: ataḥ pauruṣam āśritya cittam ākramya cetasā / viśokaṃ padam āśritya nirāśaṅkas sthiro bhava //MU_3,112.17//
GSP27moksop_u:7103: bhavabhāvanayā bhagnaṃ manasaiva na cen manaḥ / balād uttāryate rāma tad upāyo 'sti netaraḥ //MU_3,112.18//
GSP27moksop_u:7104: mana eva samarthaṃ vai manaso dṛḍhanigrahe / arājā kas samarthas syād rājño rāghava nigrahe //MU_3,112.19//
GSP27moksop_u:7105: tṛṣṇāgrāhagṛhītānāṃ saṃsārārṇavaraṃhasi / āvartair uhyamānānāṃ dūraṃ svamana eva nauḥ //MU_3,112.20//
GSP27moksop_u:7106: manasaiva manaś chittvā pāśaṃ paramabandhanam / unmocito na yenātmā nāsāv anyena mokṣyate //MU_3,112.21//
GSP27moksop_u:7107: yā yodeti manonāmnī vāsanā vāsitāntarā / tāṃ tāṃ pariharet prājñas tato 'vidyākṣayo bhavet //MU_3,112.22//
GSP27moksop_u:7108: bhogaughavāsanāṃ tyaktvā tyaja tvaṃ khedavāsanām / bhāvābhāvau tatas tyaktvā nirvikalpas sukhī bhava //MU_3,112.23//
GSP27moksop_u:7109: abhāvanaṃ bhāvanāyās tv etāvān bhāvanākṣayaḥ / eṣa eva manonāśas tv avidyānāśa ucyate //MU_3,112.24//
GSP27moksop_u:7110: yad yat saṃvedyate kiñcit tatrāsaṃvedanaṃ varam / asaṃvittis tu nirvāṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃvedanād bhavet //MU_3,112.25//
GSP27moksop_u:7111: svenaiva tat prayatnena puṃsas sampadyate kṣaṇāt / bhāvasyābhāvanaṃ bhūtyai tat tasmān nityam āharet //MU_3,112.26//
GSP27moksop_u:7112: rāgādayo ye manasepsitās te buddhvaiva tāṃs tāṃs tvam avastubhūtān / tyaktvā tadāsthāṅkuram astabījaṃ mā harṣaśokau samupaiṣi tṛptaḥ //MU_3,112.27//
GSP27moksop_u:7115: vasiṣṭhaḥ: eṣā hi vāsanā nityam asaty eva yad utthitā / dvicandrabhrāntivat tena tyaktuṃ rāghava yujyate //MU_3,113.1//
GSP27moksop_u:7116: avidyāvidyamānaiva naṣṭaprajñasya vidyate / nāmnaivāṅgīkṛtābhāvā samyakprajñasya sā kutaḥ //MU_3,113.2//
GSP27moksop_u:7117: mā bhavājño bhava prājñas samyag rāma vicāraya / nāsty evendur dvitīyaḥ khe bhrāntyā saṃlakṣyate mudhā //MU_3,113.3//
GSP27moksop_u:7118: nātmatattvād ṛte kiñcid vidyate vastv avastu vā / ūrmimālini vistīrṇe vāripūrād ṛte yathā //MU_3,113.4//
GSP27moksop_u:7119: svavikalpakṛtān etān bhāvābhāvān asanmayān / nitye tate site śuddhe mā samāropayātmani //MU_3,113.5//
GSP27moksop_u:7120: nāsi kartā kim etāsu kriyāsu mamatā tava / ekasmin vidyamāne hi kiṃ kena kriyate katham //MU_3,113.6//
GSP27moksop_u:7121: mā cākartā bhava prājña kim akartṛtayeha te / sādhyaṃ sādhyam upādeyaṃ tasmāt svastho bhavānagha //MU_3,113.7//
GSP27moksop_u:7122: kartā saṃs tvam asaktatvād bhavākartā raghūdvaha / asaktatvād akartāpi kartṛvat spandanaṃ kuru //MU_3,113.8//
GSP27moksop_u:7123: satyaṃ cet syād upādeyaṃ mithyā syād dheyam eva tat / upādeyaikasaktatvād yuktā saktir hi karmaṇi //MU_3,113.9//
GSP27moksop_u:7124: yatrendrajālam akhilaṃ māyāmayam avastukam / tatra kās tāḥ kathaṃ rāma heyopādeyadṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_3,113.10//
GSP27moksop_u:7125: saṃsārabījakaṇikā yaiṣāvidyā raghūdvaha / eṣā hy avidyamānaiva satīva sphāratāṃ gatā //MU_3,113.11//
GSP27moksop_u:7126: yeyam ābhoginissārasaṃsārārambhacakrikā / vijñeyā vāsanaiṣā sā caitasī mohadāyinī //MU_3,113.12//
GSP27moksop_u:7128: gṛhyamāṇāpi hastena grahītuṃ naiva yujyate / mṛdvy apy atyantatīkṣṇāgrā nirjharormir ivotthitā //MU_3,113.14//
GSP27moksop_u:7129: dṛśyate prakaṭābhāsā sadarthe nopayujyate / taraṅgiṇī taraṅgābhāsv ākārapariniṣṭhitā //MU_3,113.15//
GSP27moksop_u:7130: kvacid vakrā kvacid ṛjvī dīrghā kharvā sthirā calā / yatprasādodbhavā tasmād vyatirekam upāgatā //MU_3,113.16//
GSP27moksop_u:7131: antaśśūnyāpi sarvatra dṛśyate 'sārasundarī / na kvacit saṃsthitāpīha sarvatraivopalakṣyate //MU_3,113.17//
GSP27moksop_u:7132: jaḍaiva cinmayīvāsāv anyaspandopajīvinī / nimeṣam apy atiṣṭhantī sthairyāśaṅkāṃ prayacchati //MU_3,113.18//
GSP27moksop_u:7133: jvāleva śuddhavarṇāpi maṣīmalinakoṭarā / valgaty anyaprasādena kṣīyate tadavīkṣitā //MU_3,113.19//
GSP27moksop_u:7134: āloke vimale mlānā tamasy ativirājate / mṛgatṛṣṇeva susphārā nānāvarṇavilāsinī //MU_3,113.20//
GSP27moksop_u:7135: vakrā viṣamayī tanvī mṛdvī kaṇṭakakarkaśā / lalanā cañcalā kṣuddhā tṛṣṇā jihveva bhoginaḥ //MU_3,113.21//
GSP27moksop_u:7136: svayaṃ dīpaśikhevāśu kṣīyate snehasaṅkṣaye / sindūradhūlilekheva vinā rāgaṃ na rañjate //MU_3,113.22//
GSP27moksop_u:7137: kṣaṇaprakāśā taralā kṛtasaṃsthā jaḍāśaye / mugdhānāṃ trāsajananī vakrā vidyud ivoditā //MU_3,113.23//
GSP27moksop_u:7138: yatnād gṛhītvā dahati bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate / labhyate 'pi ca nānviṣṭā vidyudvad atibhaṅgurā //MU_3,113.24//
GSP27moksop_u:7139: aprārthitaivopanatā ramaṇīyāpy anarthadā / akālapuṣpamāleva śreyase nābhinanditā //MU_3,113.25//
GSP27moksop_u:7141: pratibhāsavaśād eva trijaganti mahānti ca / muhūrtamātreṇotpādya dhatte grāsīkaroti ca //MU_3,113.27//
GSP27moksop_u:7142: muhūrto vatsaraśreṇī lavaṇasyānayā kṛtā / rātrir dvādaśavarṣāṇi hariścandrasya nirmitā //MU_3,113.28//
GSP27moksop_u:7143: viyoginām athānyeṣāṃ kāntāvirahaśālinām / rātrir vatsaravad dīrghā bhavaty asyāḥ prasādataḥ //MU_3,113.29//
GSP27moksop_u:7144: sukhitasyālpatām eti duḥkhitasyaiti dīrghatām / kālo hy asyāḥ prasādena viparyāsaikaśālinā //MU_3,113.30//
GSP27moksop_u:7145: asyās svasattāmātreṇa kartṛtaitāsu vṛttiṣu / dīpasyālokakāryāṇāṃ yathā tadvan na vastutaḥ //MU_3,113.31//
GSP27moksop_u:7146: sanitambastanā citre na strī strīdharmiṇī yathā / tathaivākāradhīreyaṃ kartuṃ yogyā na kiñcana //MU_3,113.32//
GSP27moksop_u:7147: manorājyam ivākārabhāsvarā satyavarjitā / sahasraśataśākhāpi na kiñcit paramārthataḥ //MU_3,113.33//
GSP27moksop_u:7148: araṇye mṛgatṛṣṇeva mithyaivāḍambarānvitā / viḍambayati tān mugdhamṛgān eva na mānuṣān //MU_3,113.34//
GSP27moksop_u:7149: phenamāleva sañjātadhvastā vicchedavarjitā / jaḍaiva cañcalākārā gṛhyamānā na kiñcana //MU_3,113.35//
GSP27moksop_u:7150: ananyā cetanasyāpi nūnam anyeva ca sthitā / krimitantur ivādīrghā jaḍaivāpy ajaḍāśritā //MU_3,113.36//
GSP27moksop_u:7153: dhārā jaladharasyeva sudīrghā jaḍanirmitā / asārasaṅghātadṛḍharajjus tṛṇagaṇair iva //MU_3,113.39//
GSP27moksop_u:7154: taraṅgotpalamāleva kalpanāmātravarṇitā / mṛṇālīva bahucchidrā paṅkaprauḍhā jaḍātmikā //MU_3,113.40//
GSP27moksop_u:7155: jvāleva dṛśyate vṛddhitatparā na ca vardhate / viṣāsvāda ivāpātamadhurānte sudāruṇā //MU_3,113.41//
GSP27moksop_u:7156: naṣṭā dīpaśikhevaiṣā na jāne kveha gacchati / mihikevāgradṛṣṭāpi gṛhyamāṇā na kiñcana //MU_3,113.42//
GSP27moksop_u:7157: pāṃsumuṣṭir ivāstīrya prekṣitā pāramāṇavī / ākāśanīlimevaiṣā nirnimittaiva dṛśyate //MU_3,113.43//
GSP27moksop_u:7158: dvicandramohavaj jātā svapnavad vihitabhramā / yathā nauyāyinas sthāṇuspandas tadvad ihotthitā //MU_3,113.44//
GSP27moksop_u:7159: anayopahate citte dīrghakālam ivākulaiḥ / janair ālakṣyate dīrghas saṃsārasvapnavibhramaḥ //MU_3,113.45//
GSP27moksop_u:7160: manojñam api satyaṃ ca dṛśyate sad asattayā / amanojñam asatyaṃ ca dṛśyate 'sac ca sattayā //MU_3,113.46//
GSP27moksop_u:7161: anayopahate tv asmiṃś citrāś cetasi vibhramāḥ / utpadyante vinaśyante taraṅgās toyadher iva //MU_3,113.47//
GSP27moksop_u:7162: padārtharatham ārūḍhā bhāvanaiṣā balānvitā / ākrāmati manaḥ kṣipraṃ vihagaṃ vāgurā yathā //MU_3,113.48//
GSP27moksop_u:7163: kāruṇyāt spandamānākṣīṃ sravatkṣīralavastanīm / nayaty ullāsitānandaṃ jananīṃ gṛhiṇīpadam //MU_3,113.49//
GSP27moksop_u:7164: viṣīkaroti niṣṣyandasantarpitajagattrayam / sudhā sārdram api kṣipraṃ pravṛddhā bimbam aindavam //MU_3,113.50//
GSP27moksop_u:7165: unmattavaravetālavartanārambhasambhramam / sthāṇavas samprayacchanti mūkam apy eti yad dhiyā //MU_3,113.51//
GSP27moksop_u:7166: sandhyādiṣu ca kāleṣu loṣṭapāṣāṇabhittayaḥ / asyāḥ prasādād dṛśyante sarpā jagati dṛṣṭibhiḥ //MU_3,113.52//
GSP27moksop_u:7167: eko 'pi dvitayodeti yathā dviśaśidarśane / dūram abhyāśatāṃ yāti svapne 'bdhitaraṇaṃ yathā //MU_3,113.53//
GSP27moksop_u:7168: ādīrghaḥ kṣaṇatām eti kālas seṣṭā yathā niśā / kṣaṇo varṣam ivābhāti kāntāvirahiṇām iva //MU_3,113.54//
GSP27moksop_u:7169: na tad asti na yan nāma na karotīyam uddhatā / asyās tv akiñcanāyās tu śaktatāṃ paśya rāghava //MU_3,113.55//
GSP27moksop_u:7170: saṃrodhayet prayatnena saṃvidaivāśu saṃvidam / saṃvitsrotonirodhena śuṣyaty eṣā manonadī //MU_3,113.56//
GSP27moksop_u:7171: avidyamānayaivedaṃ pelavāṅgyā sutucchayā / mithyābhāvanayā nāma citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.57//
GSP27moksop_u:7172: arūpayā nirākṛtyā cārucetanahīnayā / asatyevāśu naśyantyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.58//
GSP27moksop_u:7173: ālokena vinaśyantyā sphurantyā tamaso 'ntare / kauśikekṣaṇadharmiṇyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.59//
GSP27moksop_u:7174: kukarmaikāntakāriṇyā na sahantyāvalokanam / deham apy avijānantyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.60//
GSP27moksop_u:7175: sudhīrācāradharmiṇyā nityaṃ prākṛtakāntayā / anāratāstaṅgatayā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.61//
GSP27moksop_u:7176: anantaduḥkhākulayā sadaiva dhṛtayānayā / sambodhahīnayā nāma citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.62//
GSP27moksop_u:7177: kāmakrodhaghanastanyā tamaḥprasaravaktrayā / acetanaśarīriṇyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.63//
GSP27moksop_u:7178: ātmāndhakūpāspadayā jaḍayā jāḍyajīrṇayā / duḥkhadīrghapralāpinyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.64//
GSP27moksop_u:7179: puruṣāsaṅgabhaṅginyā rogiṇyākṣatamāyayā / vivartinyā vivakṣāsu citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.65//
GSP27moksop_u:7180: puruṣasya na yā śaktā soḍhum īkṣitam apy alam / tayā striyāśaraṇayā citram andhīkṛtaḥ pumān //MU_3,113.66//
GSP27moksop_u:7181: na yasyāś cetanaivāsti yāpy anaṣṭaiva naśyati / tayā striyāpuruṣayā citram andhīkṛtaḥ pumān //MU_3,113.67//
GSP27moksop_u:7182: anantaduṣprasaravilāsakāriṇī kṣayodayonmukhasukhaduḥkhakāriṇī / iyaṃ prabho vigalati kena vāsanā manoguhānilayanibaddhabhāvanā //MU_3,113.68//
GSP27moksop_u:7185: rāmaḥ: avidyāvibhavaprotthaṃ jagataḥ puruṣasya vā / mahad āndhyam idaṃ brahman kathaṃ nāma vinaśyati //MU_3,114.1//
GSP27moksop_u:7186: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yathā tuṣāranalinī bhāskarālokanāt kṣaṇāt / naśyaty evam avidyeyaṃ naśyaty ātmāvalokanāt //MU_3,114.2//
GSP27moksop_u:7187: tāvat saṃsārabhṛguṣu svātmanā saha dehinam / āndolayati sā yaiṣā duḥkhakaṇṭakajāliṣu //MU_3,114.3//
GSP27moksop_u:7188: avidyā yāvad asyās tu notpannā kṣayakāriṇī / svayam ātmāvalokecchā mohasaṅkṣayadāyinī //MU_3,114.4//
GSP27moksop_u:7189: asyāḥ paraṃ prapaśyantyās svātmanāśaḥ pravartate / ātapānubhavārthinyāś chāyāyā iva rāghava //MU_3,114.5//
GSP27moksop_u:7190: dṛṣṭe sarvagate deve svayam eva vilīyate / sarvāśābhyudite chāyā dvādaśārkagaṇe yathā //MU_3,114.6//
