GSP27moksop_u:9218: uhyamāno hy avidyādhvany ātmā nehopalabhyate / ātmajñānād ṛte tac ca śāstrārthāt samavāpyate //MU_4,23.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9219: avidyāsaritaḥ pāram ātmalābhād ṛte kila / rāma nāsādyate tad dhi padam akṣayam acyutam //MU_4,23.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9220: yataḥ kutaścij jāteyam avidyā bhramadāyinī / nūnaṃ sthitim upāyātā samācchādya padaṃ sthitā //MU_4,23.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9221: kuto jāteyam iti te rāma māstu vicāraṇā / imāṃ katham ahaṃ hanmīty eṣā te 'stu vicāraṇā //MU_4,23.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9222: astaṅgatāyāṃ kṣīṇāyām asyāṃ jñāsyasi rāghava / yata eṣā yathā caiṣā yathā naṣṭety akhaṇḍitam //MU_4,23.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9223: vastutaḥ khalu nāsty eṣā vibhāty evānavekṣitā / asato bhrāntibhātasya rūpaṃ jānāti kaḥ kutaḥ //MU_4,23.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9224: jāteyaṃ prauḍhim āpannā doṣāyaivātatākṛtiḥ / balāt praṇāśayitvaināṃ parijñāsyasi vai tataḥ //MU_4,23.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9225: api śūrā api prājñās te na santi jagattraye / avidyayā ye puruṣā na nāma vivaśīkṛtāḥ //MU_4,23.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9226: tad asyāṃ rogaśālāyāṃ yatnaṃ kuru cikitsane / yathaiṣā janmaduḥkhena na bhūyas tvāṃ niyokṣyati //MU_4,23.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9227: sarvāpadām ekasakhīm ajñānatarumañjarīm / anarthasārthajananīm avidyām alam uddhara //MU_4,23.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9228: bhayaviṣādadurādhivipatpradāṃ hṛdayamohamahāpaṭalākulām / bhṛśam apāsya kudṛṣṭim imāṃ balād bhava bhavārṇavapāram upāgataḥ //MU_4,23.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9231: vasiṣṭhaḥ: kupitasyāsato 'py asya prekṣāmātravināśinaḥ / avidyāvitatavyādher auṣadhaṃ śṛṇu rāghava //MU_4,24.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9232: yāṃ tāṃ kathayituṃ jātiṃ rāma rājasasāttvikīm / manovīryavicārārthaṃ prastuto 'smīti tāṃ śṛṇu //MU_4,24.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9233: yat tad asty amṛtaṃ brahma sarvavyāpi nirāmayam / cidābhāsam anantākhyam anādi vigatabhramam //MU_4,24.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9234: citspandavapuṣas tasya spandaḥ kasmāccid eva hi / pradeśād ghanatām eti somyābdheś calanād iva //MU_4,24.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9235: antar abdher jalaṃ yadvat spandāt stambhavad īhate / sarvaśakti tathaikatra gacchati spandaśaktitām //MU_4,24.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9236: ātmany evātmanā vyomni yathā sarati mārutaḥ / tathehātmātmaśaktyaiva svātmany evaiti lolatām //MU_4,24.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9237: svaśikhāspandaśaktyaiva dīpas somyo yathoccatām / eti tadvad asāv ātmā tat sve vapuṣi valgati //MU_4,24.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9238: jalāntare 'mbudher yadval lasad vāri kvacic calam / sarvaśaktivapuṣy eva tathā spando vilāsavān //MU_4,24.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9239: yathollasati bhācakrair dravatkāñcanasāgaraḥ / tathātmani parispandais sphuraty acchaiś cidarṇavaḥ //MU_4,24.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9240: lakṣyate mauktikaspando yathā vyomni dṛśā dṛśaḥ / tathodeti lasadrūpā svaśaktir brahmaṇaś citaḥ //MU_4,24.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9241: kiñcitkṣubhitarūpā sā cicchaktiś cinmahārṇave / tanmayy eva sphuraty acchā tatraivormir ivārṇave //MU_4,24.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9242: ātmano 'vyatiriktaiva vyatirikteva tiṣṭhati / ālokaśrīr ivālokakoṭare ghanatāṃ gatā //MU_4,24.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9243: kṣaṇaṃ sphurantī sā devī sarvaśaktitayā tayā / cinoti svāṃ svayaṃ śaktiṃ kalendoś śītatām iva //MU_4,24.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9244: uditaiṣā prakāśākhyā cicchaktiḥ paramātmanaḥ / deśakālakriyāśaktīr vayasyās samprakarṣati //MU_4,24.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9245: aviditvā svabhāvaṃ svaṃ vyāpyānantapadaṃ sthitā / rūpaṃ parimitevāsau bhāvayaty avibhāvitā //MU_4,24.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9246: yadaiva bhāvitaṃ rūpaṃ tayā paramakāntayā / tadaivainām anugatā nāmasaṅkhyādikā dṛśaḥ //MU_4,24.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9247: cid athaitadavasthaiva vyatiriktā sthitātmanaḥ / anantā tadgataivāśu laharīva mahārṇavāt //MU_4,24.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9248: yathā kaṭakakeyūrair bhedo hemno vilakṣaṇaḥ / tathātmanaś citā rūpaṃ bhāvayantyā svam āṃśikam //MU_4,24.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9249: yathā dīpena dīpānāṃ jātānām ātmanā tathā / deśakālakalāmātrabhedas svo bhāvitaś citā //MU_4,24.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9250: deśakālaparispandaśaktisandīpitātha cit / saṅkalpam anudhāvantī prayāti kalanāpadam //MU_4,24.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9251: vikalpakalpitākāraṃ deśakālakriyāspadam / cito rūpaṃ mahābāho kṣetrajña iti kathyate //MU_4,24.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9252: kṣetraṃ śarīram ity āhus tad asau vetty akhaṇḍitam / sabāhyābhyantaraṃ tena kṣetrajña iti kathyate //MU_4,24.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9253: vāsanāḥ kalpayan so 'pi yāty ahaṅkāratāṃ punaḥ / ahaṅkāro vinirṇītā kālikī buddhir ucyate //MU_4,24.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9254: buddhis saṅkalpakalitā prayātā mananāspadam / mano ghanavikalpaṃ tu gacchatīndriyatāṃ śanaiḥ //MU_4,24.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9255: pāṇipādamayaṃ deham indriyāṇi vidur budhāḥ / deho 'sau jāyate loke mriyate 'pi ca jīvati //MU_4,24.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9256: evaṃ jīvo hi saṅkalpo vāsanārajjuveṣṭitaḥ / duḥkhajālaparītātmā kramād āyāti cittatām //MU_4,24.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9257: krameṇa pākavaśataḥ phalam eti yathānyatām / avasthayaiva nākṛtyā jīvo malavaśāt tathā //MU_4,24.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9258: jīvo 'haṅkāratāṃ prāptas tv ahaṅkāraś ca buddhitām / saṅkalpajālavalitā manastāṃ buddhir āgatā //MU_4,24.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9259: mano hi saṅkalpamayaṃ saṃsthāgrahaṇatatparam / pratiyogivyavacchinnaṃ prāptam anyair apīhitaiḥ //MU_4,24.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9260: icchādyāś śaktayo mattāṃ gāvo vṛṣam ivonmadam / anudhāvanti doṣāya saritas sāgaraṃ yathā //MU_4,24.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9261: itiśaktimayaṃ ceto ghanāhaṅkāratāṃ gatam / kośakārakrimikavad icchayā yāti bandhanam //MU_4,24.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9262: svasaṅkalpānusandhānāt pāśair āvalayad vapuḥ / kaṣṭam asmi svayaṃ baddham ity ārtyā paritapyate //MU_4,24.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9263: baddham asmīti kalayad vidyātattvaṃ jahac chanaiḥ / avidyāṃ janayaty antar jagajjaṅgalarākṣasīm //MU_4,24.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9264: svasaṅkalpitatanmātrajālābhyantaravarti ca / parāṃ vivaśatām eti śṛṅkhalābaddhasiṃhavat //MU_4,24.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9265: vicitrakāryakartṛtvam āharad vāsanāvaśāt / svecchāmātrānuracitā daśāś cānupatan navāḥ //MU_4,24.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9266: kvacin manaḥ kvacid buddhiḥ kvacij jñānaṃ kvacit kriyā / kvacid etad ahaṅkāraḥ kvacit puryaṣṭakaṃ smṛtam //MU_4,24.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9267: kvacit prakṛtir ity uktaṃ kvacin māyeti kalpitam / kvacin mana iti proktaṃ kvacit karmeti saṃsthitam //MU_4,24.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9268: kvacid bandha iti khyātaṃ kvacic cittam iti sphuṭam / proktaṃ kvacid avidyeti kvacid iccheti saṅgatam //MU_4,24.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9269: tad etad ābaddham iha cittaṃ rāghava duḥkhitam / tṛṣṇāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanam āturam //MU_4,24.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9270: jarāmaraṇamohārtaṃ bhavabhāvanayā hatam / īhitānīhitair grastam avidyārāgarañjitam //MU_4,24.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9272: kośakāravad ābaddhaṃ kośakārapadaṃ gatam / tanmātravṛndāvayavam anantanarakātapam //MU_4,24.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9274: imaṃ saṃsāram akhilam āśāpāśavidhāyakam / dadhad antaḥ phalair hīnaṃ vaṭadhānā vaṭaṃ yathā //MU_4,24.44//
GSP27moksop_u:9276: mṛgaṃ yūthād iva bhraṣṭaṃ śokopahatacetanam / pataṅgakam ivojjvāle dagdhaṃ viṣayapāvake //MU_4,24.46//
GSP27moksop_u:9277: chinnamūlam ivāmbhojaṃ paramāṃ mlānim āgatam / chinnāśam ātmanas sthānād videśāsaṅgadussthitam //MU_4,24.47//
GSP27moksop_u:9278: viṣayāhiṣu madhyasthaṃ mitrarūpeṣu śatruṣu / daśākhadāsv anantāsu luṭhitaṃ saṅkaṭāsv ati //MU_4,24.48//
GSP27moksop_u:9279: duḥkhe nipatitaṃ ghore vihagaṃ vāgure yathā / ābaddhāsthaṃ jagajjāle śūnye gandharvapattane //MU_4,24.49//
GSP27moksop_u:9280: uhyamānam anarthābdhau mano viṣayavidrutam / uddharāmarasaṅkāśa mātaṅgam iva kardamāt //MU_4,24.50//
GSP27moksop_u:9281: balīvardavad āmagnaṃ mano mananapalvale / ālūnaśīrṇāvayavaṃ balād rāma samuddhara //MU_4,24.51//
GSP27moksop_u:9282: śubhāśubhaprasaraparāhatākṛtau jvalajjarāmaraṇaviṣādamūrchite / dayeha na svamanasi yasya jāyate narākṛtis sa jagati rāma rākṣasaḥ //MU_4,24.52//
GSP27moksop_u:9285: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ jīvāś cito bhāvād bhavabhāvanayā hatāḥ / brahmaṇo 'kalitākārāl lakṣaśo 'pi ca koṭiśaḥ //MU_4,25.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9286: saṅkhyātītāḥ purā jātā jāyante 'dyāpi cābhitaḥ / utpatiṣyanti caivānye kaṇaughā iva nirjharāt //MU_4,25.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9287: svavāsanāvaśāveśād āśāvivaśatāṃ gatāḥ / daśāsv ativicitrāsu svayaṃ nigaḍitāśayāḥ //MU_4,25.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9288: anārataṃ pratidiśaṃ pratideśaṃ jale sthale / jāyante ca mriyante ca budbudā iva vāriṇi //MU_4,25.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9289: kecit prathamajanmānaḥ kecij janmavaśātigāḥ / kecic cāsaṅkhyajanmānaḥ kecij janmaśatāntarāḥ //MU_4,25.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9290: bhaviṣyajjātayaḥ kecit kecid bhūtamahābhavāḥ / vartamānabhavāḥ kecit kecic cābhavatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_4,25.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9291: kecit kalpasahasrāṇi jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ / ekām evāśritā yoniṃ kecid yonyantaraṃ śritāḥ //MU_4,25.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9292: kecin mahāduḥkhahatāḥ kecid alpavayassthitāḥ / kecid atyantam uditāḥ kecid arkā ivoditāḥ //MU_4,25.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9297: kecid vibhavasambhāramattasāmantabhūmipāḥ / kecic cīrāmbaracchannā munimaunam upāśritāḥ //MU_4,25.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9301: kecid āpadbalākrāntāḥ kecit sampadam āgatāḥ / kecit sthitās svargapure kecin narakam āsthitāḥ //MU_4,25.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9302: ṛkṣacakragatāḥ kecid vṛkṣarandhragatāḥ pare / vātarūpe sthitāḥ kecit kecid vyomapade sthitāḥ //MU_4,25.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9303: sūryāṃśuṣu sthitāḥ kecit kecid indvaṃśuṣu sthitāḥ / kecit tṛṇalatāgulmarasasvāduṣv avasthitāḥ //MU_4,25.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9304: jīvanmuktā bhramantīha kecit kalyāṇabhājanam / ciramuktās sthitāḥ kecin nūnaṃ pariṇatāḥ pare //MU_4,25.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9305: kecic cireṇa kālena bhaviṣyanmuktayaś śaṭhāḥ / kecid dviṣanti durbhāvāḥ kevalībhāvam ātmanaḥ //MU_4,25.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9306: kecij jātā jagaty asmin kecid anyatra saṃsthitāḥ / kecin neha na cānyatra pare eva pade sthitāḥ //MU_4,25.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9308: kecid viśālāḥ kakubhaḥ kecin nadyo mahārayāḥ / kecit striyaḥ kāntadṛśaḥ kecic chaṇḍhanapuṃsakāḥ //MU_4,25.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9309: kecit prabuddhamatayaḥ kecij jaḍatarāśayāḥ / kecij jñānopadeṣṭāraḥ kecid āttasamādhayaḥ //MU_4,25.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9310: jīvās svavāsanāveśavivaśāśayatāṃ gatāḥ / etāsv etāsv avasthāsu saṃsthitā baddhabhāvanāḥ //MU_4,25.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9311: viharanti jagatkośe nipatanty utpatanti ca / kandukā iva hastena mṛtyunāvirataṃ hatāḥ //MU_4,25.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9312: āśāpāśaśatābaddhā vāsanābhāradhāriṇaḥ / kāyāt kāyam upāyānti vṛkṣād vṛkṣam ivāṇḍajāḥ //MU_4,25.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9313: anantānantasaṅkalpakalpanotpātamāyayā / indrajālaṃ vitanvānā jaganmayam idaṃ mahat //MU_4,25.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9314: tāvad bhramanti saṃsāre vārīvāvartarāśayaḥ / yāvan mūḍhā na paśyanti svam ātmānam aninditam //MU_4,25.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9315: dṛṣṭvātmānam asat tyaktvā satyām āsādya saṃvidam / kālena padam āgatya jāyante neha te punaḥ //MU_4,25.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9316: bhuktvā janmasahasrāṇi jñānena tapasātha vā / parameṣṭhipadaṃ prāpya kecid yānti paraṃ padam //MU_4,25.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9317: kecic chakratvam apy uccaiḥ prāpya tucchatayā dhiyaḥ / punas tiryaktvam āyānti tiryaktvān naratām api //MU_4,25.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9318: kecin mahādhiyas santa utpadya brahmaṇaḥ padāt / tadaiva janmanaikena tatraiva praviśanty alam //MU_4,25.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9319: brahmāṇḍeṣv itareṣv anye tenaite jīvarāśayaḥ / prayānti padmodbhavatām anye ca haratām api //MU_4,25.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9320: anye prayānti tiryaktvam anye ca suratām api / anye 'pi nāgatāṃ rāma yathaiveha tathaiva hi //MU_4,25.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9321: yathedaṃ hi jagat sphāraṃ tathānyāni jaganti hi / vidyante samatītāni bhaviṣyanti ca bhūriśaḥ //MU_4,25.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9322: anyenānyena citreṇa krameṇānyena hetunā / vicitrās sṛṣṭayas teṣām āpatanti patanti ca //MU_4,25.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9323: kāścid gandharvatāṃ yānti kāścid gacchanti yakṣatām / kāścit prayānti suratāṃ kāścid āyānti daityatām //MU_4,25.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9324: yenaiva vyavahāreṇa brahmāṇḍe 'smiñ janās sthitāḥ / tenaivānyeṣu tiṣṭhanti sanniveśāvilakṣaṇāḥ //MU_4,25.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9325: svasvabhāvavaśāveśād anyo'nyaparighaṭṭanaiḥ / sṛṣṭayaḥ parivartante taraṅgiṇyā ivormayaḥ //MU_4,25.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9326: āvirbhāvatirobhāvair unmajjananimajjanaiḥ / sṛṣṭayaḥ parivartante taraṅgiṇyā ivormayaḥ //MU_4,25.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9327: niryānty avirataṃ tasmāt parasmāj jīvarāśayaḥ / anirdeśyāt svasaṃvedyāt tatraivāśu sphuranti ca //MU_4,25.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9328: dīpād ivālokadṛśas sūryād iva marīcayaḥ / kaṇās taptāyasa iva sphuliṅgā iva pāvakāt //MU_4,25.44//
GSP27moksop_u:9329: kālād ivartavaś citrā āmodāḥ kusumād iva / śīkarā iva pātāmbupūrād abdher ivormayaḥ //MU_4,25.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9330: utpatyotpatya kālena tyaktvā dehaparamparāḥ / svaka eva pade yānti vilayaṃ jīvarāśayaḥ //MU_4,25.46//
GSP27moksop_u:9331: aviralam iyam ātatā sthitoccair bhavati vinaśyati vardhate mudhaiva / tribhuvanaracanāvimohamāyā paramapade laharīva vārirāśau //MU_4,25.47//
GSP27moksop_u:9334: rāmaḥ: krameṇānena yenāptā jīvena sthitir ātmanaḥ / sa kathaṃ bhagavan dehaṃ samādatte 'sthipañjaram //MU_4,26.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9335: vasiṣṭhaḥ: pūrvam eva mayā proktaṃ rāma kiṃ nāvabudhyase / pūrvāparavicārārhā śemuṣī kva gatā tava //MU_4,26.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9336: yad idaṃ hi śarīrādi jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam / ābhāsamātram evaitad asat svapna ivotthitam //MU_4,26.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9337: dīrghasvapno hy ayaṃ rāma mithyaivānagha dṛśyate / dvicandravibhramākāro bhramārtabhrāntaśailavat //MU_4,26.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9338: praśāntājñānanidras san nūnaṃ galitabhāvanaḥ / prabuddhacetās saṃsārasvapnaṃ paśyan na paśyati //MU_4,26.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9339: svabhāvakalpito rāma jīvānāṃ sarvadaiva hi / āmokṣapadasamprāpti saṃsāro 'sty ātmano 'ntare //MU_4,26.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9340: svabhāvakalpito nityaṃ sarvasyāsty ātmano 'ntare / jīvasya taralaḥ kāya āvartaḥ payaso yathā //MU_4,26.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9341: bīje yathāṅkuras sphāraḥ pallavaś cāṅkure yathā / pallave ca yathā puṣpaṃ puṣpakośe phalaṃ yathā //MU_4,26.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9342: yataś ca kalpanārūpo deho 'sti manaso 'ntare / bahīrūpatayā rāma tato 'sty eveha sa sphuṭaḥ //MU_4,26.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9343: ya eva pratibhāso 'sya manasaḥ kila jāyate / sa evāśu bhavaty etan mṛtpiṇḍo ghaṭako yathā //MU_4,26.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9344: pratibhāsata evedaṃ manassaṅkalpamātrakam / jagad rāghava no satyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇājalaṃ yathā //MU_4,26.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9345: pratibhāsena caitena deho 'yaṃ dṛśyate puraḥ / bhītibhrāntena bālena vetālo 'gragato yathā //MU_4,26.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9346: ādisarge purā kāyapratibhāso 'sya cetasaḥ / yas sa eva vibhur brahmā padmakośagṛhe sthitaḥ //MU_4,26.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9347: tatsaṅkalpakrameṇaiva tatas sthitim upāgatā / iyaṃ sṛṣṭir aparyantā māyeva ghanamāyayā //MU_4,26.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9348: rāmaḥ: jīvo manaḥpadaṃ prāpya vairiñcapadam āgataḥ / yathā brahmaṃs tathā sarvaṃ vistareṇa vadāśu me //MU_4,26.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9349: vasiṣṭhaḥ: brāhmaṃ śṛṇu mahābāho śarīragrahaṇe kramam / nidarśanena tenaiva jāgatīṃ jñāsyasi sthitim //MU_4,26.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9350: dikkālādyanavacchinnam ātmatattvaṃ svaśaktitaḥ / līlayaiva yad ādatte dikkālakalitaṃ vapuḥ //MU_4,26.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9351: tad etaj jīvaparyāyaṃ vāsanāveśatatparaṃ / manas sampadyate lolaṃ kalanākalanonmukham //MU_4,26.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9352: kalayantī manaśśaktir ādau bhāvayati kṣaṇāt / ākāśabhāvanām acchāṃ śabdabījarasonmukhīm //MU_4,26.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9353: tatas tadghanatāṃ yātaṃ ghanaspandaṃ kramān manaḥ / bhāvayaty anilaspandaṃ sparśabījarasonmukham //MU_4,26.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9354: tābhyām ākāśavātābhyām āmṛṣṭābhyāṃ manodṛśā / śabdasparśasvarūpābhyāṃ saṅgharṣāj janyate 'nalaḥ //MU_4,26.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9355: manas tadghanatāṃ prāpya tato bhāvayati kṣaṇāt / prākāśyam amalālokam ālokas tena vardhate //MU_4,26.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9356: manas tādṛgguṇagaṇaṃ rasatanmātravedanam / kṣaṇāc cinoty apāṃ śaityaṃ jalasaṃvit tato bhavet //MU_4,26.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9357: tatas tādṛgguṇagaṇaṃ mano bhāvayati kṣaṇāt / svarūpaṃ gandhavat sthūlaṃ yenodeṣyati medinī //MU_4,26.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9358: athedaṃ bhūtatanmātraveṣṭitaṃ tanutāṃ jahat / vapur vahnikaṇākāraṃ sphuritaṃ vyomni paśyati //MU_4,26.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9359: ahaṅkārakalāyuktaṃ buddhijīvasamanvitam / tat puryaṣṭakam ity uktaṃ bhūtahṛtpadmaṣaṭpadaḥ //MU_4,26.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9360: tasmiṃs tat tīvrasaṃvegād bhāvayad bhāsuraṃ vapuḥ / sthūlatāṃ eti pākena mano bhavyaphalaṃ yathā //MU_4,26.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9361: mūṣāsthadrutahemābhaṃ sphuritaṃ vimalāmbare / sanniveśam athādatte tat tejas svaṃ svabhāvataḥ //MU_4,26.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9362: tasmin svasanniveśe 'tha tejaḥpuñjamaye manaḥ / bhajate bhāvanāṃ sphāre niścitām ātatāṃ svataḥ //MU_4,26.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9363: ūrdhvaṃ śiraḥpīṭhamayīm adhaḥ pādamayīṃ tathā / pārśvayor hastasaṃsthānāṃ madhye codaradharmiṇīṃ //MU_4,26.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9364: prakaṭāvayavo bālo jvālājālāmalākṛtiḥ / manorathavaśopāttavapus tiṣṭhaty asāv atha //MU_4,26.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9365: evaṃ svavāsanāveśāt kalpitāṅgaṃ mano muneḥ / nayaty upacayaṃ dehaṃ svaṃ svabhāvam ṛtur yathā //MU_4,26.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9367: sa eṣa bhagavān brahmā sarvalokādhināyakaḥ / dravatkanakasaṅkāśaḥ paramākāśasambhavaḥ //MU_4,26.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9368: athāsau paramākāśe tiṣṭhan paramarūpavān / kalpayaty ātmano geham ātmasthaś cittalīlayā //MU_4,26.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9369: kadācit kevalaṃ vyoma paramaṃ pāravarjitam / anādimadhyaparyantaṃ kadācid amalaṃ payaḥ //MU_4,26.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9370: kadācit kalpakālāgnijvālābhāsuramaṇḍitam / kadācit kānanaṃ kāntaṃ nābhīkamalakuṭmalam //MU_4,26.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9371: anyāny anyāny anekāni pratijanmāvadhi prabhuḥ / kalpayaty āsanāny eṣa nānārūpāṇi helayā //MU_4,26.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9372: tatredamprathamatvena yadaiṣa brahmaṇaḥ padāt / avatīrṇas tadā jñānāt tasyaiva susamas smṛtaḥ //MU_4,26.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9373: garbhanidrāvyapagame vapuḥ paśyati bhāsuram / prāṇāpānapravāhāḍhyaṃ dravyair eva vinirmitam //MU_4,26.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9374: romakoṭibhir ākīrṇaṃ dvātriṃśaddaśanānvitam / tristhūṇaṃ pañcadaivatyam adhaścaraṇalāñchitam //MU_4,26.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9375: pañcabhāgaṃ navadvāraṃ tvaglepamasṛṇāṅgakam / yuktam aṅguliviṃśatyā nakhaviṃśatilāñchitam //MU_4,26.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9376: dvibāhuṃ dvistanaṃ dvyakṣaṃ bahvakṣabhujam eva vā / nīḍaṃ cittavihaṅgasya bilaṃ manmathabhoginaḥ //MU_4,26.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9378: avalokya vapur brahmā kāntam ātmīyam uttamam / cintayām āsa bhagavāṃs trikālāmaladarśanaḥ //MU_4,26.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9379: asminn ākāśakuhare tate madupalāñchite / adṛṣṭāpāraparyante prathamaṃ kim abhūd iti //MU_4,26.46//
GSP27moksop_u:9380: iti cintitavān brahmā sadyojāto 'malātmadṛk / apaśyat sargavṛndāni samatītāny anekaśaḥ //MU_4,26.47//
GSP27moksop_u:9381: atha sasmāra sakalān sa sadharmaguṇakramān / vasantaḥ kusumānīva vedān vāṅmayasaṃyutān //MU_4,26.48//
GSP27moksop_u:9382: līlayā kalpayām āsa citrās saṅkalpajāḥ prajāḥ / nānācārasamārambhā gandharvo nagaraṃ yathā //MU_4,26.49//
GSP27moksop_u:9383: tāsāṃ svargāpavargārthaṃ dharmakāmārthasiddhaye / anantāni vicitrāṇi śāstrāṇi samakalpayat //MU_4,26.50//
GSP27moksop_u:9384: sṛṣṭir evam iyaṃ rāma sarge 'smin sthitim āgatā / viriñcarūpān manasaḥ puṣpalakṣmīr madhor iva //MU_4,26.51//
GSP27moksop_u:9385: vividhaviracanaiḥ kriyāvilāsaiḥ kamalajarūpadhareṇa cetasaiva / raghusuta parikalpanena nītā sthitim atulāṃ jagatīha sargalakṣmīḥ //MU_4,26.52//
GSP27moksop_u:9388: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃsampannam evaitan nakiñcid api saṃsthitam / śūnyam eva nabhomātraṃ manovilasitaṃ param //MU_4,27.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9389: na deśakālāv etena brahmāṇḍenāvṛtau kvacit / manāg api mahārūpavatāpy ākāśarūpiṇā //MU_4,27.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9390: etat saṅkalpamātrātma svapnadṛṣṭapuropamam / yatraitat tatra niśśūnyaṃ kevalaṃ vyoma saṃsthitam //MU_4,27.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9391: abhittirāgaracanam api dṛṣṭam asanmayam / akṛtaṃ kṛtam evaitad vyomni citraṃ vicitrakam //MU_4,27.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9392: manasā kalpitaṃ sarvaṃ dehādibhuvanatrayam / saṃsṛtau kāraṇaṃ caitac cakṣur ālokane yathā //MU_4,27.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9393: ābhāsamātraṃ hi jagad ghaṭāvaṭapaṭakramaiḥ / āvartate na sadrūpāḥ pṛthak kuḍyādayas sthitāḥ //MU_4,27.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9394: manasedaṃ śarīraṃ hi nivāsārthaṃ prakalpitam / krimiṇā kośakāreṇa svātmakośa iva svayam //MU_4,27.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9395: na tad asti na yan nāma cetas saṅkalpamantharam / na karoti na cāpnoti durgam apy atiduṣkaram //MU_4,27.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9396: sarvaśaktau pare deve kā nāma nanu śaktayaḥ / na sambhavanty āvriyate yābhir antar manoguhā //MU_4,27.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9397: sattāsatte padārthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sarvadaiva hi / mahābāho sambhavatas sarvaśaktau vibhau sati //MU_4,27.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9398: paśya bhāvanayā prāptaṃ manasā pādmajaṃ vapuḥ / tasmāt tatkalanaṃ rāma sarvaśaktiyutaṃ viduḥ //MU_4,27.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9399: svasaṅkalpaiḥ kṛtās sarge devāsuranarācarāḥ / svasaṅkalpopaśamane śāmyanty asnehadīpavat //MU_4,27.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9400: ākāśasadṛśaṃ sarvaṃ kalpanāmātrajṛmbhitam / jagat paśya mahābuddhe sudīrghaṃ svapnam utthitam //MU_4,27.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9401: na jāyate na mriyate iha kaścit kadācana / pāramārthyena sumate mithyā sarvaṃ pravartate //MU_4,27.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9402: na vṛddhim eti no nāśaṃ yatra kiñcit kadācana / rekhātaruvane tatra kasya nāma ca khaṇḍanā //MU_4,27.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9403: bhramabhūtaṃ svakāyaṃ tvam apaśyan nipuṇaṃ dṛśā / rāghavāghahatasvāntaḥ kim ajña iva bhāṣase //MU_4,27.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9404: mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā tāpān manaso 'tiśayāt tathā / asanta eva dṛśyante sarve brahmādayo 'py amī //MU_4,27.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9405: dvicandravibhramaprakhyā manorathavad utthitāḥ / mithyājñānamayās sarve jagaty ākārarāśayaḥ //MU_4,27.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9406: yathā nauyāyino mithyā sthāṇuspandamatis tathā / asatyaivotthitā nityam ākārāṇāṃ paramparā //MU_4,27.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9407: indrajālam idaṃ viddhi māyāracitapañjaram / manomanananirmāṇaṃ na san nāsad iva sthitam //MU_4,27.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9408: brahmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam anyatāyās tv ataḥ kutaḥ / prasaṅgaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ko 'sau kva cāsau paritiṣṭhati //MU_4,27.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9409: ayaṃ girir ayaṃ sthāṇur ity āḍambaravibhramaḥ / manaso bhāvanādārḍhyād asat sad iva lakṣyate //MU_4,27.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9410: prapañcacaturārambham antas tuccham idaṃ jagat / sakāmatṛṣṇāmananaṃ tyaktvānyad rāma bhāvaya //MU_4,27.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9411: yathā svapne mahārambho bhrāntir eva na vastusat / dīrghasvapnaṃ tathaivedaṃ viddhi cittopakalpitam //MU_4,27.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9412: dṛśyamānamahābhogaṃ gṛhyamāṇam avastukam / kośam āśābhujaṅgīnāṃ saṃsārāḍambaraṃ tyaja //MU_4,27.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9413: asad etad iti jñātvā mātra bhāvaṃ niveśaya / anudhāvati kaḥ prājño vijñāya mṛgatṛṣṇikām //MU_4,27.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9414: svasaṅkalpottharūpāḍhyāṃ manorathamayīṃ striyam / yo 'nugacchati mūḍhātmā duḥkhasyaiva sa bhājanam //MU_4,27.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9415: vastuny asati loko 'yaṃ yātu kāmam avastuni / yas tu vastu parityajya yāty avastu sa naśyati //MU_4,27.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9416: manovyāmoha evedaṃ rajjvām ahibhayaṃ yathā / bhāvanāmātravaicitryāc ciram āvartate jagat //MU_4,27.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9417: asadabhyuditair bhāvair jalāntaścandracañcalaiḥ / vañcyate bāla eveha na tattvajño bhavādṛśaḥ //MU_4,27.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9418: ya imaṃ guṇasaṅghātaṃ bhāvayan sukham īhate / pramārṣṭi sa jaḍo jāḍyaṃ vahnāv appratibimbite //MU_4,27.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9419: asad evedam ābhogi dṛśyate dṛśyapañjaram / manomanananirmāṇaṃ hṛdaye nagaraṃ yathā //MU_4,27.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9420: idaṃ cittecchayodeti līyate ca tadicchayā / mithyaiva dṛśyate sphāraṃ gandharvanagaraṃ yathā //MU_4,27.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9421: rāma naṣṭe jagaty asmin na kiñcid api naśyati / yukte 'pi ca jagaty asmin na kiñcid api yujyate //MU_4,27.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9422: manaḥprakalpite bhagne hṛdi vistīrṇapattane / vṛddhiṃ vopagate brūhi kiṃ vṛddhaṃ kasya kiṃ kṣataṃ //MU_4,27.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9423: krīḍārthena yathodeti bālānāṃ hṛdi pattanam / manasā tadvad evedam udety avirataṃ jagat //MU_4,27.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9424: na kiñcit kasyacin naṣṭam indrajālajale yathā / bhraṣṭe naṣṭe tathaivāsmin saṃsāre vibhavotthite //MU_4,27.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9425: yad asat tad asat syāc cet tat kiṃ kasya kila kṣatam / ato harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ saṃsāro nāma nāspadam //MU_4,27.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9426: asad eva yad atyantaṃ tasmin kiṃ nāma naśyati / nāśābhāve hi duḥkhasya kaḥ prasaṅgo mahāmate //MU_4,27.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9427: sad eva vā yad atyantaṃ tasya kiṃ nāma naśyati / brahmaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sukhaduḥkhe kim utthite //MU_4,27.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9428: sarvatrāsatyabhūte 'smin prapañcaikāntakāriṇi / saṃsāre kim upādeyaṃ prājño yad abhivāñchatu //MU_4,27.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9429: sarvatra satyabhūte 'smin brahmatattvamaye 'pi ca / kiṃ syāt tribhuvane heyaṃ prājñāḥ pariharantu yat //MU_4,27.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9430: asat sad vā jagaj jñasya tenāsau sukhaduḥkhayoḥ / agamya eva mūrkhas tu tṛtīyāṃśena duḥkhitaḥ //MU_4,27.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9431: ādāv ante 'pi yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi san na tat / yo 'bhivāñchaty asad rāma tasyāsattaiva śiṣyate //MU_4,27.44//
GSP27moksop_u:9432: ādāv ante ca yat satyaṃ vartamāne sad eva tat / yasya sarvaṃ sad eva syāt tasya sattaiva śiṣyate //MU_4,27.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9433: asatyabhūtaṃ toyāntaś candravyomalatādikam / bālā evābhivāñchanti manomohāya nottamāḥ //MU_4,27.46//
GSP27moksop_u:9434: bālo hi vitatākārair vasturiktaiḥ prayojanaiḥ / santoṣam ety anantāya duḥkhāya na sukhāya tu //MU_4,27.47//
GSP27moksop_u:9435: tasmān mā bhava bālas tvaṃ rāma rājīvalocana / anityatām ihālokya nityam āśraya susthiram //MU_4,27.48//
GSP27moksop_u:9436: asad idam akhilaṃ mayā sametaṃ tv iti vigaṇayya viṣāditāstu mā te / sad iha hi sakalaṃ mayā sametaṃ tv iti ca vilokya viṣāditāstu mā te //MU_4,27.49//
GSP27moksop_u:9437: vālmīkiḥ: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma / snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_4,27.50//
GSP27moksop_u:9440: vasiṣṭhaḥ: naṣṭe dhane 'tha dārādau śokasyāvasaro 'tra kaḥ / indrajāle kṣaṇād dṛṣṭe naṣṭe kā paridevanā //MU_4,28.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9441: gandharvanagarasyārdhe bhūṣite dūṣite 'tha vā / avidyāṃśe sutādau vā kaḥ kramas sukhaduḥkhayoḥ //MU_4,28.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9442: prāpte dhane 'tha dārādau harṣasyāvasaro hi kaḥ / vṛddhāyāṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ kim ānando jalārthinaḥ //MU_4,28.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9443: dhanadāreṣu vṛddheṣu duḥkhaṃ yuktaṃ na tuṣṭatā / vṛddhāyāṃ mohamāyāyāṃ kas samāśvāsavān iha //MU_4,28.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9444: yair eva jāyate rāgo mūrkhasyādhikatāṃ gataiḥ / tair eva bhogaiḥ prājñasya virāga upajāyate //MU_4,28.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9445: apāradarśino mūḍhā bhogair āyānti tuṣṭatām / pārāvalokinas tv etair virāgaṃ yānti sādhavaḥ //MU_4,28.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9446: ato rāghava tattvajño vyavahāreṣu saṃsṛteḥ / naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam upekṣasva prāptaṃ prāptam upāhara //MU_4,28.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9447: anāgatānāṃ bhogānām avāñchanam akṛtrimam / āgatānāṃ ca sambhoga iti paṇḍitalakṣaṇam //MU_4,28.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9448: saṃsārasambhrame hy asmiṃś channātmany ātatāyini / tathā vihara sambuddho yathā nāyāsi mūḍhatām //MU_4,28.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9449: saṃsārāḍambarasyāsya prapañcaracite krame / samyak samaṃ na paśyanti ye hatās te kubuddhayaḥ //MU_4,28.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9450: yayā kayācid yuktyeha yasya dṛśyagatāratiḥ / parimajjati tasyācchā na kvacin nirmalā matiḥ //MU_4,28.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9451: yasyāsad idam ity āsthā nivṛttā sarvavastuṣu / kroḍīkaroti sarvajñaṃ nāvidyā tam avāstavī //MU_4,28.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9452: ahaṃ jagac caikam idaṃ sarvam eveti yasya dhīḥ / āsthānāsthe parityajya saṃsthitā sa na majjati //MU_4,28.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9453: śuddhaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ padaṃ buddhyāvalambya ca / sabāhyābhyantaraṃ viśvaṃ mā gṛhāṇa vimuñca mā //MU_4,28.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9454: atyantavitatas svacchas sarvavān sarvavarjitaḥ / vyomavat tiṣṭha nīrāgaṃ rāma kāryakaro 'pi san //MU_4,28.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9455: yasya necchā na cānicchā jñasya karmaṇi tiṣṭhataḥ / na tasya lipyate prajñā padmapattram ivāmbubhiḥ //MU_4,28.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9456: darśanasparśanādīni mā karotu karotu vā / tavendriyagaṇo gauṇas tvam aniccho bhavātmavān //MU_4,28.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9457: mamedam ity asadbhūte indriyārthe bhavanmanaḥ / mā nimajjatv amagnaṃ san mā karotu karotu vā //MU_4,28.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9458: yadi te nendriyārthaśrīs svadate hṛdi rāghava / tad asi jñātavijñānas samuttīrṇo bhavārṇavāt //MU_4,28.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9459: asvāditendriyārthasya satanor atanor api / anicchato 'pi sampannā muktir arthavaśāt tava //MU_4,28.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9460: uccaiḥpadāya parayā prajñayā vāsanāgaṇāt / puṣpād gandham ivodāraṃ ceto rāma pṛthak kuru //MU_4,28.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9461: saṃsārāmbunidhāv asmin vāsanāmbupariplute / ye prajñānāvam ārūḍhās te tīrṇā bruḍitāḥ pare //MU_4,28.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9462: kṣuradhārāgraśitayā dhiyā paramadhīrayā / pravicāryātmanas tattvaṃ tat tvaṃ svaṃ padam āviśa //MU_4,28.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9463: yathā tattvavidaḥ prājñā jñānabṛṃhitacetasaḥ / viharanti tathā rāma vihartavyaṃ na mūḍhavat //MU_4,28.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9464: jīvanmuktā mahātmāno nityatṛptā mahāśayāḥ / ācārair anugantavyā na bhogakṛpaṇāś śaṭhāḥ //MU_4,28.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9465: na tyajanti na vāñchanti vyavahāraṃ jagadgatam / sarvam evānuvartante parāvaravido janāḥ //MU_4,28.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9466: prabhāvasyābhimānasya guṇānāṃ yaśasaś śriyaḥ / na kvacit kṛpaṇā loke mahāntas tattvadarśinaḥ //MU_4,28.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9467: suśūnye 'pi na khidyante devodyāne nasaṅginaḥ / niyatiṃ ca na muñcanti mahānto bhāskarā iva //MU_4,28.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9468: vigatecchā yathāprāptavyavahārānuvartinaḥ / vicaranty asamunnaddhās svasthā deharathasthitāḥ //MU_4,28.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9469: tvam api prāptavān rāma vivekam imam āgatam / prajñābalena cānena jāne svastho 'si sundara //MU_4,28.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9470: spaṣṭāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya nirmāno gatamatsaraḥ / viharāsmin bhuvaḥ pīṭhe parāṃ siddhim avāpsyasi //MU_4,28.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9471: svasthas sarvehitatyāgī dūrālokitavāñchanaḥ / parāṃ śītalatām antar ādāya viharānagha //MU_4,28.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9472: vālmīkiḥ: itthaṃ girā vimalayā vimalāśayasya rāmo munes sa parimṛṣṭa ivābabhāse / jñānāmṛtena madhureṇa virājatāntaḥ pūrṇaś śaśāṅka iva śītalatāṃ jagāma //MU_4,28.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9475: rāmaḥ: bhagavan sarvadharmajña vedavedāntapāraga / āśvasta iva tiṣṭhāmi śuddhābhir bhavaduktibhiḥ //MU_4,29.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9476: udārāṇi viraktāni peśalāny ucitāni ca / śrotuṃ tṛptiṃ na gacchāmi vacāṃsi vadatas tava //MU_4,29.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9477: jātyā rājasasāttvikyāḥ kathanāvasarāntare / utpattir bhavatā proktā bhagavan padmajanmanaḥ //MU_4,29.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9478: atrāyaṃ mama sandeho mahātman hṛdi vartate / sarvasaṃśayavicchedakārinn āśu tad ucyatām //MU_4,29.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9479: kvacid abjāt kvacid vyomnaḥ kvacid aṇḍāt kvacij jalāt / citrotpattiḥ kathaṃ proktā śāstre kamalajanmanaḥ //MU_4,29.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9480: vasiṣṭhaḥ: bahūni brahmalakṣyāṇi śaṅkarendraśatāni ca / nārāyaṇasahasrāṇi samatītāni rāghava //MU_4,29.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9481: adyānyeṣu vicitreṣu brahmāṇḍeṣu ca bhūriṣu / nānācāravihārāṇi viharanti sahasraśaḥ //MU_4,29.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9482: tulyakālam ananteṣu kālāntarabhaveṣu ca / jagatsu prodbhaviṣyanti bahūny anyāni bhūriśaḥ //MU_4,29.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9483: teṣām abjodbhavādīnāṃ teṣv aṇḍeṣu divaukasām / utpattayo mahābāho vicitrāḥ kathitā divi //MU_4,29.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9484: kadācit sṛṣṭayaś śārvyaḥ kadācit padmajodbhavāḥ / kadācid api vaiṣṇavyaḥ kadācin muninirmitāḥ //MU_4,29.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9485: kadācid abjajo brahmā kadācit salilodbhavaḥ / aṇḍodbhavaḥ kadācic ca kadācij jāyate 'mbarāt //MU_4,29.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9486: kasmiṃścid aṇḍe tryakṣo 'rkaḥ kasmiṃścid api vāsavaḥ / kasmiṃścit puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ kasmiṃścit tryakṣa eva hi //MU_4,29.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9487: kasyāñcid bhūr abhūt sṛṣṭau nīrandhratarusaṅkaṭā / kasyāñcin naranīrandhrā kasyāñcid bhūdharāvṛtā //MU_4,29.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9488: bhūr abhūn mṛṇmayī kācit kācid āsīd dṛṣanmayī / āsīd dhemamayī kācit kācin māṃsamayī tathā //MU_4,29.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9489: ihaiva kānicit tāni jaganty anyāny athānyathā / anyo'nyaikaikalokāni nirvedhāṃsy api kānicit //MU_4,29.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9490: anantāni jaganty asmin brahmatattvamahāmbare / ambhodhivīcivrajavan nimajjanty udbhavanti ca //MU_4,29.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9491: yathā taraṅgā jaladhau mṛgatṛṣṇā marau yathā / kusumāni yathā cūte tathā viśvaśriyaḥ pare //MU_4,29.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9492: bhānor gaṇayituṃ śakyā raśmiṣu trasareṇavaḥ / ālolavapuṣo brahmatattve na jagatāṃ gaṇāḥ //MU_4,29.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9493: yathā maṣakajālāni varṣāsv ikṣuvanāliṣu / utpatyotpatya naśyanti tathemā lokasṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_4,29.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9494: na ca vijñāyate kasmāt kālāt prabhṛti cāgatāḥ / nityāgamāpāyaparā etās sargaparamparāḥ //MU_4,29.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9495: anādimatyo 'virataṃ prasphuranti taraṅgavat / pūrvāt pūrvaṃ kilābhūvaṃs tataḥ pūrvataraṃ tathā //MU_4,29.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9496: bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyante surāsuranarādikāḥ / sarittaraṅgabhaṅgyaitās samastā bhūtajātayaḥ //MU_4,29.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9497: yathedam aṇḍaṃ vairiñcaṃ tathā brahmāṇḍapaṅktayaḥ / sahasraśaḥ parikṣīṇā nālikā vatsareṣv iva //MU_4,29.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9498: anyās samprati vidyante vartamānaśarīrakāḥ / pāre brahmapurasyāsya vitate brahmaṇaḥ pade //MU_4,29.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9499: brahmaṇy anyā bhaviṣyanti bahvyo brahmapuraśriyaḥ / purastāc ca vinaṅkṣyanti bhūtvā bhūtvā yathā giraḥ //MU_4,29.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9500: brahmaṇy anyā bhaviṣyantyas sthitās sargaparamparāḥ / ghaṭā iva mṛdo rāśāv aṅkure pallavā iva //MU_4,29.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9501: yāvatsamudraṃ jaladhau yathā jalarayormayaḥ / yāvadbrahma cidākāśe tathā tribhuvanaśriyaḥ //MU_4,29.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9502: sphārākāravikārāḍhyāḥ prekṣyamāṇā na kiñcana / unmajjantyo nimajjantyo na satyā nāpy asacchriyaḥ //MU_4,29.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9503: jaḍā rasānvitās tanvyas tāś śevālalatā iva / taraṅgasamadharmiṇyo dṛṣṭanaṣṭaśarīrikāḥ //MU_4,29.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9504: sarvāsāṃ sṛṣṭikoṭīnāṃ citrācāraviceṣṭitāḥ / citrākāravikārāś ca citrarūpāś ca sṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_4,29.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9505: vyatiriktā na sarveśāt samagrās sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ / tattvajñaviṣayā rāma salilād iva vṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_4,29.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9506: āyānti sṛṣṭayo devāj jaladād iva vṛṣṭayaḥ / tasmād evākhilā jātā ālokād iva dṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_4,29.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9507: vyatiriktā na sarveśāt samastās sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ / vyatiriktā ivābhānti svāṣṭhīlāś śalmaler iva //MU_4,29.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9508: iha sṛṣṭiṣu puṣṭāsu nikṛṣṭāsu ca rāghava / paramān nabhaso jātatanmātramalamālitam //MU_4,29.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9509: kadācit prathamaṃ vyoma pratiṣṭhām upagacchati / tataḥ prajāyate brahmā vyomajo 'sau prajāpatiḥ //MU_4,29.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9510: kadācit prathamaṃ vāyuḥ pratiṣṭhām upagacchati / tataḥ prajāyate brahmā vāyujo 'sau prajāpatiḥ //MU_4,29.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9511: kadācit prathamaṃ vāri sphāratām adhigacchati / tataḥ prajāyate brahmā jalajo 'sau prajāpatiḥ //MU_4,29.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9512: kadācit prathamaṃ pṛthvī sphāratām adhigacchati / tataḥ prajāyate brahmā pārthivo 'sau prajāpatiḥ //MU_4,29.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9513: iti catvāri sampīḍya pañcamaṃ vardhate yadā / tadā tajjatayaiveśaḥ kurute jāgatīṃ kriyām //MU_4,29.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9514: kadācid apsu vāyau vā susphāre vāpi tejasi / svayaṃ sampadyate kaścit pumān prakṛtibhāvataḥ //MU_4,29.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9515: tasyātha puṃso vadanāt kadācij jāyate padāt / kadācid aṃsāt pṛṣṭhād vā kadācil locanāt karāt //MU_4,29.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9516: kadācit puruṣasyāsya nābheḥ padmaḥ prajāyate / tasmin sañcarate brahmā padmajo 'sau prakīrtitaḥ //MU_4,29.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9517: māyeyaṃ svapnavad bhrāntir mithyāracitacakrikā / manorājyarucir lolā salilāvṛttisundarī //MU_4,29.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9518: kim ivāsyāṃ vada jñaptau kathaṃ sambhavatīha no / na ced bālamanorājyam idaṃ paryanuyujyate //MU_4,29.44//
GSP27moksop_u:9519: kadācid ambare śuddhe manastattvānurañjanāt / sauvarṇaṃ brahmagarbhaṃ ca svayam aṇḍaṃ pravartate //MU_4,29.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9520: kadācid eṣa puruṣo vīryaṃ sṛjati vāriṇi / tasmāt prajāyate padmaṃ brahmāṇḍam atha vā mahat //MU_4,29.46//
GSP27moksop_u:9521: tasmāt prajāyate brahmā kadācid bhāskaro hy asau / kadācid varuṇo brahmā kadācid vāyur abjajaḥ //MU_4,29.47//
GSP27moksop_u:9522: evam antarvihīnāsu vicitrāsv iha sṛṣṭiṣu / vicitrotpattayo rāma brahmaṇo vividhā gatāḥ //MU_4,29.48//
GSP27moksop_u:9523: nidarśanārthaṃ sṛṣṭes tu mayaikasya prajāpateḥ / bhavate kathitotpattir asyevānyasya vānagha //MU_4,29.49//
GSP27moksop_u:9524: manovijṛmbhaṇam ayaṃ saṃsāra iti sanmate / sambodhanāya bhavatas sṛṣṭikrama udāhṛtaḥ //MU_4,29.50//
GSP27moksop_u:9525: tās sāttvikīprabhṛtayo jātayas tv ittham āgatāḥ / iti te kathanāyaiṣa sṛṣṭikrama udāhṛtaḥ //MU_4,29.51//
GSP27moksop_u:9526: punas sṛṣṭiḥ punar nāśaḥ punar duḥkhaṃ punas sukham / punar ajñāḥ punas tajjñā bandhamokṣadṛśau punaḥ //MU_4,29.52//
GSP27moksop_u:9527: punaḥ punas sṛṣṭikarāḥ pītasnehadaśābhṛtaḥ / dīpā iva kṛtālokāḥ praśāmyanty udbhavanti ca //MU_4,29.53//
GSP27moksop_u:9528: dehotpattau vināśe ca dīpānāṃ brahmaṇām api / kālenādhikatāṃ tyaktvā nāśe bhedo na kaścana //MU_4,29.54//
GSP27moksop_u:9529: punaḥ kṛtaṃ punas tretā punaś ca dvāparaḥ kaliḥ / punar āvartate sarvaṃ cakrāvartehayā jagat //MU_4,29.55//
GSP27moksop_u:9530: punar manvantarārambhāḥ punaḥ kalpaparamparāḥ / punaḥ punaḥ kāryadaśāḥ prātaḥ prātar ahar yathā //MU_4,29.56//
GSP27moksop_u:9531: lokālokakalākālakalanākalitāntaram / punaḥ punar idaṃ sarvaṃ na kiñcana punaḥ punaḥ //MU_4,29.57//
GSP27moksop_u:9532: anāhate pratapte 'yaḥpiṇḍe 'nalakaṇā iva / ime bhāvās sthitā nityaṃ cidākāśe svabhāvataḥ //MU_4,29.58//
GSP27moksop_u:9533: kadācid anabhivyaktaṃ kadācid vyaktim āgatam / idam asti pare tattve sarvaṃ vṛkṣa ivārtavam //MU_4,29.59//
GSP27moksop_u:9534: citspanda eva sarvātmā sarvadaivedṛśākṛtiḥ / yad asmāj jāyate sargo dvīndutvam iva locanāt //MU_4,29.60//
GSP27moksop_u:9535: citas sarvās samāyānti santatās sṛṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ / tatsthā evāpy atatsthābhāś candrād iva marīcayaḥ //MU_4,29.61//
GSP27moksop_u:9536: na kadācana saṃsāraḥ kilāyaṃ nāma sarvadā / sarvaśaktāv asaṃsāraśaktitā vidyate yataḥ //MU_4,29.62//
GSP27moksop_u:9537: na caivedaṃ kadācit tu sādho jagad anīdṛśam / sarvaśaktau hi saṃsāraśaktitā vidyate yataḥ //MU_4,29.63//
GSP27moksop_u:9538: mahākalpāvadhiṃ kālam asaṃsāritayeddhayā / na bhaviṣyati saṃsāra idānīm iti yujyate //MU_4,29.64//
GSP27moksop_u:9539: jñadṛṣṭyā sarvam evedaṃ brahmaiveti mahāmate / nāsti saṃsāra ity etad upapadyata eva naḥ //MU_4,29.65//
GSP27moksop_u:9540: ajñadṛṣṭyā tv avicchinnasaṃsāritvād anāratam / nityā saṃsāramāyeyam ity asyaivopapadyate //MU_4,29.66//
GSP27moksop_u:9541: punaḥ punaś ca bhāvitvān na kadācid anīdṛśam / jagad ity etad apy uktaṃ na mṛṣā raghunandana //MU_4,29.67//
GSP27moksop_u:9542: anārataṃ patadbhūtā diśo dṛṣṭvā vinaśvarīḥ / vināśīdaṃ jagat sarvam iti kiṃ nopapadyate //MU_4,29.68//
GSP27moksop_u:9543: sarvadoditacandrārkā diśo dṛṣṭvā sthirācalāḥ / avināśi jagat sarvam ity apy avitathopamam //MU_4,29.69//
GSP27moksop_u:9544: na tad asti na yat tasminn ekasmin vitatātmani / saṅkalpakalanājālam anākhye nopapadyate //MU_4,29.70//
GSP27moksop_u:9545: punaḥ punar idaṃ sarvaṃ punar maraṇajanmanī / punas sukhaṃ punar duḥkhaṃ punaḥ karaṇakarmaṇī //MU_4,29.71//
GSP27moksop_u:9546: punar āśāḥ punar vyoma punas sāmbudhayo 'drayaḥ / abhyudeti punas sṛṣṭiś śaśvad arkaprabhā yathā //MU_4,29.72//
GSP27moksop_u:9547: punar daityāḥ punar devāḥ punar lokāntarakramaḥ / punas svargāpavargehā punar indraḥ punaś śaśī //MU_4,29.73//
GSP27moksop_u:9548: punar nārāyaṇo devaḥ punar manusutādayaḥ / punar āśāś calaccārucandrārkavaruṇānilāḥ //MU_4,29.74//
GSP27moksop_u:9550: vyomakānanam ākramya valgaty aṃśunakhotkaraiḥ / tamaḥkarighaṭā bhettuṃ punar bhāskarakesarī //MU_4,29.76//
GSP27moksop_u:9551: punar induś calaccūtamañjarīsundaraiḥ karaiḥ / karoty amṛtam āhlādaṃ digvadhūmukhamaṇḍanam //MU_4,29.77//
GSP27moksop_u:9552: punas svargataroḥ puṇyakṣayavātasamīritāḥ / patantīha vinunnāṅgāḥ puṇyakṛtphalapālayaḥ //MU_4,29.78//
GSP27moksop_u:9553: punaḥ kāryakriyāpakṣais saṃsārārambhanāmakam / kiñcit paṭapaṭaṃ kṛtvā yāti kālakapiñjalaḥ //MU_4,29.79//
GSP27moksop_u:9554: punar indrālike yāte rājyam āsvādya kesaram / āyāty aparadevendraṣaṭpadas svargapaṅkajam //MU_4,29.80//
GSP27moksop_u:9555: punaḥ kālaṃ kṛtāpūtaṃ kaluṣīkurute kaliḥ / sacakriṇam ivāmbhodhiṃ pravṛddho 'vakarānilaḥ //MU_4,29.81//
GSP27moksop_u:9556: punaḥ kālakulālena kṛtabhūtaśarāvakam / cakram āvartate vegād ajasraṃ kālanāmakam //MU_4,29.82//
GSP27moksop_u:9557: punar nīrasatām eti jagad dhvastaśubhasthiti / abhyāśībhūtakalpāntaṃ saṃśuṣkam iva kānanam //MU_4,29.83//
GSP27moksop_u:9558: punar arkagaṇāṃśvagnidagdhānantakalevaram / sarvabhūtāsthisampūrṇaṃ jagad eti śmaśānatām //MU_4,29.84//
GSP27moksop_u:9559: punaḥ kulācalākārapuṣkarāvartavarṣaṇaiḥ / nṛtyadbhasmabṛhatphenāṃ yāty ekārṇavatāṃ jagat //MU_4,29.85//
GSP27moksop_u:9560: punas saṃśāntavāyvambu riktaṃ sakalavastubhiḥ / tadapūrvam ivākāśaṃ jagad āyāti śūnyatām //MU_4,29.86//
GSP27moksop_u:9561: punaḥ katipayā bhuktvā samās samarasāśayaḥ / jīvitaṃ jīrṇayā tanvā brahmādhyātmani līyate //MU_4,29.87//
GSP27moksop_u:9562: punar anyena kālena tathaiva jagatāṃ gaṇam / manas tanoti vai śūnye gandharvo nagaraṃ yathā //MU_4,29.88//
GSP27moksop_u:9563: punas sargasamārambhaḥ punaḥ pralayasambhavaḥ / sarvaṃ punar idaṃ rāma cakravat parivartate //MU_4,29.89//
GSP27moksop_u:9564: kim etasmin mahāmāyāḍambare dīrghaśambare / rāma satyam asatyaṃ vā nirṇīya yad ihocyate //MU_4,29.90//
GSP27moksop_u:9565: dāśūrākhyāyikeveyaṃ rāma saṃsāracakrikā / kalpanāracitākārā vastuśūnyā tu vastutaḥ //MU_4,29.91//
GSP27moksop_u:9566: aviralam idam ātataṃ vikalpair asaduditākṛtibhir dvicandrakalpaiḥ / viracitam asatā tu yan na sat taj jagad iha tena vimūḍhatā kimutthā //MU_4,29.92//
GSP27moksop_u:9569: vasiṣṭhaḥ: kriyāviśeṣabahulā bhogaiśvaryahatāśayāḥ / nāvekṣante yadā satyaṃ na paśyanti śaṭhās tadā //MU_4,30.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9570: ye tu pāraṃ gatā buddher indriyair na vaśīkṛtāḥ / ta etāṃ jāgatīṃ māyāṃ paśyanti karabilvavat //MU_4,30.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9571: nanu tāṃ jāgatīṃ māyāṃ jīvo dṛṣṭvā vicāravān / ahaṅkāramayīṃ āsthāṃ tyajaty ahir iva tvacam //MU_4,30.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9572: asaktatāṃ tato 'bhyetya punar nāma na jāyate / kṣetre 'pi suciraṃ tiṣṭhad bījaṃ dagdham ivāgninā //MU_4,30.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9573: ādhivyādhiparītāya prātar vādya vināśine / prayatante śarīrāya hitam ajñās tu nātmane //MU_4,30.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9574: tvam apy ajñavad ajñasya śarīrasya samīhitam / mā sampādaya duḥkhāya bhavātmaikaparāyaṇaḥ //MU_4,30.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9575: rāmaḥ: dāśūrākhyāyikeveyaṃ nāma saṃsāracakrikā / kalpanāracitākārā vastuśūnyeti kiṃ prabho //MU_4,30.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9576: vasiṣṭhaḥ: jaganmāyāsvarūpasya varṇanāvyapadeśataḥ / dāśūrākhyāyikāṃ rāma varṇyamānāṃ mayā śṛṇu //MU_4,30.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9577: asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe vicitrakusumadrumaḥ / magadhā nāma vikhyātaś śrīmāñ janapado mahān //MU_4,30.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9585: tasmin nagavare puṇye vicitravihagadrume / kaścit paramadharmātmā munir āsīn mahātapāḥ //MU_4,30.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9586: dāśūranāmā mahatā tapoyogena saṃyutaḥ / kadambapṛṣṭhavāstavyo vītarāgo mahāmatiḥ //MU_4,30.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9587: rāmaḥ: ṛṣis tapasvī bhagavan vipine kena hetunā / kathaṃ vāpy avasat pṛṣṭhe kadambasya mahātaroḥ //MU_4,30.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9588: vasiṣṭhaḥ: śaralometi vikhyātaḥ pitā tasya babhūva ha / nāmnāpara iva brahmā tasminn evāvasad girau //MU_4,30.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9589: tasyāsāv ekaputro 'bhūt kaco devaguror iva / tena sārdhaṃ sa putreṇa nītavāñ jīvitaṃ vane //MU_4,30.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9590: athāsau śaralomātra bhuktvā yugagaṇaṃ yayau / tyaktadehas surāgāraṃ tyaktanīḍaḥ khago yathā //MU_4,30.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9591: eka eva vane tasmin dāśūraḥ praruroda ha / daśāpanītapitṛkaḥ karuṇaṃ kuraro yathā //MU_4,30.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9592: mātāpitṛviyogena śokasantāpitāśayaḥ / mlānim abhyāyayau nūnaṃ hemanta iva paṅkajam //MU_4,30.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9593: bālo 'sāv atha dīnātmā vanadevatayā vane / ittham āśvāsito rāma tadādṛśyaśarīrayā //MU_4,30.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9594: ṛṣiputra mahāprājña kim ajña iva rodiṣi / saṃsārasya na kasmāt tvaṃ svarūpaṃ vetsi cañcalam //MU_4,30.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9595: sarvadaivedṛśī sādho saṃsārī saṃsṛtiś calā / jāyate jīvate paścād avaśyaṃ ca vinaśyati //MU_4,30.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9596: yad yat kiñcid dṛśor dṛśyaṃ brahmādikam idaṃ mune / gantavyas tena sarveṇa vināśo nātra saṃśayaḥ //MU_4,30.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9597: tadarthaṃ mā kṛthā vyarthaṃ viṣādaṃ maraṇe pituḥ / avaśyabhāvy astamayo jātasyāharpater iva //MU_4,30.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9598: aśarīrām iti śrutvā giram āraktalocanaḥ / dhairyam āsādayām āsa śikhaṇḍī stanitād iva //MU_4,30.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9599: utthāyāvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā pāścātyaṃ pitur ādṛtaḥ / cakāra tapase buddhiṃ dṛḍhām uttamasiddhaye //MU_4,30.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9600: brāhmeṇa karmaṇā tasya vipine caratas tapaḥ / anantasaṅkalpamayaṃ śrotriyatvaṃ babhūva ha //MU_4,30.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9601: ajñātajñeyabuddhes tu suśrotriyatayā tayā / na viśaśrāma ceto 'sya pavitre 'pi dharātale //MU_4,30.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9602: kevalaṃ sarvam evedam api śuddhaṃ dharātalam / aśuddham iva paśyan sa na reme kvacid eva hi //MU_4,30.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9603: atha saṅkalpayām āsa svasaṅkalpanayaiva saḥ / vṛkṣāgram eva saṃśuddhaṃ sthitir atrocitā mama //MU_4,30.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9604: tad idānīṃ tapas tapsye tapasā yena śākhiṣu / khagavat sthitim āpnomi śākhāsu ca daleṣu ca //MU_4,30.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9605: iti sañcintya sañjvālya hutāśam atibhāsvaram / juhāva tasmin protkṛtya māṃsaṃ svaṃ skandhabhittitaḥ //MU_4,30.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9606: atha gīrvāṇavṛndasya samagrā galabhittayaḥ / manmukhasthena mā yāntu vipramāṃsena bhasmasāt //MU_4,30.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9607: iti sañcintya bhagavān saptārcis tasya dehavān / puro babhūva dīptāṃśur dīptāṃśur vākpater iva //MU_4,30.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9608: uvāca vacanaṃ vīrakumārābhimataṃ varam / gṛhāṇa sthāpitaṃ sādho kośakośān maṇiṃ yathā //MU_4,30.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9609: ity uktavantam analam arghapuṣpopaśobhinā / sampūjya stutivādena prāha viprakumārakaḥ //MU_4,30.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9610: bhagavan bhūtapūrṇāyā bhuvaḥ pāvanam aṅganam / nāpnomi tena vṛkṣāṇām upari sthitir astu me //MU_4,30.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9611: ity ukte muniputreṇa sarvadevamukhaṃ śikhī / evam astu tam ity uktvā jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ //MU_4,30.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9612: tasminn antarhite deve kṣaṇāt sāndhya ivāmbude / pūrṇakāmaḥ kumāro 'sāv āpūrṇendur ivābabhau //MU_4,30.44//
GSP27moksop_u:9613: adhigatābhimatānanamaṇḍaladyutijavena jahāsa sa tuṣṭimān / śaśinam āptakalākulam ambujaṃ vikasitaṃ ca sitaṃ smitaśobhinā //MU_4,30.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9617: mimānam iva dikkukṣīr dīrghair viṭapabāhubhiḥ / ālokayantaṃ kakubho vikāsikusumekṣaṇaiḥ //MU_4,31.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9619: kacchair urugulucchācchamañjarīpuñjapiñjaraiḥ / āsyair iva satāmbūlair hasantam alimālitaiḥ //MU_4,31.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9621: saṅkaṭaṃ viṭapāvalyā kuñjakūjaccakorayā / gāyatkinnarayā siddhavīthyeva jagad uccayā //MU_4,31.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9622: latāpīṭhopaviṣṭānām adholambaiḥ kalāpinām / kalāpaiś śobhitaṃ vyoma sendracāpair ivāmbudaiḥ //MU_4,31.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9623: magnonmagnaiḥ pratiskandhaṃ cāmarair bhāsitaṃ sitaiḥ / cakorānugataiḥ pūrṇais saṃvatsaram ivendubhiḥ //MU_4,31.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9624: kapiñjalakalālāpaiḥ kalakokilakūjitaiḥ / jīvajīvavirāvaiś ca pragāyantam ivorjitaiḥ //MU_4,31.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9625: kādambakakadambaiś ca kulāyakṛtakelibhiḥ / svargakoṭaraviśrāntais siddhair jagad ivāvṛtam //MU_4,31.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9626: pravālāruṇahastābhir alinetrābhir āśritam / apsarobhir iva svargaṃ mañjarībhir itas tataḥ //MU_4,31.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9627: sendracāpaṃ vilolena kusumotkarareṇunā / mañjarīpiñjaraṃ śyāmaṃ vidyutvantam ivāmbudam //MU_4,31.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9629: tale niṣaṇṇanāgendraṃ vyomni tārāgaṇākulam / latāpuṣpamayaṃ madhye bhūmaṇḍalam ivāparam //MU_4,31.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9630: pitāmaham ivāśeṣaśailakānanaśākhinām / phalapallavapuṣpāṇāṃ kośam ekam ivāvanau //MU_4,31.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9631: dadhānaṃ kalikājālaṃ sthagitaṃ puṣpadhūlibhiḥ / kaccheṣv arkakaracchannatārājālam ivāmbaram //MU_4,31.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9632: vilolavihagais skandhaiḥ kulāyakulasaṅkulaiḥ / valitaṃ bhūtalaṃ lolalokair janapadair iva //MU_4,31.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9635: sañcaratpakṣijanataṃ madamantharakoṭaram / sarvāsāṃ vanadevīnām antaḥpuram ivottamam //MU_4,31.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9636: bruḍadbhṛṅgataraṅgaughaiḥ puṣpakesararāśibhiḥ / rājamānaṃ patantībhis saridbhir iva parvatam //MU_4,31.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9637: bhramadbhiḥ puṣpapattraughair mandavātavilāsibhiḥ / vardhamānair vṛtaskandhaṃ śubhrābhrair iva bhūdharam //MU_4,31.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9638: mātaṅgaghaṭaghṛṣṭena jānustambhena pīṭhinā / ābhoginā baddhapadaṃ taṭeneva mahācalam //MU_4,31.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9639: vicitravarṇapakṣāṇāṃ skandhakoṭaracāriṇām / vṛtaṃ khagānāṃ vṛndena bhūtānām iva śṛṅgiṇam //MU_4,31.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9640: stabakāṅgulijālena lolenābhinayakriyām / diśantam iva vallīnāṃ pranṛttānāṃ vanānilaiḥ //MU_4,31.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9641: kaścid eva nirāśo me nārthī cāpaiti tuṣṭitaḥ / nṛtyantam iva puṣpāḍhyair latāvalayavalganaiḥ //MU_4,31.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9643: ārād unmuktakusumaṃ siddhānāṃ vyomacāriṇām / svāgatānīva kurvāṇaṃ kokilālikulāravaiḥ //MU_4,31.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9644: phalapuṣpalatollāsam aunnatyaṃ ca mahīruhām / vihasantam ivācchābhiḥ puṣpakuṭmaladīptibhiḥ //MU_4,31.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9645: pārijātam ivājetum ūrdhvagais skandhamaṇḍalaiḥ / vyomāntar abhidhāvantam alam uddhurakandharam //MU_4,31.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9646: madhyabhāgasphuradbhṛṅgais stabakair ghanapakṣmabhiḥ / sahasrākṣatvam atulair jetum aindram ivodyatam //MU_4,31.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9647: kacatkusumagucchācchaphaṇāmaṇigaṇāvṛtam / pātālād utthitaṃ śeṣam iva vyomadidṛkṣayā //MU_4,31.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9648: rajasoddhūlitākāraṃ dvitīyam iva śaṅkaram / chāyayā phalaśālinyā samastamuniśaṅkaram //MU_4,31.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9649: nibiḍadalanibaddhabhittibhāgaiḥ kusumalatānavamaṇḍapair upetam / puram iva gagane kadambavṛkṣaṃ khagakulanāgarasaṅkaṭaṃ dadarśa //MU_4,31.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9652: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tam athāsau mahābuddhiḥ phalapallavaśālinam / ānandamantharamanāḥ puṣparūpācalopamam //MU_4,32.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9653: kadambaṃ rodasīstambham āruroha vanasthitam / ekārṇavagataṃ śauriḥ kalpavṛkṣam ivonnatam //MU_4,32.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9654: tatrāsau vyomalagnāyāś śākhāyāḥ prāntapallave / viveśādhigatākāśam aiḍūkaprāntabuddhavat //MU_4,32.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9655: athopaviśya mṛduni navapallavaviṣṭare / kṣaṇam ālokitās tena diśaḥ kautukamantharam //MU_4,32.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9663: gaganatalalatādalopaviṣṭaḥ prasṛtavanāvalivārivāhaveṣāḥ / tribhuvanavanitā dadarśa hṛṣṭaḥ kusumanirantaramaṇḍitā daśāśāḥ //MU_4,32.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9666: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tataḥ prabhṛti tatrāsau prasiddhas tāpasāśrame / kadambadāśūra iti śūras tapasi dāruṇe //MU_4,33.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9667: tasmiṃl latādale sthitvā vilokya kakubhaḥ kṣaṇam / dṛḍhaṃ padmāsanaṃ baddhvā digbhyaḥ pratyāhṛtātmanā //MU_4,33.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9668: ajñātaparamārthena kriyāmātre ca tiṣṭhatā / phalakārpaṇyayuktena manasā so 'karon makham //MU_4,33.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9669: nabhogatalatāpattrasaṃsthitena vanāntare / sarvās svamanasā tena kṛtā yajñakriyāḥ kramāt //MU_4,33.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9670: tatrāsau daśa varṣāṇi manasaivāyajat surān / gavāśvanaramedhādyair yajñair vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ //MU_4,33.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9671: kālenāmalatāṃ yāte vitate tasya cetasi / balād avatatārāntar jñānam ātmaprasādajam //MU_4,33.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9672: tato viśīrṇāvaraṇo vigaladvāsanāmalaḥ / avasat pallave tasmin munir vigatakalmaṣaḥ //MU_4,33.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9673: sa dadarśaikadā tasyāṃ latāyām agratas sthitām / vanadevīṃ viśālākṣīm ālolakusumāmbarām //MU_4,33.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9675: tām uvācānavadyāṅgīṃ sa munir vinatānanām / kokilaḥ kusumāpūranatāṃ vanalatām iva //MU_4,33.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9676: kā tvam utpalapattrākṣi parivikṣobhitasmarā / vayasyām iva puṣpāḍhyāṃ latāṃ kim adhitiṣṭhasi //MU_4,33.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9677: ity uktā mṛgaśāvākṣī gaurī pīnapayodharā / munim āha manohāri mugdhākṣaram idaṃ vacaḥ //MU_4,33.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9678: yāni yāni durāpāni vāñchitāni mahītale / prāpyante tāni tāny āśu mahatām eva yācñayā //MU_4,33.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9679: aham asmiṃl latākīrṇe tvatkadambābhyalaṅkṛte / latālīlālayā brahman vipine vanadevatā //MU_4,33.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9680: hyaś caitrasitapakṣasya trayodaśyāṃ smarotsave / babhūva vanadevīnāṃ samājo nandane vane //MU_4,33.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9681: sāmodapuṣpabhramare kokilāliparicchadā / tatrāham agamaṃ nātha trailokyalalanāsadaḥ //MU_4,33.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9682: tato dṛṣṭā mayā sarvā vayasyā madanotsave / aputrayā putrayutās tenāhaṃ duḥkhitā bhṛśam //MU_4,33.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9683: tvayi sarvārthisārthasya bṛhatkalpatarau sthite / anātheva kathaṃ nātha kila śocyāsmy aputrikā //MU_4,33.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9684: dehi me bhagavan putraṃ no ced deham ihāgnaye / prakaromy āhutiṃ putraduḥkhadāhopaśāntaye //MU_4,33.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9685: tām ity uktavatīṃ tanvīṃ vihasya munipuṅgavaḥ / prāha hastagataṃ puṣpaṃ tasyai dattvā dayānvitaḥ //MU_4,33.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9686: gaccha tanvaṅgi māsena pūjārham alilocanam / prasoṣyase sutaṃ kāntaṃ prasūnam iva sallatā //MU_4,33.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9687: kiṃ tv asau maraṇāveśapāpinyetas tvayā yataḥ / yācitaḥ kṛcchrasamprāpyajñānas tena bhaviṣyati //MU_4,33.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9688: ity uktvā sa munis tanvīṃ prasannamukhamaṇḍalām / paricaryāṃ karomīti prārthanotkāṃ vyasarjayat //MU_4,33.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9689: sā jagāmātmasadanaṃ so 'tiṣṭhat svātmanā saha / avahat kramaśaḥ kāla ṛtusaṃvatsarāṅkitaḥ //MU_4,33.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9690: atha dīrgheṇa kālena saivotpalavilocanā / dvādaśābdam upādāya sutaṃ munim upāyayau //MU_4,33.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9691: sampraṇamyopaviśyāgre munim indusamānanā / uvāca kalayā vācā cūtadrumam ivālinī //MU_4,33.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9692: ayaṃ sa bhagavan bhavyaḥ kumāraḥ putra āvayoḥ / kṛto mayā samagrāṇāṃ kalānāṃ kila kovidaḥ //MU_4,33.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9693: prabho kevalam etena jñānaṃ nādhigataṃ śubham / yena saṃsārayantre 'smin na punaḥ paripīḍyate //MU_4,33.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9694: jñānaṃ tvam evāsya vibho kṛpayopadiśādhunā / ko hi nāma kule jātaṃ putraṃ maurkhye niyojayet //MU_4,33.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9695: evaṃvadantīṃ sa munir macchiṣyam abale sutam / ihaiva sthāpayainaṃ tvam ity uktvā tāṃ vyasarjayat //MU_4,33.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9696: tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ sa pitur antevāsitayā tadā / atiṣṭhat saṃyato dhīmān arkasyevāruṇaḥ puraḥ //MU_4,33.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9697: kadarthaprāpyavijñānaṃ tataś citrābhir uktibhiḥ / ciraṃ kālam asau tatra muniḥ putraṃ vyabodhayat //MU_4,33.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9699: anudvegitayā nityaṃ vistareṇa kathākramaiḥ / anubhūtim upārūḍhai rūḍhair atidhiyāṃ dhiyi //MU_4,33.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9700: anubhavavaśato rasātiriktair alam ucitārthavacogaṇair mahātmā / jalada iva śikhaṇḍinaṃ purassthaṃ tanayam abodhayad ambare maharṣiḥ //MU_4,33.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9703: vasiṣṭhaḥ: kadācid atha mārgeṇa tena kailāsavāhinīm / ahaṃ snātum adṛśyātmā vyomavīthigato 'gamam //MU_4,34.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9704: nirgatya nabhasas saptamunimaṇḍalakoṭarāt / rātrau prāpto 'smi sumate dāśūratarupṛṣṭhakham //MU_4,34.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9705: yāvac chṛṇomi viṭapakuharāt kānane vacaḥ / kuṭmalāmbhojabaddhasya ṣaṭpadasyeva nissvanam //MU_4,34.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9706: śṛṇu putra mahābuddhe vastuno 'sya samām imām / varṇayāmi mahāścaryām ekām ākhyāyikāṃ tava //MU_4,34.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9707: asti rājā mahāvīryo vikhyāto bhuvanatraye / nāmnā svottha iti śrīmāñ jagadākramaṇe kṣamaḥ //MU_4,34.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9708: yasyānuśāsanaṃ sarve bhuvaneṣv api nāyakāḥ / śirobhir dhārayanty uccaiś cūḍāmaṇim ivottamam //MU_4,34.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9709: yas sāhasaikarasiko nānāścaryavihāravān / kenacit triṣu lokeṣu na mahātmā vaśīkṛtaḥ //MU_4,34.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9710: yasyārambhasahasrāṇi sukhaduḥkhapradāny alam / saṅkhyātuṃ naiva śakyante kallolā jaladher iva //MU_4,34.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9711: yasya vīryaṃ suvīryasya na śastrāstrair na pāvakaiḥ / kenacid bhuvane krāntam ākāśam iva muṣṭinā //MU_4,34.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9712: yadīyāṃ vitatārambhāṃ līlāṃ nirmāṇabhāsurām / na manāg anukurvanti śakropendraharā api //MU_4,34.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9713: trayas tasya mahābāho dehā digbharaṇakṣamāḥ / jagad ākṛṣya tiṣṭhanti uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ //MU_4,34.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9714: vyomany evātivitate jāto 'sau triśarīrakaḥ / tatraiva ca sthitiṃ yātaś śabdavātakhapakṣivat //MU_4,34.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9715: tatraivāpāragagane nagaraṃ tena nirmitam / caturdaśamahārathyaṃ vibhāgatrayabhūṣitam //MU_4,34.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9718: tasminn evātivipule pattane tena bhūbhṛtā / sañcāriṇo viracitā mugdhāvavarakā gaṇāḥ //MU_4,34.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9719: ūrdhve kecid adhaḥ kecin madhye kecin niyojitāḥ / kecic cireṇa naśyantaḥ kecic chīghravināśinaḥ //MU_4,34.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9722: māyayā racitās tena rājñā teṣu mahāmate / rakṣitāro mahāyakṣā nityam ālokabhīravaḥ //MU_4,34.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9723: athāvavarakaugheṣu calatsu sa mahīpatiḥ / karoti vividhāḥ krīḍā nīḍeṣv iva vihaṅgamaḥ //MU_4,34.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9724: triśarīras sa teṣv antas tair yakṣais saha putraka / līlālasam uṣitvāśu punar niṣkramya gacchati //MU_4,34.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9725: tasyecchā jāyate vatsa kadācic calacetasaḥ / puraṃ bhaviṣyannirmāṇaṃ kiñcid yāmīti niścalā //MU_4,34.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9726: bhūtāviṣṭa ivāvegāt tata utthāya dhāvati / puraṃ tad apy avāpnoti gandharvair iva nirmitam //MU_4,34.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9727: tasyecchā jāyate nāma kadācij jaḍacetasaḥ / vināśaṃ samprayāmīti tenāśu sa vinaśyati //MU_4,34.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9728: punar utpadyate tūrṇaṃ khān mahormir ivāmbhasaḥ / vyavahāraṃ tanoty uccaiḥ punar ārambhamantharam //MU_4,34.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9729: svayaiva vyavahṛtyātha kadācit paridūyate / kiṃ karomīdam ajño 'smi duḥkhito 'smīti śocati //MU_4,34.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9730: mudam etya kadācic ca svayam āyāti pīnatām / prāvṛḍvarṣajalollāsapūrād iva nadīrayaḥ //MU_4,34.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9731: pibati valgati gacchati jṛmbhate sphurati bhāti na bhāti ca bhāsuraḥ / suta mahāmahimā sa mahīpatiḥ patir apām iva vātarayākulaḥ //MU_4,34.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9734: vasiṣṭhaḥ: athāpṛcchat sutas tatra jambudvīpe mahāniśi / kadambāgrāvacūlasthaṃ pitaraṃ pāvanāśayaḥ //MU_4,35.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9735: putraḥ: ko 'sau svottha iti khyāto bhūpas tātottamākṛtiḥ / kathitaṃ ca kim etan me tvayaitad brūhi tattvataḥ //MU_4,35.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9736: kva bhaviṣyati nirmāṇaṃ vartamāne kva gamyatām / ubhayārthaviruddhatvān mohārthāya vacas tava //MU_4,35.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9737: dāśūraḥ: śṛṇu putra yathābhūtam etat te kathayāmy aham / yena saṃsāracakrasya tattvam asyāvabudhyase //MU_4,35.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9738: asadabhyutthitārambham avastumayam ātatam / saṃsārasaṃsthānam idam evam ākathitaṃ mayā //MU_4,35.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9739: paramān nabhaso jātas saṅkalpas svottha ucyate / jāyate svayam evāsau svayam eva vilīyate //MU_4,35.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9740: tatsvarūpam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad ābhogi vidyate / jāyate tena jātena tasmin naṣṭe vinaśyati //MU_4,35.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9741: brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrādīṃs tasyaivāvayavān viduḥ / viṭapān iva vṛkṣasya śṛṅgāṇīva mahībhṛtaḥ //MU_4,35.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9742: śūnye vyomani tenedaṃ nirmitaṃ trijagatpuram / pratibhāsānusandhānamātreṇaitya viriñcatām //MU_4,35.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9743: yatreme vitatālokā lokakośāś caturdaśa / vanopavanapālyaś ca yatrodyānaparamparāḥ //MU_4,35.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9744: krīḍāśikhariṇo yatra sahyamandarameravaḥ / śītoṣṇadīptī candrārkau dīpau yatrānilākṣatau //MU_4,35.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9745: sūryāṃśukacadālolataraṅgottuṅgamauktikāḥ / vahantyas sarito yatra sanmuktāvalayaś calāḥ //MU_4,35.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9746: ikṣukṣīrādisalilā maṇiratnabisāṅkurāḥ / aurvānalāmbujā yatra vāpyas sapta mahārṇavāḥ //MU_4,35.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9747: adha urvyāṃ tathordhve khe puṇyāpuṇyadhanaśriyaḥ / narāmarakirāṭānāṃ yatrātikrayavikrayau //MU_4,35.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9748: tasminn eva jagaty asmin pure saṅkalpabhūbhujā / krīḍārtham ātmanaś citrā dehāvavarakāḥ kṛtāḥ //MU_4,35.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9749: kecid gīrvāṇanāmāna ūrdhva eva niyojitāḥ / naroragādayaḥ kecid adha eva niveśitāḥ //MU_4,35.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9750: vātayantrapravāheṇa calanto māṃsamṛṇmayāḥ / sitāsthidāravaś citrās tvaglepamasṛṇāmalāḥ //MU_4,35.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9751: kecic cireṇa naśyanti kecic chīghravināśinaḥ / kacakṛṣṇolapollāsaracitācchādanaśriyaḥ //MU_4,35.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9754: māyayā racitās teṣu saṅkalpena mahāmate / ahaṅkāramahāyakṣāḥ paramālokabhīravaḥ //MU_4,35.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9755: dehāvavarakeṣv antar mahāhaṅkārayakṣakaiḥ / sa hi saṅkrīḍate 'tyartham asad evāsadutthitaiḥ //MU_4,35.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9756: yathā kusūle mārjāro bhastrāyāṃ bhujago yathā / muktāphalaṃ yathā veṇāv ahaṅkāras tanau tathā //MU_4,35.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9757: kṣaṇam abhyudayaṃ yāti kṣaṇaṃ śāmyati dīpavat / dehageheṣu saṅkalpas taraṅgas sāgareṣv iva //MU_4,35.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9758: bhaviṣyannavanirmāṇam apy āpnoti tadā puram / yadā saṅkalpitaṃ vastu pura eva prapaśyati //MU_4,35.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9759: asaṅkalpanamātreṇa svenaivāśu vinaśyati / śreyase paramāyāsya nāśas svo na tu sambhavaḥ //MU_4,35.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9760: svayaṃ saṅkalpanāmātrāj jāyate bālayakṣavat / anantāyātmaduḥkhāya nānandāya kadācana //MU_4,35.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9761: idaṃ sphāraṃ jagadduḥkhaṃ pratanoty ātmasattayā / asattayā nāśayati kṣaṇam āndhyaṃ yathā tamaḥ //MU_4,35.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9762: svayaiva duḥkhadāyinyā ceṣṭayā pariroditi / kāṣṭhāvaṣṭabdhavṛṣaṇaḥ kīlotpāṭī kapir yathā //MU_4,35.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9763: saṅkalpitānandalavas tiṣṭhaty uddhurakandharam / akasmāt khacyutamadhubindubhuk karabho yathā //MU_4,35.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9764: svayaṃ viratim āyāti kṣaṇam eti ratiṃ kṣaṇam / kṣaṇaṃ vikāram āyāti saṅkalpo 'bhavyabālavat //MU_4,35.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9765: enaṃ sakalabhāvebhyaḥ kṛtvā nirmalam ādarāt / matimantaḥ padaṃ yātā yathā putra tathā kuru //MU_4,35.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9766: trayas tv asyā mater dehā uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ / tamassattvarajassañjñāḥ kāraṇaṃ jagatas sthiteḥ //MU_4,35.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9767: tamorūpo hi saṅkalpo nityaṃ prākṛtaceṣṭayā / parāṃ kṛpaṇatām etya prayāti krimikīṭatām //MU_4,35.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9768: sattvarūpo hi saṅkalpo dharmajñānaparāyaṇaḥ / adūrakevalībhāvas sāmrājyam adhitiṣṭhati //MU_4,35.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9769: rajorūpo hi saṅkalpo lokasaṃvyavahāravān / paritiṣṭhati saṃsāre putradārānurañjitaḥ //MU_4,35.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9770: trividhaṃ tu parityajya rūpam etan mahāmate / saṅkalpaḥ param āyāti padam ātmaparikṣaye //MU_4,35.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9771: sarvā dṛṣṭīḥ parityajya niyamya manasā manaḥ / sabāhyābhyantarārthasya saṅkalpasya kṣayaṃ kuru //MU_4,35.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9772: yadi varṣasahasrāntaṃ tapaś carasi dāruṇam / yadi vā līlayātmānaṃ śilayā cūrṇayasy alam //MU_4,35.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9773: yady ambudhiṃ praviśasi vaḍavāgnim athāpi vā / yadi vā patasi śvabhre khaḍgadhārājale 'tha vā //MU_4,35.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9774: haro yady upadeṣṭā te hariḥ kamalajo 'pi vā / atyantakaruṇākrānto lokanātho 'tha vākpatiḥ //MU_4,35.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9775: pātālasthasya bhūsthasya svargasthasyāpi tat tava / nānyaḥ kaścid upāyo 'sti saṅkalpopaśamād ṛte //MU_4,35.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9776: anādāv avikāre ca sukhe paramapāvane / saṅkalpopaśame yatnaṃ pauruṣeṇa paraṃ kuru //MU_4,35.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9777: saṅkalpatantāv akhilā bhāvāḥ protāḥ kilānagha / bhinne tantau na jāne te kva yānti viśarāravaḥ //MU_4,35.44//
GSP27moksop_u:9778: asat sat sadasat sarvaṃ saṅkalpād eva nānyataḥ / saṅkalpāt sad asac caivam iha satyaṃ kim ucyatām //MU_4,35.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9779: saṅkalpyate yathā yad yat tat tathā bhavati kṣaṇāt / mā kiñcid api tattvajña saṅkalpaya kadācana //MU_4,35.46//
GSP27moksop_u:9780: nissaṅkalpo yathāprāptavyavahāraparo bhava / cid acetyonmukhatvaṃ hi yāti saṅkalpasaṅkṣaye //MU_4,35.47//
GSP27moksop_u:9781: utthāyāsatyarūpeṇa yenāsatyamayātmakam / tataṃ jagadduḥkham idaṃ vyarthaṃ sadṛśam ātmanaḥ //MU_4,35.48//
GSP27moksop_u:9782: tena duḥkhāya mahate kiṃ śritena kilānagha / yad aduḥkhāya tat prājñās saṃśrayantīha netarat //MU_4,35.49//
GSP27moksop_u:9783: adhigataparamārthatām upetya prasabham apāsya vikalpajālam uccaiḥ / adhigamaya padaṃ tad advitīyaṃ vitatasukhāya suṣuptacittavṛttiḥ //MU_4,35.50//
GSP27moksop_u:9786: putraḥ: kīdṛśas tāta saṅkalpaḥ katham utpadyate prabho / kathaṃ vā vṛddhim āyāti kathaṃ caiva vinaśyati //MU_4,36.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9787: dāśūraḥ: anantasyātmatattvasya sattāsāmānyarūpiṇaḥ / citaś cetyonmukhatvaṃ yat tat saṅkalpāṅkuraṃ viduḥ //MU_4,36.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9788: leśataḥ prāptasattākas sa eva ghanatāṃ gataḥ / yāti cittaṃ kham āpūrya dṛḍhajāḍyāya meghavat //MU_4,36.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9789: bhāvayantī citiś cetyaṃ vyatiriktam ivātmanaḥ / saṅkalpatām ihāyāti bījam aṅkuratām iva //MU_4,36.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9790: saṅkalpanaṃ hi saṅkalpas svayam eṣa prajāyate / vardhate svata evāśu duḥkhāya na sukhāya tu //MU_4,36.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9791: saṅkalpamātraṃ hi bhavāñ jalamātraṃ yathārṇavaḥ / ṛte saṅkalpato 'nyā te nāsti saṃsāritā ṛtā //MU_4,36.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9792: kākatālīyayogena sañjāto 'si mudhaiva hi / mṛgatṛṣṇādvicandratvavad asatyaṃ ca vardhase //MU_4,36.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9793: nigīrṇamātulāṃśasya kanakapratyayo yathā / svayam abhyety asatyo 'ntas saṅkalpas te tathā bhavet //MU_4,36.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9794: asatyam eva jātas tvam asatyam abhivardhase / asmiñ jāte ca vijñāne asatyas san vilīyase //MU_4,36.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9795: ayaṃ so 'ham ime bhāvās sukhaduḥkhamayā mama / vyartham eveti sāsthas tvaṃ tenāntaḥ paritapyase //MU_4,36.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9796: asann evāsy ajāto 'si kuto janma kilāsataḥ / vyartham evāvamūḍho 'si saṅkalpavaśatas svataḥ //MU_4,36.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9797: mā saṅkalpaya saṅkalpaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvaya mā sthitau / etāvataiva bhāvena bhavyo bhavasi bhūtaye //MU_4,36.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9798: saṅkalpanāśane yatno na bhūyāṃs tava gacchati / bhāvanābhāvamātreṇa saṅkalpaḥ kṣīyate hṛdi //MU_4,36.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9799: sumanaḥkusumāmarde kiñcid vyatikaro bhavet / susādhe 'bhāvamātreṇa na tu saṅkalpanāśane //MU_4,36.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9800: puṣpākrāntau karaspandayatnaḥ putropayujyate / tad apy upakaroty asmin na saṅkalpaparikṣaye //MU_4,36.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9801: saṅkalpo yena hantavyas tena bhāvaviparyayāt / apy ardhena nimeṣeṇa līlayaiva vihanyate //MU_4,36.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9802: bhāvamātropaśamane svātmani svastham āsthite / sādhyate yad asādhyaṃ tat kasya syāt kim ivāmateḥ //MU_4,36.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9803: saṅkalpenaiva saṅkalpaṃ manasā svamano mune / bhittvā svātmani tiṣṭha tvaṃ kim etāvati duṣkaram //MU_4,36.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9804: upaśānte hi saṅkalpe upaśāntam idaṃ bhavet / saṃsāraduḥkham atulaṃ mūlād api mahāmate //MU_4,36.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9805: saṅkalpo hi mano jīvaś cittaṃ dhīr atha vāsanā / nāmnaivānyatvam apy eṣāṃ nārthenārthavidāṃ vara //MU_4,36.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9806: saṅkalpāṃśād ṛte neha kiñcid apy asti kutracit / tam eva hṛdayāc chinddhi kim anyat pariśocasi //MU_4,36.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9807: yathaivedaṃ nabhaś śūnyaṃ jagac chūnyaṃ tathaiva hi / asanmayavikalpotthe ubhe ete tate yataḥ //MU_4,36.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9808: asiddhaṃ sarvam evaitad yad asiddhena sādhitam / saṅkalpena jagat tasmād bhāvanā kvāvatiṣṭhatām //MU_4,36.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9809: satyāsthāyām asatyāṃ tu kiṃniṣṭhā vāsanā bhavet / vāsanākṣayatas siddhis tataḥ prāpyaṃ na śiṣyate //MU_4,36.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9810: tasmād asad idaṃ sarvaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ helayeddhayā / na tu bhāvanayā tena sukhaduḥkhair na lipyate //MU_4,36.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9811: avastv itīdaṃ nirṇīya nehāsthā sampravartate / āsthākṣaye na jāyete harṣāmarṣau bhavābhavau //MU_4,36.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9812: mano mithyā karotīdaṃ sukhaduḥkhābhravibhramam / mano jīvas sphuraty uccair mānasaṃ nagaraṃ jagat //MU_4,36.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9813: bhaviṣyad vartamānaṃ ca bhūtaṃ ca parivartayat / vāsanāvaśato loke sphuracchakti manas sthitam //MU_4,36.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9814: karoti svāśayenemāṃ vyavasthāṃ malinaś calaḥ / ātmanas sadṛśīṃ lolāṃ jīvo hṛdvanamarkaṭaḥ //MU_4,36.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9815: dīrgham ākāram ādāya nimeṣād yānti hrasvatām / grahītuṃ ca na yujyante saṅkalpā jaḍavīcayaḥ //MU_4,36.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9816: manāgdṛṣṭā vivardhante dahanti saparicchadam / tṛṇamātreṇa dīpyante saṅkalpā vahniśeṣavat //MU_4,36.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9817: jagatprakaṭanākārāḥ pradīptāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāḥ / bhramadā jaḍasaṃsthānās saṅkalpās taḍidagnayaḥ //MU_4,36.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9818: yadaivāsann ayaṃ putra tadaivāśu cikitsitum / śakyate nātra sandeho nāsat sad bhavati kvacit //MU_4,36.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9819: san sthito yadi saṅkalpo duścikitsas tato bhavet / kiṃ tv asadbhūta evaiṣa sucikitsas tadā bhṛśam //MU_4,36.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9820: akṛtrimaṃ cet saṃsāramalam aṅgārakārṣṇyavat / tad etatkṣālane sādho kaḥ pravarteta durmatiḥ //MU_4,36.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9821: kiṃ tv etat taṇḍule śūkatuṣakambukavat sthitam / yadā tadā prayatnena pauruṣeṇa vinaśyati //MU_4,36.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9822: akṛtrimam api prāptaṃ bhṛśaṃ kṛtrimatāṃ suta / sukhocchedyatayā jñasya saṃsāramalam ātatam //MU_4,36.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9823: taṇḍulasya yathā carma yathā tāmrasya kālimā / naśyati kriyayā putra puruṣasya tathā malam //MU_4,36.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9824: jīvasya taṇḍulasyeva malaṃ sahajam apy alam / naśyaty eva na sandehas tasmād udyamavān bhava //MU_4,36.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9825: asatkalpair vikalpair yas saṃsāro janito mudhā / stokenāsau layaṃ yāti kvāsad vastu kila sthiram //MU_4,36.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9826: asattām eti saṃsāras svāṃ vyavasthāṃ vicinvataḥ / dīpālokād ivāndhatvaṃ dvīndutvaṃ svīkṣitād iva //MU_4,36.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9827: nedaṃ tava na cāsya tvaṃ bhrāntiṃ putra parityaja / asatye satyavad dṛṣṭe bhāvanāṃ mā nyavīviśaḥ //MU_4,36.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9828: mama guruvibhavojjvalā vilāsā iti tava māstu vṛthaiva vibhramo 'ntaḥ / tvayi sati vitatāś ca te vilāsā vilasati sarvam idaṃ tadātmatattvam //MU_4,36.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9831: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity ākarṇya tadā tatra rātrāv ālapanaṃ tayoḥ / ahaṃ raghukulākāśaśaśāṅka raghunandana //MU_4,37.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9832: patitaḥ khāt kadambāgre pattrapuṣpalatākule / tūṣṇīṃ nirvṛṣṭimūkātmā śṛṅgāgra iva toyadaḥ //MU_4,37.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9833: apaśyaṃ tatra dāśūraṃ śūraṃ indriyanigrahe / pareṇa tapasā yuktaṃ tejaseva hutāśanam //MU_4,37.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9834: tejobhir dehaniṣkrāntaiḥ kāñcanīkṛtabhūruhaiḥ / tāpayantaṃ pradeśaṃ taṃ bhuvanaṃ bhāskaraṃ yathā //MU_4,37.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9835: mām athālokya samprāptaṃ dāśūro 'rghyasaparyayā / vitīrṇaviṣṭaraṃ pattre parayā paryapūjayat //MU_4,37.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9836: tataḥ kurvan kathās tena saha dāśūrabhāsvatā / tās tattanayasambaddhās saṃsārottāraṇakṣamāḥ //MU_4,37.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9837: dṛṣṭavāṃs tam ahaṃ vṛkṣaṃ korakotkaṭakoṭaram / smiteneva sphuṭaradaṃ śvasanasphuritacchadam //MU_4,37.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9838: dāśūrasyecchayā sarvair apatadbhir mṛgadvijaiḥ / sevyamānaṃ vanam iva latāmaṇḍapamaṇḍitam //MU_4,37.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9839: latākoṭitaṭabhrāntaiś camarair indusundaraiḥ / śubhrābhrakhaṇḍanikaraiś śarannabha ivāvṛtam //MU_4,37.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9842: vivāhāyeva veṣeṇa puṣpabhārādihāriṇā / latāṅganānuṣaktena nāgareṇa kṛtodyamam //MU_4,37.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9843: sunibaddhajaṭākāralatāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitam / mañjarībhiḥ patākābhir yuktaṃ puram ivotsave //MU_4,37.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9850: vṛndena vanadevīnāṃ kokilālāpaśālinā / sandigdhamañjarījālam alinetreṇa hāsinā //MU_4,37.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9851: avaśyāyopaśamitaratikhedair madālasaiḥ / puṣpadhūlisamārabdhair ālabdhair nibiḍaṃ mithaḥ //MU_4,37.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9852: puṣpāntarāntaḥpuragaiḥ kim api praṇayocitam / dhvanadbhir abhitas svacchaṃ mattāliyugalair vṛtam //MU_4,37.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9855: vanasthalīnāṃ tanayair nayair mūrtim ivāsthitaiḥ / suptaiḥ pattrapuṭeṣv antar mṛgaiś śāralatāntaram //MU_4,37.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9857: sandigdhamūkabhramaraṃ guccheṣv abjākṣasūtrakaiḥ / śyāmalīkṛtaparyantaṃ nīlaiḥ pallavamaṇḍalaiḥ //MU_4,37.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9859: bahunātra kim uktena na kiñcid api vidyate / pattraṃ tatra taror yatra noṣyate vā na bhujyate //MU_4,37.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9860: pattre pattre mṛgās suptā viśrāntās sughane ghane / kacche kacche khagā līnās tasya bhūruhabhūpateḥ //MU_4,37.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9861: evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ taṃ mamālokayatas tarum / mahotsavena sadṛśī sā babhūva tamasvatī //MU_4,37.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9862: tataḥ kathābhir anyābhis sa tasya tanayo mayā / vijñānālokaramyābhir nīto bodhaṃ paraṃ punaḥ //MU_4,37.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9863: āvayos tatra citrābhiḥ kathābhir itaretaram / śarvarī sā vyatīyāya muhūrta iva kāntayoḥ //MU_4,37.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9864: prātaḥ pratanutāṃ yāte dyugharmajalajālake / khakānanāṅkurodgāre tārakānikare śanaiḥ //MU_4,37.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9865: ākadambanabhobhāgam anuyātaṃ sutānvitam / ahaṃ visarjya dāśūraṃ harācalanadīṃ gataḥ //MU_4,37.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9866: tatrābhimatam āsādya snānam etya nabhastalam / praviśya khaṃ munīnāṃ ca madhyaṃ svastham avasthitaḥ //MU_4,37.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9867: dāśūrākhyāyikaiṣā te kathitā raghunandana / jagataḥ pratibimbābhā satyākārāpy asanmayī //MU_4,37.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9868: dāśūrākhyāyikaiveyam ity etat kathitaṃ mayā / tubhyaṃ rāghava ghorāghajagadrūpanirūpaṇe //MU_4,37.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9869: tasmād avāstavīṃ tyaktvā vāstavīm api rañjanām / dāśūrasiddhāntadhiyā sadodāro bhavātmavān //MU_4,37.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9870: anena gacchāmarasundaratvaṃ kadambadāśūrakathārathena / āsādayiṣyasy acirāt puraṃ tad bhaviṣyasīśo bhuvaneṣu yena //MU_4,37.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9873: vasiṣṭhaḥ: nāstīdam iti nirṇīya sarvatas tyaja rañjanām / yan nāsti tat prati kila kaivāstheha vicāriṇām //MU_4,38.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9874: dṛśyamānam athedaṃ ced asti tat tava kiṃ gatam / tiṣṭhatv ātmani badhnāsi tvaṃ kilātra kim ātmatām //MU_4,38.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9875: atha ced asti nāstīdam iti niścayavān asi / tathāpi bhāvanāsaṅgaḥ kathaṃ yuktaś calācale //MU_4,38.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9876: nedam asti jagad rāma na ca nāsti mahāmate / kevalaṃ svottham evetthamābhānam idam īdṛśam //MU_4,38.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9877: nedaṃ kartṛkṛtaṃ kiñcin na cākartṛkṛtakramam / svayam ābhāsate cedaṃ kartrakartṛpadaṃ gatam //MU_4,38.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9878: akartṛkaṃ jagajjālaṃ bhavatv atha sakartṛkam / mā tvam etena sambandhaṃ bhāvayānagha cetasi //MU_4,38.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9879: sarvendriyavihīnātmā karteha sa jaḍopamaḥ / akartr eva tadā manye kākatālīyavaj jagat //MU_4,38.7//
GSP27moksop_u:9880: kākatālīyayogena jātaṃ yat kiñcid eva yat / tasmin bhāvānusandhānaṃ bālo badhnāti netaraḥ //MU_4,38.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9881: na kadācid idaṃ śāntaṃ jagad rāma na ca kṣayi / ajasraṃ dṛśyamānatvād bhāvitvāc ca punaḥ punaḥ //MU_4,38.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9882: na kadācid idaṃ cāsti jagad rāma na cākṣayi / ajasraṃ kṣīyamāṇatvān nāśitvāc cānumānataḥ //MU_4,38.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9883: sarvendriyapadātīto yadā karteha vijvaraḥ / kurvāṇas sa tadā khedaṃ na kadācana gacchati //MU_4,38.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9884: teneyaṃ niyatiḥ prauḍhā bhāvābhāvadaśāmayī / īdṛśy eva sthirā dīrghā cittotthāpi na naśyati //MU_4,38.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9885: aparyantasya kālasya kaścid aṃśaś śaracchatam / tāvanmātramahāyur yaḥ kim āsthāṃ so 'nudhāvati //MU_4,38.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9886: sthirāś cej jāgatā bhāvās tat tadāsthā na śobhate / katham anyo'nyasaṃśleṣo jaḍacetanayoḥ kila //MU_4,38.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9887: asthirāś cej jagadbhāvās tad apy āsthā na śobhate / payaḥphenāsthirāsyānte duḥkham eṣā dadāti te //MU_4,38.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9888: āsthābandho mahābāho jagadbhāvatvadātmanoḥ / na sthirāsthirayoḥ phenaśailayor iva rājate //MU_4,38.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9889: sarvakartāpy akarteva karoty ātmā na kiñcana / tiṣṭhaty alam udāsīna ālokaṃ prati dīpavat //MU_4,38.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9890: kurvan na kiñcit kurute dinakāryam ivāṃśumān / gacchan na gacchati svasthas svāspadastho ravir yathā //MU_4,38.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9891: yataḥ kutaścid evedaṃ sampannam iva lakṣyate / arjunānilavad vāripūrāvartavad ātatam //MU_4,38.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9892: iti ced bhavatā rāma naipuṇyenāvadhāritam / pramāṇapariśuddhena cetasā ca vicāritam //MU_4,38.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9893: tadāti bhāvanā sādho padārthaṃ prati nārhati / alātacakre svapne ca bhrame vā keva bhāvanā //MU_4,38.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9894: akasmād āgato jantus sauhārdasya na bhājanam / bhramabhūtaṃ jagajjālam āsthāyāś ca na bhājanam //MU_4,38.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9895: uṣṇendau śītale bhānau mṛgatṛṣṇājale tathā / yathā na bhāvayasy āsthām evaṃ mā bhāvaya sthitau //MU_4,38.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9896: saṅkalpapuruṣaṃ svapnajanaṃ dvīndutvavibhramam / yathā paśyasi paśya tvaṃ bhāvajātam idaṃ tathā //MU_4,38.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9897: antar āsthāṃ parityajya bhāvaśrībhāvanāmayīm / yo 'si so 'si jagaty asmiṃl līlayā viharānagha //MU_4,38.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9898: akartṛtvapadasthasya kartṛtvam api kurvataḥ / sarvabhāvāntarasthasya sarvātītasya cātmanaḥ //MU_4,38.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9899: iyaṃ sannidhimātreṇa niyatiḥ pravijṛmbhate / dīpasannidhimātreṇa niriccheva prakāśatā //MU_4,38.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9900: abhrasannidhimātreṇa kuṭajāni yathā svayam / ātmasannidhimātreṇa trijaganti tathā svayam //MU_4,38.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9901: sarvecchārahite bhānau yathā vyomani tiṣṭhati / jāyate vyavahāraśrīs sati deve tathā kriyā //MU_4,38.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9902: niricche saṃsthite ratne yathālokaḥ pravartate / sattāmātreṇa devena tathaivāyaṃ jagadgaṇaḥ //MU_4,38.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9903: ata ātmani kartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca saṃsthitam / niricchatvād akartāsau kartā sannidhimātrataḥ //MU_4,38.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9904: sarvendriyābhyatītatvāt kartā bhoktā na bhūtapaḥ / indriyāntargatatvāt tu kartā bhoktā sa eva hi //MU_4,38.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9905: dve evātmani vidyete kartṛtākartṛte 'nagha / yayaiva paśyasi śreyas tām āśritya sthiro bhava //MU_4,38.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9906: sarvatrāham akarteti dṛḍhabhāvanayānayā / pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryaṃ kurvann api na lipyase //MU_4,38.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9907: sarvatrāham akarteti saṃvidā bhogakāmanā / yāti nīrasatāṃ jantor apravṛttes svacetasaḥ //MU_4,38.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9908: yatrāhaṃ kiñcid eveha na karomīti niścayaḥ / bhogaughakāmanāṃ tatra kaḥ karotu jahātu vā //MU_4,38.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9909: tasmān nityam akartāham iti bhāvanayeddhayā / paramāmṛtanāmnī sā samataivāvaśiṣyate //MU_4,38.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9910: atha sarvaṃ karomīti mahākartṛtayānayā / yadīcchasi sthitiṃ rāma tat tām apy uttamāṃ viduḥ //MU_4,38.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9911: ahaṃ yatra karomīmaṃ samagraṃ jāgataṃ bhramam / rāgadveṣakramas tatra kuto 'nyasyātyasambhavāt //MU_4,38.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9912: yad anyena śarīraṃ me dagdham anyena lālitam / sa madārambha evātaḥ kaḥ khedollāsayoḥ kramaḥ //MU_4,38.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9913: matsukhāsukhavistāre jagajjālakṣayodaye / ahaṃ karteti matvāntaḥ kaḥ khedollāsayoḥ kramaḥ //MU_4,38.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9914: khedollāsavilāse tu svātmakartṛtayaikayā / svayam eva layaṃ yāte samataivāvaśiṣyate //MU_4,38.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9915: samatā sarvabhāveṣu yāsau satyā parā sthitiḥ / tasyām avasthitaṃ cittaṃ na bhūyo duḥkham āpnuyāt //MU_4,38.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9916: atha vā sarvakartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca rāghava / sarvaṃ tyaktvā manaḥ pītvā yo 'si so 'si sthiro bhava //MU_4,38.44//
GSP27moksop_u:9917: ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ nāhaṃ karomīdam idaṃ na tu / iti bhāvānusandhānamayī dṛṣṭir na tuṣṭaye //MU_4,38.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9918: sā kālasūtrapadavī sā mahāvīcivāgurā / sāsipattravanaśreṇī yā deho 'ham iti sthitiḥ //MU_4,38.46//
GSP27moksop_u:9919: sā tyājyā sarvayatnena sarvanāśe 'py upasthite / spraṣṭavyā sā na bhavyena saśvamāṃseva pukkasī //MU_4,38.47//
GSP27moksop_u:9920: tayā sudūrojjhitayā dṛṣṭau pāṭalalekhayā / udeti paramā dṛṣṭir jyotsneva vigatāmbudā //MU_4,38.48//
GSP27moksop_u:9921_0: kartā nāsmi na cāyam asmi sa iti jñātvaivam antas sphuṭaṃ kartaivāsmi samagram asmi tad iti jñātvātha vā niścayam / ko 'py
GSP27moksop_u:9921_1: evāsmi na kaścid evam iti vā nirṇīya sarvottamaṃ tiṣṭha tvaṃ svapade sthitāḥ padavido yatrottamās sādhavaḥ //MU_4,38.49 //
GSP27moksop_u:9924: rāmaḥ: satyam etat tvayā brahman yad uktaṃ sūktisundaram / akartaiva hi kartātmā bhoktābhoktaiva bhūtabhṛt //MU_4,39.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9925: sarveśvaras sarvamayaś cinmātram amalaṃ padam / svānubhūtivapur devas sarvabhūtāntarasthitaḥ //MU_4,39.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9926: hṛdayaṅgamatāṃ yātam idānīṃ brahma me prabho / tvaduktibhir yathā śītaṃ dhārābhir bhūbhṛtaḥ payaḥ //MU_4,39.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9927: audāsīnyād anicchatvān na bhuṅkte na karoti ca / samagrālokakāritvād bhuṅkte devaḥ karoti ca //MU_4,39.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9928: kiṃ tv ayaṃ bhagavan sphāras saṃśayo me hṛdi sthitaḥ / chinddhi taṃ tvaṃ girā brahman dīdhityendur yathā tamaḥ //MU_4,39.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9929: idaṃ sat tad idaṃ cāsad ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ bhavān / ayam eko dvitīyo 'yam ityādikalanāmalam //MU_4,39.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9930: ekasmin vitate śānte nīhāra iva bhāskare / idamprathamam evācche katham ātmani saṃsthitam //MU_4,39.7//
