GSP27moksop_u:11277: viśramya sa kṣaṇam iva premavān avalokya ca / baḍiṃ vicārayan dṛṣṭyā parikṣīṇabhavabhramam //MU_5,28.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11278: deharaśmiśatair dantadīptibhiḥ kṣīrasāgare / kṣipann iva sabhām āha hasan vākyam idaṃ guruḥ //MU_5,28.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11279: śukraḥ: aho citram idaṃ daityās svavicāraṇayaiva yat / samprāptavimalālokas siddho 'yaṃ bhagavān baḍiḥ //MU_5,28.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11280: ayaṃ tad evam eveha tiṣṭhan dānavasattamāḥ / svātmani sthitim āpnotu padaṃ paśyatv anāmayam //MU_5,28.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11281: śrānto viśrāntim āyātaḥ kṣīṇacintābharabhramaḥ / śāntasaṃsāranīhāro bodhanīyo na dānavāḥ //MU_5,28.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11282: sva evāloka etena samprāpto 'jñānasaṅkṣaye / śānte 'bhrasambhrame sauro dineneva karotkaraḥ //MU_5,28.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11283: svayam eva hi kālena prabodham ayam eṣyati / bījakośāt svasaṃvittyā suptamūrtir ivāṅkuraḥ //MU_5,28.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11284: kurudhvaṃ svāni kāryāṇi sarve dānavanāyakāḥ / baḍir varṣasahasreṇa samādher bodham eṣyati //MU_5,28.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11285: ity ukte guruṇā tatra bhayaharṣaviṣādajām / daityāś cintāṃ jahuś śuṣkāṃ mañjarīm iva pādapāḥ //MU_5,28.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11286: vairocanisabhāsaṃsthāṃ vidhāya prāgvyavasthayā / svavyāpāraparās tasthus sarva evāsurās tataḥ //MU_5,28.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11287: narā mahīm ahipatayo rasātalaṃ grahā nabhas tridaśagaṇās triviṣṭapam / diśo 'drayo jalapatayaś ca kandarān vanecarā gaganacarāś ca khaṃ yayuḥ //MU_5,28.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11290: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha varṣasahasreṇa divyenāsurasattamaḥ / devadundubhinirghoṣair bubudhe bhagavān baḍiḥ //MU_5,29.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11291: baḍau prabuddhe tad bāḍhaṃ vireje nagaraṃ tadā / vairiñca iva sūryaugha udite kamalākaraḥ //MU_5,29.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11292: baḍiḥ prabuddha evāsau yāvan nāyānti dānavāḥ / tāvat sañcintayām āsa samādhisadane kṣaṇam //MU_5,29.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11293: aho nu ramyā padavī śītalā pāramārthikī / aham asyāṃ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā parāṃ viśrāntim āgataḥ //MU_5,29.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11294: tad enām eva padavīm avalambya vasāmy aham / bhavatīhopabhuktābhiḥ kiṃ me bāhyavibhūtibhiḥ //MU_5,29.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11295: aindaveṣv api bimbeṣu na tathānandavīcayaḥ / toṣayanti yathāntar māṃ saṃvidvibhavabhūmayaḥ //MU_5,29.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11296: iti bhūyo 'pi viśrāntyai kurvāṇaṃ galitaṃ manaḥ / baḍim āvārayām āsur daityāś candram ivāmbudāḥ //MU_5,29.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11297: tān ālokya punar dadhyau tatpraṇāmākulekṣaṇaḥ / taiḥ kulācalasaṅkāśaiḥ parivītavapus tv idam //MU_5,29.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11298: citaḥ kṣīṇavikalpasya kim upādeyam asti me / mano yadabhipātitvād yātu tadrasatām alam //MU_5,29.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11299: mokṣam icchāmy ahaṃ kasmād baddhaḥ kenāsmi vai purā / abaddho mokṣam icchāmi keyaṃ bālaviḍambanā //MU_5,29.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11300: na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti maurkhyaṃ me kṣayam āgatam / kiṃ me dhyānavilāsena kiṃ vādhyānena me bhavet //MU_5,29.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11301: na dhyānaṃ nāpi cādhyānaṃ na bhogān nāpy abhogitām / abhivāñchāmi tiṣṭhāmi samam eva gatajvaraḥ //MU_5,29.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11302: na me vāñchā pare tattve na me vāñchā jagatsthitau / na me dhyānadṛśā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ vibhavena me //MU_5,29.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11303: nāhaṃ mṛto na jīvāmi na san nāsann ahaṃ samaḥ / nedaṃ me naiva nānyan me namo mahyam ahaṃ hy aham //MU_5,29.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11304: idam astu jagadrājyaṃ tiṣṭhāmy atra svasaṃsthitaḥ / naiva vāstu jagadrājyaṃ tiṣṭhāmy ātmani śītalam //MU_5,29.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11305: kiṃ me dhyānadṛśā kāryaṃ kiṃ rājyavibhavaśriyā / yad āyāti tad āyātu nāhaṃ kiñcin na me kvacit //MU_5,29.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11306: na kiñcid api kartavyaṃ yadi nāma mayādhunā / tat kasmān na karomīha kiñcit prakṛtakarma vai //MU_5,29.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11307: iti nirṇīya pūrṇātmā baḍir balavatāṃ varaḥ / daityān ālokayām āsa padmānīva divākaraḥ //MU_5,29.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11308: dṛṣṭipātavibhāgena sarveṣāṃ danujanmanām / śiraḥpraṇāmāñ jagrāha puṣpāmodān ivānilaḥ //MU_5,29.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11309: atha vairocanis tatra dhyeyatyāgamayātmanā / manasā sakalāny eva rājakāryāṇi sa vyadhāt //MU_5,29.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11310: devān dvijān gurūṃś caiva pūjayām āsa pūjayā / sammānayām āsa suhṛdbandhusāmantasajjanān //MU_5,29.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11311: arthenāpūrayām āsa bhṛtyān arthigaṇāṃs tathā / lalanā lālayām āsa vicitravibhavārpaṇaiḥ //MU_5,29.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11312: ity asāv avasat tasmin rājye sakalaśāsane / yajñaṃ prati babhūvātha matir asya kadācana //MU_5,29.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11313: tarpitāśeṣabhuvanaṃ devarṣigaṇapūjitam / saha śukrādibhir mukhyais sa cakāra mahāmakham //MU_5,29.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11314: baḍir bhogabharasyārthī neti nirṇīya mādhavaḥ / baḍer īpsitasiddhyarthaṃ siddhidas tanmakhaṃ yayau //MU_5,29.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11315: bhogaikakṛpaṇāyedaṃ jagajjaṅgalakhaṇḍakam / dātuṃ yogyāya śakrāya vayojyeṣṭhāya kāryavit //MU_5,29.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11316: kramamātracchalenātra vañcayitvā baḍiṃ hariḥ / babandha pātālatale bhūgeha iva vānaram //MU_5,29.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11317: adyāsau saṃsthito rāma punarindratvahetunā / jīvanmuktavapus svastho nityaṃ dhyānaniṣaṇṇadhīḥ //MU_5,29.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11318: pātālakuhare tiṣṭhañ jīvanmuktamatir baḍiḥ / āpadaṃ sampadaṃ dṛṣṭyā samayaiva sa paśyati //MU_5,29.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11319: nāstam eti na codeti tatprajñā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ / samā sthiratarākārā citrasūryāvalī yathā //MU_5,29.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11320: āvirbhāvatirobhāvasahasrāṇīha jīvatām / tanmanaś ciram ālokya bhogeṣu viratiṃ gatam //MU_5,29.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11321: daśakoṭīś ca varṣāṇām anuśāsya jagattrayam / ante viraktatāṃ prāptam upaśāntaṃ baḍer manaḥ //MU_5,29.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11322: ūhāpohasahasrāṇi bhāvābhāvaśatāni ca / baḍinā paridṛṣṭāni kva samāśvāsam etv asau //MU_5,29.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11323: bhogābhilāṣaṃ santyajya baḍis sampūrṇamānasaḥ / ātmārāmas sthito nityam adya pātālakoṭare //MU_5,29.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11324: punar etena baḍinā jagad indratayākhilam / anuśāsyam idaṃ rāma bahūn varṣagaṇān iha //MU_5,29.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11325: na tasyendrapadaprāptyā tuṣṭis samupajāyate / na tasya svapadabhraṃśād udvega upajāyate //MU_5,29.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11326: sa samas sarvabhāveṣu sarvadaivoditāśayaḥ / samprāptam āharan svastha ākāśa iva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,29.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11327: baḍivijñānasamprāptir eṣā te kathitā mayā / etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya tvam apy abhyudito bhava //MU_5,29.38//
GSP27moksop_u:11328: baḍivat svavivekena nityo 'ham iti niścayāt / padam āsādayādvandvaṃ pauruṣeṇaiva rāghava //MU_5,29.39//
GSP27moksop_u:11329: dve cāṣṭau caiva varṣāṇāṃ koṭīr bhuktvā jagattrayam / ante vairasyam āpanno baḍir apy asurottamaḥ //MU_5,29.40//
GSP27moksop_u:11330: tasmād avaśyavairasyaṃ bhogapūgam arindama / santyajya satatānandam avairasyapadaṃ vraja //MU_5,29.41//
GSP27moksop_u:11331: imā dṛśyadṛśo rāma nānākāravikāradāḥ / na kāścana tavātmīyā dūrāc chailaśilā iva //MU_5,29.42//
GSP27moksop_u:11332: dhāvamānam ihāmutra luṭhitaṃ lokavṛttiṣu / saṃsthāpaya nibadhyaitan mano hṛdayakoṭare //MU_5,29.43//
GSP27moksop_u:11333: cidādityo bhavān eva sarvatra jagati sthitaḥ / kaḥ paras te ka ātmīyaḥ pariskhalasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,29.44//
GSP27moksop_u:11334: tvam ananto mahābāhus tvam ādyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ / tvaṃ padārthaśatākāraiḥ parisphūrjasi cidvapuḥ //MU_5,29.45//
GSP27moksop_u:11335: tvayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam / bodhe nityodite śuddhe sūtre maṇigaṇo yathā //MU_5,29.46//
GSP27moksop_u:11336: na jāyase na mriyase tvam ajaḥ puruṣo virāṭ / cic chuddho janmamaraṇabhrāntayo mā bhavantu te //MU_5,29.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11337: samastajanmarogāṇāṃ pravicārya balābalam / tṛṣṇām utsṛjya bhogānāṃ bhoktaiva bhava kevalam //MU_5,29.48//
GSP27moksop_u:11338: tvayi sthite jagannāthe cidāditye sadodite / idam ābhāsate sarvaṃ saṃsārasvapnamaṇḍalam //MU_5,29.49//
GSP27moksop_u:11339: mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā vyarthaṃ sukhaduḥkhaiṣaṇā na te / śuddhaś cid asi sarvātmā sarvavastvavabhāsakaḥ //MU_5,29.50//
GSP27moksop_u:11340: pūrvam iṣṭam aniṣṭaṃ tvam aniṣṭaṃ ceṣṭam ity api / parikalpya tadabhyāsāt tato 'pi dve parityaja //MU_5,29.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11341: iṣṭāniṣṭadṛśos tyāge samatodeti śāśvatī / tayā hṛdayavartinyā punar jantur na jāyate //MU_5,29.52//
GSP27moksop_u:11342: yeṣu yeṣu pradeśeṣu mano majjati bālavat / tebhyas tebhyas samuddhṛtya tad dhi tattve niveśayet //MU_5,29.53//
GSP27moksop_u:11343: evam abhyāgatābhyāsaṃ manomattamataṅgajam / nibadhya sarvabhāvena paraṃ śreyo 'dhigamyate //MU_5,29.54//
GSP27moksop_u:11344: mā śaṭhair ayathārthajñair mithyādṛṣṭihatāśayaiḥ / dhūrtasaṅkalpavikrītair vimūḍhais samatāṃ gamaḥ //MU_5,29.55//
GSP27moksop_u:11345: akiñcanāt svanirṇītau lambamānāt paroktiṣu / na maurkhyād adhiko loke kaścid astīha duḥkhadaḥ //MU_5,29.56//
GSP27moksop_u:11346: tvam etad avivekābhram uditaṃ hṛdayāmbare / vivekapavanenāśu dūraṃ naya mahāmate //MU_5,29.57//
GSP27moksop_u:11347: ātmanaiva prayatnena yāvad ātmāvalokane / na kṛto 'nugrahas tāvan na vicārodayo bhavet //MU_5,29.58//
GSP27moksop_u:11348: vedavedāntaśāstrārthatarkadṛṣṭibhir apy ayam / nātmā prakaṭatām eti yāvan na svam avekṣaṇam //MU_5,29.59//
GSP27moksop_u:11349: tvam ātmany ātmanā rāma prasāde samavasthitaḥ / prāpto 'si vitataṃ bodhaṃ madvacāṃsy avabudhyase //MU_5,29.60//
GSP27moksop_u:11350: vikalpāṃśavihīnasya tvayaiṣā cidvivasvataḥ / gṛhītā vitatā vyāptir maduktā paramātmanaḥ //MU_5,29.61//
GSP27moksop_u:11352: yad upagacchasi pāsi nihaṃsi vā pibasi valgasi cinmaya vardhase / tad asi tena tavāstu mahāmune vigatabodhakalaṅkaviśaṅkitā //MU_5,29.63//
GSP27moksop_u:11355: vasiṣṭhaḥ: athemam aparaṃ rāma vijñānādhigame kramam / śṛṇu daityeśvaras siddhaḥ prahlādas svātmanā yathā //MU_5,30.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11356: āsīt pātālajaṭhare vidrāvitasuro 'suraḥ / hiraṇyakaśipur nāma nārāyaṇaparākramaḥ //MU_5,30.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11357: ākrāntabhuvanābhogas sa jahāra harer jagat / ṣaṭpadasya bṛhatpattraṃ rājahaṃsa ivāmbujam //MU_5,30.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11358: cakāra jagatāṃ rājyaṃ samākrāntasurāsuraḥ / dantī nirastahaṃsaugho nalinyām alinām iva //MU_5,30.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11359: athāsāv asurādhīśaḥ kurvaṃs tribhuvaneśatām / kālena suṣuve putrān aṅkurān iva mādhavaḥ //MU_5,30.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11361: prahlādo nāma bhagavān pradhānātmā babhūva ha / teṣāṃ madhye mahārhāṇāṃ maṇīnām iva kaustubhaḥ //MU_5,30.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11362: tenārājata putreṇa hiraṇyakaśipur bhṛśam / sarvasaundaryayuktena vasanteneva vatsaraḥ //MU_5,30.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11363: atha putrasahāyo 'sau balakośasamanvitaḥ / ājagāma madaṃ daityas trigaṇḍagalitebhavat //MU_5,30.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11364: tatāpākrāntitāpena trijaganti vikāsinā / kalpāntasūryagaṇavan navayaiva karaśriyā //MU_5,30.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11365: akhidyantāsya tenātha sūryendupramukhās surāḥ / durvilāsavilolasya bālasyeva svabandhavaḥ //MU_5,30.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11366: te 'rthayāṃ cakrire śauriṃ daityendrebhapater vadhe / na kṣamante mahānto 'pi paunaḥpuṇyena duṣkriyām //MU_5,30.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11373: nārasiṃhaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvā mādhavo 'han mahāsuram / lasatkaṭakaṭārāvaṃ turaṅgamam iva dvipaḥ //MU_5,30.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11374: puram āsuram udvāntair dadāhekṣaṇavahnibhiḥ / sasarvabhūtaṃ kalpānte jagajjālam ivānalaḥ //MU_5,30.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11375: nṛsiṃhamārute tasmin bhṛśaṃ kṣobham upāgate / visphūrjati ghanāsphoṭair ekārṇava ivākule //MU_5,30.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11376: dudruvur dānavaughās te dikṣv alaṃ maṣakā iva / upāyayur adṛśyatvaṃ dīpā iva gatatviṣaḥ //MU_5,30.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11377: atha vidrutadaityendraṃ dagdhāntaḥpuramaṇḍalam / babhūva pātālatalaṃ kalpakṣuṇṇajagatsamam //MU_5,30.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11378: akālakalpāntavidhau śanaiḥ praśamite vibhau / kvāpi yāte samāśvastasurasaṃrambhapūjite //MU_5,30.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11379: mṛtaśiṣṭā danusutāḥ prahlādaparipālitāḥ / dagdhaṃ svaṃ deśam ājagmus saraś śuṣkam ivāṇḍajāḥ //MU_5,30.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11380: tatra kālocitāṃ kṛtvā svanāśaparidevanām / aurdhvadaihikasatkāraṃ cakruḥ prabhuṣu bandhuṣu //MU_5,30.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11381: hṛtabandījanaṃ pluṣṭabandhubāndhavamaṇḍalam / śanair āśvāsayām āsur mṛtaśiṣṭaṃ svakaṃ janam //MU_5,30.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11382: citrārpitopamadurākṛtayo nirīhā dīnāśayā himahatāmburuhopamānāḥ / śokopataptamanaso 'suranāyakās te dagdhadrumā iva nirastavikāsam āsan //MU_5,30.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11385: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha duḥkhaparītātmā hariṇā hatadānave / prahlādaś cintayām āsa maunī pātālakoṭare //MU_5,31.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11386: ko 'nv asmākam upāyas syād ya evehāsurāṅkuraḥ / tīkṣṇāgro jāyate taṃ taṃ bhuṅkte śākhāmṛgo hariḥ //MU_5,31.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11387: na kadācana pātāle daityā dordaṇḍaśālinaḥ / sthirā babhūvur udbhinnāḥ padmā iva himācale //MU_5,31.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11388: utpatyotpatya naśyanti bhāsurākāraghargharāḥ / kṣaṇaprasphuritārambhās taraṅgā iva vāridheḥ //MU_5,31.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11389: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ kaṣṭaṃ samagrālokahāriṇaḥ / ripavaḥ prauḍhim āyātā apūrvatimirabhramāḥ //MU_5,31.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11390: tamaḥprapūrṇahṛdayās saṅkucatpattrasampadaḥ / suhṛdaḥ khedam āyātā niśīva kamalākarāḥ //MU_5,31.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11391: tātasya malinavyūhapādapīṭhāpamārjakaiḥ / surair viṣaya ākrānto mṛgair iva mahāvanam //MU_5,31.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11392: nirudyamā gataśrīkā dīnāḥ prakaṭitāśayāḥ / bāndhavā na virājante padmāḥ pluṣṭadalā iva //MU_5,31.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11393: sphuranty asuravīrāṇāṃ gṛheṣv aviratānilaiḥ / dhūsarā bhasmanīhārā dhūpadhūmabharā iva //MU_5,31.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11394: hṛtadvārakavāṭāsu daityāntaḥpurabhittiṣu / prabhā marakatasyeva jātā navayavāṅkurāḥ //MU_5,31.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11395: trilokīnābhinalinīmattebhā dānavā api / devavad dainyam āyātāḥ kim asādhyam aho vidheḥ //MU_5,31.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11396: manāk calati parṇe 'pi dṛṣṭāribhayabhīravaḥ / vadhvas trasyanti vidhvastā mṛgyo grāmagatā iva //MU_5,31.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11397: asurīkarṇapūrārthaṃ phullaratnagulucchakāḥ / narasiṃhakarālūnās sthāṇutām āgatā drumāḥ //MU_5,31.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11398: divyāmbaralatāpattrā ratnastabakadanturāḥ / punar āropitās tatra nandane kalpapādapāḥ //MU_5,31.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11399: purehāmarabandīnāṃ daityair ālokitaṃ mukham / adya tv asurabandīnāṃ surair ālokyate mukham //MU_5,31.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11400: manye dānamahānadyas surebhakaṭabhittiṣu / pravṛttās tā bhaviṣyanti śailasānuṣv ivāpagāḥ //MU_5,31.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11401: asmākam ibhagaṇḍeṣu dāvadāhavibhūtayaḥ / lasanti maruṣaṇḍeṣu saṃśuṣkeṣv iva dhūlayaḥ //MU_5,31.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11403: suragandharvasundaryo dānavāntaḥpuroṣitāḥ / punar merau sthitiṃ yātā mañjarya iva pādape //MU_5,31.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11404: kaṣṭaṃ tātapurandhrīṇāṃ śuṣkāmburuhanīrasāḥ / vilāsās suranārībhir hasyante hāsyalīlayā //MU_5,31.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11405: pūrvaṃ yair eva mattātaś cāmarair upavījitaḥ / sahasranayanas svarge kaṣṭaṃ tair eva vījyate //MU_5,31.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11406: iyam asmākam anyāpad āgatā dainyadāyinī / tasyaikasya prasādena duṣpauruṣavato hareḥ //MU_5,31.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11407: taddorvanaghanacchāyālabdhaviśrāntayas surāḥ / na kadācana tapyante himādrer iva sānavaḥ //MU_5,31.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11409: tenāsurapurandhrīṇāṃ nityamaṇḍanamaṅgale / mukhapadme 'rpitaṃ bāṣpam abjinīnāṃ himaṃ yathā //MU_5,31.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11410: śīrṇabhinnaluṭhadbhittir jagajjarjaramaṇḍapaḥ / ayaṃ nīlamaṇistambhais tadbhujair eva dhāryate //MU_5,31.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11411: sa dhartā surasainyasya majjato vipadarṇave / kṣīrododaramagnasya mandarasyeva kacchapaḥ //MU_5,31.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11412: ete tātādayas sarve tenaivāsurasattamāḥ / pātitāḥ kṣubdhakalpāntavāteneva kulācalāḥ //MU_5,31.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11413: sa eṣa evaṃ saṃhārakarmakṣamabhujāvaliḥ / surasārthasuhṛc chrīmān viṣamo madhusūdanaḥ //MU_5,31.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11414: daityadordaṇḍaparaśos tasya vīryeṇa vīryavān / dānavān bādhate śakro bālakān iva markaṭaḥ //MU_5,31.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11415: durjayaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ pravimuktāyudho 'pi san / nāsau śastrāstravicchedair vajrasāro vidīryate //MU_5,31.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11416: abhyastā bahavas tena mithaḥpreritaparvatāḥ / bhīmās samarasaṃrambhās samam asmatpitāmahaiḥ //MU_5,31.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11417: tāsu tāsv atighorāsu vitatāsv asurājiṣu / yo na bhīta idānīṃ sa bhayam eṣyati kā kathā //MU_5,31.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11418: upāyam ekam evemaṃ harer ākramaṇe sphuṭam / manye tadvyatirekeṇa vidyate na pratikriyā //MU_5,31.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11419: sarvātmanā sarvadhiyā sarvasaṃrambharaṃhasā / sa eva śaraṇaṃ devo gatir astīha nānyathā //MU_5,31.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11420: na tasmād adhikaḥ kaścid asti lokatrayāntare / pralayasthitisargāṇāṃ hariḥ kāraṇatāṃ gataḥ //MU_5,31.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11421: tasmān nimeṣād ārabhya nārāyaṇam ajaṃ sadā / samprapanno 'smi sarvatra nārāyaṇamayo hy aham //MU_5,31.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11422: namo nārāyaṇāyeti mantras sarvārthasādhakaḥ / nāpaiti mama hṛtkośād ākāśād iva mārutaḥ //MU_5,31.38//
GSP27moksop_u:11423: harir āśā harir vyoma harir urvī harir jagat / ayaṃ harir ameyātmā jāto harimayo hy aham //MU_5,31.39//
GSP27moksop_u:11424: aviṣṇuḥ pūjayan viṣṇuṃ na pūjāphalabhāg bhavet / viṣṇur bhūtvā yajed viṣṇum ayaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,31.40//
GSP27moksop_u:11425: anantam idam ākāśam āpūrya vinatāsutaḥ / kanakāṅgo mamāṅgānām ayam āsanatāṃ gataḥ //MU_5,31.41//
GSP27moksop_u:11427: ime te mṛdumandāradāmadṛbdhāṃsamaṇḍalāḥ / mandarāghṛṣṭakeyūrāś catvāro mama bāhavaḥ //MU_5,31.43//
GSP27moksop_u:11428: calacchaśikarāpūracārucāmaradhāriṇī / iyaṃ me pārśvagā lakṣmīḥ kṣīrodajaṭharotthitā //MU_5,31.44//
GSP27moksop_u:11429: helāvilabdhabhuvanā trailokyatarumañjarī / iyaṃ me pārśvagā kīrtir dhavalāmalahāsinī //MU_5,31.45//
GSP27moksop_u:11430: anārataṃ jagajjālanavanirmāṇakāriṇī / iyaṃ me pārśvagā māyā svendrajālavilāsinī //MU_5,31.46//
GSP27moksop_u:11431: iyaṃ sā helayākrāntatrailokyataruṣaṇḍikā / jayā sphurati me pārśve latā kalpataror iva //MU_5,31.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11432: imau me nityaśītoṣṇau devau śītāṃśubhāskarau / prakaṭīkṛtasaṃsārau mukhamadhye vilocane //MU_5,31.48//
GSP27moksop_u:11433: mameyam utpalaśyāmā pīnāmbhodharasundarī / śyāmīkṛtakakupcakrā dehadīptir visāriṇī //MU_5,31.49//
GSP27moksop_u:11434: ayaṃ mama kare śaṅkhaḥ pāñcajanyas sphuraddhvaniḥ / mūrtaṃ kham iva śabdātma kṣīroda iva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_5,31.50//
GSP27moksop_u:11435: ayaṃ me karṇikākośanilīnabrahmaṣaṭpadaḥ / padmaḥ karatale śrīmān svanābhikuharodbhavaḥ //MU_5,31.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11436: iyaṃ me ratnacitrāṅgī sumeruśikharopamā / hemāṅgadā gadā gurvī daityadānavamardinī //MU_5,31.52//
GSP27moksop_u:11437: ayaṃ me bhāsurākāras sukhadṛśyas sudarśanaḥ / jvālājaṭilaparyantaparipāṭaladiktaṭaḥ //MU_5,31.53//
GSP27moksop_u:11438: ayaṃ me ketumadvahnisundaro jvalito 'sitaḥ / kuṭhāro daityavṛkṣāṇāṃ nandayan nandakas sthitaḥ //MU_5,31.54//
GSP27moksop_u:11439: idaṃ maccharadhārāṇāṃ puṣkarāvartako ghanaḥ / śārṅgaṃ dhanur ahīndrābham indrakārmukasundaram //MU_5,31.55//
GSP27moksop_u:11440: imāny aham anantāni jaganti jaṭhare ciram / bibharmi jātanaṣṭāni vartamānāny anekaśaḥ //MU_5,31.56//
GSP27moksop_u:11441: imau mahī me caraṇāv idaṃ me gaganaṃ śiraḥ / idaṃ vapur me trijagad imā me kukṣayo diśaḥ //MU_5,31.57//
GSP27moksop_u:11442: sākṣād ayam ahaṃ viṣṇur nīlameghodaradyutiḥ / suparṇaparvatārūḍhaś śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ //MU_5,31.58//
GSP27moksop_u:11443: ete mattaḥ palāyante samagrā duṣṭacetasaḥ / tārṇās taralasañcārāḥ pavanād iva rāśayaḥ //MU_5,31.59//
GSP27moksop_u:11444: ayam indīvaraśyāmaḥ pītavāsā gadādharaḥ / lakṣmīvān garuḍārūḍhas svayam evāham acyutaḥ //MU_5,31.60//
GSP27moksop_u:11445: ko mām eti viruddhātmā trailokyadahanakṣamam / svanāśāya marutkṣubdhaṃ kalpāgniṃ śalabho yathā //MU_5,31.61//
GSP27moksop_u:11446: ime te taijasīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ mamāgrasthās surāsurāḥ / na śaknuvanti saṃsodḥuṃ cakṣurmandāḥ prabhām iva //MU_5,31.62//
GSP27moksop_u:11447: ime mām īśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ brahmendrāgniharādayaḥ / stuvanty anantayā vācā bahuvaktrasamutthayā //MU_5,31.63//
GSP27moksop_u:11448: ayaṃ vijṛmbhitaiśvaryo jāto 'ham ajitākṛtiḥ / sarvadvandvapadātīto mahimnā parameṇa hi //MU_5,31.64//
GSP27moksop_u:11449: tribhuvanabhavanodaraikamūrti prasabhavibhinnasamastaduṣṭasattvam / ghanagiritṛṇakānanāntarasthaṃ sakalabhayāpaharaṃ vapuḥ praṇaumi //MU_5,31.65//
GSP27moksop_u:11452: vasiṣṭhaḥ: prahlāda iti sañcintya kṛtvā nārāyaṇīṃ tanum / punas sañcintayām āsa pūjārtham asuradviṣaḥ //MU_5,32.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11453: vapuṣo vaiṣṇavād asmān marunmūrtiḥ parāparaḥ / ayaṃ prāṇapravāheṇa bahir viṣṇus sthito 'paraḥ //MU_5,32.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11455: candrārkanayanaś śrīmān kāntanandakanandanaḥ / padmapāṇir viśālākṣaś śārṅgadhanvā mahādyutiḥ //MU_5,32.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11456: tad enaṃ pūjayāmy āśu parivārasamanvitam / saparyayā manomayyā sarvasambhāraramyayā //MU_5,32.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11457: tata enaṃ mahādevaṃ pūjayiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ / pūjayā bāhyasambhogamahatyā bahuratnayā //MU_5,32.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11458: prahlāda iti sañcintya sambhārabharabhāriṇā / manasā pūjayām āsa mādhavaṃ kamalādhavam //MU_5,32.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11459: ratnārghapātrapaṭalaiś candanādivilepanaiḥ / dhūpair dīpair vicitraiś ca nānāvibhavabhūṣaṇaiḥ //MU_5,32.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11461: pallavair devavṛkṣāṇāṃ nānākusumadāmabhiḥ / kiṅkirātair bukaiḥ kundaiś caṇpakair asitotpalaiḥ //MU_5,32.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11462: kalhāraiḥ kumudaiḥ kāśaiḥ kharjūraiś cūtakiṃśukaiḥ / aśokair madanair bilvaiḥ karṇikāraiḥ kirātakaiḥ //MU_5,32.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11463: kadambaiḥ kukurair nīpais sindhuvārais sayūthikaiḥ / pāribhadrair guggulubhir vidulaiḥ kuyyakotkaraiḥ //MU_5,32.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11464: priyaṅgupaṭalaiḥ pāṭaiḥ pāṭalair dhātupāṭalaiḥ / āmrair āmrātakair bhavyair harītakavibhītakaiḥ //MU_5,32.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11465: sālatālatamālānāṃ latākusumapallavaiḥ / komalaiḥ kalikājālais sahakārais sakuṅkumaiḥ //MU_5,32.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11466: ketakais saptaparṇaiś ca tatherāmañjarīgaṇaiḥ / vicitrapālīvatajair nānāṭaṅkatarūdbhavaiḥ //MU_5,32.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11468: bhakṣyair bhojyais tathā pānair lehyaiḥ peyaiś ca picchilaiḥ / rasaiḥ phalaiḥ pallavaiś ca vividhāsvādajātibhiḥ //MU_5,32.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11469: aṃśukaiś śayanair yānair mahārhair hemaviṣṭaraiḥ / geyair nṛttair vādanaiś ca mahārhalalanāgaṇaiḥ //MU_5,32.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11471: hariṃ paramayā bhaktyā jagadvibhavabhavyayā / manasā pūjayām āsa prahlādo 'ntaḥpure patim //MU_5,32.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11472: atha devagṛhe tasmin bāhyārthaiḥ paripūrṇayā / pūjayā pūjayām āsa dānaveśo janārdanam //MU_5,32.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11473: bahirdṛśyena tenaiva krameṇa parameśvaram / punaḥ punaḥ pūjayitvā tuṣṭimān dānavo 'bhavat //MU_5,32.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11474: tatas tataḥ prabhṛty eva prahlādaḥ parameśvaram / tathaiva pratyahaṃ bhaktyā pūjayām āsa pūrṇayā //MU_5,32.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11475: atha tasmin pure daityās tataḥ prabhṛti vaiṣṇavāḥ / sarva evābhavan bhavyā rājā hy ācārakāraṇam //MU_5,32.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11476: jagāma vārttā gaganaṃ devalokam atho harim / viṣṇor dveṣaṃ parityajya bhaktā daityās sthitā iti //MU_5,32.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11477: devā vismayam ājagmuś śakrādyās samarudgaṇāḥ / gṛhītā vaiṣṇavī bhaktir daityaiḥ kim iti rāghava //MU_5,32.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11478: kṣīrode bhogibhogasthaṃ vibudhā vismayākulāḥ / jagmur ambaram utsṛjya harim āhavaśālinaṃ //MU_5,32.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11479: tatraitaṃ daityavṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsur asya te / papracchuś cainam āsīnam apūrvāścaryavismayāt //MU_5,32.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11480: devāḥ: kim etad bhagavan daityā viruddhā ye sadaiva te / te hi tvanmayatāṃ yātā māyeyam iti bhāvyate //MU_5,32.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11481: kva kilātyantadurvṛttā dānavā dalitādrayaḥ / kva pāścātyamahājanmalabhyā bhaktir janārdane //MU_5,32.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11482: prākṛto guṇavāñ jāta ity eṣā bhagavan kathā / akālapuṣpamāleva sukhāyodvejanāya ca //MU_5,32.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11483: nopapannaṃ hi yad yatra tatra tan na virājate / madhye kācakalāpasya mahāmūlyo maṇir yathā //MU_5,32.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11484: yo yo yādṛgguṇo jantus sa tām evaiti saṃsthitim / sadṛśeṣv apy ajeṣu śvā na manye ramate kvacit //MU_5,32.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11485: na tathā duḥkhayanty aṅge majjantyo vajrasūcayaḥ / vaisādṛśyena sambaddhā yathaitā vastudṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_5,32.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11486: yad yatra kramasamprāptam upapannam aninditam / tad eva rājate tatra jale 'mbhojaṃ na tu sthale //MU_5,32.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11487: kvādhamaḥ prākṛtārambho hīnakarmaratis sadā / varāko dānavas tucchajātir bhaktiḥ kva vaiṣṇavī //MU_5,32.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11488: kamalinī paruṣoṣarabhūgatā sukhayatīha yathā na durāśrayā / danusuto 'pi hi mādhavabhaktimān iti kathā na tatheśa sukhāya naḥ //MU_5,32.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11491: vasiṣṭhaḥ: garjantam atisaṃrabdhaṃ suralokam athārihā / uvāca mādhavo vākyaṃ śikhivṛndam ivāmbudaḥ //MU_5,33.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11492: bhagavān: vibudhā mā viṣaṇṇās stha prahlādo bhaktimān iti / pāścātyaṃ janma tasyedaṃ mokṣārho 'sāv arindamaḥ //MU_5,33.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11493: ita uttaram etena garbhatā danusūnunā / na kartavyā pradagdhena bījenevāṅkurakriyā //MU_5,33.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11494: guṇavān nirguṇo jāta ity anarthakramaṃ viduḥ / nirguṇo guṇavāñ jāta ity āhus siddhidaṃ kramam //MU_5,33.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11495: ātmīyāni vicitrāṇi bhuvanāny amarottamāḥ / prayāta nāsukhāyaiṣā prāhlādī guṇiteha vaḥ //MU_5,33.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11496: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvā vibudhāṃs tatra kṣīrodārṇavavīciṣu / antardhānaṃ yayau devas taṭatāpiñchagucchavat //MU_5,33.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11497: so 'pi sampūjitaharis suraugho 'vrajad ambaram / punar mandaranirdhūtāt kaṇajālam ivārṇavāt //MU_5,33.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11498: prahlādaṃ prati gīrvāṇās tatas snigdhatvam āyayuḥ / mahānto yatra nodvignās tatra viśvāsavan manaḥ //MU_5,33.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11499: pratyahaṃ pūjayām āsa devadevaṃ janārdanam / manasā karmaṇā vācā prahlādo bhaktimān iti //MU_5,33.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11500: atha pūjāparasyāsya samavardhanta kālataḥ / vivekānandavairāgyavibhavapramukhā guṇāḥ //MU_5,33.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11501: nābhyanandad asau bhogapūgaṃ śuṣkam iva drumam / na cāramata kāntāsu mṛgo marumahīṣv iva //MU_5,33.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11502: na reme lokacarcāsu śāstrārthakathanād ṛte / nājāyata ratis tasya dṛśye sthala ivābjinī //MU_5,33.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11503: na viśaśrāma ceto 'sya bhogarogānurañjane / muktāphalam asaṃśliṣṭaṃ muktāphala ivātale //MU_5,33.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11504: tyaktabhogābhikalanaṃ viśrāntim atha nāgatam / cetaḥ kevalam asyāsīd dolāyām iva yojitam //MU_5,33.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11505: prāhlādīṃ tāṃ sthitiṃ kṛṣṇadehaḥ kṣīrodakoṭarāt / viveda sarvagatayā tayā paramakāntayā //MU_5,33.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11506: atha pātālamārgeṇa viṣṇur āhlāditāgragaḥ / pūjādevagṛhaṃ tasya prahlādasya samāyayau //MU_5,33.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11507: vijñāyābhyāgataṃ devaṃ pūjayā dviguṇeddhayā / daityendraḥ puṇḍarīkākṣam ādarāt paryapūjayat //MU_5,33.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11508: pūjāgṛhagataṃ devaṃ pratyakṣāvasthitaṃ harim / prahlādaḥ paramaprīto girā tuṣṭāva puṣṭayā //MU_5,33.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11509: prahlādaḥ: tribhuvanabhavanābhirāmakośaṃ sakalakalaṅkaharaṃ paraṃ prakāśam / aśaraṇaśaraṇaṃ śaraṇyam īśaṃ harim ajam īśvaram acyutaṃ prapadye //MU_5,33.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11512: sitamaṇigaṇatārakāvakīrṇaṃ smitadhavalānanapīvarendubimbam / hṛdayamaṇimarīcijālagaṅgaṃ hariśaradambaram ātataṃ prapadye //MU_5,33.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11513: tribhuvananalinīsitāravindaṃ timirasamānavimohadīpam agryam / jaḍataram ajaḍaṃ cidātmatattvaṃ jagadakhilārtiharaṃ hariṃ prapadye //MU_5,33.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11515: aviratahatasṛṣṭasargalīlaṃ satatam ajātam avardhanaṃ viśālam / yugaśatajaraḍhābhijātadehaṃ tarutalaśāyinam arbhakaṃ prapadye //MU_5,33.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11516: ditisutanalinītuṣārapātaṃ suranalinīsatatoditārkabimbam / kamalajanalinījalāvapūraṃ hṛdi nalinīnilayaṃ vibhuṃ prapadye //MU_5,33.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11517_0: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti guṇabahulābhir vāgbhir abhyarcito 'sau harir asuravināśaś śrīniṣaṇṇāṃsadeśaḥ / jalada iva mayūraṃ prītimān
GSP27moksop_u:11520: bhagavān: varaṃ guṇanidhe daityakulacūḍāmahāmaṇe / gṛhāṇābhimataṃ bhūyojanmaduḥkhopaśāntaye //MU_5,34.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11521: prahlādaḥ: sarvasaṅkalpaphalada sarvalokāntarasthita / yad udāratamaṃ vetsi tad evādiśa deva me //MU_5,34.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11522: bhagavān: sarvasambhramasaṃśāntyai paramāya phalāya ca / brahmaviśrāntiparyanto viveko 'stu tavānagha //MU_5,34.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11523: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvā ditiputrendraṃ viṣṇur antaradhīyata / kṛtaghargharanirhrādas taraṅgas toyadher iva //MU_5,34.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11524: viṣṇāv antarhite deve pūjāyāḥ kusumāñjalim / pāścātyaṃ dānavas tyaktvā maṇiratnapariṣkṛtam //MU_5,34.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11525: padmāsanastho 'tha mṛdāv upaviśya varāsane / stotrapāṭhavidhāv atra cintayām āsa cintayā //MU_5,34.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11526: vicāravān eva bhavān bhavatv iti bhavāriṇā / devenokto 'smi tenāntaḥ karomy āśu vicāraṇām //MU_5,34.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11527: kim ahaṃ nāma tāvat syāṃ yo 'smin bhuvanaḍambare / vacmi gacchāmi tiṣṭhāmi prayate cāharāmi ca //MU_5,34.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11528: jagat tāvad idaṃ nāhaṃ savṛkṣavanaparvatam / yad bāhyaṃ jaḍam atyantaṃ tat syāṃ katham ahaṃ kila //MU_5,34.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11529: asann abhyutthito mūkaḥ pavanais sphurati kṣaṇam / kālenālpena vilayī deho nāham acetanaḥ //MU_5,34.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11530: jaḍayā karṇaśaṣkulyā kalpyamānaḥ kṣaṇasthayā / śūnyākṛtiś śūnyabhavaś śabdo nāham acetanaḥ //MU_5,34.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11531: tvacā kṣaṇavināśinyā prāpyam aprāpyam anyathā / citprasādopalabdhātma sparśanaṃ nāsmy acetanam //MU_5,34.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11532: labdhātmā jihvayā tuccho lolayā lolasattayā / svalpaspando dravyaniṣṭho raso nāham acetanaḥ //MU_5,34.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11533: dṛśyadarśanayor līnaṃ kṣayi kṣaṇavināśinoḥ / kevale draṣṭari kṣīṇaṃ rūpaṃ nāham acetanam //MU_5,34.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11534: nāsayātyantajaḍayā kṣayiṇyā parikalpitaḥ / pelavo 'niyatādhāro gandho nāham acetanaḥ //MU_5,34.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11535: nirmamo 'mananaś śānto gatapañcendriyabhramaḥ / śuddhaś cetana evāhaṃ kalākalanavarjitaḥ //MU_5,34.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11537: ā idānīṃ smṛtaṃ satyam etat tad akhilaṃ mayā / nirvikalpacidābhāsa eṣa ātmāsmi sarvagaḥ //MU_5,34.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11538: anena cetaneneme sarve ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ / sūryāntā avabhāsante dīpenottamatejasā //MU_5,34.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11539: anenaitās sphurantīha vicitrendriyavṛttayaḥ / tejasāntaḥ prakāśena yathāgnikaṇapaṅktayaḥ //MU_5,34.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11540: anenaitās sphuranty antar manomananaśaktayaḥ / sarvagena nidāghena yathā marumarīcayaḥ //MU_5,34.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11541: anenaitat padārthānāṃ vastutvaṃ pratipādyate / śuklādiguṇavattvaṃ svaṃ pradīpeneva vāsasām //MU_5,34.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11542: asāv eva hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva jāgratām / sarvānubhavitā bhūmāv ātmā makuravat sthitaḥ //MU_5,34.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11543: asya tasyāvikalpasya ciddīpasya prasādataḥ / uṣṇo 'rkaś śiśiraś candro ghano 'drir vidrutaṃ payaḥ //MU_5,34.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11544: sātatyenānubhūtānāṃ padārthānām anena tat / padārthatvam udety uccaiḥ pratāpeneva taptatā //MU_5,34.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11545: brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ jagatsthitau / etat kāraṇam ādyaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ nāsya vidyate //MU_5,34.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11546: akāraṇād akaraṇāt sarvakāraṇakāraṇāt / etasmāj jagad utpannam idaṃ śaityaṃ himād iva //MU_5,34.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11547: ciccetyadraṣṭṛdṛśyādināmabhir varjitātmane / sate sakṛdvibhātāya mahyam asmai namo namaḥ //MU_5,34.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11548: etasmin sarvabhūtāni nirvikalpacidātmani / guṇabhūtāni bhūteśe tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca //MU_5,34.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11549: yat kilānena kalitaṃ cetanenāntar ātmanā / tat tad bhavati sarvatra netarat sad api sthitam //MU_5,34.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11550: yac citā kalitaṃ kiñcit tad āpnoti nijaṃ padam / yac citā kalitaṃ neha tat sad apy astam āgatam //MU_5,34.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11551: imā ghaṭapaṭākārapadārthaśatapaṅktayaḥ / jāgatyo vipulādarśe hy asmin vyomani bimbitāḥ //MU_5,34.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11552: adṛśyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ prāpyaṃ galitacetasām / etat tad dṛśyate sadbhiḥ paraṃ vyometi tanmayaiḥ //MU_5,34.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11553: etad vṛddhaṃ vṛddhimati kṣayi kṣayiṇi jāgate / padārthe sad asac cāpi pratibimbārkavat sthitam //MU_5,34.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11554: iyam abhyudayaṃ yāti nānātā dṛśyamañjarī / ācāracañcarīkāḍhyā etasmād kāraṇadrumād //MU_5,34.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11555: asmād iyam udety uccais saṃsāraracanā calā / vicitratarugulmāḍhyā śailād iva vanāvalī //MU_5,34.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11556: sarveṣām avibhinno 'sau trailokyodaravartinām / brahmādīnāṃ tṛṇāntānāṃ cidātmā samprakāśakaḥ //MU_5,34.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11557: eṣo 'sāv aham ādyantarahitas sarvagākṛtiḥ / carācarāṇām bhūtānām antas svānubhavas sthitaḥ //MU_5,34.38//
GSP27moksop_u:11558: asya tasya mamemāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca / parisaṅkhyāvihīnāni śarīrāṇi bahūni ca //MU_5,34.39//
GSP27moksop_u:11559: eṣo 'sāv aham ekātmā svānubhūtivaśāt svayam / sarvadṛgdraṣṭṛdṛśyatvāt sahasrakaralocanaḥ //MU_5,34.40//
GSP27moksop_u:11560: eṣo 'sāv aham ākāśe sūryadehena cāruṇā / viharāmītareṇāpi vāyudehena vāhinā //MU_5,34.41//
GSP27moksop_u:11561: mamaitad vapur ānīlaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam / sarvasaubhāgyasīmānto hy asmiñ jagati valgati //MU_5,34.42//
GSP27moksop_u:11562: aham asmin samudbhūtaḥ padmāsanagatas sadā / nirvikalpasamādhisthaḥ parāṃ nirvṛtim āgataḥ //MU_5,34.43//
GSP27moksop_u:11563: ahaṃ trinetrayākṛtyā gaurīvaktrābjaṣaṭpadaḥ / sargānte saṃharāmīdaṃ kūrmo 'ṅgapaṭalaṃ yathā //MU_5,34.44//
GSP27moksop_u:11564: aham aindreṇa rūpeṇa trilokīmaṭhikām imām / pālayāmi kramaprāptāṃ maṭhikām iva tāpasaḥ //MU_5,34.45//
GSP27moksop_u:11565: ahaṃ tṛṇalatāgulmajālaṃ rasatayā sthitaḥ / utthāpayāmi cidbhūmeḥ kūpād urulatām iva //MU_5,34.46//
GSP27moksop_u:11566: svalīlārtham idaṃ cāru jagadāḍambaraṃ tatam / mayābhijātabālena paṅkakrīḍanakaṃ yathā //MU_5,34.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11567: mayīdam arpyate sarvaṃ sattāṃ māṃ prāpya gacchati / matparityaktam etac ca sad apy eva na kiñcana //MU_5,34.48//
GSP27moksop_u:11568: mayi sphāre cidādarśe pratibimbaṃ yad āgatam / tad asti netarat tasmān matto 'nyan neha vidyate //MU_5,34.49//
GSP27moksop_u:11569: kusumeṣv aham āmodaḥ padmapattreṣv ahaṃ chaviḥ / chaviṣv ahaṃ rūpakalā rūpeṣv anubhavo 'py aham //MU_5,34.50//
GSP27moksop_u:11570: yad yat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam / sarvasaṅkalparahitaṃ tac cittattvam ahaṃ param //MU_5,34.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11571: āpyā rasamayī śaktir aṇvoghavivṛtodayā / sā yathā dārukuḍyeṣu tathāhaṃ sarvavastuṣu //MU_5,34.52//
GSP27moksop_u:11572: paramāṃ tām ahaṃ sarvapadārthāntaravartitām / upetya saṃvidvaicitryaṃ pratanomi svayecchayā //MU_5,34.53//
GSP27moksop_u:11573: ghṛtaṃ yathāntaḥ payasi rasaśaktir yathā jale / cicchaktis sarvabhāveṣu tathāntar aham āsthitaḥ //MU_5,34.54//
GSP27moksop_u:11574: idaṃ jagat trikālasthaṃ citi mayy eva saṃsthitam / cetyopacārarahitaṃ vastujātam ivāvanau //MU_5,34.55//
GSP27moksop_u:11575: bharitāśeṣadikkukṣis tyaktasaṅkocavibhramaḥ / sarvasthas sarvadhartā ca virāṭ samrāḍ ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,34.56//
GSP27moksop_u:11576: apūrvam anibaddhendram aśastradalitāmaram / aprārthitaṃ me samprāptaṃ jagadrājyam idaṃ tatam //MU_5,34.57//
GSP27moksop_u:11577: aho nu vitatātmāsmi na māmy ātmātmanātmani / kalpāntapavanocchūna ekārṇava ivārṇave //MU_5,34.58//
GSP27moksop_u:11578: nātmany antam avāpnomi svacche 'ntas svodite svayam / kṣīravārinidhau paṅgus sarīsṛpa iva sphuran //MU_5,34.59//
GSP27moksop_u:11579: svalpeyaṃ maṭhikā brāhmī jagannāmnī susaṅkaṭā / gajo bilva ivāsyāṃ me na māti vipulaṃ vapuḥ //MU_5,34.60//
GSP27moksop_u:11580: viriñcasadanāt pāre tattvānte 'py āharat padam / prasaraty eva me rūpam adyāpi na nivartate //MU_5,34.61//
GSP27moksop_u:11581: ayaṃ nāmāham ity antaḥ kuto niravalambanā / aparyantākṛter eṣā kilāsīt svalpatā mama //MU_5,34.62//
GSP27moksop_u:11582: bhavān ayam ahaṃ cāyam iti mithyaiva vibhramaḥ / ko dehaḥ ko 'py adeho vāpy apāravapuṣaś citaḥ //MU_5,34.63//
GSP27moksop_u:11583: varākāḥ pelavadhiyo babhūvur me pitāmahāḥ / ye sāmrājyam idaṃ tyaktvā remire 'rthavibhūtiṣu //MU_5,34.64//
GSP27moksop_u:11584: kveyaṃ kila mahādṛṣṭir bharitā brahmabṛṃhitā / kva sarīsṛpabhīmābhī ratī rājyavibhūtibhiḥ //MU_5,34.65//
GSP27moksop_u:11585: anantānantasambhogā paropaśamaśālinī / śuddheyaṃ cinmayī dṛṣṭir jayaty akhiladṛṣṭiṣu //MU_5,34.66//
GSP27moksop_u:11586: sarvabhāvāntarasthāya cetyamuktacidātmane / pratyakcetanarūpāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,34.67//
GSP27moksop_u:11587: jayāmy aham ahaṃ jāto jīrṇasaṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ / prāptaḥ prāpto mayātmāyaṃ jīvāmi ca jayāmi ca //MU_5,34.68//
GSP27moksop_u:11588: idam uttamasāmrājyaṃ bodhaṃ santyajya śāśvatam / na rame 'ham aramyāsu rājyaduḥkhavibhūtiṣu //MU_5,34.69//
GSP27moksop_u:11589: dāruvāridṛṣanmātre lulubhe yo dharātale / dhig varākam anātmajñaṃ taṃ pitāmahakīṭakam //MU_5,34.70//
GSP27moksop_u:11590: avidyaikātmabhir dravyair avidyāmayam ājyapam / ajñena santarpayatā kiṃ nāma guruṇā kṛtam //MU_5,34.71//
GSP27moksop_u:11591: varṣāṇi katicit prāpya jagadgrāmaṭikām imām / kiṃ nāma prāpad ucitaṃ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ kila //MU_5,34.72//
GSP27moksop_u:11592: anāsvādya śamānandaṃ jagadrājyaśatāny api / samāsvādayatā neha kiñcid āsvāditaṃ bhavet //MU_5,34.73//
GSP27moksop_u:11593: na kiñcid yena samprāptaṃ tenedaṃ paramāmṛtam / samprāpyāntaḥ prapūrṇena sarvaṃ prāptam akhaṇḍitam //MU_5,34.74//
GSP27moksop_u:11594: tyaktāmitapado mūrkho mitam eti na paṇḍitaḥ / uṣṭro hi tyaktasulataḥ kaṇṭakaṃ yāti netaraḥ //MU_5,34.75//
GSP27moksop_u:11595: parāṃ dṛṣṭim imāṃ tyaktvā dagdharājye rameta kaḥ / kas tyaktekṣurasaḥ prājñaḥ kaṭunimbapayaḥ pibet //MU_5,34.76//
GSP27moksop_u:11596: mūrkhā eva hi te sarve babhūvur me pitāmahāḥ / imāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ parityajya ye ratā rājyasaṅkaṭe //MU_5,34.77//
GSP27moksop_u:11597: kva phullā nandanasthalyaḥ kva dagdhā marubhūmayaḥ / kvemā bodhadṛśaś śāntāḥ kva bhogeṣv ātmabuddhayaḥ //MU_5,34.78//
GSP27moksop_u:11598: na kiñcid asti trailokye yad rājyam abhivāñchyate / sarvaṃ cāsty eva cittattve tat kasmān nānubhūyate //MU_5,34.79//
GSP27moksop_u:11599: citā sarvasthayā svacchasamayā nirvikārayā / sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvatas sādhu labhyate //MU_5,34.80//
GSP27moksop_u:11600: bhānavī taijasī śaktir amṛtasrutir aindavī / brāhmī mahattā mahatī śākrī trailokyarājatā //MU_5,34.81//
GSP27moksop_u:11601: paramā pūrṇatā śārvī jayalakṣmīś ca vaiṣṇavī / mānasī śīghragamitā balavattā tu vāyavī //MU_5,34.82//
GSP27moksop_u:11602: āgneyī dāhakalanā pāyasī rasanirvṛtiḥ / maunī mahātapassiddhir vidyā bārhaspatī tathā //MU_5,34.83//
GSP27moksop_u:11603: vaimānikī vyomagatā sthiratāpi ca pārvatī / gambhīratātha sāmudrī mairavī ca mahonnatiḥ //MU_5,34.84//
GSP27moksop_u:11604: samaśrīs saugatī somyā mādanī madalolatā / mādhavī puṣpamayatā śāradī ghanasasyatā //MU_5,34.85//
GSP27moksop_u:11605: yākṣī ca māyāmayatā nābhasī niṣkalaṅkatā / śītatāpi ca tauṣārī naidāghī tāpataptatā //MU_5,34.86//
GSP27moksop_u:11606: etāś cānyās tathā bahvyo deśakālakriyātmikāḥ / nānākāravikārotthās trikālodarasaṃsthitāḥ //MU_5,34.87//
GSP27moksop_u:11607: vicitrāś śaktayas svacchasamayā nirvikārayā / citā kriyante parayā kalākalanamuktayā //MU_5,34.88//
GSP27moksop_u:11608: vikalpahīnā cit sarvapadārthaśatadṛṣṭiṣu / samam evābhipatati prabhā prābhākarī yathā //MU_5,34.89//
GSP27moksop_u:11609: sarvāśākośaviśrāntāṃ padārthapaṭalīṃ mahī / kālatrayehākalitāṃ yathānubhavati kṣaṇāt //MU_5,34.90//
GSP27moksop_u:11610: tathā samastasaṃsārabṛhaddṛśyadaśāśriyam / kālatrayasthām amalā cic cinoti tatātmikā //MU_5,34.91//
GSP27moksop_u:11613: tulyakālāvabuddhena mṛdunā kaṭunā ca cit / samena samatām eti madhuniṣṭhānubhūtivat //MU_5,34.94//
GSP27moksop_u:11616: bhāvena bhāvam āśritya bhāvas tyajati duḥkhitām / prekṣya bhāvam abhāvena bhāvas tyajati tuṣṭatām //MU_5,34.97//
GSP27moksop_u:11617: kālatrayam upekṣitryā hīnāyāś cetyabandhanaiḥ / citaś cetyam upekṣitryās samataivāvaśiṣyate //MU_5,34.98//
GSP27moksop_u:11618: yāti vācām agamyatvād asattām iva śāśvatīm / nairātmyasiddhāntadaśām upayāteva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,34.99//
GSP27moksop_u:11619: bhavaty ātmā tathā brahma nakiñcic cākhilaṃ ca vā / paramopaśame līnā mokṣanāmnā parocyate //MU_5,34.100//
GSP27moksop_u:11620: saṅkalpakalitā tv eṣā mandābhāsatayā jagat / na samyak paśyatīdaṃ cid dṛṣṭiḥ paṭalinī yathā //MU_5,34.101//
GSP27moksop_u:11621: īhānīhāmayair antar yā cid āvalitā malaiḥ / sā hi notpatituṃ śaktā pāśabaddheva pakṣiṇī //MU_5,34.102//
GSP27moksop_u:11622: saṅkalpakalanenaiva ye kecana janā ime / patitā mohajāleṣu vinetrā iva pakṣiṇaḥ //MU_5,34.103//
GSP27moksop_u:11623: saṅkalpajālavalitair viṣayāvaṭapātibhiḥ / padavī gatabādheyaṃ na dṛṣṭā matpitāmahaiḥ //MU_5,34.104//
GSP27moksop_u:11624: dinaiḥ katipayair eva sphuritvā dharaṇītale / varākās tena te naṣṭā maṣakāḥ kuhareṣv iva //MU_5,34.105//
GSP27moksop_u:11625: ajñāsyan yadi te tattvaṃ bhogaduḥkhārthinas tataḥ / bhāvābhāvāndhakūpeṣu nāpatiṣyan hatāśayāḥ //MU_5,34.106//
GSP27moksop_u:11626: icchādveṣasamutthena dvandvamohena jantavaḥ / dharāvivaramagnānāṃ kīṭānāṃ samatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,34.107//
GSP27moksop_u:11627: īhitānīhitākārā kalanāmṛgatṛṣṇikā / satyāvabodhameghena yasya śāntā sa jīvati //MU_5,34.108//
GSP27moksop_u:11628: kutaḥ kilāsyāś śuddhāyā avicchinnāmalākṛteḥ / candrikāyā rucaḥ koṣṇāḥ kalaṅkakalanāś citaḥ //MU_5,34.109//
GSP27moksop_u:11629: ātmane 'stu namo mahyam avicchinnacidātmane / lokālokamaṇe deva cireṇādhigato 'sy aho //MU_5,34.110//
GSP27moksop_u:11630: parāmṛṣṭo 'si labdho 'si prodito 'si cirāya ca / uddhṛto 'si vikalpebhyo yo 'si so 'si namo 'stu te //MU_5,34.111//
GSP27moksop_u:11631: mahyaṃ tubhyam anantāya tubhyaṃ mahyaṃ śivātmane / namo devātidevāya parāya paramātmane //MU_5,34.112//
GSP27moksop_u:11632: gataghanam iva pūrṇam indubimbaṃ gatakalanāvaraṇaṃ svam eva rūpam / svavapuṣi muditaṃ svayaṃ svasaṃsthaṃ svayam uditaṃ svarasaṃ svayaṃ namāmi //MU_5,34.113//
GSP27moksop_u:11635: prahlādaḥ: om ity ākāritākāro vikāraparivarjitaḥ / ātmaivāyaṃ idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiñcij jagatīgatam //MU_5,35.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11636: medo'sthimāṃsamajjāsṛgatīto 'py eṣa cetanaḥ / antarastho 'pi sūryādīn prakāśayati dīpakaḥ //MU_5,35.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11637: uṣṇīkaroti dahanaṃ rasayaty amṛto rasaṃ / indriyānubhavān bhuṅkte bhogān iva mahīpatiḥ //MU_5,35.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11638: tiṣṭhann api hi nāsīno gacchann api na gacchati / śānto 'pi vyavahārasthaḥ kurvann api na lipyate //MU_5,35.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11639: pūrvam adya tathedānīm ihāmutrobhayatra ca / pihito 'pihito 'py eṣa samas sarvāsu vṛttiṣu //MU_5,35.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11640: udbhavanyagbhavābhāvabhāvanābhir itas tataḥ / brahmāditṛṇaparyantaṃ jagad āvartayan sthitaḥ //MU_5,35.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11641: nityaspandamayo nityam api devāt sadāgateḥ / sthāṇor apy akriyo nityam ākāśād apy alepakaḥ //MU_5,35.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11642: manāṃsi kṣobhayaty eṣa pallavān iva mārutaḥ / vāhayaty akṣapaṅktiṃ vā svāśvālīm iva sārathiḥ //MU_5,35.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11643: atiduḥkhitavad dehagehe karmakaras sadā / samrāḍ ivātmani svāsthyasaṃsthito bhogabhug vibhuḥ //MU_5,35.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11644: eṣa eva sadānveṣyas stutyo dhyātavya eva ca / jarāmaraṇasammohād anenottīrya gamyate //MU_5,35.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11645: sulabhaś cāyam atyantaṃ sujñeyaś cāptabandhuvat / śarīrapadmakuhare sarveṣām eva ṣaṭpadaḥ //MU_5,35.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11646: anākṛṣṭo 'py anāhūtas svadehād eva labhyate / manāg evopahūto 'pi kṣaṇād bhavati sammukhaḥ //MU_5,35.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11647: nāsya saṃsevyamānasya sarvasampattiśālinaḥ / dhanānām īśvarasyeva smayo garvo 'tha vā bhavet //MU_5,35.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11648: āmoda iva puṣpeṣu tailaṃ tilakaṇeṣv iva / rasajātiṣv ivāsvādo devo deheṣu saṃsthitaḥ //MU_5,35.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11649: avicāravaśād eṣa hṛdayastho 'pi cetanaḥ / na jñāyate cirād dṛṣṭa iṣṭabandhur ivāgragaḥ //MU_5,35.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11650: vicāraṇāt parijñāte etasmin parameśvare / abhyudeti parānando labdhe priyajane yathā //MU_5,35.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11651: asmin dṛṣṭe pare bandhāv uddāmānandadāyini / āyānti dṛṣṭayas tās tā yābhir bandho vilīyate //MU_5,35.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11652: truṭyanti sarvataḥ pāśāḥ kṣīyante sarvaśatravaḥ / na kṛntanti manāṃsy āśā gṛhāṇīva durākhavaḥ //MU_5,35.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11653: asmin dṛṣṭe jagad dṛṣṭaṃ śrute 'smin sakalaṃ śrutam / spṛṣṭe cāsmiñ jagat spṛṣṭaṃ sthite 'smin saṃsthitaṃ jagat //MU_5,35.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11654: eṣa jāgarti suptānāṃ praharaty avivekinām / haraty āpadam ārtānāṃ vitaraty amahātmanām //MU_5,35.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11655: vicaraty eṣa lokeṣu dīpa eva jagatsthitau / vilasaty eṣa bhogeṣu prasphuraty eṣa vastuṣu //MU_5,35.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11656: ātmanātmānam evāntaś śāntenānubhavan bhavī / sthitas sarveṣu deheṣu tiktatvaṃ mariceṣv iva //MU_5,35.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11658: eṣa śūnyatvam ākāśe spanda eṣa sadāgatau / prakāśaś caiṣa tejassu payasy eṣa rasaḥ paraḥ //MU_5,35.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11659: kāṭhinyam avanāv eṣa auṣṇyam eṣa hutāśane / śaityam eṣa niśānāthe sattā caiṣa jagadgaṇe //MU_5,35.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11660: maṣīpiṇḍe yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śauklyaṃ himakaṇe yathā / yathā puṣpeṣu saugandhyaṃ dehe dehapatis tathā //MU_5,35.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11661: yathā sarvagatā sattā kālas sarvagato yathā / yathā sarvagataṃ vyoma vibhus sarvagatas tathā //MU_5,35.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11662: prabhuśaktir mahīpasya sarvadeśagatā yathā / rūpālokamanaskāramuktaṃ sattvaṃ tathātmanaḥ //MU_5,35.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11663: nityas so 'yam ahaṃ devo devānām avabodhakaḥ / svayam ātmāsmi me nāsti kalanāvit kiletarā //MU_5,35.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11664: reṇunevāṇunā vyomni padmapattra ivāmbhasā / sambhrameṇeva pāṣāṇe sambandho mayi nainasā //MU_5,35.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11665: sukhaduḥkhaśriyo dehe mā patantu patantu vā / tumbakopari dhārāś ca kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā //MU_5,35.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11666: dīpāṅgābhigato rajjvā nāloko badhyate yathā / tathaivāyam abaddho 'haṃ sarvabhāvagaṇātigaḥ //MU_5,35.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11667: sambandhaḥ ko nu naḥ kāmair bhāvābhāvair athendriyaiḥ / kena sambadhyate vyoma kena vā gṛhyate manaḥ //MU_5,35.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11668: śarīre śatadhā yāte khaṇḍanā kā śarīriṇaḥ / kumbhe rugṇe kṣate kṣīṇe kumbhākāśasya kā kṣatiḥ //MU_5,35.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11669: piśācaka ivādṛśyo mano nāmoditaṃ mudhā / jaḍe tasmin kṣate bodhāt kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā //MU_5,35.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11670: sukhaduḥkhamayī yasya vāsanā tan mano mama / abhavat pūrvam adyaikā sampannā nanu nirvṛtiḥ //MU_5,35.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11671: anyo bhuṅkte 'nya ādatte 'py anyasyānarthasaṅkaṭaḥ / anyaḥ paśyaty aho maurkhyaṃ kasyeyaṃ khalu cakrikā //MU_5,35.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11672: bhuṅkte prakṛtir ādatte mano dehasya saṅkaṭaḥ / draṣṭātmā maurkhyam astīha na kiñcit keva me kṣatiḥ //MU_5,35.38//
GSP27moksop_u:11673: na me bhogasthitau vāñchā na ca bhogavivarjane / yad āyāti tad āyātu yat prayāti prayātu tat //MU_5,35.39//
GSP27moksop_u:11674: sukheṣu mama nāpekṣā nopekṣā duḥkhavṛttiṣu / sukhaduḥkhāny upāyāntu yāntu vāpy aham eṣu kaḥ //MU_5,35.40//
GSP27moksop_u:11675: vāsanā vividhā dehe tv astaṃ vodayam eva vā / prayāntu nāham etāsu na caitā mama kāścana //MU_5,35.41//
GSP27moksop_u:11676: etāvantam ahaṃ kālam ajñānaripuṇoruṇā / hṛtvā vivekasarvasvam ekāntam avapothitaḥ //MU_5,35.42//
GSP27moksop_u:11677: vaiṣṇavena prasādena svasamutthena cāruṇā / idānīṃ svaṃ parijñāya mayaiṣa paripothitaḥ //MU_5,35.43//
GSP27moksop_u:11679: nirahaṅkārayakṣo 'yaṃ maccharīramahādrumaḥ / puṇyatām alam āyātaḥ praphulta iva rājate //MU_5,35.45//
GSP27moksop_u:11681: jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilaṃ dṛṣṭā draṣṭavyadṛṣṭayaḥ / tat prāptam adhunā yena na prāpyam iha śiṣyate //MU_5,35.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11683: rajorahitasarvāśāṃ śītalopaśamadrumām / prāpto 'smi vitatāṃ bhūmim unnatāṃ pāramārthikīm //MU_5,35.49//
GSP27moksop_u:11684: stutyā praṇatyā vijñaptyā śamena niyamena ca / labdho 'yaṃ bhagavān ātmā dṛṣṭaś cādhigatas sphuṭam //MU_5,35.50//
GSP27moksop_u:11685: ahaṅkārapadātītaś cirāt saṃsmṛtim āgataḥ / svabhāvo bhagavān ātmā viṣṇur brahma sanātanam //MU_5,35.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11689: ahaṃ ciram ahaṅkāradviṣā samavapothitaḥ / niśāyām alpadhairyātmā piśāceneva jaṅgale //MU_5,35.55//
GSP27moksop_u:11690: svayam eva tvayedānīṃ kriyāśaktyā svayaiva hi / śaurivāgvyapadeśena vivekaśrīr vibodhitā //MU_5,35.56//
GSP27moksop_u:11691: prabuddhe bhavatīśāne tam ahaṅkārarākṣasam / na paśyāmi vibho dīpe jvalite timiraṃ yathā //MU_5,35.57//
GSP27moksop_u:11692: tasyāhaṅkārayakṣasya manovivaravāsinaḥ / dīpasyeva praśāntasya na vedmi gatim īśvara //MU_5,35.58//
GSP27moksop_u:11693: dṛṣṭa eva tvayīśāne palāyanaparāyaṇaḥ / sampanno madahambhāvaś cauras sūryodaye yathā //MU_5,35.59//
GSP27moksop_u:11694: asadabhyutthite tasminn ahaṅkārapiśācake / śānte tiṣṭhāmy atisvastho nirgonāsa iva drumaḥ //MU_5,35.60//
GSP27moksop_u:11695: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi jāgarmy asmi prabodhavān / taskareṇāvamukto 'smi nirvṛto 'smi cirād ayam //MU_5,35.61//
GSP27moksop_u:11696: śaityam abhyāgato 'smy antaś śāntāśāmṛgatṛṣṇikaḥ / prāvṛḍambubharasnātaś śāntadāva ivācalaḥ //MU_5,35.62//
GSP27moksop_u:11697: pramārjite 'ham ity asmin pade sārthe vicārataḥ / ko mohaḥ kāni duḥkhāni kāḥ kadāśāḥ ka ātapaḥ //MU_5,35.63//
GSP27moksop_u:11698: narakasvargamokṣādibhramās satyām ahaṅkṛtau / bhittāv eva pravartante citrehā na nabhastale //MU_5,35.64//
GSP27moksop_u:11699: ahaṅkārakalāpīne citte sāracamatkṛtiḥ / na rājate 'ṃśuke mlāne yathā kuṅkumarañjanā //MU_5,35.65//
GSP27moksop_u:11700: nirahaṅkārajalade tṛṣṇāsāravivarjite / bhāti cittaśaradvyomni svacchatā kāntiśālinī //MU_5,35.66//
GSP27moksop_u:11701: nirahaṅkārapaṅkāya samprasannāntarāya ca / mahyam ānandasarase tubhyam ātman namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.67//
GSP27moksop_u:11702: gatāhaṅkārameghāya śāntāśādāvavahnaye / mahyam ānandaśailāya viśrāntāya namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.68//
GSP27moksop_u:11703: śāntendriyogragrāhāya kṣīṇacittaurvavahnaye / ānandāmbudhaye tubhyaṃ mahyam ātman namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.69//
GSP27moksop_u:11704: praphultānandapadmāya śāntacintāmahormaye / mahyam unmānasāyātmaṃs tubhyam antar namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.70//
GSP27moksop_u:11705: saṃvidābhāsapakṣāya padmakoṭaravāsine / sarvamānasahaṃsāya svātmane 'ntar namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.71//
GSP27moksop_u:11706: kalākalitarūpāya niṣkalāyāmitātmane / sadoditātipūrṇātmaśaśine te namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.72//
GSP27moksop_u:11707: sadoditāya śītāya mahāhṛddhvāntahāriṇe / sarvagāyāpy adṛśyāya citsūryāya namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.73//
GSP27moksop_u:11708: asnehasnehadīprāya vartyatikrāntavartine / svabhāvādhāradhīrāya ciddīpāya namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.74//
GSP27moksop_u:11709: mananānalasantaptaṃ śītena manasā manaḥ / chinnam antar mayā taptam ayaseva balād ayaḥ //MU_5,35.75//
GSP27moksop_u:11710: indriyair indriyaṃ chittvā chittvā ca manasā manaḥ / ahaṅkṛtim ahaṅkṛtyā chittvā śeṣo jayāmy aham //MU_5,35.76//
GSP27moksop_u:11711: bhāvena bhāvam āmṛdya cchittvā tṛṣṇām atṛṣṇayā / niṣpiṣya prajñayāprajñāṃ jñe 'jñas saṃyojito mayā //MU_5,35.77//
GSP27moksop_u:11712: manasā manasi cchinne nirahaṅkāratāṃ gate / bhāvena galite bhāve svasthas tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ //MU_5,35.78//
GSP27moksop_u:11713: nirbhāvaṃ nirahaṅkāram amanaskam anīhitam / kevalaspandaśuddhātma yantraṃ tiṣṭhati me vapuḥ //MU_5,35.79//
GSP27moksop_u:11716: tṛṣṇārajjugaṇaṃ chittvā maccharīrakapañjarāt / na jāne kva gatoḍḍīya durahaṅkṛtipakṣiṇī //MU_5,35.82//
GSP27moksop_u:11717: uddhūlite ghanājñānakulāye kāyapādapāt / na jāne gata uḍḍīya kvāhambhāvavihaṅgamaḥ //MU_5,35.83//
GSP27moksop_u:11718: durāśādīrghadaurātmyā dhūsarā bhogabhasmanā / bhayabhogihatā diṣṭyā vayasyā vāsanā mṛtā //MU_5,35.84//
GSP27moksop_u:11719: etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ ko 'bhūvaṃ cittam īdṛśam / yenāham eva mithyaiva dṛḍhāhaṅkāratāṃ gataḥ //MU_5,35.85//
GSP27moksop_u:11720: adyāham asmi jāto 'yam aham adya mahāmatiḥ / ahaṅkāramahābhreṇa yaḥ kṛṣṇenālam ujjhitaḥ //MU_5,35.86//
GSP27moksop_u:11721: dṛṣṭo 'yam ātmā bhagavān antaś cādhigato mayā / ālabdhaś cānubhūto 'ṅge sānubhūtir niyojitaḥ //MU_5,35.87//
GSP27moksop_u:11722: gatāspadaṃ gatamananaṃ gataiṣaṇaṃ tiraskṛtaṃ nipuṇam ahaṅkṛtibhrame / nirīhitaṃ vyapagatarāgarañjanaṃ vikautukaṃ praśamam idaṃ gataṃ manaḥ //MU_5,35.88//
GSP27moksop_u:11723: duruttarās samaviṣamā mahāpadas sudussahāḥ prabhavanadīrghadoṣadāḥ / gatāḥ kṣayaṃ samadhigato maheśvaraś cidavyayo vyapagatacittam antare //MU_5,35.89//
GSP27moksop_u:11726: prahlādaḥ: ātman sarvapadātīta cirāt saṃsmṛtim āgataḥ / diṣṭyā labdho 'si bhagavan namas te 'stu cidātmane //MU_5,36.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11727: abhivandyāvalokyāyam alam āliṅgyase mayā / ko 'nyas syād bhagavan bandhus tvadṛte bhuvanatraye //MU_5,36.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11728: haṃsi pāsi dadāsi tvaṃ stauṣi yāsi vivalgasi / ayaṃ prāpto 'si dṛṣṭo 'si kiṃ karoṣi kva gacchasi //MU_5,36.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11729: svasattāpūritāśeṣaviśva viśvajanīna he / sarvatra lakṣyase nityam adhunā kva palāyase //MU_5,36.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11730: āvayor antaraṃ bhūrijanmavyavahitāntaram / adūram adya sampannaṃ diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si bāndhava //MU_5,36.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11731: namas te kṛtakṛtyāya kartre hartre namo 'stu te / namas saṃsāranṛtyāya nityāya vimalātmane //MU_5,36.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11732: namaś cakrābjahastāya namaś candrārdhadhāriṇe / namo vibudhanāthāya namas te padmajanmane //MU_5,36.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11733: vācyavācakadṛṣṭyaiva bhedo yo 'yam ihāvayoḥ / asatyā kalpanaivaiṣā vīcivīcyambhasor iva //MU_5,36.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11735: namo draṣṭre namas tvaṣṭre namo 'nantavikāsine / namas sarvasvabhāvāya namas te sarvagāmine //MU_5,36.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11736: pratijanma ciraṃ bahvyo dīrghaduḥkhavatā mayā / tvayā māyopadagdhena digdhena mahatainasā //MU_5,36.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11737: ālokitā lokadaśā dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayaḥ / na prāptas tvaṃ tvayā yena kiñcid āsāditaṃ bhavet //MU_5,36.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11738: sarvaṃ mṛtkāṣṭhapāṣāṇavārimātram idaṃ jagat / nehāsti tvadṛte deva yatprāptau nābhivāñchyate //MU_5,36.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11739: devāyam adya labdho 'si dṛṣṭo 'sy adhigato 'si ca / samprāpto 'si gṛhīto 'si namas te 'stu na mucyase //MU_5,36.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11740: yo 'kṣṇoḥ kanīnikāraśmijālaprotavapus sthitaḥ / devo darśanarūpeṇa kathaṃ so 'ntar na dṛśyate //MU_5,36.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11741: yas tvakpuṣpe spṛśan sparśagandhaṃ tailaṃ tile yathā / sparśam antaḥ karoty eṣa sa kathaṃ nānubhūyate //MU_5,36.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11742: yaś śabdaśravaṇād antaś śabdaśaktiṃ parāmṛśan / romāñcaṃ janayaty aṅge sa dūrasthaḥ kathaṃ bhavet //MU_5,36.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11743: jihvāpallavalagnāni svatītasyāṅgato 'pi ca / svadante yasya vastūni svadate sa na kasya vā //MU_5,36.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11744: puṣpagandhān upādāya ghrāṇahastena dehakam / ya ālepayati prītyā kasyāsau na mukhe sthitaḥ //MU_5,36.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11745: vedavedāntasiddhāntatarkapaurāṇagītibhiḥ / yo gītas sa kathaṃ hy ātmā vijñāto yāti vismṛtim //MU_5,36.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11746: saiveha deva bhogālī subhagāpīyam adya me / antar na svadate svacche tvayi dṛṣṭe parāpare //MU_5,36.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11747: tvayā vimaladīpena bhānuḥ prakaṭatāṃ gataḥ / tvayā śītatuṣāreṇa candraś śiśiratāṃ gataḥ //MU_5,36.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11748: tvayaite guravaś śailās tvayaite dyucarā dhṛtāḥ / tvayaiveyaṃ dharā dhīrā tvayaivāmbaram ambaram //MU_5,36.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11749: diṣṭyā mattām asi prāpto diṣṭyā tvattām ahaṃ gataḥ / ahaṃ tvaṃ tvam ahaṃ deva diṣṭyā bhedo 'sti nāvayoḥ //MU_5,36.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11750: ahaṃ tvam iti śabdābhyāṃ paryāyābhyāṃ mahātmanaḥ / tava vā mama vā sādho sampṛktābhyāṃ namo namaḥ //MU_5,36.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11751: namo mahyam anantāya nirahaṅkārarūpiṇe / namo mahyam arūpāya namaś śamanasadmane //MU_5,36.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11752: mayy ātmani same svacche sākṣibhūte nirākṛtau / dikkālādyanavacchinne svātmany eveha tiṣṭhati //MU_5,36.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11753: manaḥ prakṣobham āyāti sphurantīndriyasaṃvidaḥ / śaktir ullasati sphārā prāṇāpānapravāhinī //MU_5,36.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11754: vahanti dehayantrāṇi kṛṣṭāny āśāvaratrayā / carmamāṃsāsthidigdhāni manassārathimanti ca //MU_5,36.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11755: ayaṃ saṃvidvapur ahaṃ na kvacin na kṛtāspadaḥ / dehaḥ patatu vodetu svayābhimatayecchayā //MU_5,36.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11756: cirād aham ahaṃ jātas svātmalābhaś cirād ayam / cirād upaśamaṃ yāmi kalpasyānte jagad yathā //MU_5,36.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11757: cirāt saṃsāragāmitvād dīrghasaṃsāravartmani / viśrānto 'smi ciraśrāntaḥ kalpasyānta ivānilaḥ //MU_5,36.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11758: sarvātītāya sarvāya tubhyaṃ mahyaṃ namo namaḥ / tebhyo 'pi ca namo 'stv eva ye tvāṃ māṃ pravadanti vā //MU_5,36.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11759: akhilānantasambhogā na spṛṣṭā doṣadṛṣṭibhiḥ / jayaty akṛtasambhārā sākṣitā paramātmanaḥ //MU_5,36.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11760: ātman puṣpa ivāmodaś śastrapiṇḍa ivānalaḥ / tile tailam ivāsmiṃs tvaṃ sarvatra vapuṣi sthitaḥ //MU_5,36.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11761: haṃsi pāsi dadāsi tvam avasphūrjasi valgasi / anahaṅkṛtirūpo 'pi citreyaṃ tava māyitā //MU_5,36.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11762: jayasīśa jvaladdīptis sarvam unmīlayañ jagat / jayasy apagatārambhaṃ jagad bhūyo nimīlayan //MU_5,36.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11763: paramāṇos tavaivāntar idaṃ saṃsāramaṇḍalam / vaṭaś ca vaṭadhānāyāṃ babhūvāsti bhaviṣyati //MU_5,36.38//
GSP27moksop_u:11764: hayadviparathākārair yadvat khe dṛśyate 'mbudaḥ / tadvad ālakṣyase deva padārthaśatavibhramaiḥ //MU_5,36.39//
GSP27moksop_u:11765: bhavānāṃ bhūribhaṅgānām abhāvāya bhavādhipaḥ / bhava bhāvavimuktātmā bhāvābhāvabahiṣkṛtaḥ //MU_5,36.40//
GSP27moksop_u:11766: jahi mānaṃ madaṃ kopaṃ kāluṣyaṃ krūratāṃ tathā / na mahānto nimajjanti prākṛte guṇasaṅkaṭe //MU_5,36.41//
GSP27moksop_u:11767: prāktanīr dīrghadaurātmyadaśās smṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ / ko 'haṃ kiṃ tad babhūveti hasa muktācchaṭāsitam //MU_5,36.42//
GSP27moksop_u:11768: te prayātās samārambhā gatās te dagdhavāsarāḥ / yeṣu cintānalajvālājālajīrṇo bhavān abhūt //MU_5,36.43//
GSP27moksop_u:11769: adya tvaṃ dehanagare rājā sphāramanorathaḥ / na duḥkhair gṛhyase nāpi sukhair vyoma karair iva //MU_5,36.44//
GSP27moksop_u:11770: adyendriyaduraśvāṃs tvaṃ jitvā jitamanogajaḥ / bhogārīn abhito bhaṅktvā sāmrājyam adhitiṣṭhasi //MU_5,36.45//
GSP27moksop_u:11771: apārāmbarapānthas tvam ajasrāstamayodayaḥ / avabhāsakaro nityaṃ bahir antaś ca bhāskaraḥ //MU_5,36.46//
GSP27moksop_u:11772: sarvadaivāsi saṃsuptaś śaktyā saṃvedyase vibho / bhogālokanalīlārthaṃ kāminyā kāmuko yathā //MU_5,36.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11773: dṛkkṣudrābhir upānītaṃ dūrād rūpamadhu tvayā / pīyate svīkṛtaṃ śaktyā netravātāyanasthayā //MU_5,36.48//
GSP27moksop_u:11774: brahmāṇḍakoṭarodvāntāḥ prāṇāpānacarās tvayā / gatāgatair brahmapure samprekṣyante pratikṣaṇam //MU_5,36.49//
GSP27moksop_u:11775: dehapuṣpe tvam āmodo dehendau tv amṛtāmṛtam / rasas tvaṃ dehaviṭape śaityaṃ dehahime bhavān //MU_5,36.50//
GSP27moksop_u:11776: tvayy asti cinmayas snehaś śarīrakṣīrasarpiṣi / tvam antar asya dehasya dāruṇy agnir iva sthitaḥ //MU_5,36.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11777: tvam apām uttamāsvādaḥ prākāśyaṃ tejasām api / avagantā tvam arthānāṃ tvaṃ bhāsām avabhāsakaḥ //MU_5,36.52//
GSP27moksop_u:11778: spandas tvaṃ sarvavāyūnāṃ tvaṃ manohastino madaḥ / prajñānalaśikhāyās tvaṃ prākāśyaṃ taikṣṇyam eva ca //MU_5,36.53//
GSP27moksop_u:11779: tvadvaśād dīpavan māyā kvāpi sampravilīyate / dīpavat punar anyatra samudeti kuto 'pi sā //MU_5,36.54//
GSP27moksop_u:11780: tvayi saṃsāravartinyaḥ padārthāvalayas tathā / kaṭakāṅgadakeyūrayuktayaḥ kanake yathā //MU_5,36.55//
GSP27moksop_u:11781: bhavān ayam ayaṃ cāhaṃ tvaṃ śabdair evamādibhiḥ / svayam evātmanātmānaṃ līlayā stauṣi vakṣi ca //MU_5,36.56//
GSP27moksop_u:11782: mandānilavinunno 'bdo gajāśvanaradṛṣṭibhiḥ / yathā saṃlakṣyate vyomni tathā tvaṃ bhūtadṛṣṭibhiḥ //MU_5,36.57//
GSP27moksop_u:11783: yathā hayagajākārair jvālā lasati vahniṣu / tathaivāvyatiriktas tvaṃ dṛśyair vasasi sṛṣṭiṣu //MU_5,36.58//
GSP27moksop_u:11784: tvaṃ brahmāṇḍakamuktānām acchinnas tantur ātataḥ / kṣetraṃ tvaṃ bhūtasasyānāṃ cidrasāyanasekinām //MU_5,36.59//
GSP27moksop_u:11785: asat tad anabhivyaktaṃ padārthānāṃ prakāśyate / tvayā tattvaṃ yathā paktrā māṃsānāṃ svādavedanam //MU_5,36.60//
GSP27moksop_u:11786: vidyamānāpi vastuśrīr na sthitā tvayi na sthite / vanitārūpalāvaṇyasatteva gatacakṣuṣaḥ //MU_5,36.61//
GSP27moksop_u:11787: sad apīha na sattāyai vastu nākalitaṃ tvayā / tuṣṭaye na svalāvaṇyaṃ makurāpratibimbitam //MU_5,36.62//
GSP27moksop_u:11788: luṭhati tvāṃ vinā dehaḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaḥ kṣitau / sann apy asattayaivātto yāmāsv iva raviṃ vinā //MU_5,36.63//
GSP27moksop_u:11789: sukhaduḥkhakramaḥ prāpya bhavantaṃ parinaśyati / prākāśyam āsādya yathā tamas tejo 'tha vā himam //MU_5,36.64//
GSP27moksop_u:11790: tvadālokanayaivaite sthitiṃ yānti sukhādayaḥ / sūryālokanayā prātar varṇāś śuklādayo yathā //MU_5,36.65//
GSP27moksop_u:11791: labdhātmāno vinaśyanti sambandhakṣaṇa eva te / te tamāṃsīva dīpasya dṛṣṭāv eva vrajanty alam //MU_5,36.66//
GSP27moksop_u:11792: tamastā tamaso dīpāsattāyāṃ sphuṭatāṃ gatā / dīpasambandhasamaye sā cotpatya vinaśyati //MU_5,36.67//
GSP27moksop_u:11793: tathaiva sukhaduḥkhaśrīr dṛṣṭvaiva tvām anāmayam / jāyate jātamātraiva sarvanāśena naśyati //MU_5,36.68//
GSP27moksop_u:11794: bhaṅguratvād iha sthātuṃ kālaṃ nāṇum api kṣamā / nimeṣalakṣabhāgākhyā tanvī kālakalā yathā //MU_5,36.69//
GSP27moksop_u:11795: gatvarī naśvarī tanvī sukhaduḥkhādibhāvanā / sphurati tvatprasādena tvayi dṛṣṭe vilīyate //MU_5,36.70//
GSP27moksop_u:11796: tvadālokakṣaṇodbhūtā tvadālokakṣaṇakṣayā / mṛtaiva jātā jātaiva mṛtā kenopalakṣyate //MU_5,36.71//
GSP27moksop_u:11797: kṣaṇam apy asthiraṃ vastu kathaṃ kāryakaraṃ bhavet / taraṅgair utpalākārair mālā katham ivombhyate //MU_5,36.72//
GSP27moksop_u:11798: yadi jātavinirnaṣṭaṃ kriyāṃ vastv akariṣyata / tadāraṃsyata loko 'yaṃ mālāṃ kṛtvā taḍidguṇaiḥ //MU_5,36.73//
GSP27moksop_u:11799: imāṃ sukhādikāṃ lakṣmīṃ vivekijanacetasi / sthitas san naiva gṛhṇāsi na jahāsi samasthite //MU_5,36.74//
GSP27moksop_u:11800: avivekini yo 'si tvaṃ sa bhavātman yadṛcchayā / tadrūpakathanenālaṃ mamāmalapadāspada //MU_5,36.75//
GSP27moksop_u:11801: nirīheṇa niraṃśena nirahaṅkṛtinā tvayā / sataivāpy asatevāpi kartṛtvam urarīkṛtam //MU_5,36.76//
GSP27moksop_u:11802: jaya proḍḍāmarākāra jaya śāntiparāyaṇa / jaya sarvāgamātīta jaya sarvāgamāspada //MU_5,36.77//
GSP27moksop_u:11803: jaya jāta jayājāta jaya kṣata jayākṣata / jaya bhāva jayābhāva jaya jeya jayājaya //MU_5,36.78//
GSP27moksop_u:11804: ullasāmy upaśāmyāmi tiṣṭhāmy atigato 'smi ca / jayī jayāmi jīvāmi namo mahyaṃ namo 'stu te //MU_5,36.79//
GSP27moksop_u:11805: tvayi sthite mayi vigatāmayātmani svasaṃsthitau vyapagatarāgarañjane / kva bandhavaḥ kva ca vipadaḥ kva sampado bhavābhavau kva śamam upaimi śāśvatam //MU_5,36.80//
GSP27moksop_u:11808: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti sañcintayann eva prahlādaḥ paravīrahā / nirvikalpaṃ parānandasamādhiṃ samupāyayau //MU_5,37.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11809: nirvikalpasamādhisthaś citrārpita ivācalaḥ / śailād iva samutkīrṇo babhau svapadam āsthitaḥ //MU_5,37.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11810: tathātha tiṣṭhatas tasya kālo bahutaro yayau / sve gṛhe bhuvanasthasya meror iva suradviṣaḥ //MU_5,37.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11811: bodhito 'py asurādhīśair nābudhyata mahāmatiḥ / akāle bahuseko 'pi bījakośād ivāṅkuraḥ //MU_5,37.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11812: pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi pīnāṃso 'tiṣṭhad ekadṛk / śānta evāsurapure mattārṇava ivopalaḥ //MU_5,37.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11813: parānandadaśaikāntapariṇāmitayā tayā / nirānandam anābhāsam ivābhāsapadaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,37.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11815: hiraṇyakaśipau kṣīṇe samādhau tatsute sthite / na babhūvāparaḥ kaścid rājā danusutālaye //MU_5,37.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11816: asureśārthināṃ teṣāṃ dānavānāṃ samādhitaḥ / pareṇāpi prayatnena prahlādo na vyabudhyata //MU_5,37.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11817: na prāpur vikasadrūpaṃ patiṃ tatrāmarārayaḥ / lasatpattraprabhājālaṃ niśi padmam ivālayaḥ //MU_5,37.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11818: saṃvidvāto na tasyāntar abudhyata vicetasaḥ / bhuvaś ceṣṭākrama iva pauruṣo gatabhāsvataḥ //MU_5,37.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11819: athodvigneṣu daityeṣu gateṣv abhimatā diśaḥ / vicaratsu yathākāmam arājani pure pure //MU_5,37.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11820: pātālamaṇḍalam abhūd abhūpālatayā tayā / mātsyanyāyaviparyastam astaṅgataguṇakramam //MU_5,37.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11824: surārbhakaparābhūtaṃ bhūtair ākrāntam anyajaiḥ / bhūtariktam alakṣmīkam utsannaprāyakoṭaram //MU_5,37.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11825: aniyatavanitārthamattayuddhaṃ hṛtadhanadāravirāvitaṃ samantāt / kaliyugasamayodbhaṭodarābhaṃ tad asuramaṇḍalam ākulaṃ babhūva //MU_5,37.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11829: prāvṛṇnidrāvyuparame devārtham arisūdanaḥ / dhiyā vilokayām āsa kadācij jāgatīṃ sthitim //MU_5,38.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11830: traiviṣṭapaṃ svamanasā pārthivaṃ cāvalokya saḥ / ācāram ājagāmāśu pātālam aripālitam //MU_5,38.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11831: tatra sthirasamādhānasthite prahlādadānave / dṛṣṭvāpadam arīndrasya pure prauḍhim upāgatām //MU_5,38.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11833: padmāsanasthasya manaśśarīreṇātibhāsvatā / idaṃ sañcintayām āsa trailokyābjamahālinā //MU_5,38.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11834: prahlāde padaviśrānte pātāle gatanāyake / kaṣṭaṃ sṛṣṭir iyaṃ prāyo nirdaityatvam upāgatā //MU_5,38.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11835: daityābhāve suraśreṇī nirjigīṣupadaṃ gatā / śamam eṣyaty adṛṣṭābdapaṭaleva sarid varā //MU_5,38.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11836: mokṣākhyaṃ vigatadvandvaṃ tato yāsyati tat padam / kṣīṇābhimānā virasā lateva pariśuṣkatām //MU_5,38.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11837: devaughe śāntim āyāte bhuvi yajñatapaḥkriyāḥ / adevatvaphalās sarvāś śamam eṣyanty asaṃśayam //MU_5,38.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11838: kriyāsv athopaśāntāsu bhūloko 'stam upaiṣyati / asaṃsāraprasaṅgo 'tha śeṣo 'py artho bhaviṣyati //MU_5,38.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11839: ākalpāntaṃ tribhuvanaṃ yad idaṃ nirmitaṃ mayā / layam eṣyaty akāle tat tāpe himakaṇo yathā //MU_5,38.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11840: kim evam asminn ābhāse vilīya kṣayam āgate / kṛtaṃ mayeha bhavati svalīlākṣayakāriṇā //MU_5,38.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11841: tato 'ham api śūnye 'smin naṣṭacandrārkatārake / vapuḥpraśāntim ādāya sthitim eṣyāmi tatpade //MU_5,38.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11842: akāṇḍa evam evaṃ hi jagaty upaśamaṃ gate / neha śreyo 'nupaśyāmi manye jīvantu dānavāḥ //MU_5,38.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11843: daityodvegena vibudhās tato yajñatapaḥkriyāḥ / tena saṃsārasaṃsthānam asaṃsārakramo 'nyathā //MU_5,38.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11844: tasmād rasātalaṃ gatvā yathāvat sthāpayāmy aham / sve krame dānavādhīśam ṛtuḥ punar iva drumam //MU_5,38.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11845: vinā prahlādam atha ced itaraṃ dānaveśvaram / karomi tad asau manye devān utsādayiṣyati //MU_5,38.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11846: prahlādasya tv ayaṃ dehaḥ paścimaḥ pāvano mahān / ākalpam iha vastavyaṃ dehenānena tena ca //MU_5,38.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11847: evaṃ hi niyatir daivī niścitā pārameśvarī / prahlādena yathākalpaṃ sthātavyam iha dehinā //MU_5,38.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11848: tasmāt tam eva gatvāśu daityendraṃ bodhayāmy aham / garjan giridarīsuptaṃ mayūram iva vāridaḥ //MU_5,38.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11849: jīvanmuktasamādhisthaḥ karotv asuranāthatām / maṇir muktamanaskāraḥ pratibimbakriyām iva //MU_5,38.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11850: na vinaśyati sargo 'yam evaṃ saha surāsuraiḥ / bhaviṣyati ca nādvandvaṃ tan me krīḍā bhaviṣyati //MU_5,38.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11851: sargakṣayodayāv etau susamau mama yady api / tathāpīdaṃ yathāsaṃsthaṃ bhavatv anyena kiṃ mama //MU_5,38.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11852: bhāvābhāveṣu yat tulyaṃ tannāśe tatsthitau ca vā / yaḥ prayatnaḥ kubuddhitvāt tad vyomahananaṃ bhavet //MU_5,38.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11853: tasmāt prayāmi pātālaṃ bodhayāmy asureśvaram / sthairyaṃ nayāmi saṃsāraṃ līlāṃ sampādayāmy aham //MU_5,38.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11854_0: asurapuram avāpya proddhatācāraghoraṃ kamalam iva vivasvān daityam udbodhayāmi / jagad idam akhilāsthaṃ sthairyam abhyānayāmi
GSP27moksop_u:11857: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti sañcintya sarvātmā kṣīrodād rāma tatpuram / cacāla parivāreṇa saha sābhra ivācalaḥ //MU_5,39.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11858: kṣīrodatalarandhreṇa tenaiva stambhitāmbhasā / prahlādanagaraṃ prāpa śakralokam ivāparam //MU_5,39.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11859: hemamandirakośasthaṃ dadarśātrāsuraṃ hariḥ / atha śailaguhālīnaṃ samādhistham ivābjajam //MU_5,39.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11860: tatra te tejasā daityā vaiṣṇavenāvadhūnitāḥ / dūraṃ yayur dineśāṃśuvitrastā iva kauśikāḥ //MU_5,39.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11861: dvitrais sahāsurair mukhyaiḥ parivārayuto hariḥ / praviveśāsuragṛhaṃ tārāvān iva khaṃ śaśī //MU_5,39.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11863: mahātman samprabudhyasvety evaṃ viṣṇur udāharan / pāñcajanyaṃ pradadhvāna dhvanayan kakubhāṃ gaṇam //MU_5,39.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11864: mahatā tena śabdena vaiṣṇavaprāṇajanmanā / tulyakālaṃ parikṣubdhakalpābhrārṇavaraṃhasā //MU_5,39.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11865: āsurī janatā bhūmau papātāgatasambhramā / mattanīlābhranādena rājahaṃsāvalī yathā //MU_5,39.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11866: jahṛṣe janitānandā vaiṣṇavī vītasambhramā / janatā jaladadhvānaphulleva kuṭajāvalī //MU_5,39.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11867: babhūva samprabuddhātmā dānaveśaś śanaiś śanaiḥ / meghāravalasatpuṣpaḥ kadamba iva kānane //MU_5,39.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11868: brahmarandhrakṛtotthānā prāṇaśaktir athāsuram / śanair ākramayām āsa gaṅgā sarvam ivārṇavam //MU_5,39.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11869: kṣaṇād ākramayām āsa prāṇaśrīs sarvato 'suram / udayānantaraṃ saurī prabheva bhuvanāntaram //MU_5,39.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11870: prāṇeṣu randhranavake pravṛtteṣv atha tasya cit / cetyonmukhī babhūvāntaḥ prāṇadarpaṇabimbitā //MU_5,39.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11871: cetanīyonmukhe cittve cin manastām upāyayau / dvitvaṃ makurasaṅkrāntā mukhaśrīr iva rāghava //MU_5,39.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11872: kiñcid aṅkurite citte netre vikasanonmukhe / śanair babhūvatus tasya prātar nīle yathotpale //MU_5,39.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11874: nimeṣāntaramātreṇa manaḥ pīvaratāṃ yayau / tasmin prāṇavaśāt pūrṇe taraṅga iva vāriṇi //MU_5,39.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11875: athāsau vikasannetramanaḥprāṇavapur babhau / ardhodita ivāditye saras sphuritapaṅkajam //MU_5,39.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11876: tasminn avasare yāvad budhyasvety avadat prabhuḥ / prabuddhas tāvad eṣo 'bhūd barhī ghanaravād iva //MU_5,39.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11877: praphultanayanaṃ jātamananaṃ pīvarasmṛtim / uvācainaṃ trilokeśaḥ purā nābhyabjajaṃ yathā //MU_5,39.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11878: sādho smara mahālakṣmīm ātmīyāṃ smara cākṛtim / akāṇḍa eva kiṃ dehavirāmaḥ kriyate tvayā //MU_5,39.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11879: heyopādeyasaṅkalpavihīnasya śarīragaiḥ / bhāvābhāvais tavārthaḥ kas tiṣṭhottiṣṭhasva samprati //MU_5,39.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11880: sthātavyam iha dehena kalpaṃ yāvad anena te / vayaṃ hi niyatiṃ vidmo yathābhūtām anindita //MU_5,39.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11881: jīvanmuktena bhavatā rājya eveha tiṣṭhatā / kṣapaṇīyā gatodvegam ākalpāntam iyaṃ tanuḥ //MU_5,39.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11882: tanau kalpāntaśīrṇāyāṃ sve mahimni tvayānagha / vastavyaṃ sphuṭite kumbhe kumbhākāśena khe yathā //MU_5,39.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11883: kalpāntasthāyinī śuddhā dṛṣṭalokaparāvarā / iyaṃ tava tanur jātā jīvanmuktivilāsinī //MU_5,39.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11884: noditā dvādaśādityā na vilīnās śiloccayāḥ / na jagaj jvalitaṃ sādho tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11885: vāyur vahati nonmattas trilokībhasmadhūsaraḥ / lolāmarakapālāṅkas tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11886: aśoka iva mañjaryaḥ puṣkarāvartavidyutaḥ / na sphuranti jagatkośe tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11887: dhārāsāraraṇacchailāḥ prajvalajjvalanojjvalāḥ / kakubho na viśīryante tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11888: na brahmaviṣṇurudrākhyatrayaśeṣam idaṃ jagat / sthitaṃ jaraḍhajīmūtaṃ tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11889: sphuṭadadrīndraṭāṅkārakarālārāvavanti khe / kalpābhrāṇi na garjanti tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11890: ahaṃ bhūtāvakīrṇāsu sālokāsu khagadhvajaḥ / viharāmi daśāśāsu mā deham avadhīraya //MU_5,39.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11891: ime vayam ime śailā bhūtānīmāny ayaṃ bhavān / idaṃ jagad idaṃ vyoma mā deham avadhīraya //MU_5,39.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11892: pīvarājñānayogena yasya paryākulaṃ manaḥ / duḥkhāni vinikṛntanti maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11893: kṛśo 'tiduḥkhī mūḍho 'ham etāś cānyāś ca bhāvanāḥ / matiṃ yasyāvalumpanti maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11894: āśāpāśanibaddho 'ntar itaś cetaś ca nīyate / yo vilolamanovṛttyā maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.38//
GSP27moksop_u:11895: yasya tṛṣṇāḥ prabhañjanti hṛdayaṃ hṛtabhāvanāḥ / kugeham iva gargaṭyo maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.39//
GSP27moksop_u:11896: cittavṛttilatā yasya tālottālamanovane / phalitā sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.40//
GSP27moksop_u:11897: romarājilatājālaṃ yasyemaṃ dehadurdrumam / anarthaugho haraty uccair maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.41//
GSP27moksop_u:11898: yasya svadehavipinam ādhivyādhidavāgnayaḥ / dahanti lolāṅgalataṃ maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.42//
GSP27moksop_u:11899: kāmakopātmako yasya sphuraty ajagaras tanau / antaś śuṣkadrumasyeva maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.43//
GSP27moksop_u:11900: yo 'yaṃ dehaparityāgas tal loke maraṇaṃ smṛtam / na satā nāsatā tena kāraṇaṃ vedyavedinām //MU_5,39.44//
GSP27moksop_u:11901: yasya notkrāmati matis svātmatattvāvalokanāt / yathārthadarśino jñasya jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.45//
GSP27moksop_u:11902: yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate / yas samas sarvabhāveṣu jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.46//
GSP27moksop_u:11903: yo 'ntaśśītalayā buddhyā rāgadveṣavimuktayā / sākṣivat paśyatīdaṃ hi jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11904: yena samyak parijñāya heyopādeyam ujjhatā / cittasyānte 'rpitaṃ cittaṃ jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.48//
GSP27moksop_u:11905: avastusadṛśe vastuny astasaṅkalpanāmale / yenālīnaṃ kṛtaṃ ceto jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.49//
GSP27moksop_u:11906: satyāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya līlayeyaṃ jagatkriyā / kriyate 'vāsanaṃ yena jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.50//
GSP27moksop_u:11907: nāntas tuṣyati nodvegam eti yo viharann api / heyopādeyasamprāptau jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11908: śuddhapakṣaś ca śuddhaś ca haṃsaughas saraso yathā / yasmād guṇaugho niryāti jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.52//
GSP27moksop_u:11909: yasmiñ śrutipathaṃ yāte dṛṣṭe smṛtim upāgate / ānandaṃ yānti bhūtāni jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.53//
GSP27moksop_u:11910: yasyodayena hṛdayeṣu janāmbujāni jīvālimanti sakalāni vikāsavanti / tasyāvabhāti cirajīvitam akṣayendor āpūrṇateva danujeśvara netarasya //MU_5,39.54//
GSP27moksop_u:11913: bhagavān: sthairyaṃ dehasya dṛṣṭasya jīvitaṃ procyate budhaiḥ / dehāntarārthaṃ dehasya santyāgo maraṇaṃ smṛtam //MU_5,40.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11914: dvābhyām evāsi pakṣābhyām ābhyāṃ mukto mahāmate / kiṃ te maraṇam astīha kiṃ vā jīvitam asti te //MU_5,40.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11915: nidarśanārtham etat tu mayoktam arimardana / na tvaṃ jīvasi sarvajña mriyase na kadācana //MU_5,40.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11916: dehasaṃstho 'py adehatvād adeho 'si videhadṛk / vyomasaṃstho 'py asaktatvād avyomaiva hi mārutaḥ //MU_5,40.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11917: sparśasambodhakāritvād deha evāsi suvrata / utsedhārodhakatvena kham utsedhasya kāraṇam //MU_5,40.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11918: prabuddho jñātavastutvād eva tvam asi nāsi ca / iyattaikaparicchinnaṃ rūpam ajñeṣu duḥkhitam //MU_5,40.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11919: sarvadā sarvam evāsi citprakāśaparaikadhīḥ / ko dehaḥ ko 'py adehas te yaṃ gṛhṇāsi jahāsi vā //MU_5,40.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11920: samudetu vasanto vā vātu vā pralayānilaḥ / bhāvābhāvavihīnasya kim abhyāgatam ātmanaḥ //MU_5,40.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11921: praluṭhatsv api śaileṣu kalpāgniṣu dahatsv api / vahatsūtpātavāteṣv apy ātmātmany eva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,40.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11922: sarvabhūtāni tiṣṭhantu samam eva prayāntu vā / naśyantu vātha vardhantām ātmātmany eva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,40.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11923: kṣīyate na kṣayaṃ prāpte vardhamāne na vardhate / na spandate spandamāne dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ //MU_5,40.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11924: dehasyāham ahaṃ deha iti kṣīṇe 'pi te bhrame / tyajāmi na tyajāmīti kiṃ mṛṣā kalanoditā //MU_5,40.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11925: idaṃ kṛtvā karomīdam idaṃ tyaktvedam āhare / iti tattvavidāṃ tāta saṅkalpās saṅkṣayaṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,40.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11926: prabuddhās sarvakartāraḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti vai navam / navasyākaraṇān nityam akartṛtvapadaṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,40.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11927: akartṛtvād abhoktṛtvam arthād eva samāgatam / saṅgṛhītaṃ kilānuptaṃ keneha bhuvanatraye //MU_5,40.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11928: śānte kartṛtvabhoktṛtve śāntir eva hi śiṣyate / prauḍhim abhyāgatā saiva muktir ity ucyate budhaiḥ //MU_5,40.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11929: prabuddhāś cinmayāś śuddhās sarvam ākramya saṃsthitāḥ / kiṃ tyaktaṃ parigṛhṇantu kiṃ gṛhītaṃ tyajantu vā //MU_5,40.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11930: grāhyagrāhakasambandhaḥ pramitāvayavikramaḥ / hīnaḥ prameyāvayavaiḥ kiṃ gṛhṇātu jahātu kim //MU_5,40.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11931: grāhyagrāhakasambandhe kṣīṇe śāntir udety alam / sthitim abhyāgatā sāntar mokṣanāmnābhidhīyate //MU_5,40.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11932: tatra sthitās sadā santas tvādṛśāḥ puruṣottamāḥ / suṣuptāvayavaspandasādharmyeṇa caranti hi //MU_5,40.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11933: parāvabodhaviśrāntavāsanā jāgatīṃ sthitim / ardhasuptā ivehemāṃ paśyanty ātmasthayā dhiyā //MU_5,40.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11934: na ramanti hi ramyeṣu svātmany ekagatāśayāḥ / nodvijante ca duḥkheṣu svātmany ekarasā yataḥ //MU_5,40.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11935: nityaprabuddhā gṛhṇanti kāryāṇīmāny asaṅginaḥ / makurā iva bimbāni yathāprāptāny avāñchayā //MU_5,40.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11936: jāgrati svātmani svasthās suptās saṃsārasaṃsthitau / bālavat praviceṣṭante suṣuptasadṛśāśayāḥ //MU_5,40.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11937: tvam ajitapadavīm upāgato 'ntaḥ kamalajavāsaram ekam eva bhuktvā / guṇagaṇakalitām ihaiva lakṣmīṃ vraja paramāspadam acyutaṃ mahātman //MU_5,40.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11940: vasiṣṭhaḥ: jagadratnasamudgena trailokyādbhutadarśinā / ity ukte padmanābhena jyotsnāśītalayā girā //MU_5,41.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11941: prahlādanāmā deho 'sau vikāsinayanāmbujaḥ / mṛdūvāca vaco dhīro gṛhītamananakramaḥ //MU_5,41.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11942: prahlādaḥ: ciram antar mayā deva dṛṣṭo 'sy amalayā dhiyā / punar bahir ayaṃ dṛṣṭyā diṣṭyā deveśa dṛśyase //MU_5,41.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11943: aham āsam anantāyām asyāṃ dṛśi maheśvara / sarvasaṅkalpamuktāyāṃ vyoma vyomnīva nirmale //MU_5,41.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11944: na śokena na mohena na ca vairāgyacintayā / na dehatyāgakāryeṇa na saṃsārabhayena ca //MU_5,41.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11945: ekasmin vidyamāne hi kutaś śokaḥ kutaḥ kṣatiḥ / kuto dehaḥ kva saṃsāraḥ kva sthitiḥ kva bhayābhaye //MU_5,41.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11946: yathecchayaivāmalayā kevalaṃ svasamutthayā / evaṃ devāham avasaṃ vitate pāvane pade //MU_5,41.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11947: hā virakto 'smi saṃsāraṃ tyajāmīty āśayeśvara / aprabuddhadhiyāṃ cintā harṣaśokavikāradā //MU_5,41.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11948: dehābhāve na duḥkhāni dehe duḥkhāni me sati / iti cintāviṣavyālī mūrkham evāvalumpate //MU_5,41.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11949: idaṃ sukham idaṃ duḥkham idaṃ nāstīdam asti me / iti dolāyitaṃ ceto mūḍham eva na paṇḍitam //MU_5,41.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11950: ayam anyo 'nya evāham ity ajñānāndhavāsanāḥ / dūrodastās subuddhīnāṃ rajanyo 'ṃśumatām iva //MU_5,41.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11951: idaṃ tyājyam idaṃ grāhyam iti mithyā manobhramaḥ / nonmattatāṃ nayaty antar jñam ajñam iva durdhiyam //MU_5,41.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11952: sarvasminn ātmani tate tvayi tāmarasekṣaṇa / heyopādeyapakṣasthā dvitīyā kalanā kutaḥ //MU_5,41.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11953: vijñānābhāsam akhilaṃ jagat sadasatos sthitam / kiṃ heyaṃ kim upādeyam iti yat tyajyate na vā //MU_5,41.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11954: kevalaṃ svasvabhāvena draṣṭṛdṛśye vicārayan / kṣaṇaṃ viśrāntavān antar aham ātmātmanātmani //MU_5,41.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11955: bhāvābhāvavinirmukto heyopādeyavarjitaḥ / evam āsam ahaṃ pūrvam adhunettham avasthitaḥ //MU_5,41.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11956: śamam ātmīyam āpannas sarvagātman satāṃ gate / karomy ahaṃ mahādeva tubhyaṃ yat parirocate //MU_5,41.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11957: tvam ayaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa pūjyas tāvaj jagattraye / tan mattaḥ prakṛtaprāptāṃ pūjām ādātum arhasi //MU_5,41.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11958: ity uktvā dānavādhīśaḥ puraḥ kṣīrodaśāyinaḥ / śailendra iva pūrṇendum arghapātram upādade //MU_5,41.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11959: sāyudhaṃ sāpsarovṛndaṃ sasuraṃ sakhagādhipam / pujayām āsa govindaṃ satrailokyam athāgragam //MU_5,41.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11960: sabāhyābhyantarakrāntabhuvanaṃ bhuvaneśvaram / pūjayitvopaviṣṭaṃ tam uvāca kamalāpatiḥ //MU_5,41.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11961: bhagavān: uttiṣṭha dānavādhīśa siṃhāsanam upāśraya / yāvad āśv abhiṣekaṃ te svayam eva dadāmy aham //MU_5,41.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11962: pāñcajanyaravaṃ śrutvā ya ime samupāgatāḥ / siddhās sādhyās suraughās te kurvantu tava maṅgalam //MU_5,41.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11963: ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣo dānavaṃ siṃhaviṣṭare / yojayām āsa yogānte meruśṛṅga ivāmbudam //MU_5,41.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11964: athainaṃ harir āhūtaiḥ kṣirodādyair mahābdhibhiḥ / gaṅgādibhis saritpūrais sarvatīrthajalais tathā //MU_5,41.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11965: sarvaviprarṣisaṅghaiś ca sarvasiddhagaṇais tathā / munividyādharayuto lokapālasamanvitaḥ //MU_5,41.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11966: abhyaṣiñcad ameyātmā daityarājye mahāsuram / marudgaṇais stūyamāṇaṃ pūrvasarge hariṃ yathā //MU_5,41.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11967: surāsurais stūyamānaṃ stūyamānas surāsuraiḥ / abhiṣiktam uvācedaṃ prahlādaṃ madhusūdanaḥ //MU_5,41.28//
