GSP27moksop_u:11968: bhagavān: yāvan merur dharā yāvad yāvac candrārkamaṇḍale / akhaṇḍitaguṇaślāghī tāvad rājā bhavānagha //MU_5,41.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11969: iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ tyaktvā samadarśanayā dhiyā / vītarāgabhayakrodho rājyaṃ samanupālaya //MU_5,41.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11970: rājye 'smin bhogasampūrṇe dṛṣṭānuttamabhūminā / na gantavyas tvayodvegas svarge vā narake 'tha vā //MU_5,41.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11971: deśakālakriyākārair yathāprāptāsu dṛṣṭiṣu / prakṛtaṃ kāryam ātiṣṭhaṃs tyaktavāsanam āssva bhoḥ //MU_5,41.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11972: atiheyatayādattaṃ mamatāparivarjitam / bhāvābhāve samaṃ kāryaṃ kurvann iha na badhyase //MU_5,41.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11973: dṛṣṭasaṃsāraparyāyas tulitātulatatpadaḥ / sarvaṃ sarvatra jānāsi kim anyad upadiśyate //MU_5,41.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11974: vītarāgabhayakrodhe tvayi rājani rājati / bhūmiḥ pāsyati nedānīṃ durgṛdhrīvāsṛg āsuram //MU_5,41.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11975: dalayiṣyati bāṣpaśrīr nāsurīkarṇamañjarīm / vanarājīm ivaughotthā sarit tārataraṅgiṇī //MU_5,41.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11976: adyaprabhṛti saṃśāntadānavāmarasaṅgaram / nirmandarāmbhonidhivaj jagat svastham avasthitam //MU_5,41.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11977: devāsurakuṭumbinyo bhartṛṣv antaḥpureṣu ca / sveṣv eva yāntu viśvāsam aparasparam āhṛtāḥ //MU_5,41.38//
GSP27moksop_u:11978: bhava bahulaniśānitāntanidrātimiram apāsya sadoditāśayaśrīḥ / danusuta vanitāvilāsaramyāṃ ciram ajitām upabhuṅkṣva rājyalakṣmīm //MU_5,41.39//
GSP27moksop_u:11981: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣas sanarāmarakinnaraḥ / dvitīya iva saṃsāraś cacālāsuramandirāt //MU_5,42.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11983: kramāt kṣīrodam āsādya visṛjya suravāhinīm / bhogibhogāsane tasthau śvetābja iva ṣaṭpadaḥ //MU_5,42.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11984: bhogibhogāsane viṣṇuś śakras svarge sahāmaraiḥ / pātāle dānavādhīśa iti tasthur gatajvarāḥ //MU_5,42.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11985: eṣā te kathitā rāma niśśeṣamalanāśinī / prāhlādī bodhasamprāptir aindavadravaśītalā //MU_5,42.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11986: ya etāṃ mānavā loke bahuduṣkṛtino 'pi hi / dhiyā vicārayiṣyanti te prāpsyanty acirāt padam //MU_5,42.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11987: sāmānyena vicāreṇa kṣayam āyāti duṣkṛtam / yogavākyavicāreṇa ko na yāti paraṃ padam //MU_5,42.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11988: ajñānam ucyate pāpaṃ tad vicāreṇa naśyati / pāpamūlacchidaṃ tasmād vicāraṃ na parityajet //MU_5,42.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11989: imāṃ prahlādasaṃsiddhiṃ pravicārayatāṃ nṛṇām / saptajanmakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kṣayam āpnoty asaṃśayam //MU_5,42.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11990: rāmaḥ: pare pade pariṇataṃ pāñcajanyasvanair manaḥ / kathaṃ prabuddhaṃ bhagavan prahlādasya mahātmanaḥ //MU_5,42.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11991: vasiṣṭhaḥ: dvividhā muktatā loke sambhavaty anaghākṛte / sadehaikā videhānyā vibhāgo 'yaṃ tayoś śṛṇu //MU_5,42.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11992: asaṃsaktamater yasya tyāgādāneṣu karmaṇām / naiṣaṇā tatsthitiṃ viddhi tvaṃ jīvanmuktatām iha //MU_5,42.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11993: saiva dehakṣaye rāma punarjananavarjitā / videhamuktatā proktā tatsthā nāyānti dṛśyatām //MU_5,42.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11994: bhṛṣṭabījopamā bhūyojanmāṅkuravivarjitā / hṛdi jīvadvimuktānāṃ śuddhā bhavati vāsanā //MU_5,42.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11995: pāvanī paramodārā sattvamātrānupātinī / ātmadhyānamayī nityaṃ suṣuptastheva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,42.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11996: api varṣasahasrānte te tayaivāntarasthayā / sati dehe prabudhyante jīvanmuktā raghūdvaha //MU_5,42.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11997: prahlādo 'ntassthayā śuddhasattvavāsanayā svayā / bodham āpa mahābāho śaṅkhaśabdāvabuddhayā //MU_5,42.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11998: harir ātmā hi bhūtānāṃ tasya yat pratibhāsate / tat tathaiva bhavaty āśu sarvatrātmaiva kāraṇam //MU_5,42.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11999: prabodham etu prahlādo yadaiveti vicintitam / nimeṣād vāsudevena tadaiva tad upasthitam //MU_5,42.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12000: ātmany akāraṇenaiva bhūtānāṃ kāraṇena ca / sṛṣṭyarthaṃ vapur āttaṃ tad vāsudevīyam ātmanā //MU_5,42.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12001: ātmāvalokanenāśu mādhavaḥ paridṛśyate / mādhavārādhanenāśu svayam ātmāvalokyate //MU_5,42.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12002: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāghavātmāvalokane / viharāśu virāḍātmā padaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam //MU_5,42.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12003: sukhāsāravatī rāma saṃsāraprāvṛḍ ātatā / jāḍyaṃ dadāti paramaṃ vicārārkam apaśyataḥ //MU_5,42.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12004: prasādād ātmano viṣṇor māyeyam atibhāsurā / prabādhate na dhīrāṃs tu yakṣī mantravato yathā //MU_5,42.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12005: ātmecchayaiva ghanatāṃ samupāgatāntar ātmecchayaiva tanutām upayāti kāle / saṃsārajālaracaneyam anantamāyā jvāleva vātakalayānagha pāvakasya //MU_5,42.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12008: rāmaḥ: bhagavan sarvadharmajña śuddhais tvadvacanāṃśubhiḥ / nirvṛtās smaś śaśāṅkasya karair oṣadhayo yathā //MU_5,43.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12009: karṇābhivāñchyamānāni pavitrāṇi mṛdūni ca / bhūṣayanti gṛhītāni puṣpāṇīva vacāṃsi te //MU_5,43.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12010: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena sarvam āsādyate yadi / prahlādas tat kathaṃ buddho na mādhavavaraṃ vinā //MU_5,43.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12011: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yad yad rāghava samprāptaṃ prahlādena mahātmanā / tat tad āsāditaṃ tena pauruṣād eva nānyataḥ //MU_5,43.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12012: ātmā nārāyaṇaś caiva na bhinnau tilatailavat / tathaiva śauklyapaṭavat kusumāmodavat tathā //MU_5,43.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12013: yo hi viṣṇus sa evātmā yo hy ātmā sa janārdanaḥ / viṣṇvātmaśabdau paryāyau yathā viṭapipādapau //MU_5,43.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12014: prahlādanāmnā prathamam ātmaiva svayam ātmanā / svayaiva śaktyā parayā viṣṇubhaktau niyojitaḥ //MU_5,43.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12015: prahlādo hy ātmanaivaitaṃ varam arjitavān svayam / svayaṃ vicāraṃ kṛtavān svayaṃ vijitavān manaḥ //MU_5,43.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12016: kadācid ātmanaivātmā svayaṃ śaktyā vibodhyate / kadācid viṣṇudehena bhaktilabhyena bodhyate //MU_5,43.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12017: ciram ārādhito 'py eṣa paramaprītimān api / nāvicāravato jñānaṃ dātuṃ śaknoti mādhavaḥ //MU_5,43.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12018: mukhyaḥ puruṣayatnottho vicāras svātmadarśane / gauṇo varādiko hetur mukhyahetuparo bhava //MU_5,43.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12019: pūrvam eva balāt tasmād ākramyendriyapañcakam / abhyāsāt sarvayatnena cittaṃ kuru vicāravat //MU_5,43.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12020: yad yad āsādyate kiñcit kenacit kvacid eva hi / svaśaktisampravṛttyā tal labhyate nānyataḥ kvacit //MU_5,43.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12021: pauruṣaṃ yatnam āśritya prollaṅghyendriyaparvatam / saṃsārajaladhiṃ tīrtvā pāraṃ gaccha paraṃ padam //MU_5,43.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12022: vinā puruṣayatnena dṛśyate cej janārdanaḥ / mṛgapakṣigaṇaṃ kasmāt tad asau noddharaty ajaḥ //MU_5,43.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12023: guruś ced uddharaty ajñam ātmīyāt pauruṣād ṛte / uṣṭradāntabalīvardāṃs tat kasmān noddharaty asau //MU_5,43.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12024: na harer na guror nārthāt kiñcid āsādyate mahat / ākrāntamanasas svasmād yan nāsāditam ātmanaḥ //MU_5,43.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12025: abhyāsavairāgyayutād ākrāntendriyapannagāt / ātmanaḥ prāpyate yat tat prāpyate na jagattrayāt //MU_5,43.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12026: ārādhayātmanātmānam ātmanātmānam arcaya / ātmanātmānam ālokya santiṣṭha svātmanātmani //MU_5,43.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12027: śāstrayatnavicārebhyo mūrkhāṇāṃ prapalāyatām / kalpitā vaiṣṇavī bhaktiḥ pravṛttyarthaṃ śubhasthitau //MU_5,43.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12028: abhyāsayatnau prathamaṃ mukhyo vidhir udāhṛtaḥ / tadabhāve tu gauṇas syāt pūjyapūjāmayaḥ kramaḥ //MU_5,43.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12029: asti ced indriyākrāntiḥ kiṃ pūjāpūjyapūjanaiḥ / nāsti ced indriyākrāntiḥ kiṃ pūjāpūjyapūjanaiḥ //MU_5,43.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12030: vicāropaśamābhyāṃ hi vinā nāsādyate hariḥ / vicāropaśamābhyāṃ ca yuktasyābjakareṇa kim //MU_5,43.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12031: vicāropaśamopetaṃ cittam ārādhayātmanaḥ / tasmin siddhe bhavān siddho no cet tvaṃ vanagardabhaḥ //MU_5,43.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12032: kriyate mādhavādīnāṃ praṇayaḥ prārthanāya yat / sa caiva kasmāt kriyate na svakasyaiva cetasaḥ //MU_5,43.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12033: sarvasyaiva janasyāsya viṣṇur abhyantare sthitaḥ / taṃ parityajya ye yānti bahir viṣṇuṃ na te budhāḥ //MU_5,43.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12034: hṛdguhāvāsi cittattvaṃ mukhyaṃ sānātanaṃ vapuḥ / śaṅkhacakragadāhasto gauṇa ākāra ātmanaḥ //MU_5,43.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12035: yo hi mukhyaṃ parityajya gauṇaṃ samanudhāvati / tyaktvā rasāyanaṃ siddhaṃ sādhyaṃ saṃsādhayaty asau //MU_5,43.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12036: yas tu vā sthitim evāsyām ātmajñānacamatkṛtau / nāsādayati sammattamanās sa raghunandana //MU_5,43.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12037: aprāptātmaviveko 'ntar ajñaś cittavaśīkṛtaḥ / śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇim arcayaty amareśvaram //MU_5,43.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12038: tatpūjanena kaṣṭena tapasā tasya rāghava / kāle nirmalatām eti cittaṃ vairāgyavāriṇā //MU_5,43.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12039: nityābhyāsavivekābhyāṃ cittam āśu prasīdati / āmram eva daśām eti sāhakārīṃ śanaiś śanaiḥ //MU_5,43.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12040: etad apy ātmanaivātmā phalam āpnoti bhāvitam / haripūjākramākhyena nimittenārisūdana //MU_5,43.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12041: varam āpnoti yo vāpi viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ / tena svasyaiva tat prāptaṃ phalam abhyāsaśākhinaḥ //MU_5,43.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12042: sarveṣām uttamārthānāṃ sarvāsāṃ cirasampadām / svamanonigraho bhūmir bhūmis sasyaśriyām iva //MU_5,43.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12043: apy urvīkhananotkasya kaṣato 'pi śiloccayam / svamanonigrahād anyo nopāyo 'stīha duḥkhahā //MU_5,43.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12044: tāvaj janmasahasrāṇi bhramanti bhuvi mānavāḥ / yāvan nopaśamaṃ yāti manomattamahārṇavaḥ //MU_5,43.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12045: brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrādyāś ciraṃ sampūjitā api / upaplutamanovyādhiṃ na trāyante 'pi vatsalāḥ //MU_5,43.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12046: ākārabhāsuraṃ tyaktvā bāhyam āntaram apy ajam / kuru janmakṣayāyāśu saṃvinmātraikacintanam //MU_5,43.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12047: saṃvedyanirmuktanirāmayaikasaṃvinmayāsvādam anantarūpam / sanmātram āsvādaya sarvasāraṃ pāraṃ paraṃ prāpsyasi janmanadyāḥ //MU_5,43.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12050: vasiṣṭhaḥ: rāmāparyavasāneyaṃ māyā saṃsṛtināmikā / ātmacittajayenaiva kṣayam āyāti nānyathā //MU_5,44.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12051: jaganmāyāprapañcasya vaicitryapratipattaye / itihāsam imaṃ vakṣye śṛṇuṣvāvahito 'nagha //MU_5,44.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12052: asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe kosalā nāma maṇḍalam / kalpavṛkṣavanaṃ meror iva ratnagaṇākaram //MU_5,44.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12053: tatrāsīd brāhmaṇaḥ kaścid guṇī gādhir iti śrutaḥ / paramaśrotriyo dhīmān vedo mūrtim ivāśritaḥ //MU_5,44.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12054: ā bālyāt praviraktena cetasā sa vyarājata / niṣkalaṅkāvadātena bhuvanaṃ nabhasā yathā //MU_5,44.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12055: kim apy abhimataṃ kāryaṃ vinidhāya sa cetasi / bandhuvargād viniṣkramya tapas taptuṃ vanaṃ yayau //MU_5,44.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12056: utphullakamalaṃ tatra saraḥ prāpa sa viprarāṭ / candraḥ prasannavimalaṃ tārāśāram ivāmbaram //MU_5,44.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12057: āśauridarśanaṃ tasmiṃs tapo'rthaṃ sarasi dvijaḥ / ākaṇṭham ambunirmagnaḥ prāvṛṭpadma ivāvasat //MU_5,44.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12059: athainaṃ tapasā taptam ājagāmaikadā hariḥ / nidāghārtaṃ ghanaś śyāmaḥ prāvṛṣīva dharātalam //MU_5,44.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12060: bhagavān: viprottiṣṭha payomadhyād gṛhāṇābhimatam varam / abhīpsitaphalopeto jātas te niyamadrumaḥ //MU_5,44.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12062: māyām imāṃ tvaduditāṃ bhagavan pāramātmikīm / draṣṭum icchāmi saṃsāranāmnīm āścaryakāriṇīm //MU_5,44.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12063: vasiṣṭhaḥ: imāṃ drakṣyasi māyāṃ tvaṃ tatas tyakṣyasi cety ajaḥ / uktvā yayāv adṛśyatvaṃ gāndharvam iva pattanam //MU_5,44.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12064: gate viṣṇau samuttasthau jalāt sa brāhmaṇeśvaraḥ / śītalāmalamūrtitvād induḥ kṣīrodakād iva //MU_5,44.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12065: babhūva parituṣṭātmā darśanena jagatpateḥ / darśanasparśanair indor utphullam iva kairavam //MU_5,44.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12066: athāsya katicit tasmin divasāni yayur vane / harisandarśanānandavato brāhmaṇakarmaṇā //MU_5,44.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12067: ekadārabdhavān snānaṃ sarasy uditapaṅkaje / cintayan vaiṣṇavaṃ vākyaṃ maharṣir iva mānase //MU_5,44.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12068: atha snānavidhāv antarjalam eṣa cakāra ha / sakalāghavighātārthaṃ parivartanam ātmanaḥ //MU_5,44.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12069: antarjalavidhau tasmin vismṛtadhyānamantradhīḥ / paryastasaṃvitprasaras so 'paśyaj jalamadhyagaḥ //MU_5,44.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12070: mṛtam ātmānam ātmīye sadane 'somyatāṃ gatam / patitaṃ vātavegena kandarāntar iva drumam //MU_5,44.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12071: prāṇāpānapravāheṇa muktam antam upāgatam / saṃśāntāvayavaspandaṃ nirvāta iva ṣaṇḍakam //MU_5,44.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12072: pāṇḍurānanam āmlānaṃ vṛkṣaparṇam ivārasam / śavībhūtam anāhlādaṃ chinnanālam ivāmbujam //MU_5,44.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12073: viparyastekṣaṇaṃ prātar majjattāram ivāmbaram / sāvagraham iva grāmaṃ sarvataḥ pāṃsudhūsaram //MU_5,44.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12074: bāṣpaklinnamukhair dīnaiḥ karuṇākrandakāribhiḥ / āvṛtaṃ bandhubhiḥ khinnaiḥ kurarair iva pādapam //MU_5,44.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12075: setubhaṅgagaladvārimlāyamānamukhābjayā / nalinyā samadharmiṇyā bhāryayā pādayoś śritam //MU_5,44.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12077: anyaiḥ pārśvagatair dīnais sravadasrumukhair janaiḥ / śritaṃ galadavaśyāyaiś śuṣkaparṇair iva drumam //MU_5,44.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12078: viyogabhītyā saṃyogaparihāraparair iva / dūraṃ pravisṛtair aṅgair anātmīyair ivāvṛtam //MU_5,44.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12079: parasparam alagnābhyām oṣṭhābhyāṃ daśanaiś śanaiḥ / savirāgam ivāmlānair hasantaṃ svātmajīvitam //MU_5,44.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12080: maunaṃ dhyānam ivāpannaṃ paṅkād iva vinirmitam / aprabodhāya saṃsuptaṃ viśrāmyantam ivoccakaiḥ //MU_5,44.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12081: bāndhavākrandasaṃrambhakolāhalagatā giraḥ / snehabhāvavicārārthaṃ śṛṇvantam iva yatnataḥ //MU_5,44.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12083: krameṇa svajanaiḥ kṣubdhais tārākranditaghargharaiḥ / niṣkālitam amaṅgalyam apunardarśanāya taiḥ //MU_5,44.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12087: tatra te jvalane dīpte cakrus taṃ bhasmasāc chavam / bāndhavās salilāpūraṃ samudrā iva vāḍave //MU_5,44.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12088: citiś caṭacaṭāsphoṭaiś śavam āśu dadāha tam / śuṣkendhanavad ucchūnajvālājālajaṭāvatī //MU_5,44.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12089: atyullasaccaṭacaṭāravamuktagandhavyāptāmbuvāhapaṭalo 'sthicayaṃ hutāśaḥ / dantī virandhram iva veṇuvanaṃ samantād udvāntamedurarasaṃ dalayāṃ cakāra //MU_5,44.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12092: vasiṣṭhaḥ: athāpaśyad asau gādhis svādhipīvarayā dhiyā / antarjalastha evāntar ātmanātmany anirmale //MU_5,45.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12093: hūnamaṇḍalaparyantagrāmopāntanivāsinām / śvapacānāṃ striyo garbhe sthitam ātmānam ākulam //MU_5,45.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12094: garbhavāsabhayākrāntaṃ pīḍitaṃ pelavāṅgakam / śvapacīhṛdaye suptaṃ śvaviṣṭhāyām ivāṅkuram //MU_5,45.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12095: śanaiḥ pakvatayā kāle prasūtaṃ mecakacchavim / śvapacyā prāvṛṣevābdaṃ śyāvam āvalitaṃ malaiḥ //MU_5,45.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12096: sampannaṃ śvapacāgāre śiśuṃ śvapacavallabham / itaś cetaś ca gacchantam utpīḍam iva yāmunam //MU_5,45.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12097: dvādaśābdadaśāṃ yātaṃ saṃsthitaṃ ṣoḍaśābdikam / pīvarāṃsam udārāṅgaṃ payodam iva meduram //MU_5,45.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12098: sārameyaparīvāraṃ viharantaṃ vanād vanam / nighnantaṃ mṛgalakṣāṇi paulindīṃ sthitim āsthitam //MU_5,45.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12099: tamālaṃ latayevātha śritaṃ śvapacakāntayā / stanastabakaśālinyā navapallavahastayā //MU_5,45.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12101: vilasantaṃ vanānteṣu tayā saha naveṣṭayā / śyāmalaṃ śyāmayā bhṛṅgaṃ bhṛṅgyeva kusumarddhiṣu //MU_5,45.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12102: navaparṇalatāpattravasanaṃ vyasanāntaram / vindhyakāntāram ākāram abhyāgatam ivodbhaṭam //MU_5,45.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12103: viśrāntaṃ vanakuñjeṣu suptaṃ giridarīṣu ca / nilīnaṃ pattrakuñjeṣu gulmakeṣu kṛtālayam //MU_5,45.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12105: lulitaṃ puṣpaśayyāsu bhrāntam abdhitaṭeṣu ca / tajjñaṃ kānanakośeṣu bahujñaṃ mṛgamāraṇe //MU_5,45.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12106: prāsūta so 'tha śaileṣu putrān nijakulāṅkurān / atyantaviṣamodarkān khadiraḥ kaṇṭakān iva //MU_5,45.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12107: kalatravantaṃ sampannaṃ sthitaṃ prakṣīṇayauvanam / śanair jarjaratāṃ yātaṃ vṛṣṭihīnam iva sthalam //MU_5,45.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12108: tato hūnahatagrāmaṃ janmadeśam upetya tam / saṃsthitaṃ maṭhikāṃ parṇaiḥ kṛtvā dūre munīndravat //MU_5,45.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12110: prauḍhaṃ śvapacagārhasthyaṃ kurvāṇaṃ bahubāndhavam / karañjakuñjavanavat parāṃ vṛddhim upāgataṃ //MU_5,45.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12111: athāpaśyad asau gādhir yāvat tasya kalatriṇaḥ / jaraḍhaśvapaceśasya svātmano bhramakāriṇaḥ //MU_5,45.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12112: tat kalatram aśeṣeṇa nītam ādṛtamanyunā / āsārapavanenāśu vanaparṇagaṇo yathā //MU_5,45.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12113: pralapaty eka evāsāv aṭavyāṃ duḥkhakarṣitaḥ / viyūtha iva sāraṅgo vigatāstho 'srulocanaḥ //MU_5,45.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12114: dināni katicit tatra nītvā śokaparītadhīḥ / jahau svadeśaṃ saṃśuṣkapadmaṃ sara ivāṇḍajaḥ //MU_5,45.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12115: vijahāra bahūn deśān anāsthaś cintayānvitaḥ / preryamāṇa ivānyena vātanunna ivāmbudaḥ //MU_5,45.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12116: ekadā prāpa kīrāṇāṃ maṇḍale śrīmatīṃ purīm / khe 'nūrur viharañ śūnye sadvimānam ivāmaraḥ //MU_5,45.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12118: sāmantair lalanābhiś ca nāgaraiś ca nirantaram / svargamārgopamaṃ rājamārgam asyām avāpa saḥ //MU_5,45.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12119: maṇiratnakṛtāgāraṃ tatra maṅgalahastinam / dadarśāmalaśailendram iva sañcāracañcalam //MU_5,45.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12120: mṛte rājani rājārthaṃ viharantam itas tataḥ / ratnajñam iva ratnorvyāṃ cintāmaṇididṛkṣayā //MU_5,45.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12121: tam asau śvapaco nāgaṃ kautukodārayā dṛśā / ciram ālokayām āsa spandayuktācalopamam //MU_5,45.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12122: ālokayantam ādāya taṃ kareṇa sa vāraṇaḥ / svakaṭe 'yojayan merus taṭe 'rkam iva sādaram //MU_5,45.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12123: tasmin kaṭagate nedur jayadundubhayo 'bhitaḥ / kalpāmbuda ivākāśam adhirūḍhe mahārṇavāḥ //MU_5,45.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12124: pūritāśo babhau rājā jayatīti janasvanaḥ / udyāne samprabuddhānāṃ vihagānām ivāravaḥ //MU_5,45.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12125: udabhūd vandivṛndānāṃ ghanakolāhalas tataḥ / velāvilulitāmbūnām ambudhīnām iva dhvaniḥ //MU_5,45.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12126: taṃ tatrāvārayām āsur maṇḍanārthaṃ varāṅganāḥ / kṣīrodagatam udratnā laharya iva mandaram //MU_5,45.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12127: māninyas taṃ guṇaprotair nānāratnair apūrayan / nānāprabhāprabhāvāḍhyair velā iva taṭācalam //MU_5,45.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12128: tuṣāraśiśirasparśais tās taṃ hārair abhūṣayan / śyāmā navanadīpūrair varṣāś śṛṅgam ivonnatam //MU_5,45.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12129: vicitravarṇasaugandhyaiḥ puṣpair āvalayan striyaḥ / vanaṃ madhuśriya iva taṃ lolakarapallavāḥ //MU_5,45.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12130: nānāvarṇarasāmodais tās tam āśu vilepanaiḥ / alepayan prabhājālais taṭyo 'bhram iva dhātujaiḥ //MU_5,45.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12131: ratnakāñcanakānto 'sāv ādade chattram ātatam / sandhyābhratārendunadīvyāptaṃ merur ivāmbaram //MU_5,45.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12132: bhūṣitas savilāsābhir bālavallībhir āvṛtaḥ / ratnapuṣpāṃśukākīrṇaḥ kalpavṛkṣa ivābabhau //MU_5,45.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12133: tādṛśaṃ tam upājagmuḥ parivārasamanvitāḥ / sarvāḥ prakṛtayaḥ phullaṃ mārgadrumam ivādhvagāḥ //MU_5,45.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12134: tā enam āsane saiṃhe prāpyābhiṣiṣicuḥ kramāt / tasminn eva gaje śakram airāvaṇa ivāmarāḥ //MU_5,45.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12135: evaṃ sa śvapaco rājyaṃ prāpa kīrapurāntare / araṇye hariṇaṃ puṣṭam aprāṇam iva vāyasaḥ //MU_5,45.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12137: jajvāla kīranagare nāgarījanavān asau / siṃhīgaṇayutas siṃho yathā kusumite vane //MU_5,45.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12138: harihatamadanāgottāramuktākalāpapravicaritaśarīraś śāntacintāviṣādaḥ / aramata sa mahadbhis tatra bhogais sarasyāṃ ravikaramadatapto vāripūrair ivebhaḥ //MU_5,45.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12139: parivisṛtanṛpaujās sarvadiksaṃsthitājñaḥ katipayadivasehāsiddhadeśavyavasthaḥ / prakṛtibhir alam ūḍhāśeṣarājatvabhāras sa gavala iti nāmnā tatra rājā babhūva //MU_5,45.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12142: vasiṣṭhaḥ: vilāsinībhir valito mantrimaṇḍalapūjitaḥ / vanditas sarvasāmantaiś chattracāmaramālitaḥ //MU_5,46.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12143: siddhānuśāsanaḥ kānto jñātarājyaguṇakramaḥ / vītaśokabhayāyāsas tatra prāptamahāpadaḥ //MU_5,46.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12144: vismṛtātmaprabhāvo 'bhūd aniśaṃ stavamaṅgalaiḥ / ānandāpūrṇayā vṛttyā bhṛśaṃ kṣīva ivāsavaiḥ //MU_5,46.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12145: kīreṣu śvapaco rājyaṃ varṣāṇy aṣṭau cakāra ha / āryavṛttam aśeṣeṇa tāvatkālaṃ babhāra ha //MU_5,46.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12147: bahv amanyata no hārakeyūravasanādy asau / prabhutābṛṃhitaṃ ceto nāhāryam abhinandati //MU_5,46.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12148: eka evājiraṃ bāhyaṃ tādṛgveṣas sa niryayau / mukhyāṅganān nabhobhāgād antaṃ gacchann ivāṃśumān //MU_5,46.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12149: tatrāpaśyad ghanaśyāmaṃ pīnaṃ śvapacapeṭakam / gāyan mṛdu vasantotthaṃ kokilānām iva vrajam //MU_5,46.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12150: dhunānaṃ jhallarītantrīṃ karapallavalīlayā / madhurehaṃ raṇadrephām aliśreṇīm iva drumaḥ //MU_5,46.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12151: atha tasmāt samuttasthau jarāvān raktalocanaḥ / kācaśṛṅgaṃ himāpūrṇam iva śvapacanāyakaḥ //MU_5,46.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12152: jyo kaṭañjeti sahasā vadan kīramahīpateḥ / vallyāṃ kākam ivānandāj jānvagre 'yojayat karam //MU_5,46.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12153: uvācedaṃ ca kīreśaṃ he bandho bhoḥ kaṭañjaka / kva nu sthito 'si diṣṭyādya dṛṣṭo 'si cirabāndhava //MU_5,46.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12154: kvāsi viśrāntavān kālam etāvantaṃ vanāntare / bandhuvṛndaparityaktaḥ parapuṣṭa ivaikakaḥ //MU_5,46.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12155: iha rājā bhavantaṃ vā kaccid geyakalāvidam / raktakaṇṭhaṃ mānayati rāgavān iva kokilam //MU_5,46.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12156: āpūrayati vā kaccid gṛhavastrāśanārpaṇaiḥ / madhus tamālaviṭapaṃ phalapattrarasair iva //MU_5,46.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12157: darśanena tavādyāhaṃ parāṃ nirvṛtim āgataḥ / padmas sūryodayeneva candrodaya ivodadhiḥ //MU_5,46.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12158: ānandānām aśeṣāṇāṃ lābhānāṃ mahatām api / viśrāmāṇām anantānāṃ sīmānto bandhudarśanam //MU_5,46.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12159: śvapace pravadaty evaṃ rājā tāvat tayā tayā / cakāra tatkālajayā ceṣṭayaivāvadhīraṇam //MU_5,46.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12160: tāvad vātāyanagatāḥ kāntāḥ prakṛtayas tathā / śvapaco 'yam iti jñātvā mlānatām alam āyayuḥ //MU_5,46.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12161: padmās tuṣāravṛṣṭyeva grāmās sāvagrahā iva / dāvavanta ivādrīndrā nāgarā na virejire //MU_5,46.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12162: nṛpo 'vadhīrayām āsa sa tāṃ svajanasaṅkathām / vṛkṣāgragatamārjāraphekkāraṃ mṛgarāḍ iva //MU_5,46.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12163: satvaraṃ praviveśāntaḥpuram āmlānamānavam / rājahaṃsa ivāvarṣasīdatsarasijaṃ saraḥ //MU_5,46.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12164: sarvāvayavaviśrāntāṃ mlānatām alam āyayau / jānustambhāntaramahārandhrasthāgnir iva drumaḥ //MU_5,46.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12165: tatrāpaśyad asau sarvaṃ viṣaṇṇavadanaṃ janam / jālaṃ kuṅkumapuṣpāṇāṃ bhuktamūlam ivākhunā //MU_5,46.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12166: mantriṇo nāgarā nāryas tatas te taṃ mahīpatim / nāsprākṣur api tiṣṭhantaṃ gṛha eva śavaṃ yathā //MU_5,46.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12167: bhṛtyāś cākṛtasatkāraṃ dūra eva tam atyajan / duḥkhayuktā ghanasnehā api bālaśavaṃ yathā //MU_5,46.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12168: anānandamukhaṃ śyāmaśarīraṃ śrīvivarjitam / dagdhaṃ sthalam ivainaṃ te bahv amanyanta nākulāḥ //MU_5,46.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12169: dhūmāyamānadehasya paritāpadaśāvatī / nāḍhaukatāsya janatā pārśvam agnigirer iva //MU_5,46.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12170: mandotsāhasamudbhūtās tanvyas saṅghātavarjitāḥ / etadājñāḥ paraṃ prāpur bhasmanīvāmbuvipruṣaḥ //MU_5,46.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12171: krūrakarmakarākārāt saṅgato 'śubhadāyinaḥ / tasmād viśeṣeṇa janā rākṣasād iva dudruvuḥ //MU_5,46.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12172: eka eva babhūvāsau janamadhyagato 'pi san / arthādiguṇanirmuktaḥ paradeśa ivādhvagaḥ //MU_5,46.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12173: bhṛśam āraṭate 'py asmai nālāpaṃ nāgarā daduḥ / muktājālayutāyāpi kīcakāyādhvagā iva //MU_5,46.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12174: atha sarve vayaṃ dīrghaṃ kālaṃ śvapacadūṣitāḥ / prāyaścittair na śuddhās smaḥ praviśāmo hutāśanam //MU_5,46.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12175: iti nirṇīya nagare nāgarā mantriṇas tathā / abhito jvalayām āsuś citāś śatasahasraśaḥ //MU_5,46.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12176: jvalitāsv abhitas tāsu tārakāsv iva khe tadā / babhūva nagaraṃ sarvam ākrandaparamānavam //MU_5,46.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12178: agnikuṇḍapraviṣṭānāṃ mantriṇāṃ bhṛtyarodanaiḥ / krandadrathyaṃ dhvanadgartam araṇyam iva mārutaiḥ //MU_5,46.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12180: vātadīrghavasāgandhadhūtānītakhagombhitaiḥ / antrair vyomagataiś channaṃ bhāskaraṃ jaladair iva //MU_5,46.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12184: tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne kaṣṭe vidhiviparyaye / aśeṣajanatānāśe kalpāntasadṛśasthitau //MU_5,46.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12186: madartham atyanartho 'yaṃ deśe 'smin sthitim āgataḥ / akālakalpāntasamas sarvanāyakanāśanaḥ //MU_5,46.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12187: kiṃ me duḥkhitajīvena maraṇaṃ me mahotsavaḥ / lokanindyasya durjantor jīvitān maraṇaṃ varam //MU_5,46.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12188: iti niścitya gavalo jvalite jvalane puraḥ / pataṅgavad anudvegam akarod āhutiṃ vapuḥ //MU_5,46.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12189: tasmin balād gavalanāmni hutāśarāśau dehe pataty avayavākulatāṃ prayāte / svāṅgāvadāhadahanasphuraṇānurodhād antarjale jhagiti bodham avāpa gādhiḥ //MU_5,46.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12190: vālmīkiḥ: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma / snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_5,46.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12193: vasiṣṭhaḥ: muhūrtadvitayenātha gādher ādhibharabhramāt / praśaśāmākulībhāvo velāvattvam ivāmbudheḥ //MU_5,47.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12194: payonirmāṇasammohāt tasmāt sa virarāma ha / kalpāntasamaye brahmā jagadviracanād iva //MU_5,47.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12195: bodham āpa śanaiś śāntas svam evonnidradhīradhīḥ / kṣīvatāyāṃ praśāntāyāṃ yathā pariṇatāsavaḥ //MU_5,47.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12196: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti dadarśa ha / niśāvyapagame loko yathā kṣīṇatamaḥpaṭe //MU_5,47.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12197: smṛtasvarūpo vadanam uddadhre sa jalāntarāt / śiśirānte prabuddhātmā sarojam iva mādhavaḥ //MU_5,47.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12198: vanavārikakubvyomavatīṃ vasumatīm imām / anyām eva puraḥ paśyan paraṃ vismayam āyayau //MU_5,47.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12199: ko 'haṃ kim iva paśyāmi kim akārṣam ahaṃ kila / evaṃ vicārayaṃś citraṃ sabhrūbhaṅgam abhūt kṣaṇam //MU_5,47.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12200: etanmuhūrtamātreṇa sambhramaṃ dṛṣṭavān aham / iti vijñāya salilād udasthād udayārkavat //MU_5,47.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12201: cintayām āsa ca taṭe kva me mātā kva me priyā / yad ahaṃ mṛtim āyāto madhye mātṛmahelayoḥ //MU_5,47.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12202: bālasya mātāpitarau naṣṭau kila mamāmateḥ / vātanītasya pattrasya vallīvṛkṣāv ivāgninā //MU_5,47.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12203: avivāho 'smi jānāmi na svarūpam api striyaḥ / duṣṭāyāḥ kṣobhakāriṇyā madirāyā iva dvijaḥ //MU_5,47.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12204: tasmād etad asadbhūtam ahaṃ kiṃ nāma dṛṣṭavān / vividhārambhasaṃrambhaṃ gandharvo nagaraṃ yathā //MU_5,47.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12205: tad āstām etad eṣā hi bandhumadhyamṛtasthitiḥ / māyā mohe manāg asmin na satyam upalabhyate //MU_5,47.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12206: nityam evam anantāsu bhramadṛṣṭiṣu dehinām / ceto bhramati śārdūlo vanarājiṣv ivonmadaḥ //MU_5,47.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12207: avadhīryeti taṃ cittamohaṃ gādhir nināya saḥ / dināni katicit tasmin svaka evāśrame tadā //MU_5,47.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12208: ekadā gādhim āgacchat kaścid annapriyo 'tithiḥ / brahmāṇam iva durvāsās sa viśaśrāma saśramaḥ //MU_5,47.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12209: paramāṃ tṛptim ānītaḥ phalapuṣparasāśanaiḥ / so 'tithir gādhinā tena vasanteneva pādapaḥ //MU_5,47.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12210: atha vanditasandhyau tau kṛtajapyāv ubhāv api / kramāc chayanam āsādya tasthatur mṛdupallavam //MU_5,47.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12211: tataḥ pravavṛte śāntā tayos tāpasayoḥ kathā / svavyāpārocitā puṣpaśrīr ivartus svamāsayoḥ //MU_5,47.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12212: papracchāthātithiṃ gādhiḥ prasaṅgāpatitaṃ vacaḥ / kim brahman sukṛśāṅgas tvaṃ kim iti śramavān asi //MU_5,47.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12213: atithiḥ: mamātikārśyaśramayor bhagavañ śṛṇu kāraṇam / kathayāmi yathābhūtaṃ vayaṃ nāsatyavādinaḥ //MU_5,47.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12214: asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe uttarāśānikuñjake / kīro nāmātivikhyātaś śrīmāñ janapado mahān //MU_5,47.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12215: tatrāham avasaṃ māsaṃ pūjyamānaḥ pure janaiḥ / anantāsvādalolātmacittavetālamohitaḥ //MU_5,47.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12216: ekadaikena tatroktaṃ kathāprastāvataḥ kvacit / ihābhūc chvapaco rājā varṣāṇy aṣṭau dvijeti me //MU_5,47.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12217: tato grāmeṣu matpṛṣṭaiḥ proktaṃ sakalajantubhiḥ / rājā babhūva śvapaco varṣāṇy aṣṭāv iheti taiḥ //MU_5,47.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12218: sa evānte parijñātaḥ praviṣṭo jvalanaṃ javāt / tato dvijaśatānīha praviṣṭāni hutāśanam //MU_5,47.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12219: iti teṣāṃ mukhāc chrutvā tasmān nirgatya maṇḍalāt / prayāge 'karavaṃ śuddhyai prāyaścittam ahaṃ dvija //MU_5,47.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12220: kṛtvā cāndrāyaṇasyānte tṛtīyasyādya pāraṇam / ihāham āgatas tena śrānto 'smy atikṛśo 'smi ca //MU_5,47.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12221: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti śrutavatā tena gādhinā sa tadā dvijaḥ / bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭo 'py etad eva kathayām āsa nānyathā //MU_5,47.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12222: atha vismayavān gādhis tāṃ nītvā tatra śarvarīm / jagadgehamahādīpe ravāv udayam āgate //MU_5,47.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12223: kṛte prātastanavidhāv āpṛcchyāśv atithau gate / idaṃ sañcintayām āsa vismayoddhurayā dhiyā //MU_5,47.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12224: yan mayā sambhrame dṛṣṭaṃ satyaṃ bhūtaṃ dvijena tat / uktaṃ mameti kiṃ nāma syān māyāśambare kramaḥ //MU_5,47.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12225: yad bandhumadhye maraṇaṃ mayā tad dṛṣṭam ātmanaḥ / sā māyaiva na sandehaś śeṣe paśyāmi satyatām //MU_5,47.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12226: tad ātmaśvapacodantaṃ draṣṭuṃ tāvad akhinnadhīḥ / hūnamaṇḍalaparyantagrāmaṃ gacchāmi satvaram //MU_5,47.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12227: iti sañcintayan gantuṃ maṇḍalāntaram ādarāt / uttasthau bhāskaraḥ pārśvaṃ meror draṣṭum ivodyataḥ //MU_5,47.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12228: vinirgatyāvahan mārge prāvṛḍoghajavena saḥ / deśān ullaṅghayām āsa bahūn vātataraṅgavat //MU_5,47.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12229: tucchadeśajanācāraṃ hūnamaṇḍalam āsadat / karabhaḥ kaṇṭakaughārthī kārañjam iva kānanam //MU_5,47.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12230: tatra saṃvitsthitenaiva sanniveśena vai puraḥ / apaśyad grāmakaṃ kañcid gandharva iva pattanam //MU_5,47.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12231: dadarśa tasya paryante tam eva śvapacālayam / adhas tribhuvanasyeva pātāle narakavrajam //MU_5,47.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12232: citracintitavistārisanniveśamayaṃ puram / gandharvavad asāv ātmaśvapaceśasya dṛṣṭavān //MU_5,47.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12233: tenaiva sanniveśena prāg dṛṣṭaṃ śvapacāspadam / tasya kām api vairāgyapadavīm anayan manaḥ //MU_5,47.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12235: dāridryaṃ taṃ dṛḍham iva daurbhāgyam iva kuṭṭitam / bhraṣṭāṅgam iva daurātmyaṃ daussthityam iva khaṇḍitam //MU_5,47.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12236: gādhidantāvadalitair gavāśvamahiṣāsthibhiḥ / dhavalair vyāptaparyantaṃ sākṣyaṃ kartum iva sthitaiḥ //MU_5,47.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12237: bhuktaṃ pītaṃ purā tena yeṣu karparakeṣu ca / tair asanmātramalinaiḥ paripūrṇair ivāvṛtam //MU_5,47.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12238: tābhir evāntratantrībhis saṃśuṣkābhir ṛtāv ṛtau / tṛṣṇābhir iva dīrghābhiḥ paritaḥ pariveṣṭitam //MU_5,47.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12239: ciram ālokayām āsa sa tad ātmagṛhaṃ smayāt / prāktanaṃ śuṣkaśavatāṃ yātaṃ deham ivātmavān //MU_5,47.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12240: atha vismayavān eṣa grāmakaṃ samupāyayau / ullaṅghya mlecchanagaram āryadeśam ivādhvagaḥ //MU_5,47.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12241: tatrāpṛcchaj janaṃ sādho kaccit smarati bho bhavān / prāg vṛttam asya grāmasya paryante śvapacakramam //MU_5,47.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12242: sarva eva hi dhīmantaś ciravṛttam api sphuṭam / karastham iva paśyanti mayeti sujanāc chrutam //MU_5,47.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12243: atra śvapacam ekāntavāsinaṃ vṛddham unnatam / smarasy ekaṃ kila tamoduḥkhānām iva dehakam //MU_5,47.51//
GSP27moksop_u:12244: yadi jānāsi bhos sādho tan me kathaya taṃ janam / pānthasaṃśayavicchede mahat puṇyaphalaṃ smṛtam //MU_5,47.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12245: bhūyo bhūya iti grāmyāḥ pṛṣṭā gādhidvijanmanā / analpasmayasaṃrambhā ārteneva cikitsakāḥ //MU_5,47.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12246: grāmyāḥ: yathā kathayasi brahmaṃs tat tathā na tad anyathā / kaṭañjanāmā śvapaca ihābhūd dāruṇākṛtiḥ //MU_5,47.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12248: tasya vṛddhasya tat sarvaṃ kalatraṃ mṛtyur ācchinat / adreḥ puṣpaphalopetaṃ mahāvanam ivānilaḥ //MU_5,47.56//
GSP27moksop_u:12249: yas tato deśam utsṛjya yayau kīrapurāntaram / varṣāṇy aṣṭāv anudvegaṃ tatra rājā babhūva yaḥ //MU_5,47.57//
GSP27moksop_u:12250: yas tatrātha parijñāya janair dūre tiraskṛtaḥ / yathā rāśir amedhyasya yathā grāme viṣadrumaḥ //MU_5,47.58//
GSP27moksop_u:12251: tato jane 'gniṃ praviśaty ātmanā yo hutāśanam / āryatām āryasaṃsargād āryataḥ praviveśa ha //MU_5,47.59//
GSP27moksop_u:12252: kiṃ tvam ekaṃ prayatnena śvapacaṃ pṛcchasi prabho / kiṃ te bandhur asau kaścid abhavat saṃstuto 'tha vā //MU_5,47.60//
GSP27moksop_u:12253: evaṃ kathayato grāmyān gādhiḥ pṛcchan punaḥ punaḥ / sarveṣu tatra grāmeṣu māsam ekam uvāsa saḥ //MU_5,47.61//
GSP27moksop_u:12254: yathā tenānubhūtaṃ tac chvapacatvaṃ tathaiva taiḥ / grāmīṇais tasya kathitaṃ sarvair evāvikhaṇḍitam //MU_5,47.62//
GSP27moksop_u:12255: avyāhataṃ sakalahūnamukhād athaitad ākarṇya samyag avalokya yathānubhūtam / gādhiś śaśāṅkamalavad dhṛdaye virūḍhaṃ gūḍhākṛtiḥ paramavismayam ājagāma //MU_5,47.63//
GSP27moksop_u:12258: vasiṣṭhaḥ: luṭhitaṃ śvapacāgāraṃ punar vismayavān yayau / gādhir mano hi nāyāti tṛptim āścaryadarśane //MU_5,48.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12259: tatrāvalokayām āsa sthānāni sadanāni ca / kalpakṣobhavivṛttāni jagantīvāmbujodbhavaḥ //MU_5,48.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12260: uvāca svātmanaivedam araṇye luṭhitālaye / śuṣkāsthimālāvalite piśācaka iva bhraman //MU_5,48.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12261: imās tā mṛtamātaṅgadantamālā vṛtau kṛtāḥ / adyāpi saṃsthitāḥ kalpaṃ prati meruśikhā iva //MU_5,48.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12262: iha tad vānarīmāṃsaṃ pakvaṃ vaṃśāṅkurais saha / bhuktaṃ surāsavonmattais saha śvapacabandhubhiḥ //MU_5,48.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12263: āliṅgya śvapacīṃ śyāmām iha kesaricarmaṇi / suptam āpīya maireyaṃ tiktaṃ gajamadair navaiḥ //MU_5,48.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12264: kauleyakakuṭumbinyaḥ piṇyākaparivardhitāḥ / iha baddhā varatrābhir mṛtebharadakāṣṭhake //MU_5,48.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12265: iha vāraṇamuktānāṃ tad āsīt piṭhiratrayam / pinaddhaṃ māhiṣeṇogracarmaṇāmbudaśobhinā //MU_5,48.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12266: sthalīṣv etāsu tāsv atra saha śvapacabālakaiḥ / ciraṃ vilulitaṃ cūtapattrapuñje pikair iva //MU_5,48.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12268: atra sārdhaṃ kuṭumbena janyatreṣu kuṭumbinā / nṛttaṃ tat kṛtam unnādaṃ kallolair jaladhāv iva //MU_5,48.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12269: atroḍḍayanalolānāṃ kākabhāsapatatriṇām / dhṛtānām anyaghātārthaṃ grathitaṃ vaṃśapañjaram //MU_5,48.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12270: evamprāyās smaran gādhiḥ prāktanīś śvapacakriyāḥ / vismayotkampitaśirā dhātuś ceṣṭāḥ parāmṛśan //MU_5,48.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12271: cacāla tasmād dīrgheṇa deśāt kālena kāryavit / hūnamaṇḍalam utsṛjya prāpa deśāntaraṃ kramāt //MU_5,48.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12273: tatra prāpa mahīpālanagaraṃ nagasannibham / jagadbhramaṇakhinnātmā svarlokam iva nāradaḥ //MU_5,48.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12274: athātmanānubhūtāni dṛṣṭāny āsevitāni ca / sthānāni nagare paśyan papraccha janam ādṛtaḥ //MU_5,48.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12275: sādho smarasi kaccit tvam iha śvapacam īśvaram / yadi jānāsi tat tan me kathayāśu yathāvidhi //MU_5,48.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12276: nāgaraḥ: abhūd ihāṣṭau varṣāṇi śvapaco bhūmipo dvija / rājatvam arpitaṃ yasya navamaṅgalahastinā //MU_5,48.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12277: ante sa samparijñātas sampraviṣṭo hutāśanam / atra dvādaśavarśāṇi samatītāni tāpasa //MU_5,48.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12278: yaṃ yaṃ pṛcchaty asau gādhir janaṃ jātakutūhalaḥ / tasya tasya mukhād evaṃ śṛṇoty anubhavaty api //MU_5,48.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12279: athāpaśyat pure tasmin nṛpaṃ sabalavāhanam / devaṃ cakradharaṃ draṣṭuṃ mandirān nirgataṃ bahiḥ //MU_5,48.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12280: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sthagitākāśaṃ balareṇupayodharaiḥ / prāktanīṃ rājatām smṛtvā svām uvācātivismitaḥ //MU_5,48.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12281: imās tāḥ kīrakāminyaḥ padmagarbhopamatvacaḥ / kanakadravavarṇinyo lolanīlotpalekṣaṇāḥ //MU_5,48.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12282: cāmaraughā ime candrakarasampiṇḍapāṇḍurāḥ / sthiranirjharasaṅkāśāḥ kāśapuṣpacayā iva //MU_5,48.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12283: kāntābhir avadhūyante vālavyajanarāśayaḥ / imās tā navavallībhiḥ kusumānām ivarddhayaḥ //MU_5,48.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12284: imās tā mattamātaṅgaghaṭā ghaṭitamandirāḥ / sakalpapādapā meror iva śrṅgaparamparāḥ //MU_5,48.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12285: ete te yamaśarvendrakuberapratimaujasaḥ / sāmantā vāsavasyeva lokapālā mahībhṛtaḥ //MU_5,48.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12286: imās tās sarvaratnāḍhyās sarvābhimatadās tatāḥ / kalpavṛkṣalatākuñjasundaryo gṛhapaṅktayaḥ //MU_5,48.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12287: idaṃ tat kīrajanatārājyaṃ prāg bhuktam adya me / ātmajanmāntarācāra iva pratyaksatāṃ gatam //MU_5,48.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12288: satyasvapna ivedaṃ me jāgrato 'pi puras sthitam / na jāne kiṃ kṛtotthānā māyeyaṃ pravijṛmbhate //MU_5,48.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12289: aho nu khalu dīrgheṇa manomohena jṛmbhatā / vaivaśyam upanīto 'haṃ jāleneva śakuntakaḥ //MU_5,48.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12290: hā dhik kaṣṭam abuddhaṃ me mano vāsanayā hatam / paśyato bhramajālāni vitanoti śiśor iva //MU_5,48.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12291: eṣā hi māyā mahatī tena me cakrapāṇinā / darśitety adhunā sādhu mayā smṛtam akhaṇḍitam //MU_5,48.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12292: tad idānīṃ tathā yatnaṃ kariṣye girikandare / yathātisambhramasyāsya jāne marma yathāsthitam //MU_5,48.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12293: iti sañcintya nagarād gādhis taptuṃ jagāma ha / kandaraṃ prāpya śailasya tasthau suśrāntasiṃhavat //MU_5,48.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12294: tatra saṃvatsaraṃ sārdhaṃ payaśculakabhojanaḥ / tapaś cakre mahātejās tuṣṭaye śārṅgadhanvanaḥ //MU_5,48.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12295: athāsya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ payomūrtir upāyayau / prasādam utpalaśyāmaś śaradīva mahāhradaḥ //MU_5,48.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12296: tam ājagāma śailendrakandaraṃ dvijamandiram / payodharavad ātmācchacchavir vyomany athāvasat //MU_5,48.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12297: bhagavān: gādhe kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā māyā mama garīyasī / dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā jagajjālaceṣṭitaṃ veṣṭitātmakam //MU_5,48.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12298: cittābhimata etasmin prāpte samyag anindita / tapo giritaṭe kurvan kim anyad abhivāñchasi //MU_5,48.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12299: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ vadantam ālokya hariṃ gādhir dvijottamaḥ / arcākusumapūreṇa pādayoḥ paryapūjayat //MU_5,48.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12300: dattārghaṃ kīrṇakusumaṃ praṇamyāśu pradakṣiṇaiḥ / viṣṇum āha dvijo vākyam ambhodam iva cātakaḥ //MU_5,48.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12301: gādhiḥ: deva yaiṣā tvayā māyā darśitātitamomayī / mahīṃ prātar ivādityas tāṃ me prakaṭatāṃ naya //MU_5,48.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12302: bhramaṃ yat paśyati mano vāsanāmalamālitam / svapnavat sa kathaṃ deva jāgraty api hi dṛśyate //MU_5,48.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12303: muhūrtam upalabdhātmā jalāntas svapnavibhramaḥ / kathaṃ pratyakṣatāṃ prāpto mamāmalapadāspada //MU_5,48.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12304: dairghyādairghye ca kālasya śarīrasya bhavābhavau / katham atra sthitāni syur madīyaśvapacabhrame //MU_5,48.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12305: bhagavān: gādhe svādhividhūtasya rūpam asyaitad ātmajam / cetaso 'dṛṣṭatattvasya yat paśyaty uruvibhramam //MU_5,48.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12306: bahir na kiñcid apy asti khādridyūrvīdigādikam / etat svacitta evāsti pattrapuñja ivāṅkure //MU_5,48.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12307: phalādi sphāratām eti yathaiva bahir aṅkurāt / bahiḥ prakaṭatāṃ yāti tathā pṛthvyādi cetasaḥ //MU_5,48.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12308: satyaṃ pṛthvyādi cittasthaṃ na bahissthaṃ kadācana / aṅkurasthaṃ phalaṃ vastu tasmād yasmāt phalaśriyaḥ //MU_5,48.51//
GSP27moksop_u:12309: rūpālokamanaskārān sattākālakriyākramān / kumbhakāro ghaṭam iva ceto hanti karoti ca //MU_5,48.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12310: ābālam etat puruṣais sarvair evānubhūyate / svapnabhramavad āvegarāgarogādidṛṣṭiṣu //MU_5,48.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12311: citte vṛttāntalakṣāṇi saṃsthitāny āttavāsane / pādape phalapuṣpāṇi mūlākrāntāvanāv iva //MU_5,48.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12312: tyaktāvaner viṭapino bhūyaḥ pattrāṇi no yathā / nirvāsanasya jīvasya punar janmādi no tathā //MU_5,48.55//
GSP27moksop_u:12313: yatrānantaṃ jagajjālaṃ saṃsthitaṃ tena cetasā / śvapacatvaṃ prakaṭitaṃ yadi tad vismayo 'tra kim //MU_5,48.56//
GSP27moksop_u:12314: avabuddhā śvapacatā pratibhāsavaśāt tvayā / yathaivānalpasaṃrambhā vicitrāpi vikāradā //MU_5,48.57//
GSP27moksop_u:12315: tathaivātithir āyāto bhuktavān suptavān dvijaḥ / kathāṃ kathitavāṃś ceti dṛṣṭavān asi vibhramam //MU_5,48.58//
GSP27moksop_u:12316: tathaivotthāya gacchāmi prāpto 'haṃ hūnamaṇḍalam / ime hūnā ime grāmā dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam //MU_5,48.59//
GSP27moksop_u:12317: tathaivedaṃ kaṭañjasya prāktanaṃ luṭhitaṃ gṛham / janair uktaḥ kaṭañjaś ca dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam //MU_5,48.60//
GSP27moksop_u:12318: tathaiva kīranagaraṃ prāpto 'smi kathitaṃ ca me / kīraiś śvapacarājatvaṃ dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam //MU_5,48.61//
GSP27moksop_u:12319: evaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ mohajālaṃ dvijottama / yat satyam iti jānāsi yac cāsatyam avaiṣi ca //MU_5,48.62//
GSP27moksop_u:12320: vāsanāvalitaṃ cetaḥ kiṃ nāma na na paśyati / sādhitaṃ dṛśyate svapne varṣasādhyaṃ prayojanam //MU_5,48.63//
GSP27moksop_u:12321: nātithir na ca hūnās te na kīrās te na tat puram / sarvam eva mahābuddhe vyāmohād dṛṣṭavān asi //MU_5,48.64//
GSP27moksop_u:12322: gacchatā bhavatā hūnadeśaṃ pānthena kandare / kasmiṃścid vipra viśrāntaṃ kuraṅgeṇeva kānane //MU_5,48.65//
GSP27moksop_u:12323: tathaiva śramamūḍhatvād idaṃ tad dhūnamaṇḍalam / idaṃ tac chvapacāgāram iti dṛṣṭaṃ na satyataḥ //MU_5,48.66//
GSP27moksop_u:12324: tathaiva kīranagaraṃ dṛṣṭavān asi tat tathā / tathaiva nānyathā vāpi māyārthī hi bhavān dvija //MU_5,48.67//
GSP27moksop_u:12325: sarvadaiva samagrāsu viharann asi dṛṣṭavān / dikṣu pronmattaka iva vibhramaṃ manasā mune //MU_5,48.68//
GSP27moksop_u:12326: tad uttiṣṭha nijam karma kurvaṃs tiṣṭhopaśāntadhīḥ / na svakarma vinā śreyaḥ prāpnuvantīha mānavāḥ //MU_5,48.69//
GSP27moksop_u:12327: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti nigaditavān sa padmanābho vanagatatāpasavṛndapūjyamānaḥ / vibudhamunigaṇaiḥ pavitrahastair vṛta udadhiṃ nijam āspadaṃ jagāma //MU_5,48.70//
GSP27moksop_u:12330: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha gādhir gate viṣṇau punar hūnādikāñ janān / svasammohavicārārthaṃ babhrāmābhram ivāmbare //MU_5,49.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12331: upalabhya tathaivātmavṛttāntaṃ janatas tataḥ / harim ārādhayām āsa punar adriguhāgataḥ //MU_5,49.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12332: ājagāmainam alpena kālenātha janārdanaḥ / sakṛdārādhanenaiva mādhavo yāti bandhutām //MU_5,49.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12333: uvāca gādhiṃ bhagavān mayūram iva vāridaḥ / kiṃ tvaṃ prārthayase bhūyas tapaseti prasādavān //MU_5,49.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12334: gādhiḥ: bhrānto 'smi deva ṣaṇmāsān hūnakīrajanāspadam / tatra vyabhicaraty asmadvṛttānto na kathāsv api //MU_5,49.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12335: māyayā hūnabhūr dṛṣṭā tvayety ukto 'smi kiṃ prabho / mohanāśāya mahatāṃ vaco no mohavṛddhaye //MU_5,49.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12336: bhagavān: kākatālīyayogena cetasi śvapacasthitiḥ / sarveṣāṃ hūnakīrāṇāṃ tathaiva pratibimbitā //MU_5,49.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12337: tenāṅga tava vṛttāntaṃ satyaṃ yat kathayanti te / pratibhāso hi nāyāti punar apratibhāsatām //MU_5,49.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12338: kenacic chvapacenānte grāmasya racitaṃ gṛhaṃ / tat tathā yat tvayā dṛṣṭam iṣṭakākhaṇḍatāṃ gatam //MU_5,49.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12339: kadācit pratibhaikaiva bahūnām api jāyate / kākatālīyagativad vicitrā hi manogatiḥ //MU_5,49.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12340: tathā hi bahavas svapnam ekaṃ paśyanti mānavāḥ / svāpabhramadamaireyamadamantharacittavat //MU_5,49.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12342: bahavas tulyakālaṃ ca pratibhātena karmaṇā / janā yatante svaphalapākeneva drumā ṛtau //MU_5,49.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12343: pratibandhābhyanujñānāṃ kālo dāteti yā śrutiḥ / vipra saṅkalpamātro 'sau kālo hy ātmani tiṣṭhati //MU_5,49.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12344: amūrto bhagavān kālo brahmaiva tam ajaṃ viduḥ / na jahāti na cādatte kiñcit kasyacid eva saḥ //MU_5,49.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12345: laukiko yas tv ayaṃ kālo varṣakalpayugātmakaḥ / saṅkalpyate padārthaughaiḥ padārthaughāś ca tena te //MU_5,49.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12347: svavyāpāraparo bhūtvā dhiyātmānaṃ vicārayan / sādho gatamanomoham ihaivāssva vrajāmy aham //MU_5,49.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12348: ity uktvā bhagavān viṣṇur jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ / atiṣṭhat kandare gādhir ādhipīvarayā dhiyā //MU_5,49.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12349: tataḥ katipayeṣv adrau māseṣv api gateṣu saḥ / punar ārādhayām āsa puṇḍarīkakaraṃ dvijaḥ //MU_5,49.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12350: dadarśa caikadā nātham āgataṃ praṇanāma tam / pūjayām āsa manasā sotkenovāca ceśvaram //MU_5,49.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12351: gādhiḥ: bhagavan saṃsmaraṃś citrāṃ tām ātmaśvapacasthitim / imāṃ saṃsāramāyāṃ ca parimuhyāmi cetasā //MU_5,49.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12352: tad uktvāśu yathāvastu mahāmohanivṛttaye / etasminn eva vimale māṃ niyojaya karmaṇi //MU_5,49.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12353: bhagavān: brahmañ jagad idaṃ māyāmahāśambaraḍambaram / sarvā āścaryakalanās sambhavantīha vistṛte //MU_5,49.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12354: hūnakīrapure mohād dṛṣṭavāṃs tat tathā bhavān / ity etat sambhavaty eva dṛśyate hi janair bhramaḥ //MU_5,49.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12355: hūnās tvam iva kīrāś ca dṛṣṭavantas tathā bhramam / mudhaivety api satyābhaṃ samakālādisambhavāt //MU_5,49.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12356: idaṃ tu śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathābhūtam anindita / yenaiti tanutāṃ cintā mārgaśīrṣalateva te //MU_5,49.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12357: yo 'sau kaṭañjako nāma śvapaco hūnamaṇḍale / tenaiva sanniveśena sa tathaivābhavat purā //MU_5,49.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12358: tathaiva vikalatratvaṃ prāpya deśāntaraṃ gataḥ / babhūva kīranṛpatiḥ praviveśānalaṃ tataḥ //MU_5,49.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12359: bhavataḥ kevalaṃ citte jalāntarvartinas tadā / pratibhātā tathābhūtā kaṭañjācārasaṃsthitiḥ //MU_5,49.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12360: dṛṣṭānubhūtam atyarthaṃ kadācid vismaraty alam / kadācid apy adṛṣṭaṃ tu cetaḥ paśyati dṛṣṭavat //MU_5,49.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12361: yathā svapnamanorājyadhātusaṃsthitiṣu bhramaḥ / jāgraty api tathaivāṅga dṛśyate manasā svayam //MU_5,49.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12362: bhaviṣyadbhūtakālasthaṃ yathā traikālyadarśinaḥ / pratibhām eti te gādhe kaṭañjacaritaṃ tathā //MU_5,49.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12363: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti majjati nātmavān / ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti paśyaty anātmavān //MU_5,49.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12364: sarvam evāham eveti tattvajño nāvasīdati / na gṛhṇāti padārtheṣu vibhāgānarthabhāvanām //MU_5,49.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12365: tenāsau bhramamoheṣu sukhaduḥkhavilāsiṣu / na nimajjati magno 'pi tumbīpātram ivāmbhasi //MU_5,49.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12366: tvaṃ tāvad vāsanājālagrastacitto vicetanaḥ / kiñciccheṣamahāvyādhir iva na svāsthyam āgataḥ //MU_5,49.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12367: jñānasyāparipūrṇatvān na śaknoṣi manobhramam / vinivārayituṃ megham asamyaṅmantravān iva //MU_5,49.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12368: yad eva te manomātre sahasā pratibimbate / tarur oghajaveneva tenaivākramyase kṣaṇāt //MU_5,49.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12369: cittanābheḥ kalāsyeha māyācakrasya sarvataḥ / sthīyate cet tad ākramya tan na kiñcit prabādhate //MU_5,49.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12370: tvam uttiṣṭha gireḥ kuñje daśavarṣāṇy akhinnadhīḥ / tapaḥ kuru tato jñānam anantābhāvam āpsyasi //MU_5,49.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12371: ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣas tatraivāntaradhīyata / vātābhravad dīpakavad yamunotpīḍavat kṣaṇāt //MU_5,49.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12372: gādhir vivekavaśajaṃ vairāgyaṃ param āgataḥ / śaratsamayaparyante vairasyam iva pādapaḥ //MU_5,49.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12373: vicitraṃ ceṣṭitaṃ dhātur asamañjasam ātatam / bṛhadbhramabharonmuktamatir mandam agarhayat //MU_5,49.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12374: jagāma karuṇārdrātmā niyamāyottamaśriye / viśrāntyai vṛṣṭamūkātmā payodhara ivācalam //MU_5,49.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12375: nirastāśeṣasaṅkalpas tapas tatra cakāra ha / daśavarṣāṇi tenāsāv ātmajñānam avāpa ha //MU_5,49.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12376: aramata tadanu svāṃ prāpya sattāṃ mahātmā vyapagatabhayamoho bhogabhūmāv anicchaḥ / satatamuditajīvanmuktarūpaḥ praśāntas sakala iva śaśāṅko ghūrṇitāpūrṇacetāḥ //MU_5,49.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12379: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evam eṣātivitatā durjñānā raghunandana / mahāmohakarī māyā viṣamā pāramātmikī //MU_5,50.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12381: kva sambhramopalabdhatvaṃ kva pratyakṣanidarśanam / kvāsatyatvam asandigdhaṃ kva satyapariṇāmitā //MU_5,50.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12382: ato vacmi mahābāho māyeyaṃ vitatety alam / asāvadhānamanasaṃ yojayaty atisaṅkaṭe //MU_5,50.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12383: rāmaḥ: evam asya kathaṃ brahman māyācakrasya rodhanam / kurmaḥ prabalino vegāt sarvāṅgacchedakāriṇaḥ //MU_5,50.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12384: vasiṣṭhaḥ: asya saṃsārarūpasya māyācakrasya rāghava / cittaṃ viddhi mahānābhiṃ bhramato bhramadāyinaḥ //MU_5,50.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12385: tasmin nūnam avaṣṭabdhe dhiyā puruṣayatnataḥ / gṛhītanābhi vahanān māyācakraṃ nirudhyate //MU_5,50.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12386: avaṣṭabdhamanonābhi mohacakraṃ na copati / yathā rajjvāṃ niruddhāyāṃ kīlakaṃ rajjuveṣṭitam //MU_5,50.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12387: cakrayuddhaikatajjño 'pi kasmāj jānāsi nānagha / cakraṃ nābhāv avaṣṭabdhaṃ vaśam āyāti nānyathā //MU_5,50.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12388: cittanābhāv avaṣṭabhya tasmād yatnena rāghava / saṃsāracakraṃ vahanād ātmanaḥ parirodhaya //MU_5,50.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12389: etāṃ yuktiṃ vinā duḥkham anantam idam ātmanaḥ / asyāṃ yuktau kṣaṇāt tv antaṃ gatam evāvalokaya //MU_5,50.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12390: cittākramaṇamātrākhyāt paramād auṣadhād ṛte / prayatnenāpi saṃsāramahārogo na śāmyati //MU_5,50.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12391: tasmād rāghava santyajya tīrthadānatapaḥkriyāḥ / śreyase paramāyāntaś cittam eva vaśīkuru //MU_5,50.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12392: cittāntar eva saṃsāraḥ kumbhāntaḥ kumbhakhaṃ yathā / cittanāśe na saṃsāraḥ kumbhanāśe na kumbhakham //MU_5,50.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12393: cittasaṃsāraṇākāśakoṭare cittakumbhakham / vināśyātulitākāśarūpaṃ svaṃ rūpam āviśa //MU_5,50.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12394: vartamānaṃ kramāyātaṃ bhajad bāhyadhiyā kṣaṇam / bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad abhajad yāti cittam acittatām //MU_5,50.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12395: saṅkalpaṃ sānusandhānavarjanaṃ cet pratikṣaṇam / karoṣi tad acittatvaṃ prāpta evāsi pāvanam //MU_5,50.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12396: yāvat saṅkalpakalanaṃ tāvac cittavibhūtayaḥ / yāvaj jaladavistāras tāvat khe jalabindavaḥ //MU_5,50.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12397: sacittaṃ cetanaṃ yāvat tāvat saṅkalpakalpanam / sacandrāṃśu jagad yāvat tāvat prāleyaleśakāḥ //MU_5,50.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12398: cetanaś cittariktaś ced bhāvitas tat kusaṃsṛteḥ / āmūlam eva dagdhāni viddhi mūlāni siddhiman //MU_5,50.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12399: cetanaṃ cittariktaṃ hi pratyakcetanam ucyate / nirmanaskasvabhāvaṃ tan na tatra kalanāmalaḥ //MU_5,50.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12400: sā satyatā sā śivatā sā sattā pāramātmikī / sarvajñatā sā sā tṛptir nanu yatra manaḥ kṣatam //MU_5,50.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12401: mano yatra tu tatrāsthās tatra duḥkhasukhāni ca / sadā sannidhim āyānti śmaśāna iva vāyasāḥ //MU_5,50.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12402: avastutvāvabodhena sarvabhāvavyavasthiteḥ / saṃsṛtivratater bījaṃ saṅkalpe nopajāyate //MU_5,50.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12404: avivekād upāhṛtya cetas svair yatnaniścayaiḥ / balātkāreṇa saṃyojyaṃ śāstrasatpuruṣakrame //MU_5,50.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12405: mukhyaṃ kāraṇam ātmaiva paramātmāvalokane / agādhe patitaṃ ratnaṃ ratnenaivāvakṛṣyate //MU_5,50.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12406: svānubhūtāni duḥkhāni svātmaiva tyaktum arhati / tenātmaivātmavijñāne hetur ekaḥ paras smṛtaḥ //MU_5,50.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12407: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api / nirastamananānantasaṃvinmātraparo bhava //MU_5,50.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12408: mamedaṃ tad ayaṃ so 'ham iti santyajya vāsanāḥ / ekaniṣṭhatayāntassthasaṃvinmātraparo bhava //MU_5,50.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12409: vartamānabhaviṣyantyos sthityor ādeham ekadhīḥ / svasaṃvittyanusandhānāt samādhānaparo bhava //MU_5,50.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12410: palāyaneṣu yuddheṣu duḥkheṣu ca sukheṣu ca / jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu svasaṃvittiparo bhava //MU_5,50.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12411: malaṃ saṃvedyam utsṛjya mano nirmathya mantharam / āśāpāśān alaṃ chittvā svasaṃvittiparo bhava //MU_5,50.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12412: aśubhāśubhasaṅketas saṃśāntāśāviṣūcikaḥ / naṣṭeṣṭāniṣṭadṛṣṭis tvaṃ saṃvitsāraparo bhava //MU_5,50.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12413: sakartṛkarmakaraṇān svān sparśān antar aspṛśan / nirvikalpanirālambas svacinmātraparo bhava //MU_5,50.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12414: jāgraty eva hi sauṣuptīṃ bhāvayan susthirāṃ sthitim / sarvam astīti sañcintya sattaikātmavapur bhava //MU_5,50.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12415: nānānānādaśāmukto yukto muktatayāśaye / samagrakalanādīpas svacinmātraparo bhava //MU_5,50.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12416: ātmatāparate tyaktvā nirvibhāgo jagatsthitau / vajrastambhavad ātmānam avalambya sthiro bhava //MU_5,50.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12417: chittvāntar mānasān pāśān āśārūpān udārayā / dhiyā dhairyaikadhāriṇyā nirdharmādharmatāṃ vraja //MU_5,50.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12418: samāsādayatas tattvaṃ svasaṃvedanam ity alam / viṣaṃ hālāhalam api yāsyaty amṛtatāṃ tava //MU_5,50.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12419: tadodeti mahāmohas saṃsṛtibhramakāraṇam / nirmalāyā niraṃśāyās svasaṃvitteś cyutir yadā //MU_5,50.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12420: tadā saṅkṣīyate mohas saṃsṛtibhramakāraṇam / nirmalāyāṃ niraṃśāyāṃ svasaṃvittau sthitir yadā //MU_5,50.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12421: svarūpam anuyātasya tīrṇasyāśāmahārṇavam / prasariṣyati te saṃvit sūryāṃśur iva sarvataḥ //MU_5,50.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12422: svabhāvam ālokayata ānandamayasaṃsthiteḥ / rasāyanam api svādu rāma prativiṣāyate //MU_5,50.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12423: tair na lajjāmahe pumbhir ye svabhāvam upāgatāḥ / śeṣāḥ puruṣanāmāno gardabhā dīrghabāhavaḥ //MU_5,50.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12424: parvatāḥ kharvatāṃ yānti puro 'drer iva dantinaḥ / parāṃ koṭiṃ prayātasya svasaṃvittyunnatasthiteḥ //MU_5,50.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12425: ādṛśyadraṣṭṛsīmno 'ntas sūryādīny akhilāny api / na tejāṃsy upakurvanti svasaṃviddivyacakṣuṣaḥ //MU_5,50.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12426: avastutāṃ vrajanty ete madhyāhna iva dīpakāḥ / arkādayo mahālokavidhāv adhigatātmanaḥ //MU_5,50.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12427: tejo'ṃśuṣu prabhāveṣu baleṣv atimahatsv api / sarveṣūnnatiyukteṣu tattvajñaḥ paramonnataḥ //MU_5,50.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12428: bhānti bhāsā yathā sūryavahnīndumaṇitārakāḥ / tathā jagati rājante jñātajñeyā narottamāḥ //MU_5,50.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12429: dharāvivarakīṭebhyo gardabhebhyo 'pi mānavāḥ / tiryagbhyaś cāpy atattvajñā rāma tucchatarās smṛtāḥ //MU_5,50.51//
GSP27moksop_u:12430: tāvat sammohavetālo deho yāvad anātmavān / ātmajña eva saṃyuktaś cetaneneti tadvidaḥ //MU_5,50.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12431: anātmajño hi durdehaḥ prasphurann api bhūtale / śava eva bhramaty uccair ātmajñas tu sacetanaḥ //MU_5,50.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12432: dūram ātmajñatā yāti citte pīvaratāṃ gate / ālokalakṣmīr amalā mahāmegha ivotthite //MU_5,50.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12433: bhogābhogatiraskāraiḥ kārśyaṃ neyaṃ manaś śanaiḥ / rasāpahārais tajjñena kālenājīrṇaparṇavat //MU_5,50.55//
GSP27moksop_u:12434: anātmany ātmabhāvena dehamātrāsthayānayā / putradārakuṭumbaiś ca ceto gacchati pīnatām //MU_5,50.56//
GSP27moksop_u:12435: ahaṅkāravikāreṇa mamatāmalahelayā / idaṃ mameti bhāvena ceto gacchati pīnatām //MU_5,50.57//
GSP27moksop_u:12436: jarāmaraṇaduḥkhena vyartham unnatim īyuṣā / doṣāśīviṣakośena ceto gacchati pīnatām //MU_5,50.58//
GSP27moksop_u:12437: durāśākṣīrapānena bhogānilabalena ca / āsthādānena cānena cittāhir yāti pīnatām //MU_5,50.59//
GSP27moksop_u:12438: ādhivyādhivilāsena samāśvāsena saṃsṛtau / heyādeyaprayatnena ceto gacchati pīnatām //MU_5,50.60//
GSP27moksop_u:12439: āgamāpāyavapuṣā viṣavaiṣamyaśaṃsinā / bhogābhogena pīnena cittāhir yāti pīnatām //MU_5,50.61//
GSP27moksop_u:12441: vicārasārakrakacena cittaviṣadrumaṃ tvaṃ drutam indukalpa / āśāmahāśākham aśaṅkam eva cchinddhi prasahyārdravikalpapattram //MU_5,50.63//
GSP27moksop_u:12442: mattaṃ kṣaṇaṃ caikataṭopaveśaviśrāntisaukhyeṣv asamartham ugram / āloḍanotkaṃ sujanakramābjaṣaṇḍasya caṇḍaṃ sukhaduḥkhagaṇḍam //MU_5,50.64//
GSP27moksop_u:12443: cetogajaṃ kāyakukānanasthaṃ sutīkṣṇayā dhīkarajāgrapaṅktyā / vidārayādīrghavikāradantaṃ kriyākaraṃ rāghava rājasiṃha //MU_5,50.65//
GSP27moksop_u:12444: ratiṃ gataṃ nityam asatpradeśe śarīramālāgrasanena puṣṭam / dhṛṣṭaṃ kriyākarkaśacañcucaṇḍam ekekṣaṇaṃ puṣṭatamo'ṃśakṛṣṇam //MU_5,50.66//
GSP27moksop_u:12445: dūre samutsāraya sārabhūtaṃ duśceṣṭitaṃ karkaśam āraṭantam / garvoddhataṃ kāyakulāyakośād doṣopaśāntyai nijacittakākam //MU_5,50.67//
GSP27moksop_u:12446: tṛṣṇāpiśācyā paricaryamāṇaṃ viśrāntam ajñānamahāvaṭeṣu / bhrāntaṃ ciraṃ dehaśateṣv aṭavyāṃ svasaṃsṛtau cetanavarjiteṣu //MU_5,50.68//
GSP27moksop_u:12447: vivekavairāgyaguruprayatnamantrais svatantrais svacidātmagehāt / notsāritaś cittapiśācako 'yaṃ yāvat kutas tāvad ihātmasiddhiḥ //MU_5,50.69//
GSP27moksop_u:12448: śubhāsubhāśīrhatamānavaughaṃ cintāviṣaṃ kāyakukañcukaṃ ca / ajasram acchaśvasanāśanaṃ ca sarvasya rāmābhayanāśanaṃ ca //MU_5,50.70//
GSP27moksop_u:12449: hṛdabjaduśśalmalikoṭarasthaṃ bhogaughagarhākhagamantraśaktyā / nītvā śamaṃ rāma manomahāhiṃ bhayaṃ bhṛśaṃ projjhya bhavābhayātmā //MU_5,50.71//
GSP27moksop_u:12450: amaṅgalākāradharaś śarīraśavāvalīsantatasevanena / digāvalīsambhramaṇaśramārtaś śmaśānasevī vapuṣā kṣatena //MU_5,50.72//
GSP27moksop_u:12451: bhogāmiṣe dikṣv abhidhāvamāna utkandharo dhīravivṛddhagarvaḥ / uḍḍīya ced gacchati cittagṛdhro dehadrumāt tan nipuṇaṃ jayas te //MU_5,50.73//
GSP27moksop_u:12452: bhrāntaṃ vanānteṣu digantareṣu phalārthinaṃ cañcalam ākulāṅgam / janmāvaner janmamahīṃ prayāntaṃ saṃsārapānthaṃ janam āhasantam //MU_5,50.74//
GSP27moksop_u:12453: drume 'kṣināsākusume bhujādiśākhe vilolāṅgulijālapattre / samullasantaṃ parimārayainaṃ manomahāmarkaṭam aṅga siddhyai //MU_5,50.75//
GSP27moksop_u:12454: abhyutthitaṃ satphalasaṅkṣayāya lasatsukhāsaṅgataḍitprakāśam / varṣantam āsāram anarthasārtham āndolitaṃ vāsanavātyayāntaḥ //MU_5,50.76//
GSP27moksop_u:12455: saṅkalpyasaṅkalpanavarjanogramantraprabhāvād dhṛdayāmbarāt tvam / sotsāham utsādaya cittameghaṃ mahat phalaṃ prāpya bhavālam āḍhyaḥ //MU_5,50.77//
GSP27moksop_u:12456: granthīkṛtaṃ karmabhir ātmasṛṣṭaiś śastrair abhedyaṃ jvalanair adagdham / pīḍāṃ parām ātmani kalpayantaṃ samastajātyantaradīrghadāma //MU_5,50.78//
GSP27moksop_u:12457: samprotanissaṅkhyaśarīramālaṃ balād asaṅkalpanamātraśastraiḥ / chittvā svayaṃ rāghava cittapāśaṃ yathāsukhaṃ tvaṃ viharāstaśaṅkaḥ //MU_5,50.79//
GSP27moksop_u:12459: āmantharaṃ dehaguhāprasuptaṃ saṅkalpaghorājagaraṃ javena / akāmanānāmamahānalena balena dagdhvā vibhayo bhava tvam //MU_5,50.81//
GSP27moksop_u:12460: cittena cetaś śamam āśu nītvā śuddhena ghorāstram ivāstrayuktyā / cirāya sādho tyaja cañcalatvaṃ vimarkaṭo vṛkṣa ivākṣataśrīḥ //MU_5,50.82//
GSP27moksop_u:12461: alam alam iti kṛtvā cetasā vītaśaṅkaṃ vyupaśamitamalo 'ntas sarvam ādeham eva / tṛṇalavalaghu paśyaṃl līlayāheyadṛṣṭyā piba vihara ramasva prāptasaṃsārapāraḥ //MU_5,50.83//
GSP27moksop_u:12464: vasiṣṭhaḥ: paridīrghāsu tanvīṣu kacantīṣv asitāsu ca / kṣuradhāropamānāsu cittavṛttiṣu tiṣṭha mā //MU_5,51.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12465: kālena ca mahākṣetre jāteyaṃ buddhivallarī / vṛddhiṃ vivekasekena nayaināṃ nayakovida //MU_5,51.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12466: yāvan mlāyati no kāyakalikā kalibhasmanā / bhūtale patitāṃ tāvad enām uddhṛtya dhāraya //MU_5,51.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12467: madvākyārthaikatattvajña madvākyārthaikabhāvanāt / sukham āpnoṣi sarpārir yathābhraravabhāvanāt //MU_5,51.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12468: uddālakavad ālūnaviśīrṇaṃ bhūtapañcakam / kṛtvā kṛtvā dhiyā dhīra dhīrayāntar vicāraya //MU_5,51.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12469: rāmaḥ: kena krameṇa bhagavan muninoddālakena tat / bhūtapañcakam ālūnaṃ kṛtvāntaḥ pravicāritam //MU_5,51.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12470: vasiṣṭhaḥ: śṛṇu rāma yathā pūrvaṃ bhūtavṛndavicāraṇāt / uddālakena samprāptā paramā dṛṣṭir akṣatā //MU_5,51.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12471: jagajjīrṇagṛhasyāsya koṇe kasmiṃścid ātate / bhūmer aniladiṅnāmni bhūbhṛdbhāṇḍabharākule //MU_5,51.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12472: gandhamādanaśailendranāmnī kācit kila sthalī / vidyate kīrṇakusumā karpūradrumadhūsarā //MU_5,51.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12474: kvacit sthitamahāratnā kvacin nīlāmbudotpalā / kvacin nīhārakavarī sarasīdarpaṇā kvacit //MU_5,51.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12475: tatra kasmiṃścid udite sānau saphalapādape / āgulphakīrṇakusume snigdhacchāyāmahādrume //MU_5,51.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12476: uddālako nāma munir maunī mānī mahāmatiḥ / aprāptayauvanaḥ pūrvam uvāsoddāmatāpasaḥ //MU_5,51.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12477: prathamaṃ tu babhūvāsāv alpaprajñāvicāravān / aprāptapadaviśrāntir aprabuddhaśubhāśayaḥ //MU_5,51.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12478: tataḥ krameṇa tapasā śāstrārthaniyamair yamaiḥ / viveka ājagāmainaṃ navartur iva bhūtalam //MU_5,51.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12479: athedaṃ cintayām āsa saṃsārabhayabhītadhīḥ / ekānta eva nivasan kadācit klāntamānasaḥ //MU_5,51.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12480: kiṃ tat prāpyaṃ pradhānaṃ syād yad viśrāntau na śocyate / yat prāpya janmanā bhūyas sambandho nopajāyate //MU_5,51.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12481: kadāhaṃ tyaktamananaḥ pade paramapāvane / viśrāntiṃ ciram eṣyāmi meruśṛṅga ivāmbudaḥ //MU_5,51.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12482: kadā śamam upeṣyanti mamāntar bhogavāsanāḥ / ālolakallolaravā ūrmayo 'mbunidhāv iva //MU_5,51.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12483: idaṃ kṛtvedam apy anyat kartavyam iti kalpanām / kadāntar vihasiṣyāmi padaviśrāntayā dhiyā //MU_5,51.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12484: kadā vikalpajālaṃ me na lagiṣyati cetasi / sthitam apy ujjhitāsaṅgaṃ payaḥ padmadale yathā //MU_5,51.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12485: kadā bahalakallolāṃ nāvā paramayā dhiyā / paritīrṇo bhaviṣyāmi tṛṣṇāmattataraṅgiṇīm //MU_5,51.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12486: kademāṃ jāgatair bhūtaiḥ kriyamāṇām asanmayīm / kriyām upahasiṣyāmi bālalīlām ivāphalām //MU_5,51.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12487: kadā vikalpaparyastamanodolāvadolanam / praśamiṣyati me śāntapānaujasa iva bhramaḥ //MU_5,51.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12488: kadoditavapurbhāsvān vihasañ jāgatīr gatīḥ / antas santoṣam eṣyāmi virāḍātmeva pūrṇadhīḥ //MU_5,51.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12489: śāntaś samasamācāras somyas sarvārthanisspṛhaḥ / kadopaśamam eṣyāmi manthonmuktamahābdhivat //MU_5,51.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12490: kademām akhilāṃ dṛśyaśriyam āśāśatātmikām / sarvāṃ suṣuptavat paśyan bhaviṣyāmy antarātataḥ //MU_5,51.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12491: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ sarvaṃ śāntakalpanayā dhiyā / paśyaṃś cinmātram akhilaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmy ahaṃ kadā //MU_5,51.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12492: kadopaśāntacittātmā cittām upagataḥ parām / paramālokam eṣyāmi jātyāndhyavigamād iva //MU_5,51.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12493: kadābhyāsopalabdhena citprakāśena cāruṇā / dūrād ālokayiṣyāmi tanvīṃ kālakalām imām //MU_5,51.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12494: īhitānīhitonmukto heyopādeyavarjitaḥ / kadāntas toṣam eṣyāmi svaprakāśapadasthitaḥ //MU_5,51.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12495: kadāśākauśikīkīrṇā jāḍyajīrṇahṛdambujā / kṣayam eṣyati kṛṣṇeyaṃ kadā me mohayāminī //MU_5,51.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12497: kadā me cittamātaṅgas svābhimānamahāmadaḥ / tattvāvabodhahariṇā hato nāśam upaiṣyati //MU_5,51.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12498: niraṃśadhyānaviśrāntimūkasya mama mūrdhani / kadā karṇe kariṣyanti kulāyaṃ vanaputtikāḥ //MU_5,51.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12499: kadā niśśaṅkam urasi dhyānādhīnadhiyaḥ khagāḥ / mama viśrāntim eṣyanti śailasthāṇutalasthiteḥ //MU_5,51.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12500: tṛṣṇākarañjajaṭilāṃ janmajarjaragulmakām / saṃsārāraṇyasaraṇiṃ tyaktvā yāsyāmy ahaṃ kadā //MU_5,51.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12501: iti cintāparavaśo vana uddālako dvijaḥ / punaḥ punas tūpaviśya dhyānābhyāsaṃ cakāra saḥ //MU_5,51.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12502: viṣayair nīyamāne tu citte markaṭacañcale / na sa lebhe samādhānapratiṣṭhāṃ prītidāyinīm //MU_5,51.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12503: kadācid bāhyasaṃsparśaparityāgād anantaram / tasyāgacchac cittakapiḥ prodvegaṃ tattvasaṃsthitau //MU_5,51.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12504: kadācid āntarān sparśān parityajya manaḥkapiḥ / lolatvāt tasya saṃyāto viṣayaṃ viṣalubdhavat //MU_5,51.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12505: kadācid āntarārkābhaṃ tejo dṛṣṭvāntare manaḥ / viṣayonmukhatāṃ yātaṃ tasya tāmarasekṣaṇa //MU_5,51.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12506: antar āndhyatamastyāgaṃ kṛtvā viṣayalampaṭam / tasyoḍḍīya mano yāti kadācit trastapakṣivat //MU_5,51.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12507: bāhyān ābhyantarān sparśāṃs tyaktvā nidrāṃ ca tanmanaḥ / tamas tejaś ca no lebhe kadācic chāśvatīṃ sthitim //MU_5,51.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12508: iti paryākulāsv antas so 'luṭhad dhyānavṛttiṣu / darīṣv anvaham ugrāsu vātabhagna iva drumaḥ //MU_5,51.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12509: atiṣṭhal lūnasaṃrūḍhamanā mananasaṅkaṭe / yathā dolāyitavapus tṛṇaṃ tīrataraṅgake //MU_5,51.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12510: atha paryākulamatir vijahārāratir girau / pratyahaṃ divasādhīśo mahāmerāv ivaikakaḥ //MU_5,51.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12511: samagrabhūtaduṣprāpām ekadā prāpa kandarām / saṃśāntasarvasañcārāṃ munir mokṣadaśām iva //MU_5,51.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12512: aparyākulitāṃ vātair aprāptamṛgapakṣiṇīṃ / adṛṣṭāṃ devagandharvaiḥ paramākāśaśobhanām //MU_5,51.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12513: puṣpaprakarasañchannāṃ mṛduśādvalakomalām / jyotīrasāśmasamprotaiḥ kṛtāṃ marakatair iva //MU_5,51.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12514: siddhagītalasacchāyāṃ prakaṭāṃ ratnadīpakaiḥ / suguptāṃ vanadevīnām antaḥpurakuṭīm iva //MU_5,51.51//
GSP27moksop_u:12515: na locanāhitālokāṃ nātyuṣṇāṃ nātiśītalām / śāradasyoditārkasya hemagaurīṃ prabhām iva //MU_5,51.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12516: nālpālokaparimlānāṃ komalāśabdamārutām / mañjarījaṭilopāntāṃ bālāṃ mālāvatīm iva //MU_5,51.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12517: upaśamapadavīm ivāttarūpāṃ kamalajaviśramaṇāya yogyarūpām / kusumanikarakomalābhirāmāṃ sarasijakoṭarasundarīṃ samantāt //MU_5,51.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12520: vasiṣṭhaḥ: sa tāṃ viveśa dharmātmā gandhamādanakandarām / cirabhramaṇasamprāptām aliḥ padmakuṭīm iva //MU_5,52.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12521: samādhānonmukhatayā praviśan sa vyarājata / sargavyāpāraviratāv ātmapuryām ivābjajaḥ //MU_5,52.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12522: cakārāsanam ānīlaiḥ pattrair antassthagucchakam / mṛdu meghavidhir vṛndam āmbhodam iva tatra saḥ //MU_5,52.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12523: tasya prasārayām āsa pṛṣṭhe cāru mṛgājinam / nīlaratnataṭe meros tārāśāram ivāmbaram //MU_5,52.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12524: tatropāviśad āveśaṃ caitasaṃ tanutāṃ nayan / antaśśuddhavapuś śṛṅge vṛṣṭamūka ivāmbudaḥ //MU_5,52.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12525: buddhavat sudṛḍhābaddhapadmāsana udaṅmukhaḥ / pārṣṇibhyāṃ vṛṣaṇau dhṛtvā cakāra brāhmam añjalim //MU_5,52.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12526: vāsanābhyas samāhṛtya manomṛgapariplutam / nirvikalpasamādhyarthaṃ cakāremāṃ vicāraṇām //MU_5,52.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12527: ayi mūrkha manaḥ ko 'rthas tava saṃsāravṛttibhiḥ / dhīmanto na niṣevante paryante duḥkhadāṃ kriyām //MU_5,52.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12528: anudhāvati yo bhogāṃs tyaktvā śamarasāyanam / sa tyaktamandāravanaḥ prayāti viṣajaṅgalam //MU_5,52.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12529: yadi yāsi mahīrandhraṃ brahmalokam athāpi vā / tan na nirvṛtim āyāsi tvaṃ vinopaśamāmṛtam //MU_5,52.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12530: āśāśatāvapūrṇatvaṃ tvam idaṃ sarvaduḥkhadam / tyaja yāhi paraṃ śreyaḥ padam ekāntasundaram //MU_5,52.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12531: imā vicitrāḥ kalanā bhāvābhāvamayātmikāḥ / duḥkhāyaiva tavogrāya na sukhāya kadācana //MU_5,52.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12532: śabdādikābhir etābhiḥ kiṃ mūḍha hatavṛttibhiḥ / bhramasy avirataṃ vyartham eva maṇḍūkikā yathā //MU_5,52.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12533: manomaṇḍūkike vyartham iyantaṃ kālam andhayā / bhramantyā bhuvanaṃ viṣvak kiṃ samāsāditaṃ tvayā //MU_5,52.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12534: yasmāt kiñcit tad āpnoṣi yasmin bhajasi nirvṛtim / tasmiṃś citta śame mūrkha nānubadhnāsi kiṃ padam //MU_5,52.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12535: āgatya śrotratāṃ mūrkha vyarthotthānopabṛṃhitām / dhiyā śabdānusāriṇyā mṛgavan mā kṣayaṃ vraja //MU_5,52.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12536: tvaktām āgatya duḥkhāya sparśonmukhatayānayā / mūrkha mā baddhatām ehi gajīlubdhagajendravat //MU_5,52.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12537: rasanābhāvam āgatya gardhenāndha durandhasām / mā nāśam ehi baḍiśapiṇḍīlampaṭamatsyavat //MU_5,52.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12538: cākṣuṣīṃ vṛttim āśritya stryādirūpāmayonmukhīm / mā gaccha dagdhatāṃ mugdha kāntilubdhapataṅgavat //MU_5,52.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12539: ghrāṇamārgam upāśritya śarīrāmbhojakoṭare / gandhonmukhatayā bandhaṃ mā samāśraya bhṛṅgavat //MU_5,52.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12540: kuraṅgālipataṅgebhamīnās tv ekaikaśo hatāḥ / sarvair etair anarthais tu vyāptasyājña kutas sukham //MU_5,52.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12541: he citta vāsanājālaṃ bandhāya bhavatombhitam / svātmanas sahajaḥ phenas tāntavaḥ krimiṇā yathā //MU_5,52.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12542: śaradabhravad āgatya śuddhiṃ tyaktamalāmayām / yadi śāmyasi nirmūlaṃ tad anantā jayās tava //MU_5,52.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12543: kṣayodayadaśādātrīḥ paryantaparitāpinīḥ / jānann api jagaddṛṣṭīr na tyakṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi //MU_5,52.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12544: karomy atha kimarthaṃ vā tavaitad anuśāsanam / vicāraṇavataḥ puṃsaś cittam asti hi nānagha //MU_5,52.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12545: yāvad ajñānaghanatā tāvat praghanacittatā / yāvat prāvṛṭprabalatā tāvan nīhārabhūritā //MU_5,52.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12546: yāvad ajñānatanutā tāvac cittasya tānavam / prāvṛṭparikṣayo yāvat tāvan nīhārasaṅkṣayaḥ //MU_5,52.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12547: yāvat tānavam āyātaṃ śuddhaṃ cittaṃ vicāravat / tāvat tat kṣīṇam evāhaṃ manye śāradameghavat //MU_5,52.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12548: anuśāsanam etad yad asato naśyato 'tha vā / kriyate tan nabhovāripavanāhananais samam //MU_5,52.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12549: tasmāt saṅkṣīyamāṇaṃ tvāṃ tyajāmy aham asanmayam / maurkhyaṃ paramam evāhuḥ parityājyānuśāsanam //MU_5,52.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12550: nirvikalpo 'smi ciddīpo nirahaṅkāravāsanaḥ / tvayāhaṅkārabījena na sambaddho 'smy asanmaya //MU_5,52.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12551: ayaṃ so 'ham iti vyarthaṃ durdṛṣṭir avalambitā / tvayā mūḍha vināśāya śaṅkāviṣaviṣūcikā //MU_5,52.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12552: anantasyātmatattvasya tanvī matimatī sthitiḥ / na sambhavati bilvāntar vāsitā dantino yathā //MU_5,52.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12553: mahāskhadeva gambhīrā duḥkhadā vāsanāśritā / tvayaiṣā tad asatpātir nainām anusarāmy aham //MU_5,52.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12554: kaḥ kilāyaṃ mudhā moho bālasyevāvicāriṇaḥ / ayaṃ so 'ham iti bhrāntisandarbhaparikalpitaḥ //MU_5,52.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12555: pādāṅguṣṭhāc chiro yāvat kaṇaśaḥ pravicāritam / na labdho 'sāv ahaṃ nāma kas syād ahaṃ iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12556: bharitāśeṣadikkuñjaṃ paśyāmy ekaṃ jagattraye / saṃvedanam asaṃvedyaṃ sarvatra vitatātmakam //MU_5,52.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12557: dṛśyate tasya neyattā na nāma parikalpanā / naikatā nānyatā caiva na mahattā na cāṇutā //MU_5,52.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12558: vedanaṃ tvam asaṃvedyaṃ mayi ced duḥkhakāraṇam / vivekajena bhedena tad idaṃ hanyase mayā //MU_5,52.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12559: idaṃ māṃsaṃ idaṃ raktam imāny asthīni dehake / ime te śvāsamarutaḥ ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12560: māṃsam anyad asṛk cānyad asthīny anyāni citta he / bodho 'nyas spandanaṃ cānyat ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12561: idaṃ ghrāṇam iyaṃ jihvā tvag iyaṃ śravaṇe ime / idaṃ cakṣur ayaṃ spandaḥ ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12562: yathābhūtatayā nāham asmi na tvaṃ na vāsanā / ātmā śuddhaś cidābhāsaḥ kevalo 'yaṃ vijṛmbhate //MU_5,52.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12563: aham eveha sarvatra nāhaṃ kiñcid apīha vā / ity eva sanmayī dṛṣṭir netaro vidyate kramaḥ //MU_5,52.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12564: ciram ajñānadhūrtena pothito 'smy aty ahantayā / vṛkeṇa dṛptenāṭavyāṃ labdhveva paśupotakaḥ //MU_5,52.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12565: diṣṭyedānīṃ parijñāto mayaiṣo 'jñānataskaraḥ / punar na saṃśrayāmy enaṃ svarūpārthāpahāriṇam //MU_5,52.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12566: nirduḥkho duḥkhayogyasya nāham asya na caiṣa me / kaścid bhavati śailasya tatstha eva yathāmbudaḥ //MU_5,52.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12567: nāhaṃ bhūtvā tv ahaṃ hīdaṃ vacmi tiṣṭhāmi yāmi vā / ātmāvalokanenāham anahaṅkāratāṃ gataḥ //MU_5,52.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12568: nūnam evānya evaite matto 'jñāś cakṣurādayaḥ / yāntu tiṣṭhantu vā dehe mamaite tu na kecana //MU_5,52.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12569: kaṣṭaṃ ko 'yam ahaṃ nāma kathaṃ kenopakalpitaḥ / jagadbālakavetālas tālottālātulākṛtiḥ //MU_5,52.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12570: etāvantam ciraṃ kālaṃ vyartham āluṭhito 'vaṭe / aham ambutṛṇonmukte duradrau hariṇo yathā //MU_5,52.51//
GSP27moksop_u:12571: svārthaikālokane cakṣur yadi tūnmukhatāṃ gatam / tad ahaṃ nāma ko 'sau syād yo 'smi duḥkhena mohitaḥ //MU_5,52.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12572: sparśanāmni nije tattve yadi jātā tvag unmukhī / tat ko 'yaṃ syād ahaṃ nāma kupiśāca ivoditaḥ //MU_5,52.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12573: raseṣv abhiniṣaṇṇe 'smin sve krame rasanendriye / ahaṃ mṛṣṭabhug ity eṣa kutastyaḥ kutsito bhramaḥ //MU_5,52.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12574: śabdaśaktiṃ śrite śrotre varāke svārthapaṇḍite / tad ahaṅkāraduḥkhasya nirbījasya ka āgamaḥ //MU_5,52.55//
GSP27moksop_u:12575: ātmambharitvabharite ghrāṇe svaṃ gandham āgate / ahaṃ ghrāteti yo mantā taṃ cauraṃ naiva vedmy aham //MU_5,52.56//
GSP27moksop_u:12576: mṛgatṛṣṇākrameṇaiṣā bhāvanāpy arthabhāvanī / bhāvas tasyām asatyāyāṃ yasyāsāv api sambhramaḥ //MU_5,52.57//
GSP27moksop_u:12577: vāsanāhīnam apy etac cakṣurādīndriyaṃ svataḥ / pravartate bahis svārthe vāsanā nātra kāraṇam //MU_5,52.58//
GSP27moksop_u:12578: vāsanārahitaṃ karma kriyate nanu citta he / kevalaṃ nānubhūyante sukhaduḥkhadṛśo 'tra tāḥ //MU_5,52.59//
GSP27moksop_u:12579: tasmān mūrkhāṇīndriyāṇi tyaktvāntarvāsanāṃ nijām / kurudhvaṃ karma he sarvaṃ na duḥkhaṃ samavāpsyatha //MU_5,52.60//
GSP27moksop_u:12580: bhavadbhir eva duḥkhāya vāsanā vāsitā mudhā / bālaiḥ paṅkakrīḍanakavināśeneva khinnatā //MU_5,52.61//
GSP27moksop_u:12581: vāsanādyā dṛśas sarvā vyatiriktās tu nātmanaḥ / jalād iva taraṅgālyo jñasyaivājñasya nānagha //MU_5,52.62//
GSP27moksop_u:12582: tṛṣṇayaiva vinaṣṭās stha vyartham indriyacārakāḥ / kośakārāḥ kukrimayas tantuneva svayambhuvā //MU_5,52.63//
GSP27moksop_u:12583: tṛṣṇayaiveha luṭhatha jarāmaraṇasaṅkaṭe / bhramadṛṣṭyeva śikharipathikāś śvabhrabhūmiṣu //MU_5,52.64//
GSP27moksop_u:12584: vāsanaiveha bhavatāṃ hetur ekatra bandhane / rajjuś śūnyāśayaprotā muktānām ātatā yathā //MU_5,52.65//
GSP27moksop_u:12585: kalpanāmātrakalitā na satyaiṣā hi vastutaḥ / asaṅkalpanamātreṇa dātreṇeva vilūyate //MU_5,52.66//
GSP27moksop_u:12586: eṣā hi bhavatām eva vimohāya kṣayāya ca / vātalekheva dīpānāṃ sphuratām api tejasā //MU_5,52.67//
GSP27moksop_u:12587: he citta sarvendriyakośa tasmāt sarvendriyair aikyam upetya nūnam / ālokya cātmānam asatsvarūpaṃ nirvāṇam ekāmalabodham āssva //MU_5,52.68//
GSP27moksop_u:12588: viṣayaviṣaviṣūcikām anantāṃ nipuṇam ahaṃsthitivāsanām apāsya / abhimataparihārakāryayuktyā bhava vibhayo bhagavān bhiyām abhūmiḥ //MU_5,52.69//
GSP27moksop_u:12591: uddālakaḥ: apāraparyantavapuḥ paramāṇvaṇur eva vā / cid acetyā tadākrāntau na śaktā vāsanādayaḥ //MU_5,53.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12593: tatkṛtebhyo vikārebhyo bhītiṃ tāny eva bhūriśaḥ / bhūyo 'py anubhavantv antar ahaṃ hi cid alepikā //MU_5,53.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12594: cito na janmamaraṇe sarvagāyāś citaḥ kila / kiṃ nāma mriyate brūta māryate kena vāpi kim //MU_5,53.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12595: cito na jīvitenārthas sarvātmā saiva jīvitam / kiṃ prāpsyati kadātmaiṣa prāṅmṛto yadi jīvati //MU_5,53.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12596: jīvyate mriyate ceti kuvikalpakalāpinām / kalanā manasām eva nātmano vitatātmanaḥ //MU_5,53.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12597: yo hy ahambhāvatāṃ prāpto bhāvābhāvais sa gṛhyate / ātmano nāsty ahambhāvo bhāvābhāvāḥ kuto 'sya te //MU_5,53.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12598: ahambhāvo mudhā moho manaś ca mṛgatṛṣṇikā / jaḍaḥ padārthasambhāraḥ kasyāhambhāvabhāvanā //MU_5,53.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12599: raktamāṃsamayo deho mano naṣṭaṃ vicāraṇāt / jaḍāś cittādayas sarve kuto 'hambhāvabhāvanā //MU_5,53.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12600: ātmambharitayā nityam indriyāṇi sthitāny alam / padārthāś ca padārthatve kuto 'hambhāvabhāvanā //MU_5,53.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12601: guṇā guṇeṣu vartante prakṛtiḥ prakṛtau sthitā / sad eva sati viśrāntaṃ kuto 'hambhāvabhāvanā //MU_5,53.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12602: sarvagaṃ sarvadehasthaṃ sarvakālamayaṃ mahat / kevalaṃ paramābhānaṃ cidātmaiva hi saṃsthitam //MU_5,53.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12603: evaṃ kimākṛtiḥ ko vā kimādeyaś ca kiṅkṛtaḥ / kiṃrūpaḥ kimmayaḥ ko 'haṃ kiṃ gṛhṇāmi tyajāmi kim //MU_5,53.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12604: tenāhaṃ nāma nehāsti bhāvābhāvopapattimān / anahaṅkārarūpasya sambandhaḥ kena me katham //MU_5,53.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12605: asaty alam ahaṅkāre sambandhaḥ kena kasya kaḥ / sambandhābhāvasaṃsiddhau vilīnā dvitvakalpanā //MU_5,53.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12606: evaṃ brahmātmakam idaṃ yat kiñcij jagati sthitam / brahmaivāsti tad evāsmi pariśocāmi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,53.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12607: ekasminn eva vimale pade sarvagate sthite / ahaṅkārakalaṅkasya kathaṃ nāmodayaḥ kutaḥ //MU_5,53.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12608: nāsty eva hi padārthaśrīr ātmaivāstīha sarvagaḥ / padārthalakṣmyāṃ satyāṃ ca sambandho 'sti na kasyacit //MU_5,53.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12609: indriyair indriyeṣv aṅgair mano manasi valgati / cid aluptavapuḥ kena sambaddhaṃ kasya kiṃ katham //MU_5,53.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12610: upalāyaśśalākānāṃ sambandho na yathā mithaḥ / tathaikatrāpi dṛṣṭānāṃ dehendriyamanaścitām //MU_5,53.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12611: asadabhyutthite vyartham ahaṅkāramahābhrame / mamedam idam asyeti viparyastam idaṃ jagat //MU_5,53.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12612: atattvālokajāteyam ahaṅkāracamatkṛtiḥ / tāpena himalekheva tattvālokena līyate //MU_5,53.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12613: ātmano vyatirekeṇa na kiñcid api vidyate / śabdabrahmeti tat tattvam etat tad bhāvayāmy alam //MU_5,53.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12614: ahaṅkārabhramasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat / apunassmaraṇaṃ manye nūnaṃ vismaraṇaṃ varam //MU_5,53.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12615: samūlaṃ parivismṛtya cirāyāhaṅkṛtibhramam / tiṣṭhāmy ātmani satyātmā śaratkhe śaradīva kham //MU_5,53.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12616: dadāty anarthanicayaṃ vikāsayati duṣkṛtam / vistārayati santāpam ahambhāvo 'nusaṃhitaḥ //MU_5,53.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12617: sphuraty ahaṅkāraghane hṛdvyomni salilātmani / vikasaty abhitaḥ kāyakadambe doṣamañjarī //MU_5,53.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12618: maraṇam jīvitopāntaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇāntagam / bhāvo 'bhāvāvadhicchinnaḥ kaṣṭeyaṃ duḥkhavedanā //MU_5,53.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12619: idaṃ labdham idaṃ prāpsyāmīty antardāhakāriṇī / na śāmyaty arkaratnānāṃ grīṣme 'rcir iva durdhiyām //MU_5,53.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12620: nāstīdam idam astīti cintā dhāvaty ahaṅkṛtim / jaḍāśayā jaḍām abhramālā śailāvalīm iva //MU_5,53.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12621: ahaṅkāre parikṣīṇe śuṣkas saṃsārapādapaḥ / bhūyaḥ prayacchaty araso na pāṣāṇavad aṅkuram //MU_5,53.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12622: sutṛṣṇākṛṣṇabhoginyo dehadrumakṛtālayāḥ / kvāpi yānti vicārātmany āgate vinatāsute //MU_5,53.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12623: asadabhyutthite viśve tajjā vayam asanmayāḥ / asanmayaparispande tvam ahaṃ ceti kaḥ kramaḥ //MU_5,53.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12624: idaṃ jagad udety ādāv akāraṇam akāraṇāt / yad akāraṇam ucchūnaṃ tat sad ity ucyate katham //MU_5,53.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12625: aparyantaṃ purā kālaṃ mṛdi kumbha ivākṛtaḥ / deho 'bhavad idānīṃ tu tathaivānte bhaviṣyati //MU_5,53.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12626: madhye naravayomātraṃ kañcit kālaṃ tu cañcalam / ādyantasomyate tyaktvā vāri vīcitayā yathā //MU_5,53.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12627: asmin kṣaṇaparispande dehe viśaraṇonmukhe / taraṅge ca nibaddhāsthā ye hatās te kudṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_5,53.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12628: prāk purastāc ca sarvāṇi santi vastūni cābhitaḥ / madhyasphuṭatva eteṣāṃ kevāsthā hatarūpiṇi //MU_5,53.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12629: citta pūrvaṃ purastāc ca videhaṃ śāntam ity asi / sad asad vā khasaṃlīnaṃ madhye 'smin kiṃ tavogratā //MU_5,53.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12630: yathā svapnavikāreṣu yathā sambhramadṛṣṭiṣu / yathā vā madalīlāsu yathā nauyānasambhrame //MU_5,53.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12631: yathā dhātuvikāreṣu yathā vendriyaviplave / yathātisambhramānandadoṣāveśavaśeṣu ca //MU_5,53.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12632: dṛśyate kṣīyate caiva rūpaṃ sadasatoś calam / tathaivedam iyaṃ tv eṣā kāle nyūnātiriktatā //MU_5,53.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12633: sā ca tvayā kṛtā nityaṃ citta duḥkhasukhodayaiḥ / yathā viyogasaṃyogayāminyor anurāgiṇām //MU_5,53.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12634: tvam apy evāsadābhāsaṃ mithyā sad iva lakṣyase / mṛgatṛṣṇeva tenaitat tvatkṛtaṃ sat kathaṃ bhavet //MU_5,53.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12635: yad idaṃ kiñcid ābhogi tat sarvaṃ dṛśyamaṇḍalam / avastv iti vinirṇīya mano yāhy amanaḥpadam //MU_5,53.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12636: avastv idam iti sphāre rūḍhe manasi niścaye / hemanta iva padminyaḥ kṣīyante bhogavāsanāḥ //MU_5,53.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12637: citā dṛṣṭātmanā nūnaṃ santyaktamananaujasā / manasā vītarāgeṇa svayaṃ svasthena bhūyate //MU_5,53.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12638: paramātmānale kṣiptasaṃvittyavayavaṃ svayam / dagdhātmakam alaṃ cittaṃ śuddhatām eti śāśvatīm //MU_5,53.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12639: deham anyatayā dṛṣṭvā tyaktvā viṣayavāsanām / vināśam urarīkṛtya mano jayati vīravat //MU_5,53.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12640: manaś śatruś śarīrasya śarīraṃ manaso ripuḥ / ekabhāvena naśyete ādhārādheyakāryavat //MU_5,53.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12641: rāgadveṣavator nityam anyo'nyātiviruddhayoḥ / etayor mūlakāṣeṇa vināśaḥ paramaṃ sukham //MU_5,53.51//
GSP27moksop_u:12642: etayor ekasaṃsthāne ratir ity eva yā kathā / sā vyomny ayasstriyā bhuktā dhareti kathayā samā //MU_5,53.52//
