GSP27moksop_u:12643: akṛtrimavirodhasthau yatra saṅghaṭitāv ubhau / dhārā iva patanty eva tatrānarthaparamparāḥ //MU_5,53.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12644: mithoviruddhasaṃsarge ratim ety adhamo hi yaḥ / tyaktavyas sa patadvārāv agnirāśāv apelave //MU_5,53.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12645: saṅkalpena manas spṛṣṭvā śarīraṃ bālayakṣavat / pātrāyeva dhanāny asmai svaduḥkhāni prayacchati //MU_5,53.55//
GSP27moksop_u:12646: tair duḥkhais tāpito deho mano hantum athecchati / putro 'pi hanti pitaram ātatāyipadaṃ gatam //MU_5,53.56//
GSP27moksop_u:12647: nāsti śatruḥ prakṛtyaiva na ca mitraṃ kadācana / sukhadaṃ mitram ity uktaṃ duḥkhadāś śatravas smṛtāḥ //MU_5,53.57//
GSP27moksop_u:12648: deho duḥkhāny anubhavan svamano hantum icchati / dehaṃ manas svaduḥkhānāṃ satkośaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt //MU_5,53.58//
GSP27moksop_u:12649: evaṃ mitho duḥkhadayoś śliṣṭayoḥ kas sukhāgamaḥ / etayor dehamanasor jātyaivānyo'nyaviddhayoḥ //MU_5,53.59//
GSP27moksop_u:12650: manasy eva parikṣīṇe na deho duḥkhabhājanam / tatkṣayotkatayā nityaṃ deho 'pi paridhāvati //MU_5,53.60//
GSP27moksop_u:12651: naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam anarthāya śarīraṃ padam āpadām / alabdhātmavivekena manasāśu vinindyate //MU_5,53.61//
GSP27moksop_u:12652: ete manaśśarīre hi mithaḥ pīvaratāṃ gate / jaḍarūpe hi varṣāsu payodasarasī yathā //MU_5,53.62//
GSP27moksop_u:12653: mitho duḥkhāya sampanne ekarūpe dvidhā sthite / vyavahārapare sārdhaṃ loke vāyvanalāv iva //MU_5,53.63//
GSP27moksop_u:12654: citte kṣayiṇi saṅkṣīṇo deha ā mūlato bhavet / vardhamāne tarur iva śataśākhaḥ pravardhate //MU_5,53.64//
GSP27moksop_u:12655: kṣīyate manasi kṣīṇe dehaḥ prakṣīṇavāsanaḥ / mano na kṣīyate kṣīṇe dehe tat kṣapayen manaḥ //MU_5,53.65//
GSP27moksop_u:12656: saṅkalpapādapaṃ tṛṣṇālataṃ chittvā manovanam / vitatām bhuvam āsādya viharāmi yathāsukham //MU_5,53.66//
GSP27moksop_u:12657: prakṣīyamāṇam evedaṃ mama manye manas sthitam / praśāmyadvāsanājālaṃ prāvṛḍanta ivāmbudaḥ //MU_5,53.67//
GSP27moksop_u:12658: dhātūnāṃ sanniveśo 'yaṃ dehanāmā vapur mama / prakṣīyamāṇe manasi galann evāvatiṣṭhatu //MU_5,53.68//
GSP27moksop_u:12659: yadarthaṃ kila bhogaśrīr vāñchyate tat kalevaram / na me nāpi ca tasyāhaṃ ko 'rthas sukhalavena me //MU_5,53.69//
GSP27moksop_u:12660: nāhaṃ deha iti tv asmin yuktim ākarṇaya krame / sarvāṅgeṣv api satsv eva śavaḥ kasmān na valgati //MU_5,53.70//
GSP27moksop_u:12661: tasmād dehād atīto 'haṃ nityo 'nastamitadyutiḥ / yas saṅgaṃ bhāsvatā prāpya vedmi vyomani bhāskaram //MU_5,53.71//
GSP27moksop_u:12662: jño 'haṃ me na sukhenārtho nānarthena ca duḥkhitā / śarīram astu vā māstu sthito 'smi vigatajvaraḥ //MU_5,53.72//
GSP27moksop_u:12663: yatrātmā tatra na mano nendriyāṇi na vāsanāḥ / pāmarāḥ paritiṣṭhanti nikaṭe na mahībhṛtaḥ //MU_5,53.73//
GSP27moksop_u:12664: padaṃ tad anuyāto 'smi kevalo 'smi jayāmy aham / nisspṛho 'smi niraṃśo 'smi nirīho 'smi nirīpsitaḥ //MU_5,53.74//
GSP27moksop_u:12665: nedānīṃ mama sambandho manodehendriyādibhiḥ / pṛthakkṛtasya tailasya tilair vidalitair yathā //MU_5,53.75//
GSP27moksop_u:12666: svasmāt padavarād asmāl līlayā calitasya me / adha ākramataḥ kiñcit parivāro hy ayaṃ śubhaḥ //MU_5,53.76//
GSP27moksop_u:12667: svasthatorjitatā sattā hṛdyatā satyatā jñatā / ānanditopaśamitā matā ca muditoditā //MU_5,53.77//
GSP27moksop_u:12668: pūrṇatodāratā satyā kāntimattaikatānatā / sarvaikatā nirbhayatā kṣīṇadvitvavikalpatā //MU_5,53.78//
GSP27moksop_u:12669: etā nityoditās svasthās sundaryas subhagodayāḥ / mamaikātmarateḥ kāntā nityaṃ hṛdayavallabhāḥ //MU_5,53.79//
GSP27moksop_u:12670: sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvasmin sambhavaty ataḥ / sarvaṃ prati mama kṣīṇe vāñchāvāñche sukhāsukham //MU_5,53.80//
GSP27moksop_u:12671: vigatamohatayā vimanastayā gatavikalpanacittatayā sphuṭam / uparamāmy aham ātmani śītale ghanalavaś śaradīva nabhastale //MU_5,53.81//
GSP27moksop_u:12674: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti nirṇīya tatayā dhiyā dhavalayā muniḥ / baddhapadmāsanas tasthāv ardhonmīlitalocanaḥ //MU_5,54.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12675: oṅkāram akarot tārasvaram ūrdhvagatadhvanim / samyagāhatalāṅgūlaṃ ghaṇṭākumbham ivāravam //MU_5,54.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12676: omuccārayatas tasya saṃvittattve tadunmukhe / yāvadoṅkāram ūrdhvasthe vitate vimalātmani //MU_5,54.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12678: recakākhyo 'khilaṃ kāyaṃ prāṇaniṣkramaṇakramaḥ / riktīcakāra pītāmbur agastya iva sāgaram //MU_5,54.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12679: atiṣṭhat prāṇapavanaś cidrasāpūrite 'mbare / tyaktadehaḥ parityaktanīḍaḥ khaga ivāmbare //MU_5,54.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12680: hṛdayāgnir jvalañ jvālī dadāha malinaṃ vapuḥ / utpātapavanocchūno dāvaś śuṣkam iva drumam //MU_5,54.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12681: yāvadiccham avasthaiṣā praṇavaprathame krame / babhūva na haṭhād eva haṭhayogo hi duḥkhadaḥ //MU_5,54.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12682: athetarāṃśāvasare praṇavasya samasthitau / nisspandakumbhako nāma prāṇānām abhavat kramaḥ //MU_5,54.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12683: na bahir nāntare nādho nordhve nāśāsu tatra te / saṅkṣobham agaman prāṇā ardhasaṃstambhitā iva //MU_5,54.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12684: dagdhadehapuro vahniś śaśāmāśanivat kṣaṇāt / adṛśyata sitaṃ bhasma śārīraṃ himapāṇḍuram //MU_5,54.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12685: yatra karpūraśayyāyāṃ suptānīva sukhocitam / śarīrāsthīni lakṣyante nisspandāni sitāni ca //MU_5,54.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12686: tad bhasma pavanādhūtaṃ sāsthi vāyur ayojayat / svadehe bhṛśam ucchūne trinetravratavān iva //MU_5,54.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12687: tac caṇḍapavanoddhūtam āvṛtya gaganaṃ kṣaṇāt / śaradīvābhramihikā kvāpi bhasmāsthimad yayau //MU_5,54.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12688: yāvadiccham avasthaiṣā praṇavasyāpare krame / babhūva na haṭhād eva haṭhayogo hi duḥkhadaḥ //MU_5,54.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12689: tatas tṛtīyāvasare praṇavasyopaśāntide / pūraṇāt pūrako nāma prāṇānām abhavat kramaḥ //MU_5,54.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12690: asminn avasare prāṇāś cetanāmṛtamadhyagāḥ / vyomni śītalatām īyur himasaṃsparśasundarīm //MU_5,54.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12691: kramād gaganamadhyasthāś candramaṇḍalatāṃ yayuḥ / dhūmā gaganakośasthāś śītalāmbudatām iva //MU_5,54.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12692: kalākalāpasampūrṇe te tasmiṃś candramaṇḍale / puṇyarāśāv ivāpūrṇe rasāyanamahārṇave //MU_5,54.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12693: rasāyanamahādhārās sampannāḥ prāṇavāyavaḥ / maṇiyaṣṭisamākārā jaleṣv indor ivāṃśavaḥ //MU_5,54.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12694: sā papātāmbarād dhārā śeṣe śārīrabhasmani / rāsāyanī haraśiraḥpatiteva surāpagā //MU_5,54.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12695: udabhūd indubimbābhaṃ caturbāhuvapus tayā / prasphuranmandarād abdheḥ pārijāta iva drumaḥ //MU_5,54.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12696: uddālakaśarīraṃ tan nārāyaṇatayoditam / praphultacūtavat kāntam ābabhau dīptisundaram //MU_5,54.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12697: rasāyanamayāḥ prāṇās taccharīram apūrayan / saridoghā iva saro vṛkṣaṃ madhurasā iva //MU_5,54.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12698: antaḥ kuṇḍalinīṃ prāṇāḥ pūrayām āsur ādṛtāḥ / vakrānuvakraprasṛtās sarāṃsīva saritskhadām //MU_5,54.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12699: prakṛtisthaṃ babhūvāsya tac charīraṃ dvijanmanaḥ / prāvṛṭsaṃrambhavigame dhautaṃ talam ivāvaneḥ //MU_5,54.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12700: atha padmāsanagataḥ kṛtvā dehe sthitiṃ dṛḍhām / ālāna iva mātaṅgaṃ nibadhyendriyapañcakam //MU_5,54.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12701: nirvikalpasamādhyarthaṃ vyavasāyam upādade / svabhāvaṃ svacchatāṃ netuṃ śaratkāla ivāmalaḥ //MU_5,54.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12702: svasvāntavātahariṇam āśādiggaṇagāminam / cintayā hṛdayaṃ ninye dūrād rajjveva kīlakam //MU_5,54.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12703: dhāvamānam adho mattaṃ cittam ābilam ākulam / balāt saṃrodhayām āsa setur jalam iva drutam //MU_5,54.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12704: nyamīmilad dṛśāv ardhaṃ paripakṣmalapakṣmake / nisspandatārāmadhupe sandhyākāla ivāmbuje //MU_5,54.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12705: somyatām anayan maunī prāṇāpānajavaṃ mukhe / śvasanaṃ śreyase deśe praśastas samayo yathā //MU_5,54.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12706: tilebhya iva tailāni pṛthak cakre prayatnataḥ / indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ kūrmo 'ṅgānīva gopayan //MU_5,54.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12707: bāhyān sparśān aśeṣeṇa jahau dūre śanair arīn / sahasā kuṇḍakacchanno maṇir dūraṃ tviṣo yathā //MU_5,54.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12708: vilīnān āntarāṃś cakre sparśān ujjhitadarśanān / rasān viṭapakośasthān mārgaśīrṣa iva drumaḥ //MU_5,54.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12709: rurodha gudasaṅkocān navadvārānilān atha / mukhasaṃsthaganāt kumbharandhrakośān ivetarān //MU_5,54.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12710: ātmaratnaprakāśāḍhyāṃ spaṣṭāṃ kusumalāñchitām / dadhāra kandharāṃ dhīrāṃ meruś śṛṅgaśikhām iva //MU_5,54.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12711: dadhāra hṛdayākāśe manas saṃyamam āgatam / vindhyakhāta ivonmattaṃ gajaṃ yuktivaśīkṛtam //MU_5,54.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12712: śarannabhovad āsādya nirmalām atisomyatām / jahāra paripūrṇābdher meroś cātaralāṃ śriyam //MU_5,54.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12713: dudhāvātha vikalpaughān pratibhāsam upeyuṣaḥ / puraḥparisphuradrūpān maṣakān iva mārutaḥ //MU_5,54.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12714: āgacchato yathākāmaṃ pratibhāsān punaḥ punaḥ / acchinan manasā śūraḥ khaḍgeneva raṇe śarān //MU_5,54.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12715: vikalpaughe parālūne so 'paśyad dhṛdayāmbare / tamaś channavivekārkaṃ lolakajjalamecakam //MU_5,54.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12716: tad apy utsārayām āsa samyak svāntavivasvatā / samyagjñānoditenāśu pavaneneva kajjalam //MU_5,54.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12717: tamasy uparate kāntaṃ tejaḥpuñjaṃ dadarśa saḥ / śārvare timire śānte prātas sāndhyam ivāmbudam //MU_5,54.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12718: taṃ lulāva sthalābjānāṃ vanaṃ bāla iva dvipaḥ / apibac cāpy asṛkpūraṃ vetāla iva vegataḥ //MU_5,54.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12719: tejasy uparate tasya ghūrṇamānaṃ mano muneḥ / niśābjavad agān nidrāṃ lolaṃ kṣīvavad eva vā //MU_5,54.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12720: meghamālāṃ iva marud bālo nīlābjinīm iva / yāminīm iva tīkṣṇāṃśus tām apy āśu lulāva saḥ //MU_5,54.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12721: nidrāvyupaśame tasya bhāvayām āsa tan manaḥ / vyoma śyāmaladṛg jantur nabhasīva śikhaṇḍakam //MU_5,54.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12722: payoda iva tāpiñchaṃ nīhāram iva mārutaḥ / tamo dīpa ivācchātmā tad apy āśu mamārja saḥ //MU_5,54.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12723: vyomasaṃvidi bhagnāyāṃ mūḍhaṃ tasyābhavan manaḥ / nidrāyāṃ pravilīnāyāṃ maireyamadavān iva //MU_5,54.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12724: moham apy eṣa manasas taṃ mamārja mahāśayaḥ / yāminījanitaṃ jāḍyaṃ bhuvanād iva bhāskaraḥ //MU_5,54.51//
GSP27moksop_u:12725: tatas tejastamonidrāmohādiparivarjitam / kām apy avasthām āsādya viśaśrāma manaḥ kṣaṇam //MU_5,54.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12726: viśramyāśu papātāṅgasaṃvidaṃ citsvarūpiṇīm / seturuddhaṃ sarovāri pratīpaṃ svam ivāspadam //MU_5,54.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12727: cirānusandhānavaśāt svadanāc ca svasaṃvidaḥ / tataś cinmayatām āgād dhema nūpuratām iva //MU_5,54.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12728: cittatvam atha santyajya cittaṃ cittvaṃ tataṃ gataṃ / anyad eva babhūvāśu paṅkaḥ kumbhasthitāv iva //MU_5,54.55//
GSP27moksop_u:12729: cetyaṃ santyajya cic chuddhā citsāmānyam athāyayau / tyaktavīcyādibhede 'bdhau vārsāmānyam ivaikadhīḥ //MU_5,54.56//
GSP27moksop_u:12730: tyaktabhūtaughamananaṃ tato viśvambharaṃ bṛhat / cidākāśaṃ tataṃ śuddhaṃ so 'bhavad bodhim āgataḥ //MU_5,54.57//
GSP27moksop_u:12731: tatra prāpa mahānandaṃ dṛśyadarśanavarjitam / anantam uttamāsvādaṃ rasāyanam ivārṇavam //MU_5,54.58//
GSP27moksop_u:12732: śarīrāt samatīto 'sau kām apy avanim āgataḥ / sattāsāmānyarūpātmā babhūvānandasāgaraḥ //MU_5,54.59//
GSP27moksop_u:12733: dvijacetanahaṃso 'sāv ānandasarasi sthire / atiṣṭhac charadacche khe kalāpūrṇa ivoḍupaḥ //MU_5,54.60//
GSP27moksop_u:12735: athaitasmin mahāloke tiṣṭhann uddālakaś ciram / apaśyad vyomagān siddhān amarān iva bhūriśaḥ //MU_5,54.62//
GSP27moksop_u:12736: āgatāni vicitrāṇi siddhajālāni cābhitaḥ / śakrārkapadadātṝṇi nīrandhrāṇy apsarogaṇaiḥ //MU_5,54.63//
GSP27moksop_u:12737: tāni nādarayāṃ cakre siddhavṛndāni sa dvijaḥ / gambhīramatir akṣubdho vilāsān iva śaiśavān //MU_5,54.64//
GSP27moksop_u:12738: siddhasārtham anādṛtya tasmin svānandamandire / atiṣṭhad atha ṣaṇmāsān diktaṭe 'rka ivottare //MU_5,54.65//
GSP27moksop_u:12739: jīvanmuktapadaṃ tat tad yat sa samprāptavān dvijaḥ / tatra siddhās surās sādhyās sthitā brahmaharādayaḥ //MU_5,54.66//
GSP27moksop_u:12740: ānandapariṇāmitvād anānandapadaṃ gatāḥ / nānande na nirānande tatas tatsaṃvid ābabhau //MU_5,54.67//
GSP27moksop_u:12741: kṣaṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vā tatra labdhvā sthitiṃ manaḥ / ratim eti na bhogaughe dṛṣṭasvarga ivāvanau //MU_5,54.68//
GSP27moksop_u:12742: tat padaṃ sā gatiś śāntā tac chreyaś śāśvataṃ śivam / tatra viśrāntim āptasya na bhūyo jāyate śramaḥ //MU_5,54.69//
GSP27moksop_u:12743: tat padaṃ sādhavaḥ prāpya dṛśyadṛṣṭim imāṃ punaḥ / na yānti khadirodyānaṃ labdhacaitrarathā iva //MU_5,54.70//
GSP27moksop_u:12744: tāṃ mahānandapadavīṃ cittāny āsādya dehinām / dṛśyaṃ na bahu manyante rājāno dīnatām iva //MU_5,54.71//
GSP27moksop_u:12745: cetas tatpadaviśrāntaṃ buddhaṃ dṛśyadaśāṃ prati / kadarthād bodham āyāti na yāty evātha vānagha //MU_5,54.72//
GSP27moksop_u:12746: uddālako 'tha ṣaṇmāsān dūrotsāritasiddhabhūḥ / uṣitvonmiṣato 'mbhodakośād arko madhāv iva //MU_5,54.73//
GSP27moksop_u:12747: dadarśa samprabuddhātmā punaḥ paramatejasaḥ / praṇāmalālasān siddhāṃś candrabimbavapurdharān //MU_5,54.74//
GSP27moksop_u:12749: asmadādīn munīn darbhapavitrāṅkakarāmbujān / vidyādharībhir valitān vidyādharapatīn api //MU_5,54.76//
GSP27moksop_u:12750: te tam ūcur mahātmānam uddālakamuniṃ tadā / prasādena praṇāmān no bhagavann avalokaya //MU_5,54.77//
GSP27moksop_u:12751: āruhyemaṃ vimānaṃ tvam ehi traiviṣṭapaṃ puraṃ / svarga eva hi sīmānto jagatsambhogasampadām //MU_5,54.78//
GSP27moksop_u:12752: ākalpam ucitān bhuṅkṣva bhogān abhimatān vibho / svargādiphalabhogārtham evāśeṣatapaḥkriyāḥ //MU_5,54.79//
GSP27moksop_u:12753: hāracāmaradhāriṇyo vidyādharavarāṅganāḥ / paśyemās tvām upāsīnāḥ kariṇyaḥ kariṇaṃ yathā //MU_5,54.80//
GSP27moksop_u:12754: kāmo dharmārthayos sāraḥ kāmasārāś śucismitāḥ / vasanta iva mañjaryas svarga eva bhavanti tāḥ //MU_5,54.81//
GSP27moksop_u:12755: evaṃ kathayatas siddhān atithīn ity asau muniḥ / paripūjya yathānyāyam atiṣṭhad gatasambhramam //MU_5,54.82//
GSP27moksop_u:12756: nābhyanandan na tatyāja tāṃ vibhūtiṃ sa dhīradhīḥ / bhos siddhā vrajatety uktvā svavyāpāraparo 'bhavat //MU_5,54.83//
GSP27moksop_u:12757: atha svakarmanirataṃ bhogeṣv aratim āgatam / tam upāsya yayus siddhā dinaiḥ katipayais svayam //MU_5,54.84//
GSP27moksop_u:12758: jīvanmuktas sa ca munir vijahāra yathāsukham / yāvadicchaṃ vanānteṣu munīnām āśrameṣu ca //MU_5,54.85//
GSP27moksop_u:12760: tataḥ prabhṛti samprāptapada uddālako dvijaḥ / guhāsu girikukṣīṇāṃ nyavasad dhyānalīlayā //MU_5,54.87//
GSP27moksop_u:12761: kadācid ahnā māsena kadācid vatsareṇa ca / kadācid vatsaraughena dhyānāsakto vyabudhyata //MU_5,54.88//
GSP27moksop_u:12762: uddālakas tad ārabhya vyavahāraparo 'pi san / susamāhita evāsīc cittattvaikatvam āgataḥ //MU_5,54.89//
GSP27moksop_u:12763: cittattvaikaghanābhyāsān mahācittvam upetya saḥ / dṛśye 'smiṃś citraravivan nāstam āyān na codayam //MU_5,54.90//
GSP27moksop_u:12764: samaparapadalābhaprāptisaṃśāntacetā dalitajananapāśaḥ kṣīṇasandehadolaḥ / śaradi kham iva kāntaṃ vyātataṃ corjitaṃ ca sphuṭam amalam alekhaṃ tat vapus svaṃ babhāra //MU_5,54.91//
GSP27moksop_u:12767: rāmaḥ: ātmajñānadinaikārka matsaṃśayatṛṇānala / ajñānadāhaśītāṃśo sattāsāmānyam īśa kim //MU_5,55.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12768: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yadā saṅkṣīyate cittam abhāvātyantabhāvanāt / citsāmānyasvarūpasya sattāsāmānyatā tadā //MU_5,55.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12769: nūnaṃ cetyāṃśarahitā cid yadātmani līyate / asadrūpavad atyacchaṃ sattāsāmānyatā tadā //MU_5,55.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12770: yadā sarvāṇi dṛśyāni saṃśāntānyo'nyavedanam / svarūpeṇa svarūpābhaṃ bhāvyante samatā tadā //MU_5,55.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12771: kūrmāṅgānīva dṛśyāni līyante svātmanātmani / abhāvitāny eva yadā sattāsāmānyatā tadā //MU_5,55.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12772: dṛṣṭir eṣā hi paramā sadehādehayos sadā / muktayos sambhavaty eva turyātītapadopamā //MU_5,55.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12773: vyutthitasya bhavaty eṣā samādhisthasya cānagha / jñasya kevalam ajñasya na bhavaty eva bodhajā //MU_5,55.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12774: asyāṃ dṛśi sthitās sarve jīvanmuktā mahāśayāḥ / siddhā rasā iva bhuvi vyomavīthyām ivānilāḥ //MU_5,55.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12775: asmatprabhṛtayas sarve nāradādyāś ca rāghava / brahmaviṣṇvīśvarādyāś ca dṛṣṭāv asyāṃ vyavasthitāḥ //MU_5,55.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12776: etām ālambya padavīṃ samastabhayanāśinīm / uddālako 'sāv avasad yāvadicchaṃ jagadgṛhe //MU_5,55.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12777: atha kālena mahatā buddhis tasya babhūva ha / videhamuktas tiṣṭhāmi dehaṃ tyaktveti niścalā //MU_5,55.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12778: evaṃ niścayavān adrer guhāyāṃ pallavāsane / baddhapadmāsanas tasthāv āmīlitavilocanaḥ //MU_5,55.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12779: saṃyamya gudasaṃrodhād dvārāṇi nava cetasaḥ / mātrāsparśān acinvāno bhāvitasvāṅgacidghanaḥ //MU_5,55.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12781: na bahir nāntare nādho nordhve nārthe na śūnyake / saṃyojitamanodṛṣṭir dantair dantān asaṃspṛśan //MU_5,55.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12783: aṅgacitsaṃvidabhyāsāc citsāmānyam upādade / tadabhyāsād avāpāntar ānandasyandam uttamam //MU_5,55.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12784: tadāsvādanato līnacitsāmānyadaśākramaḥ / viśvambharam anantātma sattāsāmānyam āyayau //MU_5,55.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12785: tatsthas samasamābhogaḥ parāṃ viśrāntim āgataḥ / anānandasamānandamugdhamugdhamukhadyutiḥ //MU_5,55.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12786: saṃśāntānandapulakaḥ padaṃ prāpyāpy alaṃ gataḥ / cirakālaparikṣīṇamananādibhavabhramaḥ //MU_5,55.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12787: babhūva sa mahāsattvo lipikarmārpitopamaḥ / samaḥ kalāvapūrṇena śaradacchāmbarendunā //MU_5,55.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12788: upaśaśāma śanair divasair asau katipayais svapade vimalātmani / tarurasaś śaradanta ivāmale ravikaraujasi janmadaśātigaḥ //MU_5,55.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12789: gatasakalavikalpo nirvikāro 'bhirāmas sakalamalavilāsopādhinirmuktamūrtiḥ / vigalitasukham ādyaṃ tat sukhaṃ prāpa yasmiṃs tṛṇam iva jalarāśāv uhyate śakralakṣmīḥ //MU_5,55.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12790_0: aparimitanabho'ntarvyāpidigvyāpi pūrṇaṃ bhuvanabharaṇaśīlaṃ bhūribhāgyopasevyam / kathanaguṇam atītaṃ satyam ānandam ādyaṃ
GSP27moksop_u:12791: gatavati padam ādyaṃ cetasi svasvabhāvaṃ dvijatanur atha māsais sopaviṣṭā ca ṣaḍbhiḥ / ravikaraparitaptā vātajhāṅkāraramyā tanutarabahutantrī śailavīṇā babhūva //MU_5,55.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12792: atha bahutarakālenainam adrer bhuvaṃ tām upayayur agakanyāsaṃyutā mātaraḥ khāt / abhimataphalasiddhyai saṃyutā eva sarvā analam iva śikhānāṃ paṅktayaḥ piṅgakeśyaḥ //MU_5,55.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12793: dinakarakaraśuṣkaṃ viprakaṅkālakaṃ taj jhagiti ca karakoṭau baddhakhaṭvāṅgasaṅgā / sakalavibudhavandyā khiṅkhinī devadevī niśi navaratanṛttā kācakāntiṃ cakāra //MU_5,55.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12794_0: ity uddālakadehako 'dya vilasanmāyūrabarhavrajavyālolābdalave nave vivalite mandāramālāgaṇaiḥ / śete khiṅkhinikāmahābhagavatīlīlālalāme
GSP27moksop_u:12795_0: eṣoddālakacittavṛttikalanāvallī vivekasphuratsvānandapravikāsabhāsikusumā hṛtkānane vistṛte / rūḍhā yasya kadācid eva vilasadramyeva
GSP27moksop_u:12795_1: sacchāyayā nāsāv eti viyogam eti ca phalenoccaistarāṃ saṅgamam //MU_5,55.29 //
GSP27moksop_u:12798: vasiṣṭhaḥ: krameṇānena ripuhan vicāryātmānam ātmanā / viśrāntim eti vitate pade padmadalekṣaṇa //MU_5,56.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12799: śāstrārthagurucetobhis tāvat tāvad vicāryate / sarvadṛśyakṣayābhyāsād yāvad āsādyate param //MU_5,56.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12801: samprabodhavatī tīkṣṇā kalaṅkarahitā matiḥ / sarvasāmagryahīnāpi prāpyaṃ prāpnoti śāśvatam //MU_5,56.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12802: rāmaḥ: bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa kaścij jñātasamādhikaḥ / prabuddha iti viśrānto vyavahāraparo 'pi san //MU_5,56.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12803: kaścid ekāntam āśritya samādhiniyatas sthitaḥ / tayos tu kataraś śreyān iti me bhagavan vada //MU_5,56.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12804: vasiṣṭhaḥ: imaṃ guṇasamāhāram anātmatvena paśyataḥ / antaśśītalatā yāsau samādhir iti kathyate //MU_5,56.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12805: dṛśyair mama na sambandha iti niścitya śītalaḥ / kaścit saṃvyavahārasthaḥ kaścid dhyānavyavasthitaḥ //MU_5,56.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12806: dvāv etau rāma susamāv antaś cet pariśītalau / antaśśītalatā yā syāt tad dhanaṃ tat tapaḥphalam //MU_5,56.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12807: samādhisthānakasthasya cetaś ced vṛtticañcalam / tat tasya tat samādhānaṃ samam unmattatāṇḍavaiḥ //MU_5,56.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12808: unmattatāṇḍavasthasya cetaś cet kṣīṇavāsanam / tad asyonmattanṛttaṃ tat samaṃ buddhasamādhinā //MU_5,56.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12809: vyavahārī prabuddho yaḥ prabuddho yo vane sthitaḥ / dvāv etau puruṣau nūnam asandehapadaṃ gatau //MU_5,56.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12810: akartṛ kurvad apy etac cetaḥ pratanuvāsanam / dūre gatamanā jantuḥ kathāsaṃśravaṇe yathā //MU_5,56.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12811: akurvad api kartr eva cetaḥ praghanavāsanam / nisspandāṅgam api svapne śvabhrapātasthitāv iva //MU_5,56.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12812: cetaso yad akartṛtvaṃ tat samādhānam uttamam / taṃ viddhi kevalībhāvaṃ sā śubhā nirvṛtiḥ parā //MU_5,56.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12813: cetaścalācalatvaṃ hi paramaṃ kāraṇaṃ smṛteḥ / dhyānādhyānadṛśos tena tad evānaṅkuraṃ kuru //MU_5,56.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12814: avāsanaṃ sthiraṃ proktaṃ mano dhyānaṃ tad eva ca / sa eva kevalībhāvaś śāntaṃ tatraiva tat sadā //MU_5,56.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12815: tanuvāsanam apy uccaiḥpadāyodyatam ucyate / avāsanaṃ mano 'kartṛpadaṃ tasmād avāpyate //MU_5,56.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12816: ghanavāsanam etat tu cetaḥ kartṛtvabhāvanam / sarvaduḥkhapradaṃ tasmād vāsanās tanutām nayet //MU_5,56.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12817: praśāntajagadāstho 'ntar vītaśokabhayaiṣaṇaḥ / svastho bhavati yenātmā sa samādhir iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,56.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12818: cetasā samparityajya sarvabhāvān sabhāvanān / yathā tiṣṭhasi tiṣṭha tvaṃ tathā śaile gṛhe 'tha vā //MU_5,56.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12819: gṛham eva gṛhasthānāṃ susamāhitacetasām / śāntāhaṅkṛtidoṣāṇāṃ vijanā vanabhūmayaḥ //MU_5,56.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12820: araṇyasadane tulye samāhitamanodṛśām / mahatām iha bhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ mahatām iva //MU_5,56.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12821: śāmyaccittamahābhrasya janajālojjvalāny api / nagarāṇy eva śūnyāni vanāny avanipātmaja //MU_5,56.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12822: vṛttimaccittamattasya nirjanāni vanāny api / nagarāṇi mahālokapūrṇāni paravīrahan //MU_5,56.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12823: vyutthitaṃ cittam abhyeti bhrame śānte suṣuptatām / nirvāṇam eti nirvāṇaṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,56.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12824: sarvabhāvapadātītaṃ sarvabhāvātmakaṃ ca vā / yaḥ paśyati sadātmānaṃ sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12825: sahātmanā sadaivedaṃ jagat paśyati no manaḥ / yathā svapne tathaivāsmiñ jāgraty api janeśvara //MU_5,56.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12826: yathā vipinagā lokā viharanto 'py asatsamāḥ / asambandhāt tathā jñasya grāmo 'pi vipinopamaḥ //MU_5,56.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12827: antarmukhamanā nityaṃ supto buddho vrajan paṭhan / puraṃ janapadaṃ grāmam araṇyam iva paśyati //MU_5,56.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12828: sarvam ākāśatām eti nityam antarmukhasthiteḥ / sarvathānupayogitvād bhūtākulam idaṃ jagat //MU_5,56.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12829: antaśśītalatāyāṃ tu labdhāyāṃ śītalaṃ jagat / vijvarāṇām iva nṛṇāṃ bhavaty ā jīvitasthiteḥ //MU_5,56.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12830: antastṛṣṇopataptānāṃ dāvadāhamayaṃ jagat / bhavaty akhilajantūnāṃ yad antas tad bahis sthitam //MU_5,56.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12831: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ / antaḥkaraṇatattvasya bhāgā bahir avasthitāḥ //MU_5,56.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12832: vaṭadhānāvaṭa iva antar asya yad ātmanaḥ / tad bahir bhāsate bhāsvad vikasatpuṣpagandhavat //MU_5,56.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12833: na bahiṣṭvaṃ na cāntastvaṃ kvacit kiñcana vidyate / yad yathā kacitaṃ cittvāt tat tathā tathyam utthitam //MU_5,56.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12834: ātmatattvodaraṃ bhāti bahiṣṭvena jagattayā / karpūram iva gandhena saṅkoci pravikāsi ca //MU_5,56.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12835: ātmedaṃ sphurati sphāraṃ jagattvenāpy ahantayā / bāhyatvenāntaratvena sa ca nāsan na sadvibhuḥ //MU_5,56.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12836: bahiṣṭvenāśritaṃ bāhyam antastvenāntaraṃ sthitam / yathāviditam ātmāyaṃ svacittvam anupaśyati //MU_5,56.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12837: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ śāntam ātmano 'bhedanaṃ jagat / ahantādau sthite dehe bhūribhaṅgaṃ bhayaṃ tu sat //MU_5,56.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12838: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ / kalpāgnineva jvalitaṃ sarvam ādhihatātmanaḥ //MU_5,56.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12839: yas tv ātmaratir evāntaḥ kurvan karmendriyaiḥ kriyāḥ / na vaśo harṣaśokābhyāṃ sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12840: yas sarvagatam ātmānaṃ paśyan samupaśāntadhīḥ / na śocati dhyāyati vā sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12841: sapūrvāparaparyantā yaḥ paśyañ jāgatīr gatīḥ / dṛṣṭiṣv etāsu hasati sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12842: same pare 'sti nāhantā na jagajjanmanī mayi / vīcivṛndeṣv ivānaptvaṃ na nāśe phenadhātavaḥ //MU_5,56.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12843: yasyāntar asti nāhantvaṃ na vibhāgādi no mama / na cetanācetanate so 'sti nāstītaro janaḥ //MU_5,56.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12844: vyomasvaccho bhavan svehāṃ samyag ācaratīha yaḥ / harṣāmarṣavikāreṣu kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamas sa san //MU_5,56.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12845: ātmavat sarvabhūtāni paradravyāṇi loṣṭavat / svabhāvād eva na bhayād yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_5,56.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12846: artho 'tanus tanur vāpi nāsadrūpeṇa cetyate / na sadrūpeṇānubhūto jñenājñeneva tattayā //MU_5,56.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12847: īdṛśāśayasampanno mahāsattvapadaṃ gataḥ / tiṣṭhatūdetu vā yātu mṛtim etu nihantu vā //MU_5,56.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12848: vasatūttamabhogāḍhye svagṛhe vā janākule / sarvabhogojjhitābhoge sumahaty atha vā vane //MU_5,56.51//
GSP27moksop_u:12849: uddāmamardalaṃ pānatatparo vāpi nṛtyatu / sarvasaṅgaparityāgī śamam āyātu vā girau //MU_5,56.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12850: candanāgurukarpūrair vapur vā parilimpatu / jvālājaṭilavistāre nipatatv atha vānale //MU_5,56.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12851: pāpaṃ karotu sumahad bahalaṃ puṇyam eva vā / adyaiva mṛtim āyātu kalpāntanicayena vā //MU_5,56.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12852: nāsau kiñcin na tat kiñcit kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanā / nāsau kalaṅkam āpnoti hema paṅkagataṃ yathā //MU_5,56.55//
GSP27moksop_u:12854: samastavastupraśamas samyagjñānād yathāsthiteḥ / sa evāsyopaśānto 'ntaḥ kalaṅko 'sattayā yataḥ //MU_5,56.57//
GSP27moksop_u:12855: ahantvavāsanānarthaḥ prasūte saṃvidātmanaḥ / puruṣasya vicitrāṇi sukhaduḥkhāni janmabhūḥ //MU_5,56.58//
GSP27moksop_u:12856: rajjvāṃ sarpabhrame śānte gehino nirvṛtir yathā / ahantvabhāvasaṃśāntau tathāntassamatā matā //MU_5,56.59//
GSP27moksop_u:12857: yat karoti yad aśnāti yad dadāti juhoti vā / na taj jñasya na tatra jño mā karotu karotu vā //MU_5,56.60//
GSP27moksop_u:12858: karmaṇāsti na tasyārtho nārthas tasyāsty akarmaṇā / yathāsvabhāvaṃ bhagavān sa ātmany eva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_5,56.61//
GSP27moksop_u:12859: icchās tatas samudyanti na mañjarya ivopalāt / yāś codyanti ca tās sarvās sa evāmbv iva vīcayaḥ //MU_5,56.62//
GSP27moksop_u:12860: sakalam idam asāv asau ca sarvaṃ jagad akhilaṃ na vibhāgitātra kācit / paramapuruṣapāvanaikarūpī sa sad iti tat sad akiñcid eva vāsau //MU_5,56.63//
GSP27moksop_u:12863: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yad ātmamaricasyāntaś cittvāt tīkṣṇatvavedanam / tad ahantvādi bhedādi deśakālādi vetty adaḥ //MU_5,57.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12864: yad ātmalavaṇasyāntaś cittvāl lāvaṇyavedanam / tad ahantvādibhedādideśakālādimat sthitam //MU_5,57.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12865: svato yad antar ātmekṣoś cittvān mādhuryavedanam / tad ahantvādi bhedādi jagattādīti jṛmbhitam //MU_5,57.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12866: svato yad ātmadṛṣadaś cittvāt kāṭhinyavedanam / tad ahantvādibhedādideśakālāditāṃ gatam //MU_5,57.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12867: svato yad ātmaśailādijñatayā jāḍyavedanam / tad ahantvādi bhedādi bhuvanādīti saṃsthitam //MU_5,57.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12868: svato yad ātmatoyasya ciddravatvād vivartanam / tad āvartādy ahantādi bhedādy ākāritādi ca //MU_5,57.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12869: svato ya ātmavṛkṣasya śākhādis tasya vedanam / tad ahantādi bhedādi bhuvanādīva saṃsphuṭam //MU_5,57.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12870: yad ātmagaganasyāntaś cittvāc chūnyatvavedanam / tad ahantādi bhedādi bhāvanādīti bhāvitam //MU_5,57.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12871: yad ātmagaganasyāntaś cittvāt sauṣiryavedanam / tad ahantādi cittādi śarīrādīva dīpitam //MU_5,57.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12872: svato yad ātmakuḍyasya nairantaryaṃ nirantaram / tad ahantādibhedena cittvād bahir iva sthitam //MU_5,57.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12873: svato yad ātmasattāyā vittvāt sattvaikavedanam / tad ahantvādi bhedādi cetanādīti vā sthitam //MU_5,57.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12874: antar ātmaprakāśasya svato yad avabhāsanam / tad ahantvādi vittvādi jīva ity eva vetty asau //MU_5,57.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12875: antar asti yad ātmendoś cidrūpaṃ cidrasāyanam / svata āsvādyate tena tad ahantādinoditam //MU_5,57.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12876: paramātmaguḍasyāntar yac citsvādūdayātmakam / tad evāsvādyate tena svato 'hantādināntare //MU_5,57.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12877: paramātmamaṇeś cittvād yad antaḥ kacanaṃ svayam / cetanātma tad evāntar aham ityādi vetty asau //MU_5,57.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12878: na ca kiñcana vetty antar vedyasyāsambhavād iha / na cāsvādayati svādu svādyasyāsambhavād alam //MU_5,57.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12879: na ca kiñcic cinoty antaś cetyasyāsambhave sati / vedyate na ca vā kiñcid vedyasyāsambhavād asau //MU_5,57.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12880: asadābhāsa evātmā ananto bharitākṛtiḥ / sthitas sadaivaikaghano mahāśaila ivātmani //MU_5,57.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12881: anayā tu vacobhaṅgyā mayā vo raghunandana / nāhantādijagattādibhedo 'stīti nidarśitam //MU_5,57.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12882: na cittam asti no cettā na jagattādivibhramaḥ / dṛṣadīvāmbaram ataś śāntaṃ śāmyati kevalam //MU_5,57.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12883: yathāvartāditām eti dravatvād vāri vāriṇi / tathāhantāditām eti jñatvāj jñaptau jña ātmani //MU_5,57.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12884: yathā dravatvaṃ payasi yathā spandas sadāgatau / ahantādeśakālādi tathā jñe jñaptimātrake //MU_5,57.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12885: jño jñatāyāṃ hi yaj jñānaṃ jānāti jñānabṛṃhayā / jñāyate tad ahantādi jīvādy apy abhijīvanaiḥ //MU_5,57.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12886: yathodeti yadā jñasya jñaptir jñānena yādṛśī / ananyaivānyatāṃ buddhvā sā tadā jṛmbhate tathā //MU_5,57.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12887: jīvasya jīvitaṃ jñānaṃ jñatāyāṃ jīvajīvane / aṇur apy asti no bhedo virūpatve jñajīvayoḥ //MU_5,57.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12888: yathā jñajīvayor nāsti bhedo rāma tathaitayoḥ / bhedo 'sti na jñajagator viddhi śāntam akhaṇḍitam //MU_5,57.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12889: sarvaṃ praśāntam ajam ekam anādimadhyam ābhāsanaṃ svadanamātram acetyacihnam / sarvaṃ praśāntam ati śabdamayī tu dṛṣṭir bodhārtham eva hi mudhaiva tad om itīdam //MU_5,57.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12892: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam / kirāteśasya suraghor vṛttāntaṃ vismayapradam //MU_5,58.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12893: uttarasyā diśo medaḥ karpūrapaṭalaṃ bhuvaḥ / sambhṛtaṃ hasanaṃ śārvaṃ śuklo vā cāndra ātapaḥ //MU_5,58.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12894: himādreś śṛṅgam astīha kailāso nāma parvataḥ / śailajālasya sanmuktākalāpasyeva nāyakaḥ //MU_5,58.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12895: viṣṇoḥ kṣīrodaka iva svargas surapater iva / abjajasyeva nābhyabjaṃ gṛhaṃ yaś śaśimaulinaḥ //MU_5,58.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12896: rudrākṣavṛndadolābhis sāpsarobhir vibhāti yaḥ / lolaratnaśalākābhir laharībhir ivārṇavaḥ //MU_5,58.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12897: gaṇāṅganānām aniśaṃ mattānāṃ caraṇair hatāḥ / aśokā iva rājante yatrāśokā vikāsinaḥ //MU_5,58.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12898: sañcaracchaṅkare dikṣu bhṛguṣv indumaṇidravaiḥ / nivartante pravartante yatrājasraṃ ca nirjharāḥ //MU_5,58.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12899: yo latāgulmavṛkṣaughavāpīhradanadīnadaiḥ / mṛgapakṣigaṇair bhītair brahmāṇḍavad ihāvṛtaḥ //MU_5,58.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12900: tasya hemajaṭā nāma kirātās saṃsthitās tale / pipīlakā varataror mūlakośagatā iva //MU_5,58.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12901: kailāsapādāraṇyānyāṃ jaṭālāyāṃ sugulmakaiḥ / vasanti yaukavat kṣudrās te tannikaṭajīvinaḥ //MU_5,58.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12902: āsīt teṣām udārātmā rājā parapurañjayaḥ / jayalakṣmyā bhuja iva yaḥ prajāyāś ca dakṣiṇaḥ //MU_5,58.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12903: suraghur nāma balavān suraghorāridarpahā / mūrtaḥ parākrama iva mūrtimān iva mārutaḥ //MU_5,58.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12904: jino vairāgyavibhavair dhanair guhyakanāyakaḥ / śatakratugurur bodhaiḥ kāvyair asuradaiśikaḥ //MU_5,58.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12905: sa cakre rājakāryāṇi nigrahānugrahakramaiḥ / yathāprāptāny akhinnātmā dinānīva divākaraḥ //MU_5,58.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12906: tajjābhyāṃ sukhaduḥkhābhyām atha tasyābhyabhūyata / sumatir vāgurābandhaiś śliṣṭair grīveva pakṣiṇaḥ //MU_5,58.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12907: kim ārtaṃ pīḍayāmy enaṃ tilayantram ivaujasā / sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ mamevārtiḥ prajāyate //MU_5,58.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12908: dhanam asmai prayacchāmi dhanenānandavāñ janaḥ / bhavaty aham ivāśeṣas tad alaṃ me vinigrahaiḥ //MU_5,58.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12909: atha vā nigrahaṃ prāptaṃ karomy etena vai vinā / vartate na prajaiveyaṃ vinā vāri sarid yathā //MU_5,58.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12910: hā kaṣṭam eṣa nigrāhyo diṣṭyānugrāhya eṣa me / diṣṭyādya sukhavān asmi kaṣṭam adyāsmi duḥkhavān //MU_5,58.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12911: iti dolāyitaṃ ceto na viśaśrāma bhūpateḥ / ekatrāmbumahāvarte ciraṃ tṛṇam iva bhramat //MU_5,58.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12912: athaikadā gṛhaṃ tasya māṇḍavyo munir āyayau / bhrāntāśeṣakakupkuñjo vāsavasyeva nāradaḥ //MU_5,58.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12913: tam asau pūjayām āsa papraccha ca mahāmunim / sandehadurdrūmastambhaparaśuṃ sarvakovidam //MU_5,58.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12914: suraghuḥ: bhavadāgamanenāsmi mune nirvṛtim āgataḥ / paramāṃ vasudhāpīṭhaṃ samprāpta iva mādhave //MU_5,58.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12915: adya tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ nātha dhanyānāṃ dhuri dharmataḥ / vikāsi raviṇevābjaṃ yat tvayāsmi vilokitaḥ //MU_5,58.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12916: bhagavan sarvadharmajña ciraṃ viśrāntavān asi / tad imaṃ saṃśayaṃ chinddhi mamārkas timiraṃ yathā //MU_5,58.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12917: mahatāṃ saṅgamenārtiḥ kasya nāma na naśyati / sandehaṃ tu parām ārtim āhur ārtivido janāḥ //MU_5,58.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12918: mannigrahānugrahajā madbhṛtyavapuṣi sthitāḥ / kaṣanti mām alaṃ cintā gajaṃ harinakhā iva //MU_5,58.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12919: tad yathā samatodeti sūryāṃśur iva sarvagā / matau mama mune mānya tathā karuṇayā kuru //MU_5,58.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12920: māṇḍavyaḥ: svāyattena svasaṃsthena svenopāyena bhūpate / eṣā manaḥpelavatā himavat pravilīyate //MU_5,58.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12921: svavicāraṇayaivāśu śāmyaty antar manojvaraḥ / śaradāgamamātreṇa mihikā mahatī yathā //MU_5,58.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12922: svenaiva manasā svāni svaśarīragatāni ca / vicārayendriyāṇy antaḥ kīdṛśāny atha kāni vā //MU_5,58.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12923: ko 'haṃ katham idaṃ kiṃ vā kathaṃ maraṇajanmanī / vicārayāntar etat tvaṃ mahattām alam eṣyasi //MU_5,58.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12924: vicāreṇa parijñātasvabhāvasya satas tava / harṣāmarṣadṛśaś cetas tolayiṣyanti nācalam //MU_5,58.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12925: manas svaṃ rūpam utsṛjya śamam eṣyati vijvaram / bhūtapūrvavapur bhūtvā taraṅgaḥ payasīva te //MU_5,58.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12926: tiṣṭhad eva mano rūpaṃ parityakṣyati te 'nagha / kalaṅkavikalaṃ kāla ṛtvantaragatāv iva //MU_5,58.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12927: anukampyā bhaviṣyanti śrīmantas sarva eva te / dṛṣṭatattvasya tuṣṭasya janāḥ pitur ivāvanau //MU_5,58.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12928: vivekadīpadṛṣṭātmā mervabdhinabhasām api / adhaḥ kariṣyasi nṛpa mahattām uttamārthadām //MU_5,58.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12929: mahattām āgataṃ cetas tava saṃsāravṛttiṣu / na nimaṅkṣyati he sādho goṣpadeṣv iva vāraṇaḥ //MU_5,58.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12930: kṛpaṇaṃ tu mano rājan pelave 'pi nimajjati / kārye goṣpadatoye 'pi jīrṇāṅgo maṣako yathā //MU_5,58.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12931: ceto vāsanayā paṅke kīṭavat parimajjati / dṛśyamātrāvalambinyā svayā dīnatayā tayā //MU_5,58.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12932: tāvat tāvan mahābāho svayaṃ santyajyate 'khilam / yāvad yāvat parālokaḥ paramātmaiva śiṣyate //MU_5,58.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12933: tāvat prakṣālyate dhātur yāvad dhemaiva śiṣyate / tāvad ālokyate sarvaṃ yāvad ātmaiva lakṣyate //MU_5,58.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12934: sarvaṃ sarvikayā buddhyā svayaṃ sarvatra sarvadā / sarvathā samparityajya svātmanātmopalabhyate //MU_5,58.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12935: yāvat sarvaṃ na santyaktaṃ tāvad ātmā na labhyate / sarvavastuparityāge śeṣa ātmeti kathyate //MU_5,58.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12936: yāvad anyan na santyaktaṃ tāvat sāmānyam eva hi / vastu nāsādyate sādho svātmalābhe tu kā kathā //MU_5,58.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12937: yatra sarvātmanā svātmalābhāya patati svayam / tyaktānyakāryaḥ prāpnoti tan nāma nṛpa netarat //MU_5,58.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12938: ātmāvalokanārthaṃ tu tasmāt sarvaṃ parityajet / sarvaṃ kiñcit parityajya yac chiṣṭaṃ tat paraṃ padam //MU_5,58.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12939: sakalakāraṇakāryaparamparāmayajagadgatavastuvijṛmbhitam / alam apāsya manas svavapus tataḥ parivilūya ca yac chubham asti tat //MU_5,58.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12942: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvā bhagavān enaṃ suraghuṃ raghunandana / yayau svām eva kakubhaṃ māṇḍavyo maunamaṇḍanaḥ //MU_5,59.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12943: gate varamunau rājā gatvaikāntam aninditam / dhiyā sañcintayām āsa ko nāmāham iti svayam //MU_5,59.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12944: nāhaṃ merur na me merur jagan nāhaṃ na me jagat / nāhaṃ śailā na me śailā na dharāhaṃ na me dharā //MU_5,59.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12945: kirātamaṇḍalaṃ nedaṃ mama nāhaṃ ca maṇḍalam / nijasaṅketamātreṇa kevalaṃ deśa eṣa me //MU_5,59.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12946: tyakto mayaiṣa saṅketo nāhaṃ deśo na caiṣa me / idānīṃ nagaraṃ śiṣṭam eṣa evātra niścayaḥ //MU_5,59.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12947: patākāpurapaṭṭāḍhyā bhṛtyopavanasaṅkulā / gajāśvasāmantayutā purī nāhaṃ na me purī //MU_5,59.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12948: vyarthasaṅketasambaddhaṃ saṅketavigame kṣatam / bhogavṛndaṃ kalatraṃ ca nāhaṃ naitan mamākhilam //MU_5,59.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12949: evaṃ sabhṛtyaṃ sabalaṃ savāhanapurāntaram / nāhaṃ rājyaṃ na me rājyaṃ saṅketo hy ayam ākulaḥ //MU_5,59.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12950: dehamātram ahaṃ manye hastapādādisaṃyutam / tad etat tāvad āśv antar aham ālokayāmy alam //MU_5,59.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12951: tad atra tāvan māṃsāsthi nāham etad acetanaṃ / na caitan mama saṃśleṣam ety abjasya yathā jalam //MU_5,59.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12952: māṃsaṃ jaḍaṃ na tad ahaṃ naivāhaṃ raktam apy alam / jaḍāny asthīni naivāhaṃ na caitāni mama kvacit //MU_5,59.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12953: karmendriyāṇi naivāhaṃ na ca karmendriyāṇi me / jaḍaṃ yat kila dehe 'smiṃs tad ahaṃ naiva cetanaḥ //MU_5,59.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12954: nāhaṃ bhogā na me bhogā na me buddhīndriyāṇi ca / jaḍāny asatsvarūpāṇi na ca buddhīndriyāṇy aham //MU_5,59.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12955: mūlaṃ saṃsṛtidoṣasya mano nāhaṃ jaḍaṃ hi tat / atha buddhir ahaṅkāra iti dṛṣṭir manomayī //MU_5,59.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12956: manobuddhīndriyādyanto bhūtakośaś ca tad vapuḥ / nāham evaṃ śarīrādi śiṣṭam ālokayāmy aham //MU_5,59.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12957: śeṣas tu cetanājīvas sa ca cetyena cetati / anyena bodhyamāno 'sau nātmatattvavapur bhavet //MU_5,59.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12958: evaṃ tyajāmi saṃvedyaṃ cetyaṃ nāhaṃ hi tat kila / śeṣo vikalparahito viśuddhā cid ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,59.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12959: citram eṣo 'smi labdhātmā jātaḥ kālena kāryavit / eṣa so 'ham anantātmā kvānto 'sya paramātmanaḥ //MU_5,59.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12960: brahmaṇīndre yame vāyau sarvabhūtagaṇe tathā / sa eṣa bhagavān ātmā tantur muktāsv iva sthitaḥ //MU_5,59.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12961: cicchaktir amalā saiṣā cetyāmayavivarjitā / bharitāśeṣadikkuñjā bhairavākāradhāriṇī //MU_5,59.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12964: sarvākāravikārāḍhyā sarvākāravivarjitā / sarvabhūtaughatāṃ yātā sarvadā sarvatāṃ gatā //MU_5,59.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12965: caturdaśavidhāny eṣā bhūtāni bhuvanodare / etanmayīyaṃ kalanā jāgatī vedanātmikā //MU_5,59.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12966: mithyāvabhāsamātraṃ tu sarvaduḥkhadaśāgatiḥ / nānākāramayābhāsaṃ sarvam ātmaiva cit parā //MU_5,59.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12967: seyam ātmā mama vyāpī seyaṃ madavabodhanam / seyam ākalitāṅgehā karoti nṛpatibhramam //MU_5,59.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12968: asyā eva prasādena mano deharathasthitam / saṃsārajālalīlāsu yāti valgati nṛtyati //MU_5,59.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12969: idaṃ manaś śarīrādi na kiñcit api vastutaḥ / naṣṭe na kiñcit apy asmin parinaśyati pelave //MU_5,59.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12970: jagajjālamayaṃ nṛttam idaṃ cittanaṭais tatam / etayaivaikayā paṅktyā dṛśyate dīpalekhayā //MU_5,59.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12971: kaṣṭaṃ mudhaiva me cintā nigrahānugrahasthitau / babhūva dehaniṣṭhaiva na kiñcid api dehakaḥ //MU_5,59.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12972: nanv aho samprabuddho 'smi gataṃ durdarśanaṃ mama / dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ akhilaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyam idaṃ mayā //MU_5,59.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12973: sarvaṃ kiñcit idaṃ dṛśyaṃ dṛśyate yaj jagadgatam / cinniṣṣyandāṃśamātraṃ tan nānyat kiñcana śāśvatam //MU_5,59.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12974: kva tau kīdṛgvidhau vāpi kiṃniṣṭhau vā kimātmakau / nigrahānugrahau loke harṣāmarṣakramau tathā //MU_5,59.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12975: kiṃ sukhaṃ kiṃ ca vā duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ brahmedam ātatam / aham āsaṃ mudhā mūḍho diṣṭyāmūḍho 'smy ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,59.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12976: kim asminn evam āloke śocyate kiṃ vimuhyate / kiṃ prekṣyate kim kriyate sthīyate kva kva gamyate //MU_5,59.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12977: kiñcit ittham idaṃ nāma cidābhāsaṃ virājate / namo namas te nistattva dṛṣṭadṛśyo 'si sundara //MU_5,59.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12978: aho nu samprabuddho 'smi samyag jñātam alaṃ mayā / namo mahyam anantāya samyagjñānodayāya ca //MU_5,59.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12979: vigatarañjananirviṣayasthitir gatabhavabhrama īhitavarjitaḥ / sthirasuṣuptakalātigatas tatas samasamaṃ nivasāmy aham ātmani //MU_5,59.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12982: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti hemajaṭādhīśo lebhe padam anuttamam / vivekādhyavasāyena brāhmaṇyam iva gādhijaḥ //MU_5,60.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12983: anantākārakāryāsu nāsīc ceṣṭāsu khedavān / bhūyo bhūyaḥ prayuktāsu dinamālāsv iveśvaraḥ //MU_5,60.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12984: tataḥ prabhṛti so 'tiṣṭhat sarvehāvigatajvaram / samāsame svake kārye jalaugho 'gra ivānate //MU_5,60.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12985: harṣāmarṣavinirmuktaḥ prakṛtaṃ kāryam ācaran / udāragambhīravapur jahārāmbunidheś śriyam //MU_5,60.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12986: suṣuptasamadharmiṇyā cittavṛttyā vyarājata / niṣkampayā prakāśinyā dīpas svaśikhayeva saḥ //MU_5,60.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12987: na nirghṛṇo dayāvān no na dvandvī nāpy amatsaraḥ / na sukhī nāsukhī nārthī nānarthī sa babhūva ha //MU_5,60.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12988: samadarśanayā nityaṃ vṛttyā cāmaladhīrayā / antaśśītalayā reje paripūrṇendubimbavat //MU_5,60.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12989: sarvaṃ cittattvakacanaṃ jagad ity avalokya sā / praśāntasukhaduḥkhaśrīs tasya pūrṇā matir babhau //MU_5,60.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12990: ullasan vilasan ghūrṇaṃs tiṣṭhan gacchañ śvasan svapan / abhūt sa svasamādhisthaḥ prabuddhaś cillayaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,60.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12991: sa kurvan vigatāsaṅgaṃ rājyaṃ rājīvalocanaḥ / atiṣṭhad akṣatākāro bhūrivarṣaśatāny atha //MU_5,60.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12992: sanniveśam imaṃ dehanāmakaṃ tadanu svayam / sa jahau tejasākrānto rūpaṃ himakaṇo yathā //MU_5,60.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12993: viveśa param ādyaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ kāraṇeśvaram / prajñayā saritā vāripūraḥ pūrṇam ivāmbudhim //MU_5,60.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12994: adhigatavimalaikarūpatejā gaganadaśāṃ samupetya śāntaśokaḥ / alam abhavad asau paraṃ svarūpaṃ ghaṭakham ivāmbarasaṃyutaṃ mahātmā //MU_5,60.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12997: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya na manaḥ paritapyate / ghore tamasi nirmagnaṃ labdhadīpaś śiśur yathā //MU_5,61.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12998: vivekāvasthayā cetas tanvyaivāyāti nirvṛtim / patañ śvabhre dṛḍhatṛṇapracayālambanād iva //MU_5,61.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12999: buddhvaitāṃ pāvanīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayitvāpy udāharan / nityam ekasamādhāno bhava bhūṣitabhūtalaḥ //MU_5,61.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13000: rāmaḥ: katham ekasamādhānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vā munīśvara / vātāhatamayūrāṅgaruhalolaṃ mano bhavet //MU_5,61.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13001: vasiṣṭhaḥ: śṛṇu tasyaiva suraghoḥ prabuddhasya satas tadā / parṇādasya ca rājarṣes saṃvādam imam adbhutam //MU_5,61.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13003: babhūva pārasīkānāṃ pārthivaḥ paravīrahā / parigho nāma vikhyātaḥ parighas syandane yathā //MU_5,61.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13004: sa babhūva paraṃ mitraṃ suragho raghunandana / nandanodyānasaṃsthasya madanasyeva mādhavaḥ //MU_5,61.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13005: kadācit parighasyābhūd akāṇḍaṃ maṇḍale mahat / kalpānta iva saṃsāre prajāduṣkṛtadoṣajam //MU_5,61.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13006: vineśur janatās tatra bahvyaḥ kṣutkṣatajīvitāḥ / jvalite vipine vahnau yathā bhūtaparamparāḥ //MU_5,61.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13007: tadduḥkhaṃ parigho dṛṣṭvā viṣādam atulaṃ yayau / tatyāja cākhilaṃ rājyaṃ dagdhaṃ grāmam ivādhvagaḥ //MU_5,61.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13008: prajānāśapratīkāreṣv asamartho virāgavān / jagāma vipinaṃ kartuṃ tapo jinamunīndravat //MU_5,61.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13009: paurāṇām aparijñātaḥ kasmiṃścid dūrakānane / sa uvāsa viraktātmā lokāntara ivāpare //MU_5,61.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13010: tapaś carañ śāntamatir dāntaḥ kandaramandiraḥ / svayaṃ śīrṇāni śuṣkāṇi tatra parṇāny abhakṣayat //MU_5,61.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13011: ciraṃ hutāśavac chuṣkaparṇāny evātha bhakṣayan / parṇāda iti nāmāsau prāpa madhye tapasvinām //MU_5,61.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13012: tataḥ prabhṛti parṇādanāmā rājarṣisattamaḥ / jambudvīpe babhūvāsau vikhyāto munisadmasu //MU_5,61.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13013: tato varṣasahasreṇa tapasā dāruṇātmanā / prāpad abhyāsavaśato jñānam ātmaprasādajam //MU_5,61.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13014: babhūva vigatadvandvo nīrāgas samadarśanaḥ / nirīho niranukrośo jīvanmuktaḥ prabuddhadhīḥ //MU_5,61.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13015: vijahāra yathākāmaṃ trilokīmaṭhikām imām / siddhasādhyais samaṃ sādho sahaṃso 'lir ivābjinīm //MU_5,61.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13016: ekadā tasya sadanaṃ hemacūḍamahīpateḥ / prāpa ratnavinirmāṇaṃ meroś śṛṅgam ivāparam //MU_5,61.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13017: te tatra prāktane mitre pūjām akurutāṃ mithaḥ / pūrṇāṃ vijñātavijñeyau maurkhyagartād vinirgate //MU_5,61.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13018: aho nu mama kalyāṇaiḥ phalitaṃ bata pāvanaiḥ / samprāptavān ahaṃ yat tvām ity anyo'nyam athocatuḥ //MU_5,61.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13019: āliṅgitaśarīrau tāv anyo'nyāninditākṛtī / ekāsane viviśatuś candrārkāv iva bhūdhare //MU_5,61.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13020: parighaḥ: paramānandam āyātaṃ cetas tvaddarśanena me / candrabimba ivonmagnam antaśśītalatāṃ gatam //MU_5,61.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13021: akṛtrimaṃ suhṛtprema viyoge śataśākhatām / prayāti palvalataṭe chinnarūḍha iva drumaḥ //MU_5,61.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13022: visrabdhāṃs tān kathālāpāṃs tā līlās tac ca ceṣṭitam / saṃsmṛtya prāktanaṃ sādho hṛṣyāmy eva punaḥ punaḥ //MU_5,61.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13023: jñānam etan mayā prāptaṃ tvayā jñānaṃ yathānagha / māṇḍavyasya prasādena paramātmaprasādajam //MU_5,61.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13024: adya kaccid aduḥkhas tvaṃ kaccid viśrāntavān asi / parame kāraṇe merāv iva bhūmaṇḍalādhipa //MU_5,61.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13025: kaccit paramakalyāṇa svātmārāmatayā tava / prasādo jāyate citte śaradīva saro'mbhasi //MU_5,61.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13026: kaccit karoṣi samayā suprasannagabhīrayā / dṛṣṭyā subhaga kāryāṇi kāryāṇy eva narādhipa //MU_5,61.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13027: nirādhivyādhayo dhīrāḥ kaccit sampannaśālayaḥ / janatās tava deśeṣu tiṣṭhanti vigatajvaram //MU_5,61.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13028: kaccid uddāmaphalinī phalinīva latānatā / dharā tava phalāpūrair bhṛśaṃ dhārayati prajāḥ //MU_5,61.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13029: kaccit tava diganteṣu candrasyevāṃśupañjaram / tuṣāranikarākāraṃ prasṛtaṃ pāvanaṃ yaśaḥ //MU_5,61.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13030: kaccid guṇaśatair etā diśo nirvivarīkṛtāḥ / tvayā saro'mbhasā bandho bisānām iva bhittayaḥ //MU_5,61.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13031: kaccit kalamakedārakoṇasthāṇuṣu harṣulāḥ / pratigrāmaṃ kumāryas te gāyanty ānandadaṃ yaśaḥ //MU_5,61.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13032: kuśalaṃ tava dhānyeṣu dhaneṣu vibhaveṣu ca / bhṛtyeṣv atha kalatreṣu putreṣu nagareṣu ca //MU_5,61.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13033: ādhivyādhivihīneyaṃ kaccit kāyalatā tava / phalaṃ phalati puṇyākhyaṃ yad ihāmutra coditam //MU_5,61.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13034: āpātaramaṇīyeṣu paryantātyantavairiṣu / kaccid viṣayasarpeṣu savirāgaṃ manas tava //MU_5,61.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13035: aho bata ciraṃ kālam āvāṃ viśleṣam āgatau / kālena śleṣitau bhūyo vasantādritaṭāv iva //MU_5,61.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13036: na tā jagati vidyante sukhaduḥkhadaśās sakhe / jīvadbhir yā na dṛśyante saṃyogajaviyogajāḥ //MU_5,61.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13037: tathaitāsv atidīrghāsu daśāsv anyatvam āgatāḥ / bhūyo vayam api śliṣṭāś citrā hi niyatir vidheḥ //MU_5,61.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13038: suraghuḥ: bhagavan niyater asyā gatiṃ dīpagater iva / daivikyāḥ ko hi jānāti gambhīrāṃ vismayapradām //MU_5,61.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13039: tvam ahaṃ ca viyojyātidūre dūradaśāsu ca / adya saṅghaṭitau bhūyaḥ kim asādhyam aho vidheḥ //MU_5,61.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13040: vayaṃ tv adya mahāsattva bhṛśaṃ kuśalinas sthitāḥ / tvadāgamanapuṇyena parāṃ pāvanatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,61.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13041: īṣat tvadāgamakṣīṇapāpānāṃ puṇyapādapaiḥ / tathā phalitam asmākaṃ na yathā vayam ākulāḥ //MU_5,61.45//
GSP27moksop_u:13042: sarvās sampattayo 'smākaṃ rājarṣe saṃsthitāḥ pure / bhavadāgamanenādya prayātāś śataśākhatām //MU_5,61.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13043: vikirati parito rasāyanānām iva nikaraṃ madhuraṃ mahānubhāva / tava vacanam avekṣaṇaṃ ca puṇyaṃ paramapadapratimo hi sādhusaṅgaḥ //MU_5,61.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13046: vasiṣṭhaḥ: athaivamprāyayā tatra viśrambhakathayā ciram / prāktanasnehagarbhiṇyā sthitvovācāyudhābhidhaḥ //MU_5,62.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13047: parighaḥ: yad yat saṃsārajāle 'smin kriyate karma bhūmipa / tat samāhitacittasya sukhāyānyasya nānagha //MU_5,62.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13048: kaccit saṅkalparahitaṃ paraṃ viśramaṇāspadam / paramopaśamaśreyas samādhim anutiṣṭhasi //MU_5,62.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13049: suraghuḥ: etan me brūhi bhagavan sarvasaṅkalpavarjitam / paramopaśamaśreyas samādhir hi kim ucyate //MU_5,62.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13050: [parighaḥ:] yo jño mahātman satataṃ tūṣṇīṃ vyavaharaṃś ca vā / asamāhitacitto 'sau kadā bhavati kaḥ kila //MU_5,62.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13051: nityaprabuddhacittās tu kurvanto 'pi jagatkriyāḥ / ātmaikatattvatanniṣṭhās sadaiva susamādhayaḥ //MU_5,62.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13052: baddhapadmāsanasyāpi kṛtabrahmāñjaler api / aviśrāntasvabhāvasya kas samādhiḥ kathaṃ ca vā //MU_5,62.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13053: [suraghuḥ:] tattvāvabodho bhagavan sarvāśātṛṇapāvakaḥ / proktas samādhibhedena na tu tūṣṇīm avasthitiḥ //MU_5,62.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13054: samāhitā nityatṛptā yathābhūtārthadarśinī / sādho samādhiśabdena parā prajñocyate budhaiḥ //MU_5,62.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13055: akṣubdhā nirahaṅkārā dvandveṣv anabhipātinī / proktā samādhiśabdena meros sthiratarā sthitiḥ //MU_5,62.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13056: niścintā vigatābhīṣṭā heyopādeyavarjitā / proktā samādhiśabdena paripūrṇā manogatiḥ //MU_5,62.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13057: yataḥ prabhṛti bodhena yuktam ātyantikaṃ manaḥ / tad ārabhya samādhānam avyucchinnaṃ mahātmanaḥ //MU_5,62.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13058: na hi prabuddhamanaso bhūtvā vicchidyate punaḥ / samādhir dūram ākṛṣṭo bisatantuś śiśor iva //MU_5,62.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13059: samagraṃ dinam ālokād viramaty akṣi no yathā / ājīvitāntaṃ me prajñā tathā tattvāvalokanāt //MU_5,62.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13060: ajasram ambu vahanād yathā nadyā na rudhyate / tathā vijñānadṛg bodhāt kṣaṇamātraṃ na rudhyate //MU_5,62.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13061: na vismaraty avirataṃ yathā kālakalā gatim / na vismaraty avirataṃ svātmānaṃ prājñadhīs tathā //MU_5,62.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13062: na vismarati sarvatra yathā satatago gatim / na vismarati niścetyaṃ cinmātraṃ prājñadhīs tathā //MU_5,62.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13063: gatiṃ kālakalā yadvac cinvānā samavasthitā / cic ciraṃ cetyarahitaṃ cinvānāṅgaṃ tathā sthitā //MU_5,62.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13064: yathā sattāvihīnātmā padārtho nopalabhyate / tathātmajñānahīnātmā kālo jñasya na labhyate //MU_5,62.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13065: na sambhavati saṃsāre guṇahīno guṇī yathā / na sambhavaty ātmasaṃvidvarjito hy ātmavāṃs tathā //MU_5,62.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13066: sarvadaivāsmi sambuddhas sarvadaivāsmi nirmalaḥ / sarvadaivāsmi śāntātmā sarvadāsmi samāhitaḥ //MU_5,62.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13067: bhedaḥ kena samādher me janyate katham eva vā / ātmano vyatiriktena nityam evāsadātmanā //MU_5,62.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13068: tasmāt kadācid api me na samādhimayaṃ manaḥ / na cāsamāhitaṃ nityam ātmatattvaikasambhavāt //MU_5,62.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13069: sarvagas sarvadaivātmā sarvam eva ca sarvathā / asamādhir hi ko 'sau syāt samādhir api kas smṛtaḥ //MU_5,62.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13070: nityaṃ samāhitadhiyas suśamā mahāntas tiṣṭhanti kāryapariṇāmavibhāgamuktāḥ / tenāsamāhitasamāhitabhedabhaṅgyā mithyoditaṃ na tu maduttamavākprapañcaḥ //MU_5,62.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13073: parighaḥ: rājan nūnaṃ prabuddho 'si prāptavān asi tat padam / saṃśītalāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pūrṇendur iva rājase //MU_5,63.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13074: ānandamadhusampūrṇo lakṣmyā ca parayā śritaḥ / śītalasnigdhamadhuro rājīvam iva rājase //MU_5,63.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13075: nirmalo vitataḥ pūrṇo gambhīraḥ prakaṭāśayaḥ / velānilabalollāsamukto 'bdhir iva rājase //MU_5,63.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13076: svacchas svānandasampūrṇo gatāhaṅkāravāridaḥ / sphuṭaṃ vistīrṇagambhīraś śaratkham iva rājase //MU_5,63.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13077: sarvatra lakṣyase svasthas sarvatra parituṣyasi / sarvatra vītarāgo 'si rājan sarvatra rājase //MU_5,63.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13078: sārāsāraparicchedapāragas tvaṃ mahādhiyā / jānāsi sarvam evedaṃ yathāsthitam akhaṇḍitam //MU_5,63.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13079: bhāvābhāvaparicchedatattvajña muditāśaya / samāsamadaśālaulyamuktaṃ tava vapus sthitam //MU_5,63.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13080: vastunāvastunaivāntar amṛteneva sāgaraḥ / apunaḥprakṣayāyaiva paritṛpto 'si sundara //MU_5,63.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13081: suraghuḥ: na tad asti mune vastu yatropādeyatāsti naḥ / yāvat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ tāvad eva na kiñcana //MU_5,63.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13082: upādeyasya cābhāvād dheyam apy asti kiṃ kila / pratiyogivyavacchedaṃ vinā heyaṃ kim ucyate //MU_5,63.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13083: tucchatvāt sarvabhāvānām atucchatvāc ca kālataḥ / ciraṃ mama parikṣīṇe tucchātucchamanassthitī //MU_5,63.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13084: deśakālavaśād dṛṣṭvā tucchasyātucchatām iha / atucchasya tu tucchatvaṃ varjye nindāstutī budhaiḥ //MU_5,63.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13085: rāgān nindāstutī loke rāgaś ca parivāñchanāt / vāñchyate ca mahodāraṃ vastu śobhanabuddhinā //MU_5,63.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13086: trilokyāṃ ca striyaś śailās samudrā vanarājayaḥ / bhūtāni ca suśūnyāni sāro nāsty uttamas tataḥ //MU_5,63.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13087: māṃsārbudābhamṛdvartimaye jagati jarjare / vāñchanīyavihīne 'smiñ śūnye kim iva vāñchyate //MU_5,63.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13088: vāñchāyāṃ vinivṛttāyāṃ saṅkṣayo dveṣarāgayoḥ / dinalakṣmyāṃ vyatītāyām ālokātapayor iva //MU_5,63.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13089: alam ativitatair vacaḥprapañcair iyam uciteha sukhāya dṛṣṭir ekā / samupaśamitavāsanaṃ mano 'ntar yadi muditaṃ hi tad uttamā pratiṣṭhā //MU_5,63.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13092: vasiṣṭhaḥ: suraghuḥ parighaś caiva vicāryeti jagadbhramam / mithaḥ prapūjitau tuṣṭau svavyāpāraparau gatau //MU_5,64.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13093: tad eva rāghava śrutvā paramaṃ bodhakāraṇam / anenaiva vibodhena bhava labdhāspadas sphuṭam //MU_5,64.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13094: parayā prajñayā dhīra vicārātatataikṣṇyayā / galaty alam ahaṅkārakālameghe hṛdambare //MU_5,64.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13095: samastalokānumate saphale hlādakāriṇi / nirmale vitate cetaśśaratkāla upasthite //MU_5,64.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13096: dhyeye śaraṇye susame sakalānandasampadi / supraśaste cidākāśe sthīyate paramātmani //MU_5,64.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13097: yo nityam adhyātmamayo nityam antarmukhas sukhī / nityaṃ cidanusandhānas sa na śokena bādhyate //MU_5,64.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13098: vyavahāraparo 'py uccai rāgadveṣamayo 'pi san / nāntaḥ kalaṅkam ādatte padmo jalalavaṃ yathā //MU_5,64.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13099: samyagvijñānavān buddhvā yo 'ntaś śāntamanā muniḥ / na bādhyate sa manasā kariṇeva mṛgādhipaḥ //MU_5,64.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13100: bhogaikaśaraṇaṃ dīnaṃ na cittaṃ jñasya vidyate / nandane durdruma iva jñacittaṃ himavadvapuḥ //MU_5,64.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13101: viraktajāyāmaraṇe yathā duḥkhī na mānavaḥ / parijñātākhilāvidyaṃ tathā cittaṃ na duḥkhadam //MU_5,64.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13102: parijñātamanomoho jagadbhānodbhavātmanā / spṛśyate nainasā sādhū rajaseva nabhastalam //MU_5,64.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13103: avidyāsamparijñānamātram eva mahauṣadham / avidyāvitatavyādhes timirasyeva dīpakaḥ //MU_5,64.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13104: avidyā samparijñātā yadaiva hi tadaiva hi / sā parikṣīyate bhūyas svadate ca na bhogabhūḥ //MU_5,64.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13105: vyavahāraparo 'py antar asaktamatir ekadhīḥ / spṛśyate nainasā sādhur matsyekṣaṇam ivāmbhasā //MU_5,64.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13106: prāpte cidbhāskarāloke prakṣīṇājñānayāminī / cittabhūḥ paramānandam āgatā jñasya rājate //MU_5,64.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13107: ajñānanidropaśame jano jñānārkabodhitaḥ / taṃ prabodham avāpnoti punar yena na muhyati //MU_5,64.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13108: dināni jīvyate tāni sānandās te kriyākramāḥ / ātmacintoditā yeṣu cijjyotsnā hṛdayāmbare //MU_5,64.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13109: naro mohasamuttīrṇas satatasvātmacintayā / antaśśītalatām eti svāmṛteneva candramāḥ //MU_5,64.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13110: tāni mitrāṇi śāstrāṇi tāni tāni dināni ca / virāgollāsavān yais syād ātmacintodayas sphuṭam //MU_5,64.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13111: ciraṃ śocanti te dīnā janmajaṅgalavīrudhaḥ / ātmāvalokane helā yeṣām adhigatainasām //MU_5,64.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13115: putradāradarījīrṇaṃ magnonmagnaṃ kukardame / śrāntaṃ vigataviśrāmaṃ bhagnam ādīrghavartmani //MU_5,64.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13117: ākārabhāsuraṃ dīnaṃ vāhair ākrāntam indriyaiḥ / karmakarṇīrathākrāntaṃ tāntaṃ duṣkṛtatāḍanaiḥ //MU_5,64.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13119: nijānarthaskhadāmagnaṃ sīdamānam akiñcanam / sannāṅgaṃ karmabhāreṇa karuṇākrandakāriṇam //MU_5,64.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13120: rāma jīvabalīvardam imaṃ saṃsārapalvalāt / paramaṃ yatnam āsthāya ciram uttārayed balāt //MU_5,64.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13121: tattvāvalokanāt kṣīṇe citte no jāyate punaḥ / jīvaḥ kadācana tadā bhavet tīrṇabhavārṇavaḥ //MU_5,64.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13122: mahānubhāvasamparkāt saṃsārārṇavalaṅghane / yuktis samprāpyate rāma dṛḍhā naur iva nāvikāt //MU_5,64.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13123: yasmin deśamarau rāma nāsti sajjanapādapaḥ / saphalaś śītalacchāyo na tatra nivased budhaḥ //MU_5,64.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13124: snigdhaśītavacaḥpattre sacchāye smitapuṣpite / kṣaṇād viśramyate rāma bhṛśaṃ sujanaṣaṇḍake //MU_5,64.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13125: tadabhāve mahāmohadāhasantatidāyini / kiñcijjātavivekena svaptavyaṃ neha dhīmatā //MU_5,64.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13126: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmanātmānam uddharet / nātmānam avalepena janmapaṅkārṇave kṣipet //MU_5,64.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13127: kim idaṃ katham āyātaṃ kimmūlaṃ kimapakṣayam / dehaduḥkham iti prājñaiḥ prekṣaṇīyaṃ prayatnataḥ //MU_5,64.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13128: na dhanāni na mitrāṇi na śāstrāṇi na bandhavaḥ / narāṇām upakurvanti magnasvātmasamuddhṛtau //MU_5,64.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13129: manomātreṇa suhṛdā sadaiva sahavāsinā / saha kiñcit parāmṛśya bhavaty ātmā samuddhṛtaḥ //MU_5,64.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13130: vairāgyābhyāsayatnābhyāṃ svaparāmarśajanmanā / tattvālokena potena tīryate bhavasāgaraḥ //MU_5,64.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13131: śocyamānaṃ janair nityaṃ dahyamānaṃ durāśayā / nātmānam avamanyeta proddhared enam ādarāt //MU_5,64.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13132: ahaṅkāramahālānaṃ tṛṣṇārajjuṃ manomadam / janmajambālanirmagnaṃ jīvadantinam uddharet //MU_5,64.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13133: ayam etāvataivātmā trāto bhavati rāghava / yad apāsya vimūḍhatvam ahaṅkāraḥ pramārjyate //MU_5,64.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13134: etāvataiva sanmārgo yāti prakaṭatām alam / yad apāsya manomoham ahambhāvo vilīyate //MU_5,64.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13135: etāvataiva deveśaḥ paramātmāvagamyate / kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamatvena deho yad avalokyate //MU_5,64.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13136: ahaṅkārāmbude kṣīṇe dṛśyate ciddivākaraḥ / tatas tatpariṇāmena tat padaṃ samavāpyate //MU_5,64.45//
GSP27moksop_u:13137: yathā dhvāntasamucchede svayam ālokavedanam / tathāhaṅkāravicchede svayam ātmāvalokanam //MU_5,64.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13138: ahaṅkārasamucchede yāvasthā susamodayā / sā parā bharitākārā sā sarvavyāpinī citiḥ //MU_5,64.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13139: paripūrṇārṇavaprakhyā na vāggocaram eti naḥ / nopamānam upādatte nānudhāvati rañjanam //MU_5,64.48//
GSP27moksop_u:13140: kevalaṃ citprakāśāṃśakalitā sthiratāṃ gatā / turyā cet prāpyate dṛṣṭis tat tayā sopamīyate //MU_5,64.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13141: adūragatasādṛśyā suṣuptasyopalakṣyate / sāvasthā bharitākārā gaganaśrīr ivāmbudheḥ //MU_5,64.50//
GSP27moksop_u:13142: mano'haṅkāravilaye sarvabhāvāntarasthitā / samudeti parānandā yā tanuḥ pārameśvarī //MU_5,64.51//
GSP27moksop_u:13143: sā svayaṃ yogasaṃsiddhyā suṣuptādūrabhāvinī / na gamyā vacasāṃ rāma hṛdy evehānubhūyate //MU_5,64.52//
GSP27moksop_u:13144: akhilam idam anantam ātmatattvaṃ dṛḍhapariṇāmini cetasi sthite 'ntaḥ / bahir upaśamite carācarātmā svayam anubhūyata eva devadevaḥ //MU_5,64.53//
GSP27moksop_u:13145: tadanu viṣayavāsanāvināśas tadanu śubhaḥ paramasphuṭaḥ prakāśaḥ / tadanu ca samatāvaśāt svarūpe pariṇamanaṃ mahatām acintyarūpe //MU_5,64.54//
GSP27moksop_u:13148: vasiṣṭhaḥ: manasaiva manaś chittvā yady ātmā nāvalokyate / mamety aham iti tyaktvā tat tāmarasalocana //MU_5,65.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13149: nāstam eti jagadduḥkhaṃ yathā citragato raviḥ / āpad āyāty anantatvaṃ mahārṇavavad ātatā //MU_5,65.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13150: punaḥ punar upāyāti jaḍakallolakāriṇī / meghanīlataruśyāmā saṃsṛtiprāvṛḍ ākulā //MU_5,65.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13151: atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam / saṃvādaṃ suhṛdos sahyasānau bhāsavilāsayoḥ //MU_5,65.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13152: asty utsedhajitākāśaḥ pīṭhena jitabhūtalaḥ / talena jitapātālas trilokavijayī giriḥ //MU_5,65.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13154: muktāpaṭalasampūrṇair dhātupāṭalabhittibhiḥ / bhāsuraḥ kāñcanataṭaiḥ kaṭair iva suradvipaḥ //MU_5,65.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13155: kvacit puṣpabharāśāro dhātuśārataraḥ kvacit / kvacit phullasaraśśāro ratnaśāraśirāḥ kvacit //MU_5,65.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13156: ito raṭannirjharavān itaḥ kvaṇitakīcakaḥ / ito raṭadguhāvāta itaṣ ṣaṭpadaghuṅghumī //MU_5,65.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13157: sānau gītāpsarovṛndo vane mṛdukhagāravaḥ / adhityakāyāṃ mattābhro gahaneṣu mṛgāravī //MU_5,65.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13159: skandheṣu devair valitaḥ pādeṣu valito naraiḥ / pātāle valito nāgair jagadgeham ivāparam //MU_5,65.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13160: kandareṣu śritas siddhair nidhānair antar āśritaḥ / candaneṣu śrito nāgais siṃhaiś śṛṅgaśikhāsu ca //MU_5,65.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13162: dhātudhūlyabhrakapilo ratnopalatalasthitiḥ / sa dārujair iva surastrīgaṇair alam āśritaḥ //MU_5,65.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13167: brahmalokasamas svargaramyaś śivapuropamaḥ / atrer asty āśramaś śrīmān siddhaśramaharo mahān //MU_5,65.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13168: mahaty atryāśrame tasmiṃs tāpasau dvau babhūvatuḥ / kaucid eva nabhomārga iva śukrabṛhaspatī //MU_5,65.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13169: tayor athaikāspadayos tatrābhūtāṃ sutāv ubhau / kulāṅkurau śuddhatanū sarasvaty ambujāv iva //MU_5,65.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13170: vilāsabhāsanāmānau vṛddhim āyayatuḥ kramāt / tau pitroḥ pallavau śīghraṃ latāpādapayor iva //MU_5,65.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13171: āstām anyo'nyasuhṛdau susnigdhau vallabhau mithaḥ / tilatailavad āśliṣṭau tau puṣpāmodavat sthitau //MU_5,65.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13172: nābhūtāṃ viprayuktau tau suraktāv iva dampatī / ekaṃ dvitvam ivāpannaṃ samam āsīt tayor manaḥ //MU_5,65.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13173: tau tathānyo'nyamuditau manoharatarākṛtī / tasthatus svāśrame maune saroja iva ṣaṭpadau //MU_5,65.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13174: prāpatur yauvanaṃ bālyam utsṛjya janavallabhau / kālenālpatareṇaiva candrasūryāv ivoditau //MU_5,65.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13175: jagmatur deham utsṛjya tatas tau pitarau tayoḥ / svargaṃ jarārtāv uḍḍīya nīḍād iva vihaṅgamau //MU_5,65.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13176: pañcatvaṃ gatayoḥ pitror dīnavaktrau babhūvatuḥ / sannāṅgau vigatotsāhau padmāv iva jaloddhṛtau //MU_5,65.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13177: tatraurdhvadaihikaṃ kṛtvā cakrāte paridevanam / lokasthitir alaṅghyā hi mahatām api mānada //MU_5,65.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13178: kṛtvaurdhvadaihikam atho vyathayābhibhūtau śokotthayā karuṇam ārtagirā vilapya / citrārpitāv iva nirastasamastaceṣṭau tau saṃsthitau susamaśūnyahṛdādināntam //MU_5,65.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13181: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha śokaparābhūtau tasthatur dṛḍhatāpasau / tāpasaṃśuṣkasarvāṅgau tāv araṇyadrumāv iva //MU_5,66.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13182: viraktau vipine kālaṃ kṣapayām āsatur dvijau / viyūthāv iva sāraṅgāv anāsthām āgatau parām //MU_5,66.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13183: jagmur dināni māsāś ca varṣāṇy atha tayos tadā / kramāt tāv api saṃyātau jarāṃ śvabhradrumāv iva //MU_5,66.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13184: aprāptavimalajñānau cirāj jaraḍhatāpasau / tāv ekadā saṅghaṭitāv idam anyo'nyam ūcatuḥ //MU_5,66.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13185: vilāsaḥ: jīvitogradrumaphala madāśvāsāmṛtāmbudhe / jagaty asmin mahābandho bhāsa svāgatam astu te //MU_5,66.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13186: etāvatyo dināvalyo madviyogavatā tvayā / vada kva kṣapitās sādho kaccit te vimalaṃ tapaḥ //MU_5,66.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13187: kaccit te vijvarā buddhiḥ kaccij jātas tvam ātmavān / kaccit phalitavidyas tvaṃ kaccit kuśalavān asi //MU_5,66.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13188: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktavantaṃ saṃsārasamudvignam alaṃ tadā / prāhāprāptamahājñānaṃ suhṛt suhṛdam ādarāt //MU_5,66.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13189: bhāsaḥ: sādho svāgatam adyāṅga diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si mānada / kuśalaṃ tu kuto 'smākaṃ saṃsāre tiṣṭhatām iha //MU_5,66.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13190: yāvan nādhigataṃ jñeyaṃ yāvat kṣīṇā na cittabhūḥ / yāvat tīrṇaṃ na saṃsārāt tāvan me kuśalaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,66.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13191: yāvan nādhigataṃ jñānaṃ yāvan na samatoditā / yāvan nābhyudito bodhas tāvan naḥ kuśalaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,66.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13192: āśā yāvad aśeṣeṇa na lūnāś cittasambhavāḥ / vīrudho dātrakeṇeva tāvan naḥ kuśalaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,66.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13193: ātmalābhaṃ vinā sādho vinā jñānamahauṣadham / udeti punar eveyaṃ dussaṃsṛtiviṣūcikā //MU_5,66.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13195: kāyajīrṇataror asmād bāndhavākrandaṣaṭpadāt / jarāpuṣpasitodeti punar maraṇamañjarī //MU_5,66.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13196: bhuktaśuktartuvirasā purāṇadivasombhitā / nīyate nīrasaprāyā punas saṃvatsarāvalī //MU_5,66.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13197: mahādarīṣu dehādres tṛṣṇākaṇṭakitāsv ati / helāvyālāsu ca punaḥ kriyāsu parilupyate //MU_5,66.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13198: duḥkhais sukhalavākārair dīrghadīrghaiś śubhāśubhaiḥ / aparyastāgamaprāyāḥ prayānty āyānti rātrayaḥ //MU_5,66.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13199: ayathārthakriyārambhaiḥ kadāśāveśapallavaiḥ / kṣīyate karmabhis tucchair āyur āhatakartṛbhiḥ //MU_5,66.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13201: jihvādalalatālagnaḥ kāyadrumaguhālaye / yatracintāmaṇau vṛddho gardhagṛdhro vivardhate //MU_5,66.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13202: nīrasā nissukhā laghvī patatpelavagātrikā / jīrṇaparṇasavarṇeyaṃ kṣīyate divasāvalī //MU_5,66.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13203: apamānarajodhvastam astaṅgatavapuśśri ca / mukhaṃ dhūsaratām eti himaiḥ padmam ivāhatam //MU_5,66.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13204: śuṣyataḥ kāyasarasaḥ pragaladyauvanāmbhasaḥ / rājahaṃsaḥ kṣaṇād āyur anāvarti palāyate //MU_5,66.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13205: kālānilabaloddhūtāj jarjarāj jīvitadrumāt / bhogapuṣpāṇi divasaparṇāni nipatanty adhaḥ //MU_5,66.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13206: bhogabhogiśriteṣv antar duḥkhadarduravāriṣu / mano mohāndhakūpeṣu dūreṣu vinimajjati //MU_5,66.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13207: nānānurañjanā spaṣṭā tṛṣṇā taralapelavā / caityamagnapatākeva dūraṃ samadhirohati //MU_5,66.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13208: asya saṃsāratantrasya bṛhatkālabilāspadaḥ / jīvitāśāmayāṃs tantūn antakākhur nikṛntati //MU_5,66.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13211: anantā bandhujanatānadyo gambhīrakoṭare / ajasraṃ nipatanty etā vitate kālasāgare //MU_5,66.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13212: deharatnaśalākeyaṃ nāśapaṅkārṇavodare / na jñāyate kva magneti tāta janmani janmani //MU_5,66.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13213: cintācakre ciraṃ cañcaccakrikācāracañcure / ceto bhramati sāmudre gartāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_5,66.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13214: uhyamānam ananteṣu cetaḥ kāryamahormiṣu / kṣaṇam eti na viśrāmaṃ cintātāṇḍavitāśayam //MU_5,66.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13215: idaṃ kṛtaṃ karomīdaṃ kariṣyāmīdam ity alam / kalanājālavalitā mūrchitā matipakṣiṇī //MU_5,66.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13216: ayaṃ suhṛd ayaṃ śatrur iti dvandvamahāmayaḥ / vinikṛntati marmāṇi navānīvotpalāni me //MU_5,66.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13217: cintātuṇḍyā madāvartavīcyaikanicayaṃ caran / kṣaṇād ucchūnatām eti mānamīnaḥ kṣaṇāt kṣatim //MU_5,66.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13218: anātmīyāni duḥkhāni bahūny evaṃvidhāny alam / ātmabuddhyā vicinvāno jano gacchati dīnatām //MU_5,66.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13219: bahuvidhasukhaduḥkhamadhyapātī vitatajarāmaraṇaprapātabhagnaḥ / jagadudaragirau luṭhañ jano 'yaṃ gatarasaparṇavad eti jarjaratvam //MU_5,66.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13222: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ tau kuśalapraśnaṃ kṛtavantau parasparam / kālenāsādya vimalaṃ jñānaṃ mokṣaṃ tato gatau //MU_5,67.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13223: ato vacmi mahābāho yathā jñānetarā gatiḥ / nāsti saṃsārataraṇe pāśabaddhasya cetasaḥ //MU_5,67.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13224: idaṃ bhavyamater duḥkham anantam api pelavam / kukhagasyātaro 'mbhodhis sarpārer goṣpadāyate //MU_5,67.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13225: dehātītā mahātmānaś cinmātre svātmani sthitāḥ / dūrad dehaṃ hasanti svaṃ prekṣyārko janatām iva //MU_5,67.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13226: dehe duḥkhini saṅkṣubdhe kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā / rathe vidhurite bhagne sāratheḥ keva khaṇḍanā //MU_5,67.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13227: manasi kṣubdhatāṃ yāte cittvasyāṅga kim āgatam / taraṅge rajasā mlāne vaiparītyaṃ kim ambudheḥ //MU_5,67.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13228: ke bhavanty ayasāṃ haṃsāḥ payasām upalāś ca ke / kāś śilāḥ kila dārūṇāṃ ke bhogāḥ paramātmanaḥ //MU_5,67.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13229: sambandhaḥ ka ivāgrāśāśailāparasamudrayoḥ / antare dūrasambādhe kaś ca cittattvabandhayoḥ //MU_5,67.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13230: apy utsaṅgohyamānāni kāṣṭhāni saridambhasām / kāni nāma bhavantīha śarīrāṇi tathātmanaḥ //MU_5,67.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13231: saṅghaṭṭāt kāṣṭhapayasāṃ yathottuṅgāḥ kaṇādayaḥ / dehātmanos samāyogāt tathaitāś cittavṛttayaḥ //MU_5,67.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13232: sambandhād dārupayasāṃ pratibimbāni dārutaḥ / yathā payasi lakṣyante śarīrāṇi tathātmani //MU_5,67.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13233: yathā darpaṇavāryādau pratibimbāni vastutaḥ / nāsatyāni na satyāni śarīrāṇi tathātmani //MU_5,67.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13234: dāruvāryupalāsphoṭe duḥkhitā na yathā kvacit / saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu na tathā pañcasu kṣatiḥ //MU_5,67.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13235: dārusaṃvellitāt toyāt kampaśabdādayo yathā / prajāyante tathaivāsmād dehāc citparibodhitāt //MU_5,67.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13236: na buddhajaḍayor etās saṃvidaś ciccharīrayoḥ / etā hy ajñānamātrasya tasmin naṣṭe tad eva tāḥ //MU_5,67.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13237: yathā na kasyacid dāruvāriśleṣe 'nubhūtayaḥ / tathā na kasyacid dehadehisaṅge 'nubhūtayaḥ //MU_5,67.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13238: ajñasyāyaṃ yathā dṛṣṭas saṃsāras satyatāṃ gataḥ / tajjñasyāyaṃ tathā naṣṭas saṃsāro 'satyatāṃ gataḥ //MU_5,67.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13239: antassaṅgavihīnās te yathā snehā dṛṣattale / tathāsaktamanovṛttau bāhyābhogānubhūtayaḥ //MU_5,67.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13240: antassaṅgena rahito yadvat salilakāṣṭhayoḥ / sambandhas tadvad evāntar asaṅgo dehadehinoḥ //MU_5,67.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13241: antassaṅgena rahitas sambandho jalakāṣṭhayoḥ / jñadehadehinoś caiva pratibimbāmbhasos tathā //MU_5,67.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13242: sthitā sarvatra saṃvittiś śuddhā saṃvedyavarjitā / dvitvopalāñchitā tv anyā dussaṃvittir na vidyate //MU_5,67.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13243: aduḥkham eti duḥkhatvam antassaṃvedanāt sphuṭam / sthāṇur bhavati vetālo vetālatvena bhāvitaḥ //MU_5,67.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13244: asambandho hi sambandho bhavaty antarviniścayāt / svapnāṅganāsuratavat sthāṇuvetālabhaṅgavat //MU_5,67.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13245: asatprāyo hi sambandho yathā salilakāṣṭhayoḥ / tathaiva mithyā sambandhaś śarīraparamātmanoḥ //MU_5,67.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13246: antassaṅgaṃ vinā nāmbu kāṣṭhāghātaiḥ pramuhyate / ātmāntassaṅgarahito dehaduḥkhair na dahyate //MU_5,67.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13247: dehabhāvanayaivātmā dehaduḥkhavaśe sthitaḥ / tattyāgena tato mukto bhavatīti vidur budhāḥ //MU_5,67.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13248: antassaṅgavihīnatvād duḥkhavanty aṅga no yathā / pattrāmbūpaladārūṇi śliṣṭāny api parasparam //MU_5,67.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13249: antassaṅgena rahitā yānti nirduḥkhatāṃ parām / śliṣṭā api tathaivātmā dehendriyamanāṃsy alam //MU_5,67.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13250: antassaṅgo hi saṃsāre sarveṣāṃ nāma dehinām / jarāmaraṇamohānāṃ tarūṇāṃ bījakāraṇam //MU_5,67.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13251: antassaṃsaṅgavāñ jantur magnas saṃsārasāgare / antassaṃsaṅgamuktas tu tīrṇas saṃsārasāgarāt //MU_5,67.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13252: antassaṃsaṅgavac cittaṃ śataśākham ihocyate / antassaṃsaṅgarahitaṃ vilīnaṃ cittam ucyate //MU_5,67.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13253: bhagnasphaṭikavad viddhi manas saktam apāvanam / abhagnasphaṭikābhāsam asaktaṃ viddhi vai manaḥ //MU_5,67.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13254: asaktaṃ nirmalaṃ cittaṃ muktaṃ saṃsāry api sphuṭam / saktaṃ tu dīrghatapasā yuktam apy atibandhavat //MU_5,67.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13255: antassaktaṃ mano baddhaṃ muktaṃ saktivivarjitam / antassaṃsaktir evaikaṃ kāraṇaṃ bandhamokṣayoḥ //MU_5,67.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13256: antassaṃsaktimuktasya kurvato 'pi na kartṛtā / sukhaduḥkhavati svapne sambhramonmukhatā yathā //MU_5,67.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13257: citte kartari kartṛtvam adehasyāpi vidyate / svapnādāv iva vikṣubdhasukhaduḥkhadaśāmayam //MU_5,67.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13258: akartari manasy antar akartṛtvaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavet / śūnyacitto hi puruṣaḥ kurvann api na cetati //MU_5,67.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13259: cetasā kṛtam āpnoṣi cetasā na kṛtaṃ na tu / na kvacit kāraṇaṃ deho na cittam api kartṛ vai //MU_5,67.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13260: asaṃsaktam akartr eva kurvad eva mano viduḥ / na karmaphalabhoktṛtvam asaktaṃ pratipadyate //MU_5,67.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13261: brahmahatyāśvamedhābhyām asaṃsakto na lipyate / dūrasthakāntāsaṃsaktamanāḥ kāryair ivāgragaiḥ //MU_5,67.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13262: antassaṃsaktinirmukto jīvo madhuravṛttimān / bahiḥ kurvann akurvan vā kartā bhoktā na hi kvacit //MU_5,67.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13263: antassaṃsaktimuktaṃ yan manas syāt tad akartṛkam / tad viyuktaṃ praśāntaṃ tat tad yuktaṃ tad alepakam //MU_5,67.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13264: tat syāt sarvapadārthānāṃ śliṣṭānāṃ niścitaṃ bahiḥ / sarvaduḥkhakarīṃ krūrām antassaktiṃ vivarjayet //MU_5,67.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13265: virahitam alam antassaṅgadoṣeṇa cetaś śamam upagatam ādyaṃ vyomavan nirmalābham / sakalakalanamuktenātmanaikatvam eti sthiram alinibham ambho vāriṇīvālinīle //MU_5,67.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13268: rāmaḥ: kīdṛśo bhagavan saṅgaḥ kaś ca bandhāya vai nṛṇām / kaś ca mokṣāya kathitaḥ kathaṃ caiṣa cikitsyate //MU_5,68.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13269: vasiṣṭhaḥ: dehadehivibhāgaikaparityāge na bhāvanā / dehamātre tu viśvāsas saṅgo bandhārha ucyate //MU_5,68.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13270: anantasyātmatattvasya saparyantaviniścaye / yat sukhārthitvam antas sa saṅgo bandhārha ucyate //MU_5,68.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13271: sarvam ātmedam akhilaṃ kiṃ vāñchāmi tyajāmi kim / ity asaṅgasthitiṃ viddhi jīvanmuktatanusthitām //MU_5,68.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13272: nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti mā bhavantu bhavantu vā / sukhāny asakta ity antaḥ kathyate muktibhāṅ naraḥ //MU_5,68.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13273: nābhinandati naiṣkarmyaṃ na karmaprakṛtehitaḥ / susamo yaḥ phalatyāgī so 'saṃsakta iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,68.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13274: ātmatattvaikaniṣṭhasya harṣāmarṣavaśaṃ manaḥ / yasya nāyāty asakto 'sau jīvanmuktaś ca kathyate //MU_5,68.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13275: sarvakarmaphalādīnāṃ manasaiva na karmaṇā / nipuṇaṃ yaḥ parityāgas so 'saṃsaṅga iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,68.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13276: asaṃsaṅgena sakalāś ceṣṭā nānāvijṛmbhitāḥ / cikitsitā bhavanty aṅga śreyas sampādayanti ca //MU_5,68.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13277: saṃsaktivaśatas sarve vitatā duḥkharāśayaḥ / prayānti śataśākhatvaṃ śvabhrakaṇṭakavṛkṣavat //MU_5,68.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13278: rajjukṛṣṭaghanaghrāṇo yad gantryāḥ pathi gardabhaḥ / bhāraṃ vahati bhītātmā tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13279: śītavātātapakleśam ekadeśaniṣaṇṇayā / tarur vahati yat tanvā tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13280: dharāvivaranirmagno yat kīṭaḥ pīḍitāṅgakaḥ / kṣiṇoti vikalaḥ kālaṃ tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13281: dūrvāṅkuratṛṇāhāraḥ kirātaśarapīḍayā / jahāti yan mṛgo dehaṃ tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13282: vīruttṛṇadaśāṃ yātā lūyante yat punaḥ punaḥ / nānāvigatasañcārās tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13283: rasātalarasāyogāt tṛṇagulmalatādayaḥ / janayanti yad ākāraṃ tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13284: utpatyotpatya līyante taraṅgiṇi taraṅgavat / bhūtāni yad anantāni tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13285: śāntaivānantasaṅkāśā padārthaśatasaṅkulā / yat saṃsāranadī mattā tat saṃsaktivijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13286: saktir hi dvividhā proktā vandhyā vandyā ca rāghava / vandhyā sarvatra mūḍhānāṃ vandyā tattvavidāṃ nijā //MU_5,68.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13287: ātmatattvāvabodhena hīnā dehādivastujā / bhūyassaṃsāradā saktir dṛḍhā vandhyeti kathyate //MU_5,68.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13288: ātmatattvāvabodhena satyabhūtā vivekajā / vandyā hi kathyate saktir bhūyassaṃsāravarjitā //MU_5,68.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13289: śaṅkhacakragadāhasto deho vividhayehayā / vandyasaṃsaktivaśataḥ paripāti jagattrayam //MU_5,68.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13290: anārataṃ nirālambe vyomavartmani pānthatām / vandyasaṃsaktivaśataḥ karoti ravir anvaham //MU_5,68.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13291: mahākalpasamādhānadhīrakalpitakalpanam / vandyasaṃsaktivaśato brāhmaṃ sphurati vai vapuḥ //MU_5,68.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13292: līlayā lalanālānanilīnaṃ bhūtibhūṣitam / vandyasaṃsaktivaśataś śarīraṃ śāṅkaraṃ sthitam //MU_5,68.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13293: vijñātagatayas siddhā lokapālās tathetare / vandyasaṃsaktivaśatas tiṣṭhanti jagatāṃ gaṇe //MU_5,68.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13294: dhatte śarīrayantraugham anyeyaṃ bhūtasantatiḥ / vandhyasaṃsaktivaśato jarāmṛtivivartitam //MU_5,68.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13295: manaḥ patati bhogeṣu gṛdhro māṃsalaveṣv iva / vandhyasaktivaśād eva vyarthayā rasyaśaṅkayā //MU_5,68.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13296: saṃsaktivaśato vāti vāyur bhuvanakoṭare / pañcabhūtāni tiṣṭhanti vahatīyaṃ jagatsthitiḥ //MU_5,68.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13297: divi devā bhuvi narāḥ pātāle bhogino 'surāḥ / brahmāṇḍodumbaraphale sphuranmaṣakavat sthitāḥ //MU_5,68.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13298: jāyante ca mriyante ca nipatanty utpatanti ca / bhūtāny avirataṃ bhūyo nirjharāmbukaṇā iva //MU_5,68.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13299: parasparanigīrṇāṅgī janatā jāḍyajarjarā / sambhrāntā prabhramaty aṅga śīrṇaṃ parṇam ivāmbare //MU_5,68.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13300: nakṣatracakraṃ gagane kṣamāmaṣakasantatam / sphuraty āvartavṛttyaiva pātālagajalaughavat //MU_5,68.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13301: pātotpātadaśājīrṇaṃ kālabālakakandukam / adyāpi na jahātīndur jaḍimnā malinaṃ vapuḥ //MU_5,68.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13302: nānāyugaparāvartaduḥkhālokanakarkaśam / na lunāti manaṣṣaṇḍaṃ divi gīrvāṇamaṇḍalam //MU_5,68.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13303: vāsanāmātravaśataḥ pare vyomani kenacit / idam āracitaṃ citraṃ vicitraṃ paśya rāghava //MU_5,68.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13304: manassaṅgaikaraṅgeṇa śūnye vyomni jaganmayam / yad idaṃ racitaṃ citraṃ na tat satyaṃ kadācana //MU_5,68.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13305: saṃsaktamanasām asmin saṃsāre vyavahāriṇām / atti tṛṣṇā śarīrāṇi tṛṇāny agniśikhā yathā //MU_5,68.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13306: parisaktamater dehān sikatāḥ patyur ambhasām / kaś śaktaḥ parisaṅkhyātuṃ paramāṇugaṇaṃ tathā //MU_5,68.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13307: muktālatāyā gaṅgāyā meror āpādamastakam / taraṅgamuktā gaṇyante na dehās saktacetasaḥ //MU_5,68.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13308: saṃsaktacittam āyānti sarvā duḥkhaparamparāḥ / jaḍakallolavalitā mahānadya ivāmbudhim //MU_5,68.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13310: saktacittaṃ janaṃ duḥkhaśuṣkam indhanasañcayam / jvalatāṃ narakāgnīnāṃ viddhi tena jvalanti te //MU_5,68.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13311: duḥkhajālam idaṃ rāma yat kiñcij jagatīgatam / saṃsaktamanasām arthe tat sarvaṃ parikalpitam //MU_5,68.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13312: manassaṃsaṅgadharmiṇyā bhārabhūtaśarīrayā / kṣayodayadaśārthinyā sarvaṃ tatam avidyayā //MU_5,68.45//
GSP27moksop_u:13313: asaṃsaṅgena bhogānāṃ sarvā rāma vibhūtayaḥ / paraṃ vistāram āyānti prāvṛṣīva mahāpagāḥ //MU_5,68.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13314: antassaṃsaṅgam aṅgānām aṅgāraṃ viddhi rāghava / anantassaṅgam aṅgānāṃ viddhi rāma rasāyanam //MU_5,68.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13315: saṃsaṅgenāntarasthena dahyate prakṛtis svayam / svaphalotthenaiḍakākṣī pāvakena yathauṣadhiḥ //MU_5,68.48//
GSP27moksop_u:13316: sarvatrāsaktam āśaktam anantam iva saṃsthitam / asaṅkalpaṃ sadābhāsaṃ sukhāyaiva mano bhavet //MU_5,68.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13317: vidyādṛśi prodayam āgatena kṣayaṃ tv avidyāviṣayaṃ gatena / sarvatra saṃsaktivivarjitena svacetasā tiṣṭhati yas sa muktaḥ //MU_5,68.50//
GSP27moksop_u:13320: vasiṣṭhaḥ: sarvadā sarvasaṃsthena sarveṇa saha tiṣṭhatā / sarvakarmaratenāpi manaḥ kāryaṃ vijānatā //MU_5,69.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13321: na saktam iha cintāsu na ceṣṭāsu na vastuṣu / nākāśe nāpy adhobhāge na dikṣu na latāsu ca //MU_5,69.2//
