GSP27moksop_u:13322: na bahir vipulābhoge na caivendriyavṛttiṣu / nābhyantare na ca prāṇe na mūrdhani na tāluni //MU_5,69.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13323: na bhrūmadhye na nāsānte na mukhe na khatārake / nāndhakāre na cābhāse na cāsmin hṛdayāmbare //MU_5,69.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13324: na jāgrati na ca svapne na suṣupte na nirmale / nāsite na ca vā pīte raktādau śabale 'pi ca //MU_5,69.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13325: na sthire na cale nādau na madhye netaratra ca / na dūre nāntike nāṅge na padārthe na cātmani //MU_5,69.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13326: na śabdasparśarūpeṣu na mohānandavṛttiṣu / na gamāgamaceṣṭāsu na kālakalanāsu ca //MU_5,69.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13327: kevalaṃ citi viśramya kiñcic cetyāvalambataḥ / sarvatra nīrasam iva tiṣṭhatv ātmarasaṃ manaḥ //MU_5,69.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13328: tatrastho vigatāsaṅgo jīvo 'jīvatvam āgataḥ / vyavahāram imaṃ sarvaṃ mā karotu karotu vā //MU_5,69.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13329: akurvan vāpi kurvan vā jīvas svātmaratikriyām / kriyāphalair na sambandham āyāti kham ivāmbudaiḥ //MU_5,69.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13330: atha vā tam api tyaktvā cetyāṃśaṃ śāntacidghanaḥ / jīvas tiṣṭhatu saṃśāntaṃ jvalan maṇir ivātmani //MU_5,69.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13331: nirvāṇam ātmani gatas satatoditātmā jīvo bhuvi vyavaharann api rāmabhadra / nāsaṅgam eti gatasaṅgatayā phalena karmodbhavena hasatīva ca deham ārāt //MU_5,69.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13334: vasiṣṭhaḥ: asaṃsaṅgasukhadhyānasaṃsthitair viditātmabhiḥ / vyavahāribhir apy antar vītaśokair avasthitam //MU_5,70.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13335: prakṣubdhākṣubdhadehasya visaṃvedanasaṃvidaḥ / antaḥpūrṇasya vadane śrīr indor iva lakṣyate //MU_5,70.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13336: cetyahīnacidālambi mano yasya gatajvaram / tenāmbu katakeneva janatā samprasīdati //MU_5,70.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13337: nityam ātmadṛgālīno jñas svasthaś cañcalo 'pi san / kṣubdho dṛśyata evāsau pratibimbārkavan mudhā //MU_5,70.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13338: ātmārāmā mahātmānaḥ prabuddhāḥ paramodayāḥ / bahiḥ piñchāgrataralā antar merur ivācalāḥ //MU_5,70.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13339: cittam ātmatvam āyātaṃ sukhaduḥkhānurañjanām / nopaiti raṅgasaṃyogaṃ masṛṇas sphaṭiko yathā //MU_5,70.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13340: saṃsāradṛṣṭir uditā jñātalokaparāvaram / na rañjayati saccittaṃ jalalekhā yathāmbujam //MU_5,70.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13341: ātmadhyānamayo 'dhyānī prabodhaṃ param āgataḥ / kalanāmalanirmuktas tv asakta iti kathyate //MU_5,70.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13342: ātmārāmatayā jīvo yāty asaṃsaktatām iha / ātmajñānena saṃsaṅgas tanutām eti nānyathā //MU_5,70.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13343: jāgraty eva suṣuptastho jīvo bhavati rāghava / asyāṃ dṛśi gatadvandvo nityānastamayodayaḥ //MU_5,70.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13344: atra prauḍhim upāyātas turyatām eti pāvanīm / pariṇāmavaśād indur amāvasyārkatām iva //MU_5,70.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13345: cittve cetyadaśāhīne yā sthitiḥ kṣīṇacetasaḥ / socyate śāntakalanā jāgraty eva suṣuptatā //MU_5,70.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13346: tāṃ ca suptadaśām etya jīvan vyavaharan naraḥ / sukhaduḥkhavaratrābhir na kadācana kṛṣyate //MU_5,70.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13347: jāgraty eva suṣuptastho yaḥ karoti jagatkriyām / taṃ yantraputrakam iva nāyāti sukhaduḥkhadṛk //MU_5,70.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13348: cittasya bādhikā saktir bhāvābhāvopatāpadā / ātmatām āgate citte kasya kiṃ bādhate katham //MU_5,70.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13349: suṣuptabuddhiḥ karmāṇi pūrvahevākahelayā / kurvan na badhyate jīvo jīvanmuktatayā sthitaḥ //MU_5,70.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13350: sauṣuptīṃ vṛttim āśritya kuru mā kuru vānagha / karma prakṛtihevākavaśād upagataṃ svakam //MU_5,70.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13351: nādānaṃ na parityāgaḥ karmaṇo jñāya rocate / tiṣṭhanty adhigatātmāno yathāprāptānuvartinaḥ //MU_5,70.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13352: kurvann api na kartāsi suṣuptaikasthayā dhiyā / akartāpi ca kartāsi yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,70.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13353: yathā na kiñcit kalayan mañcake spandate śiśuḥ / tathā phalādy akalayan kuru karmāṇi rāghava //MU_5,70.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13354: acetyacitpadasthatvāj jāgraty api suṣuptadhīḥ / yad yat karoti labdhātmā tasmiṃs tasya na kartṛtā //MU_5,70.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13355: daśām āsādya sauṣuptīṃ svavidaiva vivāsanaḥ / antaśśītalatām eti jño rasena yathā śaśī //MU_5,70.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13356: suṣuptastho mahātejā ghūrṇan pūrṇendubimbavat / samas sarvāsv avasthāsu bhavaty adrir yathartuṣu //MU_5,70.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13357: suṣuptasaṃstho dhīrātmā bahir āyāti lolatām / kriyāsu nāntar bhūkampapraspandita ivācalaḥ //MU_5,70.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13358: suṣuptāvasthito bhūtvā dehaṃ vigatakalmaṣaḥ / ghātayāśv atha vā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ dhāraya śailavat //MU_5,70.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13359: eṣaiva rāma sauṣuptī sthitir abhyāsayogataḥ / prauḍhā satī turyam iti kathitā tattvakovidaiḥ //MU_5,70.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13360: ānandamaya evātra prakṣīṇasakalāmayaḥ / atyantāstaṅgatamanā bhavati jño mahodayaḥ //MU_5,70.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13361: atrastho jñaḥ pramuditaḥ paramānandaghūrṇitaḥ / līlām ivemāṃ racanāṃ sāṃsārīm anupaśyati //MU_5,70.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13362: vītaśokabhayāyāso gatasaṃsārasambhramaḥ / turyāvasthām upārūḍho bhūyaḥ patati nātmavān //MU_5,70.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13363: prāptuṃ svāṃ padavīṃ puṇyāṃ yatnavantam imaṃ janam / śailasaṃstha ivādhassthaṃ hasan paśyati dhīradhīḥ //MU_5,70.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13364: asyāṃ tu turyāvasthāyāṃ sthitiṃ prāpyāvināśinīm / ānandaikāntalīnatvād anānandapadaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,70.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13365: anānandamahānandaḥ kalātītas tato 'pi hi / mukta ity ucyate yogī turyātītapadaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,70.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13366: parigalitasamastajanmapāśas sakalavihīnamanomayābhimānaḥ / paramarasamayīṃ prayāti sattāṃ jalagatasaindhavakhaṇḍavan mahātmā //MU_5,70.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13369: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yāvat turyaparāmarśas tāvat kevalatāpadam / jīvanmuktasya viṣayo vacasāṃ ca raghūdvaha //MU_5,71.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13370: ata ūrdhvaṃ sadehānāṃ muktānāṃ vacasāṃ tathā / viṣayo na mahābāho puruṣāṇāṃ ivāmbaram //MU_5,71.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13371: sā hi viśrāntipadavī dūrebhyo 'pi davīyasī / gamyā videhamuktānāṃ khalekheva nabhasvatām //MU_5,71.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13372: suṣuptāvasthayā kañcit kālaṃ bhuktvā jagatsthitim / turyatām etya tadanu paramānandaghūrṇitāḥ //MU_5,71.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13373: turyātītāṃ daśāṃ tajjñā yathā yānty ātmakovidāḥ / tathādhigaccha nirdvandvaṃ padaṃ raghukulodvaha //MU_5,71.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13374: suṣuptāvasthayā rāma bhava saṃvyavahāravān / citrendor iva te na staḥ kṣayodvegāv arindama //MU_5,71.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13375: śarīrasanniveśasya kṣaye sthairye ca saṃvidam / mā gṛhāṇa bhramo hy eṣa śarīram iti jṛmbhate //MU_5,71.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13376: dehanāśena ko 'rthas te ko 'rthas te dehasaṃsthayā / bhava tvaṃ prakṛtārambhas tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsthitam //MU_5,71.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13377: jñātavān asi tat satyaṃ buddhavān asi tat padam / prāptavān asi rūpaṃ svaṃ viśoko bhava bhūtaye //MU_5,71.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13378: īpsitānīpsitatyaktaś śītalālokaśobhayā / andhakārātapāmbhodamuktaṃ kham iva śobhase //MU_5,71.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13379: manas tavātmā sampannaṃ nādhas samanudhāvati / yogamantratapassiddhaḥ puruṣaḥ khād ivāvanim //MU_5,71.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13380: iha śuddhā cid evāsti pārāvāravivarjitā / ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti te māstu vibhramaḥ //MU_5,71.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13381: ātmeti vyavahārārtham abhidhā kalpitā vibhoḥ / nāmarūpādibhedās tu dūram asmād alaṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,71.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13382: jalam eva yathāmbhodhir na taraṅgādikaṃ pṛthak / ātmaivedaṃ tathā sarvaṃ na bhūtaughādikaṃ pṛthak //MU_5,71.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13383: yathā samastāj jaladher jalād anyan na labhyate / tathaiva jagatas sphārād ātmano 'nyan na labhyate //MU_5,71.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13384: ayaṃ so 'ham iti prājña kva karoṣi vyavasthitim / kiṃ tat tvaṃ kiṃ ca vā te syāt kiṃ na tvaṃ kiṃ ca vā na te //MU_5,71.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13385: na dvitvam asti no dehas sambandho na ca taiś citaḥ / sambhavaty akalaṅkāyā bhānor iva tamaḥpaṭaiḥ //MU_5,71.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13386: dvitvam abhyupagamyāpi kathayāmi tavārihan / dehādibhis sadbhir api na sambandho vibhor bhavet //MU_5,71.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13387: chāyātapaprasarayoḥ prakāśatamasor yathā / na sambhavati sambandhas tathā vai dehadehinoḥ //MU_5,71.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13388: yathā śītoṣṇayor nityaṃ parasparaviruddhayoḥ / na sambhavati sambandho rāma dehātmanos tathā //MU_5,71.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13389: avinābhāvitārthas tu sambandhaḥ katham etayoḥ / jaḍacetanayor dehadehinor anubhūyate //MU_5,71.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13390: cinmātreṇātmanā dehas sambaddha iti yā kathā / saiṣā duravabodhotthā dāvāgnau jaladhīr yathā //MU_5,71.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13391: satyāvalokanenaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir vinaśyati / avalokanayā samyag ātape jaladhīr yathā //MU_5,71.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13392: cidātmā nirmalo nityas svāvabhāso nirāmayaḥ / dehas tv anityo malavāṃs tena sambadhyate katham //MU_5,71.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13393: spandam āyāti vātena bhūtair āpīvarīkṛtaḥ / dehas tena na sambandho manāg eva mahātmanaḥ //MU_5,71.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13394: siddhe dvitve 'pi dehasya na sambandhasya sambhavaḥ / dvitvāsiddhau tu sumate kalanaivedṛśī kutaḥ //MU_5,71.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13395: ity etad eva tat satyam atraivāṅga sthitiṃ kuru / na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti kadācit kasyacit kvacit //MU_5,71.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13396: sarvam ātmamayaṃ śāntam ity eva pratyayaṃ sphuṭam / sabāhyābhyantaraṃ rāma sarvatra dṛḍhatāṃ naya //MU_5,71.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13397: sukhī duḥkhī ca mūḍho 'smīty etā durdṛṣṭayas smṛtāḥ / āsu ced vastubuddhis te tac ciraṃ duḥkham eṣyasi //MU_5,71.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13398: yaḥ kramaś śailatṛṇayoḥ kauśeyopalayos tathā / sāmyaṃ prati sa evoktaḥ paramātmaśarīrayoḥ //MU_5,71.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13399: yathā śītoṣṇayor aikyaṃ kathāsv api na dṛśyate / jaḍaprakāśayoś śleṣo na tathātmaśarīrayoḥ //MU_5,71.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13400: yathā tejastimirayor na sambandho na tulyatā / atyantabhinnayo rāma tathā hy ātmaśarīrayoḥ //MU_5,71.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13401: dehaś calati vātena tenaivāyāti gacchati / śabdaṃ karoti tenaiva dehanāḍīvilāsinā //MU_5,71.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13402: śabdaḥ kacaṭataprāyas sphuraty antas samīraṇe / yathā prajāyate vaṃśād deharandhrāt tathaiva hi //MU_5,71.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13403: kanīnikāparispandaś cakṣusspandaś ca mārutāt / indriyasphuraṇaṃ caiva saṃvit kevalam ātmanaḥ //MU_5,71.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13404: ākāśopalakuḍyādau sarvatrātmadaśā sthitā / pratibimbam ivādarśe citta eva ca dṛśyate //MU_5,71.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13405: śarīrālayam utsṛjya yatra cittavihaṅgamaḥ / svavāsanāvaśād yāti tatraivātmānubhūyate //MU_5,71.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13406: yatra puṣpaṃ tatra gandhasaṃvidas saṃsthitā yathā / yatra cittaṃ hi tatrātmasaṃvidas saṃsthitās tathā //MU_5,71.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13407: sarvatra sthitam ākāśam ādarśe pratibimbate / yathā tathātmā sarvatra sthitaś cetasi dṛśyate //MU_5,71.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13408: apām avanataṃ sthānam āspadaṃ bhūtale yathā / antaḥkaraṇam evātmasaṃvidām āspadaṃ tathā //MU_5,71.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13409: satyāsatyaṃ jagadrūpam antaḥkaraṇabimbitā / ātmasaṃvit tanotīdam ālokam iva sūryabhāḥ //MU_5,71.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13410: antaḥkaraṇam evātaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhūtasaṃsṛtau / ātmā sarvātigatvāt tu kāraṇaṃ sad akāraṇam //MU_5,71.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13411: avicāraṇam ajñānaṃ maurkhyam āhur mahādhiyaḥ / saṃsārasaṃsṛtau sāram antaḥkaraṇakāraṇam //MU_5,71.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13412: asamyakprekṣaṇān mohāc cetas sattāṃ gṛhītavat / sammohabījakaṇikāṃ tamo 'rkadravaṇād iva //MU_5,71.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13413: yathābhūtātmatattvaikaparijñānena rāghava / asattām ety alaṃ ceto dīpeneva tamaḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_5,71.45//
GSP27moksop_u:13414: saṃsārakāraṇam atas svayaṃ ceto 'vicāraṇāt / jīvo 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ cittaṃ manaś cetyādināmakam //MU_5,71.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13415: rāmaḥ: etās sañjñāḥ prabho bahvyaś cetaso rūḍhim āgatāḥ / katham ity eva kathaya mayi mānada siddhaye //MU_5,71.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13416: vasiṣṭhaḥ: sarve bhāvā ime nityam ātmatattvaikarūpiṇaḥ / citrās taraṅgakakaṇā jalaikakalitā yathā //MU_5,71.48//
GSP27moksop_u:13417: ātmā spandaikarūpātmā sthitas teṣu kvacit kvacit / taraṅgeṣu viloleṣu payo vyomāmalaṃ yathā //MU_5,71.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13418: kvacid aspandarūpātmā sthitas teṣu maheśvaraḥ / taraṅgatvam ayāteṣu jalabhāvo jaleṣv iva //MU_5,71.50//
GSP27moksop_u:13419: tatropalādayo bhāvā alolā ātmani sthitāḥ / surāphenavad utspandā lolās tu puruṣādayaḥ //MU_5,71.51//
GSP27moksop_u:13420: tatra teṣu śarīreṣu sarvaśaktitayātmanā / kalitājñānakalanā tenājñānam asau śritaḥ //MU_5,71.52//
GSP27moksop_u:13421: tad ajñānam anantātmarūṣitaṃ jīva ucyate / sa saṃsārī mahāmohamāyāpañjarakuñjaraḥ //MU_5,71.53//
GSP27moksop_u:13422: jīvanāj jīva ity ukto 'hambhāvaś cāpy ahantayā / buddhir niścāyakatvena saṅkalpakalanān manaḥ //MU_5,71.54//
GSP27moksop_u:13423: prakṛtiḥ prakṛtatvena deho digdhatayā sthitaḥ / jaḍaḥ prakṛtibhāvena cetanas svātmasattayā //MU_5,71.55//
GSP27moksop_u:13424: jaḍājaḍadṛśor madhye yat tattvaṃ pāramātmikam / tad etad eva nānātvaṃ nānāsañjñābhir āgatam //MU_5,71.56//
GSP27moksop_u:13425: evaṃ svarūpaṃ jīvasya bṛhadāraṇyakādiṣu / bahudhā bahuṣu proktaṃ vedānteṣu kilānagha //MU_5,71.57//
GSP27moksop_u:13426: anyais tv etāsu sañjñāsu kuvikalpakutārkikaiḥ / mohāya kevalaṃ mūḍhair vyartham arthāḥ prakalpitāḥ //MU_5,71.58//
GSP27moksop_u:13427: evam eṣa mahābāho jīvas saṃsārakāraṇam / mūkenātivarākeṇa dehakeneha kiṃ kṛtam //MU_5,71.59//
GSP27moksop_u:13428: ādhārādheyayor ekanāśenānyasya naṣṭatā / yathā tathā śarīrādināśe nātmani naṣṭatā //MU_5,71.60//
GSP27moksop_u:13429: ekaparṇarase kṣīṇe raso naiti yathā kṣayam / yāti parṇarasaś cārkaraśmijālāntaraṃ yathā //MU_5,71.61//
GSP27moksop_u:13430: śarīrasaṅkṣaye dehī na kṣayaṃ yāti kasyacit / nirvāsanaś cet tad vyomni tiṣṭhaty ātmapade tathā //MU_5,71.62//
GSP27moksop_u:13431: dehanāśe vinaṣṭo 'smīty evaṃ yasyāmater bhramaḥ / mātus stanataṭāt tasya manye vetāla utthitaḥ //MU_5,71.63//
GSP27moksop_u:13432: yasya hy ātyantiko nāśas syād asāv uditas smṛtaḥ / cittanāśo hi nāśas syāt sa mokṣa iti kathyate //MU_5,71.64//
GSP27moksop_u:13433: mṛto naṣṭa iti proktam anyais tac ca mṛṣā na sat / sa deśakālāntarito bhūtvā bhūyo 'nubhūyate //MU_5,71.65//
GSP27moksop_u:13434: ihohyate janair oghataraṅgāntas tṛṇair iva / maraṇavyapadeśāt tu deśakālatirohitaiḥ //MU_5,71.66//
GSP27moksop_u:13435: vāsanāvalito jīvo yāty utsṛjya śarīrakam / kapir vanataruṃ tyaktvā tarvantaram ivāsthitaḥ //MU_5,71.67//
GSP27moksop_u:13436: punas tad api santyajya prayāty anyad api kṣaṇāt / anyasmin vitate deśe kāle 'nyasmiṃś ca rāghava //MU_5,71.68//
GSP27moksop_u:13437: itaś cetaś ca nīyante jīvā vāsanayā svayā / ciraṃ tadupajīvinyā dhūrtadhātryeva bālakāḥ //MU_5,71.69//
GSP27moksop_u:13438: vāsanārajjuvalitā jīrṇāḥ parvatakukṣiṣu / jarayanty atiduḥkhena jīvitaṃ jīvajīvakāḥ //MU_5,71.70//
GSP27moksop_u:13439: jaraḍhajagadupoḍhaduḥkhabhārāḥ pariṇatajarjarajīvitāś śvasantyaḥ / hṛdayajanitavāsanānuvṛttyā narakabhare janatāś ciraṃ patanti //MU_5,71.71//
GSP27moksop_u:13440: vālmīkiḥ: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma / snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_5,71.72//
GSP27moksop_u:13443: vasiṣṭhaḥ: dehe jāte na jāto 'si dehe naṣṭe na naśyasi / tvam ātmā niṣkalaṅkātmā dehas tava na kaścana //MU_5,72.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13444: yaḥ kuṇḍabadaranyāyo yā ghaṭākāśasaṃsthitiḥ / tatraikasmin kṣate kṣīṇe dve iti vyarthakalpanā //MU_5,72.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13445: vināśini vinaṣṭe 'smin dehe svāṃ sthitim āgate / vinaśyāmīti yaḥ khedī taṃ dhig astv andhacetanam //MU_5,72.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13446: yādṛśo raśmirathayos snehodvegavivarjitaḥ / sambandhas tādṛśo dehacittendriyasukhaiś citaḥ //MU_5,72.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13447: gatetaretarāpekṣas saraḥpaṅkopalāmbhasām / yathā rāghava sambandhas tathā dehendriyātmanām //MU_5,72.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13448: yādṛśo 'bdhidharādyānāṃ niricchāparidevanaḥ / saṃyogo viprayogaś ca tādṛśo dehadehinām //MU_5,72.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13449: yathā kalpitavetālavikārabhayabhītayaḥ / mithyaiva kalpitā ete tathā snehasukhādayaḥ //MU_5,72.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13450: bhūtapañcakasampiṇḍād racitā janatāḥ pṛthak / ekasmād eva viṭapād vicitrā iva putrikāḥ //MU_5,72.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13451: kāṣṭhetarat kāṣṭhanare kiñcid anyan na vidyate / bhūtapiṇḍetarad dehe kiñcid anyan na vidyate //MU_5,72.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13452: bhūtapañcakavikṣobhanāśotpādeṣu he janāḥ / harṣāmarṣaviṣādānāṃ kiṃ bhavanto vaśaṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,72.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13453: ko nāmātiśayaḥ puṃsāṃ strīnāmny aparanāmni vā / kevale bhūtasaṅghāte prodbhūte 'rjunavātavat //MU_5,72.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13454: sanniveśāṃśavaicitryam ajñānām eva tuṣṭaye / tajjñānāṃ tu yathābhūtabhūtapañcakadarśanam //MU_5,72.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13455: mithaś śilāputrikayor yathaikopalasaṃsthayoḥ / śliṣṭayor api no rāgas tathā cittaśarīrayoḥ //MU_5,72.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13456: mṛtpuṃsāṃ yādṛśo 'nyo'nyam āśayas saṅgame bhavet / buddhīndriyātmamanasām saṅgame tādṛśo 'stu te //MU_5,72.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13457: nānyo'nyasnehasambandhabhājanaṃ śailaputrikāḥ / dehendriyātmaprāṇāś ca kasyātra paridevanā //MU_5,72.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13458: itaś cetaś ca yātāni yathā saṃśleṣayaty alam / taraṅgas tṛṇajālāni tathā bhūtāni bhūtakṛt //MU_5,72.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13459: saṃyujyante viyujyante tṛṇāny abdhijale yathā / muktāntaḥkalanaṃ dehabhūtāny ātmani vai tathā //MU_5,72.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13460: ātmā cittatayā dehabhūtāny āśleṣayan sthitaḥ / tṛṇāny āvartavṛttyāntaḥkalanonmuktam ambv iva //MU_5,72.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13461: prabodhāc cittatāṃ tyaktvā vrajaty ātmātmatāṃ svayam / svaspandavaśato vāri tyaktvāvartam ivācchatām //MU_5,72.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13462: tato viviktaṃ bhūtaughaṃ dehasañjñaṃ prapaśyati / vātaskandhagato jantur vasudhāmaṇḍalaṃ yathā //MU_5,72.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13463: pṛthagbhūtagaṇaṃ tyaktvā dehātīto bhavaty ajaḥ / paraṃ prakāśam āyāti sūryakānta ivāhani //MU_5,72.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13464: jānāty athātmanātmānaṃ mānameyāmayojjhitam / muktaḥ kṣīvatayevāntas svāṃ saṃvidam anusmaran //MU_5,72.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13465: ātmaikas spandate citkhe vastujālair ivoditaḥ / taraṅgakaṇakallolair anantāmbv ambudhāv iva //MU_5,72.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13466: evamprāyamahābodhā vītarāgā gatainasaḥ / jīvanmuktāś carantīha mahāsattvapadaṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,72.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13467: yathā kacanti vividhair maṇiratnair mahormayaḥ / nirastavāsanaṃ citrair vyavahārair narottamāḥ //MU_5,72.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13468: na kūlakāṣair jaladhir na rajobhir nabhastalam / na mlāyati nijair lokavyavahārair ihātmavān //MU_5,72.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13469: gatair abhyāgatais svacchair malinaiś capalair jaḍaiḥ / na rāgo nāmbudher dveṣo bhogaiś cādhigatātmanaḥ //MU_5,72.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13470: yan manomananaṃ kiñcit samagre jagati sthitam / tac cetyonmukhacittattvavilāsollasanaṃ viduḥ //MU_5,72.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13471: yad ahaṃ yac ca bhūtādi kālatritayabhāvi yat / dṛśyadarśanasambandhavistāras tad vijṛmbhate //MU_5,72.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13472: yad dṛśyaṃ tad asat sad vā dṛṣṭim ekām upāśritam / anyat tv alepakaṃ tasmād dharṣaśokadaśe kutaḥ //MU_5,72.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13473: asatyam evāsatyaṃ hi satyaṃ satyaṃ sadaiva hi / satyāsatyam asad viddhi tadarthaṃ kiṃ vimuhyasi //MU_5,72.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13474: asamyagdarśanaṃ tyaktvā samyak paśya sulocana / na kvacin muhyati prauḍhas samyagdarśanavān iha //MU_5,72.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13475: dṛśyadarśanasambandhe yat sukhaṃ pāramārthikam / anubhūtimayaṃ tasmāt paraṃ brahmeti kathyate //MU_5,72.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13476: dṛśyadarśanasambandhasukhasaṃvid anuttamā / dadāty ajñāya saṃsāraṃ jñāya mokṣaṃ sukhodayā //MU_5,72.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13477: dṛśyadarśanasambandhasukham ātmavapur viduḥ / tad dṛśyāvalitaṃ baddhaṃ tanmuktaṃ muktam ucyate //MU_5,72.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13478: dṛśyadarśanasambandhasukhasaṃvid anāmayā / kṣayātiśayamuktā cet tan muktis socyate budhaiḥ //MU_5,72.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13479: dṛśyadarśanasambandhe yānubhūtis svagocarā / dṛśyadarśananirmuktā tām ālambya bhavābhavaḥ //MU_5,72.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13480: sauṣuptī dṛṣṭir eṣā hi yāty evaṃ samprakāśatām / evaṃ ca yāti turyatvam evaṃ muktir iti smṛtā //MU_5,72.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13481: dṛśyadarśanamuktāyāṃ yuktāyāṃ parayā dhiyā / dṛśyadarśanasambandhasaṃvidy asyāṃ tu rāghava //MU_5,72.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13482: nātmā sthūlo na caivāṇur na pratyakṣo na cetanaḥ / nācetano na ca jaḍo na caivāsan na sanmayaḥ //MU_5,72.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13483: nāhaṃ nānyo na caivaiko nāneko nāpy anekavān / nābhyāśastho na dūrastho naivāsti na ca nāsti ca //MU_5,72.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13484: nāprāpyo nāpi ca prāpyo na cāsarvo na sarvagaḥ / na padārtho nāpadārtho nāpañcātmā na pañca ca //MU_5,72.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13485: yad idaṃ dṛśyatāṃ prāptaṃ manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyāspadam / tadatītaṃ padaṃ yat syāt tan na kiñcid ivehitam //MU_5,72.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13486: yathābhūtam idaṃ samyag jñasya sampaśyato jagat / sarvam ātmamayaṃ vidvan nāsty anātmamayaṃ kvacit //MU_5,72.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13488: sattaivāsti na vastūnāṃ yayā nāma vinā citā / vyatiriktaṃ tato 'stīti viddhi pronmattajalpitam //MU_5,72.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13489: eko jaganti sakalāni samastakālakalpakramāntaragatāni gatāgatāni / ātmaiva netarakalākalanāsti kācid itthammatir bhava bhavātigato mahātman //MU_5,72.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13492: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃvicārayā dṛṣṭyā dvaitatyāgena rāghava / svo bhāvaḥ prāpyate tajjñais tajjñaiś cintāmaṇir yathā //MU_5,73.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13493: athemām aparāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śṛṇu rāmānayā yathā / drakṣyasy ātmānam acalaṃ bhaviṣyasi ca divyadṛk //MU_5,73.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13494: ahaṃ kham aham ādityo diśo 'ham aham apy adhaḥ / ahaṃ daityā ahaṃ devāś śailāś cāham ahaṃ mahaḥ //MU_5,73.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13495: tamo 'ham aham abhrāṇi bhūsamudrādikaṃ tv aham / rajo vāyur athāgniś ca jagat sarvam idaṃ tv aham //MU_5,73.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13496: jagattraye 'haṃ sarvatra sa ātmaiva kila sthitaḥ / ko 'haṃ kim anyad iha hi dvitvam ekasya kīdṛśam //MU_5,73.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13497: iti niścayavān antar nūnam ātmatayā jagat / paśyan harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ nāvaśaḥ paribhūyate //MU_5,73.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13498: manmaye 'smin kila jagaty akhile saṃsthite 'nagha / kim ātmīyaṃ paraṃ kiṃ syāt kamalekṣaṇa kathyatām //MU_5,73.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13499: kiṃ tajjñavyatirekeṇa vidyate yad upāgame / harṣam etu viṣādaṃ vā vināśe jño jaganmayaḥ //MU_5,73.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13500: ahaṅkāradṛśāv ete sāttvike dve vinirmale / tattvajñānāt pravartete mokṣade pāramārthike //MU_5,73.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13501: paro 'ṇus sakalātītarūpo 'haṃ tv ity ahaṅkṛtiḥ / prathamā sarvam evāham ity anyoktā raghūdvaha //MU_5,73.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13502: ahaṅkāradṛg anyā tu tṛtīyā vidyate 'nagha / deho 'ham iti tāṃ viddhi duḥkhāyaiva na śāntaye //MU_5,73.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13503: atha vaitat trayam api tyaktvā sakalasiddhaye / yathecchaṃ tad upālambya tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabdhatatpadaḥ //MU_5,73.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13504: sarvātītasvarūpo 'pi sarvasattātigo 'pi ca / svasattāpūritajagad asty evātmā prakāśakaḥ //MU_5,73.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13505: svānubhūtyaiva paśyāśu sa evāsi sadoditaḥ / saṃśayaṃ hṛdayagranthiṃ tyaja tattvavidāṃ vara //MU_5,73.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13506: nātmāsty anumayā rāma na cāptavacanādinā / sarvadā sarvathā sarvaṃ sa pratyakṣānubhūtitaḥ //MU_5,73.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13507: yad idaṃ darśanaṃ spandaḥ kiñcid yat saṃvidādy api / tat sarvam ātmā bhagavān dṛśyadarśanavarjitaḥ //MU_5,73.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13508: na san nāsad asau devo nāṇur nāpi mahān asau / nāpy etayor dṛśor madhyaṃ sa evedaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ //MU_5,73.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13509: sa evedaṃ ca vadati sa ca vaktuṃ na yujyate / na tadanyad idaṃ naitat paśya māyām anāmayām //MU_5,73.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13510: nātmāyam ayam apy ātmā sañjñābheda iti svayam / tenaiva sarvagatayā śaktyā svātmani kalpitaḥ //MU_5,73.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13511: saṃsthitas sa hi sarvatra triṣu kāleṣu bhāsuraḥ / sūkṣmatvāt sumahattvāc ca kevalaṃ na vibhāvyate //MU_5,73.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13512: satsv anantapadārtheṣu jīvatvenābhibimbati / ātmā puryaṣṭakādarśe svabhāvavaśatas svataḥ //MU_5,73.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13513: puryaṣṭakodayād eva svayam ātmānubhūyate / sarvadā sarvasaṃsthaḥ khe ghanaspandād ivānilaḥ //MU_5,73.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13514: cidātmā sarvago vyāpī na kvacin nāma na sthitaḥ / yadvat sarvapadārthānāṃ sattā tadvan maheśvaraḥ //MU_5,73.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13515: sati puryaṣṭake tasmiñ jīvas sphurati nopalaḥ / sati vāyāv iva rajas sati dīpa ivekṣaṇam //MU_5,73.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13516: iyaṃ puryaṣṭakasyecchā svātmany evātmani sthite / sati sphuraty abhyudite bhānāv iva janaiṣaṇā //MU_5,73.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13517: yadi sūrye sthite vyomni tadvaśoditasaṃsthitiḥ / naśyati vyavahāro 'yaṃ bhāsvataḥ kim upāgatam //MU_5,73.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13518: yady ātmani sthite deve tatsattālabdhasaṃsthitiḥ / deho nāśam upāyāti tat kim unnaṣṭam ātmanaḥ //MU_5,73.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13519: na jāyate na mriyate nābhivāñchati nojjhati / na mukto na ca baddho 'yam ātmā sarvasya sarvadā //MU_5,73.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13520: ātmāvabodhābhyuditā nirātmany ātmatāṃ gatā / sarparajjubhramākārā bhrāntir duḥkhāya kevalam //MU_5,73.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13521: anāditvān na jāto 'yam ajātatvān na naśyati / ātmātmavyatiriktaṃ tu nābhivāñchaty asambhavāt //MU_5,73.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13522: dikkālādyanavacchedān na baddho 'yaṃ kadācana / bandhābhāve 'py amuktis syād amokṣas tena sa smṛtaḥ //MU_5,73.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13523: evaṅguṇaviśiṣṭo 'yam ātmā sarvasya rāghava / avicāravaśān mūḍho loko 'yaṃ pariroditi //MU_5,73.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13524: samyagālokitāśeṣapūrvāparajagatkramaḥ / mā śokaṃ gaccha sumate maurkhyopahatalokavat //MU_5,73.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13525: dve eva kalane tyaktvā mokṣabandhātmike sadā / viduṣā vyavahartavyaṃ yantreṇevātmamauninā //MU_5,73.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13526: na mokṣo nabhasaḥ pṛṣṭhe na pātāle na bhūtale / mokṣo hi ceto vimalaṃ samyagjñānāvabodhitam //MU_5,73.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13527: sakalāśāsv asaṃsaktyā yas svayaṃ cetasaḥ kṣayaḥ / sa mokṣanāmnā kathitas tattvajñair ātmadarśibhiḥ //MU_5,73.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13528: yāvat prabodho vimalo noditas tāvad eva saḥ / maurkhyadīnatayā rāma bhaktyā mokṣo 'bhivāñchyate //MU_5,73.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13529: ciraṃ prabodham āsādya citte 'vitatatāṃ gate / daśa mokṣā na vāñchyante kim utaiko hi mokṣakaḥ //MU_5,73.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13530: ayaṃ mokṣas tv ayaṃ bandhaḥ pelavāṃ kalanām imām / parityajya mahātyāgī tvaṃ tvam eva bhavābhavaḥ //MU_5,73.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13531: parigalitavikalpatāṃ prayātas sagarasutaughanikhātamekhalāṅkam / avanivalayam antarastasaṅgaś ciram anupālaya sarvadoditaśrīḥ //MU_5,73.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13534: vasiṣṭhaḥ: līlayāpaśyati vapuḥ kalanātmani jāyate / ramyasyāpaśyato vaktraṃ hṛdi daurūpyadhīr iva //MU_5,74.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13535: tadvaśād iyam āyātā mahatī medurodarā / māyā madamahāśaktis surāsvādalavād iva //MU_5,74.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13536: tayānayā vikāriṇyā tadatadbhāvabhūtayā / idaṃ sampannam akhilaṃ tāpād iva marau payaḥ //MU_5,74.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13537: mano buddhir ahaṅkāro vāsanāś cendriyāṇy api / evaṅkalpitanāmāṅkas sphuraty ātmābdhir ambubhiḥ //MU_5,74.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13538: cittāhaṅkārayor dvitvaṃ vacasy asti na vastutaḥ / yac cittaṃ sa hy ahaṅkāro yo 'haṅkāro mano hi tat //MU_5,74.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13539: vyatiriktaṃ himāc chauklyam iti saṅkalpyate yathā / mudhaiva kalpyate bhedaś cittāhaṅkārayos tathā //MU_5,74.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13540: mano'haṅkārayor antar dvayor ekatarakṣaye / kṣīṇe dve eva hi yathā paṭaśauklye paṭakṣaye //MU_5,74.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13541: tucchāṃ mokṣadhiyaṃ tyaktvā bandhabuddhiṃ tathaiṣaṇāḥ / suvairāgyavivekābhyāṃ kevalaṃ kṣapayen manaḥ //MU_5,74.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13542: mokṣo me 'stv iti cintā cej jātā tad vyutthitaṃ manaḥ / mananotke manasy uccair vapur doṣāya kevalam //MU_5,74.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13543: ātmany atīte sarvasmāt sarvarūpe 'tha vā tate / ko bandhaḥ kaś ca vā mokṣo nirmūlaṃ mananaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,74.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13544: vāyus spandanadharmatvād yadā lagati dehake / tadā sphurati hastāṅgarasanāpallavāvalī //MU_5,74.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13545: pādape pallavaśreṇīṃ cālayaty anilo yathā / tathaivāṅgāvalīṃ vāyur dehe sañcālayaty alam //MU_5,74.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13546: cit sarvavyāpinī sūkṣmā na calā na ca cālyate / na svatas spandam āyāti devācala ivānilaiḥ //MU_5,74.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13547: pratibimbitasarvārthā kevalaṃ svātmani sthitā / prakāśayati bodhena jagantīmāni dīpavat //MU_5,74.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13548: tatra ko 'yaṃ mudhā moho bhavatām atiduḥkhadaḥ / ayaṃ so 'haṃ mamāṅgāni mamedaṃ ceti durdhiyām //MU_5,74.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13550: tatrāyam ātmā sammantā bhoktā karteti jāyate / mudhaivājñānatāpotthā mṛgatṛṣṇeva vāsanā //MU_5,74.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13551: ajñātaiṣā manomattamṛgaṃ viṣayatarṣulam / asatyaiva hi satyeva mṛgatṛṣṇeva karṣati //MU_5,74.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13552: vijñātā satyarūpeyaṃ nāśaṃ yāti palāyate / vipramadhyāt parijñātā yathā caṇḍālakanyakā //MU_5,74.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13553: avidyā samparijñātā na manaḥ parikarṣati / mṛgatṛṣṇā parijñātā tarṣulaṃ nāpakarṣati //MU_5,74.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13554: paramārthāvabodhena samūlaṃ rāma vāsanā / dīpenevāndhakāraśrīr galaty āloka eti ca //MU_5,74.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13555: nāsty avidyeti sañjāte niścaye śāstrayuktitaḥ / galaty avidyā tāpena tuṣārakaṇikā yathā //MU_5,74.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13556: dehasyāsya jaḍasyārthe kiṃ bhogair iti niścayī / bhinatty āśāmayaṃ jñānī pañjaraṃ kesarī yathā //MU_5,74.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13557: āśāparikare rāma nūnaṃ parihṛte hṛdaḥ / pumān āgatasaundaryo hlādam āyāti candravat //MU_5,74.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13558: parāṃ śītalatām eti vṛṣṭidhauta ivācalaḥ / nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ dhatte prāptarājya ivādhanaḥ //MU_5,74.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13559: śobhate 'malayā lakṣmyā śaradīva nabhastalam / ātmany eva na māty uccaiḥ kalpasyānta ivārṇavaḥ //MU_5,74.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13560: bhavaty apetasaṃrambho vṛṣṭamūka ivāmbudaḥ / tiṣṭhaty ātmani saṃvettā praśānta iva vāridhiḥ //MU_5,74.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13561: paraṃ dhairyam upādatte sthairyaṃ merur ivācalaḥ / rājate svasthayā lakṣmyā śāntendhana ivānalaḥ //MU_5,74.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13562: bhavaty ātmani nirvāṇaḥ praśānta iva dīpakaḥ / dṛṣṭim āyāti paramāṃ naraḥ pītāmṛto yathā //MU_5,74.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13563: antardīpo ghaṭa iva madhyajvāla ivānalaḥ / sphuraddīptir maṇir iva prayāty antaḥ prakāśatām //MU_5,74.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13564: sarvātmakaṃ sarvagataṃ sarveśaṃ sarvanāyakam / sarvākāraṃ nirākāraṃ svam ātmānaṃ prapaśyati //MU_5,74.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13565: hasaty alam atītās tāḥ pelavā divasāvalīḥ / yāsu smaraśaraśreṇīcapalaṃ cittam acchinat //MU_5,74.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13568: prāptānuttamaviśrāntir labdhālabhyapadāspadaḥ / anivartipadaṃ prāptaḥ karmaṇām antam āgataḥ //MU_5,74.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13569: sarvābhivāñchitārambho na kiñcid api vāñchati / sarvānumoditānando na kiñcid anumodate //MU_5,74.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13570: na dadāti na cādatte na stauti na ca nindati / nāstam eti na codeti na tuṣyati na śocati //MU_5,74.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13571: sarvārambhaphalatyāgī sarvopādhivivarjitaḥ / sarvāśāsamparityāgī jīvanmukta iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,74.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13572: sarvaiṣaṇāḥ parityajya cetasā bhava maunavān / dhārā niravaśeṣeṇa yathā tyaktvā payodharaḥ //MU_5,74.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13573: tathā na sukhayaty aṅgasaṃlagnā varavarṇinī / yathā sukhayati svāntam induśītā nirāśatā //MU_5,74.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13574: na tathendus sukhayati kaṇṭhalagno 'pi rāghava / nairāśyaṃ sukhayaty antar yathā sakalaśītalam //MU_5,74.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13575: puṣpaghūrṇannavalato na tathā rājate madhuḥ / yathodāramatir maunī nairāśyasamamānasaḥ //MU_5,74.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13576: na himādrer na muktābhyo na rambhābhyo na candanāt / na tac candramasaś śaityaṃ nairāśyād yad avāpyate //MU_5,74.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13577: api rājyād api svargād apīndor api mādhavāt / api kāntāsamāsaṅgān nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham //MU_5,74.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13578: tṛṇavan nopakurvanti yayā tribhuvanaśriyaḥ / sā parā nirvṛtis sādho nairāśyād upalabhyate //MU_5,74.45//
GSP27moksop_u:13579: āśākarañjaparaśuṃ parāyā nirvṛteḥ padam / puṣpagucchaṃ śamataror ālambasva nirāśatām //MU_5,74.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13580: goṣpadaṃ pṛthivī merus sthāṇur āśās samudgikāḥ / tṛṇaṃ tribhuvanaṃ rāma nairāśyālaṅkṛtākṛteḥ //MU_5,74.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13581: dānādānasamāhāravihāravibhavādikāḥ / kriyā jagati hasyante nirāśaiḥ puruṣottamaiḥ //MU_5,74.48//
GSP27moksop_u:13582: padaṃ yasya na badhnāti kadācit kalanā hṛdi / tṛṇīkṛtatribhuvanaḥ kenāsāv upamīyate //MU_5,74.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13583: idam evāstv idaṃ māstu mameti hṛdi rañjanā / na yasyāsti tam ātmeśaṃ tolayanti kathaṃ janāḥ //MU_5,74.50//
GSP27moksop_u:13584: sarvasaṅkaṭaparyantam asaṅkaṭamalaṃ sukham / saubhāgyaṃ paramaṃ buddher nairāśyam avalambyatām //MU_5,74.51//
GSP27moksop_u:13585: na śāsteha tvam āśānāṃ viddhi mithyābhramaṃ jagat / vahadrathasthadikcakranemyāvartavad utthitam //MU_5,74.52//
GSP27moksop_u:13586: kiṃ muhyasi mahābāho mūrkhavat paṇḍito 'pi san / mamedaṃ tad ayaṃ so 'ham ity udbhrāntena cetasā //MU_5,74.53//
GSP27moksop_u:13587: ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ nānāteha na vidyate / ekarūpaṃ jagaj jñātvā dhīrai rāma na khidyate //MU_5,74.54//
GSP27moksop_u:13588: yathābhūtapadārthaughadarśanād eva rāghava / paramāśvāsanaṃ buddher nairāśyam adhigamyate //MU_5,74.55//
GSP27moksop_u:13589: bhāvābhāvavisaṃvādamuktam ādyantayos sthitam / yad rūpaṃ tat samālambya padārthānāṃ sthitiṃ kuru //MU_5,74.56//
GSP27moksop_u:13590: nairāśyadhīramanaso māyeyam atimohinī / palāyya yāti saṃsārī mṛgī kesariṇo yathā //MU_5,74.57//
GSP27moksop_u:13591: kāntām uddāmamadanāṃ lolāṃ vanalatām api / jarjaropalapālīṃ ca samaṃ paśyati dhīradhīḥ //MU_5,74.58//
GSP27moksop_u:13592: bhogā nānandayanty antaḥ khedayanti na cāpadaḥ / dṛśyaśriyo haranty aṅga na jñam adrim ivānilāḥ //MU_5,74.59//
GSP27moksop_u:13593: raktabālāṅganasyāpi jñasyodāradhiyo muneḥ / kaṇaśaḥ khaṇḍatāṃ yānti manasi smarasāyakāḥ //MU_5,74.60//
GSP27moksop_u:13594: rāgadveṣais svarūpajño nāvaśaḥ parikṛṣyate / sparśa evāsya naitābhyāṃ kim utākramaṇaṃ bhavet //MU_5,74.61//
GSP27moksop_u:13595: samadṛṣṭalatālolavanitādriśilādiṣu / ramate naiṣa bhogeṣu pāntho marumahīṣv iva //MU_5,74.62//
GSP27moksop_u:13596: ayatnopanataṃ sarvaṃ līlayā muktamānasaḥ / bhuṅkte bhogabharaṃ prājñas tv ālokam iva locanam //MU_5,74.63//
GSP27moksop_u:13597: kākatālīyavat prāptā bhogālī lalanādikā / sevitāpy aṅga dhīrasya na duḥkhāya na tuṣṭaye //MU_5,74.64//
GSP27moksop_u:13598: samyagdṛṣṭapadārthaṃ jñaṃ sukhaduḥkhagatī manāk / dve vīcyāv iva śailendraṃ kṣobhaṃ netuṃ na śaknutaḥ //MU_5,74.65//
GSP27moksop_u:13599: helayālokayan bhogān mṛdur dānto gatajvaraḥ / svam eva padam ālambya sarvabhūtāntarasthitam //MU_5,74.66//
GSP27moksop_u:13600: jñas tiṣṭhati gatavyagraṃ vyagrayāpi samanvitaḥ / jaganti janayann eva brahmevātmaparāyaṇaḥ //MU_5,74.67//
GSP27moksop_u:13601: āpatatsu yathākāmaṃ yathākālaṃ yathākramam / sukhaduḥkheṣu na kṣobham eti bhūbhṛd ṛtuṣv iva //MU_5,74.68//
GSP27moksop_u:13602: majjato 'pi bahujñasya rāma karmendriyakramaiḥ / asaktamanaso nityaṃ na kiñcid api majjati //MU_5,74.69//
GSP27moksop_u:13603: kalaṅky antaḥkalaṅkena procyate hema nānyathā / bhāvāsaktyā samāsakta ukto jantur hi nānyathā //MU_5,74.70//
GSP27moksop_u:13604: śarīrāt praviviktaṃ svaṃ paśyataḥ pravivekinaḥ / vikartitāṅgakasyāpi na kiñcit pravikartitam //MU_5,74.71//
GSP27moksop_u:13605: sakṛtprabhātaṃ vimalaṃ yaj jñātaṃ jñātam eva tat / na hi bandhuḥ parijñātaḥ punar ajñātatāṃ vrajet //MU_5,74.72//
GSP27moksop_u:13606: sarpabhrāntau nivṛttāyāṃ na rajjvāṃ sarpabhāvanā / punar eti yathā prāvṛṇnadī giritaṭacyutā //MU_5,74.73//
GSP27moksop_u:13607: na hema tāpaśuddhāṅgaṃ svābhāsam alam āgatam / kardame magnam api sat samādatte malaṃ punaḥ //MU_5,74.74//
GSP27moksop_u:13608: kṣīṇe svahṛdayagranthau na bandho 'sti punar guṇaiḥ / yatnenāpi punar baddhaṃ kena vṛnte cyutaṃ phalam //MU_5,74.75//
GSP27moksop_u:13609: ayaśchedavicārābhyām abhitaḥ khaṇḍaśo gatam / pāṣāṇaṃ ca manaś caiva sandhātuṃ kasya śaktatā //MU_5,74.76//
GSP27moksop_u:13610: vijñātāyām avidyāyāṃ kaḥ punaḥ parimajjati / parijñāya śvapākānāṃ yātrāṃ kaḥ prekṣate dvijaḥ //MU_5,74.77//
GSP27moksop_u:13611: sudhāmbhasi yathā kṣīradhīr vicārān nivartate / saṃsāravāsanā tadvad dhīvicārān nivartate //MU_5,74.78//
GSP27moksop_u:13612: madhvambuśaṅkayā tāvad viṣavāri prapīyate / yāvat tan na parijñātaṃ parijñātaṃ vihīyate //MU_5,74.79//
GSP27moksop_u:13613: rūpalāvaṇyayuktāpi citrakānteva kāminī / dravyamātrasamārambhāt tattvavidbhir vilokyate //MU_5,74.80//
GSP27moksop_u:13614: yathā maṣīkusumbhādi striyāś citre tathaiva hi / jīvantyā api keśoṣṭhaṃ kas tāṃ prati kila grahaḥ //MU_5,74.81//
GSP27moksop_u:13615: anubhūto guḍas svādur api dāhavikartanaiḥ / na śakyate 'nyathā kartuṃ tattvālokas tathātmanaḥ //MU_5,74.82//
GSP27moksop_u:13616: paravyasaninī nārī vyagrāpi gṛhakarmaṇi / tad evāsvādayaty antar navasaṅgarasāyanam //MU_5,74.83//
GSP27moksop_u:13617: evaṃ tattve pare śuddhe dhīro viśrāntim āgataḥ / na śakyate cālayituṃ devair api sahāsuraiḥ //MU_5,74.84//
GSP27moksop_u:13618: paravyasaninī nārī kena bhartrā balīyasā / vismāritā svasaṅkalpakāntasaṅgamahotsavam //MU_5,74.85//
GSP27moksop_u:13619: jagat samarasānantacidālokāvalambanam / kena vismāryate buddhis tattvajñasya mahātmanaḥ //MU_5,74.86//
GSP27moksop_u:13620: samagrasukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ vyavahāram akhaṇḍitam / kurvan gurujanāyatto bhartṛśvaśurakheditaḥ //MU_5,74.87//
GSP27moksop_u:13621: yathā saṅkalpakāntena bhavaty ānandamantharaḥ / vadhūloko vyasanavān duḥkhajālair na khedyate //MU_5,74.88//
GSP27moksop_u:13622: tathā vigalitāvidyo vyavahāraparo 'pi san / samyagdṛṣṭisamācāro mudam ety antar ātmanā //MU_5,74.89//
GSP27moksop_u:13623: chidyate na nikṛttāṅgo galadasrur na roditi / dahyate na pradagdho 'pi naṣṭo 'pi na vinaśyati //MU_5,74.90//
GSP27moksop_u:13624: vyapagatasukhaduḥkhasannipāto vidhividhureṣv api saṅkaṭeṣv akhinnaḥ / nivasatu sadane purottame vā vitatagirau vipine tapovane vā //MU_5,74.91//
GSP27moksop_u:13627: vasiṣṭhaḥ: janakas saṃsthito rājye vyavahāraparo 'pi san / vigatajvara evāntar anākulamatis sadā //MU_5,75.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13628: pitāmaho dilīpas te sarvārambhaparo 'py alam / vītarāgatayaivāntar bubhuje medinīṃ ciram //MU_5,75.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13630: vicitrabalayuddheṣu vyavahāreṣu bhūriṣu / māndhātā suciraṃ tiṣṭhaṃs tyaktavān na paraṃ padam //MU_5,75.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13631: baḍiḥ pātālapīṭhasthaḥ kurvan svāṃ divasasthitim / sadātyāgī sadāsakto jīvanmuktapade sthitaḥ //MU_5,75.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13632: namucir dānavādhīśo devadvandvaparas sadā / nānācāravihāreṣu kvacin nāntar atapyata //MU_5,75.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13633: vāsavājau tanutyāgī vṛtro vitatamānasaḥ / antaśśītamanā mānī cakāra surasaṅgaram //MU_5,75.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13634: kurvan dānavakāryāṇi pātālatalapālakaḥ / anapāyaṃ nirākrośaṃ prahlādo hlādam āgataḥ //MU_5,75.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13635: śambaraikaparo 'py antaś śambaraikatayoditaḥ / saṃsāraśambaraṃ rāma śambaras tyaktavān idam //MU_5,75.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13636: asaktabuddhir hariṇā kurvan dānavasaṅgaram / parāṃ saṃvidam āsādya musalas tyaktavāṃs tanum //MU_5,75.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13637: sarvāmaramukhaṃ vahniḥ kriyājālaparo 'py ati / yajñalakṣmīṃ ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mukta eveha tiṣṭhati //MU_5,75.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13638: pīyamānas surais sarvais somas samarasāśayaḥ / kvacid eti na saṃsaṅgam ākrānto 'py ambaraṃ yathā //MU_5,75.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13639: bṛhaspatir devagurur dārārthaṃ candrayodhy api / ācaran divi citrehāmukta eva vyavasthitaḥ //MU_5,75.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13640: śukro 'mbarataloddyotī labdhasarvārthapālakaḥ / nirvikāramatiḥ kālaṃ nayaty asuradaiśikaḥ //MU_5,75.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13641: jagadbhūtagaṇāṅgāni ciraṃ sañcārayann api / sarvadā sarvasañcārī mukta eva samīraṇaḥ //MU_5,75.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13642: lokājavañjavībhāve prodvegārho 'py akhinnadhīḥ / brahmā samamanā rāma kṣapayaty āyur āyatam //MU_5,75.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13643: jarāmaraṇayuddhādidvandvapañjaralīlayā / caratīha ciraṃ kālaṃ mukto 'pi bhagavān hariḥ //MU_5,75.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13644: muktenāpi trinetreṇa saundaryatarumañjarī / dehārdhe dhāryate gaurī kāmukeneva kāmukī //MU_5,75.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13645: muktayāpi gale baddho gauryā gauras trilocanaḥ / suśuddha iva muktānāṃ gaṇaś śaśikalāmalaḥ //MU_5,75.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13646: guho gahanadhīr vīras tārakādiraṇakramam / mukto 'pi kṛtavān sarvajñānaratnaikasāgaraḥ //MU_5,75.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13647: bhṛṅgīśo raktamāṃsaṃ svaṃ svamātre pravitīrṇavān / muktayaiva dhiyā rāma dhīrayā dhyānadhautayā //MU_5,75.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13648: munir muktasvabhāvo 'pi jagajjaṅgalakhaṇḍakam / nārado vijahāremaṃ līlayā kāryaśīlayā //MU_5,75.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13649: jīvanmuktamanā mānī viśvāmitras svayaṃ prabhuḥ / vedoktāṃ makhanirmāṇakriyāṃ samadhitiṣṭhati //MU_5,75.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13650: dhārayaty avaniṃ śeṣaḥ karoty arko dināvalīm / yamo yamatvaṃ kurute jīvanmuktatayaiva hi //MU_5,75.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13651: anye 'py asmiṃs tribhuvane yakṣāmaranarāsurāḥ / śataśo muktatāṃ yātās santas tiṣṭhanti saṃsṛtau //MU_5,75.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13652: saṃsthitā vyavahāreṣu vividhācāradhāriṣu / antarāśītalāḥ kecit kecin mūḍhāś śilāsamāḥ //MU_5,75.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13653: paramaṃ bodham āsādya kecit kānanam āgatāḥ / yathā bhṛgubharadvājaviśvāmitrasahādayaḥ //MU_5,75.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13654: kecit rājyeṣu tiṣṭhanti cchattracāmaramālitāḥ / yathā janakaśaryātimāndhātṛmagadhādayaḥ //MU_5,75.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13655: kecid vyomani tiṣṭhanti dhiṣṇyacakrāntarasthitāḥ / yathā bṛhaspatyuśanaścandrasūryamunīśvarāḥ //MU_5,75.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13656: kecit surapadaṃ yātā vimānāvalim āsthitāḥ / yathāgnivāyuvaruṇayamatumburunāradāḥ //MU_5,75.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13657: kecit pātālakuhare jīvanmuktā vyavasthitāḥ / yathā baḍisuhotrāndhaprahlādahlādapūrvakāḥ //MU_5,75.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13658: tiryagyoniṣv api sadā vartante kṛtabuddhayaḥ / devayoniṣv api prājña vartante mūrkhabuddhayaḥ //MU_5,75.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13659: sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvatra sarvathā sarvadaiva hi / sambhavaty eva sarvātmany ātmanātmasvarūpiṇi //MU_5,75.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13660: vidher vicitrā niyatir anantārambhamantharā / sanniveśāṃśavaicitryāt sarvaṃ sarvatra dṛśyate //MU_5,75.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13661: vidhir daivaṃ vibhur dhātā sarveśaś śiva īśvaraḥ / iti nāmabhir ātmāntaḥ pratyakcetana ucyate //MU_5,75.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13662: asty avastuni vastv antaḥ kāñcanaṃ sikatāsv iva / asti vastuny avastv antar malaṃ hemakaṇeṣv iva //MU_5,75.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13663: ayukte yuktatā yuktyā prekṣyamāṇā pradṛśyate / pāpasya hi bhayāl loko dharme rāma pravartate //MU_5,75.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13664: asatye satyatā sādho śāśvatī parilakṣyate / śūnyena dhyānayogena śāśvataṃ padam āpyate //MU_5,75.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13665: yan nāsti tad udety āśu deśakālavilāsataḥ / śaśakāś śṛṅgavanto hi dṛśyante śambarasthitau //MU_5,75.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13666: ye vajrasārās sudṛḍhā dṛśyante te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ / kalpasyānte yathendvarkadharābdhivibudhādrayaḥ //MU_5,75.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13667: iti paśyan mahābāho bhāvābhāvabhavakramam / harṣāmarṣaviṣādehās santyajya samatāṃ vraja //MU_5,75.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13668: asat sad avabhātīha sad asac cāpi dṛśyate / āsthānāsthe parityajya tenāśu samatāṃ vraja //MU_5,75.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13669: muktau rāghava loke 'smin na prāptis sambhavaty alam / apravṛttyā vivekasya magnā hi janakoṭayaḥ //MU_5,75.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13670: muktau rāghava loke 'smin prāptir asti sadaiva hi / pravṛttyā hi vivekasya muktāś ca janakoṭayaḥ //MU_5,75.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13671: pravivekāvivekābhyāṃ sulabhālabhyatāṃ gatā / muktir manaḥkṣayaprāptyā vivekaṃ tena dīpaya //MU_5,75.45//
GSP27moksop_u:13672: ātmāvalokane yatnaḥ kartavyo bhūtim icchatā / sarvaduḥkhaśiraścheda ātmālokena jāyate //MU_5,75.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13673: nīrāgā nirupāsaṅgā jīvanmuktā mahādhiyaḥ / sambhavantīha bahavas suhotrajanakā iva //MU_5,75.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13674: tasmāt tvam api vai rāma vivekoditadhīradhīḥ / jīvanmukto vihara bhos samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ //MU_5,75.48//
GSP27moksop_u:13675: dvividhā muktatā loke vidyate dehadhāriṇām / sadehaikā videhānyā vibhāgo 'yaṃ tayoś śṛṇu //MU_5,75.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13676: asaṃsaṅgāt padārthānāṃ manaśśāntir hi muktatā / saty asaty api dehe sā sambhavaty anaghākṛte //MU_5,75.50//
GSP27moksop_u:13677: snehasaṅkṣayam evāṅga viduḥ kaivalyam uttamāḥ / tat sambhavati dehasya bhāve cābhāva eva ca //MU_5,75.51//
GSP27moksop_u:13678: yo jīvati gatasnehaṃ sa jīvanmukta ucyate / sasnehajīvito baddho mukta eva tṛtīyakaḥ //MU_5,75.52//
GSP27moksop_u:13679: yatno yatnena kartavyo mokṣārthaṃ yuktipūrvakam / yatnayuktivihīnasya goṣpadaṃ dustaraṃ bhavet //MU_5,75.53//
GSP27moksop_u:13680: na tv anadhyavasāyasya duḥkhāya vipulātmane / ātmā paravaśaḥ kāryo moham āśritya kevalam //MU_5,75.54//
GSP27moksop_u:13681: sumahad dhairyam ālambya manasā vyavasāyinā / vicārayātmanātmānam ātmanaś cirasiddhaye //MU_5,75.55//
GSP27moksop_u:13682: vitatādhyavasāyasya jagad bhavati goṣpadam / vihatādhyavasāyasya goṣpadaṃ vai jagad bhavet //MU_5,75.56//
GSP27moksop_u:13683: yad upagatas sugataḥ paraṃ pradhānaṃ yad upagato dhruvatāṃ nṛpaś ca kaścit / yad upagatāḥ padam uttamaṃ mahāntaḥ prayatanakarmataror mahāphalaṃ tat //MU_5,75.57//
GSP27moksop_u:13686: vasiṣṭhaḥ: brahmaṇas samupāyānti jagantīmāni rāghava / sthairyaṃ yānty avivekena śāmyanty aṅga vivekataḥ //MU_5,76.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13687: jagajjālajalāvartavṛttayo brahmavāridhau / saṅkhyātuṃ kena śakyante bhāsāṃ ca trasareṇavaḥ //MU_5,76.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13688: asamyakprekṣaṇaṃ viddhi kāraṇaṃ jagatas sthitau / saṃsāraśāntāv ekāntakāraṇaṃ samyagīkṣaṇam //MU_5,76.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13689: ayaṃ hi rāma duṣpāro ghoras saṃsārasāgaraḥ / vinā yuktiprayatnābhyām asmān nāma na tīryate //MU_5,76.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13690: ayaṃ hi sāgaraḥ pūrṇo mohāmbubharapūritaḥ / agādhamaraṇāvartaḥ kallolākulakoṭaraḥ //MU_5,76.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13693: paśyāsmin prasṛtā rāma vīcayaś cārucañcalāḥ / imā mugdhāṅganānāmnyaś śikharākarṣaṇakṣamāḥ //MU_5,76.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13697: evaṃvilolalaharībhīmāt saṃsārasāgarāt / uttīryate cen magnena tat paraṃ pauruṣaṃ bhavet //MU_5,76.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13698: satyāṃ prajñāmahānāvi viveke sati nāvike / saṃsārasāgarād asmād yo na tīrṇo dhig astu tam //MU_5,76.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13699: apārāvāram ākramya prameyīkṛtya sarvataḥ / saṃsārābdhiṃ gāhate yas sa eva puruṣas smṛtaḥ //MU_5,76.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13700: vicāryāryais sahālokya dhiyā saṃsārasāgaram / etasmiṃs tadanu krīḍā śobhate rāma nānyathā //MU_5,76.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13701: iha bhavyo bhavān sādho vicāraparayā dhiyā / tvayā yūnaiva yenāyaṃ saṃsāraḥ pravicāryate //MU_5,76.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13702: bhavān iva vicāryādau saṃsāram atikāntayā / matyā yo gāhate loke nehāsau parimajjati //MU_5,76.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13703: pūrvaṃ dhiyā vicāryaite bhogā bhogibhayapradāḥ / bhoktavyāś caramaṃ rāma garuḍeneva pannagāḥ //MU_5,76.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13704: vicārya tattvam ālokya sevyante yā vibhūtayaḥ / tā udarkodayā jantoś śeṣā duḥkhāya kevalam //MU_5,76.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13705: balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca dṛṣṭatattvasya vardhate / savasantasya vṛkṣasya saundaryādyā guṇā iva //MU_5,76.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13706: ghanarasāyanapūraṇaśītayā vimalayā samayā satataṃ dhiyā / śiśiraraśmir ivātivirājate viditavedyasukhaṃ raghunandana //MU_5,76.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13709: rāmaḥ: samāsena mune bhūyo dṛṣṭatattvacamatkṛtim / kathayodāravṛttānte kas te vacasi tṛpyati //MU_5,77.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13710: vasiṣṭhaḥ: jīvanmuktasya bahudhā kathitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ mayā / bhūyo 'pi ca mahābāho kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu //MU_5,77.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13711: suṣuptavad idaṃ nityaṃ paśyaty apagataiṣaṇaḥ / asadrūpaṃ ivāsaktas sarvatrākhilam ātmavān //MU_5,77.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13712: kaivalyam iva samprāptaḥ parisuptamanā iva / ghūrṇamāna ivānandī tiṣṭhaty adhigatātmadṛk //MU_5,77.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13713: na dattam apy upādatte gṛhītam api pāṇinā / antarmukhatayodāttarūpayā samayā dhiyā //MU_5,77.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13714: yantraputrakasañcāra itīmaṃ janatākramam / antassaṃlīnayā dṛṣṭyā paśyan hasati śāntadhīḥ //MU_5,77.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13715: nāpekṣate bhaviṣyac ca vartamāne na tiṣṭhati / na saṃsmaraty atītaṃ ca sarvam eva karoti ca //MU_5,77.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13716: suptaḥ prabuddho bhavati prabuddho 'pi ca suptavat / sarvakarmakaro 'py antar na karotīva kiñcana //MU_5,77.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13717: antas sarvaparityāgī nityam antar aneṣaṇaḥ / kurvann api bahiḥ kāryaṃ sarvam evāvatiṣṭhate //MU_5,77.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13719: samagrasukhabhogātmā sarvāśāsv iva saṃsthitaḥ / karoty akhilakarmāṇi tyaktakartṛtvavibhramaḥ //MU_5,77.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13720: udāsīnavad āsīnaḥ prakṛtikramakarmasu / nābhivāñchati na dveṣṭi na śocati na hṛṣyati //MU_5,77.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13721: anubandhaparo jantāv asaṃsaktena cetasā / bhakte bhaktasamācāraś śaṭhe śaṭha iva sthitaḥ //MU_5,77.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13722: bālo bāleṣu vṛddheṣu vṛddho vīreṣu vīryavān / yuvā yauvanavṛtteṣu duḥkhiteṣu tu duḥkhitaḥ //MU_5,77.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13723: pravṛttavākpuṇyakatho dainyād apagatāśayaḥ / dhīradhīr uditānandaḥ peśalaḥ puṇyakīrtanaḥ //MU_5,77.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13724: prājñaḥ prasannamadhuraḥ pūrṇas supratibhodayaḥ / nirastakhedadaurgatyas sarvasmin snigdhabāndhavaḥ //MU_5,77.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13725: udāracaritākāras samas saukhyamahodadhiḥ / susnigdhaś śītalasparśaḥ pūrṇaś candra ivoditaḥ //MU_5,77.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13726: na tasya sukṛtenārtho na bhogair na ca karmabhiḥ / na duṣkṛtair na bhogānāṃ santyāgena na bandhubhiḥ //MU_5,77.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13727: na kāryakaraṇārambhair na niṣkriyatayā tathā / na bandhena na mokṣeṇa na pātālena no divā //MU_5,77.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13728: yathāvastu yadā dṛṣṭaṃ jagad ekamayātmakam / tadā bandhavimokṣārthaṃ na kvacit kṛpaṇaṃ manaḥ //MU_5,77.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13729: samyagjñānāgninā yasya dagdhā sandehajālikā / niśśaṅkam alam uḍḍīnas tasya cittavihaṅgamaḥ //MU_5,77.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13730: yasya bhrāntivinirmuktaṃ manas samarasaṃ sthitam / sa nāstam eti nodeti vyomavat sarvavṛttiṣu //MU_5,77.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13731: mañjūṣāyāṃ niṣaṇṇasya yathā bālasya ceṣṭate / aṅgāvaly anusandhānavarjitā jñasya vai tathā //MU_5,77.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13732: ghūrṇan kṣīva ivānandī mandīkṛtapunarbhavaḥ / anupādeyabuddhyā tu na smaraty akṛtaṃ kṛtam //MU_5,77.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13733: sarvaṃ sarvaprakāreṇa gṛhṇāti ca jahāti ca / anupādeyasarvārtho bālavac ca viceṣṭate //MU_5,77.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13734: sa tiṣṭhann api kāryeṣu deśakālakriyākramaiḥ / na kāryasukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ manāg api hi gṛhyate //MU_5,77.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13735: bahiḥ prakṛtasarvārtho 'py antaḥ punar anīhayā / na sattāṃ yojayaty arthe na phalāny anudhāvati //MU_5,77.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13736: nopekṣate duḥkhadaśāṃ na sukhāśām apekṣate / kāryodaye naiti mudaṃ kāryanāśe na khidyate //MU_5,77.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13737: api śītarucāv arke sukṛṣṇe 'pīndumaṇḍale / apy adhaḥ prasaraty agnau vismayo 'sya na jāyate //MU_5,77.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13738: cidātmana imā itthaṃ prasphurantīha śaktayaḥ / ity asyāścaryajāleṣu nābhyudeti kutūhalam //MU_5,77.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13739: na dayādainyam ādatte na krauryam anudhāvati / na lajjām anusandhatte nālajjatvaṃ ca gacchati //MU_5,77.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13740: na kadācana dīnātmā noddhatātmā kadācana / na pramatto na khinnātmā nodvigno na ca harṣavān //MU_5,77.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13741: nāsya cetasi susphāre śaradambaranirmale / kopādayaḥ pravartante nabhasīva navāṅkurāḥ //MU_5,77.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13742: anāratapatajjātabhūtāyāṃ jagatas sthitau / kva kathaṃ kila kāsya syāt sukhitā duḥkhitātha vā //MU_5,77.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13743: phenājavañjavībhāve jale bhūtakrame tathā / kva kileha kutaḥ ko 'ntaḥ prasaṅgas sukhaduḥkhayoḥ //MU_5,77.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13744: bhāvābhāvair aparyantair ajasraṃ jantusambhavaiḥ / na viṣīdanti nodyanti dṛṣṭasṛṣṭikramā narāḥ //MU_5,77.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13745: nimeṣaṃ prati yāminyā yathānyās svapnadṛṣṭayaḥ / yathotpannavināśinyas tathaitā lokadṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_5,77.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13746: anāratasamutpattāv anāratavināśini / kaḥ kramo dagdhasaṃsāre kāruṇyānandayor iha //MU_5,77.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13747: śubhābhāvāt sukhābhāve sthitiṃ yāte vilakṣaṇāḥ / kīdṛśyaḥ katham āyātāḥ kā vā tā duḥkhasaṃvidaḥ //MU_5,77.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13748: sukham ante tadantotthā svabījaṃ vitanoti yā / śāntaṃ duḥkhadaśā seyaṃ katham antarite sukhe //MU_5,77.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13749: kṣīṇābhyāṃ sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ heyopādeyayoḥ kṣaye / īpsitānīpsite kva sto galite 'tha śubhāśubhe //MU_5,77.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13750: ramyāramyadṛśor nāśāc chānte bhogābhivāñchane / nairāśyasantatiprauḍhe himavad vigalen manaḥ //MU_5,77.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13751: ā mūlān manasi kṣīṇe saṅkalpasya kathaiva kā / tileṣv evātidagdheṣu tailasya kalanā kutaḥ //MU_5,77.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13752: bhāveṣv abhāvaghanabhāvanayā mahātmā nirmuktasaṅkalanam ambaravat sthiteṣu / cittaṃ prati svamudito viditaikarūpī jñas tiṣṭhati svapiti jīvati nityatṛptaḥ //MU_5,77.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13755: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yathālātaparispandād agnicakraṃ pravartate / asad eva sadābhāsaṃ cittaspandāt tathā jagat //MU_5,78.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13756: yathā jalaparispandād vyatirikta ivāmbhasaḥ / dṛśyate vartulāvartaś cittaspandāt tathā jagat //MU_5,78.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13757: yathā vyomnīkṣitaspandāt piñchamauktikamaṇḍalam / dṛśyate sad ivāsatyaṃ cittaspandāt tathā jagat //MU_5,78.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13758: rāmaḥ: yena praspandate cittaṃ yena na spandate 'tha vā / tad brahman brūhi me yena cikitsyeta tad eva hi //MU_5,78.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13759: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yathā śauklyahime rāma tilatailalavau yathā / yathā kusumasaugandhye tathauṣṇyadahanau yathā //MU_5,78.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13760: raghunandana saṃśliṣṭau cittaspandau tathaiva hi / abhinnau kevalaṃ mithyā bhedaḥ kalpita etayoḥ //MU_5,78.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13761: cittacittaparispandapakṣayor ekasaṅkṣaye / svayaṃ guṇaguṇisthityā naśyato dvau na saṃśayaḥ //MU_5,78.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13762: dvau kramau cittanāśasya yogo jñānaṃ ca rāghava / yogas tadvṛttirodho hi jñānaṃ samyagavekṣaṇam //MU_5,78.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13763: rāmaḥ: kayā kīdṛkṣayā vṛttyā prāṇāpānanibaddhayā / yoganāmnyā manaś śāntim ety anantasukhapradām //MU_5,78.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13764: vasiṣṭhaḥ: dehe 'smin dehanāḍīṣu vātas sphurati yo 'bhitaḥ / skhadāsv iva bhuvo vāri sa prāṇa iti kīrtitaḥ //MU_5,78.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13765: tasya spandavaśād antaḥ kriyāvaicitryam īyuṣaḥ / apānādīni nāmāni kalpitāni kṛtātmabhiḥ //MU_5,78.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13766: āmodasya yathā puṣpaṃ śauklyasya tuhinaṃ yathā / tathaiṣa ratha ādhāraś cittasyābhinnatāṃ gataḥ //MU_5,78.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13767: antaḥprāṇaparispandāt saṅkalpakalanonmukhī / saṃvit sañjāyate yaiṣā tac cittaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_5,78.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13768: prāṇaspandaṃ vidus spandaṃ tatspandād eva saṃvidaḥ / cakrāvartavidhāyinyo jalaspandād ivormayaḥ //MU_5,78.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13769: cittaṃ prāṇaparispandam āhur āgamabhūṣaṇāḥ / tasmin saṃrodhite nūnam upaśāntaṃ bhaven manaḥ //MU_5,78.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13770: manasspandopaśāntyāyaṃ saṃsāraḥ pravilīyate / sūryālokaparispandaśāntau vyavahṛtir yathā //MU_5,78.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13771: rāmaḥ: aniśaṃ caratāṃ dehagehe gahanagāminām / prāṇādīnāṃ parispando vāyūnāṃ rodhyate katham //MU_5,78.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13772: vasiṣṭhaḥ: śāstrasajjanasamparkād vairāgyābhyāsayogataḥ / anāsthāyāṃ kṛtāsthāyāṃ pūrvaṃ saṃsāravṛttiṣu //MU_5,78.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13773: yathābhivāñchitadhyānāc ciram ekatayoditāt / etattattvaghanābhyāsāt prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13775: oṅkāroccāraṇaprāntaśabdatattvānudhāvanāt / suṣupte saṃvido jāte prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13776: recake nūnam abhyaste prāṇe sphāraṃ kham āgate / na spṛśaty aṅgarandhrāṇi prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13777: kumbhake pūrvavat kālam anantaṃ paritiṣṭhati / abhyāsāt stambhite prāṇe prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13778: tālumūlagatāṃ yatnāj jihvayākramya ghaṇṭikām / ūrdhvarandhragate prāṇe prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13779: samastakalanonmukte nakiñcinnāmni sūkṣmakhe / dhyānāt saṃvidi līnāyāṃ prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13780: dvādaśāṅgulaparyante nāsāgre vimalāmbare / samyag dṛśoḥ praśāmyantyoḥ prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13781: abhyāsād ūrdhvarandhreṇa tālūrdhvadvādaśāntage / prāṇe galitasaṃvittau prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13782: bhrūmadhye tārakālokaśāntāv astam upāgate / cetane ketane buddheḥ prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13783: ciraṃ kālaṃ hṛdekāntavyomasaṃvedanān muneḥ / avāsanamanodhyānāt prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13784: rāmaḥ: brahmañ jagati bhūtānāṃ hṛdayaṃ tat kim ucyate / idaṃ sarvaṃ mahādarśe yasmiṃs tat pratibimbati //MU_5,78.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13785: vasiṣṭhaḥ: sādho jagati bhūtānāṃ dvividhaṃ hṛdayaṃ sthitam / upādeyaṃ ca heyaṃ ca vibhāgo 'yaṃ tayoś śṛṇu //MU_5,78.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13786: iyattayā paricchinne dehe yad vakṣaso 'ntare / heyaṃ tad dhṛdayaṃ viddhi tanāv ekataṭe sthitam //MU_5,78.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13787: saṃvinmātraṃ tu hṛdayam upādeyaṃ nṛṇāṃ smṛtam / tad antare ca bāhye ca na ca bāhye na cāntare //MU_5,78.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13788: tat tatpradhānaṃ hṛdayaṃ tatredaṃ samavasthitam / tad ādarśaḥ padārthānāṃ tat kośas sarvasampadām //MU_5,78.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13789: sarveṣām eva jantūnāṃ saṃvid dhṛdayam ucyate / na dehāvayavaikāṃśo jaḍo jīrṇopalopamaḥ //MU_5,78.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13790: tasmāt saṃvinmaye śuddhe hṛdaye 'tra vivāsanam / balān niyojite citte prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13791: ebhiḥ kramair athānyaiś ca nānāsaṅkalpakalpitaiḥ / nānādaiśikavaktrasthaiḥ prāṇaspando nirudhyate //MU_5,78.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13792: abhyāsena nirābādham etās tā yogayuktayaḥ / upāyatām upāyānti bhavyasya bhavabhedane //MU_5,78.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13793: abhyāsād dṛḍhatāṃ yātād vairāgyaparilāñchitāt / yathāvāsanam āyāmaḥ prāṇānāṃ saphalas smṛtaḥ //MU_5,78.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13794: bhrūnāsātālusaṃsthāsu dvādaśāṅgulakoṭiṣu / abhyāsāc chāmyati prāṇo dūre girinadī yathā //MU_5,78.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13795: bhūyo bhūyaś cirābhyāsāj jihvāprāntena tāluni / ghaṇṭikā spṛśyate prāṇā yenordhvena vahanty alam //MU_5,78.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13796: vikalpabahulās tv ete svabhyāsena samādhayaḥ / paramopaśamāyāśu samprayānty avikalpatām //MU_5,78.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13797: ātmārāmo vītaśoko bhavaty antassukhaḥ pumān / abhyāsād eva nānyasmāt tasmād abhyāsavān bhava //MU_5,78.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13798: abhyāsena parispande prāṇānāṃ kṣayam āgate / manaḥ praśamam āyāti nirvāṇam avaśiṣyate //MU_5,78.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13799: vāsanāvalitaṃ janma mokṣo nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ / prāṇaś ca rāma gṛhṇāti yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,78.45//
GSP27moksop_u:13800: prāṇaspando manorūpaṃ tasmāt saṃsṛtisambhramaḥ / tasminn eva śamaṃ yāte kṣīyate saṃsṛtijvaraḥ //MU_5,78.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13801: vikalpasaṅkṣayāj jantoḥ padaṃ tad avaśiṣyate / yato vāco nivartante samastakalanānvitāḥ //MU_5,78.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13802: yatra sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yat / yatra nedaṃ yato nedaṃ yan nedaṃ nedṛśaṃ ca yat //MU_5,78.48//
GSP27moksop_u:13803: vināśitvād vikalpitvād guṇitvān nirguṇātmanaḥ / yasya no sadṛśo dṛśye dṛṣṭāntaḥ kaścid eva hi //MU_5,78.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13804: svādanī sarvaśālīnāṃ dīpikā sarvatejasām / kalanā sarvakāmānāṃ yataś ciccandrikoditā //MU_5,78.50//
GSP27moksop_u:13805: yatsaṅkalpataror bahvyas saṃsāraphalapaṅktayaḥ / anārataṃ bahurasā jāyante ca patanti ca //MU_5,78.51//
GSP27moksop_u:13806: tat padaṃ sarvasīmāntam avalambya mahāmatiḥ / yas sthitas sthiradhīs tajjñas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_5,78.52//
GSP27moksop_u:13807: vigatasarvasamīhitakautukas samupaśāntahitāhitakalpanaḥ / sakalasaṃvyavahārasamāśayo bhavati muktamanāḥ puruṣottamaḥ //MU_5,78.53//
GSP27moksop_u:13810: rāmaḥ: yogayuktyāsya cittasya śama evaṃ nirūpitaḥ / samyagjñānam idānīṃ me kathayānugrahāt prabho //MU_5,79.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13811: vasiṣṭhaḥ: anādyantāvabhāsātmā paramātmeha vidyate / ity ekaniścayas sphāras samyagjñānaṃ vidur budhāḥ //MU_5,79.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13812: imā ghaṭapaṭākārapadārthaśataśaktayaḥ / ātmaiva nānyad astīti niścayas samyagīkṣaṇam //MU_5,79.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13813: asamyagvedanāj janma mokṣas samyagavekṣaṇāt / asamyagvīkṣaṇād rajjus sarpo no samyagīkṣaṇāt //MU_5,79.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13814: saṅkalpāṃśavinirmuktā saṃvit saṃvedyavarjitā / saṃvid ādyābhir ākhyābhir muktāstīha hi netarat //MU_5,79.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13815: sā śuddharūpā vijñātā paramātmeti kathyate / buddhā tv aśuddharūpāntar avidyety ucyate budhaiḥ //MU_5,79.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13816: saṃvittir eva saṃvedyaṃ nānayor dvitvakalpanā / cinoty ātmānam ātmaiva rāmaivaṃ nānyad asti hi //MU_5,79.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13817: yathābhūtārthadarśitvam etāvadbhuvanatraye / yad ātmaiva jagat sarvam iti niścitya pūrṇatā //MU_5,79.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13818: sarvam ātmaiva kiṃniṣṭhau bhāvābhāvau kva vāsthitau / kva bandhamokṣakalane kim anyad rāma śocyate //MU_5,79.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13819: na cittam anyan no cetyaṃ brahmaivedaṃ vijṛmbhate / sarvaṃ ekaṃ paraṃ vyoma kva mokṣaḥ kasya baddhatā //MU_5,79.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13820: brahmedaṃ bṛṃhitākāraṃ bṛhad bṛṃhad avasthitam / dūram astamitadvitvaṃ bhavātmaiva tvam ātmanā //MU_5,79.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13821: samyagālokite rūpe kāṣṭhapāṣāṇavāsasām / manāg api na bhedo 'sti kvāpi saṅkalpanonmukhaḥ //MU_5,79.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13822: ādāv ante ca saṃśāntaṃ svarūpam avināśi yat / vastūnām ātmanaś caiva tanmayo bhava rāghava //MU_5,79.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13823: dvaitādvaitasamudbhūtair jarāmaraṇavibhramaiḥ / sphuraty ātmabhir ātmaiva citrair ambv iva vīcibhiḥ //MU_5,79.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13824: śuddham ātmānam ālambya nityam antassthayā dhiyā / yas sthitas taṃ ka ātmeśaṃ bhogo vañcayituṃ kṣamaḥ //MU_5,79.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13825: kṛtasphāravicārasya mano bhogādayo 'rayaḥ / manāg api na bhindanti śailaṃ mandānilā iva //MU_5,79.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13826: avicāriṇam ajñānaṃ mūḍham āśāparāyaṇam / nigirantīha duḥkhāni bakā matsyam ivājalam //MU_5,79.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13827: jagad ātmaiva sakalam avidyā nāsti kutracit / iti dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya samyagrūpāṃ sthiro bhava //MU_5,79.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13828: nānātvam asti kalanāsu na vastuto 'ntar nānāvidhāsu sarasīṣu jalād ivānyat / ity ekaniścayamayaḥ puruṣo vimukta ity ucyate samavalokitasamyagarthaḥ //MU_5,79.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13831: vasiṣṭhaḥ: idam antaḥ kalayato bhogān prati vivekinaḥ / purassthitān api sadā spṛhaivāṅga na jāyate //MU_5,80.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13832: cakṣur ālokanāyaiva jīvas tu sukhaduḥkhayoḥ / bhārāyaiva balīvardo bhoktā dravyasya nāyakaḥ //MU_5,80.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13833: nayane rūpanirmagne kṣobhaḥ ka iva dehinaḥ / gardabhe palvalonmagne kaiva senāpateḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_5,80.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13834: rūpakardamam etan mānaya nāsvādayādhama / naśyaty etan nimeṣeṇa bhavantam api hiṃsati //MU_5,80.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13835: yenaiva sakhyaṃ kriyate ya evābhyanugamyate / tadīyaiḥ karmabhiḥ kṣipraṃ prājñaś śūro 'pi badhyate //MU_5,80.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13836: utpannadhvaṃsi sampātamātrahṛdyam asanmayam / rūpam āśraya mā netra vināśāyāvināśine //MU_5,80.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13837: sākṣivat tvaṃ sthitaṃ netra rūpaṃ ātmani tiṣṭhati / ālokaḥ kālavaśatas tvam ekaḥ kiṃ pratapyase //MU_5,80.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13838: salilaspandavad dṛṣṭiḥ piñchikevāmbarotthitā / svajātibandhāt sphurati tava citta kim āgatam //MU_5,80.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13839: svalpāmbhasīva śaphare citte sphuraṇadharmiṇi / svayaṃ sphuraty ahaṅkāra tvam ayaṃ protthitaḥ kutaḥ //MU_5,80.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13840: ālokarūpayor nityaṃ jaḍayos sphurator mithaḥ / ādhārādheyayoś citta vyartham ākulatā tava //MU_5,80.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13841: rūpālokamanaskārāḥ parasparam asaṅginaḥ / saṃsaktā iva lakṣyante vadanādarśabimbavat //MU_5,80.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13842: ajñānajantunā hy ete śliṣṭā jātā nirantarāḥ / ajñāne jñānagalite pṛthak tiṣṭhanty asanmayāḥ //MU_5,80.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13843: manaḥkalanayā hy ete susambaddhāḥ parasparam / rūpālokamanaskārā dārūṇi jatunā yathā //MU_5,80.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13844: svamanomanane tantau mano'bhyāsena yatnataḥ / vicārāc chedam āyāte chinnaivājñānabhāvanā //MU_5,80.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13845: ajñānasaṅkṣayāt kṣīṇe manasy ete punar mithaḥ / rūpālokamanaskārās saṅghaṭante na kecana //MU_5,80.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13846: sarveṣāṃ cittam evāntar indriyāṇāṃ prabodhakam / tad eva tasmād ucchedyaṃ piśāca iva mandirāt //MU_5,80.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13847: citta valgasi mithyaiva dṛṣṭo 'nto bhavato mayā / ādyanteṣu sutucchas tvaṃ vartamāne 'pi na hy asi //MU_5,80.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13848: mudhā pañcabhir ākāraiḥ kim antaḥ parivalgasi / yas tvāṃ tv ām iti jānāti tasyaitat parivalgyate //MU_5,80.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13849: tvadvalganaṃ me kumano na manāg api tuṣṭaye / māyānaraspanda iva vyarthaṃ vṛttiṣu dahyase //MU_5,80.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13850: tiṣṭha vā gaccha vā citta nāsi me śaṭha jīvasi / prakṛtyāsi mṛtaṃ nityaṃ vicārāt sumṛtaṃ sthitam //MU_5,80.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13851: nistattvaṃ tvaṃ jaḍaṃ bhrātaś śaṭha nityamṛtākṛte / mūḍha eva tvayājñena vañcyate na vicāravān //MU_5,80.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13852: vayam ājñātavantas tvāṃ maurkhyeṇānusṛtaṃ bhavet / mṛtam asmākam adyāsi dīpānāṃ timiraṃ yathā //MU_5,80.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13853: śaṭhena bhavatā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama / uparuddham abhūt pūrvaṃ sādhusaṃsargavarjitam //MU_5,80.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13854: jaḍe pretasamākāre gate tvayi manaśśaṭhe / sarvasajjanasaṃsevyaṃ idaṃ dehagṛhaṃ sthitam //MU_5,80.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13855: pūrvam evāsi nāsy eva sampraty api jaḍaṃ śaṭham / na bhaviṣyasi cedānīṃ kiṃ vetāla na lajjase //MU_5,80.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13856: saha tṛṣṇāpiśācībhis saha kopādiguhyakaiḥ / nirgaccha cittavetāla śarīrasadanān mama //MU_5,80.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13857: diṣṭyā vivekamantreṇa nirgato dehamandirāt / pramattacittavetālaḥ kuvṛkaḥ kandarād iva //MU_5,80.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13858: aho nu citraṃ sumahaj jaḍena kṣaṇabhaṅginā / manaśśaṭhena sarvo 'yaṃ nīto vivaśatāṃ janaḥ //MU_5,80.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13859: kas te parākramaḥ kiṃ te balaṃ kas te samāśrayaḥ / yadi valgasi mām eva janatāṃ bādhase tathā //MU_5,80.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13860: śaṭhātmaivāsi na mayā dīnacittaka māryase / mṛtam ity avabuddhaṃ tvam adya kevalam ajña he //MU_5,80.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13861: etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ tvāṃ jñātvā jīvadāsthitam / kliṣṭaḥ prabhūtabhaṅgāsu ciraṃ saṃsṛtirātriṣu //MU_5,80.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13862: cittaṃ mṛtaṃ hi nāstīha tv ity adyāvagataṃ mayā / tena tvadāśāṃ santyajya tiṣṭhāmy ātmani kevalaḥ //MU_5,80.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13863: diṣṭyā cittaṃ mṛtam iti jñātam adya mayā svayam / na śaṭhena samaṃ nītaṃ samagraṃ jīvitaṃ nijam //MU_5,80.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13864: utsārya dehasadanān manaśśaṭham ahaṃ kṣaṇāt / ayaṃ svasthas sthito 'smy antarvetālaparivarjitaḥ //MU_5,80.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13865: cittavetālalabdhena ciraṃ kālaṃ mayoddhatāḥ / kṛtā vikārā vividhās svayaṃ kṛtvā hasāmi yān //MU_5,80.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13866: cirān nipatito diṣṭyā vicārāsivarāṅkitaḥ / hṛdgehāc cittavetālas tālottālasamunnatiḥ //MU_5,80.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13867: praśāntacittavetāle pavitrāṃ padavīṃ gate / diṣṭyā śarīranagare sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ //MU_5,80.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13868: mṛtaṃ mano mṛtāś cintā mṛto 'haṅkārarākṣasaḥ / vicāramantreṇa samas svasthas tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ //MU_5,80.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13869: kiṃ mano me mamāśāḥ kāḥ ko me 'haṅkārako bhavet / diṣṭyā vyarthaṃ kalatraṃ me naṣṭam etad aśeṣataḥ //MU_5,80.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13870: ekasmai kṛtakṛtyāya nityāya vimalātmane / nirvikalpacidākhyāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13871: na mamāśā na karmāṇi na saṃsāro na kartṛtā / na bhoktṛtā na deho me mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13872: nāham ātmā na cākāśo na caivāyam ahaṃ svayam / mama nāsti vyavacchedo mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13873: nīrūpāya nirākhyāya prakāśāyāmalātmane / svayam ātmaikasaṃsthāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13874: nirvikārāya nityāya niraṃśāya nirātmane / sarvasmai sarvakāryāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13875: samāṃ sarvagatāṃ sūkṣmāṃ jagadekaprakāśinīm / sattām upāgato 'smy antar mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.45//
GSP27moksop_u:13876: sādridyūrvīnadīśāṅgaṃ nāham evāham eva vā / jagat sarvapadārthāḍhyaṃ mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13877: vyapagatamananaṃ śamābhirāmaṃ prakaṭitaviśvam aviśvam apy anantam / svayam ajam ajaraṃ guṇād atītaṃ vapur aham acyutam aiśvaraṃ namāmi //MU_5,80.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13880: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ vicārya buddhyāntaḥ punar itthaṃ vicāryate / tattvavidbhir mahābāho jñeya ātmā mahātmabhiḥ //MU_5,81.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13881: ātmaivedaṃ jagad iti satyaṃ cittena mārjitam / utthitaṃ syāt kutaś cittam aho citram avastu yat //MU_5,81.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13882: avidyātvād acittvāc ca samāyātvāt sadaiva hi / mṛtaṃ nāsty eva vā cittaṃ bhramād anyat khapuṣpavat //MU_5,81.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13883: siddhas sthāṇuparispando naugatasya yathā śiśoḥ / abuddhasya na buddhasya tathā cittam asanmayam //MU_5,81.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13884: maurkhyamohabhrame śānte cittaṃ nopalabhāmahe / cakrārohabhramasyānte parvataspandanaṃ yathā //MU_5,81.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13885: evaṃ hi cittaṃ nāsty eva brahmaivāsti tatātmakam / padārthabhāvanāś citrās tenāsatyā mayojjhitāḥ //MU_5,81.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13886: jāto 'smi śāntasandehas sthito 'smi vigatajvaraḥ / yathā tiṣṭhāmi tiṣṭhāmi tathaiva vigataiṣaṇam //MU_5,81.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13887: cittābhāve parikṣīṇā balāt tṛṣṇādayo guṇāḥ / ālokoparame citrā varṇākhyā iva saṃvidaḥ //MU_5,81.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13888: mṛtaṃ cittaṃ gatās tṛṣṇāḥ prakṣīṇaṃ mohapañjaram / nirahaṅkāratā jātā jagaty asmi prabuddhavān //MU_5,81.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13889: ekam eva jagac chāntaṃ nānātvaṃ na sad ity api / kim anyad vimṛśāmy antaḥ kathayaivālam etayā //MU_5,81.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13890: nirābhāsam anādyantaṃ padaṃ pāvanam āgataḥ / somyas sarvagatas sūkṣmas sthita ātmāsmi śāśvataḥ //MU_5,81.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13891: yad asti yac ca nāstīha cittādy ātmādy avastu vā / tat khād acchataraṃ śāntam anantāgrāhyam ātatam //MU_5,81.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13892: cittaṃ bhavatu vā māntar niyatāṃ smṛtim etu vā / ko vicāraṇayārtho me niraṃśasyoditātmanaḥ //MU_5,81.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13893: vicārakārako maurkhyād aham āsam iti sthitiḥ / vicāreṇāmitākāraḥ kvādhunāhaṃ vicārakaḥ //MU_5,81.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13894: mṛte 'pi manasīyaṃ me vikalpaśrīr nirarthakā / manovetālavṛttyarthaṃ kimartham upajāyate //MU_5,81.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13895: tad imāṃ prajahāmy antar vikalpakalanām alam / nirṇīyom iti śāntātmā tiṣṭhāmy ātmani maunavān //MU_5,81.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13896: aśnan gacchan svapaṃs tiṣṭhann iti rāghava cetasā / sarvatra prajñayā tajjñaḥ pratyahaṃ pravicārayet //MU_5,81.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13897: pravicārya svasaṃsthena svasthena svena cetasā / tiṣṭhanti vigatodvegaṃ santaḥ prakṛtakarmasu //MU_5,81.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13898: vigatamānamadā muditāśayāś śaradupoḍhaśaśāṅkasamatviṣaḥ / prakṛtasaṃvyavahāravihāriṇas tv iha sukhaṃ viharanti mahādhiyaḥ //MU_5,81.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13901: vasiṣṭhaḥ: vicāra evaṃ viduṣā saṃvartena kṛtaḥ purā / kathito mama vindhyādrau tenaiva viditātmanā //MU_5,82.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13902: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya vicāraparayā dhiyā / saṃsārasāgarād asmāt tāratamyena santara //MU_5,82.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13903: athemām aparāṃ rāma śṛṇu dṛṣṭiṃ padapradām / muninā vītahavyena yathā sthitam aśaṅkitam //MU_5,82.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13904: vītahavyo mahātejā babhrāmābhrāmbaraḥ purā / vindhyaśailadarīr dīrghā ravir merudarīr iva //MU_5,82.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13905: asmāt kriyākramād ghorāt saṃsārabhramadāyinaḥ / ādhivyādhimayākārāt kālenodvegam āyayau //MU_5,82.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13907: viveśa rambhāracitaṃ nijaṃ parṇoṭajāntaram / cūtagauraṃ sasaugandhyam alir nīlam ivotpalam //MU_5,82.7//
GSP27moksop_u:13908: tatrāsane same śuddhe svāstīrṇahariṇājine / viśaśrāmācale śānte vāntavarṣa ivāmbudaḥ //MU_5,82.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13909: baddhapadmāsanaḥ kṛtvā pārṣṇyor adhi karāñjalim / śṛṅgivac chāntacalanam atiṣṭhad dṛḍhakandharam //MU_5,82.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13910: sañjahārālam ālokaṃ digvikīrṇaṃ śanaś śanaiḥ / viśan merudarīṃ sāyaṃ bhānur bhāsām ivotkaram //MU_5,82.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13911: bāhyān ābhyantarāṃś caiva sparśān pariharan kramāt / idam ākalayām āsa manasā vigatainasā //MU_5,82.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13912: aho nu cañcalam idaṃ pratyāhṛtam api kṣaṇāt / na manas sthairyam āyāti taraṅgaprauḍhaparṇavat //MU_5,82.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13913: cakṣurādibhir uddāmai rūpair āhitasambhramaiḥ / ajasram utphalaty eva vīṭeva talatāḍitā //MU_5,82.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13914: tyajad evāśu gṛhṇāti vṛttīr indriyavardhitāḥ / yasmān nivāryate tasmin pronmatta iva dhāvati //MU_5,82.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13915: ghaṭāt paṭam upāyāti paṭāc chakaṭam utkaṭam / cittam artheṣu carati pādapeṣv iva markataḥ //MU_5,82.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13916: pañcadvārāṇi manasaś cakṣurādīny amūny alam / dagdhendriyābhidhānāni tāvad ālokayāmy aham //MU_5,82.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13917: haṃho hatendriyagaṇāḥ kim eṣoddāmateha vaḥ / velā vilulitāmbūnām abdhīnām iva cañcalā //MU_5,82.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13918: mā kurudhvam anarthāya cāpalaṃ cañcalāśayāḥ / smaratātītavṛttīni duḥkhajālāni bhūriśaḥ //MU_5,82.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13919: rūpāṇi manaso yūyaṃ jaḍā eva kilādhamāḥ / jaḍimnotsukatātyarthaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇeva valgati //MU_5,82.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13920: asārātmasvarūpāṇām anālokavatāṃ sadā / andhānām uddhatir yeyaṃ sā hāsāyaiva jāyate //MU_5,82.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13921: cidātmā bhagavān sarvaṃ sākṣitvena karoty ajaḥ / hatendriyagaṇā yūyaṃ kiṃ nirarthakam āgatāḥ //MU_5,82.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13922: mithyaivaite vivalganti nīrūpā nayanādayaḥ / alātacakrapratimās sarparajjubhramopamāḥ //MU_5,82.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13923: tenātmanā bahujñena nirjñānāś cakṣurādayaḥ / manāg api na sambaddhā dyupātālatalādrivat //MU_5,82.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13924: bhītaḥ pāntha ivāhibhyaḥ pukkasebhya iva dvijaḥ / dūre tiṣṭhati cinmātram indriyebhyas tv anāmayam //MU_5,82.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13925: citsattāmātrakeṇāyaṃ saṅkṣobho bhavatāṃ mithaḥ / tiṣṭhati svairam āditye dinakāryavatām iva //MU_5,82.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13926: citta cāraṇacārvāka caturdikkukṣibhikṣuka / śveva vyartham anarthāya medaṃ vihara he jagat //MU_5,82.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13927: ahaṃ cidvad iti vyartham asatyā tava vāsanā / atyantabhinnayor aikyaṃ nāsti cinmanasoś śaṭha //MU_5,82.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13928: jīvāmy evāham ity eṣā tavāhaṅkāradundubhiḥ / mithyaiva jātā duḥkhāya na satyā satyavarjitā //MU_5,82.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13929: ahaṅkārād ahaṃ so 'smīty etāṃ saṃrabdhatāṃ tyaja / na kiñcid api mūrkha tvaṃ kiṃ vyarthaṃ taralāyase //MU_5,82.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13930: saṃvic cittam anādyantaṃ saṃvido 'nyan na vidyate / dehe 'smiṃs tan mahāmūrkha kiṃ tat syāc cittanāmakam //MU_5,82.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13931: viṣaparyavasāneyaṃ rasāyanavad utthitā / bhoktṛtākartṛtāśaṅkā tava citta mudhaiva hi //MU_5,82.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13932: mopahāsapadaṃ gaccha mūrkhendriyagaṇa svayam / na kartā tvaṃ na bhoktā tvaṃ jaḍo 'sy anyena bodhyase //MU_5,82.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13933: kas tvaṃ bhavasi bhogānāṃ ke vā bhogā bhavanti te / jaḍasyātmaiva te nāsti bandhumitrādi tat kutaḥ //MU_5,82.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13934: yaj jaḍaṃ tad dhi nāsty eva sad evāsattayānvitam / jñatvakartṛtvabhoktṛtvamantṛtvānām asambhavāt //MU_5,82.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13935: pratyakcetanarūpaṃ cet tvaṃ tad ātmaiva te vapuḥ / bhāvābhāvamayī citta sattā te keva duḥkhadā //MU_5,82.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13936: ye vā kartṛtvabhoktṛtve mithyaivādhigate tvayā / mayā te hi pramārjyete śṛṇu yuktyā kathaṃ śaṭha //MU_5,82.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13937: svayaṃ tāvad bhavān eṣa jaḍo nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ / jaḍasya kīdṛk kartṛtvaṃ nṛtyanti hi kathaṃ śilāḥ //MU_5,82.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13938: upajīvya ciraṃ tasmāc chuddhaṃ tadbhāgam aiśvaram / jīvasīcchasi haṃsi tvaṃ plavase yāsi valgasi //MU_5,82.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13939: kriyate yat tu yacchaktyā tat tenaiva kṛtaṃ bhavet / lunāti dātraṃ puṃśaktyā hantaiva procyate pumān //MU_5,82.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13940: pīyate yat tu yacchaktyā pītaṃ tenaiva tad bhavet / pātreṇa pīyate pānaṃ pānapas tūcyate naraḥ //MU_5,82.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13941: prakṛtyaivāsi sujaḍam asakṛj jñena bodhyase / tenātmaivātmanātmānaṃ cinotīdaṃ hi no bhavet //MU_5,82.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13942: anārataṃ bodhayati tvām ātmā parameśvaraḥ / bodhanīyā budhair mūḍhāḥ kilāvṛttiśatair api //MU_5,82.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13943: ātmasattaiva bodhaikarūpiṇī sphuratīha hi / tayaiva citta śabdārthān aṅgīkṛtya laghu sthitam //MU_5,82.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13944: evaṃ citta tvam ajñānād ātmaśakter upāgatam / jñāne tv adyāvagalitaṃ tīvre himam ivātape //MU_5,82.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13945: tasmān mṛtaṃ tvaṃ mūḍhaṃ tvaṃ nāsi tvaṃ paramārthataḥ / tad evāham iti vyarthaṃ māno māstv asukhāya te //MU_5,82.45//
GSP27moksop_u:13946: asatyāś cittakalanā indrajālalatā iva / vijñānamātram eveha brāhmam aṅga vijṛmbhate //MU_5,82.46//
GSP27moksop_u:13947: narāmarajagadrūpair brāhmī śaktir udety alam / sāmudrī kaṇakallolajālair veleva valgati //MU_5,82.47//
GSP27moksop_u:13948: cinmayaṃ cidbhavan mūḍha tat tasmāt paramāt padāt / nityam avyatiriktaṃ tvaṃ kim anyat pariśocasi //MU_5,82.48//
GSP27moksop_u:13949: sarvagaṃ sarvabhāvasthaṃ sarvarūpaṃ hi tat padaṃ / tatprāptau sarvam evāśu prāptaṃ bhavati sarvadā //MU_5,82.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13950: na tvam asti na deho 'sti brahmāstīha mahat sphurat / ahaṃ tvam iti niṣṣyandais sphuraty ārtir hi kasya kā //MU_5,82.50//
GSP27moksop_u:13951: ātmā cet tvaṃ tad ātmaiva sarvago 'stīha netaraḥ / ātmano 'nyaj jaḍaṃ tvaṃ cet tat tvaṃ nāsty asy avidvapuḥ //MU_5,82.51//
GSP27moksop_u:13952: ātmaiva sarvaṃ trijagat tadanyat tu nakiñcana / tan nakiñcit tvam ātmānyad yadi tat tvaṃ nakiñcana //MU_5,82.52//
GSP27moksop_u:13953: ahaṃ tv idam idaṃ tan me iti vyarthaṃ kim īhase / asadvapuḥ kiṃ sphurati śaśaśṛṅgeṇa ko hataḥ //MU_5,82.53//
GSP27moksop_u:13954: tṛtīyā kalpanā nāsti cijjaḍāṃśetarā śaṭha / chāyāhasanayor madhye tṛtīyevānurañjanā //MU_5,82.54//
GSP27moksop_u:13955: satyāvalokanāj jāte cittvajāḍyadṛśoḥ kṣaye / sampadyate yat tat tv ajña svasaṃvedanamātrakam //MU_5,82.55//
GSP27moksop_u:13956: tena mūḍha na kartṛ tvaṃ na bhoktṛ tvaṃ na cāpy asi / tad evāsi paraṃ brahma tyaja maurkhyaṃ bhavātmakam //MU_5,82.56//
GSP27moksop_u:13957: kevalaṃ tv ajñaviṣayam upadeśārthasiddhaye / tvayā karaṇabhūtena karoty ātmeti kathyate //MU_5,82.57//
GSP27moksop_u:13958: asatsvarūpaṃ karaṇaṃ jaḍaṃ niravalambanam / na spandate na plavate kartṛsambodhanaṃ vinā //MU_5,82.58//
GSP27moksop_u:13959: akartuḥ karaṇasyājña śaktiḥ kācin na vidyate / dātrasya lāvakābhāve kartuṃ kim iva śaktatā //MU_5,82.59//
GSP27moksop_u:13960: khaḍgaprahāravicchedakriyāyāṃ puṃsi śaktatā / na khaḍge sujaḍe kṛttasarvāṅge 'py asti śaktatā //MU_5,82.60//
GSP27moksop_u:13961: tasmān nāsi sakhe kartṛ mā vyarthaṃ duḥkhabhāg bhava / parārthaṃ kleśitā mūrkha prākṛteṣu na śobhate //MU_5,82.61//
GSP27moksop_u:13962: īśvaro nedṛśaś śocyo yas tvayopakṛto bhavet / naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaścana //MU_5,82.62//
GSP27moksop_u:13963: sarvaṃ tūpakaromy enam iti kevalam alpadhīḥ / kliśyate ca satāṃ tv artho na kaścid upayujyate //MU_5,82.63//
GSP27moksop_u:13964: kartur bhogeśvarasyaivam atha ced anuvartase / tad asya kācin neccheha tṛptatvāt sarvadaiva hi //MU_5,82.64//
GSP27moksop_u:13965: akṛtrimāvabhāsena sarvagena cidātmanā / ekenaivedam āpūrṇaṃ kalpanaivāsti netarā //MU_5,82.65//
GSP27moksop_u:13966: ekānekāvabhāsena samastena tatātmanā / ātmany evātmanaivāntaḥ kriyate kiṃ kim iṣyate //MU_5,82.66//
GSP27moksop_u:13967: tvādṛśasya tu dṛṣṭyaiva kṣubdhatā jāyate mudhā / ālokya rājamahiṣīṃ mano madamayīṃ yathā //MU_5,82.67//
GSP27moksop_u:13968: ātmanā tava sambandhaś cet tat kartr asi sundara / kiṃ tu nāsyāsi sambandhaḥ kusumasyopalo yathā //MU_5,82.68//
GSP27moksop_u:13969: dvitīyena samaṃ yaiṣā tattā tadbhāvataikatā / sā sambandhagatiḥ proktā prāgdvitvād adhunaikatā //MU_5,82.69//
GSP27moksop_u:13970: nānāprakāraracanā nānārūpakriyāmukhī / sukhaduḥkhadaśāhetus sā cānekavidhā smṛtā //MU_5,82.70//
GSP27moksop_u:13971: sambandhas samayor dṛṣṭas tathārdhasamayor api / suvilakṣaṇayoś cānyas tasmin sati jagattraye //MU_5,82.71//
GSP27moksop_u:13972: dravyāntaraguṇaṃ dravyāṇy āśrayanti bahūny alam / śaśiśaityaṃ yathauṣadhyo yathoṣmāṇaṃ mahāśilāḥ //MU_5,82.72//
GSP27moksop_u:13973: itthaṃ yadi tu sambandho bhavataḥ paramātmanā / astu tat saṃsṛter bījam anyo'nyaguṇasaṅkaraḥ //MU_5,82.73//
GSP27moksop_u:13975: anyaś ca dṛśyate loke sambandhas samayos sphuṭaḥ / yathā jvalanayor aikye tejasoḥ payasor api //MU_5,82.75//
GSP27moksop_u:13977: anyaś ca caura sambandho dṛṣṭo 'rdhasamayor api / ekāvayavavaicitryād yathā strīpuṃsayor iha //MU_5,82.77//
GSP27moksop_u:13978: kiñcidanyatayā caiva salilakṣīrayor iva / atha vā vārimadhunor madhunor iva citrayoḥ / pāṇḍurāruṇayor vāpi tejasor aruṇārkayoḥ //MU_5,82.78//
GSP27moksop_u:13980: anyo 'sti caura sambandho yo 'tyantāsamayor api / yatheha kāṣṭhajatunos tathā puruṣadantinoḥ //MU_5,82.80//
GSP27moksop_u:13982: anyo bījāṅkuranyāye pitṛputrakrame tathā / kāryakāraṇarūpo 'pi na sambandhas tavātmanā //MU_5,82.82//
GSP27moksop_u:13983: anyo 'pi kalanāmātrasaṅketaracito bhavet / tavāhaṃ tvaṃ mamety antarniścayena kila dvayoḥ //MU_5,82.83//
