GSP27moksop_u:15404: aṇḍebhyas tebhya evaṃ hi jātā vayam ime mune / bhrātaraś caṇḍatanayā vāyasā ekaviṃśatiḥ //MU_6,19.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15405: te sma jātā gatā vṛddhiṃ tasmin kamalapallave / sañjātapakṣās sampannā gaganoḍḍayanakṣamāḥ //MU_6,19.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15406: mātṛbhis saha haṃsībhir brāhmī bhagavatī tataḥ / ciram ārādhitā samyak samādhiviratā satī //MU_6,19.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15407: prasādaparayā kāle bhagavatyā tatas svayam / tathāṅgānugṛhītās smo yathā muktā vayaṃ sthitāḥ //MU_6,19.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15408: santṛptamanasaś śāntā ekānte dhyānasaṃsthitau / tiṣṭhāma iti niścitya pituḥ pārśvaṃ vayaṃ gatāḥ //MU_6,19.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15409: āliṅgitās tataḥ pitrā pūjitālambusā vayam / tayā dṛṣṭāḥ prasādena saṃsthitās tatra saṃyatāḥ //MU_6,19.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15410: caṇḍakaḥ: putrāḥ kaccid aparyantād vāsanāsūtrasūmbhitāt / bhavanto nirgatā nūnam asmāt saṃsārajālakāt //MU_6,19.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15411: no ced vayaṃ bhagavatīṃ tad imāṃ bhṛtyavatsalām / prārthayāmo yathā yūyaṃ bhavata jñānapāragāḥ //MU_6,19.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15412: kākāḥ: tāta jñātam alaṃ jñeyaṃ brāhmyā devyāḥ prasādataḥ / kiṃ tv ekāntasthites sthānam abhivāñchāma uttamam //MU_6,19.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15413_0: caṇḍakaḥ: śṛṇuta vigatadoṣaṃ pāvanaṃ sthānam agryaṃ sthirataram ayi putrā nīḍakāmāḥ pravakṣye / vyapagatabhayamohaṃ śāntasarvapracāraṃ
GSP27moksop_u:15416: caṇḍakaḥ: sarvaratnagaṇādhāras samastasurasaṃśrayaḥ / asty ameyamahotsedho merur nāma mahīdharaḥ //MU_6,20.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15418: sauvarṇaś candravīṭārthaṃ ratnāḍhyaś śikharāṅguliḥ / dhvanaddvīpābdhivalayo bhuvevonnāmito bhujaḥ //MU_6,20.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15419: vṛtaḥ kulādrisāmantair jambudvīpāsane sthitaḥ / rājā candrārkanayane bhramayañ śailasaṃsadi //MU_6,20.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15421: digaṅganābhir abhito ramyābhiḥ purabhūṣaṇaiḥ / pṛṣanniṣṣyandibhiś śītair vījito ghanacāmaraiḥ //MU_6,20.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15422: ṣoḍaśāsya sahasrāṇi yojanānām adhaḥ kṣiteḥ / sthitāḥ pādāḥ prapūjyante nānāsuramahoragaiḥ //MU_6,20.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15423: aśītis tu sahasrāṇi deho 'syārkendulocanaḥ / pūjyate nākasadanais suragandharvakinnaraiḥ //MU_6,20.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15424: caturdaśavidhāny enaṃ gṛhastham iva bandhavaḥ / upajīvanti bhūtāni mitho'dṛṣṭapurāspadam //MU_6,20.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15425: asya tv īśānadigbhāge padmarāgamayaṃ bṛhat / vidyate śṛṅgam aparo divākara ivoditaḥ //MU_6,20.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15426: tasyāsti pṛṣṭhe bhūtaughavṛtaḥ kalpatarur mahān / jagataś śikharādarśe pratibimbam iva sthitaḥ //MU_6,20.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15427: tasyāsti dakṣiṇaskandhe śākhā kanakapallavā / ratnastabakanīrandhrā candrabimbābhasatphalā //MU_6,20.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15428: tatra nīḍaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ kṛtam āsīt sphuranmaṇi / devyāṃ dhyānaniṣaṇṇāyāṃ yasmin kila rame sutāḥ //MU_6,20.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15430: buddhipūrvasamācārais sampūrṇaṃ kākaputrakaiḥ / śītalābhyantaraṃ hṛdyaṃ pūritaṃ kusumotkaraiḥ //MU_6,20.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15431: tad gacchata sutā nīḍaṃ durgaṃ nākasadām api / bhogaṃ mokṣaṃ ca tatrasthā nirvighnaṃ samavāpsyatha //MU_6,20.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15432: ity uktvāsmān pitā tatra cucumbābhyāliliṅga ca / dadau devyai yad ānītam asmabhyaṃ ca tad āmiṣam //MU_6,20.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15433: tad bhuktvā caraṇau devyāḥ pituś caivābhivandya ca / vindhyakacchād vayaṃ tasmāt sthānād ālambusāt plutāḥ //MU_6,20.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15434: krameṇākāśam ullaṅghya nirgatyāmbudakoṭaraiḥ / pavanaskandham āruhya vanditavyomacāriṇaḥ //MU_6,20.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15435: parihṛtya dinādhīśaṃ lokāntarapurād gatāḥ / svargam ullaṅghya yātās smo brahmalokaṃ munīśvara //MU_6,20.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15436: praṇāmapūrvaṃ tatraitad yathāvastu pitur vacaḥ / mātre ca bhagavatyai ca brāhmyai cāśu nivedya ha //MU_6,20.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15437: tābhyāṃ sasneham āliṅgya gacchathety ājñayaidhitāḥ / vayaṃ kṛtanamaskārā brahmalokād vinirgatāḥ //MU_6,20.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15438: ullaṅghya lokapālānāṃ purīs tapanabhāsurāḥ / ākāśagāmino lolāḥ pavanaskandhacāriṇaḥ //MU_6,20.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15439: imaṃ kalpataruṃ prāpya nijaṃ nīḍaṃ praviśya ca / nirastabādhaṃ tiṣṭhāmo mune maunam avasthitāḥ //MU_6,20.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15440: jātā yathā vayam ime sthitim āgatāś ca samprāptabodham upaśāntadhiyo yathā ca / etat tad uktam avikhaṇḍam alaṃ mayā te śeṣeṇa māṃ samanuśādhi mahānubhāva //MU_6,20.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15443: bhusuṇḍaḥ: āsīt kiñcitpurākalpe jagad yac ciravismṛtam / sanniveśenāmunaiva tad yad adyātidūragam //MU_6,21.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15444: tad etad vṛttam abhyāsād vartamānena varṇitam / mayā munīndra bodhāya prāgjagatsāmyadarśinā //MU_6,21.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15445: adya me phalitaṃ puṇyaiś cirakālopabṛṃhitaiḥ / nirvighnam evaṃ paśyāmi yad bhavantaṃ mune tataḥ //MU_6,21.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15446: idaṃ nīḍam imāś śākhā ayaṃ cāham ayaṃ drumaḥ / adya pāvanatāṃ prāptāny etāni tava darśanāt //MU_6,21.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15447: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyaṃ gṛhītvā vibhavārpitam / nūnaṃ pāvanatāṃ nītvā śeṣeṇādiśa māṃ mune //MU_6,21.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15448: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvārghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca bhūyo dattavati svayam / bhusuṇḍavihage tasminn idaṃ rāmāham uktavān //MU_6,21.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15449: bhrātaras te vihaṅgeśa tādṛksattvā mahādhiyaḥ / iha kasmān na dṛśyante tvam evaiko hi dṛśyase //MU_6,21.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15450: bhusuṇḍaḥ: tiṣṭhatām iha naḥ kālo mahān atigato mune / yugānāṃ paṅktayaḥ kṣīṇā divasānām ivānagha //MU_6,21.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15451: etāvatā ca kālena sarva eva mamānujāḥ / tanūs tṛṇam iva tyaktvā śive pariṇatāḥ pare //MU_6,21.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15452: dīrghāyuṣo mahānto 'pi santo 'pi balino 'pi ca / sarva eva nigīryante kālenākalitātmanā //MU_6,21.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15453: vasiṣṭhaḥ: skandharūḍhārkaśaśiṣu vahatsv avirataṃ javāt / vātaskandhātivāteṣu kaccit tāta na khidyase //MU_6,21.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15454: dagdhodayāstaśailendravanavyūhai raveḥ karaiḥ / ciram atyantam āsannaiḥ kathaṃ tāta na khidyase //MU_6,21.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15455: indor atha karaiś śītaiḥ pāṣāṇīkṛtavāribhiḥ / āsannataratāṃ yātaiḥ kaccit tāta na khidyase //MU_6,21.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15456: ajasram iha viśrāntaiḥ kalpajīmūtamaṇḍalaiḥ / paraśucchedyanīhāraiḥ kathaṃ tāta na khidyase //MU_6,21.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15457: viṣamair jāgataiḥ kṣobhair uccaistarapadasthitaḥ / kathaṃ na kṣobham āyāti kalpavṛkṣo 'yam unnataḥ //MU_6,21.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15458: bhusuṇḍaḥ: nirālambāspadā brahman sarvalokāvadhīritā / tuccheyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ madhye vihagajīvikā //MU_6,21.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15459: yad īdṛśeṣu dūreṣu nirjaneṣu vaneṣu ca / kalpitāsyās sthitir dhātrā śūnye vā vyomadhanvani //MU_6,21.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15460: katham asyāṃ prabho jātau jātasya kila jīvataḥ / āśāpāśanibaddhasya vihagasya viśokatā //MU_6,21.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15461: vayaṃ tu bhagavan nityaṃ svātmasantoṣasaṃyutāḥ / na kadācana nīrūpair muhyāmo jāgatair bhramaiḥ //MU_6,21.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15462: svabhāvamātrasantuṣṭāḥ kaṣṭair muktā viceṣṭitaiḥ / kṣipāmaḥ kevalaṃ kālam asmin brahman nijālaye //MU_6,21.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15463: na jīvitān na maraṇāt kurmo dehasya rodhanam / yathā sthitena tiṣṭhāmas tathaivāstaṅgatehitāḥ //MU_6,21.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15464: ālokitā lokadaśā dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayaḥ / nūnaṃ santyaktam asmākaṃ manasā cañcalaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,21.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15465: anāratanijāloke nityaṃ cāparitāpini / kalpāgasyopari sadā vedmi kālakalāgatim //MU_6,21.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15466: ratnagucchaprakāśāḍhye brahman kalpalatāgṛhe / prāṇāpānapravāheṇa vedmi kālam akhaṇḍitam //MU_6,21.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15467: avijñātadivārātre 'py asminn uccaiś śiloccaye / jānāmi nijayā buddhyā lokakālakramasthitim //MU_6,21.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15468: sārāsāraparicchedi bodhād viśrāntim āgatam / nirastacāpalaṃ śāntaṃ jātam eva mune manaḥ //MU_6,21.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15469: saṃsāravyavahārotthair āśāpāśair asanmayaiḥ / udgālair iva bhūkāko na vaivaśyaṃ vrajāmy aham //MU_6,21.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15470: paropaśamadharmiṇyā vayam ālokaśītayā / paśyanto jāgatīṃ māyāṃ dhiyā dhairyam upāgatāḥ //MU_6,21.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15471: bhīmāsv api mahābuddhe daśāsv acalabuddhayaḥ / bibhimo nopalākārās samprāptāsu yathākramam //MU_6,21.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15472: iyam ārambhasubhagā taralā jāgatī sthitiḥ / bhūyo bhūyaḥ parāmṛṣṭā neha kiñcana sanmayam //MU_6,21.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15473: sarvāṇy eva prayānty eva samāyānti ca vā na vā / bhagavan bhūtajālāni bhayam asmākam atra kim //MU_6,21.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15474: bhūtajālataraṅgiṇyā viśantyāḥ kālasāgaram / vayaṃ saṃsārasaritas taṭasthā apy anākulāḥ //MU_6,21.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15475: nojjhāmo na ca gṛhṇīmas tiṣṭhāmo naiva ca sthitāḥ / mṛdavo 'pi bhṛśaṃ krūrā vayam asmin drume sthitāḥ //MU_6,21.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15476: vītaśokabhayāyāsais tvādṛśaiḥ puruṣottamaiḥ / tuṣṭair anugṛhītās smas saṃsthitā vigatajvarāḥ //MU_6,21.34//
GSP27moksop_u:15477: netaś cetaś ca paryastaṃ lulitaṃ na ca vṛttiṣu / nāparāmṛṣṭatattvārtham asmākaṃ bhagavan manaḥ //MU_6,21.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15478: nirvikāre gatakṣobhe svātmany upaśamaṃ gate / ataraṅgāḥ prapūrṇās smaḥ parvaṇīva mahābdhayaḥ //MU_6,21.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15479: bhavadāgamanād brahmann idānīṃ muditāśayāḥ / phalitāśeṣasaṅkalpāḥ paramāṃ pūrṇatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_6,21.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15480: rasāyanamayī śītā paramānandadāyinī / nānandayati kaṃ nāma sādhusaṅgaticandrikā //MU_6,21.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15481: satsaṅgamānandarasaḥ kenāyam upamīyate / mandaroddhūtasarvāmbuḥ kṣīrodo yena kharvyate //MU_6,21.39//
GSP27moksop_u:15482: nātaḥ parataraṃ kiñcin manye kuśalam ātmanaḥ / santo yad anugamyante santyaktasakalaiṣaṇam //MU_6,21.40//
GSP27moksop_u:15483: āpātamātraramyebhyo bhogebhyaḥ kim avāpyate / satsaṅgacintāmaṇitas sarvaṃ sāram avāpyate //MU_6,21.41//
GSP27moksop_u:15485: adhigataparamātmano 'pi manye bhavadavalokanaśāntaduṣkṛtasya / mama saphalam ihādya janma sādho sakalabhayāpaharo hi sādhusaṅgaḥ //MU_6,21.43//
GSP27moksop_u:15488: bhusuṇḍaḥ: yugakṣobheṣu ghoreṣu vātyāsu viṣamāsu ca / susthiraḥ kalpavṛkṣo 'yaṃ na kadācana kampate //MU_6,22.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15489: agamyo 'yaṃ samagrāṇāṃ lokāntaravihāriṇām / bhūtānāṃ tena tiṣṭhāmas sukham asmin vanaspatau //MU_6,22.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15490: hiraṇyākṣo dharāpīṭhaṃ dvīpasaptakaveṣṭitam / yadā jahāra tarasā nākampata tadā drumaḥ //MU_6,22.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15491: yadā dolāyitavapur babhūvāmaraparvataḥ / sarvato dattajhampādrir nākampata tadā drumaḥ //MU_6,22.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15492: bhujāvaṣṭambhavinamanmerur nārāyaṇo yadā / mandaraṃ proddadhārādriṃ nākampata tadā drumaḥ //MU_6,22.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15493: unmūlitādrīndraśilā yadotpātānilā vavuḥ / ādhūtamerutaravas tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15494: yadā surāsurakṣobhasphuraccandrārkamaṇḍalam / āsīj jagad atikṣubdhaṃ tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15495: yadā kṣīrodalolādrikandarānilakampitāḥ / kalpābhrapaṅktayaḥ petus tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15496: yadā samantato meruḥ kālanemibhujāntare / kiñcid unmūlito 'tiṣṭhat tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15497: pakṣīśapakṣapavanā amṛtākrāntisaṅgare / yadā vavuḥ patatsiddhās tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15498: yadā śeṣākṛtiṃ karṣann asamāptaikaveṣṭanāt / yayau garutmān amṛtaṃ tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15499: yadā kalpānalaśikhāś śailābdhivalanolbaṇāḥ / śeṣaḥ phaṇābhis tatyāja tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15500: evaṃrūpe drumavare tiṣṭhatām āpadaḥ kutaḥ / asmākaṃ muniśārdūla daussthityena kilāpadaḥ //MU_6,22.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15501: vasiṣṭhaḥ: kalpānteṣu mahābuddhe vahatsv agnyambuvāyuṣu / pratapatsu tathārkeṣu kathaṃ tiṣṭhasi vijvaram //MU_6,22.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15502: bhusuṇḍaḥ: yadopayāti kalpāntavyavahāro jagatsthitau / kṛtaghna iva sanmitraṃ tadā nīḍaṃ tyajāmy aham //MU_6,22.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15503: ākāśa eva tiṣṭhāmi vigatākhilakalpanam / stabdhaprasṛtasarvāṅgo mano nirvāsanaṃ yathā //MU_6,22.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15504: pratapanti yadādityās salilīkṛtabhūdharāḥ / vāruṇīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā tadā tiṣṭhāmi dhīradhīḥ //MU_6,22.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15505: yadā śakalitādrīndrā vānti pralayavāyavaḥ / pārvatīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā khe tiṣṭhāmy acalas tadā //MU_6,22.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15506: jagad galitamervādi yāty ekārṇavatāṃ yadā / vāyavīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā khaṃ plave 'caladhīs tadā //MU_6,22.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15507: brahmāṇḍapāram āsādya tattvānte vimale pade / suṣuptāvasthayā tāvat tiṣṭhāmy acalarūpayā //MU_6,22.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15508: yāvat punaḥ kamalajas sṛṣṭikarmaṇi tiṣṭhati / tataḥ praviśya brahmāṇḍaṃ tiṣṭhāmi patagālaye //MU_6,22.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15509: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yathā tiṣṭhasi pakṣīśa dhāraṇābhir akhaṇḍitaḥ / kalpānteṣu tathā kasmān nānye tiṣṭhanti yoginaḥ //MU_6,22.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15510: bhusuṇḍaḥ: brahman niyatir eṣā hi durlaṅghyā pārameśvarī / mayedṛśena vai bhāvyaṃ bhāvyam anyais tu tādṛśaiḥ //MU_6,22.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15511: na śakyate tolayitum avaśyabhavitavyatā / yad yathā tat tathaitad dhi svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ //MU_6,22.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15512: matsaṅkalpavaśenaiva kalpe kalpe punaḥ punaḥ / asminn eva gireś śṛṅge tarur itthaṃ bhavaty ayam //MU_6,22.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15513: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atyantam eva dīrghāyur bhavān vihaganāyaka / jñānavijñānavān vīro yogayogyamanogatiḥ //MU_6,22.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15514: dṛṣṭānekavidhānalpasargasaṅghasamāgamaḥ / kiṃ kiṃ smarasi kalyāṇiṃś citram asmiñ jagattraye //MU_6,22.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15515: bhusuṇḍaḥ: bṛhadgiriśilārūkṣām ajātatṛṇavīrudham / aśailavanavṛkṣaughāṃ smarāmīmāṃ dharām adhaḥ //MU_6,22.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15516: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca / bhasmabhārabharāpūrṇāṃ smarāmīmāṃ dharām adhaḥ //MU_6,22.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15517: anutpannadinādhīśām ajātaśaśimaṇḍalām / avibhaktadinālokāṃ saṃsmarāmi dharām adhaḥ //MU_6,22.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15518: meruratnataṭoddyotair ardhaprakaṭakoṭaram / lokālokam ivādyādriṃ bhuvanaṃ saṃsmarāmy aham //MU_6,22.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15519: pravṛddhāsurasaṅgrāme mriyamāṇān narān iva / palāyamānān abhitas saṃsmarāmi surān aham //MU_6,22.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15520: caturyugāni pañcāśad asurair mattakāśibhiḥ / daityāntaḥpuratāṃ prāptāṃ saṃsmarāmi dharām imām //MU_6,22.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15522: caturyugārdhaṃ caramaṃ nīrandhrāṃ ghanapādapaiḥ / adṛṣṭanaranirmāṇāṃ saṃsmarāmi dharām imām //MU_6,22.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15523: evaṃ caturyugaṃ sāgraṃ nīrandhrair acalair yutām / apravṛttajanācārāṃ saṃsmarāmi dharām imām //MU_6,22.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15525: caturyugāni trīṇy ambupūraplutakakummukhīm / merudaṇḍāṅkitāṃ madhye saṃsmarāmi dharām imām //MU_6,22.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15526: bhayād antarhitāśeṣavaimānikanabhaścarām / dyāṃ nirṛkṣaniśeśārkāṃ saṃsmarāmi tamomayīm //MU_6,22.39//
GSP27moksop_u:15527: anagastyām agastyāśām ekaparvatatāṃ gatāṃ / matte vindhyamahāśaile saṃsmarāmi jagatkuṭīm //MU_6,22.40//
GSP27moksop_u:15528: etāṃś cānyāṃś ca vṛttāntān saṃsmarāmi bahūn api / kiṃ tena bahunoktena sāraṃ saṅkṣepataś śṛṇu //MU_6,22.41//
GSP27moksop_u:15529: asaṅkhyātān manūn brahman smarāmi śataśo gatān / sargān ārambhabahulāṃś caturyugaśatāni ca //MU_6,22.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15530: ekadevamayaṃ śuddhaṃ puruṣāsuravarjitam / alokatritayaṃ caikasvargaṃ sargaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,22.43//
GSP27moksop_u:15531: surāpabrāhmaṇaṃ mattaṃ niṣiddhasuraśūdrakam / bahunāthasatīkaṃ ca kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,22.44//
GSP27moksop_u:15532: vṛkṣanīrandhrabhūlokam akalpitamahārṇavam / svargasañjātapuruṣaṃ kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,22.45//
GSP27moksop_u:15533: aparvatam abhūmiṃ ca vyomasthāmaramānavam / acandrārkaprakāśāḍhyaṃ kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,22.46//
GSP27moksop_u:15534: anindram amahīpālam amadhyasthādhamottamam / samasarvakakubbhūtaṃ kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,22.47//
GSP27moksop_u:15536: kulaparvatasaṃsthānaṃ jambudvīpe pṛthaksthitim / varṇadharmadhiyaṃ sṛṣṭivibhāgaṃ maṇḍalāvaleḥ //MU_6,22.49//
GSP27moksop_u:15537: ṛkṣacakrakasaṃsthānaṃ dhruvanirmāṇam eva ca / janmendubhāskarādīnām indropendravyavasthitiḥ //MU_6,22.50//
GSP27moksop_u:15538: hiraṇyākṣāpaharaṇaṃ varāhoddharaṇaṃ kṣiteḥ / kalpanaṃ pārthivānāṃ ca vedānayanam eva ca //MU_6,22.51//
GSP27moksop_u:15539: mandaroddhūnanaṃ cābdher amṛtārthe ca manthanam / ajātapakṣo garuḍas sāgarāṇāṃ ca sambhavaḥ //MU_6,22.52//
GSP27moksop_u:15540: ityādikā yās smṛtayas svalpātītamanukramāḥ / bālair api hi tās tāta smaryante tāsu kiṃ grahaḥ //MU_6,22.53//
GSP27moksop_u:15541: garuḍavāhanam agaruḍavāhanaṃ sitavivāhanam asitavivāhanam / suvṛṣavāhanam asuvṛṣavāhanaṃ kalitavān aham akalitajīvitaḥ //MU_6,22.54//
GSP27moksop_u:15544: bhusuṇḍaḥ: tato jagati jāteṣu bhagavan yuṣmadādiṣu / bharadvājapulastyātrināradendramarīciṣu //MU_6,23.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15550: alpakātītakāleṣu kiñcid dūreṣu keṣucit / tathādyatanasargeṣu smaraṇe gaṇanaiva kā //MU_6,23.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15551: mune te brahmaputrasya janmāṣṭamam idaṃ kila / saṃsmarāmy aṣṭame sarge tv asmiṃs tvaṃ mama saṅgataḥ //MU_6,23.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15552: kadācij jāyase vyomnaḥ kadācij jāyase jalāt / kadācij jāyase śailāt kadācij jāyase 'nalāt //MU_6,23.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15553: yādṛśo yādṛśācāro yādṛksaṃsthānadiggaṇaḥ / sargo 'yaṃ tādṛśān eva trīn sargān saṃsmarāmy aham //MU_6,23.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15554: ekarūpākhilācārasanniveśanarāmarān / samakālākhilasthairyān daśa sargān smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15555: antardhānaṃ gatā devā vārapañcakam uddhṛtāḥ / mune pañcasu sargeṣu kūrmā iva payonidheḥ //MU_6,23.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15557: sarvauṣadhirasopetāṃ baliṃ grāhas taṭād iva / vāratrayaṃ hiraṇyākṣo nītavān vasudhām adhaḥ //MU_6,23.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15558: reṇukātmajatāṃ gatvā ṣaṣṭhaṃ vāram imaṃ hariḥ / bahusargāntareṇāpi cakāra kṣatriyakṣayam //MU_6,23.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15559: śataṃ kaliyugānāṃ ca harer buddhadaśāśatam / śākyarājatayaivāptaṃ smarāmi munināyaka //MU_6,23.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15560: triṃśattripuravikṣobhān dvau dakṣādhvarasaṅkṣayau / daśa śukravighātāṃś ca candramaules smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15561: bāṇārtham aṣṭau saṅgrāmāj jvarapramathanāyakān / vikṣobhitasurānīkān smarāmi hariśarvayoḥ //MU_6,23.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15562: yugaṃ prati dhiyāṃ puṃsām ūnādhikatayā mune / kriyāṅgapāṭhavaicitryayuktān vedān smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15563: ekāgrāṇi samagrāṇi bahupāṭhāni me 'nagha / purāṇāni pravartante vivṛtāni yugaṃ prati //MU_6,23.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15564: punas tān eva tān evam anyān api yuge yuge / devarṣivipraracitān itihāsān smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15565: itihāsaṃ mahāścaryam anyaṃ rāmāyaṇābhidham / granthalakṣapramāṇaṃ saj jñānaśāstraṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15566: rāmavad vyavahartavyaṃ na rāvaṇavilāsavat / iti yatra dhiyā jñānaṃ haste phalam ivārpitam //MU_6,23.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15567: kṛtaṃ vālmīkinā caitad adhunā ca kariṣyati / adya tv aprakaṭaṃ loke sthitaṃ jñāsyati kālataḥ //MU_6,23.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15568: vālmīkināmnā jīvena tenaivānyena cākṣatam / etat tad dvādaśaṃ vāraṃ kriyate vismṛtiṃ gatam //MU_6,23.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15569: dvitīyam etasya samaṃ bhārataṃ nāma nāmataḥ / smarāmi prāktanavyāsakṛtaṃ jagati vismṛtam //MU_6,23.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15570: vyāsābhidhena jīvena tathaivānyena cākṣatam / etat tu saptamaṃ vāraṃ kriyate vismṛtiṃ gatam //MU_6,23.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15571: ākhyānakāni śāstrāṇi vivṛtāni yugaṃ prati / vicitrasanniveśāni saṃsmarāmi munīśvara //MU_6,23.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15572: punas tāny eva tāny eva tathānyāni yuge yuge / sādho padārthajālāni prapaśyāmi smarāmi ca //MU_6,23.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15573: rākṣasakṣataye viṣṇor mahīm avatariṣyataḥ / adhunaikādaśaṃ janma rāmanāmno bhaviṣyati //MU_6,23.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15574: vasudevagṛhe viṣṇor bhuvo bhāranivṛttaye / adhunā ṣoḍaśaṃ janma bhaviṣyati munīśvara //MU_6,23.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15575: nārasiṃhena vapuṣā hiraṇyakaśipuṃ hariḥ / jaghāna vāratritayaṃ mṛgendra iva vāraṇam //MU_6,23.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15576: jagattrayībhrāntir iyaṃ na kadācin na vidyate / vidyate na kadācic ca jalabudbudavat sthitā //MU_6,23.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15577: dṛśyabhrāntir aniṣṭheyam antassthā saṃvidātmani / jāyate līyate cāśu lolā vīcir ivāmbhasi //MU_6,23.34//
GSP27moksop_u:15578: samaikasanniveśāni bahūni viṣamāṇi ca / tathārdhasamarūpāṇi trijaganti smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15579: tāny eva tādṛkkarmāṇi tathānyācaraṇāni ca / tatkarmāṇi tathānyāni bhūtānīha smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15580: pratimanvantaraṃ brahman viparyaste jagatkrame / sanniveśe 'nyathā jāte prayāte saṃstute jane //MU_6,23.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15581: mamānyāni ca mitrāṇi te 'nya eva ca bandhavaḥ / anya eva navā bhṛtyā anya eva samāśrayāḥ //MU_6,23.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15582: kadācid aham ekānte vindhyamūlalatāśrayaḥ / kadācin meruśṛṅgāgrakalpavṛkṣalatāśrayaḥ //MU_6,23.39//
GSP27moksop_u:15583: kadācit sahyanilayaḥ kadācid dardurālayaḥ / kadācid dhimavadvāsī kadācin malayāśrayaḥ //MU_6,23.40//
GSP27moksop_u:15584: kadācit prāktanenaiva sanniveśena bhūdharam / vanaṃ vṛkṣaṃ ca śākhāṃ ca prāpya nīḍaṃ karomy aham //MU_6,23.41//
GSP27moksop_u:15585: adyānanteṣu yāteṣu yugeṣu munināyaka / prāktanenaiva jāto 'yaṃ sanniveśena pādapaḥ //MU_6,23.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15586: tāte jīvati yaivābhūc chobhāsya sutaros tayā / kṛtaprāksanniveśo 'yam ahaṃ sthitim upāgataḥ //MU_6,23.43//
GSP27moksop_u:15587: nehābhūd uttarā pūrvaṃ kakum nāyaṃ ca bhūdharaḥ / dig uttarābhūd anyaiva pūrvaṃ merumahīdharā //MU_6,23.44//
GSP27moksop_u:15588: ekaikadehasaṃsthānanītabrahmaniśāgamaḥ / dhyānānte khastha evaitat sargam ālokya vedmy aham //MU_6,23.45//
GSP27moksop_u:15589: arkāder ṛkṣasañcārān mervādes sthānakād diśām / saṃsthānam anyathā tasmin sthite yānti diśo 'nyathā //MU_6,23.46//
GSP27moksop_u:15590: na san nāsaj jagan manye bhramo 'yaṃ kevalaṃ dhiyaḥ / ātmaspandacamatkāravibhavo 'yaṃ vijṛmbhate //MU_6,23.47//
GSP27moksop_u:15591: putraḥ pitṛtvam āyāto mitrāṇi tv aritāṃ tathā / strītvaṃ ca śataśo yātān puṃsaś caiva smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.48//
GSP27moksop_u:15592: kalau kṛtayugācārān kṛte kaliyugasthitīḥ / tretāyāṃ dvāpare caiva saṃsmarāmi munīśvara //MU_6,23.49//
GSP27moksop_u:15593: adṛṣṭavedavedārthān svasaṅketavihāriṇaḥ / sargān nirargalācārān kvacit kāṃścit smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.50//
GSP27moksop_u:15594: dhyātari brahmaṇi brahman sasurāsuramānuṣam / caturyugasahasre dve jagac chūnyaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.51//
GSP27moksop_u:15595: vicitrasaṃsthānaviśeṣadeśān vicitrakāryākulabhūtakośān / vicitravinyāsavilāsaveṣān smarāmy ahaṃ brahmadineṣv aśeṣān //MU_6,23.52//
GSP27moksop_u:15598: vasiṣṭhaḥ: athāsau vāyasaśreṣṭho jijñāsārtham idaṃ mayā / bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭo mahābāho kalpavṛkṣalatāgrakhe //MU_6,24.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15599: caratāṃ jagataḥ kośe vyavahāravatām api / kathaṃ vihagarājendra dehaṃ mṛtyur na bādhate //MU_6,24.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15600: bhusuṇḍaḥ: jānann api hi sarvajña brahmañ jijñāsayaiva mām / pṛcchasi prabhavo nityaṃ bhṛtyaṃ vācālayanti hi //MU_6,24.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15601: tathāpi yat pṛcchasi māṃ tat te prakathayāmy aham / anājñābhaṅgam evāhur mukhyam ārādhanaṃ satām //MU_6,24.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15602: doṣamuktāphalaprotā vāsanātantusantatiḥ / hṛdi na grathitā yasya mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15603: viśvāsavṛkṣakrakacās sarve dehalatāghuṇāḥ / ādhayo yaṃ na bhindanti mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15604: ṣaṇḍāt ṣaṇḍaṃ nipatitaṃ śākhāmṛgam ivoddhataṃ / na cañcalaṃ mano yasya taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15605: śarīratarusarpaughāś cittaurvaśikhinaś śikhāḥ / āśā yaṃ na dahanty antas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15606: rāgadveṣaviṣāpūras svamanobilamandiraḥ / lobhavyālo na bhuṅkte yaṃ mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15607: pītāśeṣavivekāmbuś śarīrāmbhodhivāḍavaḥ / na nirdahati yaṃ kopas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15608: yantraṃ tilānāṃ kaṭhinaṃ rāśim ugram ivākulam / yaṃ pīḍayati nānaṅgas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15609: ekasmin nirmale yena pade paramapāvane / saṃśritā dṛḍhaviśrāntis taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15610: ete brahman mahādoṣās saṃsāravyādhihetavaḥ / manāg api na lumpanti cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15611: ādhivyādhisamutthāni valitāni mahābhramaiḥ / na vilumpanti duḥkhāni cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15612: na dādati na cādatte na jahāti na yācate / kurvad eva ca kāryāṇi cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15613: nāstam eti na codeti nasaṃsmṛti navismṛti / na suptaṃ na ca jāgratsthaṃ cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15614: andhīkṛtahṛdākāśāḥ kāmakrodhavikārajāḥ / cintā na parihiṃsanti cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15615: ye durarthā durārambhā durguṇā durudāhṛtāḥ / duṣkramās te na kṛntanti cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15616: śubhāni vipulārthāni mahānti guṇavanti ca / sarvāṇy evānudhāvanti cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15617: yad udarkahitaṃ satyam anapāyi gatabhramam / durīhitadaśāmuktaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15618: yad adṛṣṭam aśuddhena ciravaidhuryakāriṇā / mune kāmapiśācena tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15619: ādau madhye tathānte ca cirāya pari coditam / yac cāru madhuraṃ pathyaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15620: yad anarthadaśāhīnaṃ nirṇītaṃ sadbhir āditaḥ / guṇānubandhi lokyaṃ ca tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15621: peśalaṃ madhuraṃ hṛdyaṃ svādu śītam apakṣayam / sutīkṣṇam atinirṇītaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15622: yad buddheḥ param ālokyam ādyaṃ yad amṛtaṃ param / yad anuttamasaubhāgyaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15623: sāmare sahagandharve savidyādharakinnare / sasurastrīgaṇe svarge na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15624: sanare sanarādhīśe saparvatapuravraje / sāmbudhau bhūtale tāta na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15625: sanāge sāsuravyūhe sāsurastrījane tathā / samasta eva pātāle na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15626: sasvarge sadharābhoge sapātāle sadiktaṭe / jagaty asmiṃs tu sarvasmin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15627: samukhe sakare sāṃse sapāde sorumaṇḍale / saraktamāṃse dehe 'smin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15628: ādhivyādhivilolāsu duḥkhaughavalitāsu ca / kriyāsu nityatucchāsu na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15629: taralīkṛtacittāsu hṛdayāmardanīṣu ca / cintāsu jīvakārāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15630: hṛtkṣīrodakasaspandamandareṣu caleṣv ati / svasaṅkalpavikalpeṣu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15631: anāratāgamāpāyaparāsv aśiśirāsv ati / citrācārāsu ceṣṭāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.34//
GSP27moksop_u:15632: na varam ekamahītalarājatā na ca varaṃ vividhāmararūpatā / na ca varaṃ dharaṇītalanāgatā sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ //MU_6,24.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15633: na varam ākulaśāstravicāraṇaṃ na ca varaṃ varakāvyavivecanam / na varam agryakathākramacarvaṇaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ //MU_6,24.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15634: na varam ādhimayaṃ cirajīvitaṃ na ca varaṃ maraṇaṃ dṛḍhamūḍhatā / na ca varaṃ narako na ca viṣṭapaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ //MU_6,24.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15635: iti vividhajagatkramās samastāś calamatimūḍhatayā narasya rūḍhāḥ / calatarakalanāhite padārthe katham upayānti ciraṃ sthitiṃ mahāntaḥ //MU_6,24.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15638: bhusuṇḍaḥ: ekaiva kevalaṃ dṛṣṭir anapāyā gatabhramā / vidyate sarvavicchreṣṭha sarvaśreṣṭhā samunnatā //MU_6,25.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15639: ātmacintā samastānāṃ duḥkhānām antakāriṇī / cirasambhṛtasantaptasaṃsāraśramahāriṇī / niṣkalaṅkamanomārgavipulāṅganacāriṇī //MU_6,25.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15640: tayā samastaduḥkhānāṃ sattānarthavilāsinām / jyotsnayevāndhakārāṇām alam antaḥ prajāyate //MU_6,25.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15641: sā svātmacintā bhagavan sarvasaṅkalpavarjitā / yuṣmadādiṣu suprāpā duṣprāpaivāsmadādiṣu //MU_6,25.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15642: samastakalanātītaṃ parāṃ koṭim upāśritam / padam āsādayantv etat kathaṃ sāmānyabuddhayaḥ //MU_6,25.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15643: ātmacintāvilāsinyas tv asyās sakhyo mahāmate / kiñcit sāmyam upāyātā vidyante śaśiśītalāḥ //MU_6,25.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15644: ātmacintāsamānānāṃ vividhānāṃ munīśvara / ātmacintāvayasyānāṃ madhyād ekatamā mayā //MU_6,25.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15645: sarvaduḥkhakṣayakarī sarvasaubhāgyavardhinī / kāraṇaṃ jīvitasyeyaṃ prāṇacintā samāśritā //MU_6,25.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15646: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktavantaṃ vihagaṃ bhusuṇḍaṃ punar apy aham / jānann apīdam avyagraḥ pṛṣṭavān krīḍayā punaḥ //MU_6,25.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15647: sarvasaṃśayavicchedinn atyantacirajīvita / yathārthaṃ brūhi me sādho prāṇacintā kim ucyate //MU_6,25.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15648: bhusuṇḍaḥ: sarvavedāntavettāsi sarvasaṃśayanāśakaḥ / mām etat parihāsārthaṃ mune pṛcchasi vāyasam //MU_6,25.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15649: atha vā bhavatām eva bhavadbhyaḥ pariśikṣitam / punaḥ pratyuccarāmīdaṃ kā me kṣatir upasthitā //MU_6,25.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15650: bhusuṇḍajīvitakaraṃ bhusuṇḍasyātmalābhadam / śṛṇu prāṇasamādhānaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ mayā //MU_6,25.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15651: paśyedaṃ bhagavaṃs tāvad dehagehaṃ manoramam / tripradhānamahāsthūṇaṃ navadvārasamāvṛtam //MU_6,25.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15652: puryaṣṭakakalatreṇa tanmātrasvajanena ca / ahaṅkāragṛhasthena sarvataḥ paripālitam //MU_6,25.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15657: īdṛśasyāsya dehasya gehasya munināyaka / suṣire komale madhye pārśukābhittimālite //MU_6,25.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15658: padmayugmamayaṃ yantram asthimāṃsamayaṃ mṛdu / ūrdhvādhonālam anyo'nyamilatkośaṃ lasaddalam //MU_6,25.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15659: satataspandarūpeṇa sakalākāśacāriṇā / tasya yantrasya pattrāṇi mṛdūny āttāni vāyunā //MU_6,25.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15660: lasatsu teṣu pattreṣu sa marut parivardhate / vātāhatalatāpattrajāle bahir ivābhitaḥ //MU_6,25.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15661: vṛddhiṃ gato 'sau pavanaḥ kṛtvātmānam anekadhā / ūrdhvādho dikṣu cānyāsu dehe 'smin prasaraty atha //MU_6,25.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15662: prāṇāpānasamānādyais tatas sa hṛdayānilaḥ / saṅketaiḥ procyate tajjñair vicitrācāraceṣṭitaḥ //MU_6,25.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15663: hṛtpadmayantrakuharāt samastāḥ prāṇaśaktayaḥ / ūrdhvādhaḥ prasṛtā dehe candrabimbād ivāṃśavaḥ //MU_6,25.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15664: yānty āyānti vivalganti haranti viharanti ca / utpatanti patanty āśu tā etāḥ prāṇaśaktayaḥ //MU_6,25.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15665: sa eṣa hṛtpadmagataḥ prāṇa ity ucyate budhaiḥ / asya kācin mune śaktiḥ praspandayati locane //MU_6,25.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15666: kācit sparśam upādatte kācid vahati nāsayā / kācid annaṃ jarayati kācid vakti vacāṃsi ca //MU_6,25.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15667: bahunātra kim uktena sarvam eva śarīrake / karoti bhagavān vāyur yantrehām iva yāntrikaḥ //MU_6,25.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15668: tatrordhvādho dvisaṅketau prasṛtāv anilau mune / prāṇāpānāv iti khyātau prakaṭau tau varānilau //MU_6,25.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15669: tayor anusaran nityaṃ mune gatim ahaṃ sthitaḥ / śītoṣṇavapuṣor nityaṃ nityam ambarapānthayoḥ //MU_6,25.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15672: tayor mamānusarataḥ prāṇāpānābhidhānayoḥ / gatiṃ śarīramarutor āśarīram aruddhayoḥ //MU_6,25.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15673: jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu sadaiva samarūpayoḥ / suṣuptasaṃsthitasyeva brahman gacchanti vāsarāḥ //MU_6,25.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15674: sahasradhā nikṛttāṅgād bisatantulavād api / durlakṣyā vidyamānā ca gatis sūkṣmatarā tayoḥ //MU_6,25.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15675: aviratagatayor gatiṃ viditvā hṛdi marutor anusṛtya coditāṃ tām / na punar iha hi jāyate mahātman muditamanāḥ puruṣaḥ praṇaṣṭapāśaḥ //MU_6,25.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15678: bhusuṇḍaḥ: jānann api mune sarvaṃ kiṃ māṃ pṛcchasi līlayā / yathāpṛṣṭam ahaṃ vacmi tatrāpi śṛṇu me vacaḥ //MU_6,26.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15679: prāṇo 'yam aniśaṃ brahman spandaśaktis sadāgatiḥ / sabāhyābhyantare dehe prāṇo 'yam upari sthitaḥ //MU_6,26.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15680: apāno 'py aniśaṃ brahman spandaśaktis sadāgatiḥ / sabāhyābhyantare dehe tv apāno 'yam avāk sthitaḥ //MU_6,26.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15681: jāgratas svapataś caiva prāṇāyāmo 'yam uttamaḥ / pravartate yas tajjñasya taṃ tāvac chreyase śṛṇu //MU_6,26.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15682: bāhyonmukhatvaṃ prāṇānāṃ yad dhṛdambhojakoṭarāt / svairam evāttayatnānāṃ taṃ dhīrā recakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15683: dvādaśāṅgulaparyantaṃ bāhyam ākramatāṃ hṛdaḥ / prāṇānām aṅgasaṃsparśo yas sa pūraka ucyate //MU_6,26.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15684: bāhyāt parāpataty antar apāne yatnavarjitam / yo 'ṅgaprapūraṇe sparśo vidus tam api pūrakam //MU_6,26.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15685: apāne 'staṅgate prāṇo yāvan nābhyudito hṛdi / tāvat sā kumbhakāvasthā yogibhir yānubhūyate //MU_6,26.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15686: pūrakaḥ kumbhakaś caiva recakaś ca dvidhā sthitaḥ / apānasyodayasthāne dvādaśāntābhidhe bahiḥ //MU_6,26.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15687: svabhāvāt sarvakālasthās somyā yatnavivarjitāḥ / ye proktās sphāramatibhis tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇu mahāmate //MU_6,26.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15688: dvādaśāṅgulaparyantād bāhyād abhyuditaḥ prabho / apānas tasya tatraiva svabhāvāt pūrakādayaḥ //MU_6,26.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15689: mṛdantarasthāniṣpannaghaṭavad yā sthitir bahiḥ / vyomni nityam apānasya taṃ viduḥ kumbhakaṃ budhāḥ //MU_6,26.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15690: bāhyonmukhatvaṃ vāyor yā nāsikāgrāvadhir gatiḥ / taṃ bāhyapūrakaṃ tv ādyaṃ vidur yogavido janāḥ //MU_6,26.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15691: nāsāgrād api nirgatya dvādaśāntāvadhir gatiḥ / yā vāyos taṃ vidur dhīrā aparaṃ bāhyapūrakam //MU_6,26.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15692: atraivāstaṅgate prāṇe yāvan nāpāna udgataḥ / tāvat pūrṇāṃ samāvasthāṃ bahissthaṃ kumbhakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15693: yat tadantarmukhatvaṃ syād apānasyodayaṃ vinā / taṃ bāhyarecakaṃ vidyāc cintyamānaṃ vimuktidam //MU_6,26.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15694: dvādaśāntād yad utthāya rūpapīvaratā parā / apānasya bahis tat tam aparaṃ recakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15695: bāhyān ābhyantarāṃś caitān kumbhakādīn anāratam / prāṇāpānasvabhāvān svān buddhvā bhūyo na jāyate //MU_6,26.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15696: aṣṭāv ete mahābuddhe rātrindivam anusmṛtāḥ / svabhāvād eva vāyūnāṃ kathitā muktidā mayā //MU_6,26.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15697: gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato 'pi vā / ete na rodham āyānti prakṛtyā hi calo 'nilaḥ //MU_6,26.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15698: yat karoti yad aśnāti buddhyaitān samanusmaran / kumbhakādīn naras so 'ntas tatra kartā na kiñcana //MU_6,26.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15699: suvyagram asmin vyāpāre bāhyaṃ parijahan manaḥ / dinaiḥ katipayair eva padam āpnoti kevalam //MU_6,26.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15700: etad abhyasyataḥ puṃso bāhye viṣayavṛttiṣu / na badhnāti ratiṃ cetaś śvadṛtau brāhmaṇo yathā //MU_6,26.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15701: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya ye sthitāḥ kṛtabuddhayaḥ / prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ tair akhinnās ta eva hi //MU_6,26.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15702: tiṣṭhatā gacchatā nityaṃ jāgratā svapatā tathā / eṣā cet prekṣyate dṛṣṭis tan na bandhanam āpyate //MU_6,26.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15703: prāṇāpānānusaraṇāt prāpte bodhe nirāmaye / saṃśāntamadamohena svasthenāntar ihoṣyate //MU_6,26.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15704: sarvārambhāṃs tyajan svasthaḥ kurvaṃś cāpi budho janaḥ / prāṇāpānagatīḥ prāpya susvasthas sukham edhate //MU_6,26.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15705: prāṇasyābhyudayo brahman padmayantrād dhṛdi sthitāt / dvādaśāṅgulaparyante prāṇo 'staṃ yāty ayaṃ bahiḥ //MU_6,26.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15706: apānasyodayo bāhyād dvādaśāntān mahāmune / astaṅgatir athāmbhojayantre hṛdayasaṃsthite //MU_6,26.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15707: prāṇo yatrāstam āyāti dvādaśānte nabhaḥpade / padāt tasmād apāno 'yam udeti samanantaram //MU_6,26.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15708: bāhyākāśonmukhaḥ prāṇo vahaty agniśikhā yathā / hṛdākāśonmukho 'pāno nimne vahati vārivat //MU_6,26.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15709: apānaś candramā deham āpyāyayati bāhyataḥ / prāṇas sūryo 'gnir atha vā pacaty antar idaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,26.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15710: prāṇo hi hṛdayākāśaṃ tāpayitvā pratikṣaṇam / mukhāgragaganaṃ paścāt tāpayaty uttamo raviḥ //MU_6,26.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15711: apānendur mukhāgre khaṃ pyāyayitvā hṛdambaram / paścād āpyāyayaty eṣa nimeṣasamanantaram //MU_6,26.34//
GSP27moksop_u:15712: apānaśaśino 'ntassthāḥ kalāḥ prāṇavivasvatā / yatra grastās tad āsādya padaṃ bhūyo na śocyate //MU_6,26.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15713: prāṇārkasya kalāntassthā yatrāpānahimāṃśunā / grastā tat padam āsādya na bhūyo janmabhāṅ manaḥ //MU_6,26.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15714: prāṇa evārkatāṃ yāti sabāhyābhyantare 'mbare / āpyāyanakarīṃ paścāc chaśitām adhigacchati //MU_6,26.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15715: prāṇa evendutāṃ tyaktvā śarīrāpyāyakāriṇīm / kṣaṇād āyāti sūryatvaṃ saṃśoṣaṇakaraṃ param //MU_6,26.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15716: arkatāṃ samparityajya na yāvac candratāṃ gataḥ / prāṇas tāvad vicāryāntar deśakālau na śocyate //MU_6,26.39//
GSP27moksop_u:15717: hṛdi candrārkayor jñātvā nityam astamayodayam / ātmano nijam ādhāraṃ na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ //MU_6,26.40//
GSP27moksop_u:15718: sodayāstamayaṃ senduṃ saraśmiṃ sasamāgamam / hṛdaye bhāskaraṃ devaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_6,26.41//
GSP27moksop_u:15719: nākṣīṇaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bahissthaṃ siddhaye tamaḥ / hārdaṃ tu kṣapayed dhvāntaṃ yatkṣaye siddhir uttamā //MU_6,26.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15720: bāhye tamasi saṅkṣīṇe lokālokaḥ prajāyate / hārde tu tamasi kṣīṇe svāloko jāyate paraḥ //MU_6,26.43//
GSP27moksop_u:15721: hārdāndhakārakṣayadaṃ parijñātaṃ vimuktidam / sodayāstamayaṃ yatnāt prāṇārkam avalokayet //MU_6,26.44//
GSP27moksop_u:15722: apānenduḥ prayāty astaṃ yatra hṛtpadmakoṭare / padāt tasmād udety antaḥ prāṇārko bahirunmukhaḥ //MU_6,26.45//
GSP27moksop_u:15723: apāne 'staṅgate prāṇas samudeti hṛdambujāt / chāyāyāṃ galitāṅgāyāṃ tatraivāśu yathātapaḥ //MU_6,26.46//
GSP27moksop_u:15724: prāṇe tv astaṅgate bāhyād apānaḥ prodayet kṣaṇāt / ātape parito naṣṭe chāyevāśu pade navā //MU_6,26.47//
GSP27moksop_u:15725: prāṇajanmāvanau naṣṭam apānaṃ viddhi sanmate / apānajanmabhūmau ca prāṇaṃ naṣṭam avaihi hi //MU_6,26.48//
GSP27moksop_u:15726: astaṅgatavati prāṇe tv apāne 'bhyudayonmukhe / bahiḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate //MU_6,26.49//
GSP27moksop_u:15727: apāne 'staṅgate prāṇe kiñcid abhyudayonmukhe / antaḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate //MU_6,26.50//
GSP27moksop_u:15728: prāṇarecakamūlastham apānāpūrakoṭigam / svasthaṃ kumbhakam abhyasya na bhūyaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,26.51//
GSP27moksop_u:15729: apānarecakādhāraṃ prāṇapūrāntasaṃsthitam / svasaṃsthaṃ kumbhakaṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhūyaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,26.52//
GSP27moksop_u:15730: prāṇāpānāv ubhāv antar yatraitau vilayaṃ gatau / tad ālambya padaṃ śāntam ātmanā nānutapyate //MU_6,26.53//
GSP27moksop_u:15731: prāṇabhakṣyonmukhāpānaṃ deśaṃ kālaṃ ca niṣkalam / vicārya bahir antar vā na bhūyaḥ pariśocyate //MU_6,26.54//
GSP27moksop_u:15732: apānabhakṣaṇaparaṃ prāṇaṃ hṛdi tathā bahiḥ / deśaṃ kālaṃ ca samprekṣya na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ //MU_6,26.55//
GSP27moksop_u:15733: yatra prāṇo hy apānena prāṇenāpāna eva ca / nigīrṇo bahir antaś ca deśau kālau ca paśya tau //MU_6,26.56//
GSP27moksop_u:15734: kṣaṇam astaṅgataprāṇam apānodayavarjitam / ayatnasiddhaṃ bāhyasthaṃ kumbhakaṃ tat padaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.57//
GSP27moksop_u:15735: kṣaṇam astaṅgatāpānaḥ prāṇodayavivarjitaḥ / ayatnasiddho hy antassthaḥ kumbhakaḥ paramaṃ padam //MU_6,26.58//
GSP27moksop_u:15736: etat tad ātmano rūpaṃ śuddhaiṣā sā paraiva cit / etat sad asadābhāsam etat prāpya na śocyate //MU_6,26.59//
GSP27moksop_u:15737: puṣpasyāntar ivāmodaṃ prāṇasyāntar avasthitam / na ca prāṇaṃ na cāpānaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.60//
GSP27moksop_u:15738: prāṇakṣayapadāntastham apānakṣayakoṭigam / apānaprāṇayor madhyaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.61//
GSP27moksop_u:15739: prāṇasya prāṇanaṃ proccaiḥ paraṃ jīvasya jīvitam / dehasya dhāraṇaṃ dhuryaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.62//
GSP27moksop_u:15740: yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ / yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.63//
GSP27moksop_u:15741: ālokālokanaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvapāvanapāvanam / bhāvābhāvanam anyūnaṃ cidātmanam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.64//
GSP27moksop_u:15742: parasparopasaṅghaṭṭe hṛdaye marutos sthitam / bahir antas tathākāśe cidātmanam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.65//
GSP27moksop_u:15743: apāno 'staṅgato yatra prāṇo nābhyuditaḥ kṣaṇam / kalākalaṅkarahitaṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.66//
GSP27moksop_u:15744: nāpāno 'bhyudito yatra prāṇaś cāstam upāgataḥ / nāsāgragaganāvartaṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.67//
GSP27moksop_u:15745: prāṇāpānodbhavasthāne bāhyābhyantarasaṃsthite / ye dve yogipadādhāraṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.68//
GSP27moksop_u:15746: prāṇāpānarathārūḍham aprāṇāpānam ātatam / yac chaktirūpaṃ śaktīnāṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.69//
GSP27moksop_u:15747: hṛtprāṇakumbhakaṃ devaṃ bahiś cāpānakumbhakam / pūrakāṃśavimṛṣṭaṃ yat tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.70//
GSP27moksop_u:15748: prāṇāpānaparāmarśasattārūpāvabodhakam / yat prāpyaṃ prāṇamananāt tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.71//
GSP27moksop_u:15749: yat prāṇapavanaspando yat spandānandakāraṇam / kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānāṃ yat tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.72//
GSP27moksop_u:15750: yad akhilakalanākalaṅkahīnaṃ parivalitaṃ ca sadā kalāgaṇena / anubhavavibhavaṃ padaṃ tad agryaṃ sakalasurāvanataṃ paraṃ prapadye //MU_6,26.73//
GSP27moksop_u:15753: bhusuṇḍaḥ: eṣā hi citi viśrāntir mayā prāṇasamādhinā / krameṇānena samprāptā svayam ātmani nirmale //MU_6,27.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15754: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya saṃsthito 'smi mahāmune / na calāmi nimeṣāṃśam api merur ivācalaḥ //MU_6,27.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15755: gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato 'pi vā / svapne 'pi na calaty eṣa susamādhir mamātmani //MU_6,27.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15756: nityānityāsu lolāsu jagatsthitiṣu saṃsthitaḥ / antarmukho 'smi tiṣṭhāmi svayam evātmanātmani //MU_6,27.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15757: api saṃrudhyate vāyur api vā salilaṃ gateḥ / naitasmāt susamādhānān niruddhaṃ saṃsmarāmy aham //MU_6,27.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15758: prāṇāpānānusaraṇāt paramātmāvalokanāt / aśokam anuyāto 'smi padam ādyaṃ mahātapaḥ //MU_6,27.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15759: ā mahāpralayād brahmann unmajjananimajjane / ayam adyāpi bhūtānāṃ paśyañ jīvāmi dhīradhīḥ //MU_6,27.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15760: na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyac ca cintayāmi kadācana / dṛṣṭim ālambya tiṣṭhāmi vartamānām ihātmanaḥ //MU_6,27.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15761: yathāprāpteṣu kāryeṣu parityaktaphalaiṣaṇaḥ / suṣuptasamayā buddhyā paritiṣṭhāmi kevalam //MU_6,27.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15762: bhāvābhāvamayīṃ cintām īhitānīhitānvitām / vimucyātmani tiṣṭhāmi ciraṃ jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15763: prāṇāpānasamāyogasamayaṃ samanusmaran / svayam ātmani tuṣyāmi tenāsmi cirajīvitaḥ //MU_6,27.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15764: idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ lapsyāmi sundaram / iti cintā na me tena ciraṃ jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15765: na staumi na ca nindāmi kvacit kiñcit kadācana / ātmano 'nyasya vā sādho tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15766: na tuṣyati śubhaprāptau nāśubheṣv api khidyate / mano mama samaṃ nityaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15767: paramaṃ tyāgam ālambya sarvam eva sadaiva hi / jīvitādi mayā tyaktaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15768: praśāntacāpalaṃ vītaśokam astasamīhitam / mano mama mune śāntaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15769: kāṣṭhaṃ vilāsinīṃ śailaṃ tṛṇam agniṃ himaṃ nabhaḥ / samaṃ sarvatra paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15770: kim adya mama samprāptaṃ prātar vā bhavitā punaḥ / iti cintājvaro nāsti tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15771: jarāmaraṇaduḥkheṣu rājyalābhasukheṣu ca / na bibhemi na hṛṣyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15772: ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyaṃ mamāyam ayam anyataḥ / iti brahman na jānāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15773: āharan viharaṃs tiṣṭhann uttiṣṭhann ucchvasan svapan / deho 'ham iti no vedmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15774: imaṃ saṃsāram ārambhaṃ suṣuptavad avasthitaḥ / asantam iva paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15775: yathākālam upāyātāv arthānarthau samau mama / hastāv iva śarīrasthau tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15776: apāriplavayā ṛjvyā sudṛśā snigdhamugdhayā / ṛju paśyāmi sarvatra tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15777: āpādamastakānte 'smin na dehe mamatā mama / tyaktāhaṅkārapaṅkasya tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15778: yat karomi yad aśnāmi tat tyaktvā tadvato 'pi me / mano naiṣkarmyam ādatte tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15779: yadā yadā mune kiñcid vijānāmi tadā tadā / natim āyāmi nauddhatyaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15780: karomīśo 'pi nākrāntiṃ paritapye na kheditaḥ / daridro 'pi na vāñchāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15781: naśyadrūpe śarīre 'sminn anaṣṭātmā cidāspadaḥ / bhūtavṛndaṃ hasāmy ārāt tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15782: āśāpāśavinunnāyāś cittavṛttes samāhitaḥ / saṃsparśaṃ na dadāmy antas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15783: asattāṃ jagatas sattām ātmanaḥ karabilvavat / suptaḥ prabuddhaḥ paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15784: kṣīṇaṃ bhinnaṃ ślathaṃ jīrṇaṃ kṣubdhaṃ kṣuṇṇaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam / paśyāmi navavat sarvaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15785: sukhito 'smi sukhāsakte duḥkhito duḥkhite jane / sarvasya priyamitraṃ ca tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15786: āpady acaladhīro 'smi jaganmitraṃ ca sampadi / bhāvābhāveṣu naivāsmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.34//
GSP27moksop_u:15787: nāham asmi na cānyo me nāham anyasya kasyacit / iti me bhāvitaṃ cetas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15788: ahaṃ jagad ahaṃ vyoma deśakālakramāv aham / ahaṃ kriyeti me buddhis tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15789: ghaṭaś cic cit paṭaś cit khaṃ cid vaṭaś śakaṭaś ca cit / cit sarvam iti me bhāvas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15790: ity ahaṃ muniśārdūla trilokīkamalālikaḥ / bhusuṇḍanāmā kākolaḥ kathitaś cirajīvitaḥ //MU_6,27.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15791: brahmārṇave vilulitaṃ trijagattaraṅgam utpādanāśavibhavena vibhinnarūpam / ālīnam unnamitam ākuladṛśyadṛśyam ālokayan prakalayaṃś ca ciraṃ sthito 'smi //MU_6,27.39//
GSP27moksop_u:15794: bhusuṇḍaḥ: etat te kathitaṃ brahman yathāsmi yad ihāsmi vā / tvadājñāmātrasiddhyarthaṃ dhārṣṭyena jñānapāraga //MU_6,28.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15795: vasiṣṭhaḥ: aho nu citraṃ bhagavan bhavatā bhūṣaṇaṃ śruteḥ / ātmodantaḥ prakathitaḥ paraṃ vismayakāraṇam //MU_6,28.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15796: dhanyās te ye mahātmānam atyantaṃ cirajīvitam / bhavantaṃ paripṛcchanti dvitīyam iva padmajam //MU_6,28.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15797: vayam adya bhṛśaṃ dhanyās svātmodantam akhaṇḍitam / yathāvat pāvanaṃ buddhes sarvaṃ kathitavān asi //MU_6,28.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15798: prabhrāntaṃ dikṣu sarvāsu dṛṣṭā vibudhabhūmayaḥ / bhavān iva jagaty asmin na mahān avalokitaḥ //MU_6,28.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15799: kathañcit prāpyate kaccid bhrāntveha hi mahājanaḥ / na bhavān iva bhavyātmā sulabho jagati kvacit //MU_6,28.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15800: vaṃśakhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate mauktikaṃ yathā / jagatkhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate tvādṛśas tathā //MU_6,28.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15801: mayā tu sumahat kāryam adya sampāditaṃ śubham / puṇyadeho vimuktātmā yad bhavān avalokitaḥ //MU_6,28.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15802: tad astu tava kalyāṇaṃ praviśātmaguhāṃ śubhām / madhyāhnasamayo 'yaṃ me vrajāmi suramandiram //MU_6,28.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15803: ity ākarṇya bhusuṇḍo 'sau jagrāhotthāya pādapāt / saṅkalpitābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ supātraṃ hemapallavam //MU_6,28.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15804: kalpavṛkṣalatāpuṣpakesareṇa himatviṣā / tat pātraṃ mauktikārgheṇa pūrayām āsa pūrṇadhīḥ //MU_6,28.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15805: tenārghyapādyapātreṇa trinetram iva mām asau / āpādamastakaṃ bhaktyā pūjayām āsa pūrvajaḥ //MU_6,28.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15806: anuvrajyākadarthena khagendrālam iti bruvan / viṣṭarād aham utthāya tataḥ khagavad āplutaḥ //MU_6,28.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15807: vyomni yojanamātreṇa madanuvrajyayā gataḥ / karaṃ kareṇāvaṣṭabhya balāt saṃrodhitaḥ khagaḥ //MU_6,28.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15808: mayi yāte tato dīrghe gaganādhvany adṛśyatām / nivṛtto 'sau vihaṅgeśo dustyajā saṅgatis satām //MU_6,28.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15809: anyo'nyaṃ mayi tasmiṃś ca taraṅgaka ivāmbudhau / vyomany adṛśyatāṃ yāte gatas smṛtyā munīn aham //MU_6,28.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15810: saptarṣimaṇḍalaṃ prāpya jāyayā paripūjitaḥ / vismayotphullahṛdayas tato 'haṃ rāghavāvasam //MU_6,28.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15811: bhusuṇḍo bhavyatuṇḍo 'sau tasmin kalpalatālaye / samaś śāntamanā mānyas svasamādhānavān abhūt //MU_6,28.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15812: jīvaty adyāpi matimāṃs tasminn eva latādale / tatraiva saṃsthito meros tathaiva kanakadrume //MU_6,28.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15813: yāte kṛtayugasyādau purā varṣaśatadvaye / saṅgato 'haṃ bhusuṇḍena merau śṛṅgadrume 'bhavam //MU_6,28.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15814: adya rāma kṛte kṣīṇe tretā samparivartate / madhye tretāyugasyāsya jātas tvaṃ ripusūdana //MU_6,28.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15815: punar adyāṣṭamaṃ varṣaṃ tatraivopari bhūbhṛtaḥ / milito 'bhūd bhusuṇḍo 'sau tathaivājararūpavān //MU_6,28.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15816: itīdaṃ kathitaṃ citraṃ bhusuṇḍodantam uttamam / śrutvā vicārya caivāntar yad yuktaṃ tat samācara //MU_6,28.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15817: iti sumunibhusuṇḍasaṅkathāṃ yo vimalamatiḥ pravicārayiṣyatīha / bhavabhayabahalāṃ kusaṃsṛtiṃ sa prasabham asatsaritaṃ tariṣyatīti //MU_6,28.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15820: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ bhusuṇḍavṛttāntaḥ kathitas te mayānagha / anayā prajñayā tīrṇo bhusuṇḍo mohasaṅkaṭāt //MU_6,29.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15821: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya svaprāṇābhyāsapūrvikām / bhusuṇḍavan mahābāho bhava tīrṇabhavārṇavaḥ //MU_6,29.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15822: yathā jñānena yogena santatābhyāsajanmanā / bhusuṇḍo 'vāptavān prāpyaṃ tathā sādhaya tat padam //MU_6,29.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15823: asaktabuddhayas santo bhusuṇḍavad avasthitim / prāpnuvanti pare tattve prāṇāpānāvalokinaḥ //MU_6,29.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15824: etā vicitrā bhavatā śrutā vijñānadṛṣṭayaḥ / idānīṃ dhiyam ālambya yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_6,29.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15825: rāmaḥ: bhagavan bhavatā bhūmibhāsvatā jñānaraśmibhiḥ / hārdam uddāmadaurātmyaṃ pramṛṣṭam akhilaṃ tamaḥ //MU_6,29.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15826: prabuddhās smaḥ prahṛṣṭās smaḥ praviṣṭās smas svam āspadam / sthitās smo jñātavijñeyā bhavanto hy aparā iva //MU_6,29.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15827: aho bhusuṇḍacaritaṃ paraṃ vismayakārakam / bhagavan bhavatā proktam uttamārthāvabodhadam //MU_6,29.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15828: bhusuṇḍacarite brahmann etasmin yat tvayā vibho / tac charīragṛhaṃ proktaṃ māṃsacarmāsthinirmitam //MU_6,29.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15829: tat kena nāma racitaṃ kuto vā tat samutthitam / kathaṃ vā sthitim āyātaṃ ko vā tatrāvatiṣṭhate //MU_6,29.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15830: vasiṣṭhaḥ: paramārthāvabodhāya doṣāpākaraṇāya ca / śṛṇu rāghava tattvena vakṣyamāṇam idaṃ mayā //MU_6,29.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15831: asthisthūṇaṃ navadvāraṃ raktamāṃsāvalepanam / śarīrasadanaṃ rāma na kenacid idaṃ kṛtam //MU_6,29.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15832: ābhāsamātram evedam ittham evāvabhāsate / dvicandravibhramākāraṃ sad asac ca vyavasthitam //MU_6,29.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15833: dvicandravibhramavidhau dvicandratvaṃ sad eva hi / vastutaś caika evendus sthitir dehe tathaiva hi //MU_6,29.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15834: dehapratyayakāle hi deho 'yaṃ san vyavasthitaḥ / asann eva vastutas sa proktas sadasadātmakaḥ //MU_6,29.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15835: svapnas svapnavidhau satyas tv anyadā sa mudhaiva hi / budbudo budbudavidhau satyo mithyaiva cānyadā //MU_6,29.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15836: deho dehāvadhau satyo 'py asatya itarāvadhau / pratibhāsāvadhau tāpe jalaṃ sad asad anyadā //MU_6,29.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15837: pratibhāsāvadhau dehas sann asaṃs tv anyadā smṛtaḥ / ābhāsamātram evedam itthaṃ samprati bhāsate //MU_6,29.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15838: ayaṃ nāmāham ity antar gṛhītamananaṃ sthitam //MU_6,29.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15839: māṃsāsthimayanirmāṇaṃ deho nānyad iti bhramam / tyaja saṅkalpanirmāṇā dehās santi sahasraśaḥ //MU_6,29.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15840: varatalpagato yena svapne dehena diktaṭam / paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15841: jāgarāyāṃ manorājye yena svargapurāntaram / paribhramasi meruṃ vā sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15842: svapneṣv api ca yas svapnas tatra yena mahītaṭān / paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15843: gatair dehair manorājye mahāvibhavabhūmiṣu / paribhramasi yeneha sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15844: manorājye manorājye vicitrā yā jagatkriyāḥ / prakaroṣi mahābāho yair dehais te kva saṃsthitāḥ //MU_6,29.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15845: vilāsinyānurāgiṇyā yena saṅkalpakāntayā / nirvṛtiṃ yāsi dehena sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15846: ete rāma yathā dehā mānasaspandasanmayāḥ / tathaiva tādṛgārambho deho 'yaṃ mānasas smṛtaḥ //MU_6,29.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15847: idaṃ dhanam ayaṃ deho deśo 'yam iti yo bhramaḥ / tat sarvaṃ cittavīryasya saṅkalpasya vijṛmbhitam //MU_6,29.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15848: dīrghaṃ svapnam imaṃ viddhi dīrghaṃ vā cittavibhramam / dīrghaṃ vāpi manorājyaṃ saṃsāraṃ raghunandana //MU_6,29.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15849: prabodham eṣyasi yadā param ātmecchayā svayā / drakṣyasi tvaṃ tadā samyag idam ūrdhvād adho yathā //MU_6,29.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15850: svapnasaṅkalpakalane yathānyeva jagatsthitiḥ / tathaiveyaṃ hi saṅkalpakalanā kācid eva ha //MU_6,29.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15851: yathā pūrvaṃ mayotpattiḥ proktā kamalajanmanaḥ / manasas svayam evāntas saṅkalpakalanodbhavā //MU_6,29.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15853: yathā kalita ābhāso manaso 'bjajatāgatau / dehavac cintito dehas sthito 'nyas tadvad eva hi //MU_6,29.34//
GSP27moksop_u:15854: prākpravāhacirābhyasto vāsanāvilayena yaḥ / tathaiva dṛśyate dehas tadākṛtyudayena saḥ //MU_6,29.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15855: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena saṅkalpo hy ayam eva cet / anyathā bhāvyate rāma bhūyate tad ihānyathā //MU_6,29.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15856: ayaṃ so 'haṃ mamāyaṃ ca saṃsāra iti bhāvite / satyo 'yaṃ bhāsate rāma bhāvanādārḍhyasambhavaḥ //MU_6,29.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15857: bhāvitaṃ tīvravegena yad evāśu tad eva ca / sarvatra dṛśyate rāma kāntevātyantavallabhā //MU_6,29.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15858: aharvyāpṛtir abhyastā yathā svapne 'pi dṛśyate / tathā sambhāvanābhyastas saṃsāro 'py avalokyate //MU_6,29.39//
GSP27moksop_u:15859: yathā svapnāvadhau kṣipram aharvad avabhāsate / tathedaṃ sarvakālastham api saṃlakṣyate ciram //MU_6,29.40//
GSP27moksop_u:15860: vyomany eva yathā tāpasantapte dṛśyate sarit / dharāpy avidyamānaiva saṅkalpād dṛśyate tathā //MU_6,29.41//
GSP27moksop_u:15861: dṛśyate dṛṣṭivairūpyād yathā vyomani piñchikā / tathaiveyaṃ jagallakṣmīr durjñānād eva bhāsate //MU_6,29.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15862: bhīrur apy eti na yathā svasaṅkalpeṣu sambhramam / svasaṅkalpe 'pi saṃsāre na tathaiti bhayaṃ sudhīḥ //MU_6,29.43//
GSP27moksop_u:15863: sva eva hi svabhāvo 'yam itthaṃ samprati bhāsate / saṃsārasaraṇisthityā kasmāt ko 'tra vibhāti kim //MU_6,29.44//
GSP27moksop_u:15864: sa eva kiñcit saṃśodhyaś śuddhyā vimalatāṃ gate / tasmin na dṛśyate rāma moho 'yaṃ jāgataś calaḥ //MU_6,29.45//
GSP27moksop_u:15865: samyagālokamātreṇa svabhāvaś śuddhim ṛcchati / na gṛhṇāti malaṃ bhūyas tāmratām iva kāñcanam //MU_6,29.46//
GSP27moksop_u:15866: ābhāsamātram evaitan na san nāsaj jagattrayam / ity anyakalanātyāgaṃ samyagālokanaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,29.47//
GSP27moksop_u:15867: maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ svargo jñānam ajñānam eva ca / cidābhāsād ṛte nāstīty ekatā samyagīkṣaṇam //MU_6,29.48//
GSP27moksop_u:15868: tvamahantādisaṃsāram idam etā diśo daśa / sarvaṃ svābhāsam eveti samyagālokanaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,29.49//
GSP27moksop_u:15869: sadasanmayasaṃsāre yathābhūtārthadarśanāt / nāstam eti na codeti samyagālokanān manaḥ //MU_6,29.50//
GSP27moksop_u:15870: nirṇīya sarvabhāvānām asattvaṃ sattvam eva vā / niṣkāmaṃ śāntim abhyeti samyagālokanān manaḥ //MU_6,29.51//
GSP27moksop_u:15871: na nindati na ca stauti na hṛṣyati na śocati / śītalaṃ satyatām eti samyagālokanān manaḥ //MU_6,29.52//
GSP27moksop_u:15872: avaśyam eva martavyaṃ sarvair eva hi bandhubhiḥ / iti bandhuviyogeṣu kiṃ vṛthā paritapyase //MU_6,29.53//
GSP27moksop_u:15873: avaśyam eva ca mayā martavyam iti niścaye / ity ātmamaraṇaprāptau kiṃ mudhā paritapyase //MU_6,29.54//
GSP27moksop_u:15874: avaśyam eva jātena kiñcit svavibhavādikam / prāptavyaṃ puruṣeṇeti harṣasyāvasaro hi kaḥ //MU_6,29.55//
GSP27moksop_u:15875: sarvasyaiva hi saṃsāre narasya vyavahāriṇaḥ / anarthāya bhavaty āpac chokasyāvasaro hi kaḥ //MU_6,29.56//
GSP27moksop_u:15876: bruḍaty udeti sphurati budbudaugha ivārṇave / idaṃ hi janatājālaṃ kim atra paridevanā //MU_6,29.57//
GSP27moksop_u:15877: sat sad eva sadaivaitad asad evāsad eva hi / kriyāvaicitryamātre tu kim asmin paridevanā //MU_6,29.58//
GSP27moksop_u:15878: nāham asmi na cābhūvaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi cādhunā / deho 'haṃ cittadoṣo 'yaṃ kim anyat paridevyate //MU_6,29.59//
GSP27moksop_u:15879: dehāc ced anya evāhaṃ cidābhāsas tad aṅga he / kau tau me sadasadbhāvau yanniṣṭhaṃ paritapyate //MU_6,29.60//
GSP27moksop_u:15880: iti niścayavat tv antas samyagjñānān mano muneḥ / nāstam eti na codeti na cāntaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,29.61//
GSP27moksop_u:15881: paratām eva tāṃ so 'ntar anuttarapadasthitām / ādatte tittirir mṛdvīṃ tṛṇakoṭim ivāmalām //MU_6,29.62//
GSP27moksop_u:15882: etadartham asatye 'smin nāsthā kāryā manāg api / surajjveva balīvardo badhyate jantur āsthayā //MU_6,29.63//
GSP27moksop_u:15883: asatsvapnaṃ dṛḍham idam iti nirṇīya buddhitaḥ / āsthārahitayā dṛṣṭyā vihartavyam ihānagha //MU_6,29.64//
GSP27moksop_u:15884: kartavyam eva kartavyaṃ yasya na pratibhāsate / so 'ntaśśītalatām eti dinānte bhuvanaṃ yathā //MU_6,29.65//
GSP27moksop_u:15885: pravibhāgaṃ parityajya padārthapaṭalavraje / ābhāsamātrasāmānyam idam ālokayānagha //MU_6,29.66//
GSP27moksop_u:15886: ābhāsamātrakaṃ rāma cintāmarśakalaṅkitam / tatas tad api santyajya nirābhāso bhavottamaḥ //MU_6,29.67//
GSP27moksop_u:15887: cidākāśamayo nityas sarvagas sarvavarjitaḥ / ābhāsasya parityāge bhavasy ekāntanirmalaḥ //MU_6,29.68//
GSP27moksop_u:15888: nāham asmi na me bhogās satyā ity abhibhāvite / nedam āḍambaraṃ vyartham anarthāyāvabhāsate //MU_6,29.69//
GSP27moksop_u:15889: aham eva hi vā sarvaṃ cid ity evābhibhāvite / nedam āḍambaraṃ vyartham anarthāyāvabhāsate //MU_6,29.70//
GSP27moksop_u:15890: darśanadvayam apy etat satyam atyantasiddhidam / yad ekam etayor vetsi ramyaṃ tad rāma saṃśraya //MU_6,29.71//
GSP27moksop_u:15891: dvābhyām evātha vai tābhyāṃ darśanābhyām ihānagha / viharan kuru kalyāṇaṃ rāgadveṣaparikṣayāt //MU_6,29.72//
GSP27moksop_u:15892: yat kiñcid ucitaṃ loke yan nabhasy atha yat pare / tat sarvaṃ prāpyate rāma rāgadveṣaparikṣayāt //MU_6,29.73//
GSP27moksop_u:15893: rāgāhihitayā buddhyā yādṛg rāma viceṣṭyate / tat tad eva prayāty āśu mūḍhānāṃ viparītatām //MU_6,29.74//
GSP27moksop_u:15894: dveṣadoṣoparuddhāsu na guṇāś cittavṛttiṣu / padaṃ kurvanti dagdhāsu sthalīṣu hariṇā iva //MU_6,29.75//
GSP27moksop_u:15895: rāgo dveṣaś ca sarpau dvau na nilīnau manobile / yasya kalpataros tasmāt kiṃ nāmāṅga na labhyate //MU_6,29.76//
GSP27moksop_u:15896: ye hi prājñās suniyatā vidagdhāś śāstraśālinaḥ / rāgadveṣamayās te cej jambukās tad dhig astu tān //MU_6,29.77//
GSP27moksop_u:15897: mad dhanaṃ bhuktam anyena dhanaṃ bhuktaṃ mayānyataḥ / itthaṃ saṃvyavahārehā ko rāgadveṣayoḥ kramaḥ //MU_6,29.78//
GSP27moksop_u:15898: dhanāni bandhavo mitraṃ punar āyānti yānti ca / kim eteṣu naraḥ prājño rajyate vā virajyate //MU_6,29.79//
GSP27moksop_u:15899: bhāvābhāvabhavābhogā māyeyaṃ pārameśvarī / saṃsāraracanāsarpī prasaktaṃ pradahaty alam //MU_6,29.80//
GSP27moksop_u:15900: na dhanaṃ na jano nāsmi satyaṃ rāghava vastutaḥ / mithyaiva mithyāvalitam itīdaṃ parilakṣyate //MU_6,29.81//
GSP27moksop_u:15901: ādyantayos sarvam asan madhye 'py asthiram ādhimat / kva badhnātu dhṛtiṃ dhīro hy anyakalpitakhadrume //MU_6,29.82//
GSP27moksop_u:15902: ekena kalpitā khe strī bhuṅkte tāṃ dūrago 'paraḥ / itīyam aṅga saṃsāraracanā netaraḥ kramaḥ //MU_6,29.83//
GSP27moksop_u:15903: ihājavañjavībhāvam imam ākulam ātatam / gandharvapuranirmāṇavināśena samaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,29.84//
GSP27moksop_u:15904: svapnasaṅkalpapuravad asad evedam utthitam / kāladairghyadhiyā jātapratyayaṃ jātam adya vaḥ //MU_6,29.85//
GSP27moksop_u:15905: nāsi nāyaṃ paṭo nārtho vidyate bhittibhāgavān / saṅkalpakalanaiveyam abhyāsāt puṣṭatāṃ gatā //MU_6,29.86//
GSP27moksop_u:15906: suṣuptasaṃsthito nityaṃ vitate śāśvate pade / na kaścid eva parame bhavān ātmani saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.87//
GSP27moksop_u:15907: sarvaṃ tatrastha evedaṃ suṣuptapadavicyutaḥ / paripaśyasi saṃsāradīrghasvapnam urubhramam //MU_6,29.88//
GSP27moksop_u:15908: ajñānanidrāsughanasvasvabhāvān manāk cyutaḥ / saṃsārasvapnasambhrānto bhavān ayam iha sthitaḥ //MU_6,29.89//
GSP27moksop_u:15909: tad etāṃ vitatāṃ nidrāṃ ghanājñānamayātmikām / tyajālakṣmīm iva prāptanidhānaḥ puruṣottama //MU_6,29.90//
GSP27moksop_u:15910: prabodham ehi paśyāccham ātmānam uditaṃ sadā / nirvikalpacidābhāsaṃ prātaḥ padmo raviṃ yathā //MU_6,29.91//
GSP27moksop_u:15911: prabudhyasva prabudhyasva punaḥ punar ayaṃ mayā / prabodhyase mahābāho paśyātmārkam anāmayam //MU_6,29.92//
GSP27moksop_u:15912: mayaitenātiśītena vṛṣṭena jñānavāriṇā / suśabdaśālinā rāma ghanenevāsi bodhitaḥ //MU_6,29.93//
GSP27moksop_u:15913: bodham āsādaya paraṃ prabuddho 'sy eva rāghava / satyam ālokayālīkaṃ tyaktvemaṃ jāgataṃ bhramam //MU_6,29.94//
GSP27moksop_u:15914: na te janma na te duḥkhaṃ na doṣas te na te bhramaḥ / sarvasaṅkalpamuktas tvaṃ svātmanātmani saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.95//
GSP27moksop_u:15915: parigalitavikalpadoṣajālas samasitasārasuṣuptasomyavṛttiḥ / ativitatam idaṃ ca somyarūpaṃ samupaśamātmani tiṣṭha he mahātman //MU_6,29.96//
GSP27moksop_u:15918: vālmīkiḥ: ity ākarṇayati svacchasamacetasi rāghave / viśrānte svātmani svairaṃ paramānandam āgate //MU_6,30.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15919: tatrastheṣu ca sarveṣu teṣūpaśamaśāliṣu / aparikṣubdhacitteṣu sthiteṣv abhyuditātmasu //MU_6,30.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15920: saṃśāntasakalaspandaśabdasaṃvyavahāriṇi / sabhābhoge sthite somye rātrāv iva mahītale //MU_6,30.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15921: pramūkamugdhaghaṇṭāsu niṣaṇṇāsu nabhastale / śṛṇvantīṣv iva śuddhāsu patākāsu vaco muneḥ //MU_6,30.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15922: śāntasañcārasaṅkrāntaniścalāsyeṣu pakṣiṣu / svapatsv antaḥpurāṇāṃ ca pañjareṣv ālayeṣu ca //MU_6,30.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15923: vicārayatsu tattvārthaṃ buddhyā prāptavikāsayā / sutattvajñeṣu sabhyeṣu sahajānandaśāliṣu //MU_6,30.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15924: paropaśamaśālinyā tayā sadvākyamālayā / vinayāvanatistheṣu krīḍāmarkaṭakeṣv api //MU_6,30.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15925: rāghavasyātmaviśrāntisthityarthaṃ vacanaughataḥ / virarāma munir vāri sasetv ātmarayād iva //MU_6,30.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15926: atha yāte muhūrtārdhe rāghave pratibodhite / punar āha tam evārthaṃ vasiṣṭho vadatāṃ varaḥ //MU_6,30.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15927: vasiṣṭhaḥ: rāma samyakprabuddho 'si svātmānam asi labdhavān / etam evāvalambyāntas tiṣṭha meha madaṃ kṛthāḥ //MU_6,30.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15928: idaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ hi nābhau saṅkalpamātrake / saṃrodhitāyāṃ vahanād raghunandana rudhyate //MU_6,30.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15929: bodhitāyāṃ manonābhyām idaṃ saṃsāracakrakam / prayatnād rodhitam api pravahaty eva vegataḥ //MU_6,30.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15930: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya balaṃ prajñāṃ ca yuktitaḥ / nābhiṃ saṃsāracakrasya cittam eva nirodhayet //MU_6,30.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15931: prajñāsaujanyayuktena śāstrasaṃvalitena ca / pauruṣeṇa na yat prāptaṃ na tat kvacana labhyate //MU_6,30.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15932: daivaikaparatāṃ tyaktvā bālabodhopakalpitām / nijaṃ prayatnam āśritya cittam ādau nirodhayet //MU_6,30.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15933: ā viriñcāt pravṛttena bhrameṇājñānarūpiṇā / asad eva sadābhāsam idam ālakṣyate 'nagha //MU_6,30.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15934: ajñānabhramavistāramithyaikākṛtayo 'nagha / ime dehā bhramantīha sarva evāsadutthitāḥ //MU_6,30.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15935: saṅkalpapuruṣasyeva dehasyārthe kadācana / sukhaduḥkhavikāritvaṃ na kāryaṃ rāma dhīmatā //MU_6,30.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15936: duḥkhamlānamukhakledī prasannāt kledavarjitāt / api citranarād dehanaras tucchataras smṛtaḥ //MU_6,30.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15937: ādhivyādhiparimlāne svayaṃ kledini nāśini / na tathā sthiratā dehe citrapuṃsi yathā kila //MU_6,30.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15938: vināśito hi citrastho deho naśyati nānyathā / avaśyanāśo nāśātmā svayaṃ deho vinaśyati //MU_6,30.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15939: pālitas susthirāṃ śobhām ādatte citramānavaḥ / dehas tu pālito 'py uccair naśyaty eva na vardhate //MU_6,30.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15940: tena śreṣṭhaś citradeho nāyaṃ saṅkalpadehakaḥ / ye guṇāś citradehe hi na te saṅkalpadehake //MU_6,30.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15941: citradehād api jaḍād yo 'yaṃ tucchataraḥ kila / tasmin māṃsamaye dehe kevāsthā bhavato 'nagha //MU_6,30.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15942: dīrghasaṅkalpadeho 'yam asmin kvāsthā mahāmate / svalpasaṅkalpajād dehād api tucchataro hy ayam //MU_6,30.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15943: svalpasaṅkalpajo dīrghais sukhaduḥkhair na gṛhyate / dīrghasaṅkalpajaś cāyaṃ dīrghaduḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ //MU_6,30.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15944: deho hi saṅkalpamayo nāyam asti na nāsti ca / kiṃ vyartham etadarthaṃ hi mūḍho 'yaṃ kleśabhāg janaḥ //MU_6,30.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15945: yathā citramaye puṃsi kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ / yathā saṅkalpapuruṣe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15946: yathā manorājyamaye kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ / yathā dvitīye śaśini kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15947: yathā svapnasamārambhe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ / yathā ghanātapajale kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15948: saṅkalpamātrakalite prakṛtyaiva vināśini / tathā śarīrayantre 'smin kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15949: dīrghasvapnamaye hy asmiṃś cirasaṅkalpakalpite / bhūṣite dūṣite dehe na hi kiñcic citaḥ kṣatam //MU_6,30.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15950: na cid astam upāyāti nātmā calati rāghava / na brahma vikṛtiṃ yāti kiṃ vo dehakṣaye kṣatam //MU_6,30.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15951: bhramaccakroparistho hi tyaktacakro 'pi cakravat / yathā paśyati dikcakraṃ bhramad atyantamohitaḥ //MU_6,30.34//
GSP27moksop_u:15952: akasmād eva rūḍhena mithyājñānena valgatā / abhyastena tathaivedaṃ dṛśyate dehacakrakam //MU_6,30.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15953: bhramitaṃ ca bhramadrūpaṃ patadrūpaṃ ca pātitam / hataṃ ca hanyamānaṃ ca vapur durvāsanāvaśāt //MU_6,30.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15954: ajñānajaṃ bhramaṃ tyaktvā satyāṃ dṛṣṭim avekṣya ca / dhīratām alam ālambya ghanaṃ bhramam idaṃ tyajet //MU_6,30.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15955: saṅkalpena kṛto deho mithyājñānena san na san / asatyena kṛtaṃ yat syān na tat satyaṃ kadācana //MU_6,30.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15956: asadabhyutthito deho rajjvām iva bhujaṅgamaḥ / asatyām eva cemāṃ ca karoti ca jagatkriyām //MU_6,30.39//
GSP27moksop_u:15957: jaḍena rāma kriyate yat tan na kṛtam ucyate / kurvann api tato deho na kartā kvacid eva hi //MU_6,30.40//
GSP27moksop_u:15958: nirīho hi jaḍo deho nātmano 'sty abhivāñchitam / kartā na kaścid evāto draṣṭā kevalam asy ajaḥ //MU_6,30.41//
GSP27moksop_u:15959: yathā dīpo nivātasthas svātmany eva hi tiṣṭhati / sākṣivat sarvabhāveṣu tathā tiṣṭha jagatsthitau //MU_6,30.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15960: yathā divasakāryāṇi bhāskaras svastha eva san / karoty evam imāṃ rāma kuru pārthivasaṃsthitim //MU_6,30.43//
GSP27moksop_u:15961: asmin hy asanmaye dehagehe śūnye samutthite / sattām upagate mithyā bālakalpitayakṣavat //MU_6,30.44//
GSP27moksop_u:15962: kuto 'py āgatya nissāras sarvasajjanavarjitaḥ / ahaṅkārakuvetālaḥ praviṣṭaś cittanāmabhṛt //MU_6,30.45//
GSP27moksop_u:15963: bhṛtyatāṃ māsya gaccha tvam ahaṅkārasya durmateḥ / asya bhṛtyatayā rāma nirayaḥ prāpyate phalam //MU_6,30.46//
GSP27moksop_u:15964: svasaṅkalpavilāsena dehagehe nirākṛtiḥ / unmattacittavetālaḥ parivalgati līlayā //MU_6,30.47//
GSP27moksop_u:15965: śūnyadehagṛhaṃ prāpya cittayakṣeṇa tat kṛtam / bhītā yena mahānto 'pi samādhiniratās sthitāḥ //MU_6,30.48//
GSP27moksop_u:15966: cittavetālam udvāsya svaśarīraikamandirāt / saṃsāraśūnyanagare na bibheṣi kadācana //MU_6,30.49//
GSP27moksop_u:15967: cittabhūtābhibhūte 'smin ye śarīragṛhe ratāḥ / citram adyāpi te kasmād ghaṭṭitā nāśmavat sthitāḥ //MU_6,30.50//
GSP27moksop_u:15968: graste cittapiśācena dehaveśmani yā dhṛtiḥ / piśācasyaiva sā buddhir nāpiśācasya rāghava //MU_6,30.51//
GSP27moksop_u:15969: ahaṅkārabṛhadyakṣe gṛhe dagdhaśarīrake / viharānāsthayā sādho na tavaitat kila sthiram //MU_6,30.52//
GSP27moksop_u:15970: ahaṅkārānucaratāṃ tyaktvā vitatayā dhiyā / ahaṅkāramṛtiṃ prāpya svātmaivāśv avalambyatām //MU_6,30.53//
GSP27moksop_u:15971: ahaṅkārapiśācena grastā ye nirayaiṣiṇaḥ / teṣāṃ mohāmayāndhānāṃ na mitrāṇi na bandhavaḥ //MU_6,30.54//
GSP27moksop_u:15972: ahaṅkāropahatayā buddhyā yā kriyate kriyā / viṣavallyā iva phalaṃ tasyās syān maraṇātmakam //MU_6,30.55//
GSP27moksop_u:15973: vivekadhairyahīnena svāhaṅkāramahāśavam / mūrkheṇālambitaṃ yena naṣṭam evāśu viddhi tam //MU_6,30.56//
GSP27moksop_u:15974: ahaṅkārapiśācena varākā ye vaśīkṛtāḥ / ta ete narakāgnīnāṃ rāghavendhanatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_6,30.57//
GSP27moksop_u:15975: ahaṅkārorago yasya parisphurati koṭare / sa dehapādapo dhīrair acireṇa nipātyate //MU_6,30.58//
GSP27moksop_u:15976: ahaṅkārapiśāco 'smin dehe tiṣṭhatu yātu vā / tvam enam ālokaya mā manasā mahatāṃ vara //MU_6,30.59//
GSP27moksop_u:15977: avadhūto hy avajñātaś cetasaiva tiraskṛtaḥ / ahaṅkārapiśācas te neha kiñcit kariṣyati //MU_6,30.60//
GSP27moksop_u:15978: dehālaye sphuraty asmin rāma cittapiśācake / asyānantavilāsasya kim ivāgatam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,30.61//
GSP27moksop_u:15979: cittayakṣābhibhūtānāṃ yāḥ puṃsāṃ vitatāpadaḥ / śakyante parisaṅkhyātuṃ na tā varṣaśatair api //MU_6,30.62//
GSP27moksop_u:15980: hato mṛto 'smi dagdho 'smīty etā durbhagavṛttayaḥ / ahaṅkārapiśācasya śaktayo 'nyasya nānagha //MU_6,30.63//
GSP27moksop_u:15981: sarvago 'pi yathākāśas sambaddho neha kenacit / sarvago 'pi tathaivātmā nāhaṅkāreṇa saṅgataḥ //MU_6,30.64//
GSP27moksop_u:15982: yat karoti yad ādatte dehayantram idaṃ calam / vātarajjuyutaṃ rāma tad ahaṅkāraceṣṭitam //MU_6,30.65//
GSP27moksop_u:15983: vṛkṣonnatau yathā hetur akartr api kilāmbaram / ātmasaṃsthas tathehātmā cittaceṣṭāsu kāraṇam //MU_6,30.66//
GSP27moksop_u:15984: ātmasannidhimātreṇa kuḍyarūpam ivāmalam / dīpasannidhimātreṇa sphuraty āttavapur manaḥ //MU_6,30.67//
GSP27moksop_u:15985: ativiśliṣṭayo rāma nityam evātmacittayoḥ / dyāvāpṛthivyor iva kas sambandhaḥ prakaṭāndhayoḥ //MU_6,30.68//
GSP27moksop_u:15986: calanaspandanehābhir ātmaśaktibhir āvṛtam / cittam ātmeti maurkhyeṇa dṛśyate raghunandana //MU_6,30.69//
GSP27moksop_u:15987: ātmā prakāśarūpo hi nityas sarvagato vibhuḥ / cittaṃ śaṭham ahaṅkāraṃ viddhi hārdaṃ bṛhattamaḥ //MU_6,30.70//
GSP27moksop_u:15988: ātmāsi raghusarvasva jaḍā nāsi manodṛṣat / dūrīkuru manomohaṃ kim etenāsi saṅgataḥ //MU_6,30.71//
GSP27moksop_u:15989: piśāco hi manonāmā śūnye dehagṛhe sthitaḥ / bhāyayaty eṣa duṣṭātmā mainam uttama saṃspṛśa //MU_6,30.72//
GSP27moksop_u:15990: bhayapradam akalyāṇaṃ dhairyasarvasvahāriṇam / manaḥpiśācam utsārya yo 'si sa tvaṃ sthiro bhava //MU_6,30.73//
GSP27moksop_u:15991: cittayakṣadṛḍhākrāntaṃ na śāstrāṇi na bandhavaḥ / śaknuvanti paritrātuṃ guravo na ca mānavam //MU_6,30.74//
GSP27moksop_u:15992: saṃśāntacittavetālaṃ guruśāstrārthabandhavaḥ / śaknuvanti samuddhartuṃ svalpapaṅkān mṛgaṃ yathā //MU_6,30.75//
GSP27moksop_u:15993: asmiñ jagacchūnyapure sarvam eva pradūṣitam / dehagehaṃ pramattena cittayakṣeṇa valgatā //MU_6,30.76//
GSP27moksop_u:15994: cittavetālavalitasamastagṛhaṣaṇḍakā / iyaṃ jagadaraṇyānī śūnyā kasya na bhītaye //MU_6,30.77//
GSP27moksop_u:15995: jagannagaryām asyāṃ tu śāntacittapiśācakam / dehagehaṃ katipayais sevyate sadbhir eva ca //MU_6,30.78//
GSP27moksop_u:15996: iha saṃśrīyate yā yā dik saiva raghunandana / pramattamohavetālaiḥ pūrṇā dehaśmaśānakaiḥ //MU_6,30.79//
GSP27moksop_u:15997: asyāṃ jagadaraṇyānyāṃ muhūrtaṃ mugdhabālavat / svayam ālambya dhairyāṃśam ātmanātmānam uddhara //MU_6,30.80//
GSP27moksop_u:15998: jagajjaradaraṇye 'smiṃś caradbhūtamṛgavraje / dhṛtiṃ tṛṇarasai rāma mā gaccha mṛgapotavat //MU_6,30.81//
GSP27moksop_u:15999: asmin mahītalāraṇye carannṛmṛgapotake / tvam ajñānagajaṃ bhaṅktvā saiṃhīṃ vṛttim upāśraya //MU_6,30.82//
GSP27moksop_u:16000: anye naramṛgā mugdhā jambudvīpe svajaṅgale / viharanti yathā rāma tathā mā viharānagha //MU_6,30.83//
GSP27moksop_u:16001: atyalpakālaṃ śiśire kardamālepadāyini / na maṅktavyaṃ vadhūrūpe mahiṣeṇeva palvale //MU_6,30.84//
GSP27moksop_u:16002: bhogābhogā bahiṣkāryā āryasyānusaret padam / pravicārya mahāryais svam ekam ātmānam āśrayet //MU_6,30.85//
GSP27moksop_u:16003: apavitrasya tucchasya durbhagasya durākṛteḥ / dehasyārthe na maṅktavyaṃ cintācuṇṭīṣu cāruṇā //MU_6,30.86//
GSP27moksop_u:16004: anyena racito deho yakṣeṇānyena saṃśritaḥ / duḥkham anyasya bhoktānyaś citreyaṃ maurkhyacakrikā //MU_6,30.87//
GSP27moksop_u:16005: yathaikarūpā ghanatā dṛṣado 'py ātmanas tathā / sattāmātraikasāmānyād itarasyātyasambhavāt //MU_6,30.88//
GSP27moksop_u:16006: yathopalasya ghanatā manastā hi tathātmanaḥ / sattāmātrād abhinnā svād abhāvād anyasaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,30.89//
GSP27moksop_u:16007: yathopalasya ghanatā tathāsya paramātmanaḥ / rūpaikarūpā saṃvittis sattāsāmānyarūpataḥ //MU_6,30.90//
GSP27moksop_u:16008: pṛthak sambhavatīhāṅga na jāḍyaṃ na ca cetanam / mithyāsaṅkalparacite ete hi śiśuyakṣavat //MU_6,30.91//
GSP27moksop_u:16009: yathekṣurasamātrasya tv ekasyaiva pṛthaṅmayī / ayaṃ guḍa idaṃ khaṇḍam iti māyā mudhoditā //MU_6,30.92//
GSP27moksop_u:16010: paramātmana ekasya sattāsāmānyarūpataḥ / mudhaivābhyuditaiveyaṃ jāḍyājāḍyamatis tathā //MU_6,30.93//
GSP27moksop_u:16011: kṣīyate prekṣitaivaiṣā prekṣāmātraikanāśinī / śuktirupyamatiprakhyā na satī nāsatī tataḥ //MU_6,30.94//
GSP27moksop_u:16012: nāsato vidyate bhāvo yo nāsty eveha san na saḥ //MU_6,30.95//
GSP27moksop_u:16013: svarūpamātraniṣṭhatvād dvaitaikyābhāvayogataḥ / abhāvād anyasaṃvittes samatvam upalātmanoḥ //MU_6,30.96//
GSP27moksop_u:16014: ananyo 'nanta ekātmā svasattānubhavī yathā / tathopalas svatāniṣṭho na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ //MU_6,30.97//
GSP27moksop_u:16015: anyāsambhavato nityadvaitaikyābhāvayogataḥ / cetyasyāsambhavād ātmā na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ //MU_6,30.98//
GSP27moksop_u:16016: jaḍājaḍadṛśau vandhyāputravad vyomavṛkṣavat / samāyāte na cāyāte prekṣite na ca vīkṣite //MU_6,30.99//
GSP27moksop_u:16017: jaḍacetanaśabdārthāv asantau rajjusarpavat / bhavatas tau kathaṃ satyam aprekṣāmātrakād ṛte //MU_6,30.100//
GSP27moksop_u:16018: yac ca cetanam ātmeti jaḍaś copala ity api / uktaṃ tad īdṛgvāgyogyabodhyabodhanahetukam //MU_6,30.101//
GSP27moksop_u:16019: bodhyaḥ paratare bodhe yayā yuktyā prabodhyate / sopadeśyā na gṛhṇāti mūḍhas tat sahasā padam //MU_6,30.102//
GSP27moksop_u:16020: cittaṃ pṛthak pṛthag imāni hatendriyāṇi kartā na dṛśyata idaṃ ca gṛhaṃ mudhaiva / ko 'py anya eva parivalgati nissvabhāva eṣo 'ham ity alam aho mahad indrajālam //MU_6,30.103//
GSP27moksop_u:16021: lolāsu saṃsṛtiṣu bhūtaparamparāṇāṃ krīḍāsu cānyapuruṣasya cidekavṛtteḥ / tattvaṃ vicārya ramate hi mahānubhāvo mantrī yatholbaṇaviṣāsu bhujaṅgamīṣu //MU_6,30.104//
GSP27moksop_u:16022: na tvaṃ śiro na nayane na ca raktamāṃse nāsthīni naiva ca mano na ca bhūtajālam / mā moham ehi na śarīram asi prasannā cit tvaṃ prapannasakalāmalasarvageti //MU_6,30.105//
GSP27moksop_u:16025: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya naṣṭakaṣṭeṣṭaceṣṭitaḥ / tiṣṭhāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryam apy ariṣṭam ivotsṛjan //MU_6,31.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16026: athemām aparāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ mahāmohavināśinīm / duṣprāpām api suprāpām anapāyām anāmayām //MU_6,31.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16027: śṛṇu yā kathitā pūrvaṃ mama kailāsakandare / saṃsāraduḥkhaśāntyarthaṃ devenārdhendumaulinā //MU_6,31.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16028: astīndukarasambhārabhāsuraḥ pārago divaḥ / kailāso nāma śailendro gaurīramaṇamandiram //MU_6,31.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16036: tatrāste bhagavān devo haraś candrakalādharaḥ / śūlapāṇis trinayano gaṇaughaparivāritaḥ //MU_6,31.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16039: taṃ pūjayan mahādevaṃ tasminn eva girau purā / kadācid avasaṃ gaṅgātaṭe 'haṃ racitāśramaḥ //MU_6,31.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16040: tapo'rthaṃ tāpasācāre cirāya racitasthitiḥ / yathākramasadācāraḥ puṇyasānusamāśrayaḥ //MU_6,31.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16044: evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭasya kailāsavanakuñjake / tapaḥ pracarato rāma mama kālo 'tyavartata //MU_6,31.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16045: athaikadā kadācit tu bahulasyāṣṭame dine / gate śrāvaṇapakṣasya rātryardhe kṣayam āgate //MU_6,31.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16046: dikṣu saṃśāntarūpāsu kāṣṭhamaunasthitāsv iva / khaḍgacchedyāndhakāreṣu kuñjeṣu gahaneṣu ca //MU_6,31.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16047: avaśyāyalasanmuktāhāse sarati mārute / ālavālopadhāneṣu mṛgeṣv āśramaśāyiṣu //MU_6,31.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16048: amṛtāṃśukarasyandam ātmanaḥ parivṛddhaye / lihatsu śaśiraśmibhyaḥ pallaveṣv amṛtadravam //MU_6,31.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16049: kumudvatīṣv oṣadhīṣu cakorīṣu latāsu ca / pibantīṣv amṛtasyandaṃ karair ākīrṇam aindavam //MU_6,31.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16051: tāraughapratibimbena girau sphaṭikabhūmiṣu / vikāsipuṣpaprakare dviguṇatvam upāgate //MU_6,31.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16052: mayi pallavapalyaṅkagate muktehayā dhiyā / cintayaty amalābhāsam ātmatattvam aviplutam //MU_6,31.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16053: dvitīyamaddehavati vyomni saptarṣimaṇḍale / madartham iva tām eva diśam āpatatīva ca //MU_6,31.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16054: tārakātritaye vyomno gṛhamūrdhani madhyage / mṛgatraye kirātātte sadā bhramam ivāgate //MU_6,31.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16056: śilāśikhopaviṣṭāsu śailotkīrṇāsv ivābhitaḥ / pibantīṣu cakorīṣu śītaṃ śaśikarāmṛtam //MU_6,31.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16057: vahati madhuramārute vane 'ntaś śaśikaraśīkaravarṣaṇaikaśīte / dalacayacalanotthaśabdagīte kumudavadhūprathamābhisāriṇīva //MU_6,31.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16060: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etasmin samaye tatra yāmārdhe prathame gate / samādhiṃ tanutāṃ nītvā sthito 'haṃ bāhyalagnadṛk //MU_6,32.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16061: apaśyaṃ kānane tejo jhagity eva samutthitam / mandarāhananoddhūtakṣubdhakṣīrodabhāsuram //MU_6,32.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16063: yugāntatāpagalitaṃ susphāṭikam ivācalam / nāvanītam ivāmbhodaṃ ketakaugham ivotthitam //MU_6,32.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16064: śaṅkhaśauklyam ivoḍḍīnaṃ śubhrābhram iva sambhṛtam / kṣīraphenam ivotphālaṃ muktāsāram ivoddhatam //MU_6,32.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16065: gaṅgātaraṅgabharavat praviṣṭaṃ kandarāntaram / piṇḍahāryaṃ sudadhivac chārvaṃ hāsam ivātatam //MU_6,32.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16066: prakaṭīkṛtadik tejas tad ālokya mayā smayāt / antaḥprakāśaśālinyā buddhidṛṣṭyāvalokitam //MU_6,32.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16067: yāvat paśyāmi taṃ sānuṃ līlayaiva yadṛcchayā / viharan svagirau hṛdye tāvac candrakalādharaḥ //MU_6,32.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16071: manodṛṣṭas sa bhagavān manasaiva tato mayā / dattamandārapuṣpeṇa praṇatenābhivanditaḥ //MU_6,32.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16072: iti kṛtvā mayā dehaḥ paryaṅkaśayanād ayam / kṣaṇād utthāpitas tasmād bhūteneva mahāśavaḥ //MU_6,32.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16073: śiṣyān udbodhya tatrasthān gṛhītvārghaṃ susaṃyataḥ / agamaṃ lokanāthasya dṛṣṭipūtam ahaṃ puraḥ //MU_6,32.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16074: tatra puṣpāñjaliṃ dattvā dūrād eva trilocanaḥ / dattārgheṇa mayā devas sa praṇamyābhivanditaḥ //MU_6,32.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16075: tataś candraprabhāmṛdvyā ṛjvyā śītalayā tayā / dṛśā sarvārtihāriṇyā saraṇyā śāśvate pade //MU_6,32.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16076: aham ālokya devena candrārdhakṛtamaulinā / puṣpasānūpaviṣṭena proktas smitasitākṣaram //MU_6,32.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16077: īśvaraḥ: ānayārghyaṃ tathā pādyaṃ brahman svāgatam astu te / āśramātithayaḥ prāptā vayam adya tavānagha //MU_6,32.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16078: ghanābhirāmaśālinyā satataṃ śamaśāntayā / muditodārayā brahmaṃs tapolakṣmyā virājase //MU_6,32.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16079: āgacchopaviśāsmiṃs tvam akṛtrimadalāsane / mṛdau sānusamudbhūte puṇyasañcayapāvane //MU_6,32.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16080: iti proktavate tasmai niśeśārdhārdhadhāriṇe / arghaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā pādyaṃ samupetyārpitaṃ mayā //MU_6,32.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16081: pādayor hastayoś caiva tanvāṃ cāsya svayambhuvaḥ / mandārapuṣpāvalayo vikīrṇā bahavaḥ puraḥ //MU_6,32.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16082: tato bhagavatī gaurī tādṛśyaiva saparyayā / sampūjitā sakhīyuktā gaṇamaṇḍalikā tathā //MU_6,32.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16083: gṛhītavantau tau tāṃ me saparyām ādarāt prabhū / bhaktipraṇayino rāma pārvatīparameśvarau //MU_6,32.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16084: pūjānte pūrṇaśītāṃśuraśmiśītalayā girā / tatropaviṣṭaṃ provāca mām athendukalādharaḥ //MU_6,32.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16085: īśvaraḥ: brahman praśamaśālinyaḥ prāptaviśrāntayaḥ pare / kaccit kalyāṇakāriṇyas saṃvidas te sthitāḥ pade //MU_6,32.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16086: kaccit kamalakalhārakumudānayanakṣamāḥ / tavāntevāsino brahman nīrujas tvadanuvratāḥ //MU_6,32.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16087: balibhāgabhujāṃ kaccid bhagavan bhavadāśrame / kuśalaṃ mugdhamugdhānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ matpriyādṛśām //MU_6,32.28//
