GSP27moksop_u:16088: kaccin mandārakusumāny ete mandārapādapāḥ / tavāsmadādipūjārthaṃ samprayacchanti sūnnatāḥ //MU_6,32.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16089: kaccin mandākinī puṇyaṃ tava snānopayogikam / ekayā vāhalatayā dadāty utpalapaṅkajam //MU_6,32.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16090: asamañjasaceṣṭāsu nityaṃ ceṣṭāsu me 'nagha / api madgaṇalīlāsu muninātha na khidyase //MU_6,32.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16091: tiṣṭhantam iha śailendre vipināraṇyavāsinaḥ / api nodvejayanti tvāṃ dhaneśānucarā mune //MU_6,32.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16092: durvṛttaghanayakṣaughe vipra lolaniśācare / vasato 'smin gireḥ kukṣāv apy anudvegitāsti te //MU_6,32.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16093: evaṃvādini deveśe sarvalokaikakāraṇe / girānunayaśālinyā mayoktaṃ raghunandana //MU_6,32.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16094: tryakṣānusmṛtikalyāṇavatām iha maheśvara / na kiñcid api duṣprāpaṃ na ca kāścana bhītayaḥ //MU_6,32.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16095: tvadanusmaraṇānandaparipūrṇitacetasaḥ / na te santi jagatkośe praṇatiṃ ye na bibhrati //MU_6,32.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16096: te deśās te janapadās tā diśas te ca parvatāḥ / tvadanusmaraṇaikāntadhiyo yatra narās sthitāḥ //MU_6,32.37//
GSP27moksop_u:16097: phalaṃ bhūtasya puṇyasya vartamānasya secanam / taror ivaiṣyato bījaṃ tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho //MU_6,32.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16098: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca saphalaṃ yena nāma tat / kālatritayakalyāṇaṃ tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho //MU_6,32.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16099: paramaṃ manaso mitraṃ sarvāpatprasarāpaham / sarvasampallatāsekas tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho //MU_6,32.40//
GSP27moksop_u:16100: mahāmahimnāṃ mahatāṃ mahitānāṃ ca karmaṇām / kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānāṃ vai tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho //MU_6,32.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16101: vivekapayasām abdhiḥ puṇyaratnākaraḥ paraḥ / ajñānatimirārkaughas tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho //MU_6,32.42//
GSP27moksop_u:16103: tṛṣṇālatāyāḥ paraśur dhairyāmbhodharaparvataḥ / dainyadurvanadāvāgnis tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho //MU_6,32.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16104: jayaty ābhāsitāśeṣacittasaṃsāramaṇḍapaḥ / apūrvaḥ paramo dīpas tvadanusmaraṇaṃ prabho //MU_6,32.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16105: tvadanusmaraṇodāracintāmaṇimatā mayā / sarvāsām āpadāṃ mūrdhni dattaṃ bhūtapate padam //MU_6,32.46//
GSP27moksop_u:16106: sakaladuḥkhabhayāpahara prabho kṣaṇam apīha mayāsi na cetasā / varada vīra maheśvara vismṛtas sukham ato nivasāmi bhavān iva //MU_6,32.47//
GSP27moksop_u:16107: vālmīkiḥ: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma / snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_6,32.48//
GSP27moksop_u:16110: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktavantam atrāsau gaurī bhagavatī giram / mām uvāca jaganmātā māteva tanayaṃ priyam //MU_6,33.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16111: devī: bhagavan bhavatā brūhi bhūrisaubhāgyabhāginī / pativratānāṃ prathamā kva kṛtārundhatī priyā //MU_6,33.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16112: uttiṣṭhānaya tām asmād āśramān macchramāpahāt / tayā saha kathāś citrāḥ karomy ekavayasyayā //MU_6,33.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16113: ity ukte tatra pārvatyā mayā sā gṛhiṇī svayam / gatvoddeśaṃ tam evāśu samānītā samāśayā //MU_6,33.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16114: arundhatyā samaṃ kṛtvā lalanācāram akṣatam / svakāryaikaparā gaurī babhūva parinirvṛtā //MU_6,33.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16115: aham asmin kṣaṇe buddhyā rāma cintitavān idam / avyagro matprasannaś ca labdho 'yaṃ bhagavān mayā //MU_6,33.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16116: kam enaṃ parameśānaṃ sarvajñānamahārṇavam / paripṛcchāmi sandeham indubhūṣitaśekharam //MU_6,33.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16117: iti sañcintya sa gurur idaṃ pṛṣṭo mayānagha / śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te sarvaṃ yad uktaṃ candramaulinā //MU_6,33.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16118: bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa sarvakāraṇakāraṇa / bhavatprasādenedaṃ me dhārṣṭyam abhyāgataṃ sphuṭam //MU_6,33.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16119: pṛcchāmi tvā mahādeva yad ahaṃ tat tvam āśu me / brūhi prasannayā buddhyā tyaktodvegam anāmaya //MU_6,33.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16120: sarvapāpakṣayakaraṃ sarvakalyāṇavardhanam / devārcanavidhānaṃ me satyaṃ brūhi maheśvara //MU_6,33.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16121: īśvaraḥ: śṛṇu brahman varam idaṃ devārcanam anuttamam / vadāmi mucyase yena kṛtena sakṛd eva hi //MU_6,33.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16122: kaccit vetsi mahādevo devaḥ kas syād iti dvija / na devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo na ca devas trilocanaḥ //MU_6,33.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16123: na devaḥ kamalodbhūto na devas tridaśeśvaraḥ / na devaḥ pavano nārko nānalo na niśākaraḥ //MU_6,33.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16124: na brāhmaṇo nāvanipo nāhaṃ na tvaṃ dvijottama / na devo deharūpo 'sti na devaś citrarūpadhṛt //MU_6,33.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16125: na devaḥ kalanārūpī nāpi devo bhaven matiḥ / akṛtrimam anādyantaṃ vedanaṃ deva ucyate //MU_6,33.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16126: ākārādiparicchinnam iti vastuni tat kutaḥ / akṛtrimam anādyantaṃ vedanaṃ cicchivaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,33.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16127: tad eva devaśabdena kathyate tat prapūjayet / tad evāsti yatas sarvaṃ sattāsattātmarūpadhṛt //MU_6,33.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16128: ajñātaśivatattvānām ākārādyarcanaṃ kṛtam / yojanādhvany aśaktasya krośādhvā parikalpyate //MU_6,33.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16129: iyattādiparicchinnaṃ rudrādeḥ prāpyate phalam / akṛtrimam anādyantaṃ phalam ānanda ātmanaḥ //MU_6,33.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16130: akṛtrimaphalaṃ tyaktvā yaḥ kṛtrimaphalaṃ vrajet / sa tyaktamandāravanaḥ kārañjaṃ yāti kānanam //MU_6,33.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16131: bodhas sāmyaṃ śama iti puṣpāṇy agryāṇi tatra vai / śivaṃ cinmātram akalam ātmānam amalaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,33.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16132: śamabodhādibhiḥ puṣpair deva ātmā yad arcyate / tat taddevārcanaṃ viddhi nākārārcanam arcanam //MU_6,33.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16133: ātmasaṃvittirūpaṃ tu tyaktvā devārcanaṃ janāḥ / kṛtrimārcāsu ye saktāś ciraṃ kleśaṃ bhajanti te //MU_6,33.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16134: jñātajñeyā hi ye santo bālakrīḍopamaṃ na te / ātmadhyānād ṛte brahman kurvate devapūjanam //MU_6,33.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16135: ātmaiva devo bhagavāñ śivaḥ paramakāraṇam / jñānārcanenāvirataṃ pūjanīyas sa sarvadā //MU_6,33.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16136: tvam etac cetanākāśam ātmānaṃ jīvam avyayam / svabhāvaṃ viddhi na tv anyat pūjyapūjātmapūjanam //MU_6,33.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16137: cetanākāśamātrātma yathā jagad idaṃ prabho / yathā ca cetanasyaiva jīvāditvaṃ tad ucyatām //MU_6,33.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16138: cidvyomaiva kilāstīha pārāvāravivarjitam / sarvatrāsambhavaccetyaṃ yat kalpānteṣu śiṣyate //MU_6,33.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16139: tad yat svayaṃ prakacati tasya svakacanasya tu / svayaṃ saṃviditaṃ nāma tenedaṃ jagad ity alam //MU_6,33.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16140: ity evaṃ svapnapuravaj jagad bhāti cidātmakam / evaṃ cidvyomamātrātma jagad acchaṃ na bhittimat //MU_6,33.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16141: atyantāsambhavaccetyadṛṣṭi cidvyomamātrakam / cittvāt kacati sargādau yat taj jagad iti smṛtam //MU_6,33.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16142: tasmāt svapnapurākāraṃ yad idaṃ bhāsate jagat / tatra cidvyomamātrātmany anyatā nāma kā kutaḥ //MU_6,33.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16143: cinmātram eva girayaś cinmātraṃ jagadambaram / cinmātram ātmā jīvaś ca cinmātraṃ bhūtasantatiḥ //MU_6,33.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16144: cidvyomamātrād itarat sargādau sargavedane / bhinnaṃ svapnapure cāṅga kiṃ sambhavati kathyatām //MU_6,33.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16145: ākāśaṃ paramākāśaṃ brahmākāśaṃ jagac citiḥ / iti paryāyanāmāni tarupādapavṛkṣavat //MU_6,33.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16146: etac ca svapnasaṅkalpamāyādiṣv anubhūyate / tadā kila cidākāśam eva bhāti jagattayā //MU_6,33.37//
GSP27moksop_u:16147: yathaitat saṃvidākāśaṃ svapne bhāti jagadvapuḥ / tathedaṃ jāgradākhye 'pi svapne bhāti tad eva naḥ //MU_6,33.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16148: yathā svapnapure citkhaṃ varjayitvetarat kvacit / na kiñcit sambhavaty aṅga jagaty evam ihāditaḥ //MU_6,33.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16149: yato na sambhavaty anyac cedaṃ kiñcit tato 'khilam / cittvaṃ sacetyam apy etad acetyaṃ saj jagat sthitam //MU_6,33.40//
GSP27moksop_u:16150: yathā cidvyomamātrātma svapne ghaṭapaṭādikam / sargādāv eva sargo 'yaṃ tathā cidvyomamātrakam //MU_6,33.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16151: śuddhasaṃvittimātratvād ṛte 'nyat svapnapattane / yathā na vidyate kiñcit tathāsmin bhuvanatraye //MU_6,33.42//
GSP27moksop_u:16152: yāḥ kāścana dṛśo ye ye bhāvābhāvāḥ kilāgamāḥ / sadeśakālacittās tat sarvaṃ cidvyomamātrakam //MU_6,33.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16153: sa eṣa devaḥ kathito yaḥ paraḥ paramārthataḥ / yas tvaṃ yo 'ham aśeṣaṃ vā jagad eva ca yo 'khilam //MU_6,33.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16154: sarvasya bhūtajātasya jagato 'nyasya te mama / deho hi cetanākāśaṃ paramātmaiva netarat //MU_6,33.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16155: saṅkalpane svapnapure śarīraṃ cidvyomato 'nyan na yathāsti kiñcit / tatheha sarge prathamaikasargān mune prabhṛty asti na rūpam anyat //MU_6,33.46//
GSP27moksop_u:16158: īśvaraḥ: evaṃ sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ paramātmaiva kevalam / brahmaiva paramākāśa eṣa devaḥ paras smṛtaḥ //MU_6,34.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16159: tad etatpūjanaṃ śreyas tasmāt sarvam avāpyate / sa devas sarvagas sarvas sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitam //MU_6,34.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16160: akṛtrimam anādyantam advitīyam akhaṇḍitam / abahissādhanāsādhyaṃ sukhaṃ tasmād avāpyate //MU_6,34.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16161: prabuddhas tvaṃ muniśreṣṭha tenedaṃ tava varṇyate / nāsi devārcane yogyaḥ puṣpadhūpamaye mahān //MU_6,34.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16162: avyutpannadhiyo ye hi bālāḥ pelavacetasaḥ / kṛtrimārcāmayaṃ teṣāṃ devārcanam udāhṛtam //MU_6,34.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16163: gandhākṣataiś ca dīpaiś ca puṣpādyaiḥ pūjayanti hi / mithyaiva kalpitair devam ākāre kalpitātmakam //MU_6,34.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16164: svasaṅkalpakṛtaiḥ kṛtvā kramair arcanam ādṛtāḥ / bālās santāpam āyānti puṣpadhūpalavārcanaiḥ //MU_6,34.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16165: svasaṅkalpakṛtair arthaiḥ kṛtvā devārcanaṃ mudhā / yataḥ kutaścin mithyātma phalam atrārpayanti te //MU_6,34.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16166: puṣpadhūpārcanaṃ brahman kalpitaṃ bālabuddhiṣu / yat syād bhavādṛśe 'yogyam arcanaṃ tad vadāmy aham //MU_6,34.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16167: asmadādis tu no kaścid devo matimatāṃ vara / devas tribhuvanādhāraḥ paramātmaiva netaraḥ //MU_6,34.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16168: śivas sarvapadātītas sarvasaṅkalpanātigaḥ / sarvasaṅkalpavalito na sarvī na ca sārvikaḥ //MU_6,34.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16169: dikkālādyanavacchinnas sarvārambhaprakārakṛt / cinmātramūrtir amalo deva ity ucyate mune //MU_6,34.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16170: saṃvit sarvakalātītā sarvabhāvāntarasthitā / sarvasattāpradā devī sarvasantāpahāriṇī //MU_6,34.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16171: brahma brahman sadasator madhyaṃ tad deva ucyate / paramātmāparābhikhyaṃ tat sad om ity udāhṛtam //MU_6,34.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16172: mahāsattāsvabhāvena sarvatra samatāṃ gatam / mahācid iti ca proktaṃ paramārtha iti śrutam //MU_6,34.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16173: sthitaṃ sarvatra sarvartu latāsv antar yathā rasaḥ / sattāsāmānyarūpeṇa mahācittvātmanāpi ca //MU_6,34.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16174: yac cittattvam arundhatyā yac cittattvaṃ tavānagha / yac cittattvaṃ ca pārvatyā yac cittattvaṃ gaṇeṣu ca //MU_6,34.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16175: cittattvaṃ yan mamedaṃ ca cittattvaṃ yaj jagattraye / tad deva iti tattvajñā vidur uttamabuddhayaḥ //MU_6,34.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16176: pādapāṇyādimān anyo yo vā devaḥ prakalpyate / sa cinmātrād ṛte brahman kiṃsāraḥ kila kathyatām //MU_6,34.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16177: na sa dūre sthito brahman na duṣprāpas sa kasyacit / sa saṃsthitas sadā dehe sarvatraiva ca khe tathā //MU_6,34.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16178: sa karoti sa cāśnāti sa bibharti prayāti ca / sa niśśvasati saṃvettā so 'ṅgāny aṅgāni vetti te //MU_6,34.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16179: so 'syāṃ vicitraceṣṭāyāṃ prakāśāyāṃ ca tadvaśāt / tatsvarūpanibaddhāyāṃ puryām aṅgapurīśvaraḥ //MU_6,34.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16180: śarīraparvatasthāyāṃ calāyāṃ tatprasādataḥ / so 'syāṃ gahanakośāyāṃ hṛdguhāyāṃ guheśvaraḥ //MU_6,34.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16181: manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyācārasattātītāmalātmanaḥ / tasya saṃvyavahārārthaṃ sañjñā cid iti kalpitā //MU_6,34.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16182: sa eṣa cinmayas sūkṣmas sarvavyāpī nirañjanaḥ / imaṃ bhāsuram ābhāsaṃ karoti na karoti ca //MU_6,34.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16183: sā cid atyantavimalā jagadarthāṃ jagatkriyām / imāṃ rañjayati prājña raseneva madhur latām //MU_6,34.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16184: cāravo ye camatkārāś citaś citi yathāsthitam / camatkurvanti kila te ete kecin nabho'bhidhāḥ //MU_6,34.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16185: kecij jīvābhidhānāś ca kecic cittābhidhānakāḥ / kecit kālābhidhānāś ca kecid deśābhidhānakāḥ //MU_6,34.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16186: kecit kriyābhidhānāś ca kecid dravyābhidhānakāḥ / kecid bhāvavikārādijāḍyacittvābhidhānakāḥ //MU_6,34.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16187: prākāśyādyabhidhāḥ kecit kecic caiva tamo'bhidhāḥ / arkendvādyabhidhāḥ kecit kecid yakṣābhidhānakāḥ //MU_6,34.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16188: niricchasvasvabhāvena vasantena yathāṅkuraḥ / janyate tadvad eveyaṃ jagallakṣmīś cidātmanā //MU_6,34.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16189: cid imāsu samagrāsu sarvadaivaikikaiva hi / trailokyāmbudhisaṃsthāsu śarīrajalajālikā //MU_6,34.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16191: sasurāsuragandharvaṃ saśailārṇavakaṃ jagat / citi sthiraṃ pravahati jalāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,34.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16193: cic caturbhujarūpeṇa jaghānāsuramaṇḍalam / kālo jaladakhaṇḍena sāyudhena yathātapam //MU_6,34.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16194: cit trinetratayā brahman vṛṣaśītāṃśucihnayā / gaurīkamalinīvaktrapadmaṣaṇḍālitāṃ gatā //MU_6,34.37//
GSP27moksop_u:16195: viṣṇoḥ padmālitām etya cid dhyānādhīnamānasīm / trayīnalinyās sarasīṃ dhatte paitāmahīṃ sthitim //MU_6,34.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16196: cito brahman vicitrāṇi śarīrāṇīha bhūriśaḥ / pattrāṇīva taror hemni keyūrādikriyeva vā //MU_6,34.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16198: cit surāsuratām etya trailokyodaraḍambare / pataty udeti saṃyāti svātmanaivābdhivārivat //MU_6,34.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16199: ciccandrikā caturdikkam evābhāsaṃ vitanvatī / vikāsayati niśśeṣabhūtasattākumudvatīm //MU_6,34.42//
GSP27moksop_u:16200: ciddarpaṇamahālakṣmīs trijagat pratibimbitam / gṛhṇāty anugraheṇāntas svagarbham iva garbhiṇī //MU_6,34.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16201: cic caturdaśabhūtānāṃ maṇḍalāni mahānti ca / bhūtīkaroti vāriśrīs samudratvam ivāmbudheḥ //MU_6,34.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16206: cillateyaṃ vikasitā pelavaṃ sadasadvapuḥ / vicitraṃ dṛśyakusumaṃ parāmarśāsahaṃ bahu //MU_6,34.49//
GSP27moksop_u:16207: anayeha hi sarvatra cchāyācchāpi vijanyate / manyate tanyate vastu gīyate kriyate 'pi ca //MU_6,34.50//
GSP27moksop_u:16208: mahācitānayā nityaṃ bhāsante bhāskarādayaḥ / dehās svadante ca mithas tvanmaccijjaḍavibhramaiḥ //MU_6,34.51//
GSP27moksop_u:16209: vitatāvartavartanyā cidvātyeyaṃ pranṛtyati / jagajjālarajolekhā tatsattā dṛśyadehinī //MU_6,34.52//
GSP27moksop_u:16210: cit sarvaṃ jagadārambham imaṃ prakaṭayaty alam / trailokyadīpakaśikhā dīpo varṇaśriyaṃ yathā //MU_6,34.53//
GSP27moksop_u:16211: ciccandrabimbe vimale śaśavat prāpya saṅgamam / sarvatra lakṣyatām eti padārthaśrīr jagadgatā //MU_6,34.54//
GSP27moksop_u:16212: cidrasāyanasekena padārthapaṭalāvalī / rūpam eti phalaṃ caiva prāvṛṭsikteva sallatā //MU_6,34.55//
GSP27moksop_u:16213: cicchāyayaiva sarvasya jāḍyaṃ śāmyaty udeti vā / śavasyāsya śarīrasya gṛhasyeva tamas tviṣā //MU_6,34.56//
GSP27moksop_u:16214: ciccamatkṛtayo dehe na bhaveyur imā yadi / trailokyadehās tat ke te kān spṛśeyuḥ kimākṛtīn //MU_6,34.57//
GSP27moksop_u:16215: cidālokaprakāśe 'smin saṅkalpaśiśudhāriṇī / kriyākulavadhūr dehagehe sphurati cañcalā //MU_6,34.58//
GSP27moksop_u:16216: cidālokaṃ vinā kasya rasanāgre sphurann api / kathaṃ kadā prakaṭatām eti kīdṛk ca vā rasaḥ //MU_6,34.59//
GSP27moksop_u:16217: suskandhas svaṅgaśākho 'pi kuntalālivṛto 'py alam / cinmañjarīṃ vinā dehavṛkṣaḥ ka iva rājate //MU_6,34.60//
GSP27moksop_u:16218: vardhate 'bhilaṣaty atti cic carācarakāriṇī / cid evāstītaran nāsti cinmātram idam utthitam //MU_6,34.61//
GSP27moksop_u:16219: ity uktavān atha tryakṣas sudhāsyandācchayā girā / punaḥ pṛṣṭo mayā rāma vinayapraśrayojjvalam //MU_6,34.62//
GSP27moksop_u:16220: yadi sarvagatā deva cid asty ekā tatātmikā / tad ayaṃ cetati sphāram ayaṃ caiva na cetati //MU_6,34.63//
GSP27moksop_u:16221: ayaṃ cidvān purā bhūtvā ciddhīnas samprati sthitaḥ / itīyaṃ kalpanā loke pratyakṣānubhavā katham //MU_6,34.64//
GSP27moksop_u:16222: īśvaraḥ: śṛṇv etad akhilaṃ brahman yathāpṛṣṭam vadāmi te / mahān ayaṃ kṛtaḥ praśnas tvayā brahmavidāṃ vara //MU_6,34.65//
GSP27moksop_u:16223: cid asti dviśarīreha sarvabhūtamayātmikā / cetyonmukhātmikaikā tu nirvikalpā parā smṛtā //MU_6,34.66//
GSP27moksop_u:16224: saṅkalpabaddhātmaivāntas svayam anyeva saṃsthitā / saṅkalpitetaravarā dauśśīlyaṃ strī yathā gatā //MU_6,34.67//
GSP27moksop_u:16225: sa eva hi pumān kopād yathehānya iva kṣaṇāt / bhavaty evaṃ vikalpāṅkā cit svarūpānyatāṃ gatā //MU_6,34.68//
GSP27moksop_u:16226: vikalpakalitā brahmaṃś cit svarūpaparicyutā / jāḍyaṃ kramād bhāvayantī prayāti kalanāpadam //MU_6,34.69//
GSP27moksop_u:16227: cit svayaṃ cetyatām eti sākāśaparamāṇutām / śabdabījātmikāṃ paścād vātatanmātrabhāvanīm //MU_6,34.70//
GSP27moksop_u:16228: deśakālavibhāgā tu tanmātravalitā kramāt / jīvo bhūtvā bhavaty āśu buddhiḥ paścād ahaṃ manaḥ //MU_6,34.71//
GSP27moksop_u:16229: manastvaṃ samupāyātā saṃsāram avalambate / caṇḍālo 'smīti mananāc caṇḍālatvam iva dvijaḥ //MU_6,34.72//
GSP27moksop_u:16230: saṅkalpitāprabodhena jāḍyāc cit svaprabodhinī / śabalaṃ rūpam āsādya saṅkalpān yāty anāratam //MU_6,34.73//
GSP27moksop_u:16231: anantasaṅkalpamayī jāḍyasaṅkalpapīvarī / cij jāḍyād deham āyāti payaḥ pāṣāṇatām iva //MU_6,34.74//
GSP27moksop_u:16232: tataś cittamanomohamāyeti vihitābhidhā / jāḍyaṃ nipuṇam āśritya saṃsāre jāyate mune //MU_6,34.75//
GSP27moksop_u:16235: iyam asmīti bhāvena śūnyena vikalīkṛtā / bhedamātragṛhītāsthā paraṃ dainyam upāgatā //MU_6,34.78//
GSP27moksop_u:16236: magnā mohamahāpaṅke paṅke jīrṇeva dantinī / bhāvābhāvalatādolāparilolaśarīrakā //MU_6,34.79//
GSP27moksop_u:16238: nijayūthaparibhraṣṭā mṛgīvāvaśatāṃ gatā / āvirbhāvoditākārā tirobhāve 'stam āgatā //MU_6,34.81//
GSP27moksop_u:16239: svasaṅkalpopayātāsu bhītā sambhramadṛṣṭiṣu / palāyate 'py asatyāsu vetālīṣv iva bālikā //MU_6,34.82//
GSP27moksop_u:16240: uṣṭrīva madhuno binduṃ vāñchate bhāvitaṃ sukham / avāntaraparibhraṣṭā doṣād doṣaṃ pataty adhaḥ //MU_6,34.83//
GSP27moksop_u:16241: paraṃ vaivaśyam āyāti saṅkaṭāt saṅkaṭaṃ gatā / duḥkhād duḥkhe nipatitā vipado vipadi sthitā //MU_6,34.84//
GSP27moksop_u:16242: nānānarthagaṇopetā ceṣṭāparavaśāśayā / kaṣṭāt kaṣṭam anuprāptā paritāpānutāpinī //MU_6,34.85//
GSP27moksop_u:16243: kramān nave nave bandhe 'vaidagdhyaṃ samupāgatā / vicitrabandhanirmāṇaparā krimipadaṃ gatā //MU_6,34.86//
GSP27moksop_u:16244: sarvataśśaṅkare bhītā prāṇātyayam upāgatā / kṣīṇatoyeva śapharī vivartanaparāyaṇā //MU_6,34.87//
GSP27moksop_u:16245: bālye vivaśasarvārthā yauvane cintayāhṛtā / vārddhake mṛtiduḥkhāttā mṛtā karmavaśīkṛtā //MU_6,34.88//
GSP27moksop_u:16246: jāyate duḥkhaśabalā mriyate jananonmukhī / karoty āveśavivaśā nigiraty ārtidhāriṇī //MU_6,34.89//
GSP27moksop_u:16247: gacchati śramasantaptā bhavaty ambudabhaṅgurā / rodity ākrāntahṛdayā parākrandati tāpitā //MU_6,34.90//
GSP27moksop_u:16248: apsarās svarganagare nāgī pātālakoṭare / asurī daityavivare narastrī vasudhātale //MU_6,34.91//
GSP27moksop_u:16249: rākṣasī rākṣasādhāre vānarī vanakoṭare / siṃhī girīndraśikhare kinnarī kulaparvate //MU_6,34.92//
GSP27moksop_u:16250: vidyādharī devagirau vyālī cāvanigartake / latā tarau khagī nīḍe vīrut sānau vane mṛgī //MU_6,34.93//
GSP27moksop_u:16251: śete nārāyaṇo 'mbhodhau dhyānī brahmapure 'bjajaḥ / kāntāsakho haraś śaile svarge suravaro hariḥ //MU_6,34.94//
GSP27moksop_u:16252: dinaṃ karoti tīkṣṇāṃśur varṣaty ambudharo jalam / karoti rajanīm indur dhatte nīraṃ mahodadhiḥ //MU_6,34.95//
GSP27moksop_u:16253: ṛtucakraṃ pravahati sahakālarkṣamaṇḍalam / dinarātritayodeti tejastimiratā kvacit //MU_6,34.96//
GSP27moksop_u:16254: kvacid bījarasollāsaḥ kvacit pāṣāṇamauninī / kvacin nadī rasavahā kvacit kusumavistṛtiḥ //MU_6,34.97//
GSP27moksop_u:16255: kvacit phalāvalīpākaḥ kvacit kvātho 'nalādibhiḥ / kvacic chaityaṃ himendvādi kvacit khādi nakiñcana //MU_6,34.98//
GSP27moksop_u:16256: kvacid ujjvalitākārā kvacit kṛṣṇā kvacit sitā / kvacin nīlātha haritā kvacid agniḥ kvacin mahī //MU_6,34.99//
GSP27moksop_u:16257: sarvātmatvāt sarvagatvāt sarvaśaktitayeddhayā / sarvatvād ekarūpaiva khād apy acchaiva sā parā //MU_6,34.100//
GSP27moksop_u:16258: cic cinoti yathātmānaṃ yena yatra yathā yadā / tat tathāśu bhavaty amburayād vīcyāditā yathā //MU_6,34.101//
GSP27moksop_u:16259: haṃsī krauñcī bakī kākī sarasīsārasī vṛkī / pikī balākā hariṇī vānarī kariṇī śunī //MU_6,34.102//
GSP27moksop_u:16260: caṭikā vañjulī śārī makṣikā ṣaṭpadī śukī / dhīś śrīr hrīḥ prītir ārtiś ca śavarī śarvarī śaśī //MU_6,34.103//
GSP27moksop_u:16261: etāsv anyāsu cānyāsu paribhramati yoniṣu / vivartamānā saṃsāre jalāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,34.104//
GSP27moksop_u:16262: bibhety eṣā svasaṅkalpāt svaśabdād iva gardabhī / nānayā sadṛg anyāsti mugdhā bālābalā calā //MU_6,34.105//
GSP27moksop_u:16263: eṣā sā kathitā tubhyaṃ jīvaśaktir mayā mune / prākṛtācāravivaśā varākī paśudharmiṇī //MU_6,34.106//
GSP27moksop_u:16264: karmātmety abhidhāṃ prāptā śocyāsya paramātmanaḥ / anantaduḥkhabahalaṃ svayaṃ sambhramam āśritā //MU_6,34.107//
GSP27moksop_u:16265: asad evānayākrāntaṃ vināśi sahajaṃ malam / taṇḍuleneva kambūkam ananyac cānyavat sthitam //MU_6,34.108//
GSP27moksop_u:16266: anantavibhavabhraṣṭā daurbhāgyaparitāpinī / śocati prāpya jīvatvaṃ bhartṛhīneva nāyikā //MU_6,34.109//
GSP27moksop_u:16267: jaḍarater avalokaya śaktatāṃ nijapadasmaraṇena vineha yat / vrajati pṛṣṭham adhaḥpatanāya khād duraraghaṭṭaghaṭīpuṭapīṭhavat //MU_6,34.110//
GSP27moksop_u:16270: īśvaraḥ: cinoty alīkam evaivaṃ duḥkhitāsmīti bhāvanāt / cid vadhūḥ kṣīvasuptaiva patitāsmīty alaṃ yathā //MU_6,35.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16271: amṛtaiva mṛtāsmīti viparyastamatir vadhūḥ / yathā rodity anaṣṭaiva naṣṭāsmīti tathaiva cit //MU_6,35.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16272: akāraṇaviparyastamatir bhrāntam api sthiram / yathā jagat paśyatīdaṃ tathāhantābhramaṃ citiḥ //MU_6,35.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16273: cittvaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ tasyās saṃsārānubhave citeḥ / na ca tatkāraṇaṃ kiñcic cittvānyatvātyasambhavāt //MU_6,35.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16274: evaṃ hi kāraṇābhāvāc cetyasyāsambhavād api / nāsau cin na ca tac cetyaṃ na ca tac cetyate tayā //MU_6,35.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16275: na dṛśyadarśanadraṣṭṛrūpaṃ tailam ivopale / na kartṛkarmakaraṇadṛg indāv iva kṛṣṇatā //MU_6,35.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16276: na manomeyamānāni nabhasīva navāṅkuraḥ / na ciccetanacetyādi nandane khadiro yathā //MU_6,35.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16277: nāhantvatvattvatattvādi parvatatvam ivāmbare / na cehatvānyadeśatve śaṅkhatvakṣv iva kajjalam //MU_6,35.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16278: nānānānā na cāpy antar aṇāv iva sumeravaḥ / na ca śabdārthaśabdaśrīr mahoṣaralatā yathā //MU_6,35.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16279: neti neti na caivārkamaṇḍale rajanī yathā / na vastutāvastute ca tuṣāreṣu yathoṣṇatā //MU_6,35.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16280: na śūnyatāśūnyate ca śilākośa iva drumaḥ / śūnyatāśūnyatā nāpi mahatī kha ivākhatā //MU_6,35.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16281: kevalaṃ kevalībhāvas svasthataivāvaśiṣyate / na kaścit kasyacid doṣo jñatayaitad avāpyate //MU_6,35.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16283: nañarthabhāvanāmātrād ṛte 'trāṅgopayujyate / na tṛṇaṃ na ca trailokyam iti svāyattatātra te //MU_6,35.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16284: svāyatta eva hy eṣo 'rtho dussādho 'bhāvanāt sthitaḥ / yad yan na sādhyate puṃsā tat kathaṃ kila labhyate //MU_6,35.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16285: nirvikalpādvitīyā cid yāsau sakalagā satī / paramaikā parā sācchā dīpikā tejasām api //MU_6,35.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16286: saiṣāvabhāsanakarī sarvagā nityanirmalā / nityoditā nirmanaskā nirvikārā nirañjanā //MU_6,35.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16287: ghaṭe paṭe vaṭe kuḍye śakaṭe vānare sure / asure sāgare bhūte nare nāge ca saṃsthitā //MU_6,35.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16288: sākṣivat tiṣṭhati satī spandate ca na kutracit / dīpaḥ prakāśanāyaiva karoti na punaḥ kriyām //MU_6,35.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16289: malināpy amalaiṣā sā vikalpāḍhyāvikalpinī / jaḍaivājaḍatāsārā nasarvā sarvam eva ca //MU_6,35.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16290: nirvikalpā parā sūkṣmā cic cinoti svasaṃvidam / vāta evāṅgamarmādi yathā yantrādi ceṣṭate //MU_6,35.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16291: rūpālokamanaskāravalitā cid abodhataḥ / bodhatas saiva bhavati naiṣā sadasatī yataḥ //MU_6,35.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16292: sā paraiva cid atyacchā cintām āyāti cetanāt / sādhur eva yathāsādhusaṃvitter durjanaiṣaṇām //MU_6,35.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16293: satamas svarṇam āyāti tāmratāṃ malamārjanāt / punaḥ kanakatām eti yathā cit paramā tathā //MU_6,35.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16294: śvāsopaśāntāv ādarśo yathaiti prathamāṃ sthitim / tathā sargam ihāgatya bodhāt svaṃ yāti cit padam //MU_6,35.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16295: svabhāvāvedanād asyās saṃsāras sampravartate / svabhāvavedanād eṣa tv asann evopaśāmyati //MU_6,35.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16296: yadā cittvāc cinoty antar anyatām asatīṃ tadā / ahantām iva samprāpya naśyatīvāpy anāśinī //MU_6,35.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16297: īṣatspandād adho yāti śṛṅgaprāntātalopalaḥ / yathā tathaiva saṃvitter adhaḥpāto mahācitaḥ //MU_6,35.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16298: rūpādīnāṃ tu sattaiṣā cetyam evāmalaiva cit / dvitvaikatve tv abodhotthe bodhena vilayaṃ gate //MU_6,35.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16299: sattāmātreṇa cittvasya bodhaś cittendriyādiṣu / ālokasattāmātreṇa vyavahāraḥ kriyāsv iva //MU_6,35.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16300: vātāt kanīnikāspandas taddīptir dṛṣṭir ucyate / tadbāhyapātitā rūpaṃ rūpabodhas tu cit parā //MU_6,35.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16301: tvaṅmārutau jaḍau tucchau tatsaṅgas sparśa ucyate / mananaṃ sparśasaṃvittis tatsaṃvittis tu cit parā //MU_6,35.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16302: gandhatanmātrapavanasambandho gandhasaṃvidaḥ / āsāṃ tu manasā hīnaṃ vedanaṃ paramaiva cit //MU_6,35.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16303: śabdatanmātraśravaṇaśaktes saṅgān mano vinā / suṣuptasadṛśī saṃvit paramā cid udāhṛtā //MU_6,35.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16304: kriyonmukhatvaṃ saṅkalpāt saṅkalpo mananakramaḥ / mananaṃ citsvakāluṣyam ātmā cin nirmalā bhavet //MU_6,35.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16305: cit prakāśātmikā nityā svātmany eva ca saṃsthitā / idam antar jagad dhatte sanniveśaṃ yathā śilā //MU_6,35.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16306: advitīyaṃ dadhānedaṃ vikārādivivarjitā / nāstam eti na codeti spandate no na vardhate //MU_6,35.37//
GSP27moksop_u:16307: saṅkalpāj jīvatām etya nissaṅkalpātmanātmanā / cij jaḍaṃ cājaḍaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvayantī svayaṃ sthitā //MU_6,35.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16308: rathas tv asyās smṛto jīvo jīvasyāhaṅkṛtī rathaḥ / ahaṅkṛte ratho buddhis tathā buddher mano rathaḥ //MU_6,35.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16309: manasas tu rathaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇasyākṣagaṇo rathaḥ / akṣaughasya ratho deho dehasya spandanaṃ rathaḥ //MU_6,35.40//
GSP27moksop_u:16310: spandanaṃ karma saṃsāro jarāmaraṇapañjaram / evaṃ pravartitaṃ cakram idam ādhivibhūtijam //MU_6,35.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16311: pratibhāsata evātmany asatsvapna ivātataḥ / manāg api na satyātma mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvat sthitam //MU_6,35.42//
GSP27moksop_u:16312: rathas tv asyās smṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ kalanāyā munīśvara / yatra prāṇamarut tatra mananaṃ paritiṣṭhati //MU_6,35.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16313: yatra sthitaiṣā kalanā tad eva paricopati / yat prayāti vanaṃ vātyā tad eva parighūrṇate //MU_6,35.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16314: manasy ākāśasaṃlīne na prāṇaḥ paricopati / tejasy asattām āyāte na rūpam iva rājate //MU_6,35.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16315: prāṇe praśānte manute na mano 'ntar manāg api / vātyāyām upaśāntāyāṃ na rajo hi vikampate //MU_6,35.46//
GSP27moksop_u:16316: yatra prāṇamarud yāti manas tatraiva tiṣṭhati / yatra yatrānusarati rathas tatraiva sārathiḥ //MU_6,35.47//
GSP27moksop_u:16317: prāṇasampreritaṃ cittaṃ yāti deśāntaraṃ kṣaṇāt / kṣepaṇonmuktapāṣāṇa iva tan nānyathā javi //MU_6,35.48//
GSP27moksop_u:16318: yatra puṣpaṃ tatra gandho yatrāgnis tatra coṣṇatā / yatra prāṇo manas tatra yatrendus tatra tadruciḥ //MU_6,35.49//
GSP27moksop_u:16319: saṃvittiḥ pavanaspandān nāḍīsaṃsparśatas svataḥ / saṃvittes sphāratā cittam atas tat prāṇakoṭare //MU_6,35.50//
GSP27moksop_u:16320: sarvatra vidyate saṃvid vyomasvacchā jaḍājaḍe / kṣubhyatīva tu sā prāṇaspandād ity anubhūyate //MU_6,35.51//
GSP27moksop_u:16322: nānāsphārasamullāsair yaḥ pūrvaṃ parivalgitaḥ / prāṇo 'tīte tu manane sa evāśu na copati //MU_6,35.53//
GSP27moksop_u:16323: puryaṣṭake cit paramā sve mune pratibimbati / ādarśa eva pratimā dṛśyate nopalādiṣu //MU_6,35.54//
GSP27moksop_u:16324: manaḥ puryaṣṭakaṃ viddhi sarvakāryaikakāraṇam / tad eva bhedaiḥ kathitam anyais svāśayakalpitaiḥ //MU_6,35.55//
GSP27moksop_u:16325: yasmād udeti phalam ākuladṛśyajālaṃ tat tan na vastvitarad ity anubhūtam uccaiḥ / tasmān mano viparivarti hi dehadṛṣṭyā sarvaṃ tu tatparam avastv iti viddhi tat tvam //MU_6,35.56//
GSP27moksop_u:16328: īśvaraḥ: mune śṛṇu kathaṃ kāryakāriṇī spandaśālinī / patantīva citiḥ puṃsām upaiti maraṇābhidhām //MU_6,36.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16329: prāktanais tair ihānyaiś ca svair manomananehitaiḥ / karmavātair vicitrehaiḥ paripīvaratāṃ gataiḥ //MU_6,36.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16330: manastvaṃ yā gatā śaktis sujaḍeva mune citeḥ / sā sphuraty anayā brahman svacitā sākṣibhūtayā //MU_6,36.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16331: asyāḥ prasādād iha sā cit kalaṅkavatī mune / jagadgandharvanagaraṃ karoti na karoti ca //MU_6,36.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16332: vinātmasattayā jīvo mūkas tiṣṭhati kuḍyavat / tatsattayā prasphurati nabhassampreritāśmavat //MU_6,36.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16333: yathā sphuraty atijaḍam ayo 'yaskāntasannidhau / tathā sphurati jīvo 'yaṃ sati sarvagate pare //MU_6,36.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16334: sarvasthayātmaśaktyaiva jīva eṣa sphuraty alam / makuro bimbam ādatte dravyān nāntassthitād api //MU_6,36.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16335: suvismṛtasvabhāvatvāc jīvo 'yaṃ jaḍatāṃ gataḥ / mohād vismṛtabhāvatvāc chūdratām iva saddvijaḥ //MU_6,36.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16336: pravismṛtasvabhāvā hi cic cittatvam upāgatā / mohopahatacittatvāt sumahān iva dīnatām //MU_6,36.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16337: jaḍayāvaśayā deho vātaśaktisamānayā / sañcālyate kalanayā pattraṃ vā vīcimālayā //MU_6,36.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16338: karmātmanā varākeṇa jīvena manasāmunā / cālyante dehayantrāṇi pāṣāṇā iva vāyunā //MU_6,36.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16339: śarīraśakaṭānāṃ hi karṣaṇe paramātmanā / manaḥprāṇodayau brahman kṛtau karmakarau dṛḍhau //MU_6,36.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16340: cij jaḍaṃ tūrarīkṛtya rūpaṃ jīvatvam eva ca / manoratham upāruhya vahatprāṇaturaṅgamam //MU_6,36.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16341: kvacij jātapadārthatvaṃ kvacin naṣṭapadārthatām / kvacid bahupadārthatvaṃ kvacin nānāpadārthatāṃ //MU_6,36.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16342: gateva bhinnevāsteccham atyajantī nijaṃ padam / jalateva taraṅgatvaṃ saivāseva sadoditā //MU_6,36.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16343: upajīvyātmano rūpaṃ paraṃ sphurati vṛttiṣu / ālokam upajīvyemaṃ rūpaśrīr dravyagā yathā //MU_6,36.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16344: paramātmani cittattve sthite sati nirāmaye / jīvo jīvati sālokaṃ dīpe sati gṛhaṃ yathā //MU_6,36.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16345: ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva prayānty asyāḥ prapīnatām / apām iva taraṅgatvaṃ vīcitvasyeva phenatā //MU_6,36.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16346: ādhivyādhibhir ākīrṇaś śarīrāmbhojaṣaṭpadaḥ / jīvo vaivaśyam āyāti taraṅgatvaṃ yathā payaḥ //MU_6,36.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16347: cicchaktis sarvaśaktitvān nāhaṃ cid iti bhāvanāt / svavaśaivaiti vaivaśyaṃ sūryadīptir ivāmbudaiḥ //MU_6,36.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16348: vaivaśyāśāvatī mauḍhyān na vindaty ātmasaṃvidam / ghanajāḍyaparābhūtas svāṅgāvadalanaṃ yathā //MU_6,36.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16349: prāṇavāyvanusandhānam asyā mohād vinaśyati / ghanamohavato jantos svakāryasmaraṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,36.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16350: athāṅgasaṃvido vātas spandaśakteś ca mohataḥ / na karoty anusandhānaṃ kuṣṭhī spandaiṣaṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,36.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16351: asaṃvitspandane dehe padmapattraṃ hṛdi sthitam / na sphuraty aparāmṛṣṭaṃ dārupattraṃ yathā bahiḥ //MU_6,36.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16352: nisspande padmapattre 'ntaḥ prāṇāś śāntiṃ prayānty amī / tālavṛnte yathāspande bahiḥ pavanaśaktayaḥ //MU_6,36.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16353: prāṇe śānte 'ntar asparśāj jīvo nipuṇamūkatām / yāti śānte nabhovāyāv adṛśyatvaṃ yathā rajaḥ //MU_6,36.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16354: virathaṃ vigatādhāraṃ manomātraṃ hi dṛśyate / tiṣṭhaty ātmany alabdhorvījalāditarubījavat //MU_6,36.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16355: iti vaikalyam āyāte karaṇaughe samantataḥ / nāśaṃ puryaṣṭake yāte dehaḥ patati niścalaḥ //MU_6,36.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16356: ciccetyacetanān mohāt spandam āyāti vāsanā / udīritā smaraty anyad anyad vismarati svayam //MU_6,36.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16357: hṛtpadmayantrasphuraṇāt sphuṭaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ bhavet / hṛtpadmayantre vahanād ruddhe puryaṣṭakaṃ kṣayi //MU_6,36.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16358: dehe puryaṣṭakaṃ yāvad asti tāvat sa jīvati / śānte puryaṣṭake deho mṛta ity ucyate dvija //MU_6,36.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16359: viruddhamalasaṃrodhāc chedabhedadaśāvaśāt / na prasphurati hṛtpadmayantram abhyantare yadā //MU_6,36.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16360: tadā puryaṣṭakaṃ śāntim upaiti gagane śanaiḥ / saṃrodhite vātayantre yathā pavanasantatiḥ //MU_6,36.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16361: svāsaṃvittivaśāj jīvo vaivaśyam upagacchati / padmayantraṃ śarīrasthaṃ na vāhayati nissahaḥ //MU_6,36.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16362: vāsanā vimalā yeṣāṃ hṛdayān nāpasarpati / sthiraikarūpajīvās te jīvanmuktāś cirāyuṣaḥ //MU_6,36.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16363: saṃruddhe padmayantre hi prāṇe śāntim upāgate / dehaḥ pataty adhairyo 'yaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaḥ kṣitau //MU_6,36.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16364: yathaiva vyomamaruti līnaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ bhavet / tathaiva tatraiva tadā layam eti mano mune //MU_6,36.37//
GSP27moksop_u:16365: sucirābhyastabhāvasthavāsanānucitaṃ manaḥ / yatra tatra bhramaṃ svarganarakādiṃ prapaśyati //MU_6,36.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16366: śarīraṃ śavatām eti manomārutavarjitam / gate gṛhajane dūraṃ gṛhaṃ saṃśūnyatām iva //MU_6,36.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16367: sarvagā cic cetanato jīvībhūya manassthitā / puryaṣṭakavapur bhūtvaivātivāhikadehinī //MU_6,36.40//
GSP27moksop_u:16368: tanmātrapañcakaṃ cittvaṃ kroḍīkṛtya vyavasthitā / svapnabhramavad ākāraṃ bhāvāt sthūlaṃ prapaśyati //MU_6,36.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16369: dṛḍhabhāvanayā paścāt tatraiva rasaśālinī / ātivāhikadehatvaṃ vismaraty akhilaṃ kṣaṇāt //MU_6,36.42//
GSP27moksop_u:16370: asaty eva śarīre 'smin kṛtā kṛtrimabhāvanā / nayaty asatyaṃ satyatvaṃ satyaṃ cāsatyatām api //MU_6,36.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16371: sarvagā hi cid aṃśena jīvībhūya bhaven manaḥ / manaḥ puryaṣṭakaratham ākrāmati tato jagat //MU_6,36.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16372: puryaṣṭakaṃ vātamayaṃ deham utthāpayaty alam / hṛtsthaṃ hi vetāla iva jīva ity ucyate tadā //MU_6,36.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16373: kṣīṇe puryaṣṭake cittaṃ yadā vyomani līyate / tadā sphurati no deho mṛta ity ucyate 'pi ca //MU_6,36.46//
GSP27moksop_u:16374: svabhāvavaśato jīvo vismṛtyāśaktim ṛcchati / vairasyāt kālavaśataḥ parṇaṃ jarjaratām iva //MU_6,36.47//
GSP27moksop_u:16375: jīvaśaktyāparāmṛṣṭe niruddhe padmayantrake / prāṇe saṃrodham āyāte mriyate mānavo mune //MU_6,36.48//
GSP27moksop_u:16376: yathā jātāni jātāni tāny athānyāni kālataḥ / vṛkṣāt parṇāni śīryante śarīrāṇi tathā nṛṇām //MU_6,36.49//
GSP27moksop_u:16377: jāyante ca mriyante ca śarīrāṇi śarīriṇām / pādapānāṃ ca parṇāni kā tatra paridevanā //MU_6,36.50//
GSP27moksop_u:16378: cidambudhau sphuranty etā dehabudbudapaṅktayaḥ / itaś cānyā itaś cānyā etāsv āsthā na dhīmataḥ //MU_6,36.51//
GSP27moksop_u:16379: sarvagāpi cid etasmiṃś cetasi pratibimbate / padārtham antar ādatte nānyo hi makurād ṛte //MU_6,36.52//
GSP27moksop_u:16380: cidamalanabhasi prasannarūpāḥ parivitate tadatanmaye sphuranti / kalakalamukharās sphuṭābhirāmā vividhaśarīravimohatāpanadyaḥ //MU_6,36.53//
GSP27moksop_u:16383: vasiṣṭhaḥ: candrārdhaśekharadhara cittattvasya mahātmanaḥ / anantasyaikarūpasya dvitvaṃ katham ivāgatam //MU_6,37.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16384: kathaṃ ca tan mahādeva rūḍhaṃ sat kālaparyayāt / bhaved duḥkhopaghātāya prajñayā vinivāritam //MU_6,37.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16385: īśvaraḥ: sarvaśaktir hi cid brahma sad ekaṃ vidyate yadā / tadā nirmūla evāyaṃ dvitvaikatvalayodayaḥ //MU_6,37.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16386: sati dvitve kilaikaṃ syāt saty ekatve dvirūpatā / kale dve eva cidrūpaṃ cidrūpatvāt tad apy asat //MU_6,37.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16387: ekābhāvād abhāvo 'tra caikatvadvitvayor dvayoḥ / ekaṃ vinā dvitīyaṃ na na dvitīyaṃ vinaikatā //MU_6,37.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16388: kāryakāraṇayor ekasāratvād ekarūpatā / phalāntasyāpi bījāder vikārādi hi kalpanā //MU_6,37.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16389: cittvaṃ cetyavikalpena svayaṃ sphurati tanmayam / vikārādi tad evātas tatsāratvān na bhidyate //MU_6,37.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16390: vikārādivikalpo 'yaṃ tata utthāya vastuṣu / yāti sārthakatām nānākāryakāraṇakādibhiḥ //MU_6,37.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16391: taraṅgas salile 'toyam ato 'yaṃ yasya te sa naḥ / śaśaśṛṅgasamas so 'pi yasya satyaṃ sa khāṅkuraḥ //MU_6,37.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16392: vastubodhe 'tra sampanne tavālaṃ vāgvikalpitaiḥ / vyavacchedādi duśchedaṃ vaco vāktvāt kila dvija //MU_6,37.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16393: brahmaṇas sarvaśaktitvaṃ tattvato na vibhidyate / svam aṅga kaṇakallolajālādy ambudhivāriṇaḥ //MU_6,37.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16394: puṣpapallavapattrādi latāyā netarad yathā / dvitvaikatve jagattvādi tvattāhantvaṃ tathā citeḥ //MU_6,37.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16395: deśakālavikārādibhedaś cidracitas tu yat / tac cid eveti te proktaṃ na praśno 'tra tavocitaḥ //MU_6,37.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16396: deśakālakriyāsattāniyatyādyāś ca śaktayaḥ / cidātmikā eva cites sattvāt sampatitās svataḥ //MU_6,37.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16397: cic ca carcitacetyeha cid brahmādyabhidhā smṛtā / yathā vīcyabhidhārhatve sthitam ambu taraṅgitam //MU_6,37.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16398: ahambhāvataraṅgasya cidvilāsamahāmbudheḥ / taraṅgitatvam iva yan na tāvac cetyatāṃ gatam //MU_6,37.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16399: tad etat paramaṃ brahma satyeśvaraśivādibhiḥ / śūnyaikaparamātmādināmabhiḥ parigīyate //MU_6,37.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16400: evaṃrūpapadātītaṃ yad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ / tan na nāmārham amalaṃ viṣayo na girāṃ ca tat //MU_6,37.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16401: yad idaṃ dṛśyate tasyās tal latāyā mahāciteḥ / phalapallavapuṣpādi na bhinnaṃ tanmayaṃ yataḥ //MU_6,37.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16402: mahāciccetyacayanāc cid bhavaty abhidhāvatī / sā jīvatvaṃ sa bāhyatvaṃ tad advi dvīva paśyati //MU_6,37.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16403: svayam anyeyam asmīti bhāvayitvā svabhāvataḥ / anyatām iva saṃyāti svasaṅkalpātmikāṃ svatām //MU_6,37.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16404: akalaṅkena rūpeṇa rūpaṃ yat svakalaṅkavat / saṃsārapatitaṃ prāpya cetanenaiva cetitam //MU_6,37.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16405: cidvapus svayam evaitad ekato yāti jīvatām / cittattvasyāvabhāsena jīvo jīvati tanmayaḥ //MU_6,37.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16406: ātivāhikadehā cij jīvatāṃ samupāgatā / bhāvanāt pañcakībhūtā dravyam asmīti vetty alam //MU_6,37.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16407: tad dravyaṃ prāṇinā bhuktam āśu gacchati vīryatām / tato 'haṃ prāṇavāñ jāto vettīty anubhavātmakam //MU_6,37.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16408: ahantādikrameṇāśu pañcakānubhavakramāt / sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ yad yad vetti tat tad bhavaty alam //MU_6,37.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16409: kākatālīyayogena dṛḍhābhyāsakṣayeṇa ca / vāsanāntarasaṃśleṣāt pūrvam ākāram ujjhati //MU_6,37.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16410: dvitvasvasaṃvidā dvitvam ekasyaiva pravartate / puṃso vetālasamparkād vetāla iva bhāsuraḥ //MU_6,37.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16411: advitvavedanād dvitvam ātmano vinivartate / na karomīti saṅkalpāt puruṣasyeva kartṛtā //MU_6,37.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16412: paramārthatayā dvitvaṃ na kilātmani vidyate / avikārādimattvena sarvagatvena sarvadā //MU_6,37.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16413: yat svasaṅkalparacitam asaṅkalpakṣayaṃ hi tat / yathā mune manorājyaṃ gandharvanagaraṃ yathā //MU_6,37.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16414: saṅkalparacanaṃ kleśo na saṅkalpavināśanam / saṅkalpayatno gandharvapuryās sṛṣṭau na tu kṣaye //MU_6,37.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16415: puṣṭasaṅkalpamātreṇa yad idaṃ duḥkham āgatam / tad asaṅkalpamātreṇa kṣayi kātra kadarthanā //MU_6,37.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16416: yat kiñcid api saṅkalpya naro duḥkhe nimajjati / na kiñcid api saṅkalpya sukham akṣayam aśnute //MU_6,37.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16417: saṅkalpavyālanirmuktaṃ sthitaṃ cet tava cetanam / tadānandavanodyāne tvam uccaiḥ parirājase //MU_6,37.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16418: svavivekānilaiḥ kṛtvā saṅkalpajaladakṣayam / parāṃ nirmalatām ehi śaradīva nabho'ntaram //MU_6,37.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16419: saṅkalpasaritaṃ mattāṃ matiyantreṇa śoṣayan / tatrohyamānam ātmānaṃ samāśvāsya bhavāmanāḥ //MU_6,37.37//
GSP27moksop_u:16420: saṅkalpānilanirdhūtaṃ bhrāntaṃ parṇatṛṇāṃśavat / bhūtākāśe tvam ātmānam avalambyāvalokaya //MU_6,37.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16421: svasaṅkalpakakāluṣyaṃ vinivāryātmanātmanaḥ / paraṃ prasādam āsādya paramānandavān bhava //MU_6,37.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16422: sarvaśaktitayehātmā yad yathā bhāvayaty alam / tat tathā paśyati tadā svasaṅkalpavijṛmbhitam //MU_6,37.40//
GSP27moksop_u:16423: saṅkalpamātram evedaṃ jagan mithyā samutthitam / asaṅkalpanamātreṇa brahman kvāpi vilīyate //MU_6,37.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16425: tṛṣṇākarañjalatikām imāṃ rūḍhim upāgatām / saṅkalpamūloddharaṇāt pariśoṣavatīṃ kuru //MU_6,37.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16426: pratibhāsasamutthānaṃ pratibhāsaparikṣayam / yathā gandharvanagaraṃ tathā saṃsṛtivibhramaḥ //MU_6,37.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16427: prākṛto 'smīti vismṛtyā tāvac chocati bhūmipaḥ / bhūmipo 'smīti sañjātā yāvan nāsya hṛdi smṛtiḥ //MU_6,37.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16428: naśyate jātayā brahman prāksmṛtir vartamānayā / śaradevopagatayā prāvṛḍ jāḍyavikāriṇī //MU_6,37.46//
GSP27moksop_u:16429: ghanapravāhā yaiva syāc cittehā saiva vardhate / ya evoccais svaras tantryās sa evākrāmati śrutim //MU_6,37.47//
GSP27moksop_u:16430: aham eko 'ham ātmā tv ity ekāṃ bhāvaya bhāvanām / tayā bhāvanayā yuktas sa eva tvaṃ bhavasy alam //MU_6,37.48//
GSP27moksop_u:16431: evaṃ hy asambhavad idaṃ tv avibhāgabhāsvad brahmatvam uttamapadaṃ param eva devaḥ / pūjāṃśapūjanasupūjakapūjyarūpaṃ kiñcin nakiñcid iva cittapanaikamūrtiḥ //MU_6,37.49//
GSP27moksop_u:16434: īśvaraḥ: itthaṃ sthitam idaṃ viśvaṃ sadasad devarūpi ca / dvaitaikyapadanirmuktaṃ muktadvaitaikyam apy uta //MU_6,38.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16435: citeḥ kalaṅkavad rūpam iti saṃsāritāṃ gatam / akalaṅkam asaṃsāri tac cābhinnaṃ dvayātmakam //MU_6,38.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16436: iyam asmīti samprāptakalaṅkā cin nibadhyate / etām eva kalāṃ buddhvā svatvābhinnāṃ vimucyate //MU_6,38.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16437: cid arthākāratābhāvād dvitvāt sattvaṃ samujjhatī / sukhaduḥkhāditāṃ dhatte nasatyāṃ sad iti kṣaṇāt //MU_6,38.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16438: śuddhā niraṃśā satyaikā sattā cetyevamādibhiḥ / vimuktā nāmaśabdārthais sarvais sarvātmikāpi kham //MU_6,38.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16439: sarvaṃ nirupamaṃ śāntaṃ manaso 'nte trimārgagam / brahmedaṃ bṛṃhitaṃ brāhmyā śaktyākāśanikāśayā //MU_6,38.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16440: vasiṣṭhaḥ: manasā manasi cchinne sarvākṣaprasavātmani / dvitīye 'tha tṛtīye vā pade kim avaśiṣyate //MU_6,38.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16441: yāvat kilātmanas sattā mahāsattaiva tāvatī / samastāstamaye jāte sattā keva kutaś ca kā //MU_6,38.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16442: īśvaraḥ: manasā manasi cchinne svendriyāvayavātmani / vicāreṇa samādhānāt prayogeṇa jayena vā //MU_6,38.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16443: dvaitaikyakalanābhede galite kalitātmani / satyāloke jagajjāle procchūne vilayaṃ gate //MU_6,38.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16444: śiṣyate śīrṇasaṃsārakalanākalanātmikā / bhṛṣṭabījopamā sattā jīvasya citināmikā //MU_6,38.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16446: śuddhā cid bhāvamātrasthā cetyaciccāpalād gatā / adūraviprakṛṣṭeśā padopanatipāvanī //MU_6,38.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16447: cid vyomātmeti kalitā galitākhilakalpanā / samastasāmānyavatī nāvatīrṇabhavārṇavā //MU_6,38.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16448: apunarbodhasauṣuptapadapāṇḍityapīvarī / pāram āsādya viśrāntā ciraśrāntā tate pade //MU_6,38.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16449: etat te manasi kṣīṇe kathitaṃ prathamaṃ padam / dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu viprendra śakter asyās supāvanam //MU_6,38.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16452: kālenāyāti tatraiva parāṃ pariṇatiṃ yadā / śabdaśaktir ivākāśe paramākāśagā tadā //MU_6,38.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16453: cetyāṃśonmukhatāṃ nūnaṃ tyajanty ambv iva cāpalam / vātalekheva calanaṃ puṣpalekheva saurabham //MU_6,38.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16454: kālatākāśate tyaktvā sakale cāpale 'malā / na jaḍāṃ nājaḍāṃ sphārāṃ dhatte sattām anāmikām //MU_6,38.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16455: dikkālādyanavacchinnāṃ mahāsattāpadād gatām / turyaturyāṃśakalitām akalaṅkām anāmayām //MU_6,38.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16456: kāñcid eva viśālākṣasākṣivat samavasthitām / sarvatas sarvadā sarvaprakārāsvādatatparām //MU_6,38.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16457: eṣā dvitīyā padatā kathitā tava suvrata / tṛtīyaṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi padaṃ padavidāṃ vara //MU_6,38.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16458: eṣā dṛk cetyagalanād anāmārthapadaṃ gatā / brahmātmatvādiśabdārthād atītodeti kevalam //MU_6,38.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16459: sthairyeṇa kālatas svācchyān niṣkalaṅkapadātmanā / turyātītādināmatvād api yāti paraṃ padam //MU_6,38.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16460: sā parāt paramā kāṣṭhā pradhānaṃ śivabhāvataḥ / nityaikā niravacchedyā tṛtīyā pāvanī sthitiḥ //MU_6,38.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16461: ciram asyāṃ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ sarvāśādhvānadūragā / sā mamāpy aṅga vacasāṃ na samāyāti gocaram //MU_6,38.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16462: trimārgakalanātītam iti te kathitaṃ mune / tiṣṭhaitasmin pade nityam iti devas sanātanaḥ //MU_6,38.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16463: etanmayam idaṃ viśvaṃ mune tanmayavedanāt / satyasaṃvedanān nedaṃ na ca nedaṃ munīśvara //MU_6,38.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16464: nedaṃ pravartate kiñcin nedaṃ kiñcit nivartate / śāntaṃ samasamābhāsam akham eva khakośavat //MU_6,38.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16465: advaitaikyād asaṅkṣobhād ghanāghanatayā tathā / avikārādimattvāc ca nityānityatayā ciram //MU_6,38.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16466: cidghanātmatayā śailakośānāṃ jagatām api / manāg api na bhedo 'sti satām apy asatām iva //MU_6,38.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16467: samastaṃ sac chivaṃ śāntam atītaṃ vāgvilāsataḥ / om ity asya ca tanmātrāt turyāṃśāt param om iti //MU_6,38.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16468: vālmīkiḥ: ity uktavān amaladṛk pariṇāmato 'smin sphāre pade samupaśāntaravābhirāmaḥ / tūṣṇīm atiṣṭhad amunā muninā ca sārdhaṃ saṃśāntavṛttir atha tatra muhūrtam īśaḥ //MU_6,38.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16471: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tato muhūrtena haro gaurīkamalinīsaraḥ / madvikāsonmukhas svairaṃ vikāsaṃ bahir ādade //MU_6,39.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16472: dṛktrayaṃ darśayām āsa mukhāt kālavaśoditam / rodassamudgakād arkaratnarāśim ivoditam //MU_6,39.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16473: akāladvādaśādityadinatejas sa saṃharan / niśām anāśayaṃś ceṣad īśo mām āha mānitam //MU_6,39.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16474: mune mananam āhūya svasattaivāśu mīyatām / tvam artham āharāhāryaṃ pavanas spandatām iva //MU_6,39.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16475: draṣṭavyam iha yat kiñcit tad dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ śamabhramaiḥ / na hi heyam upādeyaṃ veha paśyāmi tadvidaḥ //MU_6,39.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16476: śāntyaśāntimayān etān vikalpān galitān asi / vibuddhavān yathāsthityā tvaṃ tvam eva bhavātmadṛk //MU_6,39.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16477: imāṃ dṛśyadaśām āśu bālabodhāya vā punaḥ / samāśritya maduktaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu tūṣṇīṃsthitena kim //MU_6,39.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16478: ity uktvā bāhyabodhasthaṃ mām avekṣya triśūladhṛt / kurvan prāharad ajyotsnāsarasīnduṃ sitotpalam //MU_6,39.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16479: [īśvaraḥ:] audāsīnyena dehānāṃ cit svaspandeṣu kāraṇam / tadātmanām atattvānāṃ śūnyaṃ kham iva bhūruhām //MU_6,39.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16480: citā sañcetyate deho na tu sañcālyate kvacit / prabhur draṣṭaiva bhavati kartā bhavati karmakṛt //MU_6,39.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16481: prāṇenedaṃ dehagehaṃ parisphurati yantravat / prāṇahīnaṃ parispandaṃ tyaktvā tiṣṭhati mūkavat //MU_6,39.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16482: cālanī pāvanī śaktiś śaktis saṃvedanī citeḥ / sāmūrtā khād api svacchā svasattaivātra kāraṇam //MU_6,39.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16483: vinaśyataḥ prāṇadehau viyogātmaka eva ca / cidātmā khād api svaccho na vinaśyati kiṃ bhramaiḥ //MU_6,39.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16484: manaḥprāṇamaye dehe cittattvaṃ parirājate / makure cāmalābhāse pratibimbaṃ pravartate //MU_6,39.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16485: sad apy agragataṃ vastu pratibimbakriyāṃ prati / yathā nāsti malopete makure munināyaka //MU_6,39.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16486: tathā nāsti gataprāṇe vidyamāne 'pi dehake / sarvagāpi cid anyūnā bodhaspandādikaṃ prati //MU_6,39.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16487: bodhāt kalaṅkavikalā cid eva paramā śivam / vidur devaṃ tadabhyāsaṃ sarvasattārthadaṃ tathā //MU_6,39.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16488: sa haris sa śivas so 'jas sa brahmā sa sureśvaraḥ / anilānalacandrārkavapus sa parameśvaraḥ //MU_6,39.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16489: sa eva sarvagātmātmā cit saṃvic cetanas smṛtaḥ / deveśo dehabhṛd dhātā devadevo divaspatiḥ //MU_6,39.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16490: mahācitas samullāsāt samudyantīva kecana / ye nāma te jagaty ete brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ / kaṇās taptāyasa iva vāridher iva bindavaḥ //MU_6,39.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16491: teṣv īṣadbhramabhūteṣu jāteṣv iva parāt padāt / sthiteṣu bhramabījeṣu kalpanājālakartṛṣu //MU_6,39.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16493: tatas tv asyā anantāyāḥ prasṛtāyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ / sampannadeśakālāyāḥ kṣamas syād varṇanāsu kaḥ //MU_6,39.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16494: brahmaviṣṇuharādīnāṃ mato yaḥ paramaḥ pitā / mūlabījaṃ mahādevaḥ pallavānām iva drumaḥ //MU_6,39.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16495: sa brahmatattvādyabhidhas sarvasaṃvedanaikakṛt / sarvasattāprado bhāsvān vandyo 'bhyarcyaś ca tadvidām //MU_6,39.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16496: pratyakṣavastuviṣayas sarvatraiva sadoditaḥ / saṃvedanātmakatayā gatayā sarvagocaram //MU_6,39.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16497: na tasyāhvānamantrādi kiñcid evopayujyate / nityāhūtas sa sarvastho labhyate sarvatas svacit //MU_6,39.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16498: yāṃ yāṃ vastudaśāṃ yāsi tata eva mune śivam / svarūpaṃ samavāpnoṣi rūpālokamanodṛśā //MU_6,39.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16499: ādyaṃ pūjyaṃ namaskāryaṃ stutyam arghyaṃ sureśvaram / enaṃ taṃ viddhi vedyānāṃ sīmāntaṃ mahatām api //MU_6,39.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16500: evam ātmānam ālokya jarāśokabhayāpaham / sambhṛṣṭabījavaj jantur na bhūyaḥ parirohati //MU_6,39.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16501: sakalajantuṣu jantupadapradaṃ viditam ādyam upāsya yatavrata / tvam ajam ātmamayaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ bhavasi kiṃ parimajjasi dṛṣṭiṣu //MU_6,39.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16504: īśvaraḥ: tataṃ cidrūpam evaikaṃ sarvasattāntarasthitam / svānubhūtimayaṃ śuddhaṃ devaṃ rudreśvarā viduḥ //MU_6,40.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16505: bījaṃ samastabījānāṃ sāraṃ saṃsārasaṃsṛteḥ / karmaṇāṃ paramaṃ karma ciddhātuṃ viddhi nirmalam //MU_6,40.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16506: kāraṇaṃ kāraṇaughānām akāraṇam anābilam / bhāvanaṃ bhāvanāṃśānām abhāvyam abhavātmakaṃ //MU_6,40.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16507: cetanaṃ cetanaughānāṃ cetanātmani cetitam / acetyacetanaṃ cetyaṃ paramaṃ bhūribhāsanam //MU_6,40.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16508: ālokālokam amalam anālokyam alokajam / abījaṃ jīvabījaughaṃ cidghanaṃ vimalaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,40.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16509: asatyaṃ sanmayaṃ śāntaṃ satyāsatyavivarjitam / mahāsattādisantānaṃ cinmātraṃ viddhi netarat //MU_6,40.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16510: svayaṃ bhavati rāgātmā rañjako rañjanaṃ rajaḥ / svayam ākāśam apy āśu kuḍyaṃ bhavati maṇḍitam //MU_6,40.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16511: asmiṃś cittejasi sphāre jaganmarumarīcayaḥ / sphuritāḥ prasphuriṣyanti prasphuranti ca koṭiśaḥ //MU_6,40.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16512: svasattāmātrasampannam idam asmin svatejasi / na kiñcid api sampannam anyad auṣṇyād ivānale //MU_6,40.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16514: garbhīkṛtamahākalpo nimeṣo 'yam udāhṛtaḥ / ākrāntakalpenānena na santyaktā nimeṣatā //MU_6,40.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16515: vālāgrakād apy aṇunā vyāptānenākhilā mahī / saptābdhivalayāpy urvī nāsyāntam adhigacchati //MU_6,40.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16516: akurvann eva saṃsāraracanāṃ kartṛtāṃ gataḥ / kurvann eva mahākarma na karoty eva kiñcana //MU_6,40.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16517: dravyam apy eva nirdravyo nirdravyo 'pi hi dravyavat / akāyo 'pi mahākāyo mahākāyo 'py akāyavān //MU_6,40.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16518: adyāpy eṣa sadā prātaḥ prātar apy adyatāṃ gataḥ / na cāyam adya na prātas tv adya prātaś ca vā sadā //MU_6,40.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16520: ityādy anarthakaṃ vākyaṃ tathā satyaṃ sa eva ca / na tad asti na yat sa syān na tad asti na yat tv asau //MU_6,40.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16521: yasmai sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ / yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ //MU_6,40.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16522: pattrāntarālagahanena vilāsavatyā helāvilolaghanagarjitayā malena / mallena mallapadamālitamālavānāṃ lakṣmīlatāvivalitā valiteva puṣṭiḥ //MU_6,40.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16525: īśvaraḥ: ityādikāpi śabdānām arthaśrīs satyarūpiṇī / tasmin sarveśvare sarvasattāmaṇisamudgake //MU_6,41.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16526: kā nāma vimalā bhāsas tasmin paramacinmaṇau / na kacanti vicinvanti vicitrāṇi jaganti yāḥ //MU_6,41.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16527: eṣā bījakaṇāntassthā citsattā svavapurmayam / buddhvā mṛtkālavāryādi karoty aṅkuracodanam //MU_6,41.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16528: phenāvartavivartāntarvartinī rasarūpiṇī / kacitendriyasambandhe karoti spandam ambhasām //MU_6,41.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16529: eṣā kusumaguccheṣu gandharūpeṇa saṃsthitā / kacantī ghrāṇarandhreṣu karoti pariphullanam //MU_6,41.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16530: śilāṅgasthā śilāṅgatvaṃ nayantī satyatāpadam / sargādhāradaśāṃ dhatte girīndrasthitilīlayā //MU_6,41.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16531: pavanaspandakośātmarūpiṇī ca tvagindriyam / saṃsādhayaty ātmasutaṃ pitevātmaparājayāt //MU_6,41.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16532: aśeṣasārasampiṇḍam apy ātmānaṃ khasiddhaye / bhāvayitvā nakiñcittvam iva khatvaṃ karoty alam //MU_6,41.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16533: svasattāpratibimbābham ākāśamakurodare / dhatte kalpanimeṣāṅkaṃ kālākhyam amalaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,41.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16534: āmahāpañcameśānapariṇāmam anāmayā / idam ittham idaṃ neti niyatir bhavati svayam //MU_6,41.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16535: sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ / saty etasmin prakāśante jagaccitraparamparāḥ //MU_6,41.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16536: paramākāśanagaranāṭyamaṇḍapabhūmiṣu / svaśaktinṛttaṃ saṃsāraṃ paśyantī sākṣivat sthitā //MU_6,41.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16537: vasiṣṭhaḥ: śivasyāsya jagannātha śaktayas tāḥ kathaṃ sthitāḥ / sākṣitā kātha kiṃ tāsāṃ nṛttaṃ syāt kiyad eva vā //MU_6,41.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16538: īśvaraḥ: svabhāvācalaśāntasya śivasya paramātmanaḥ / somya cinmātrarūpasya sarvasyānākṛter api //MU_6,41.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16539: icchāsattā vyomasattā kālasattā tathaiva ca / tathā niyatisattā ca mahāsattā ca suvrata //MU_6,41.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16540: jñānaśaktiḥ kriyāśaktiḥ kartṛtākartṛtāpi ca / ityādikānāṃ śaktīnām anto nāsti śivātmani //MU_6,41.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16541: vasiṣṭhaḥ: śaktayaḥ kuta etās tā bahutvaṃ katham āsu ca / udayaś ca kathaṃ deva bhedābhedaś ca kīdṛśaḥ //MU_6,41.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16542: īśvaraḥ: śivasyānantarūpasya yaiṣā cinmātratātmanaḥ / eṣā hi śaktir ity uktā nāsmād bhinnā manāg api //MU_6,41.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16544: śivaśaktyākhyayaiko 'pi bahuvad bhāsate svataḥ / sarvaśaktyātmanaikena śivenaiva śivātmasu / artheṣv arthitayā satsu sākṣivat kalpitātmasu //MU_6,41.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16545: etā jagati nṛtyanti brahmāṇḍe nṛttamaṇḍape / kālena nartakeneva krameṇa pariśikṣitāḥ //MU_6,41.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16546: yā sā paramparaitāsām eṣā niyatir ucyate / kriyā prakṛtir icchā sā kāletyādikṛtābhidhā //MU_6,41.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16547: āmahārudraparyantam idam ittham iti sthiteḥ / ātṛṇaṃ padmajaspandaniyamān niyatis smṛtā //MU_6,41.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16548: niyatir nityam udvegavarjitā paramorjitā / eṣā nṛtyati khe nityaṃ jagajjālakanāṭakam //MU_6,41.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16558: asmin vikāravalite niyater vilāse saṃsāranāmni ciranāṭakanāṭyasāre / sākṣī sadoditavapuḥ parameśvaro 'yam ekas sthito na ca tayā na ca tena bhinnaḥ //MU_6,41.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16561: īśvaraḥ: eṣa devas sa paramaḥ pūjya eṣa sadā satām / cinmātram anubhūtātmā sarvagas sarvasaṃśrayaḥ //MU_6,42.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16562: ghaṭe paṭe vaṭe kuḍye śakaṭe vānare sthitaḥ / śivo haro harir brahmā śakro vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ //MU_6,42.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16563: bahir antaś ca sarvātmā sadā svātmā subuddhibhiḥ / dvividhena krameṇaiṣa bhagavān paripūjyate //MU_6,42.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16564: bahis tāvan mahābuddhe krameṇa paripūjyate / yena taṃ śṛṇu tattvajña śroṣyasy antaḥkramaṃ tataḥ / pūjākrameṣu sarveṣu neha dārbhaṃ pavitrakam //MU_6,42.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16565: pūjanaṃ dhyānam evātra dhyānam evātra pūjanam / tasmāt tribhuvanādhāre nityaṃ dhyānena pūjayet //MU_6,42.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16566: cidrūpaṃ sūryalakṣābhaṃ samastābhāsabhāsanam / antassthacitprakāśaṃ svam ahantāsāram āśrayet //MU_6,42.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16570: brahmendraharirudreśapramukhām amarādikām / imāṃ bhūtaśriyaṃ tasya romālīṃ paricintayet //MU_6,42.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16571: vividhārambhakāriṇyas trijagadyantrarajjavaḥ / icchādyāś śaktayas sarvāś cintanīyāś śarīragāḥ //MU_6,42.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16573: saśailabhuvanābhogam idaṃ brahmāṇḍamaṇḍalam / dehakoṇe 'sya kasmiṃścit svāṅgāvayavatāṃ gatam //MU_6,42.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16574: vicintayen mahādevaṃ sahasracaraṇekṣaṇam / sahasraśirasaṃ śāntaṃ sahasrabhujabhūṣaṇam //MU_6,42.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16575: sarvatrekṣaṇaśaktyāḍhyaṃ sarvato ghrāṇaśaktigam / sarvatra sparśanamayaṃ sarvato rasanānvitam //MU_6,42.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16576: sarvatra śravaṇākīrṇaṃ sarvatra manasānvitam / sarvato mananātītaṃ sarvatra paramaṃ śivam //MU_6,42.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16577: sarvadā sarvakartāraṃ sarvasaṅkalpitārthadam / sarvabhūtāntarālasthaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaikasādhanam //MU_6,42.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16578: iti sañcintya deveśam arcayed vidhivat tataḥ / vidhānam arcanasyedaṃ śṛṇu brahmavidāṃ vara //MU_6,42.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16579: devaṃ svasaṃvidātmānaṃ nopahāreṇa pūjayet / na dīpena na dhūpena na puṣpavibhavārpaṇaiḥ //MU_6,42.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16580: nānnadānādidānena na candanavilepanaiḥ / na ca kuṅkumakarpūrair bhogaiś citrair na cetaraiḥ //MU_6,42.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16581: nityam akleśalabhyena śītalenāvināśinā / ekenaivāmṛtenaiṣa bodhena svena pūjyate //MU_6,42.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16582: etad eva paraṃ dhyānaṃ pūjaiṣaiva parā smṛtā / yad anāratam antassthaśuddhacinmātravedanam //MU_6,42.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16583: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan / pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇañ śuddhasaṃvinmayo bhavet //MU_6,42.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16584: dhyānāmṛtena sampūjyas svayam ātmāyam īśvaraḥ / paramāsvādayuktena muktena kusumehitaiḥ //MU_6,42.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16585: dhyānopahāra evātmadhyānaṃ hy asya samīhitam / dhyānam arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca śuddhasaṃvedanātmakam //MU_6,42.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16586: dhyānasaṃvedanaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ paraṃ viduḥ / vinā tenetareṇāyam ātmā labhyata eva no //MU_6,42.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16587: dhyānāt prasādam āyātas sarvalokasukhaśriyam / ayam ātmā mune bhuṅkte dehe bhūpo gṛhe yathā //MU_6,42.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16588: dhyānenānena sumune nimeṣāṃs tu trayodaśa / pūrṇo 'pi pūjayatv īśaṃ gopradānaṃ labheta vai //MU_6,42.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16589: pūjayitvā nimeṣāṇāṃ śatam ekam iti prabhum / aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalam āpnoti mānavaḥ //MU_6,42.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16590: dhyānabalyupahāreṇa svayam ātmānam ātmanā / ghaṭikāṃ pūjayed yas tu rājasūyaṃ labheta saḥ //MU_6,42.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16591: madhyāhnapūjanād itthaṃ rājasūyaikalakṣabhāk / divasaṃ pūjayitvaivaṃ pare dhāmni vasen naraḥ //MU_6,42.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16592: eṣo 'sau paramo yoga eṣā sā paramā kriyā / bāhyasampūjanaṃ proktam etad uttamam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,42.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16593: etat pavitram akhilāghavināśahetuṃ yas tv ācariṣyati naraḥ kṣaṇam apy akhinnaḥ / taṃ vandayiṣyati surāsuralokapūgaḥ prāptāspadaṃ jagati mām iva lokasāram //MU_6,42.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16596: īśvaraḥ: pāvanaṃ pāvanānāṃ yad yat sarvatamasāṃ kṣayaḥ / tad idānīṃ pravakṣye 'ham antaḥpūjanam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,43.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16597: gacchatas tiṣṭhataś caiva jāgratas svapato 'pi vā / sarvācāravataḥ pūjā nityadhyānātmikā tv iyam //MU_6,43.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16598: nityam eva śarīrastham idaṃ dhyāyet paraṃ śivam / sarvapratyayakartāraṃ svayam ātmānam ātmanā //MU_6,43.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16599: śayānam utthitaṃ caiva vrajantam atha vā sthitam / spṛśantam abhitas sparśāṃs tyajantam atha vābhitaḥ //MU_6,43.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16600: bhuñjānaṃ santyajantaṃ ca bhogān ābhogapīvarān / bāhyārthagaṇakartāraṃ sarvakāryasvarūpadam //MU_6,43.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16602: pravāhāpatitārthas tu sambodhasnānaśuddhimān / nityāvabodhārhaṇayā bodhaliṅgaṃ prapūjayet //MU_6,43.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16604: pratibhātapadārthaughanityāvagatasaṃvidam / dvārair vahantaṃ śārīrair mukhe prāṇasvarūpiṇam //MU_6,43.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16606: jñātāraṃ jñeyadṛṣṭīnāṃ kartāraṃ sarvakarmaṇām / bhoktāraṃ sarvabhojyānāṃ smartāraṃ sarvasaṃvidām //MU_6,43.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16607: samyaksaṃviditāṅgaughaṃ bhavabhāvanabhāvitam / ābhāsabhāsanaṃ bhūri sarvagaṃ cintayec chivam //MU_6,43.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16608: niṣkalaṃ sakalaṃ caiva dehasthaṃ vyomacāriṇam / arañjitaṃ rañjitaṃ ca nityam aṅgāṅgasaṃvidā //MU_6,43.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16610: ṣaṭtriṃśatpadakoṭistham unmanāntadaśātigam / kurvantam antaś śabdādīṃś codayantaṃ manaḥkhagam //MU_6,43.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16611: vikalpiny avikalpe ca trividhe vākpathe sthitam / tile tailam ivāṅgeṣu sarveṣv evāntar āśritam //MU_6,43.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16612: kalākalaṅkarahitaṃ kalitaṃ kalanāgaṇaiḥ / ekadeśe svahṛtpadme sarvadehe ca saṃsthitam //MU_6,43.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16613: cinmātram amalābhāsaṃ kalākalanakalpanam / pratyakṣadṛśyaṃ sarvatra svānubhūtimayātmakam //MU_6,43.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16614: pratyakcetanam ātmīyam ātmatvena purassthitam / padārthatām upetyāśu kṣaṇād dvitvam ivāgatam //MU_6,43.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16615: sahastapādāvayavas sakeśanakhadantakaḥ / svadeho 'haṃ cidābhāso devo 'yam iti bhāvayet //MU_6,43.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16616: vicitrāś śaktayo bahvyo nānācārā manodṛśām / upāsate māṃ mānasyaḥ patnyo varam ivottamam //MU_6,43.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16617: mano me dvārapālo 'yam niveditajagattrayaḥ / cinteyaṃ me pratīhārī purassthā śuddharūpiṇī //MU_6,43.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16618: śaktir mamāṅgagā buddhiḥ kriyā caivāparāṅgagā / jñānāni ca vicitrāṇi bhūṣaṇāny aṅgagāni me //MU_6,43.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16619: karmendriyāṇi dvārāṇi buddhīndriyagaṇo 'ṅganāḥ / ayaṃ so 'ham anantātmā vyavacchedojjhitaś citi //MU_6,43.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16620: tiṣṭhāmi bharitaikātmā pūrṇas sarvāvapūrakaḥ / iti devīm upāśritya svacchām ātmacamatkṛtim //MU_6,43.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16621: devavat paripūrṇo 'ntar adīnātmā ca tiṣṭhati / nāstam eti na codeti na tuṣyati na tapyate //MU_6,43.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16622: na tṛptiṃ na kṣudhaṃ yāti nābhivāñchati nojjhati / samas samasamācāras samābhāsas samākṛtiḥ //MU_6,43.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16623: somyatām alam āyātas samantāt sundarāśayaḥ / ādeham eka evāsāv avyucchinnamahāmatiḥ //MU_6,43.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16624: devārcanaṃ karoty evaṃ dīrghadīrgham aharniśam / cittattvāvalito deho devo 'sya parikīrtitaḥ //MU_6,43.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16625: yathāprāptena sarveṇa tam arcayati vastunā / samayāmalayā buddhyā cinmātraṃ dehatatparam //MU_6,43.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16626: yathāprāptakramotthena sarvārthena samarcayet / manāg api na kartavyo yatno 'trāpūrvavastuni //MU_6,43.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16627: prātar dharmehayā nityaṃ tato 'rthakriyayānagha / kāmasaṃvedanenātha pūjayec cetanaṃ vibhum //MU_6,43.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16631: sīmāntais sampadāṃ caiva ceṣṭānāṃ jagatas sthiteḥ / mṛtajīvitasattvaiś ca prāptair ātmānam arcayet //MU_6,43.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16632: dāridryeṇātha rājyena vā pravāhāgatātmanā / vicitraceṣṭāpuṣpeṇa buddhvātmānaṃ samarcayet //MU_6,43.37//
GSP27moksop_u:16634: satāṃ hṛdayahāriṇyā rūḍhayā śaśiśītayā / maitryā mādhuryadharmiṇyā hṛtstham ātmānam arcayet //MU_6,43.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16635: bhogānām aviruddhānāṃ niṣiddhānāṃ ca sarvadā / tyāgena vātha rāgeṇa svātmānaṃ buddham arcayet //MU_6,43.40//
GSP27moksop_u:16636: īhitānīhitaughena yuktāyuktamayātmanā / tyaktenārtena vārthyena prāptenātmānam arcayet //MU_6,43.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16637: naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam upekṣeta prāptaṃ prāptam upāharet / nirvikāratayaitad dhi paramārcanam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,43.42//
GSP27moksop_u:16638: sarvadaiva samagrāsu ceṣṭāniṣṭāsu dṛṣṭiṣu / paramaṃ sāmyam ādāya nityātmārcāvrataṃ caret //MU_6,43.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16639: sarvaṃ vindeta suśubhaṃ sarvaṃ vindyāc ca vāśubham / sarvam ātmamayaṃ kuryān nityātmārcāparo naraḥ //MU_6,43.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16640: āpātaramaṇīyaṃ yad yac cāpātasudussaham / tat sarvaṃ susamaṃ buddhvā nityātmārcāvrataṃ caret //MU_6,43.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16641: ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ nāhaṃ vibhāgam iti santyajet / sarvaṃ brahmeti niścitya nityātmārcāvrataṃ caret //MU_6,43.46//
GSP27moksop_u:16642: sarvadā sarvarūpeṇa sarvākāravikāriṇā / sarvāsarvaprakāreṇa prāptenātmānam arcayet //MU_6,43.47//
GSP27moksop_u:16643: na vāñchatā na tyajatā jñena prāptās svabhāvataḥ / saritas sāgareṇeva bhoktavyā bhogabhūmayaḥ //MU_6,43.48//
GSP27moksop_u:16644: udvego nānugantavyas tucchātucchāsu dṛṣṭiṣu / vyomnā citrapadārtheṣu patitotpatiteṣv iva //MU_6,43.49//
GSP27moksop_u:16645: deśakālakriyāyogād yad udeti śubhāśubham / avikāraṃ gṛhītena tenaivātmānam arcayet //MU_6,43.50//
GSP27moksop_u:16646: ātmārcanavidhāne 'smin proktā dravyaśriyas tu yāḥ / ekenaiva śamenaitā rasena paribhāvitāḥ //MU_6,43.51//
GSP27moksop_u:16647: nāmblā na kaṭvyo no tiktā na kaṣāyāś ca kāścana / citrair api rasair digdhā madhurā eva tāś citaḥ //MU_6,43.52//
GSP27moksop_u:16648: samatāmadhurā ramyā rasaśaktir munīndra yā / tayā yad bhāvitaṃ cetyam amṛtaṃ tat kṣaṇād bhavet //MU_6,43.53//
GSP27moksop_u:16649: samatāmṛtapūreṇa yad yan nāma vibhāvyate / tat tad āyāti mādhuryaṃ param indor iva cyutam //MU_6,43.54//
GSP27moksop_u:16650: samam ākāśavad bhūtvā yad ahṛllekham āsanam / avikāram anāyāsaṃ tad devārcanam ucyate //MU_6,43.55//
GSP27moksop_u:16651: pūrṇenduneva pūrṇena bhāvyaṃ śamasamatviṣā / svacchena cidghanaikena jñenāpy upalarūpiṇā //MU_6,43.56//
GSP27moksop_u:16652: antar ākāśaviśado bahiḥ prakṛtakāryakṛt / rañjanāmihikāmuktas sampūrṇo jña upāsakaḥ //MU_6,43.57//
GSP27moksop_u:16653: svapne 'py adṛśyahṛllekham ajñānābhraparikṣaye / śāntāhantādimihikaṃ jñaśaradvyoma rājate //MU_6,43.58//
GSP27moksop_u:16654: sāmānyam astamitamānasamātṛmeyaṃ sadyaḥprasūtaśiśuvedanavadvitānam / samyakpraśāntamaticetanacittajīvaṃ jīvañ jña uttamapadasthita eva tiṣṭha //MU_6,43.59//
GSP27moksop_u:16655: deśakālakalanakramoditais sarvavastusukhaduḥkhavibhramaiḥ / nityam arcitaśarīranāyakas tiṣṭha śāntasakalehayā dhiyā //MU_6,43.60//
GSP27moksop_u:16658: īśvaraḥ: yathākāmaṃ yathārambhaṃ na karoṣi karoṣi yat / cinmātrasya śivasyāntas tad devārcanam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,44.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16659: tenaivāhlādam āyāti yāti prakaṭatāṃ tathā / tathāsthitena rūpeṇa svenaiva svayam īśvaraḥ //MU_6,44.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16660: rāgadveṣādiśabdārthā nātmany anyatamāś śive / sambhavanti pṛthagrūpā vahnau himakaṇā iva //MU_6,44.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16661: yad yad rājatvadīnatvasukhaduḥkhādivedanam / ātmīyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca tat tad arcanam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,44.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16662: viddhi saṃvittim evārcāṃ vetty ātmātmānam eva ca / ghaṭādyātmatayā brahman svayam ātmatayaiva vā //MU_6,44.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16663: śivaṃ śāntam anābhāsam ekaṃ bhāsuram ātatam / jagatpratyayavat sarvam ātmarūpam idaṃ sthitam //MU_6,44.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16664: aho nu citram ātmaiva ghaṭādy anyad avasthitam / jīvādis svastha evāntar nūnaṃ vismṛtavān iva //MU_6,44.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16665: sarvātmakasyānantasya śivasyāntaḥ kilātmanaḥ / pūjyapūjakapūjākhyo vibhramaḥ prodito vṛthā //MU_6,44.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16666: niyatākāraśāntatvaṃ na ca sambhavatīśvare / yatas saṅkalpyate brahman pūjyapūjāmayaḥ kramaḥ //MU_6,44.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16667: pūjyapūjāvyavacchinno devo 'nityo 'malātmanaḥ / sarvaśakter anantasya neśvaratvasya bhājanam //MU_6,44.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16668: trijagatprasṛtācchācchasaṃvidrūpasya cātmanaḥ / neśvaratvād ṛte brahman vyapadeśo 'pi yujyate //MU_6,44.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16669: deśakālaparicchinno yeṣāṃ syāt parameśvaraḥ / asmākam upadeśyās te na vipaścid vipaścitaḥ //MU_6,44.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16670: tadīyāṃ dṛṣṭim utsṛjya tathemām avalambya ca / samas svasthamanāś śānto vītarāgo nirāmayaḥ //MU_6,44.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16671: kāryopahārair abhito yathāprāptair akhinnadhīḥ / ātmānam arcayaṃs tiṣṭha sukhaduḥkhaśubhāśubhaiḥ //MU_6,44.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16672: adhigatavati sādhāv evam evāśu nūnaṃ tvayi taralitajīvaṃ janmaduḥkhādi kiñcit / na lagati pariśuddhe sarvatas sphāṭikāṅge navasadana ivāntar niṣkalaṅke kalaṅkaḥ //MU_6,44.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16675: vasiṣṭhaḥ: śivaḥ kim ucyate deva paraṃ brahma kim ucyate / ātmā kim ucyate vāpi paramātmā kim ucyate //MU_6,45.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16676: tat sat kiñcin nakiñcic ca śūnyaṃ vijñānam eva ca / ityādibhedo bhagavaṃs trilokeśa kim ucyate //MU_6,45.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16677: īśvaraḥ: anādyantam anābhāsaṃ sat kiñcid iha vidyate / indriyāṇām anābhāsād yan nakiñcid iva sthitam //MU_6,45.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16678: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yad indriyāṇāṃ buddhyādiyuktānām apy adṛśyatām / gataṃ tat katham īśāna vada kenāvagamyate //MU_6,45.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16679: īśvaraḥ: yo mumukṣur avidyāṃśaḥ kevalaṃ nāma sāttvikaḥ / sāttvikair eva so 'vidyābhāgaiś śāstrādināmabhiḥ //MU_6,45.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16680: avidyāṃ śreṣṭhayāśreṣṭhāṃ kṣālayann iha tiṣṭhati / malaṃ malenāpaharan yuktijño rajako yathā //MU_6,45.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16681: kākatālīyavat paścād avidyākṣaya āgate / prapaśyaty ātmanaivātmā svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ //MU_6,45.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16682: yathā kathañcid aṅgāraṃ nighṛṣya kṣālayañ śiśuḥ / karanairmalyam āpnoti kārṣṇyāṅgārakṣaye yathā //MU_6,45.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16683: yathā kathañcic chāstrāḍhyair bhāgair bhāgaṃ vicārayan / sāttvikais tāmasaṃ nāśād dvayor ātmodayas tathā //MU_6,45.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16684: paśyaty ātmānam ātmaiva vicārayati cātmanā / ātmaivāstīha nāvidyāvidyāvidyākṣayaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,45.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16685: yāvat kiñcid idaṃ vastu nānevātmāvagamyate / kramā gurūpadeśādyā nātmajñānasya kāraṇam //MU_6,45.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16686: gurur hīndriyavṛndātmā brahma sarvendriyakṣayāt / yad vastu yatkṣayaprāpyaṃ tat tasmin sati nāpyate //MU_6,45.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16687: akāraṇā api prāptā bhṛśaṃ kāraṇatāṃ dvija / kramā gurūpadeśādyā ātmajñānasya siddhaye //MU_6,45.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16688: krame gurūpadeśānāṃ pravṛtte śiṣyabodhataḥ / anirdeśyo 'py adṛśyo 'pi svayam ātmā prasīdati //MU_6,45.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16689: śāstrārthair budhyate nātmā guror vācā na cānagha / budhyate svayam evaiṣa svabodhavaśatas svataḥ //MU_6,45.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16690: gurūpadeśaśāstrārthair vinā cātmā na budhyate / etatsaṃyogasattaiva svātmajñānaprakāśinī //MU_6,45.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16691: guruśāstrārthaśiṣyāṇāṃ cirasaṃyogasattayā / ahanīva janācāra ātmajñānaṃ pravartate //MU_6,45.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16692: karmabuddhīndriyādyantasukhaduḥkhādisaṅkṣayaḥ / śiva ātmeti kathitas tat sad ityādināmabhiḥ //MU_6,45.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16693: yatredam akhilaṃ nāsti tadrūpeṇaiva cāsti vā / tad ākāśād acchataram anantaṃ sad ihāsti hi //MU_6,45.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16695: adūra eva tiṣṭhadbhir jīvanmuktapadasya taiḥ / mokṣopāyakabodhāya śāstrārtharacanāya ca //MU_6,45.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16697: cid brahma śiva ātmeśaparamātmeśvarādikāḥ / ekasmin kalpitās sañjñā nissañjñe pṛthag īśvare //MU_6,45.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16698: evam etaj jagattattvaṃ svaṃ tattvaṃ śivanāmakam / sarvathā sarvadā sarveṇārcayan sukham āssva bhoḥ //MU_6,45.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16699: śiva ātmā paraṃ brahmetyādiśabde 'sti bhinnatā / savāsanair viracitā jñasya bhedo na vastuni //MU_6,45.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16700: evaṃ devārcanaṃ kurvañ jño nityaṃ munināyaka / yatrāsmadādayo bhṛtyās tat prayāti paraṃ padam //MU_6,45.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16701: vasiṣṭhaḥ: avidyamānam evedaṃ vidyamānam iva sthitam / yathā tan me samāsena bhagavan vaktum arhasi //MU_6,45.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16702: īśvaraḥ: yo 'sau brahmādiśabdārthas saṃvidaṃ viddhi kevalam / svaccham ākāśam apy asyās sthūlaṃ merur aṇor iva //MU_6,45.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16703: sā vedyam avagacchantī yāti cinnāmayogyatām / apy avedyavatī nūnam unmanāntapadasthitā //MU_6,45.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16704: kṣaṇād bhāvitavedyatvād ahantām anugacchati / puruṣatvāt pumān svapne navavāraṇatām iva //MU_6,45.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16705: asyā ahantāṃ yātāyā deśatākālatākhatāḥ / sampadyante svayaṃ śūnyarūpiṇyas sakhya eva tāḥ //MU_6,45.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16706: tābhis saṃvalitā sātha sattā jīvābhidhānakā / bhavati spandavijñātā pavanasyeva lekhikā //MU_6,45.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16707: jīvaśaktis tathābhūtā niścayaikavilāsinī / buddhitām anuyātā sā bhavaty ajñapadāsthitā //MU_6,45.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16708: śabdaśaktyā kriyāśaktyā jñānaśaktyānugamyate / pratyekaṃ prasphuraty antar apradarśitarūpayā //MU_6,45.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16709: militvaiṣa gaṇaḥ kṣipraṃ śrutiṃ samanukalpayan / mano bhavati śūnyātmabījaṃ saṅkalpaśākhinaḥ //MU_6,45.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16710: ātivāhikadehoktibhājanaṃ tad vidur budhāḥ / antassthayā brahmaśaktyā jñarūpaṃ svātmanātmadṛk //MU_6,45.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16711: sampadyamāna evāsmiṃś cetasīmā hi śaktayaḥ / paścād iva sahaivāsya prodyanty anuditā api //MU_6,45.37//
GSP27moksop_u:16712: vātasattā spandasattā sparśasattā tathaiva ca / tvaksattā taijasī sattā tathā sattā prakāśinī //MU_6,45.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16713: dṛksattā jalasattā ca svādasattā tathāpi ca / tathaiva rasasattā ca gandhasattā tathaiva ca //MU_6,45.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16714: bhūsattā dehasattā ca piṇḍasattā ca pīvarī / deśasattā kālasattā sarvās tv ākāravarjitāḥ //MU_6,45.40//
GSP27moksop_u:16715: evaṃ sattāgaṇaṃ cetaḥ kroḍīkṛtya kharūpadhṛt / sphuraty āśritapattrādi bījavaj jīvatāṃ gatam //MU_6,45.41//
GSP27moksop_u:16716: etat puryaṣṭakaṃ viddhi deho 'yaṃ cātivāhikaḥ / aparābodham etat tat sphuraty aṃśavibhāgavat //MU_6,45.42//
GSP27moksop_u:16717: etad yad aṅgasampannaṃ sampannaṃ tan na kiñcana / na jātaṃ na ca sadrūpaṃ na cidādi na cetarat //MU_6,45.43//
GSP27moksop_u:16718: pare paraṃ prasphurati kevalaṃ kevalātma sat / jalapīṭhasya jaṭhare jaladravavilāsavat //MU_6,45.44//
GSP27moksop_u:16719: saṃvitsaṃvedanaikātma pṛthag etad acetitam / sampadyate parijñātaṃ saṅkalpanagaropamam //MU_6,45.45//
GSP27moksop_u:16720: saṃvedanaparijñānāc chivatām eva gacchati / ajātam eva vā yat tat kathaṃ gacchati vastutām //MU_6,45.46//
GSP27moksop_u:16721: athaitad vindate svāntaṃ saṅkalpād aṇutāṃ svataḥ / tanmātrasattās tasyāṇor etāḥ paśyanti dehakam //MU_6,45.47//
GSP27moksop_u:16722: aṇusthūlatvam āpannaṃ tad evāśu prapaśyati / tasya tanmātrarandhrāṇi yathādeśaṃ ca paśyati //MU_6,45.48//
GSP27moksop_u:16723: tataḥ puruṣarūpaikabhāvanāt puruṣākṛtim / kākatālīyavad dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭaṃ puṣṭaṃ bhavaty alam //MU_6,45.49//
GSP27moksop_u:16724: jīva etadavastho 'tha sthitaṃ paśyati dehakam / asantam eva gandharvapuraṃ svapnapuraṃ yathā //MU_6,45.50//
GSP27moksop_u:16725: vasiṣṭhaḥ: gandharvanagarākāram api svapnapuropamam / jagad duḥkhāya duḥkhasya kātra yuktiḥ parikṣaye //MU_6,45.51//
GSP27moksop_u:16726: īśvaraḥ: vāsanāvaśato duḥkhaṃ vidyamāne ca sā bhavet / avidyamānaṃ ca jagan mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubhaṅgavat //MU_6,45.52//
GSP27moksop_u:16727: ataḥ kiṃ vāsyate kena kasya vā vāsanā kutaḥ / kathaṃ svapnanareṇāṅga mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu pīyate //MU_6,45.53//
GSP27moksop_u:16728: sasraṣṭari tu sāhante samanomananādike / avidyamāne jagati yat sat tat pariśiṣyate //MU_6,45.54//
GSP27moksop_u:16729: yatra no vāsanā naiva vāsakaṃ na ca vāsyatā / kevalaṃ kevalībhāvas saṃśāntasakalabhramaḥ //MU_6,45.55//
GSP27moksop_u:16730: yasya satyo 'py asatyo vā śūnya eva hi yakṣakaḥ / vilīnas tasya kaivalyāt kim anyad avaśiṣyate //MU_6,45.56//
GSP27moksop_u:16731: śūnya eva hi vetāla ivetthaṃ cittavāsanā / uditeyaṃ jagannāmnī tacchāntau śāntir akṣatā //MU_6,45.57//
GSP27moksop_u:16732: ahantāyāṃ jagati ca mṛgatṛṣṇājale ca yaḥ / sāsthas taṃ cidghanataraṃ nopadeśyas tv asāv iti //MU_6,45.58//
GSP27moksop_u:16733: jīvaṃ vivekinam ihopadiśanti tajjñā no bālam udbhramam asanmayam āryamuktam / ajñān praśāsti kila yaḥ kanakāvadātāṃ sa svapnadṛṣṭapuruṣāya sutāṃ dadāti //MU_6,45.59//
GSP27moksop_u:16736: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tatas sa jīvo bhagavan dṛṣṭavān dehasambhramam / ādisarge nabhassaṃsthaḥ kām avasthām upaiti hi //MU_6,46.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16737: īśvaraḥ: parasmāt parame vyomni pūrvoktakramavad vapuḥ / jīvaḥ paśyati sampannam asatsvapnanaro yathā //MU_6,46.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16738: sarvagatvāc cidghanasya kāryaṃ svapnanaro 'pi hi / yathā karoty āśu tathā jīvasyāpi śarīradṛk //MU_6,46.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16739: sanātano 'ham avyaktaḥ pumān ity abhidhās tataḥ / karoty ātmani tenāsau prathamaḥ kathitaḥ pumān //MU_6,46.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16740: evaṃ sa sarge kasmiṃścit prathamo 'rthas sadāśivaḥ / kasmiṃścid viṣṇur ity ukto nābhyutpannapitāmahaḥ //MU_6,46.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16741: pitāmahas sa kasmiṃścit kasmiṃścid api cetaraḥ / sa ca saṅkalpapuruṣas saṅkalpān mūrtimān sthitaḥ //MU_6,46.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16742: puṣṭaḥ prathamasaṅkalpas tāṃ manomūrtim āsthitaḥ / yad yathā kalpayaty āśu tat tathānubhavaty alam //MU_6,46.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16743: tat tv asadrūpam akhilaṃ śūnye vetālako yathā / bhramadṛṣṭyā tu sadrūpam ity ahantājagadgatiḥ //MU_6,46.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16744: sraṣṭādipuruṣas tv evaṃ svayaṃ sampadyate hi yaḥ / sa nimeṣaṃ prati vyomni samudety atha līyate //MU_6,46.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16746: paramāṇau paramāṇau vyomni vyomni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe / sargakalpamahākalpabhāvābhāvā bhavanti hi //MU_6,46.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16747: dṛśyante kecid anyo'nyaṃ sādharmyaṃ vāsanāśataiḥ / mithaḥ kecin na dṛśyante kecit paśyanti netaram //MU_6,46.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16748: kecin nānyena dṛśyante dṛṣṭenāpy asadātmanā / sargās sargeṇa sarvatra sambhavanti na te śive //MU_6,46.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16749: bhavanti parame vyomni vyomarūpā iti svayam / svayaṃ ca sadasadrūpā līyante svapnaśailavat //MU_6,46.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16750: sargair na deśa ākrānto na ca kālo na kartṛtā / na caite satsvarūpā vā na kalpaṃ naiva ca kṣaṇam //MU_6,46.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16751: na cedaṃ jāyate kiñcin na ca kiñcana naśyati / svacamatkārarūpeṇa cic camatkurute citi //MU_6,46.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16752: svapnapattananirmāṇapātotpatanavaj jagat / na deśakālākramaṇaṃ karoti manasām api //MU_6,46.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16753: yathā saṅkalpaśailena deśakālādyanantakam / ākrāntam api nākrāntaṃ tathaiva jagatāsatā //MU_6,46.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16754: sampadyate yathādyo 'sau puruṣas sargakārakaḥ / anenaiva krameṇeha kīṭas sampadyate kṣaṇāt //MU_6,46.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16755: tasthuṣām evam eveha jātayo hi caturvidhāḥ / rudrādyās taruparyantās sampadyante kṣaṇaṃ prati //MU_6,46.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16756: paramāparamās santi tathā kecid aṇūpamāḥ / eṣa eva kramas teṣāṃ sati cāsati sargake //MU_6,46.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16757: asyās saṃsāramāyāyā evambhūtārthabhāvanāt / bhedopaśāntāv abhyāsād bhavaty upaśamaś śivaḥ //MU_6,46.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16758: nimeṣaśatabhāgārdhamātram eva parā citiḥ / svarūpataś cel luṭhitā tad eṣodety avasthitiḥ //MU_6,46.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16759: sā jñarūpā śilākośa iva cet svātmani sthitā / tad anādyavabhāsātmabrahmaśabdena gīyate //MU_6,46.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16760: asmin prauḍhiṃ gate sarge mahācic cetanaṃ navam / saṅgam āgatya digdeśakālāṃśaparamāṇunā //MU_6,46.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16762: yasmin nitye tate tantau dṛḍhe srag iva tiṣṭhati / sadasadgrathitaṃ viśvaṃ viśvāṅge viśvakarmaṇi //MU_6,46.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16763: na tad dūre na nikaṭe nordhve nādho na te na me / na pūrvaṃ nādya na prātar na san nāsan na madhyagam //MU_6,46.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16764: anubhavakalanād ṛte 'sya mātā bhavati na sarvavikalpaneṣu satsu / phaladuruvibhavā pramāṇamālā sthitim upayāti na vāriṇīva vahniḥ //MU_6,46.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16765: yathāpṛṣṭaṃ mune proktaṃ tvayi kalyāṇam astu te / deśaṃ prayāmo 'bhimatam āgacchottiṣṭha pārvati //MU_6,46.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16766: ity uktvā nīlakaṇṭho 'sau tyaktapuṣpāñjalau mayi / tatāra parivāreṇa samam ambarakoṭaram //MU_6,46.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16767: tasmin gate tribhuvanādhipatāv umeśe sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ tadanu saṃsmṛtipūrvam eva / aṅgīkṛtaṃ navapavitratayā mayātmadarbhāsanaṃ śramavateva mahāśrutaṃ tat //MU_6,46.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16770: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etad uktaṃ pareśena svayam eva ca vedmy aham / rāma tvam api jānīṣe yathedaṃ samavasthitam //MU_6,47.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16771: yatrālīkam alīkena kilālīkaṃ vilokyate / tasyāṃ saṃsāramāyāyāṃ kiṃ satyaṃ kim asanmayam //MU_6,47.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16772: yathā yena vikalpena yadvikalpena kalpyate / tathā tenātmakalpena na satāpy anubhūyate //MU_6,47.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16773: yathā dravatvaṃ payasi yathā spando nabhasvati / yathā nabhasi śūnyatvaṃ tathā sargatvam ātmani //MU_6,47.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16774: tataḥ prabhṛti tenaiva krameṇārcanam ātmanaḥ / adya yāvad gatavyagraḥ kurvann aham avasthitaḥ //MU_6,47.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16775: anenārcāvidhānena mayemā rāma vāsanāḥ / akhinnenātivāhyante vyavahāraparā api //MU_6,47.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16776: yathāprāptaiḥ kriyācārakusumair ātmano 'rcanam / vyucchinnam apy ucchinnaṃ me na kadācid aharniśam //MU_6,47.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16777: grāhyagrāhakasambandhe sāmānye sarvadehinām / yoginas sāvadhānatvaṃ yat tad arcanam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,47.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16778: dṛṣṭyānayā raghupate saṅgamuktena cetasā / saṃsāre vipulāraṇye viharāsmin na khidyase //MU_6,47.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16779: duḥkhe mahati samprāpte dhanabandhuviyogaje / etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya vicāraṃ kuru suvrata //MU_6,47.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16780: sukhaduḥkhe na kartavye dhanabandhūdayakṣayaiḥ / evamprāyā eva sarvā nityaṃ saṃsāradṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_6,47.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16781: jānāsīva gatīś citrā viṣayāṇāṃ pramāthinīḥ / yathā yānti yathāyānti yathā paribhavanti ca //MU_6,47.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16782: evam eva pravartante premāṇi ca dhanāni ca / evam evāvahīyante nimittair avicāritaiḥ //MU_6,47.13//
