GSP27moksop_u:16783: na tās tava na tāsāṃ tvaṃ nirmalas tvaṃ jagatkriyāḥ / idam itthaṃ jagat kiñcit kiṃ mudhā paritapyase //MU_6,47.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16784: tvam evāsi jagadrūpaṃ cinmātraṃ vitatākṛtiḥ / nijāvayavakāvṛttau kaḥ kramo harṣaśokayoḥ //MU_6,47.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16785: cidekatānatām etya sauṣuptīm āgatas sthitim / adyaprabhṛti rāma tvaṃ turyāvasthātmako bhava //MU_6,47.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16786: samas samasamābhāso bhāsvadvapur udāradhīḥ / tiṣṭhātmācārato nityaṃ paripūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ //MU_6,47.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16787: etat tvaṃ śrutavān sarvaṃ sthitas tvaṃ paripūrṇadhīḥ / yadīcchasītarat praṣṭuṃ tat pṛccha raghunandana //MU_6,47.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16788: brahmaṇo 'nantarūpasya kuto malam iti tvayā / yat pṛṣṭaṃ prathame kalpe tad adya paricodaya //MU_6,47.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16789: rāmaḥ: idānīṃ saṃśayo brahman vinivṛtto viśeṣataḥ / jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilaṃ jātā tṛptir akṛtrimā //MU_6,47.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16790: nātmano 'sti malaṃ dvitvaṃ na caikyaṃ na ca kalpanā / tadā mamābhūd ajñānaṃ praśāntam adhunā tu tat //MU_6,47.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16791: kalaṅka ātmano 'stīti mamājñānavaśena yā / āsīd bhrāntir idānīṃ sā nivṛttā tvatprasādataḥ //MU_6,47.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16792: na jāyate na mriyate na caivātmā kalaṅkitaḥ / sarvaṃ ca brahmamayam ity uditaḥ khalu cāsmy aham //MU_6,47.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16793: praśnebhyas saṃśayebhyaś ca vāñchitebhyaś ca sarvataḥ / śuddhaṃ me nirgataṃ cetas tvaṣṭā yantrabhramād iva //MU_6,47.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16794: sarvasāropadeśeṣu prāyaḥ prokteṣu sādhubhiḥ / nirākāṅkṣas sthito 'smy antas sumeruḥ kanakeṣv iva //MU_6,47.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16795: na tad asty asti yatrāśā na tad asti yad īpsitam / na tad asti yad ādeyaṃ heyaṃ madhyaṃ ca vā mama //MU_6,47.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16796: idaṃ heyam upādeyam idaṃ sad idam apy asat / iti cintābhramaś śānto nipuṇaṃ paramo mune //MU_6,47.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16797: na svargam abhivāñchāmi dveṣmi vā na ca rauravam / ātmany eva hi tiṣṭhāmi mandarādrir ivābhramaḥ //MU_6,47.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16799: avastv idam idaṃ vastu yasyeti kalanāmalam / hṛdi tasya kusandehajālikā jvalitādhikam //MU_6,47.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16800: idam itthaṃ jagad iti jñātaṃ yena munīśvara / sa yatra yāti kārpaṇyaṃ jagatas tan na labhyate //MU_6,47.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16801: vicitrākulakallolāj jaḍāvṛttivivartitāt / tvatprasādena bhagavaṃs tīrṇās smo bhavasāgarāt //MU_6,47.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16802: sampadām avadhir jñāto dṛṣṭas sīmānta āpadām / sarvasāreṣv adīnās smaḥ pūrṇās smaḥ parameśvarāḥ //MU_6,47.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16803: parām abhedyām aparair dalitāśāmataṅgajām / saṃsārasamare samyag dhīratām āgataṃ manaḥ //MU_6,47.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16804: parigalitavikalpatām upetaṃ pragalitavāñcham adīnasārasattvam / trijagati jayati prasiddharūpaṃ pramuditam antar anuttaraṃ mano me //MU_6,47.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16807: vasiṣṭhaḥ: kevalenendriyais sārdhaṃ vartamānārthavartinā / asaṅgamena manasā yat karoṣi na tat kṛtam //MU_6,48.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16808: yathā prāptikṣaṇe vastu prathamaṃ tuṣṭaye tathā / na prāptyekakṣaṇād ūrdhvam iti ko nānubhūtavān //MU_6,48.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16809: vāñchākāle yathā vastu tuṣṭaye nānyadā tathā / tasmāt kṣaṇasukhe tuṣṭiṃ bālo badhnāti netaraḥ //MU_6,48.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16810: vāñchākṣaṇe tuṣṭaye yat tatra vāñchaiva kāraṇam / tuṣṭis tv atuṣṭiparyantā tasmād vāñchāṃ parityaja //MU_6,48.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16811: yadi tat padam āpnoṣi kadācit kālaparyayāt / tad ahambhāvanārūpe na maṅktavyaṃ tvayā punaḥ //MU_6,48.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16812: ātmajñānācalasyāgre rāma viśrāntavān asi / ahambhāvamahāśvabhre na punaḥ pātam arhasi //MU_6,48.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16814: dṛśyate te svabhāvo 'yaṃ samatāsatyatāmayaḥ / manye kṣīṇavikalpo 'si jāto 'si gatakālikaḥ //MU_6,48.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16815: svabhāvo 'yaṃ sthiro rāma ity āvedayatīva me / somya pūrṇārṇavaprakhyā samatā nirmalā tava //MU_6,48.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16816: āśā yātu nirāśatvam abhāvaṃ yātu bhāvanā / amanastvaṃ mano yātu tavāsaṅgena jīvataḥ //MU_6,48.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16817: yāṃ yāṃ vastudṛśaṃ yāsi tasyāṃ tasyām avasthitam / sattāsāmānyarūpeṇa brahmabṛṃhitacidghanam //MU_6,48.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16818: ajñātātmā nibaddho 'si vijñātātmā na badhyase / rāma tvaṃ svātmanātmānaṃ bodhayasva balād ataḥ //MU_6,48.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16819: yatra na svadate vastu svadate ca yathāgatam / avāsanatvaṃ tad viddhi sāmyam ākāśakomalam //MU_6,48.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16820: vāsanārahitair antar indriyair āharan kriyāḥ / na vikriyām avāpnoṣi khavat kṣobhaśatair api //MU_6,48.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16821: jñātā jñānaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ trayam ekatayātmani / śāntātmānubhavan bhavya na bhūyobhavabhāg asi //MU_6,48.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16822: cittonmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ saṃsārapralayodayau / vāsanāprāṇasaṃrodhād anunmeṣaṃ manaḥ kuru //MU_6,48.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16823: prāṇonmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ saṃsṛteḥ pralayodayau / tam abhyāsaprayogābhyām unmeṣarahitaṃ kuru //MU_6,48.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16824: maurkhyonmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ karmaṇāṃ pralayodayau / tad vilīnaṃ kuru balād guruśāstrārthasaṅgamaiḥ //MU_6,48.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16825: yathā vātarajassaṅgaspandāt stambhābhravedanam / tathā citā cetyatayā spandād idam upasthitam //MU_6,48.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16826: dṛśyadarśanasambandhaspandajeyaṃ jagadgatiḥ / sphuraty ālokakuḍyādisaṅgajā varṇadhīr iva //MU_6,48.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16827: dṛśyadarśanasambandhaspandābhāve na jāyate / vedanā bhavadābhāsā citrapuṃsām ivāśaye //MU_6,48.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16828: cittaspandotthitā māyā tadabhāve vilīyate / payasspandotthitā vīcis tadabhāvena śāmyati //MU_6,48.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16829: tyāgato vāsanāṃśasya bodhād vā prāṇarodhanāt / citte nisspandatāṃ yāte kutas spandasya sambhavaḥ //MU_6,48.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16830: asaṃvitspandamātreṇa yāti cittam acittatām / prāṇānāṃ vā nirodhena tad eva ca paraṃ padam //MU_6,48.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16831: dṛśyadarśanasambandhe yat sukhaṃ pāramātmikam / tadantaikāntasaṃvittyā brahmadṛṣṭyā manaḥkṣayaḥ //MU_6,48.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16832: yatra nābhyuditaṃ cittaṃ tat tat sukham akṛtrimam / na svargādau sambhavati marau himagṛhaṃ yathā //MU_6,48.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16833: cittopaśamajaṃ sphāram avācyaṃ vacasāṃ sukham / kṣayātiśayanirmuktaṃ nodeti na ca śāmyati //MU_6,48.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16834: bodhād bhavati cittānto nirbodhāc cittatoditā / bālavetālavat tena mohaśrīr ghanatāṃ gatā //MU_6,48.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16835: vidyamānam api hy etac cittaṃ bodhād vilīyate / sad apy asad ivābhāti tāmraṃ hemīkṛtaṃ yathā //MU_6,48.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16836: jñasya cittaṃ na cittākhyaṃ jñacittaṃ sattvam ucyate / nāmārthānyatvabhāk cittaṃ bodhāt tāmrasuvarṇavat //MU_6,48.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16837: na sambhavati cittatvaṃ tena tat pravilīyate / bhramaś śāmyati bodhena nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ //MU_6,48.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16838: avastv etad vikalpātma cittādi śaśaśṛṅgavat / sarvatvād ātmanas tasmāt tad vibodhād vilīyate //MU_6,48.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16839: cittaṃ sattvaṃ samāyātaṃ kañcit kālaṃ jagatsthitau / vihṛtya turyāvasthāyāṃ turyātītaṃ bhavaty ataḥ //MU_6,48.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16840: brahmaiva bhūribhuvanabhramavibhramaughair itthaṃ sthitaṃ samam anekatayaikam eva / sarvātma sambhavati netarad aṅga kiñcic caittādi kāñcanahṛdīva hi sanniveśaḥ //MU_6,48.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16843: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atremām avabodhāya vismayotphullakāriṇīm / apūrvām eva saṅkṣepād rāma ramyāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,49.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16844: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi vipulaṃ vimalaṃ sphuṭam / yugair apy ajaradrūpam asti bilvaphalaṃ mahat //MU_6,49.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16847: yojanāyutakoṭīnāṃ koṭilakṣaśatair api / vaipulyenāparicchedyaṃ phalam ādyaṃ jagatsthiteḥ //MU_6,49.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16848: asya bilvaphalasyoccair brahmāṇḍāni samīpataḥ / haranti līlāṃ śaile 'dho rājikākaṇapaddhateḥ //MU_6,49.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16849: syandamānarasāpūrāṃ svādvīṃ rasacamatkṛtim / yasyātiśete no kaścid api rāghava ṣaḍrasaḥ //MU_6,49.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16850: na kadācana pākena pātāntena sameti yat / sadaiva pakvam apy aṅga jarasā yan na bādhyate //MU_6,49.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16851: brahmaviṣṇvindrarudrādyā jaraḍhāḥ kecid eva no / yasyotpattiṃ vijānanti mūlaṃ vā vṛkṣam eva vā //MU_6,49.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16852: adṛṣṭāṅkuravṛkṣasya tv adṛṣṭakusumodgateḥ / astambhamūlaśākhasya phalam evāvalokyate //MU_6,49.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16854: samastaphalasārasya phalasyāsya mahākṛteḥ / majjāntar asti vitato nirvikāro rasāntaraḥ //MU_6,49.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16855: śilāntar iva nīrandhras syandamānendubimbavat / rasaṃ svasaṃvidāsvādyaṃ syandamāna ṛtāmṛtam //MU_6,49.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16856: sekas sakalasaukhyānāṃ śītalālokakārakaḥ / śailābho 'mṛtapiṇḍābho maṇḍa ātmaphalasthiteḥ //MU_6,49.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16857: tasmāt paramamajjā tu yāsau svādvī camatkṛtiḥ / antar akṣubhitā nityam ananyā śrīphalāṅgataḥ //MU_6,49.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16858: svasanniveśavaicitryam ananyatvaphalāṅgakam / atyajantyā tayā tanvyā sthūlayāpy atibālayā //MU_6,49.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16859: iyam asmīti kalanād asatsadanyatāmalam / bhedādy asambhavad idaṃ svayam utpādya bhāvitam //MU_6,49.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16861: ity anukramato yātā sā saṃvicchaktirūpatām / majjā prāksanniveśaṃ svaṃ tam evāpy asamujjhatī //MU_6,49.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16862: saṃvicchaktyā tayā tatra tatas taralarūpayā / nija eva pare rūpe dṛg itthaṃ samprasāritā //MU_6,49.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16863: idaṃ vyomamahānantam iyaṃ kālamahākalā / iyaṃ niyatir udyuktā kriyeyaṃ spandadharmiṇī //MU_6,49.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16864: ayaṃ saṅkalpavistāras tv ayam āśābharabhramaḥ / rāgadveṣasthitir iyaṃ heyopādeyadhīr iyam //MU_6,49.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16865: iyaṃ tvattā tv iyaṃ mattā tatteyaṃ saṃsthitis tv iyam / brahmāṇḍaugho 'yam ūrdhvasthas tv ayam agre 'yam apy adhaḥ //MU_6,49.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16866: ayaṃ puraḥ pārśvato 'yaṃ paścād ārād davīyasi / idaṃ bhūtaṃ vartamānaṃ bhaviṣyat tv idam ity api //MU_6,49.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16872: iyaṃ ca tārākiñjalkā brahmāṇḍakataṭasthitā / apārāpāraparyantā vyomanīlasarojinī //MU_6,49.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16874: iyaṃ tamobhramariṇī kṣaṇakalpādipallavā / tejaḥkesariṇī kālanalinī vyomapaṅkajā //MU_6,49.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16875: imā bhāvavikārāḍhyā jarāmṛtiviṣūcikāḥ / vidyāvidyāvikārāḍhyā imāś śāstrārthadṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_6,49.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16876: iti sā tasya bilvasya nijā majjācamatkṛtiḥ / svakalpasanniveśāntar evaivaṃkṛtasaṃsthitiḥ //MU_6,49.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16877: śāntā svasthā nirābādhā somyetaratayojjhitā / kartṛtvam apy akartṛtvaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvaiva saṃsthitā //MU_6,49.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16878: ekaikikaiva vividheva vibhāvyamānā naikātmikā na vividhā nanu saiva saiva / satyāsthitā sakalaśāntisamaikarūpā sarvātmikātimahatī citir eva śaktiḥ //MU_6,49.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16881: rāmaḥ: bhagavan sarvadharmajña tvayaiṣā bilvarūpiṇī / mahācidghanasatteti kathiteti matir mama //MU_6,50.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16882: cinmajjarūpam akhilam ahantādīdam ātatam / na manāg api bhedo 'sti dvaitaikyakalanātmakaḥ //MU_6,50.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16883: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yathā brahmāṇḍakūṣmāṇḍamajjā mervādisaṃsthitiḥ / tathā cidbilvamajjeyaṃ brahmāṇḍādyā jagatsthitiḥ //MU_6,50.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16884: sṛṣṭiś cidbilvamajjasya jagadākhyā camatkṛtiḥ / sthitā suṣuptasomyāntas śilāntas sanniveśavat //MU_6,50.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16885: atremām induvadana citrāṃ vismayakāriṇīm / varṇyamānāṃ mayā ramyām anyām ākhyāyikāṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,50.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16886: snigdhā spaṣṭā mṛdusparśā mahāvistāraśālinī / nibiḍā nityanīrandhrā kvacid asti mahāśilā //MU_6,50.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16887: tasyām antaḥ praphultāni padmāni subahūny api / karṇikājātamūlāni mūlāntaḥkarṇikāni ca / ūrdhvamūlāny adhomūlāny amūlānītarāṇi ca //MU_6,50.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16888: teṣāṃ ca nikaṭe santi śaṅkhāś śatasahasraśaḥ / cakraughāś ca mahākārāḥ padmavat sanniveśinaḥ //MU_6,50.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16889: rāmaḥ: satyam etan mayā dṛṣṭā tādṛśī sā mahāśilā / sāligrāme harer dhāmni vidyate parivāriṇī //MU_6,50.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16890: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evam etad vijānāsi dṛṣṭavān asi tāś śilāḥ / yo yaś ca tatra pāṣāṇas sa sarvas tādṛgantaraḥ //MU_6,50.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16891: mayā tv iyam apūrvaiva śileyaṃ varṇyate tava / yasyām antar mahākukṣau sarvam asti ca nāsti ca //MU_6,50.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16892: cicchilaiṣā mayoktā te yasyām antar jaganti khe / ghanatvaikātmakatvādivaśād eṣā śileva cit //MU_6,50.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16893: apy atyantaghanāṅgāyā anīrandhrākṛter api / vidyate 'ntaḥ paraṃ brahma vyomnīva vipulānilaḥ //MU_6,50.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16894: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ / santi tasyāṃ śilā sā ca suṣirā na manāg api //MU_6,50.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16895: asyām ekaghanāṅgātma jagatpadmaṃ vijṛmbhate / etasmād vastuno nānyad anyac ca dvyātmakaṃ ca vā //MU_6,50.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16896: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac cicchilāyāṃ sālabhañjikā / tathāsti tatra tat sarvaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vastuno yathā //MU_6,50.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16897: upalāntas sanniveśo nānātmāpy ekapiṇḍatām / yathā dhatte tathaiṣā cit piṇḍākāraikikā ghanā //MU_6,50.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16898: yathā padmaś śilākośād abhinno 'pi vapurmayaḥ / tathā sargaś cito rūpād abhinno 'pi vapurmayaḥ //MU_6,50.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16899: suṣuptāvasthayā cakrapadmalekhāś śilodare / yathā sthitāś citer antas tatheyaṃ jagadāvalī //MU_6,50.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16900: śilāntaḥ padmalekhālī maricāntaś camatkṛtiḥ / nodeti nāstam āyāti yathā sargas tathā citau //MU_6,50.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16901: yathāparandhro 'nanyo 'ntarmajjā bilve nirantaraḥ / tathā labhyavikārāḍhyā citau brahmāṇḍamaṇḍalī //MU_6,50.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16902: vikārādi tad eveti buddhaivoktir anarthikā / tattāṃ samupayāty āśu jalabindur ivāmbhasi //MU_6,50.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16903: anantatvāc citer etad vikārādi citer iti / uktyā sampadyate tac ca tallayena vilīyate //MU_6,50.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16905: brahmasthiti vikārādi brahmaivotpāditaṃ kramāt / atrānyārthavidaṃ viddhi mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasā samām //MU_6,50.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16906: bījaṃ puṣpaphalāntassthaṃ bījāntaṃ nānyatātmakam / tādṛśī bījasattā sā bhavitrī yā tathottaram //MU_6,50.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16907: cidghane cidghanatvaṃ yat sa eva trijagatkramaḥ / ekatvam anayor dvitvam ekābhāve dvayoḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,50.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16908: jagad anyagbhavotpatti na kadācid anīdṛśam / cid acin na kadācin na dvayam etan mitho dvayam //MU_6,50.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16909: mahāśilāntare 'bhedye lekhātmāsti yathā bahu / tadanyānanyamajjādi cidghane trijagadgatiḥ //MU_6,50.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16910: yathā śilāntar lekhādi bhidyate na śilāṅgataḥ / tatsāratvāt tathā mantṛkartṛtvādi jagac citeḥ //MU_6,50.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16911: yathā śilāntar abjānāṃ spandāspandabhavābhavāḥ / viṣayatvaṃ na gacchanti kartāro jagatas tathā //MU_6,50.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16912: nedaṃ kadācit kriyate na kadācana naśyati / adrivan nyagbhavollāsavilāsāvedanātmakam //MU_6,50.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16913: yathā yatra yadākāraṃ tathā tatra tad eva hi / brahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvaṃ suṣuptastham avasthitam //MU_6,50.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16914: bhūribhāvavikārāḍhyo yo 'yaṃ jagadurubhramaḥ / suṣuptam eva tad viddhi śilāntaḥ paṅkajādivat //MU_6,50.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16915: nityaṃ suṣuptapadam eva jagadvilāsas somya praśāntasamacidghanakhātmakatvāt / padmāś śilāta iva sargadaśās svasārād dṛṣṭyā na bhedam upayānti kayācid eva //MU_6,50.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16918: vasiṣṭhaḥ: cittattvasya phalasyeva citras somyo 'py anukramāt / svasattāsanniveśo 'ntar yas sa sarga iti sthitaḥ //MU_6,51.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16919: deśakālakriyādīnām ati tanmayarūpataḥ / idam anyad idaṃ cānyad iti nātropapadyate //MU_6,51.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16920: samastaśabdaśabdārthavāsanākalpanāvidām / ekātmatvād anyathedam iti saṅkathyate katham //MU_6,51.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16922: anānaivāpi nāneva kṣubdhevākṣubhitaiva ca / yathā phalāntas svā sattā cidantaś ciccayas tathā //MU_6,51.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16923: jagannagaram ādarśe citīva pratibimbitam / kacatīvākacad api śilāntas sanniveśavat //MU_6,51.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16924: parame cinmaṇau santi jagatkoṭiśatāny api / cintāmaṇāv anantāni phalānīvārthitāny alam //MU_6,51.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16925: citsamudgaka evedaṃ tadaṅgotkīrṇam ātatam / jaganmauktikam ābhāti tadaṃśumayam anyavat //MU_6,51.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16926: ahorātrān viracayan vedanāvedanāny ayam / cidādityas sthito bhāsvāñ jagaddravyāṇi darśayan //MU_6,51.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16927: samudrakoṭarāvartapayasspandavilāsavat / na vyaktaṃ nānabhivyaktaṃ trijagad vartate citi //MU_6,51.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16928: śilāntarghanaśuddhaikacitsāravapur ātmavān / somyo vyavaharann eva tiṣṭhaty upalakośavat //MU_6,51.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16929: avibhāgaghanaspandā śilāntas sanniveśavat / anānaiva ca nānā cic chilāntas sanniveśavat //MU_6,51.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16930: yad asti tac citi śilāśarīre sālabhañjikā / yan nāsti tac citi śilāśarīre sālabhañjikā //MU_6,51.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16931: bhāvābhāveṣu yat satyaṃ cinmajjaujjvalyam eva tat / majjasārā padārthaśrīs tanmayaṃ syāt tad eva hi //MU_6,51.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16932: padmaṃ nānādiśabdārthāṃs tyaktvā yadvac chilodaram / nānā tadvad idaṃ nānā tadatanmayam advayam //MU_6,51.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16933: nānāpy ekatayānānā ghanaḍimbaśilodaram / yathā tad avibhāgātma tathedaṃ cidghanāntaram //MU_6,51.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16934: yathāmalaḥ payaḥkośas talaviśrāntabhānubhāḥ / sann evāsann ivaivaṃ cinnaibiḍyaṃ sad asat tv iva //MU_6,51.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16935: yathā somyapayorāśikoṭaraṃ kalanonmukham / dravatvāt spandy athāspandaṃ tathedaṃ cidghanāntaram //MU_6,51.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16936: cicchilāśaṅkhapadmaughas tanmayaś cāpy atanmayaḥ / jagad viddhi sapadmādiśabdārthaṃ cicchilāntaram //MU_6,51.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16937: mahāśilāghano 'py eṣa cidghanas suṣirodaraḥ / arandhro 'ntaś cādvayo 'ccho jalāntas sanniveśavat //MU_6,51.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16938: patatīdaṃ jagadbrahma somyam ambha iva druteḥ //MU_6,51.21//
GSP27moksop_u:16939: brahmaṇīdaṃ suṣuptābham asty ananyac chilābjavat / majjabilvam iva brahma jagad brahmaiva vāmalam //MU_6,51.22//
GSP27moksop_u:16940: yathā śūnyatvam ākāśe dravatvaṃ cāmbhasi sthitam / spandatvaṃ ca yathā vāyau brahmaṇīdaṃ tathā jagat //MU_6,51.23//
GSP27moksop_u:16941: brahmatvaṃ brahmaṇi yathā tathaivedaṃ jagat sthitam / nānayor vidyate bhedas tarupādapayor iva //MU_6,51.24//
GSP27moksop_u:16942: yāny etāni jagantīha tāny antrāṇi cidākṛteḥ / bhāvābhāvādi nāsty eṣāṃ tasyā iva kadācana //MU_6,51.25//
GSP27moksop_u:16943: brahmaiva jagadābhāsaṃ marutāpo yathā jalam / brahmaivālokanāc chuddhaṃ bhavaty ambu yathātapaḥ //MU_6,51.26//
GSP27moksop_u:16944: mervādes tṛṇagulmādeś cittāder jagato 'pi ca / paramāṇuvibhāgena yad rūpaṃ tat paraṃ viduḥ //MU_6,51.27//
GSP27moksop_u:16945: tatsamūhas tad evoccaiś cittamerutṛṇādikam / yat saukṣmye 'pi hi sārātma sthaulye sārataraṃ hi tat //MU_6,51.28//
GSP27moksop_u:16946: yathā rasātmikā śaktiḥ paramāṇutayā tayā / sthitā jagatpadārtheṣu pāyasī brahmatā tathā //MU_6,51.29//
GSP27moksop_u:16947: rasaśaktir yathodeti tṛṇagulmatayāmbhasaḥ / tathā nānātayodeti saivāseveha brahmatā //MU_6,51.30//
GSP27moksop_u:16948: yaiṣā rūpavilāsānām ālokaparamāṇutā / guṇaguṇyarthasattvātmarūpiṇī sā parātmatā //MU_6,51.31//
GSP27moksop_u:16949: cititattve 'sti śailādi tadabhivyañjanātmani / piñchapakṣaughakāṭhinyaṃ mayūrāṇḍarase yathā //MU_6,51.32//
GSP27moksop_u:16950: cititattve 'sti nānātā tadabhivyañjanātmani / vicitrapiñchikāpuñjo mayūrāṇḍarase yathā //MU_6,51.33//
GSP27moksop_u:16951: nānānānātmike hy evaṃ yathāṇḍarasabarhite / vivekadṛṣṭyā dṛśyete tathā brahmajagatsthitī //MU_6,51.34//
GSP27moksop_u:16952: sanānāto 'py anānāto yathāṇḍarasabarhiṇaḥ / advaitadvaitasattātmā tathā brahmajagadbhramaḥ //MU_6,51.35//
GSP27moksop_u:16953: yatas sadasatos sattā sattvatāyā yatas sthitiḥ / yatas tadatado rūpaṃ bhāvaṃ svaṃ viddhi tat param //MU_6,51.36//
GSP27moksop_u:16954: nānānānātvam avidan nanu nūnam asambhavam / cijjagajjvalanaṃ paśya barhyaṇḍarasabarhivat //MU_6,51.37//
GSP27moksop_u:16955: yathā jagati cittattvaṃ cittattve ca jagat tathā / nānānānātma caikaṃ ca mayūrāṇḍaraso yathā //MU_6,51.38//
GSP27moksop_u:16956: nānāpadārthabhramapiñchapūrṇo jaganmayūrāṇḍarasaś cidātmā / mayūrarūpaṃ tv amayūram atra sattāpadaṃ viddhi kuto 'sti bhedaḥ //MU_6,51.39//
GSP27moksop_u:16959: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yatrānuditarūpātma sarvam astīdam ātatam / mayūra iva bījāntas tad ahantvam agādi ca //MU_6,52.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16960: tatra nābhyuditaṃ kiñcit tatra sarvaṃ ca vidyate / tad avācyaṃ girāṃ svargasukhasāre na vidyate //MU_6,52.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16961: tathā ca munayo devā gaṇās siddhā maharṣayaḥ / āsvādayantas svaṃ rūpaṃ sadā tūryapade sthitāḥ //MU_6,52.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16962: ete ye stabdhanayanadṛṣṭayo nirnimeṣiṇaḥ / te dṛśyadarśanāsaṅgaspandatyāge vyavasthitāḥ //MU_6,52.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16963: na sthitā bhāvanā yeṣāṃ sthitānām api karmasu / saṃvitsaṃvedyasambandhaspandatyāge ca ye sthitāḥ //MU_6,52.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16964: prāṇo na spandate teṣāṃ citrasthavapuṣām iva / cittacaittasamāsaṅgatyāge te svapade sthitāḥ //MU_6,52.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16965: spandāt saṃsādhayanty arthaṃ senās seneśvaraṃ yathā / tathaiva cittacaittāni spandāt kurvanti saṃsṛtim //MU_6,52.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16966: yathāhlādayati svacchaḥ pallavaṃ raśmir aindavaḥ / tathātmāhlādayaty antar dṛśyadarśanasaṅgame //MU_6,52.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16967: bimbād dūraṃ prayātasya bhittāv apatitasya ca / yad indos tejaso rūpaṃ tad rūpaṃ śuddhasaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,52.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16968: na dṛśyaṃ nopadeśārhaṃ nābhyāśe na ca dūrataḥ / kevalānubhavaprāpyaṃ tad rūpaṃ śuddham ātmanaḥ //MU_6,52.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16969: na deho nendriyagaṇo na cittaṃ na ca vāsanā / na jīvo nāpi ca spando na saṃvittir na caiva kham //MU_6,52.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16970: na san nāsan na madhyasthaṃ śūnyāśūnye na caiva ha / na deśakālavastvādi sa evāsti na cetarat //MU_6,52.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16971: etais sarvair vinirmuktaṃ hṛdi kośagate 'pi ca / yatraitat spandate 'dṛśyaṃ tat tad ātmapadaṃ bhavet //MU_6,52.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16972: tac ca nādya na kalpānte na śastrāgnyanilādibhiḥ / neha nāmutra sadrūpād anyathā bhavati kvacit //MU_6,52.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16973: jāyante ca mriyante ca dehakumbhās sahasraśaḥ / sabāhyābhyantarasyāsya nātmākāśasya khaṇḍanā //MU_6,52.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16974: tac ca dehādi sakalam ātmaivātmavidāṃ vara / kevalaṃ bodhavairūpyād īṣat pṛthag avasthitam //MU_6,52.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16975: viṣvag ātmamayaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhvā buddhyā svasiddhayā / prajvalann api kāryeṣu nirvāṇo nirmamo bhava //MU_6,52.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16976: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam / tat sarvaṃ brahma nirdharma nirguṇaṃ nirmamātmakam //MU_6,52.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16977: nityavyapetāvayavam ekam ekāntanirmalam / nirvikāram anādyantaṃ nityaṃ śāntaṃ samātmakam //MU_6,52.19//
GSP27moksop_u:16978: kālakriyākaraṇakāraṇakartṛkāryajanmasthitipralayasaṃsaraṇādi sarvam / brahmeti dṛṣṭavata eva tavātmadṛṣṭyā bhūyo 'pi kiṃ bhramaṇam aṅga sasaṅgam eva //MU_6,52.20//
GSP27moksop_u:16981: rāmaḥ: yadi nāsti vikārādi brahman brahmaṇi bṛṃhite / tad idaṃ katham ābhāti bhāvābhāvamayaṃ jagat //MU_6,53.1//
GSP27moksop_u:16982: vasiṣṭhaḥ: apunaḥprāgavasthānaṃ yat svarūpaviparyayaḥ / tad vikārādi kathitaṃ yat kṣīrādiṣu vidyate //MU_6,53.2//
GSP27moksop_u:16983: payastāṃ punar abhyeti dadhitvān na punaḥ payaḥ / buddham ādyantamadhyeṣu brahma brahmaiva nirmalam //MU_6,53.3//
GSP27moksop_u:16984: kṣīrāder iva tenāsti brahmaṇo na vikāritā / anādyantāvikārasya na caivāvayavikramaḥ //MU_6,53.4//
GSP27moksop_u:16985: samasyādyantayor yeyaṃ dṛśyate vikṛtiḥ kṣaṇam / saṃvidas taṃ bhramaṃ viddhi nāvikāre 'sti vikriyā //MU_6,53.5//
GSP27moksop_u:16986: saṃvedye sati saṃvittis tan na brahmaṇi vidyate / tad brahmaśabdakathitaṃ nissaṃvedyaṃ cidātma yat //MU_6,53.6//
GSP27moksop_u:16987: yādṛg ādyantayor vastu tādṛg eva tad ucyate / madhye tasya yad anyatvaṃ tad abodhavijṛmbhitam //MU_6,53.7//
GSP27moksop_u:16988: ātmā tv ādyantamadhyeṣu samas sarvatra sarvadā / kham apy anyatvam āyāti nātmatattvaṃ kadācana //MU_6,53.8//
GSP27moksop_u:16989: bhārūpatvāt tadekatvān nityatvāc cāyam īśvaraḥ / vaśaṃ bhāvavikārāṇāṃ na kadācana gacchati //MU_6,53.9//
GSP27moksop_u:16990: rāmaḥ: vidyamāne sadaikasmin brahmaṇy ekāntanirmale / saṃvidbhramasvarūpāyā avidyāyāḥ ka āgamaḥ //MU_6,53.10//
GSP27moksop_u:16991: vasiṣṭhaḥ: brahmatattvam idaṃ sarvam āsīd asti bhaviṣyati / nirvikāram anādyantaṃ nāvidyāstīti niścayaḥ //MU_6,53.11//
GSP27moksop_u:16992: yas tu brahmeti śabdena vācyavācakayoḥ kramaḥ / tatrāpi nānyatābhāva upadeṣṭuṃ kṛto hy asau //MU_6,53.12//
GSP27moksop_u:16993: tvam ahaṃ jagad āśāś ca bhūḥ kham agnyanilādi ca / brahmamātram anādyantaṃ nāvidyāsti manāg api //MU_6,53.13//
GSP27moksop_u:16994: nāmaivedam avidyeti bhramamātram asad viduḥ / na vidyate yā tasyā hi kīdṛṅ nāma bhaviṣyati //MU_6,53.14//
GSP27moksop_u:16995: rāmaḥ: upadeśaprakaraṇe hyaḥ kim etat tvayoditam / avidyeyaṃ tathetthaṃ ca nirdhāryata iti prabho //MU_6,53.15//
GSP27moksop_u:16996: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etāvantam abuddhas tvam abhūḥ kālaṃ raghūdvaha / kalpitābhiḥ kilaitābhir bodhito 'si suyuktibhiḥ //MU_6,53.16//
GSP27moksop_u:16997: avidyeyam ayaṃ jīva ityādikalanākramaḥ / aprabuddhaprabodhāya kalpito vāgvidāṃ varaiḥ //MU_6,53.17//
GSP27moksop_u:16998: aprabuddhaṃ mano yāvat tāvad eva bhramaṃ vinā / na prabodham upāyāti tāvad varṣaśatair api //MU_6,53.18//
GSP27moksop_u:16999: yuktyaiva bodhayitvaiṣa jīva ātmani yojyate / yad yuktyā sādhyate kāryaṃ na tad yatnaśatair api //MU_6,53.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17000: sarvaṃ brahmeti yo brūyād aprabuddhasya durmatiḥ / sa karoti suhṛdbhrāntyā sthāṇau duḥkhanivedanam //MU_6,53.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17001: yuktyā prabodhyate mūḍhaḥ prājñas tattvena bodhyate / mūḍhaḥ prājñatvam āyāti na yuktyā bodhanaṃ vinā //MU_6,53.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17002: etāvantam abuddhas tvaṃ kālaṃ yuktyā prabodhitaḥ / idānīṃ samprabuddho 'si tattvenaivāvabodhyase //MU_6,53.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17003: brahmāhaṃ trijagad brahma brahma tvaṃ brahma dṛśyabhūḥ / dvitīyā kalpanā nāsti yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_6,53.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17004: asaṃvedyamahāsaṃvitkoṭimātraṃ jagattrayaṃ / evaṃ pratyayavān antaḥ kurvann api na lipyase //MU_6,53.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17005: bhārūpaś cetano vyāpī paramātmāham ity alam / rāghavānubhavāntas tvaṃ tiṣṭhan gacchan svapañ śvasan //MU_6,53.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17006: nirmamo nirahaṅkāro buddhimān asi rāma cet / tad brahmavedanaṃ śāntaṃ sarvabhūtasthitaṃ bhava //MU_6,53.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17007: tad anādyantam ābhāsi sattvam eva paraṃ padam / sthito 'si sarvagaikātmā śuddhasaṃvinmayātmakaḥ //MU_6,53.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17008: yad brahmātmā vibhur yaś ca yāvidyā prakṛtiś ca yā / tad abhinnaṃ sadaikātma yathā kumbhaśateṣu mṛt //MU_6,53.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17009: nātmanaḥ prakṛtir bhinnā ghaṭān mṛṇmayatā yathā / spandamātraṃ yathā vāyur ātmaiva prakṛtis tathā //MU_6,53.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17010: āvartas salilasyeva yas spandas svayam ātmanaḥ / proktaḥ prakṛtiśabdena tenaiveha sa eva hi //MU_6,53.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17011: yathaikaṃ spandapavanau nāmnā bhinnau na sattayā / tathaikam ātmaprakṛtī nāmnā bhinne na sattayā //MU_6,53.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17012: abodhād etayor bhedo bodhenaiva vilīyate / abodho 'sanmayo bhrāntī rajjvāṃ sarpabhramo yathā //MU_6,53.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17013: cidbhūmau kalanābījaṃ yad etat patati sphurat / cittāṅkura udety asmād bhāvisaṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ //MU_6,53.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17014: etad evātmavijñānadagdhaṃ sadvāsanājalaiḥ / saṃsiktam api yatnena na bhavaty aṅkurakṣamam //MU_6,53.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17015: no cet patati citkṣetre kalanābījakaṃ tataḥ / cittāṅkurā na jāyante sukhaduḥkhaphaladrumāḥ //MU_6,53.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17016: dvitvaṃ jagaty asadupāttam abodhajātaṃ bodhakṣayaṃ jahihi bodham upāgato 'si / ātmaikabhāvavibhavena bhavābhayātmā nāsty eva duḥkham iti naḥ paramārthasāraḥ //MU_6,53.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17019: rāmaḥ: jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam akṣatam / pareṇa paripūrṇās smo brahmañ jñānāmṛtena te //MU_6,54.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17020: pūrṇātmakam idaṃ pūrṇaṃ pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prapūryate / pūrṇena pūritaṃ pūrṇaṃ sthitā pūrṇaiva pūrṇatā //MU_6,54.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17021: līlayedaṃ tu pṛcchāmi bhūyo bodhābhivṛddhaye / bālasyeva pitā brahman na roṣaṃ kartum arhasi //MU_6,54.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17022: śrotraṃ cakṣus sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca / vidyamānam api brahman dṛśyamānam api sphuṭam //MU_6,54.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17023: kathaṃ mṛtasyaiva jantor viṣayaṃ svaṃ na paśyati / jīvataś ca kathaṃ sarvaṃ viṣayaṃ svaṃ prapaśyati //MU_6,54.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17024: kathaṃ ghaṭādi bāhyastham indriyāṇi jaḍāny api / śarīre 'nubhavanty antaḥ punar nānubhavanty api //MU_6,54.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17025: ayaśśalākopamayor ghaṭādīndriyayoḥ kila / aśliṣṭayor nīrasayoḥ kathaṃ sattoditā mithaḥ //MU_6,54.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17026: jānann api yad etat tvāṃ viśeṣāśaṅkayā punaḥ / pṛcchāmi tad aśeṣeṇa kathayāśv anukampayā //MU_6,54.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17027: vasiṣṭhaḥ: indriyāṇy api cittādi ghaṭādy api na kiñcana / pṛthak sambhavatīhāṅga nirmalāc cetanād ṛte //MU_6,54.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17028: gaganād api yācchā cit tayā rūpaṃ svam ātmanā / cittvāt puryaṣṭakatvena bhāvavṛttyaiva bhāvitam //MU_6,54.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17029: tad evedaṃ prakṛtitāṃ gataṃ jagad avasthitam / tasyāvayavajātaṃ tad indriyādi ghaṭādi ca //MU_6,54.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17030: puryaṣṭakatvam āyātaṃ yac cittattvaṃ svabhāvataḥ / sva evāvayavas tasmin ghaṭādi pratibimbati //MU_6,54.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17031: rāmaḥ: jagatsahasranirmāṇamahimnāṃ darpaṇasya me / puryaṣṭakasya bhagavan rūpaṃ kathaya kīdṛśam //MU_6,54.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17032: vasiṣṭhaḥ: anādyantajagadbījaṃ yad brahmāsti nirāmayam / bhārūpaṃ śuddhacinmātraṃ kalākalanavarjitam //MU_6,54.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17033: kalanonmukhatāṃ yātaṃ sat taj jīva iti smṛtaḥ / sa jīvaḥ khalu dehe 'smiṃś cinoti spandate sphuṭam //MU_6,54.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17034: ahambhāvād ahaṅkāro mananān mana ucyate / bodhaniścayato buddhir indradṛṣṭes tathendriyam //MU_6,54.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17035: dehabhāvanayā deho ghaṭabhāvanayā ghaṭaḥ / eṣa evaṃsvabhāvātmā jīvaḥ puryaṣṭakaṃ smṛtam //MU_6,54.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17036: jñatvakartṛtvabhoktṛtvasākṣitvādyabhimāninī / yā saṃvij jīva ity uktā tad dhi puryaṣṭakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,54.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17037: kāle kāle svato jīvas tv anyo 'nyo bhavati svataḥ / bhāvitākāritānantavāsanākaṇikodayāt //MU_6,54.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17038: puryaṣṭakasvabhāvena kālenākāram ṛcchati / vāsanāvaśatas sekād bījaṃ pallavatām iva //MU_6,54.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17039: ākāro 'haṃ śarīrādi sthāvarādi surādi vā / nāham ādyaś cidātmeti mithyājñāne nimajjati //MU_6,54.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17040: bhramaty evaṃ jagaj jīvo vāsanāvellitaś ciram / ūrdhvādhogamanair abdhau kāṣṭhaṃ vīcihataṃ yathā //MU_6,54.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17041: kaścit sāttvikajātitvād bhavabandhād anantaram / buddhvātmānaṃ svam abhyeti padam ādyantavarjitam //MU_6,54.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17042: kaścit kālena bahunā bhuktayonigaṇāntaraḥ / ātmajñānavaśād eti paramaṃ padam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,54.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17043: evambhūtas sa sumate jīvo yātaś śarīratām / netrādinā ghaṭādy antar yathā vetti tathā śṛṇu //MU_6,54.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17044: cittvasya kalanāt tasya samprayātasya jīvatām / manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyagrāmo deho 'gra iva tiṣṭhati //MU_6,54.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17045: padārthadehe dehena sve pataty akṣirūpiṇā / tadā taj jīvasaṃsparśāj jīvātmaikatvam ṛcchati //MU_6,54.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17046: bāhyārthavedane nityaṃ sambandho 'kṣasya kāraṇam / samanvitasya cittena na muktasya kadācana //MU_6,54.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17047: yad yad acchatare tasminn agrasthaṃ pratibimbati / jīvena bhavati śliṣṭaṃ bahir jīvo 'tha jīvati //MU_6,54.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17048: nighṛṣṭanavaratnābhe yadā nayanatārake / tadaitayor bāhyagataḥ padārthaḥ pratibimbati //MU_6,54.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17049: jīvena bhavati śliṣṭaḥ pratibimbavaśāt tataḥ / jīvajñeyatvam āyāti bāhyaṃ vastv iti rāghava //MU_6,54.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17050: yat saṃśleṣam upāyāti tad bālo 'pi hi vindate / paśur vā sthāvaro vāpi jīvaḥ kasmān na vetsyati //MU_6,54.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17051: anyac ca nāyanās sādho raśmayo jīvaveṣṭitāḥ / kroḍīkurvanty alaṃ dṛśyaṃ jīvas tat tena vindate //MU_6,54.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17052: eṣa eva kramas sparśe sambandhapratyayodbhavaḥ / rase gandhe ca kathito jīvasaṃsparśasambhavaḥ //MU_6,54.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17053: śabdas tv ākāśaniṣṭhatvāt karṇākāśagataḥ kṣaṇāt / jīvākāśaṃ viśaty antar evam indriyasaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,54.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17054: rāmaḥ: dṛśyate nirmalādarśaratnavāryādikeṣu yat / pratibimbanam etan me brūhi brahman kimātmakam //MU_6,54.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17055: vasiṣṭhaḥ: kākatālīyavad bhātaṃ tad brahmavyomni yac ciram / kiñcid āste kṣaṇaṃ kiñcit tad evedaṃ jaganti vaḥ //MU_6,54.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17056: svasattāmātrakaṃ svapne ivārtha iti bhāvayat / sthitam ekam anekātma cidvyoma svapnavṛkṣavat //MU_6,54.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17057: bāhyārthāstitvabodho yo yā brahmātmajaganmatiḥ / sa ca sā ceti sat sarvaṃ yathāsaṃvedanaṃ sthiteḥ //MU_6,54.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17058: prathamaṃ paramāṇutve buddhe 'ṇutve tataś ca khe / tā vido vetti vidvyoma karākṣādikam adya yāḥ //MU_6,54.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17059: sargāditaḥ prabhṛty eva nirmale 'rthaḥ prabimbate / vidātteti sthitis tv aikyāt sarvabimbyanubimbayoḥ //MU_6,54.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17060: cidvyomnā kacatā tad yad ayam artha iti sthitam / sargādau cetitā saṃsthā yāsau sthitim upāgatā //MU_6,54.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17061: asatām eva bhāvānāṃ cidvyomakacanābalāt / guṇārpaṇaṃ mitho rūḍhaṃ nirmale pratibimbanam //MU_6,54.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17062: atyantajaḍayor eva jīvayor iva yan mithaḥ / sattārpaṇaṃ svabhāvena pratibimbaṃ tad ucyate //MU_6,54.44//
GSP27moksop_u:17063: cidātmanor vā jaḍayor mahāsattājaḍātmanoḥ / ādyasvabhāvaniyamād bimbasattārpaṇaṃ mithaḥ //MU_6,54.45//
GSP27moksop_u:17064: pratibimbaṃ dṛśor bhrāntiṃ viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara / tāvanmātraṃ jagat tena viśvāso mā tavāstv iha //MU_6,54.46//
GSP27moksop_u:17065: ahamityāditaraṅgas sargādyāvartavān parāmbhodhau / nāsty eva deśakālakriyākṛtas tanmayaikatayā //MU_6,54.47//
GSP27moksop_u:17066: nityam asaktamatir muditātmā śāntasukhāsukhasaṃvidanantaḥ / tiṣṭha niviṣṭamatis samatāyām astasamastabhavāmayamāyaḥ //MU_6,54.48//
GSP27moksop_u:17069: vasiṣṭhaḥ: navād udbhavataḥ pūrvaṃ sampannāś cakṣurādayaḥ / yathā kamalajasyaitat sarvam eva tvayā śrutam //MU_6,55.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17070: brahmapuryaṣṭakasyādāv akṣasaṃvid yathoditā / puryaṣṭakasya sarvasya tathaivodeti sarvadā //MU_6,55.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17071: viddhi puryaṣṭakaṃ jīvaṃ sa garbhasthendriyodayaḥ / yad yathā bhāvayaty āśu tat tathā paripaśyati //MU_6,55.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17072: indriyāṇīndriyārthākhyaṃ viddhi saṃvedanaṃ svakam / sampannaṃ ca yathā tat te proktam ādyamanassthitau //MU_6,55.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17073: śuddhā saṃvit saṃvidantī saṃvedanam aninditam / ato 'haṃvedanād antar jīvaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ tv itā //MU_6,55.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17074: na tv ekatvād anantatvād avedyatvād anāmayā / ananyatvād anekatvād aśūnyatvāt parā sthitiḥ //MU_6,55.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17075: cetyādi budhyate kiñcin na manastāṃ ca gacchati / na ca jīvatvam āyāti na ca puryaṣṭakātmikā //MU_6,55.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17076: nāvidyādivilāso 'sti so 'sti nāstīva yas sadā / paramātmeti kathito manaṣṣaṣṭhendriyātigaḥ //MU_6,55.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17077: tasmāt sampadyate jīvaś cinmūrtir mananātmakaḥ / bhramaḥ kevalam ity ādya upadeśāya gīyate //MU_6,55.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17078: yataḥ kutaścit sampanne tv avidyāmaya āmaye / upadeśyopadeśena pravilīne vicāraṇāt //MU_6,55.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17079: praśāntasakalācāraṃ jñānaṃ tad avaśiṣyate / yatrākāśam api sthūlam aṇāv iva surācalaḥ //MU_6,55.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17080: yatrodyadācāram api sad apy asad avasthitam / jagaj jñaviṣayaṃ paṅkād iva tiṣṭhati nirmitam //MU_6,55.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17081: asanmayam avidyāyā rūpam etāvad eva hi / yad vīkṣitā satī nūnaṃ naśyaty eva na dṛśyate //MU_6,55.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17082: ālokitaṃ nāma katham avastu kila labhyate / prayatnenāpi samprāptaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu kena vā //MU_6,55.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17083: asad eva sadaivāsad ajñānād asya satyatā / jñānād yathāsthitaṃ vastu dṛśyate naśyati bhramaḥ //MU_6,55.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17084: avidyāyā vicārāya jīvapuryaṣṭakādikā / apy atyantam asatyāyāḥ kalpanā kalpitātmani //MU_6,55.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17085: tasmāt tadupadeśāya seyaṃ jīvādikalpanā / kṛtā śāstraiḥ prabodhāya tāṃ tvam ekamanāś śṛṇu //MU_6,55.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17086: jīvatvam iva samprāptā puryaṣṭakapade sthitā / kalākalaṅkarahitā citir ācetanonmukhī //MU_6,55.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17087: yad yathā bhāvayaty āśu tat tathānubhavaty alam / satyaṃ bhavatv asatyaṃ vā bāleva niśi yakṣakam //MU_6,55.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17088: pañcatanmātrakalanās sā bhāvayati yatra yāḥ / tatrātmani tathārandhrās tāḥ paśyati tathoditāḥ //MU_6,55.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17089: tābhya eva samutpannaṃ bahissthaṃ bhūtapañcakam / paśyaty ananyad anyābhaṃ śākhāśatam ivāṅkuraḥ //MU_6,55.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17090: idam antar idaṃ bāhyam iti niścayavāṃs tataḥ / jīvo yathā yad ādatte tat tathā draḍhayaty alam //MU_6,55.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17091: raśmijālam ivendor yad ātmanaḥ pratibhāsanam / bāhyasparśatayā tena tad evāśūrarīkṛtam //MU_6,55.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17092: maricasyeva yat taikṣṇyaṃ śūnyatvam iva khasya yat / ātmano vedanaṃ tena tad evānyad ivāśritam //MU_6,55.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17093: atraiva niścayaṃ buddhvā niyamas sudṛḍhīkṛtaḥ / anenettham anenetthaṃ bhāvyam ity avikhaṇḍitam //MU_6,55.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17094: svabhāvetaranāmāsau svasaṅkalpaniyāmakaḥ / kvacit kadācid bhavati svabhāvenaiva nānyathā //MU_6,55.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17095: ātmanaivedam akhilaṃ sampannaṃ dvaitam advayam / ṣaṇḍo madhuraseneva mṛdeva ca mahāghaṭaḥ //MU_6,55.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17096: sanniveśavikārādi deśakālādisambhavāt / sambhavaty atra na tv īśe deśakālādyasambhavāt //MU_6,55.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17097: itaḥ puṣpam itaḥ pattram aham ity udito yathā / ṣaṇḍe svātmani vāsanto raso 'dvitve dvitāṃ haran //MU_6,55.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17098: itaḥ paṭam itaḥ kuḍyam aham ity uditas tathā / sargātmany ātmani brahma nirdvandve dvitvam āharat //MU_6,55.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17099: adyāṅkuro 'ham adyārkarug ahaṃ tv adya vāridaḥ / yatheti tiṣṭhaty abbhāgas tathātmā sadasadvapuḥ //MU_6,55.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17100: iti bhāvyam anenettham iti sarveśvareritam / kramaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ loke kasya nāmāsti śaktatā //MU_6,55.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17101: ādarśe svaccha ākāro naiva svaḥ pratibimbati / vyatirekāsambhavataḥ kacaty eva tu kevalam //MU_6,55.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17102: brahmaṇi tv ātmanātmaiva sthitaḥ kacati bimbati / dvaitībhavaty adeho 'pi cinmayatvāt svabhāvataḥ //MU_6,55.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17103: yad yathaivātmakacanaṃ cetitaṃ kacatātmanā / asatyam api tan neha vyabhicāri kadācana //MU_6,55.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17104: hematvakaṭakatve dve satyāsatyasvarūpiṇī / hemni bhāṇḍamatau yadvac cittvācittve tathātmani //MU_6,55.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17105: sarvagatvāc citeś cittvaṃ nityaṃ manasi vidyate / hematvaṃ kaṭakasyeva jaḍatā ca sthitānyadā //MU_6,55.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17106: cittvajāḍyātmakaṃ cittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhāvayati svayam / yadā yathaiva yadbhāvaṃ tadā bhavati tat tathā //MU_6,55.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17107: kāle kāle citā jīvas tv anyo 'nyo bhavati svayam / bhāvitākāravān antar vāsanākaṇikodayāt //MU_6,55.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17108: svapne dṛṣṭo yathā grāmo yāti satyātmatāṃ kṣaṇam / dehād dehaṃ tathā yāti jīvo 'yaṃ pratibhātmakam //MU_6,55.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17109: pratibhāso yathā svapne naraḥ kuḍyaṃ paṭaṃ bhavet / bhavaty asatyam evaivaṃ dehād dehāntaraṃ sa naḥ //MU_6,55.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17110: asatyam eva mriyate tv asatyaṃ jāyate punaḥ / jīvas svapratibhāsena svapnavat svānyarūpavat //MU_6,55.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17111: kālenaitāvatā rūpam idaṃ tyājyaṃ mayety asau / prākṛtaṃ niścayaṃ rūḍhaṃ bhavaty anubhavat svataḥ //MU_6,55.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17112: vastu dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ ca svapne samanubhūyate / jīvasvapnaṃ jagadrūpaṃ viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara //MU_6,55.44//
GSP27moksop_u:17113: ajāgraddraṣṭṛdṛśyo yas so 'bhidhānādinā vinā / na svapno bhidyate svasmād acchāt saṃvittimātrakāt //MU_6,55.45//
GSP27moksop_u:17114: anyapūrvābhidhabṛhatsvapnaṃ paśyati nā yathā / aprāgdṛṣṭaṃ tathaiṣā svaṃ cetanaṃ cit prapaśyati //MU_6,55.46//
GSP27moksop_u:17115: prākkṛtā vāsanādyāśu pauruṣeṇaiva jīyate / hyaḥkukarmādya yatnena prayāti hi sukarmatām //MU_6,55.47//
GSP27moksop_u:17116: mokṣād ṛte na śāmyanti jīvānāṃ cakṣurādayaḥ / unmajjanti nimajjanti kevalaṃ deśakālataḥ //MU_6,55.48//
GSP27moksop_u:17117: cittvasya kalanāt tasya deho 'gra iva tiṣṭhati / pañcātmā bhāvito 'satyo mahāyakṣaś śiśor iva //MU_6,55.49//
GSP27moksop_u:17118: mano buddhir ahaṅkāras tathā tanmātrapañcakam / iti puryaṣṭakaṃ proktaṃ deho 'sāv ātivāhikaḥ //MU_6,55.50//
GSP27moksop_u:17119: amūrta eva cittātmā khatvam asyātipīnatā / vātatāsya mahāgulpho dehatāsya sumerutā //MU_6,55.51//
GSP27moksop_u:17120: dviravasthaḥ krameṇaiṣa niravasthas tu muktibhāk / suṣuptataikāvasthāsya jaḍā kroḍīkṛtodayā //MU_6,55.52//
GSP27moksop_u:17121: svapnatāsyetarāvasthā dehapratyayaśālinī / āmokṣaṃ bhramatīhāyam iti sthāvarajaṅgamaiḥ //MU_6,55.53//
GSP27moksop_u:17122: kadācid dhi suṣuptasthaḥ kadācit svapnasaṃsthitaḥ / ātivāhikadeho 'yaṃ sarvasyaivāvatiṣṭhate //MU_6,55.54//
GSP27moksop_u:17123: yadā suṣuptabhāvastho bhāviduḥkhaprabodhanaḥ / tadākāśopalasamas tiṣṭhaty anuditākṛtiḥ //MU_6,55.55//
GSP27moksop_u:17124: sthāvarādyāsv avasthāsu kalpavṛkṣadaśāsu ca / bhavaty eṣa suṣuptastho ghanamohaś śilāghanaḥ //MU_6,55.56//
GSP27moksop_u:17125: suṣuptatāsya jaḍatā svapno 'syeyaṃ tu saṃsṛtiḥ / yaḥ prabodho 'sya sā muktis taj jāgrat sā ca turyatā //MU_6,55.57//
GSP27moksop_u:17126: jīvaprabodho muktir hi sā ceha dvividhocyate / ekā jīvanmuktateti dvitīyādehamuktatā //MU_6,55.58//
GSP27moksop_u:17127: jīvanmuktir hi turyatvaṃ turyātītaṃ paraṃ tataḥ / muktir jīvaprabodho hi sa ca buddhiprayatnataḥ //MU_6,55.59//
GSP27moksop_u:17128: jñānapramāṇo jīvo 'ntar yaj jānāti hi tanmayaḥ / jānātu jñaptim evāto bhavaty āśu sa tanmayaḥ //MU_6,55.60//
GSP27moksop_u:17129: paśyatīmam ayaṃ jīvas sudīrghaṃ svapnavibhramam / mithyoditaṃ svahṛdaye svaccha eva śilīkṛte //MU_6,55.61//
GSP27moksop_u:17130: jīvāṇor antar asty asya na kiñcic citkalāṃ vinā / tām evānyatayā paśyan mudhaiva pariśocati //MU_6,55.62//
GSP27moksop_u:17131: jīvāṇor antar asty asya na kiñcit paramād ṛte / yatra tatra jagad dṛṣṭam aho māyāvijṛmbhitam //MU_6,55.63//
GSP27moksop_u:17132: sthālyantaḥ kvathadambūnāṃ yathānnānāṃ bhramodayaḥ / jīvāṇūnāṃ tathā svāntar mithyā saṃsaraṇodayaḥ //MU_6,55.64//
GSP27moksop_u:17133: bandho 'sya vāsanāvattvaṃ mokṣas syād vāsanākṣayaḥ / vāsanāto 'sya sauṣuptī svāpnī ca sphurati sthitiḥ //MU_6,55.65//
GSP27moksop_u:17134: ghanavāsanamoho 'yaṃ suṣuptātmā jaḍas smṛtaḥ / tadantarbhāvinā svapnenāvaśyambhāvinānvitaḥ //MU_6,55.66//
GSP27moksop_u:17135: vāsanāveśanidrālur jīvaḥ paśyati vibhramam / yadāsya vāsanānidrā kṣīyate budhyate tadā //MU_6,55.67//
GSP27moksop_u:17136: vāsanoktā dṛśyaratir dṛśyatvaṃ ca na vidyate / hemnīva kaṭakāditvaṃ sarvātmany ātmanā kvacit //MU_6,55.68//
GSP27moksop_u:17137: abodhād etad abhavad vilīnaṃ cet prabodhataḥ / tad vāsyavāsanāyās tu kṣayād udaya eva vaḥ //MU_6,55.69//
GSP27moksop_u:17138: ghanaṃ svavāsanāmohaṃ kṣapayitvā suṣuptagaḥ / tanuvāsanatām etya svapnaṃ paśyati saṃsṛtim //MU_6,55.70//
GSP27moksop_u:17139: ghanavāsanamoho 'yaṃ jīvas sthāvaratādibhāk / madhyasthavāsanas tiryak puruṣas tanuvāsanaḥ //MU_6,55.71//
GSP27moksop_u:17140: yadāntar jīvitenāttā bahir jīvā ghaṭādayaḥ / jīvaikyād ubhayos sattā grāhyagrāhakayos tataḥ //MU_6,55.72//
GSP27moksop_u:17141: ātmanātmā samālīḍho bahir antar yadā citā / tadā grāhyagrahaṇadhīr mṛgatṛṣṇeva sodayā //MU_6,55.73//
GSP27moksop_u:17142: neha santyajyate kiñcin neha kiñcana gṛhyate / bāhyāntarakalākāraś cidātmaikaḥ prakāśate //MU_6,55.74//
GSP27moksop_u:17143: trijagac ciccamatkāras tv alaṃ bhedavikalpanaiḥ / cetitās smaś citi citā bāhyādy anyan na vidmahe //MU_6,55.75//
GSP27moksop_u:17144: abdher yathāmalam apāstasamastabhedaṃ svādv accham eva sakalaṃ dravam ekaśuddham / sarvaṃ tathedam apahastitabhedajātam ādyaṃ paraṃ padam anāmayam eva buddham //MU_6,55.76//
GSP27moksop_u:17147: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yo jīvasyoditas svapno nānākalanakomalaḥ / tam imaṃ viddhi saṃsāraṃ na satyaṃ nāpy asanmayam //MU_6,56.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17148: na puṃsa iva jīvasya svapnas sambhavati kvacit / tenaite jāgatā bhāvā jāgratsvapnaikatātra hi //MU_6,56.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17149: jīvasvapnam idaṃ dīrghaṃ kṣipraṃ ca pratibhāsate / asatyam apy avastutvād viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara //MU_6,56.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17150: svapnāt svapnāntaram iva gacchanto jīvajīvakāḥ / asatyam eva paśyanti ghanasatyatayā ciram //MU_6,56.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17151: ajaḍā jaḍatāṃ yātā jāḍye cājāḍyatoditā / asatye satyatā jātā jīvānubhavamohataḥ //MU_6,56.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17152: sthāṇor apy antar akhilaṃ paśyantas trijagadbhramam / bhramanti svapnasambhrāntā iha jīvāhirāśayaḥ //MU_6,56.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17153: sarvagatvād anantasya svasya jīvasya vai citeḥ / yad bhāvayanti cetanti tad evāśv eti satyatām //MU_6,56.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17154: puṇḍarīkākṣagaditām asaṃsaṅgagatiṃ śubhām / yām āliṅgya mahābāho jīvanmukto mahāmuniḥ //MU_6,56.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17155: pāṇḍoḥ putro 'rjuno nāma sukhaṃ jīvitam ātmanaḥ / kṣapayiṣyati nirduḥkhaṃ tathā kṣapaya jīvitam //MU_6,56.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17156: rāmaḥ: bhaviṣyati kadā brahmann arjunaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ / kīdṛśīṃ ca haris tasya kathayiṣyaty asaktatām //MU_6,56.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17157: vasiṣṭhaḥ: asti sanmātram ātmeti parikalpitanāmakam / sthitam ātmany anādyante nabhasīva mahānabhaḥ //MU_6,56.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17158: dṛśyate vimale tasminn ayaṃ saṃsāravibhramaḥ / kaṭakādi yathā hemni taraṅgādi yathāmbhasi //MU_6,56.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17159: caturdaśavidhā bhūtajātayaḥ prasphuranty alam / tasmin saṃsārajāle 'smiñ jāle śakunayo yathā //MU_6,56.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17160: tatra te yamacandrārkaśakrādyās saṃsṛtikramāḥ / bhūtapañcakasaṃsthānā lokapālatvam āgatāḥ //MU_6,56.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17161: idaṃ puṇyam upādeyaṃ heyaṃ pāpam idaṃ tv iti / tais svasaṅkalpaghaṭitā vedena sthāpitā sthitiḥ //MU_6,56.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17162: evaṃ prauḍhiṃ prayātāyāṃ vahantyāṃ ca ciraṃ ciram / acchinnāyāṃ vināśinyāṃ nadyām iva jagatsthitau //MU_6,56.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17163: vaivasvato yamo nāma lokapālaḥ pratāpavān / maraṇāṅkitasattākaprajāsaṃyamane sthitaḥ //MU_6,56.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17164: tasyādya yāvad anagha pravāhāpatite nije / karmaṇy acalasaṅkāśaṃ sthiraṃ cittam avasthitam //MU_6,56.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17165: bhagavān sa yamaḥ kiñcid vrataṃ praticaturyugam / tathāpi kurute bhūtadalanotthāghaśaṅkayā //MU_6,56.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17166: kadācid aṣṭau varṣāṇi daśa dvādaśa vāpi ca / kadācit pañca saptāpi kadācit ṣoḍaśāpi vā //MU_6,56.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17167: udāsīnavad āsīne tasmin niyamam āsthite / na hinasti jagajjāle mṛtyur bhūtāni kānicit //MU_6,56.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17168: tena nīrandhrabhūtaughaṃ nissañcāraṃ mahītalam / bhavati prāvṛṣi svedī kuñjako maṣakair iva //MU_6,56.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17169: atha tāni vicitrāṇi bhūtāni bahuyuktibhiḥ / kṣapayanti surā rāma bhuvo bhāranivṛttaye //MU_6,56.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17170: evaṃ yamasahasrāṇi vyavahāraśatāni ca / samatītāny anantāni bhūtāni ca jaganti ca //MU_6,56.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17171: vaivasvato 'dya tu yamo ya eva pitṛnāyakaḥ / anena tv adhunā sādho parikṣīṇeṣu keṣucit //MU_6,56.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17172: yugeṣv aghavighātāya varṣāṇi dvādaśātmanā / vratacaryeha kartavyā dūrāstakrūrakarmaṇā //MU_6,56.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17173: teneyam urvī nīrandhrā bhūtair martair amṛtyubhiḥ / dīnā praghanagulmeva bhārabhūtair bhaviṣyati //MU_6,56.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17174: bhūr bhāraparibhūtāṅgī hariṃ śaraṇam eṣyati / kāntā dasyuparābhūtā dīnā patim iva priyam //MU_6,56.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17175: harir dehadvayenātha mahīm avatariṣyati / devāṃśair akhilais sārdhaṃ naranāyakatāṃ gataiḥ //MU_6,56.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17176: vasudevasutas tv eko vāsudeva iti śrutaḥ / deho bhaviṣyati harer dvitīyaḥ pāṇḍavo 'rjunaḥ //MU_6,56.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17177: yudhiṣṭhira iti khyāto dharmaputro bhaviṣyati / ambhodhimekhalābhūpaḥ pāṇḍoḥ putras sa dharmavit //MU_6,56.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17178: duryodhana iti khyātas tasya bhrātā pitṛvyajaḥ / bhaviṣyati dṛḍhadvandvo bhīmo babhrur aher iva //MU_6,56.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17179: anyo'nyaṃ harator urvīṃ tayos saṅgrāmalālasāḥ / aṣṭādaśākṣauhiṇyo hi ghaṭiṣyanty atra bhīṣaṇāḥ //MU_6,56.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17180: tatkṣayeṇa vibhāratvaṃ bhuvo viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati / rāghavārjunadehena bṛhadgāṇḍīvadhanvanā //MU_6,56.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17181: viṣṇor arjunanāmāsau prākṛtaṃ bhāvam āsthitaḥ / harṣāmarṣānvito deho naradharmā bhaviṣyati //MU_6,56.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17182: senādvayagatān dṛṣṭvā svajanān maraṇonmukhān / viṣādam eṣyaty udyogaṃ yuddhāya na kariṣyati //MU_6,56.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17183: tam arjunābhidhaṃ dehaṃ prāptakāryaikasiddhaye / harir buddhena dehena bodhayiṣyati rāghava //MU_6,56.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17184: bhagavān: tvaṃ mānuṣeṇopahatāntarātmā viṣādamohābhibhavād visañjñaḥ / naṣṭas svam utsṛjya paraṃ prakāśaṃ tadātmatattvaṃ nanu rājasiṃha //MU_6,56.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17185: anantam avyaktam anādimadhyam ātmānam ālokaya saṃvidātman / saṃvidvapus sphāram alagnadoṣam ajo 'si nityo 'si nirāmayo 'si //MU_6,56.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17186: na jāyate mriyate vā kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ / ajo nityaś śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre //MU_6,56.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17189: bhagavān: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam / ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate //MU_6,57.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17190: anantasyaikarūpasya satas sūkṣmasya khād api / ātmanaḥ parameśasya kiṃ kathaṃ kena hanyate //MU_6,57.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17191: nārjunas tvaṃ na hantā tvam abhimānam alaṃ tyaja / jarāmaraṇanirmuktas svayam ātmāsi śāśvataḥ //MU_6,57.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17192: yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo yasya buddhir na lipyate / hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate //MU_6,57.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17193: yaiva sañjāyate saṃvid antas saivānubhūyate / ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me ity atas saṃvidaṃ tyaja //MU_6,57.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17194: anayaiva ca yukto 'smi naṣṭo 'smīti ca bhārata / abhitas sukhaduḥkhābhyām avaśaḥ parikṛṣyase //MU_6,57.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17195: svātmāṃśaiḥ kriyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi bhāgaśaḥ / ahaṅkāravimūḍhātmā kartāham iti manyate //MU_6,57.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17196: cakṣuḥ paśyatu karṇaś ca śṛṇotu tvak spṛśatv iyam / rasanā ca rasaṃ yātu ko 'traiko 'ham iti sthitaḥ //MU_6,57.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17197: kalanākarmanirate manasy api mahāmate / na kaścid atrāham iti kleśabhāgī ka eva te //MU_6,57.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17198: bahubhis samavāyena yat kṛtaṃ tatra bhārata / eko 'bhimānaduḥkhena hāsāyaiva hi gṛhyate //MU_6,57.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17199: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api / yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmasiddhaye //MU_6,57.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17200: ahantvaviṣacūrṇena yeṣāṃ kāyo na bhāvitaḥ / kurvanto 'pi haranto 'pi ta ete nirviṣūcikāḥ //MU_6,57.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17201: na kvacid rājate kāyo mamatvāmedhyadūṣitaḥ / prājño 'py atibahujño 'pi duśśīla iva mānavaḥ //MU_6,57.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17202: nirmamo nirahaṅkāras samaduḥkhasukhaḥ kṣamī / yas sa kāryam akāryaṃ vā kurvann api na lipyate //MU_6,57.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17203: idaṃ ca te pāṇḍusuta svakarma kṣātram uttamam / atikrūram api śreyas sukhāyaivodayāya ca //MU_6,57.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17204: api kutsitam apy antyam apy adharmamayaṃ kṛśam / śreyase svaṃ yathā karma na tathehāmṛtāsavaḥ //MU_6,57.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17205: mūrkhasyāpi svakarmaiva śreyase kim u sanmateḥ / matir galadahaṅkārā patitāpi na lipyate //MU_6,57.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17206: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya / nissaṅgas tvaṃ yathāprāptakarmāsi cen na badhyase //MU_6,57.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17207: śāntabrahmavapur bhūtvā karma brahmamayaṃ kuru / brahmārpitasamācāro brahmaiva bhavasi kṣaṇāt //MU_6,57.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17208: īśvarārpitasarvārtha īśvarātmā nirāmayaḥ / īśvaras sarvabhūtātmā bhava bhūṣitabhūtalaḥ //MU_6,57.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17209: sannyastasarvasaṅkalpas samaś śāntamanā muniḥ / sannyāsayogayuktātmā kurvan muktamatir bhava //MU_6,57.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17210: arjunaḥ: saṅgatyāgasya bhagavaṃs tathā brahmārpaṇasya ca / īśvarārpaṇarūpasya sannyāsasya ca sarvaga //MU_6,57.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17211: tathā jñānasya yogasya vibhāgaḥ kīdṛśaḥ prabho / krameṇa kathayaitan me mahāmohanivṛttidam //MU_6,57.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17212: bhagavān: sarvasaṅkalpasaṃśāntāv ekāntaghanavedanam / nakiñcidbhāvanākāraṃ yat tad brahma paraṃ viduḥ //MU_6,57.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17213: tadudyogaṃ vidur jñānaṃ yogaṃ ca kṛtabuddhayaḥ / brahma sarvaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti brahmārpaṇaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,57.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17214: antaśśūnyaṃ bahiśśūnyaṃ pāṣāṇahṛdayopamam / śāntam ākāśakośācchaṃ na śūnyaṃ na dṛṣat param //MU_6,57.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17215: tata īṣad yad utthānam īṣad anyatayodaye / sa jagatpratibhāso 'yam ākāśa iva śūnyatā //MU_6,57.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17216: bhāgo 'ham iti ko 'py eṣa pratyekam uditaś citeḥ / koṭikoṭyaṃśakalitaḥ ka ivainaṃ prati grahaḥ //MU_6,57.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17217: vikalpabhede sphurite saṃvitsāramayātmani / vaicitryeṇāvicitre 'pi kim ekatrāpi vo grahaḥ //MU_6,57.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17218: apṛthagbhūta evaiṣa pṛthagbhūta iva sthitaḥ / pṛthag abdhir aparyanto nāham ity avagacchati //MU_6,57.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17219: yathehāhaṃ tathehāsi ghaṭādīhāsti markaṭaḥ / kham ihaivaṃ tathāmbvādi kim ahantāṃ prati grahaḥ //MU_6,57.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17220: iti jñānād vibhāgasya yo dvaitasya parikṣayaḥ / tyāgas saṅkalpajālānām asaṃsaṅgas sa kathyate //MU_6,57.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17222: abhedavaśato bhedo nāmnaivaiṣāṃ cidātmani / bodhātmākhilaśabdārthaṃ jagad ekaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //MU_6,57.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17223: aham āśā jagad ahaṃ kham ahaṃ karma cāpy aham / kālo 'ham aham advaitaṃ dvaitaṃ cāham ahaṃ jagat //MU_6,57.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17224: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru / mām evaiṣyasi matvaivam ātmānaṃ matparāyaṇaḥ //MU_6,57.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17225: arjunaḥ: dve rūpe tava deveśa paraṃ cāparam eva ca / kīdṛśaṃ tat kadā rūpaṃ tiṣṭhāmy āśritya siddhaye //MU_6,57.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17226: bhagavān: sāmānyaṃ paramaṃ caiva dve rūpe viddhi me 'nagha / pāṇyādiyuktaṃ sāmānyaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam //MU_6,57.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17227: paraṃ rūpam anādyantaṃ yan mamaikam anāmayam / brahmātmaparamātmādiśabdair etad udīryate //MU_6,57.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17228: yāvad apratibuddhas tvam anātmajñatayā sthitaḥ / tāvac caturbhujākāradevapūjāparo bhava //MU_6,57.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17229: tatkramāt samprabuddhas tvaṃ tato jñāsyasi tat param / mama rūpam anādyantaṃ yena bhūyo na jāyase //MU_6,57.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17230: yadi vā vedyavijñāto bhavāṃs tad arimardana / taṃ mamātmānam ātmānam ātmanaś cāśu saṃśraya //MU_6,57.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17231: idaṃ cāham idaṃ cāham iti yat pravadāmy aham / tad etad ātmatattvaṃ tan muhur vyapadiśāmy alam //MU_6,57.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17232: manye sādho prabuddho 'si pade viśrāntavān asi / saṅkalpair avamukto 'si satyaikātmamayo bhava //MU_6,57.44//
GSP27moksop_u:17233: sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani / paśya tvaṃ yogayuktātmā sarvatra samadarśanaḥ //MU_6,57.45//
GSP27moksop_u:17234: sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ yo bhajaty aikyam āsthitaḥ / sarvathā vartamāno 'pi na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate //MU_6,57.46//
GSP27moksop_u:17235: ekatvaṃ sarvaśabdārtha ekaśabdārtha ātmatā / ātmāpi ca na san nāsad gato yasyāśu tat sa sat //MU_6,57.47//
GSP27moksop_u:17236: trailokyacetasām antar āloko yaḥ prakāśajaḥ / anubhūtim upārūḍhas so 'yam ātmeti niścayaḥ //MU_6,57.48//
GSP27moksop_u:17237: trailokyapayasām antar yo rasānubhavas sthitaḥ / gavyānām abdhijānāṃ ca so 'yam ātmāsmi bhārata //MU_6,57.49//
GSP27moksop_u:17238: antas sarvaśarīrāṇāṃ yas sūkṣmo 'nubhavas sa ca / mukto 'nubhavanīyena so 'yam ātmāsmi sarvagaḥ //MU_6,57.50//
GSP27moksop_u:17239: samagrapayasām antar yathā ghṛtam avasthitam / tathā sarvapadārthānāṃ dehānāṃ ca sthitaḥ paraḥ //MU_6,57.51//
GSP27moksop_u:17240: sarvāmbhonidhiratnānāṃ sabāhyābhyantare yathā / tejas tathāsmi dehānām asaṃsthita iva sthitaḥ //MU_6,57.52//
GSP27moksop_u:17241: yathā kumbhasahasrāṇāṃ sabāhyābhyantare nabhaḥ / jagattrayaśarīrāṇāṃ tathātmāham avasthitaḥ //MU_6,57.53//
GSP27moksop_u:17242: muktāphalaśataughānāṃ tantuḥ protavapur yathā / tathāhaṃ dehalakṣāṇāṃ sthita ātmāsmy alakṣitaḥ //MU_6,57.54//
GSP27moksop_u:17243: brahmādau tṛṇaparyante padārthanikurumbake / sattāsāmānyam etad yat tam ātmānam ajaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,57.55//
GSP27moksop_u:17244: tad īṣatsphuritākāraṃ brahma brahmaiva tiṣṭhati / ahantādi jagattādi krameṇa bhramakāriṇā //MU_6,57.56//
GSP27moksop_u:17245: ātmaivedaṃ jagadrūpaṃ hanyate hanti cātra kim / śubhāśubhair jagadduḥkhaiḥ kim asyārjuna lipyate //MU_6,57.57//
GSP27moksop_u:17246: pratibimbeṣv ivādarśaṃ samaṃ sākṣivad āsthitam / naśyatsu na vinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_6,57.58//
GSP27moksop_u:17247: idaṃ cāham idaṃ cāham itīdaṃ kathyate mayā / evam ātmāsi sarvātmā mām evaṃ viddhi pāṇḍava //MU_6,57.59//
GSP27moksop_u:17248: imās sarvāḥ pravartante sargapralayavikriyāḥ / ātmatantoś cito 'ntassthāḥ payasspandā ivāmbudhau //MU_6,57.60//
GSP27moksop_u:17249: yathopalatvaṃ śailānāṃ dārutvaṃ ca mahīruhām / taraṅgāṇāṃ jalatvaṃ ca padārthānāṃ tathātmatā //MU_6,57.61//
GSP27moksop_u:17250: sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani / yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati //MU_6,57.62//
GSP27moksop_u:17251: nānākāravikāreṣu taraṅgeṣu yathā payaḥ / kaṭakādiṣu vā hema bhūteṣv ātmā tathārjuna //MU_6,57.63//
GSP27moksop_u:17252: nānātaraṅgavṛndāni yathā lolāni vāriṇi / kaṭakādīni vā hemni tathā bhūtāni cātmani //MU_6,57.64//
GSP27moksop_u:17253: padārthajātaṃ bhūtādi bṛhad brahma ca bhārata / ekam evākhilaṃ viddhi pṛthaksthaṃ na manāg api //MU_6,57.65//
GSP27moksop_u:17254: kiṃ tadbhāvavikārāṇāṃ gamyam asti jagattraye / kva te vāpi jagat kiṃ vā kiṃ mudhā parimuhyasi //MU_6,57.66//
GSP27moksop_u:17255: iti śrutvāvagamyāntar bhāvayitvā suniścitam / jīvanmuktāś carantīha santas samarasāśayāḥ //MU_6,57.67//
GSP27moksop_u:17256: nirmānamohā jītasaṅgadoṣā adhyātmavidyā vinivṛttakāmāḥ / dvandvair vimuktās sukhaduḥkhasañjñair gacchanty amūḍhāḥ padam avyayaṃ tat //MU_6,57.68//
GSP27moksop_u:17259: bhagavān: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ / yat te 'haṃ prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hitakāmyayā //MU_6,58.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17260: mātrāsparśās tu kaunteya śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhadāḥ / āgamāpāyino 'nityās tāṃs titikṣasva bhārata //MU_6,58.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17261: te tu naikātmanaś cānye kvāto duḥkhaṃ kva vā sukham / anādyante 'navayave kutaḥ pūraṇakhaṇḍane //MU_6,58.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17262: saṃsthitā sparśamātrākhyā kalāsmin paramātmani / anante 'sanniveśādau hemnīva kaṭakāditā //MU_6,58.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17263: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete mātrāsparśā bhramātmakāḥ / samaduḥkhasukho dhīras so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate //MU_6,58.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17264: sarvatvād ātmanas tv ete ābhāsās saṃsthitā iva / asadrūpās tv asadrūpaṃ kathaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakyate //MU_6,58.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17265: manāg api na vidyete sukhaduḥkhe asarvage / sarvatvād ātmatattvasya sattā katham ivānayoḥ //MU_6,58.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17266: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ / nāsty eva sukhaduḥkhādi paramātmāsti sarvagaḥ //MU_6,58.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17267: sattvāsattvamatī tyaktvaivaitayor jagadātmanoḥ / tyaktvā nakiñcin madhyaṃ ca śeṣe baddhapado bhava //MU_6,58.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17268: na hṛṣyati sukhenātmā duḥkhair glāyati nārjuna / dṛṣadvac cetanātmāpi śarīrāntargato 'pi san //MU_6,58.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17269: jaḍaṃ cittādi duḥkhasya bhājanaṃ dehatāṃ gatam / na caitasmin kṣate kṣīṇe kiñcid evātmanaḥ kṣatam //MU_6,58.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17270: jaḍaṃ dehādi duḥkhāder yad idaṃ bhoktr iti sthitam / tan māyābhramam evāṅga viddhy abodhavaśotthitam //MU_6,58.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17271: na kiñcid eva dehādi na ca duḥkhādi vidyate / ātmano yat pṛthagbhūtaṃ kiṃ kenāto 'nubhūyate //MU_6,58.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17272: yad idaṃ kathayāmy atra tenaiṣā te vinaśyati / bhrāntir duravabodhotthā samyagbodhena bhārata //MU_6,58.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17273: yathā rajjvām ahibhayaṃ bodhān naśyaty abodhajam / tathā dehādi duḥkhādi bodhān naśyaty abodhajam //MU_6,58.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17274: viṣvag viśvam ajaṃ brahma na naśyati na jāyate / iti satyaṃ paraṃ viddhi bodhaḥ parama eṣa saḥ //MU_6,58.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17275: brahmārṇavataraṅgas tvaṃ kiñcid bhūtvā vilīyase / brahmāvarte sphurasy adya brahmaivāsi nirāmayam //MU_6,58.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17276: jagat kālaḥ kriyā deśas tvam ahaṃ sainikā iti / brahmaṇy evaṃ parispando nātra stas sadasatkramau //MU_6,58.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17277: jahi mānaṃ madaṃ śokaṃ bhayam īrṣyāṃ sukhāsukhe / dvaitam etad asadrūpam ekas sadrūpavān bhava //MU_6,58.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17278: puruṣākṣauhiṇīnāṃ tvaṃ kṣayeṇānubhavātmanā / brahmaṇā bṛṃhitaṃ yuddhaṃ brahma brahmamayaṃ kuru //MU_6,58.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17279: asaṃvidan sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ lābhālābhau jayājayau / yuddhabrahmaikatāṃ gaccha brahmādistambha bhārata //MU_6,58.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17280: lābhālābhasamo bhūtvā bhūtvā nūnaṃ nakiñcana / jaḍo vāta iva spandī prasṛtaṃ kāryam ācara //MU_6,58.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17281: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat / yat kariṣyasi kaunteya tad ātmeti sthiro bhava //MU_6,58.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17282: yanmayo yo bhavaty antas sa tad āpnoty asaṃśayam / brahmasatyam avāptuṃ tvaṃ brahmasatyamayo bhava //MU_6,58.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17283: anapekṣya phalaṃ brahma bhūtvā brahmeti bhāvitam / kriyate kevalaṃ karma brahmajñena yathāgatam //MU_6,58.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17284: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyaty akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ / sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa coktas sarvakarmakṛt //MU_6,58.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17285: mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi / yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya //MU_6,58.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17286: karmāsaktim anāśritya tathā nāśritya mūḍhatām / naiṣkarmyam apy anāśritya samas tiṣṭha yathāsthitam //MU_6,58.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17287: tyaktvā karmaphalāsaṅgaṃ nityatṛpto nirāśrayaḥ / karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiñcit karoti saḥ //MU_6,58.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17288: āsaktim āhuḥ kartṛtvam akartur api tad bhavet / maurkhye sthite hi manasi tasmān maurkhyaṃ parityajet //MU_6,58.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17289: paraṃ tajjñatvam āśritya nirāsakter mahātmanaḥ / sarvakarmaratasyāpi kartṛtodeti na kvacit //MU_6,58.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17290: akartṛtvād abhoktṛtvam abhoktṛtvāt samaikatā / samaikatvād anantatvaṃ tato brahmatvam ātatam //MU_6,58.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17291: nānātām alam utsṛjya paramātmaikatāṃ gataḥ / kurvan kāryam akāryaṃ ca naiva kartā tvam arjuna //MU_6,58.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17292: yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāmasaṅkalpavarjitāḥ / jñānāgnidagdhakarmāṇaṃ tam āhuḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ //MU_6,58.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17293: samas somyas sthiras svasthaś śāntas sarvārthanisspṛhaḥ / yas tiṣṭhati sa suvyagro 'py alam avyagratāṃ gataḥ //MU_6,58.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17294: nirdvandvo nityasattvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān / yathāprāptānuvartī ca bhava bhūṣitabhūtalaḥ //MU_6,58.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17295: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran / indriyārthān vimūḍhātmā mithyācāras sa ucyate //MU_6,58.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17296: yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhate 'rjuna / karmendriyaiḥ karmayogam asaktas sa viśiṣyate //MU_6,58.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17297: āpūryamāṇaṃ tv acalapratiṣṭhaṃ samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat / tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī //MU_6,58.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17300: bhagavān: na kuryād bhogasantyāgaṃ na kuryād bhogabhāvanam / sthātavyaṃ susamenaiva yathāprāptānuvartinā //MU_6,59.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17301: anātmany ātmatāṃ dehe mā bhāvaya bhavātmani / ātmany evātmatāṃ satye bhāvayābhāvarūpiṇi //MU_6,59.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17302: dehanāśe mahābāho na kiñcid api naśyati / ātmanāśe hi nāśas syān na cātmā naśyati kvacit //MU_6,59.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17303: avināśam anādyantam ātmānam ajaraṃ viduḥ / naśyaty ātmeti durbodho mā tavāstv atiduḥkhadaḥ //MU_6,59.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17304: na kadācana naśyanti viditātmāna uttamāḥ / naśyanty aviditātmāno hy anātmany ātmamāninaḥ //MU_6,59.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17305: arjunaḥ: evaṃ cet taj jagannātha mūḍhānām api mānada / dehanāśe samutpanne manye naṣṭaṃ na kiñcana //MU_6,59.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17306: bhagavān: evam eva mahābāho na kiñcin naśyati kvacit / ātmaivāsty avināśātmā kiṃ tasya kva vinaśyati //MU_6,59.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17307: idaṃ naṣṭam idaṃ yuktam iti mohād bhramād ṛte / anyat tathā na paśyāmi vandhyāstrītanayaṃ yathā //MU_6,59.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17308: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ / ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ //MU_6,59.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17309: avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam / vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati //MU_6,59.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17310: antavanta ime dehā nityasyoktāś śarīriṇaḥ / anāśino 'prameyasya tasmād yudhyasva bhārata //MU_6,59.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17311: ātmaivaiko 'sti na dvitvam asatas sambhavaḥ kutaḥ / avināśas tv ananto 'sau sato nāśo na vidyate //MU_6,59.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17312: dvaitaikatvaparityāge yac cheṣam avaśiṣyate / śāntaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ tad astīha paraṃ padam //MU_6,59.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17313: arjunaḥ: tan mṛto 'smīti bhagavan kiṃrūḍheha nṛṇāṃ sthitiḥ / kathaṃ sthitau vā lokānāṃ tau svarganarakau prabho //MU_6,59.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17314: bhagavān: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca / etattanmātrajātātmā jīvo deheṣu tiṣṭhati //MU_6,59.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17315: sa kṛṣyate vāsanayā rajjveva paśupotakaḥ / sa tiṣṭhati śarīrāntaḥ pañjare vihago yathā //MU_6,59.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17316: sa kālavaśato dehāj jarjaratvam upāgatāt / vāsanāvaśato yāti vṛkṣaparṇād raso yathā //MU_6,59.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17317: śrotraṃ cakṣus sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca / gṛhītvaitāni saṃyāti vāyur gandhān ivāśayāt //MU_6,59.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17318: vāsanāvattvam evāsya deho netarayuktijaḥ / kṣīyate vāsanātyāge kṣīṇe bhavati tat padam //MU_6,59.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17319: vāsanāvān purā puṣṭo bhūtvā bhrāmyati yoniṣu / jīvo bhramabharākāro māyāpuruṣako yathā //MU_6,59.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17320: akṣasvabhāvān akhilāñ śarīrād vāsanāvaśaḥ / jīvo gṛhītvā saṃyāti puṣpād gandhān ivānilaḥ //MU_6,59.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17321: deho nisspandatām eti jīve kaunteya nirgate / nisspandāvayavābhogaś śāntavāta iva drumaḥ //MU_6,59.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17322: aceṣṭaś chedabhedādidoṣair āyāty adṛśyatām / mṛta ity ucyate loke deho vigatajīvitaḥ //MU_6,59.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17323: sa jīvaḥ prāṇamūrtiḥ khe yatra yatrāvatiṣṭhate / tatra svavāsanābhyāsāt paśyaty ākāram ātatam //MU_6,59.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17324: ayaṃ deho hi jīvena tv asann evāvalokitaḥ / asya nāśe 'nyam apy evaṃ paśyaty evāśu svapnavat //MU_6,59.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17325: yathaiva paśyaty ākārāṃs teṣāṃ nāśāṃs tathaiva saḥ / ādisarge bhāvanayā kilaivaṃ saṃvibhāvitaḥ //MU_6,59.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17326: jhagity udbhavakāle tu yad yathā dṛśyate puraḥ / ānirvāṇaṃ tad evāsyā avinābhāvisaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,59.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17327: prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ puruṣārthena jīyate / yatnenādyatanenāśu yatanaṃ hyastanaṃ yathā //MU_6,59.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17328: ya eva puruṣārthena dṛṣṭo balavatā kṣaṇāt / pūrvottaranimeṣāṃśas sa eva jayati sphuṭam //MU_6,59.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17329: api sphuṭati vidhyaṇḍe vāti vā pralayānile / pauruṣaṃ hi yathāśāstram atas tyājyaṃ na dhīmatā //MU_6,59.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17330: narakasvargasargādi vāsanāvaśato 'bhitaḥ / prapaśyati cirābhyastaṃ jīvo jaraḍhamohadhīḥ //MU_6,59.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17331: arjunaḥ: narakasvargasargādisambhrameṣu jagatpate / kim asya kāraṇaṃ brūhi jīvasya janitasthiteḥ //MU_6,59.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17332: bhagavān: vāsanātmānam enaṃ tvaṃ jīvaṃ viddhi śarīrakam / svavāsanātmikaivāsya sattā saṃsṛtikāraṇam //MU_6,59.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17333: dhriyate saṃsṛtis tāvad yāvat sphurati vāsanā / svapnopamānā teneha śreyase vāsanākṣayaḥ //MU_6,59.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17334: arjunaḥ: cirābhyāsavaśāt prauḍhā saṃsārabhramakāriṇī / kimutthā devadeveśa vāsanā kṣīyate katham //MU_6,59.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17335: bhagavān: maurkhyamohasamucchrāyād anātmany ātmabhāvanāt / ajñānād ātmanas sādho sattām āyāti vāsanā //MU_6,59.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17336: bhāvitātmāsi kaunteya satyaṃ vijñātavān asi / ayaṃ so 'haṃ janā ete mameti tyaja vāsanāḥ //MU_6,59.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17337: vāsanāvilaye jīvo vilīno bhavati svayam / yo hi yatsattayocchūnas tannāśāt sa vilīyate //MU_6,59.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17338: dehe vilayam āyāte deśakālānyatākṛteḥ / ko 'sau bhājanatām eti janmano maraṇasya ca //MU_6,59.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17339: svayaṃ kalpitasaṅkalpam ātmarūpaṃ yad ābilam / tad eva vāsanākāraṃ jīvaṃ viddhi mahāmate //MU_6,59.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17340: anāyattam asaṅkalpam ātmarūpaṃ yad avyayam / prabodhād vāsanāmuktaṃ taṃ mokṣaṃ viddhi bhārata //MU_6,59.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17341: jīvann eva mahābāho tattvaṃ prekṣya yathāsthitam / vāsanāvāgurāmukto mukta ity abhidhīyate //MU_6,59.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17342: yo na nirvāsano nūnaṃ sarvadharmaparo 'pi saḥ / sarvajño 'py abhito baddhaḥ pañjarastho yathā khagaḥ //MU_6,59.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17343: durdarśanasya gagane śikhipiñchikeva sūkṣmāpi visphurati yasya na vāsanāntaḥ / muktas sa eva bhavatīha hi vāsanaiva bandho 'naghasya nanu tatkṣaya eva mokṣaḥ //MU_6,59.44//
GSP27moksop_u:17346: bhagavān: iti nirvāsanatvena jīvanmuktatayātmani / antaśśītalatām etya bandhuduḥkham alaṃ tyaja //MU_6,60.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17348: pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryam idaṃ kiñcid yathāgatam / kuru kāryam akārpaṇyaṃ na kiñcid iha naśyati //MU_6,60.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17349: pravāhāpatitaṃ karma svam eva kriyate hi yat / jīvanmuktasvabhāvo 'sāv ajīvanmuktatānyathā //MU_6,60.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17350: idaṃ karma tyajāmīdam āśrayāmīty anirmalam / mūḍhasya manaso rūpaṃ jñamanas tu samasthiti //MU_6,60.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17351: pravāhāpatitaṃ kāryaṃ kurvantaś śāntacetasaḥ / jīvanmuktās suṣuptasthās sphuranty ardhaprabuddhavat //MU_6,60.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17352: sthirāṃ saṃhṛtim āyānti kūrmāṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ / indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo hṛdi jñasya svabhāvataḥ //MU_6,60.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17353: cinmātre vitate tantau dṛḍhe srag iva saṃsthitam / sadasadgrathitaṃ viśvaṃ viśvāṅge viśvakarmaṇi //MU_6,60.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17354: prasārite prasarati tv antardhiṃ yāti saṃvṛte / vicitraracanājālam ananyac cidvitānake //MU_6,60.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17355: ananyad apy anyad iva svāṅgarūpam anaṅgavat / citraṃ vitānaka iva sthitaṃ jagad idaṃ citi //MU_6,60.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17356: yathaivāracitaṃ citraṃ sthitaṃ citrakṛdīhite / tathā jātam ajātaṃ ca viśvaṃ saṃsthitam ātmani //MU_6,60.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17357: yathā sphurati kartavyaṃ citraṃ citrakṛtaś citi / viśvātmani tathā viśvaṃ kālatrayamayodayam //MU_6,60.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17358: abhitti trijagaccitraṃ kurute cittacitrakṛt / vyomni vyomātmakam api prasphuṭaṃ vṛttivartibhiḥ //MU_6,60.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17359: cittacitrakareṇādau citraṃ citraṃ vitānitam / paścād bhittiḥ kṛtā vyomarūpā cāsāv aho bhramaḥ //MU_6,60.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17360: apūrvaivātimāyeyaṃ kila yatra khakuḍyayoḥ / na manāg api bhedo 'sti sphuṭam apy upalabdhayoḥ //MU_6,60.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17361: imā yā upalakṣyante bhittayaś cittacitrajāḥ / vyomnaś śūnyatayā viddhi tās tāmarasalocana //MU_6,60.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17362: kṣaṇena cetasi yathā bhāto lokakṣayodayau / khātmā jagat tathaivedaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ nabhaḥ //MU_6,60.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17363: cirantanamanorājyamātre 'smin kila satyatā / katham ālokite 'pi syāt satyaṃ nāsty eva vibhrame //MU_6,60.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17364: bhrameṇālokitas satyam ālokena vilīyate / dṛśyamānam api kṣāmaṃ śaradīvābhram ambare //MU_6,60.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17365: cittacitrakṛtaś citte saṃsthitāś citraputrikāḥ / bhittyabhāvād anādhārā bahis tribhuvanādikāḥ //MU_6,60.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17366: naitās santi na cāsi tvaṃ kiṃ kena parirudhyate / rodhyarodhakasammohaṃ tyaktvā khavimalo bhava //MU_6,60.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17367: pravṛttir eva kā vyomnaḥ pravṛttiś caiva khātmikā / ataḥ kālakriyākuḍyakalādi vimalaṃ nabhaḥ //MU_6,60.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17368: cittasaṃsthaṃ yathā citraṃ sadrūpam api khātmakam / vyomnaś śūnyatamaṃ viddhi tathedam akhilaṃ jagat //MU_6,60.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17369: cittabhittau kṛtaṃ citraṃ yac ciccitrakareṇa tat / sarvaṃ śūnyatayā vyomno manāg api na bhidyate //MU_6,60.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17370: yathā prakacataś citte jagannirmāṇasaṅkṣayau / kṣaṇenaiva tathaivemau bahissthāv iti viddhi he //MU_6,60.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17371: ādyakṣaṇamanorājye nānābhuvananāmani / kṣaṇabhāvini mohena kalpatā parikalpitā //MU_6,60.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17372: asad eva manorājyaṃ kartuṃ śaktaṃ yathā manaḥ / kṣaṇasya kalpīkaraṇe tathaiva balavan manaḥ //MU_6,60.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17373: kṣaṇaṃ kalpīkaroty etat tathālpaṃ kurute bahu / asat sat kurute kṣipram itīyaṃ bhrāntir utthitā //MU_6,60.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17374: kṣaṇam ādimanorājyaṃ pratibhātaṃ svabhāvataḥ / yad vicitrātma tad idaṃ jagajjālam iti sthitam //MU_6,60.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17375: sargo nirvāṇaniṣṭhatvān nimeṣam ayam utthitaḥ / pratibhāmātrato 'traiva kalpitā vajrasāratā //MU_6,60.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17376: cittacitrakṛtaś citsthaṃ jagaccitraṃ kacat sthitam / akuḍyam apy araṅgāḍhyam idaṃ sphāram ivāgrataḥ //MU_6,60.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17377: aho nu citraṃ nirbhitti citram ujjvalam utthitam / surañjanaṃ jagad iti sthitaṃ dṛṣṭivilobhanam //MU_6,60.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17382: ākāśa eva racitā pratibhaikaraṅgā mugdhā jagattrayamanoharaputrikeyam / cinmātravaktraparirañjitasarvalokā līlākulā capalacittakacitrakartrā //MU_6,60.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17386: jīvānvitā gagana eva kṛtā vicitrā vyomātmikāciravilakṣaṇacitrakartrā / cittena citraparikarmavidā trilokī nānāvilāsavalitā varaputriketi //MU_6,60.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17389: bhagavān: idaṃ viddhi mahāścaryam arjuneha hi yat kila / pūrvaṃ sañjāyate citraṃ paścād bhittir udeti hi //MU_6,61.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17390: abhittāv utthite citre dṛśyate bhittir ātatā / aho nu citrā māyeyaṃ magnaṃ tumbu śilā plutā //MU_6,61.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17391: cittasthacitrasadṛśe vyomātmani jagattraye / vyomātmanas te kim iyam ahantā vyomatoditā //MU_6,61.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17392: sargavyoma kṛtaṃ vyomnā vyomni vyoma vilīyate / bhujyate vyomani vyoma vyoma vyomani cātatam //MU_6,61.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17393: veṣṭitaṃ vāsanārajjvā dīrghasaṃsṛtidāma yat / vāsanodveṣṭanenaiva tad ihodveṣṭyate 'rjuna //MU_6,61.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17394: pratibimbaṃ yathādarśe tathedaṃ brahmaṇi svayam / agamyaṃ chedabhedāder ādhārānanyatāvaśāt //MU_6,61.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17395: ananyac chedabhedādi brahmaṇi brahma cāmbaram / kiṃ kathaṃ kasya kenaitac chidyate vā kva bhidyate //MU_6,61.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17396: brahmatā brahmatāpūre jale jalam iva sphurat / sthitā samasamā vyoma nirmalā śāntam ātmani //MU_6,61.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17397: vāsyavāsakabhāvo 'to manāg api na bhidyate / tenehāvāsanībhāvo bodhāt sampanna eva te //MU_6,61.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17398: yo na nirvāsano nūnaṃ sarvadharmaparo 'pi saḥ / sarvajño 'py atibaddhātmā tapasvy api sa rāgavān //MU_6,61.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17399: yasyāsti vāsanābījam atyalpaṃ citibhūmigam / bṛhat sañjāyate tasya punas saṃsṛtikānanam //MU_6,61.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17400: abhyāsād dhṛdi rūḍhena satyasambodhavahninā / nirdagdhaṃ vāsanābījaṃ na bhūyaḥ parirohati //MU_6,61.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17401: dagdhaṃ tu vāsanābījaṃ na nimajjati vastuṣu / sukhaduḥkhādiṣu svacchaṃ tumbīpattram ivāmbhasi //MU_6,61.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17402: śāntātmā vigatabhavāmayo 'si jāto nirvāṇo dalitamahāmanovimohaḥ / samyagjñaś śrutam avagamya pāvanaṃ tat tiṣṭhātmavyavahṛtir ekaśāntarūpaḥ //MU_6,61.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17405: arjunaḥ: naṣṭo mohas smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta / sthito 'smi gatasandehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava //MU_6,62.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17406: bhagavān: vṛttayo yadi bodhena saṃśāntā hṛdaye sphuṭam / tac cittaṃ śāntam evāśu viddhi sattvam upāgatam //MU_6,62.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17407: atra tac cetyarahitaṃ pratyakcetananāmakam / vastu śiṣṭaṃ vinirmuktaṃ yat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yat //MU_6,62.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17408: na kecana prabādhante tat padaṃ jagadādhayaḥ / bhūtalād gaganoḍḍīnaṃ vihaṅgamam ivotavaḥ //MU_6,62.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17409: pratyakcetanam ābhāsaṃ śuddhaṃ saṅkalpavarjitam / agamyam enam ātmānaṃ viddhi duṣṭadṛśām iha //MU_6,62.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17410: sarvātītapadasthasya citā śuddhasya vāsanā / na śaknoti padaṃ draṣṭuṃ janadṛṣṭir aher iva //MU_6,62.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17411: yatprāptau sarva eveme kṣīṇā ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ / varākī vāsanā tatra kiṃ karoti pare pade //MU_6,62.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17412: yathānalagiriṃ prāpya himaleśo vilīyate / śuddham āsādya cittattvam avidyā līyate tathā //MU_6,62.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17413: kva varākī rajastucchā vāsanā bhogabandhanī / kvāpūritajagajjālaś cittattvavipulānilaḥ //MU_6,62.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17414: tāvat sphuraty avidyeyaṃ nānākāravikāriṇī / yāvan na samparijñātaś śuddhas svātmāyam ātmanā //MU_6,62.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17415: sarvā dṛśyadṛśaḥ kṣīṇāś śuddhataivoditātatā / nabhasīva pade tasmin svātmany akhilapūraṇe //MU_6,62.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17416: samagrākārarūpaṃ tat samagrākāravarjitam / vāgatītaṃ paraṃ vastu kena nāmopamīyate //MU_6,62.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17417: viṣayaviṣaviṣūcikām atas tvaṃ nipuṇam ahaṃsthitivāsanām apāsya / abhimataparihārayatnayuktyā bhava virujo bhuvanaikanāthamūrtiḥ //MU_6,62.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17418: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti gaditavati trilokanāthe kṣaṇam iva maunam avasthite purastāt / atha madhupa ivāsitābjaṣaṇḍe vacanam upaiṣyati tatra pāṇḍuputraḥ //MU_6,62.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17419: arjunaḥ: parigalitasamastaśokabhāvā param udayaṃ bhagavan matir gateyam / mama tava vacanena lokabhartur dinapatinā paribodhitābjinīva //MU_6,62.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17420: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvotthāya gāṇḍīvadhanvā sa harisārathiḥ / arjuno gatasandeho raṇalīlāṃ kariṣyati //MU_6,62.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17424: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāghavāghavighātinīm / tiṣṭha nissaṅgasannyāsabrahmārpaṇamayātmikām //MU_6,63.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17425: yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ / yaś ca sarvamayo nitya ātmānaṃ viddhi taṃ param //MU_6,63.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17426: dūrastham apy adūrasthaṃ sarvagaṃ tvaṃ svam eva ca / tatsthas tattām avāpnoṣi tad evāsy astasaṃśayam //MU_6,63.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17427: yat saṃvedyavinirmuktaṃ saṃvedanam aninditam / cetyamuktacidābhāsaṃ tad viddhi paramaṃ padam //MU_6,63.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17428: sā parāt paramā kāṣṭhā sā dṛśāṃ dṛg anuttamā / sa mahimnāṃ ca mahimā gurūṇāṃ sa gurur guruḥ //MU_6,63.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17429: sa ātmā tac ca vijñānaṃ tac chūnyaṃ brahma tat param / tac chreyas sa śivaś śāntas sā vidyāparamā sthitiḥ //MU_6,63.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17430: yo 'yam antaścetanātmā sarvānubhavarūpakaḥ / yatra svadante sarvāṇi dravyāṇi svātmasattayā //MU_6,63.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17431: sa jagattilatailātmā sa jagadgṛhadīpakaḥ / sa jagatpādaparasas sa jagatpaśupālakaḥ //MU_6,63.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17432: sa tantur bhūtamuktānāṃ pariprotahṛdambaraḥ / sa bhūtamaricaughānāṃ paramā tiktatātatā //MU_6,63.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17433: sa padārthe padārthatvaṃ sa tucchatvam avastunaḥ / sa sato vastunas sattvam asattvam asataś ca saḥ //MU_6,63.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17434: jagadgṛhakriyābhāṇḍopaskarāṇāṃ sa dīpakaḥ / candrārkatārakātejas tenedaṃ prakaṭīkṛtam //MU_6,63.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17435: sarvaṃ prasṛtam etasmāc cetanāt paramātmanaḥ / svasaṃvittivicāreṇa svayam ātmaiṣa labhyate //MU_6,63.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17436: sarva eva jagadbhāvā avicāraṇacāravaḥ / avidyamānasadbhāvā vicāraviśarāravaḥ //MU_6,63.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17437: aham ādau jagajjāle mithyābhramabharātmani / ko bhūtvā kvānubadhnāmi dhṛtiṃ katham avāstavīm //MU_6,63.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17438: ādimadhyāntamananasaṅkalpakalanāsv aham / brahmākāśam anādyantaṃ keveyattā mamātmanaḥ //MU_6,63.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17439: itiniścayavān yo 'ntas samavyavahṛtir bahiḥ / udayāstamayonmuktas sthito 'nantas sa sarvadā //MU_6,63.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17440: nāstam eti na codeti sāmyaṃ samam avasthitam / yasya khasyeva śūnyatvaṃ sa mahātmeha sadvapuḥ //MU_6,63.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17441: bhāvādvaitapadārūḍhas suṣuptaparayā dhiyā / vyavahāry api hṛtkṣobhaṃ naity ādarśanaro yathā //MU_6,63.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17442: ādarśapuruṣasyeva vyavahāravato 'pi ca / na yasya hṛdayollekho manāg api sa muktibhāk //MU_6,63.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17443: avibhāgamatāv eva jñamaṇau pratibimbati / citeḥ paramavaimalyād vyavahāro yathāgataḥ //MU_6,63.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17444: ciccamatkṛtir eveyaṃ jagad ity avabhāsate / nehāsty aikyaṃ na ca dvitvam upadeśo 'pi tanmayaḥ //MU_6,63.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17445: vācyavācakaśiṣyehāgurvākhyais svacamatkṛtaiḥ / ātmanātmani śāntaiva cic camatkurute citi //MU_6,63.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17446: citpraspando hi saṃsāras tadaspandaḥ paraṃ padam / citspandaśamaneneyaṃ pariśāmyati saṃsṛtiḥ //MU_6,63.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17447: mahāciter nañarthāṃśabhāvo yo 'bhāvanakṣayaḥ / asann iva svabhāvena sa citspanda udāhṛtaḥ //MU_6,63.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17448: śūnyatvam ajaḍaṃ yat tat param āhuś citer vapuḥ / nañarthābhāvanā yātra saṃsṛtis sānubhūyate //MU_6,63.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17449: abhāvanāmātralayā sā ca nissārarūpiṇī / kevalaṃ kevalībhāvas svas sadrūpo 'vaśiṣyate //MU_6,63.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17450: citspanda eva saṃsāracakrapravahaṇaṃ viduḥ / mātṛmānaprameyādi kaṭakādīva hemani //MU_6,63.27//
