GSP27moksop_u:17451: pṛthag asti na ca spandaś citer yas saṃsṛtir bhavet / cittvam eva cites spandas tadabodho hi saṃsṛtiḥ //MU_6,63.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17452: abodhamātraṃ citspandaḥ kaṭakatvam ivotthitam / bodhamātravilīne 'smiñ śuddhaṃ ciddhema śiṣyate //MU_6,63.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17453: satyāvabodhamātreṇa kṣīyate bhogabhāvanā / bhogābhāvanam eveha paramaṃ jñatvalakṣaṇam //MU_6,63.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17454: ime 'nabhimatās sarve jñasya bhogās svabhāvataḥ / bhavanti ko 'titṛpto hi durannaṃ kila vāñchati //MU_6,63.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17455: etad eva paraṃ viddhi jñatvasya paralakṣaṇam / svabhāvenaiva bhogānāṃ yat kilānabhivāñchanam //MU_6,63.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17456: cid aspandaiva sarvātmarūpiṇy astīti niścayaḥ / yo 'ntaḥ prarūḍhas svābhyāsāj jñatvaśabdena sa smṛtaḥ //MU_6,63.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17457: yo na bhuṅkte bhujyamānān api bhogān abuddhimān / lokānurodhasiddhyarthaṃ sa hanti laguḍair nabhaḥ //MU_6,63.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17458: vinākṛtrimayā yuktyā na siddhir adhigamyate / kvacid ātmani loke vā svāṅgāvadalanair api //MU_6,63.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17459: cic cetyacaityakoṭisthā tāvat paśyati vibhramam / iyaṃ yāvad abodhātmā spandate spandarūpiṇī //MU_6,63.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17460: samyagbodhodaye tv asyās spandāspandadaśākramāḥ / kvāpi yāntīva saṃśāntadīpavat sābhidhānakāḥ //MU_6,63.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17461: citaḥ prakāśarūpāyā dīpikāyās svabhāvataḥ / spandāspandamayī neha kathaivāsti manāg api //MU_6,63.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17462: yad aspandasya maruto na san nāsan na madhyagam / rūpaṃ tad eva saṃvittispandatā praśamocitā //MU_6,63.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17463: abhinno 'syāś cites spandaś śuddhacitsārarūpadhṛt / na bandhāya na mokṣāya sthita ātmani kevalam //MU_6,63.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17464: cic cen nañarthasaṃvittiṃ nirvāṇeva na vindate / tad bandhamokṣapakṣāder nāmāpi hi na vidyate //MU_6,63.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17465: mokṣo 'stv ity eva bandho 'ntaḥpūrṇatākṣayakāraṇaṃ / māstv itīty api bandhas te śreyase 'vedanaṃ param //MU_6,63.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17466: yad anābhāsam ajaḍaṃ tad viddhi paramaṃ padam / citas svarūpasaṃsthānam acetyonmukhatātmakam //MU_6,63.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17467: yas saṅkalpanaśabdārtharūpas spando mahāciteḥ / bandhamokṣādikārho 'sau prekṣyamāṇaḥ praśāmyati //MU_6,63.44//
GSP27moksop_u:17468: prekṣaṇād eva saṃśānte tv ahambhāve nirāspade / na vidmaḥ kena kiṃ kasya badhyate vātha mucyate //MU_6,63.45//
GSP27moksop_u:17469: saṅkalpa eva ca citer buddhaś ced avibhāgavān / tad asaṅkalpam aspandaṃ sarvaṃ jātam avāritam //MU_6,63.46//
GSP27moksop_u:17470: spande 'spandatayaivātte tanmayatvāt sadā citā / saṅkṣīṇa eva saṃsāro nisspande cidghane sthite //MU_6,63.47//
GSP27moksop_u:17471: citteja eva citspanda iti buddhe nirantaram / vyatiriktaś citas spando na kaścid avaśiṣyate //MU_6,63.48//
GSP27moksop_u:17472: asmin dṛśyamaye dīrghasvapne svapnāntaraṃ vrajan / na jño moham upādatte sarvagatvāt svasaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,63.49//
GSP27moksop_u:17473_0: yatrodeti prasabham aniśaṃ sarvasaṃvittisattā yasminn ete sakalakalanākāraṭaṅkā laganti / utpadyante svadanasubhagaṃ yatra
GSP27moksop_u:17473_1: sarvopalambhā dhyānenainaṃ tam avagamaya pratyagātmānam antaḥ //MU_6,63.50 //
GSP27moksop_u:17476: vasiṣṭhaḥ: enam āhuḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ viddhy enaṃ paramaṃ padam / vedmy enam ekam evāham eṣa evāsti netaraḥ //MU_6,64.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17477: ya eṣa pratyagātmāntas sarvasattaikadarpaṇaḥ / etasmād idam utpannaṃ jagad bījād iva drumaḥ //MU_6,64.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17478: buddhyahaṅkāracittādi varjayitvā jaḍātmakam / yatrānubhavitāntas te tad viddhi paramaṃ padam //MU_6,64.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17479: śuddhānubhavamātraṃ yan manobuddhyādivarjitam / mahācidabhidhaṃ puṇyaṃ tad etat paramaṃ padam //MU_6,64.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17480: tatsthā ete mahārūpā brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ / vibhūtibhis sphuranty uccair janās tuṣṭanṛpā iva //MU_6,64.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17481: ākāśagamanādyābhiḥ krīḍābhiḥ krīḍyate ciram / tatsthenaiva janeneha svarge svargaukasā yathā //MU_6,64.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17482: tat prāpya nāṅga mriyate tat prāpyāṅga na śocyate / tat prāpya kṣīyate nāṅga tat prāpyāṅga na badhyate //MU_6,64.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17483: apāraparamākāśarūpiṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ / sattāsāmānyarūpaṃ cen manāg api vibhāvyate //MU_6,64.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17484: tat tannimeṣamātreṇa jantur muktamanā muniḥ / kurvan saṃsārakarmāṇi na bhūyaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,64.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17485: rāmaḥ: mano buddhir ahaṅkāra iti yatra kṣayaṃ gatam / sattāsāmānyam ābhānaṃ kiṃ tat kīdṛśam ucyate //MU_6,64.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17486: vasiṣṭhaḥ: yad brahma sarvadehasthaṃ bhuṅkte pibati valgati / ādatte vinihanty atti saṃvitsaṃvedyavarjitam //MU_6,64.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17487: tat sarvagatam ādyantarahitaṃ sthitam ūrjitam / sattāsāmānyam akhilaṃ vastutattvam ihocyate //MU_6,64.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17488: tat sthitaṃ khatayā vyomni śabde śabdatayā sthitam / sparśe sthitaṃ sparśatayā tvaci tat tvaktayā sthitam //MU_6,64.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17489: rase līnaṃ rasatayā rasanāyāṃ ca tattayā / rūpe rūpatayā dṛṣṭaṃ netre līnaṃ ca dṛktayā //MU_6,64.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17490: ghrāṇe ghrāṇatayā dṛṣṭaṃ gandhe gandhatayoditam / puṣṭaṃ kāyatayā kāye bhūmāv api ca bhūtayā //MU_6,64.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17491: payastayā ca payasi vāyau vāyutayā sthitam / tejastayā tejasi ca buddhau buddhitayā gatam //MU_6,64.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17492: manastayā manasy antar ahaṅkṛtyāpy ahaṅkṛtau / rūḍhaṃ saṃvidi saṃvittyā citi cittvena cotthitam //MU_6,64.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17493: vṛkṣe vṛkṣatayā lagnaṃ paṭe paṭatayā sthitam / ghaṭe ghaṭatayā rūḍhaṃ vaṭe vaṭatayā sthitam //MU_6,64.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17494: sthāvare sthāvaratvena jaṅgamatvena jaṅgame / pāṣāṇatvena pāṣāṇe cetanatvena cetane //MU_6,64.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17495: amareṣv amaratvena naratvena nareṣu ca / tiryaktvena ca tiryakṣu krimitvena krimisthitau //MU_6,64.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17496: kālakrame kālatayā ṛtāv ṛtutayānayā / tuṭikṣaṇanimeṣādau saṃsthitas tattayā vibhuḥ //MU_6,64.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17497: śukle śuklatayā jātaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇatayā sthitam / kriyāsu spandarūpeṇa niyatau niyamena ca //MU_6,64.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17498: saṃsthitas saṃsthitau sthityā nāśe nāśatayā sthitaḥ / utpattirūpeṇotpattāv āsthitaḥ parameśvaraḥ //MU_6,64.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17499: bālye bālyena viśrānto yauvane yauvanena ca / jarasā ca jarārūpe maraṇe maraṇena ca //MU_6,64.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17500: iti sarvapadārthānām abhinnaḥ parameśvaraḥ / kallolaśīkarormīṇām abdhāv iva payobharaḥ //MU_6,64.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17501: nānātaiṣā tv asatyaiṣā satyenānena caiva hi / kalpitā citsvabhāvena vetālaś śiśunā yathā //MU_6,64.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17502: sarvatra saṃsthitimatā vigatāmayena vyāptaṃ mayedam akhilaṃ vividhair vilāsaiḥ / cidrūpiṇaiva kalitākalitātmaneti sarvopaśāntamatir āssva sukhaṃ mahātman //MU_6,64.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17503: vālmīkiḥ: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma / snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_6,64.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17506: rāmaḥ: yathāsmākaṃ mune svapnapurapattanamaṇḍalam / tathaiva padmajādīnāṃ yadi dehaparigrahaḥ //MU_6,65.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17507: tathaivedaṃ ca sañjātaṃ yadi sarvam asanmayam / tad asmākaṃ dṛḍhataraḥ pratyayaḥ katham utthitaḥ //MU_6,65.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17508: vasiṣṭhaḥ: asmatsargavad ābhāti pūrvasargaprajāpatiḥ / svajīvapratibhāsātmā vidyate na tu vāstavaḥ //MU_6,65.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17509: sarvagatvāc cites sarvaṃ jīvas sarvatra saṃsṛtiḥ / sā cāsatyā darśanotthā samyagdarśananāśinī //MU_6,65.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17510: svapnābhaḥ pratibhāso 'sya ya eṣa svayam utthitaḥ / ahantāpratyayaikātmā sa evātidṛḍhas sthitaḥ //MU_6,65.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17511: svapne kṣaṇavināśitvaṃ yathā puṃsā na dṛśyate / sargasvapne tathaivaitad brahmaṇāpi na lakṣyate //MU_6,65.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17512: svapno 'grapuruṣasyāsya pratibhāsaś ca yo bhavet / rāmāsmadādisargātmā bhavet tādṛśa eva saḥ //MU_6,65.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17513: yat svapnapuruṣāj jātaṃ tat svapnapuruṣātmakam / bhavatīty anubhūtaṃ hi yad bījaṃ tat phalaṃ yathā //MU_6,65.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17514: asatyam eva tad viddhi yad asatyena sādhyate / asaty arthe samarthe 'pi na yuktaṃ bhāvabandhanam //MU_6,65.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17515: asaty arthe samarthe 'pi sattā bhāvanasambhavā / yatas tena parityājyam asadbhāvanabhāvanam //MU_6,65.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17516: dṛḍhapratyayinas svapnapuruṣād yat samutthitam / bhavaty ātmani sargādi dṛḍhapratyayam eva tat //MU_6,65.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17517: nimeṣamātram evāyaṃ sargasvapnas sphuran sthitaḥ / tasmin nimeṣa evāsmatkalpatā parikalpitā //MU_6,65.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17518: sudīrghasvapnaṣaṇḍo 'yaṃ yathodeti prajāpateḥ / sargādyās sarvabhūtānāṃ pratyekam uditās tathā //MU_6,65.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17519: cittattvasyaiva bhāvena sargasvapnaparamparāḥ / sphuranty ambho dravatvena yathāvartavivartanaiḥ //MU_6,65.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17520: yadā svapnātmikaiveyaṃ sargalakṣmīr na vāstavī / idaṃ sambhavatīdaṃ no vety ataḥ pralayaṃ gatam //MU_6,65.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17521: yad yathā yādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tat tādṛg vidyate tathā / na hi paryanuyujyante svapnavibhramanītayaḥ //MU_6,65.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17522: na tad asti jagaty asmin yan na sambhavati bhrame / vicitrās triṣu lokeṣu dṛśyante vastudṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_6,65.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17523: jalamadhye jvalaty agnir yathābdhau vaḍavānalaḥ / nagarāṇy ambare santi yathā vaimānikāśrayāḥ //MU_6,65.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17524: śilāsv abjāni jāyante hemādrāv iva pādapāḥ / ekāge sarvapuṣpāṇi santi kalpatarau yathā //MU_6,65.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17525: śilāḥ phalanti phalavad yathā ratnagulucchakāḥ / śilāntaḥ prāṇinas santi bhekā iva śilāntare //MU_6,65.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17526: dṛṣado vāri niryāti candrakāntopalād iva / nimeṣeṇa ghaṭo yāti paṭatāṃ śāpavān iva //MU_6,65.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17527: svāsattām api budhyante svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā / adhogāmi jalaṃ vyomni ḍīyate 'bhragataṃ yathā //MU_6,65.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17528: vitānam iva khe vāri tiṣṭhati svarnadī yathā / uḍḍīyante śilās sthūlāḥ pakṣavanto 'drayo yathā //MU_6,65.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17529: śilātaḥ prāpyate sarvaṃ nanu cintāmaṇer iva / cintitāni phalanty āśu devodyānāntareṣv iva //MU_6,65.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17530: tāny eva na phalanty āśu mokṣādīnīva rāghava / acetano 'pi kurute karma yantrapumān iva //MU_6,65.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17531: evamādis tathānyaś ca vicitrārambhavibhramaḥ / dṛṣṭaś śambaragandharvavilāsair apy asambhavaḥ //MU_6,65.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17533: asambhavas sambhavānām apīhābhyupapadyate / sambhavāsambhavāṃśasya siddhayas svapnavibhramāḥ //MU_6,65.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17534: na tad asti na yat satyaṃ na tad asti na yan mṛṣā / sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvatra svapne sargābhidhānake //MU_6,65.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17535: svapne nimagnadhīr jantuḥ paśyati sthiratāṃ yathā / sargasvapne magnabuddhiḥ paśyati sthiratāṃ tathā //MU_6,65.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17536: bhramād bhramāntaraṃ gacchan svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ vrajan / atisthirapratyayabhāg iha jīvo vimuhyati //MU_6,65.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17537: śvabhrāntaraṃ śvabhranipātadoṣāt samprāpnuvan mugdhamṛgaḥ prayāti / mohaṃ yathā pātamayaikarūpaṃ jīvas tathā saṃsṛtipātamūḍhaḥ //MU_6,65.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17540: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atra rāghava vakṣye 'ham itihāsam imaṃ śṛṇu / yad vṛttaṃ kasyacid bhikṣoḥ kvacin mananaśālinaḥ //MU_6,66.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17541: āsīt kaścin mahābhikṣus samādhyabhyāsatatparaḥ / nityaṃ svavyavahāreṇa kṣapayann akhilaṃ dinam //MU_6,66.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17542: samādhyabhyāsaśuddhaṃ tat tasya cittaṃ kṣaṇena yat / cintayaty āśu tadbhāvaṃ gacchaty ambv iva vīcitām //MU_6,66.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17543: kadācit sa samādhānavirato 'tiṣṭhad ekadhīḥ / kañcit sañcintayām āsa svāsanasthaḥ kriyākramam //MU_6,66.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17544: tasya cintayato jātā pratibheyam atha svataḥ / bhāvayāmy āśu līlārthaṃ sāmānyajanavṛttitām //MU_6,66.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17545: iti sañcintya ceto 'sya sthitaṃ kiñcin narāntaram / spandasaṃsthānasantyāgamātreṇāvartake 'mbv iva //MU_6,66.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17546: tena cittanareṇātha kṛtaṃ nāmātmanīcchayā / jīvaṭo 'smīti sahasā kākatālīyavat sthitam //MU_6,66.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17547: jīvaṭo vijahārātha sa svapnapuruṣaś ciram / svapnanirmāṇanagare kasmiṃścit puravīthiṣu //MU_6,66.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17548: tatra pānaṃ papau matto bhṛṅgaḥ padmarasaṃ yathā / śilayeva dṛḍhaṃ piṣṭas suṣvāpa ghananidrayā //MU_6,66.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17549: svapne dadarśa vipratvaṃ pāṭhānuṣṭhānatuṣṭimat / pratibhāmātrasampannaṃ cittadeśāntarāptivat //MU_6,66.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17550: kadācit sa dvijaśreṣṭhas svāharvyāpāraniṣṭhayā / ājagāma ghanāṃ nidrāṃ bījatām iva pādapaḥ //MU_6,66.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17551: so 'py apaśyat svayaṃ svapne sāmantatvam athātmani / patākārathahastyaśvasenājaladamālitam //MU_6,66.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17552: sa sāmantaḥ kṛtāhāraḥ kadācid ghananidrayā / suṣvāpāntarvyavahṛtir bījatāyām iva drumaḥ //MU_6,66.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17553: apaśyad rājatāṃ svapne kakubvalayamālinīm / lālitāṃ bhogapūgena puṣpaughenartutām iva //MU_6,66.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17554: sa kadācin nṛpas svasthas suṣvāpāstamitehitaḥ / purobhāvinijācāras svaṃ kāryam iva kāraṇe //MU_6,66.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17555: apaśyad ātmani svapne surastrītvam aninditam / vṛkṣaḥ kesarasollāso mañjarītvam ivoditam //MU_6,66.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17556: sā reme surasenāsu devodyānasthalīṣu ca / kṣīrāmbhodhitaraṅgeṣu loleva harivallabhā //MU_6,66.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17557: suṣvāpa saikadā bālā mattodyānalatāgṛhe / saṃśāntasvamanasspandaṃ gandhalekheva paṅkaje //MU_6,66.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17558: dadarśātmany atha svapne saṃsargavaśatoditam / mṛgītvam ātmani svairam āvartatvam ivāmbutā //MU_6,66.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17559: sā mṛgī lolanayanā kadācin nidrayāhṛtā / svapne dadarśa vallītvaṃ svābhyāsād rūḍham ātmani //MU_6,66.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17560: tiryañco 'pi prapaśyanti svapnaṃ cittasvabhāvataḥ / dṛṣṭānto 'tra śukāśvebhasañjñāsmaraṇam akṣatam //MU_6,66.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17562: bījāntassthāṅkurākārarūpayehādhirūḍhayā / sāpaśyad antassaṃvittyā sphuṭaṃ lavanam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,66.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17563: kañcit kālaṃ suṣuptasthakalayā jaḍatāṃ ghanam / anubhūya dadarśātha svātmānaṃ bhramaraṃ sthitam //MU_6,66.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17564: ṣaṭpado vijahārātha vane vanalatāsv asau / padminīṣu ca phullāsu taruṇīṣv iva vallabhaḥ //MU_6,66.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17565: bimbādharaṃ vidalayan svādayan kausumaṃ madhu / svapan kusumaśayyāsu bhuktvā vallīvilāsinīḥ //MU_6,66.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17566: sa babhūva sarojinyāṃ vyasanī bisanālavat / kvacid eva ratiṃ yāti ceto jaḍamater api //MU_6,66.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17567: tām ājagāma nalinīṃ pariloḍayituṃ gajaḥ / ramyavastukṣayāyaiva mūḍhānāṃ jṛmbhate manaḥ //MU_6,66.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17568: nalinīmathanenaiva samaṃ tena sa ṣaṭpadaḥ / guṇavattāntare rūḍhir iva cūrṇatvam āyayau //MU_6,66.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17570: śuṣkasāgaragambhīre gajaḥ khāte papāta ha / tamoghanaghane śūnye saṃsāra iva jīvakaḥ //MU_6,66.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17571: babhūva vallabho rājño mahān parabalāntakaḥ / sadā madabalakṣīvo ghūrṇann iva niśācaraḥ //MU_6,66.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17572: kadācid arinistriṃśacchinnas so 'stam upāyayau / vivekāsilatālūnarūpo jīva ivātmani //MU_6,66.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17573: paśyan gajaghaṭākumbhamaṇīn procchalitān alīn / utkrāman sa gajāj jīvo bhūyo drāgity abhūd aliḥ //MU_6,66.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17574: sevamāno vanalatāḥ punar āyāt sa padminīm / dustaro hi cirābhyāso vāsanānām abodhataḥ //MU_6,66.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17575: tatra hastikhurākrāntyā punar ācūrṇatāṃ yayau / pārśvasthahaṃsasaṃvittyā babhūva kalahaṃsakaḥ //MU_6,66.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17576: sa haṃsaḥ phullapadmāsu sarasīṣu ciraṃ caran / kadācid bahubhir haṃsais saṅgato virarāja ha //MU_6,66.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17577: brahmahaṃsātmikā saṃvid aśabdārthavatī manāk / tatra pusphora tasyāntaḥ prāgjāṇḍarasabarhivat //MU_6,66.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17578: sa tāṃ vibhāvayan dūrād dṛḍhaṃ dāśeṣuṇā hataḥ / tatsaṃvittyanusandhānāj jātaḥ padmajasārasaḥ //MU_6,66.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17579: tatrātisantatavivekavacovilāsair ābodhito 'dhigatapāvanavastudṛṣṭiḥ / muktas sthito nanu yugāntavidhau videhamuktena tena kila bhāvyam avaśyam eva //MU_6,66.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17582: vasiṣṭhaḥ: sa kadācid dadarśātha rudraṃ rudrapure khagaḥ / vairiñcanalinīnālalīlālānebhalīlayā //MU_6,67.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17583: tatra buddhir abhūt tasya rudro 'ham iti niścitā / pratibimbaṃ varādarśe jhagity eva hi bimbati //MU_6,67.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17584: rudrībhūtavapus tatra tanuṃ tatyāja tām asau / gandhaḥ pavanatāṃ gacchan kusumastabakaṃ yathā //MU_6,67.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17585: rudro 'tha rudrabhavane vijahāra yadṛcchayā / tais taiś śivapurācārair gaṇagoṣṭhīgariṣṭhayā //MU_6,67.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17586: rudras tv anuttarajñānavilāsaikatayā tayā / svam aśeṣam udantaṃ tam apaśyat prāktanaṃ dhiyā //MU_6,67.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17587: nirāvaraṇavijñānavapus sa bhagavān haraḥ / uvāca svayam ekānte svasvapnaśatavismitaḥ //MU_6,67.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17588: aho nu citrā māyeyaṃ bata viśvavimohinī / asaty evāpi sadrūpā surūḍhā maruvārivat //MU_6,67.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17590: yadṛcchāsthitajīvatvo bhūtatanmātrarañjitaḥ / kasmiṃścid abhavaṃ sarge bhikṣur akṣubhito 'bhitaḥ //MU_6,67.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17591: tenālayanibaddhena bahis svairavihāritā / līlāvilulitākārā yadā ramyeti bhāvitā //MU_6,67.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17592: sarvabhāvopamardena tadabhyāsavaśāt tadā / tām eva so 'nvabhūd bhikṣus tyaktvānyaṃ mananodayam //MU_6,67.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17593: camatkṛtiś cetasi yā rūḍhā saiva vijṛmbhate / vallī tyajati naidāghī pītam apy ambu mādhavam //MU_6,67.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17594: sa bhikṣur jīvaṭo bhūtvā jantur jaraḍhavāsanaḥ / teṣu deśeṣu babhrāma randhreṣv iva pipīlakaḥ //MU_6,67.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17595: ātmani dvijabhaktatvāt so 'paśyad dvijatām atha / bhāvo bhāvaviparyāse balavān eva vardhate //MU_6,67.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17596: sāmantatām avāpāsau vipras satatacintitām / sātatyena rasaḥ pītaḥ phalatām eti pādape //MU_6,67.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17597: rājyārthadharmakāryāṇāṃ kartṛtvāt so 'bhavan nṛpaḥ / sa kāmukatayā rājā surastrītvam avāpa ha //MU_6,67.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17598: lolalocanalobhena sā mṛgī rasaśālinī / babhūva vāsanāmohas tv aho duḥkhāya jantuṣu //MU_6,67.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17599: mṛgī satatacittasthā babhūva vipine latā / avaśyambhāvi lavanaṃ latikānubabhūva ha //MU_6,67.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17600: antassañjñācirābhyastaṃ bhramaratvam athātmani / sāpaśyad bhāvamardena sadātadbhāvabhāvitā //MU_6,67.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17601: sa vāraṇakhurakṣodam anubhūyātha bhāvitam / bhūyo bhūyaḥ prababhrāma mahāsaṃsṛtivibhramān //MU_6,67.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17602: saṃsāraśataparyante rudras so 'yam ahaṃ sthitaḥ / asmin saṃsārasaṃrambhe svamanomātrasambhṛte //MU_6,67.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17603: evaṃ saṃśāntarūpāsu saṃsārāraṇyabhūmiṣu / bahvīṣv aham abhibhrāntas tv aśūnyāsv iva bhūriśaḥ //MU_6,67.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17604: kasmiṃścid abhavaṃ sarge tv ahaṃ jīvaṭanāmakaḥ / kasmiṃścid brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhaḥ kasmiṃścid vasudhādhipaḥ //MU_6,67.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17605: haṃsaḥ padmavane bhūtvā vindhyakacche ca vāraṇaḥ / hariṇo hehayādrau ca daśām aham imāṃ gataḥ //MU_6,67.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17606: atra varṣasahasrāṇi caturyugaśatāni ca / samatītāny anantāni dinarturacitāni ca //MU_6,67.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17607: mama prathamam eva prāksphuritasya parāt padāt / sattvajātitayā rūḍho bhikṣutve yo jñatākramaḥ //MU_6,67.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17608: bhūyo bhūyo 'py atikramya gatasya brahmahaṃsatām / sa eva prāktano 'bhyāsaḥ phalitas saṅgamodayāt //MU_6,67.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17609: dṛḍhābhyāso ya evāsya jīvasyodety avighnataḥ / yonyantaraśatenāpi tam evaiṣo 'nudhāvati //MU_6,67.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17610: kākatālīyayogena kadācit sādhusaṅgamāt / aśubho vāsanābhyāso jīvasya vinivartate //MU_6,67.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17611: saṅgatyādikam evaiṣa kevalaṃ svodayaṃ prati / prāktano vāsanābhyāso hetuṃ laghum apekṣate //MU_6,67.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17612: yad yad abhyasyate 'jasram anyadehāntare 'pi ca / jāgratsvapneṣv asad api tat sad ity anubhūyate //MU_6,67.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17613: tat tad arthakriyākāri duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca / udeti bhāvanā tasmād bhāvanābhāvanaṃ jayaḥ //MU_6,67.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17614: bhāvanaiva svam ātmānaṃ deho 'yam iti paśyati / svasattāmātravistāraṃ taṃ gulmatvam ivāṅkuraḥ //MU_6,67.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17615: bhāvanā prekṣyamāṇaiṣā na kiñcid api śiṣyate / naiva vidyata eveti tadbhrameṇālam astu naḥ //MU_6,67.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17617: asanmayī kharūpaiṣā varaṃ sattaiva lālanī / pravartatāṃ vinodāya kim asan naḥ kariṣyati //MU_6,67.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17618: tat tān sarvān svasaṃsārān utthāyālokayāmy aham / kāṃścid ālokadānena tebhya ekīkaromy aham //MU_6,67.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17619: iti sañcintya rudro 'sau taṃ sargaṃ prajagāma ha / yatra bhikṣur vihārasthas suptaś śava iva sthitaḥ //MU_6,67.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17620: bodhayitvātha taṃ bhikṣuṃ cetasā cetanena ca / yojayām āsa sasmāra bhikṣur apy ātmano bhramam //MU_6,67.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17621: rudram ātmānam ālokya jīvaṭādimayaṃ tathā / bodhād avismayārho 'pi sthityarthaṃ vismayaṃ yayau //MU_6,67.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17622: atha rudras tathā bhikṣur dvāv evotthāya jagmatuḥ / kvāpi jīvaṭasaṃsāraṃ cidākāśaikakoṇagam //MU_6,67.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17623: tatra tadbhavanaṃ gatvā tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam / viṣayaṃ taṃ puraṃ tac ca tac ca pānavaṇiggṛham //MU_6,67.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17624: suptaṃ dadṛśatur naṣṭasañjñaṃ jīvaṭakaṃ śavam / sthāpayitvā vapurbhāraṃ prabhrāntaṃ bhavabhūmiṣu //MU_6,67.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17625: taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca / ekarūpās trirūpās te rudrajīvaṭabhikṣukāḥ //MU_6,67.44//
GSP27moksop_u:17626: bodhavanto 'py abuddhābhā vismitā apy avismitāḥ / babhus tūṣṇīṃ sthitāś citre kṛtākārā iva kṣaṇam //MU_6,67.45//
GSP27moksop_u:17627: atha jagmuś ca te sarve kvacic cidvyomani sthitam / viprasaṃsāram ārambhaparabhūtasaghuṅghumam //MU_6,67.46//
GSP27moksop_u:17628: tatra tadbhavanaṃ gatvā tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam / viṣayaṃ taṃ ca taṃ grāmaṃ prāpus te brāhmaṇālayam //MU_6,67.47//
GSP27moksop_u:17629: vipraṃ te dadṛśus suptaṃ kalatravalitaṃ gṛhe / kaṇṭhe gṛhītaṃ brāhmaṇyā bahirjīvam iva sthitam //MU_6,67.48//
GSP27moksop_u:17630: taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca / tasthus te bahavo 'py eke savismayam avismayāḥ //MU_6,67.49//
GSP27moksop_u:17631: atha jagmuś cidākāśakacitaṃ cetitaṃ ca taiḥ / sāmantanṛpasaṃsāram ārambhabharasundaram //MU_6,67.50//
GSP27moksop_u:17632: tatra tadbhavanaṃ prāpus tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam / sāmantaṃ dadṛśur mattaṃ suptaṃ paryaṅkapaṅkaje //MU_6,67.51//
GSP27moksop_u:17633: hemāvadātaṃ hemāṅgyā nihitaṃ kucakoṭare / bhramaryevānvitaṃ padmakośasuptaṃ madhuvratam //MU_6,67.52//
GSP27moksop_u:17634: kāntābhir abhyāvalitaṃ mañjarībhir iva drumam / dīpajālakamadhyasthaṃ ratnaugha iva kāñcanam //MU_6,67.53//
GSP27moksop_u:17635: taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca / tasthus te bahavo 'py evaṃ savismayam avismayam //MU_6,67.54//
GSP27moksop_u:17636: atha te rājasaṃsāraṃ jagmus tatra prabodhya tam / tena sārdham athānyāsu bhremus saṃsṛtibhūmiṣu //MU_6,67.55//
GSP27moksop_u:17637: prāpya tāṃ brahmahaṃsehāṃ rudratāṃ sarva eva te / samājagmur virejuś ca rudrāṇām uttamaṃ śatam //MU_6,67.56//
GSP27moksop_u:17638: ekasaṃvid bhinnatanu citraceṣṭam aceṣṭitam / ekarūpam anekātma rūpaṃ ca parameśvaram //MU_6,67.57//
GSP27moksop_u:17639: rudrāṇāṃ tac chatam atha nirāvaraṇacinmayam / sarvasaṃsāragaṃ viddhi sthitaṃ sarvajagatsthiti //MU_6,67.58//
GSP27moksop_u:17640: daśa rudraśatānīha santi rāma mahānti ca / etad ekādaśaṃ viddhi saṃsāraṃ prati saṃsthitam //MU_6,67.59//
GSP27moksop_u:17641: yo yo hi yasya jīvasya saṃsāras samudeti hi / tatrāprabuddhā jīvaughāḥ paśyanti na parasparam //MU_6,67.60//
GSP27moksop_u:17642: milanti hi mitho buddhās taraṅgāmbv iva vāridhau / aprabuddhās svatāmātraniṣṭhā loṣṭavad āsthitāḥ //MU_6,67.61//
GSP27moksop_u:17643: yathā dravatvād vīcyambūny anyo'nyaṃ sammilanty alam / tathā prabuddhā jīvaughā mithaś cittvān milanty alam //MU_6,67.62//
GSP27moksop_u:17644: pratyekam uditāś caite saṃsāre jīvarāśayaḥ / ciddhātos sarvagatvena tv asatyās satyavat sthitāḥ //MU_6,67.63//
GSP27moksop_u:17645: yad yad ākhanyate bhūmes tat tan nāma yathāṅga mṛt / sarvagāyāś citer yad yad ūhyate tat tatheha cit //MU_6,67.64//
GSP27moksop_u:17646: sarvatra pañcabhūtāni yathānubhavasīha hi / tatheha sarvabhūtātma cittvaṃ sarvatra vidyate //MU_6,67.65//
GSP27moksop_u:17647: yat sālabhañjikāvṛnde śailastambhagate 'ṅgakam / prekṣyate tat tad evāśma tathā citi jagac citaḥ //MU_6,67.66//
GSP27moksop_u:17648: avedane pare śuddhe vedanaṃ yaj jaganti tat / akāraṇakam evaitac chūnyatvaṃ nabhaso yathā //MU_6,67.67//
GSP27moksop_u:17649: cidghane vedanaṃ dṛśyaṃ bandho mokṣas tv avedanaṃ / yad eva rucitaṃ te syāt tad evāśu dṛḍhīkuru //MU_6,67.68//
GSP27moksop_u:17650: sargāsargau bandhamokṣau vedanāvedanātmakau / abhinnau bodhataś caitau yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_6,67.69//
GSP27moksop_u:17651: asaṃvittyaiva yan nāsti tannāśe kā kadarthanā / tūṣṇīmbhāvena yat prāpyaṃ prāptam evāśu viddhi tat //MU_6,67.70//
GSP27moksop_u:17652: yad vai vedanamātrātma tad aṅgāvedanakṣayam / tad vedanāvedanayor yad iṣṭaṃ tat samācara //MU_6,67.71//
GSP27moksop_u:17653: vīcir yathāmbhasi spando jagac citraṃ tathā citau / etāvanmātra evātra bhedo yad raghunandana //MU_6,67.72//
GSP27moksop_u:17654: deśakālakharūpeṣu satsu vīcyāditāmbhasi / jagadādau tu deśādyā asanto nirmitāś citā //MU_6,67.73//
GSP27moksop_u:17655: ābhāsuraṃ trijagad ity avabhāti bhāsvat saṃvedanaṃ cayanam ekacites svarūpam / vāci sthitaṃ bhavati caitad upoḍhabhedaṃ kliṣṭaṃ praśāntavacanas tu śivaḥ parātmā //MU_6,67.74//
GSP27moksop_u:17656: saṃvedanaṃ sarga itīha śabdāv arthena bhinnau na kadācid etau / vīcyambhasī dve iti nocitoktir jñasyājñatāyāṃ tv idam eva yuktam //MU_6,67.75//
GSP27moksop_u:17659: rāmaḥ: jīvaṭabrāhmaṇādīnāṃ haṃsāntānāṃ munīśvara / bhikṣusvapnaśarīrāṇāṃ sampannaṃ kim ataḥ param //MU_6,68.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17660: vasiṣṭhaḥ: rudreṇa saha sambhūya prabuddhās sarva eva te / mithaś ca dṛṣṭasaṃsārā rudrāṃśās sukhinas sthitāḥ //MU_6,68.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17661: tena rudreṇa tāṃ māyām avalokya tathoditām / svāṃśās tām eva saṃsārasthitiṃ te preṣitāḥ punaḥ //MU_6,68.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17662: rudraḥ: gacchatāśu nijaṃ sthānaṃ tatra bhuktvā kalatrakaiḥ / kañcit kālaṃ samaṃ bhogān matsakāśam upaiṣyatha //MU_6,68.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17663: bhaviṣyatha madaṃśā me gaṇā matpurabhūṣaṇāḥ / tato mahāpralayato yāsyāmas tat padaṃ saha //MU_6,68.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17664: ity uktvā bhagavān rudras teṣāṃ so 'ntaradhīyata / anyasaṃsārasaṃsthānāṃ rudrāṇāṃ madhyam āyayau //MU_6,68.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17665: prayayus svāspadaṃ te 'pi jīvaṭabrāhmaṇādayaḥ / svakalatrais samaṃ dehaṃ kṣapayitvātha kālataḥ //MU_6,68.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17666: rudralokaṃ samāsādya bhaviṣyanti gaṇottamāḥ / kadācid vyomni dṛśyante tārakākāradhāriṇaḥ //MU_6,68.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17667: rāmaḥ: bhikṣusaṅkalparūpās te jīvaṭabrāhmaṇādayaḥ / kathaṃ satyatvam āyātās saṅkalpārtheṣv asatyatā //MU_6,68.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17668: vasiṣṭhaḥ: saṅkalpasatyatāstīśe saṅkalpāsatyatāsty aje / yatra yan nāsti tan nāsti yatas sarvātma tat padam //MU_6,68.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17669: yat svapne dṛśyate yac ca saṅkalpair avalokyate / tat tathā vidyate tatra sarvakālaṃ tadātmakam //MU_6,68.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17670: taddeśakālātmikayā tayaivāvasthayāpyate / taddeśakālātmikayā gatyā deśāntaraṃ yathā //MU_6,68.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17671: deśād deśāntaraṃ yadvad yatnagatyādikaṃ vinā / na labhyate tathā svapno vinā tattāṃ na labhyate //MU_6,68.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17672: sarvam asti citaḥ kośe yad yathālokayaty asau / cit tat tathā tadāpnoti sarvātmatvād avikṣatam //MU_6,68.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17673: saṅkalpasvapnavastv aṅga yayā ca daśayāpyate / paramābhyāsayogābhyāṃ vinā seha na labhyate //MU_6,68.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17674: yeṣāṃ tu yogavijñānadṛṣṭayaḥ phalitās sthitāḥ / sarvaṃ sarvatra paśyanti ta ete śaṅkarādayaḥ //MU_6,68.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17675: idam agragataṃ vastu tathāsaṅkalpitaṃ ca yaḥ / prārthayaty ubhayabhraṃśaṃ sa prāpnoty ubhayāśrayāt //MU_6,68.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17676: sarvaṃ hy abhimataṃ kāryam ekaniṣṭhasya sidhyati / dakṣiṇāṃ kakubhaṃ gacchan kaḥ prāpnoty uttarāṃ diśam //MU_6,68.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17678: agrasthabuddhisaṃsthe 'smin kalpitaṃ prāptum icchati / yas sa nā naikaniṣṭhatvāt tadā tan nāśayed dvayam //MU_6,68.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17679: tasmād ekārthaniṣṭhatvād bhikṣujīvena rudratām / prāpya sarvātmano labdhaṃ padāt sarvaṃ tathāsthiteḥ //MU_6,68.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17680: bhikṣusaṅkalpajīvānāṃ pratyekaṃ taj jagat pṛthak / paśyanti te ca nānyo'nyaṃ rudrajñānād ṛte tataḥ //MU_6,68.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17681: aprabuddhāḥ prajāyante jīvā jīvāt prabodhinaḥ / tadicchayāśu viduṣa iva mūrkhās sutā iva //MU_6,68.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17682: iha vidyādharo 'haṃ syām iha syām aham eḍikā / ity ekadhyānasāphalyadṛṣṭānto 'syāṃ kriyāsthitau //MU_6,68.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17683: ekatvaṃ ca śatatvaṃ ca maurkhyaṃ pāṇḍityam eva ca / devatvaṃ mānuṣatvaṃ ca deśakālakriyākramaiḥ //MU_6,68.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17684: tulyakālam alaṅkartuṃ dhāraṇādhyānayatnataḥ / sarvaśaktyajarūpatvāj jīvasyāsty eva śaktatā //MU_6,68.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17685: anantaś cāntayuktaś ca svabhāvo 'sya svabhāvataḥ / savikāsas sasaṅkoco haṃsasyeva cidātmanaḥ //MU_6,68.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17686: yad icchati tad asty aṅga nanu sampadyate svayam / svayaṃsaṅkalpitair ebhir deśakālakriyākramaiḥ //MU_6,68.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17687: yoginyo yoginaś ceha tiṣṭhanty anyatra yānti ca / iha cāmutra cehante dṛṣṭam etad anekaśaḥ //MU_6,68.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17688: kārtavīryo gṛhe tiṣṭhan vavarṣāmbudharo bhavan / viṣṇuḥ kṣīrodadhau tiṣṭhañ jāyate puruṣo bhuvi //MU_6,68.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17689: paśvarthaṃ yānti tiṣṭhantyo yoginyo yoginīgaṇe / śakras svargāsane tiṣṭhan yāti yajñārtham urvarām //MU_6,68.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17690: sahasram ekaṃ bhavati tathāsmiñ jagadātmani / nṛṇāṃ śatāni bhaktānāṃ yānti sāyujyatāṃ tanau //MU_6,68.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17691: ekas sahasraṃ bhavati tathā caiṣa janārdanaḥ / ekaḥ kāntāsahasrāṇi tulyakālaṃ niṣevate //MU_6,68.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17692: evaṃ te bhikṣusaṅkalpajīvaṭabrāhmaṇādayaḥ / rudravijñānavaśatas svasaṅkalpapurīr gatāḥ //MU_6,68.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17693: tatra bhuktvā ciraṃ bhogān prāpya rudrapuraṃ tataḥ / gaṇatām āpnuvantas te sthāsyanti saparicchadāḥ //MU_6,68.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17694: nityapraphultanavakalpalatālayeṣu rudreṇa sārdham ururatnagulucchakeṣu / nānājagatsu ca tadā purapattaneṣu vidyādharīṣv amalamaulidharā ramante //MU_6,68.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17697: vasiṣṭhaḥ: eṣa dṛṣṭo yathānena bhikṣuṇā cetanābhramaḥ / bhūtaṃ pratyekam evaivaṃ pṛthaṅ mṛtvā tu paśyati //MU_6,69.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17698: sarvasya nāma jīvasya mṛtijanmamayī sthitiḥ / bhavaty eva cidākāśarūpiṇo 'py ākṛtiṃ gatā //MU_6,69.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17699: pṛthak pratyekam abhyeti khātmā saṃsāraṣaṇḍakaḥ / pṛthag āmodasārthasya yathā kusumaṣaṇḍakaḥ //MU_6,69.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17700: sarva eva mṛto jantuḥ pṛthak svapratibhātmakam / paśyaty evaṃ kharūpo 'pi dehī cāmokṣam ākulaḥ //MU_6,69.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17701: jīva eṣa mayā tubhyaṃ kathitaḥ kathayānayā / parāt praspanditātmeti na bhikṣū rāma kevalaḥ //MU_6,69.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17702: mohān mohāntaraṃ yāti jīvo jaraḍhajīvitaḥ / parvatāgraparibhraṣṭo hy adho 'dha upalo yathā //MU_6,69.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17703: paramātmapadabhraṣṭo jīvas svapnam imaṃ dṛḍham / paśyaty asmād api svapnād yāti svapnāntaraṃ punaḥ //MU_6,69.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17704: svapnāt svapne 'pi nipatan mṛṣaivedaṃ śilādṛḍham / paripaśyati deho 'ntar māyayā jarjarīkṛtaḥ //MU_6,69.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17705: kvacit kenacid evaiṣa kadācid vā na vā svayam / dehena mohanidrāto mucyate samprabudhyate //MU_6,69.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17706: rāmaḥ: aho nu viṣamo moho jīvasyāsyopajāyate / padāc cyutasya stokena nānākāravikāradaḥ //MU_6,69.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17707: mithyājñānograyāminyā māyayā nipuṇād idam / aho nu khalu vaiṣamyaṃ bhīmaṃ nijapadacyuteḥ //MU_6,69.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17708: bhagavan sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvathaiva jagatsthitau / tvayā sambhavatīty uktaṃ mayā tac cānubhūyate //MU_6,69.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17709: evaṃguṇaviśiṣṭātmā sumahātman sa bhikṣukaḥ / kvacid asti na vety antar ālokya kathayāśu me //MU_6,69.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17710: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atra rātrau samādhisthas trilokīmaṭhikām imām / bhikṣur eṣo 'sti nāstīti prekṣya prātar vadāmy aham //MU_6,69.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17711: vālmīkiḥ: munāv evaṃ kathayati bahir madhyāhnadiṇḍimaḥ / udabhūt pralayakṣubdhaghanagarjitamāṃsalaḥ //MU_6,69.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17712: tatyajuḥ pādayos tasya puṣpāñjaliparamparāḥ / nṛpāḥ paurā viṭapinaḥ puṣpaṃ vātayutā iva //MU_6,69.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17713: pūjayitvā muniśreṣṭhān udatiṣṭhat sa viṣṭarāt / muninā saha bhūpāla udayādrer ivāṃśumān //MU_6,69.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17714: sabhā tadanu sottasthau sapraṇāmaparasparam / krameṇa hyastanenaiva jagmuḥ khecarabhūcarāḥ //MU_6,69.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17715: svāspadeṣu yathāśāstram aharvyāpāram ādṛtāḥ / sarve sampādayām āsur nijadharmakramocitam //MU_6,69.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17716: cintayanto muniproktaṃ mahīcaranabhaścarāḥ / jñānaṃ kṣapāṃ kṣaṇam iva ninyuḥ kalpam ivāpi ca //MU_6,69.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17717: prātaḥ punaḥ prasṛtakāryaparampare 'smiñ jāte jane khacarabhūcarasiddhasaṅghaḥ / āsthānalokaracanena tathaiva tasthāv anyo'nyasaṃvadanapūjitapūjyalokaḥ //MU_6,69.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17721: sarāmalakṣmaṇā saiva tathaivātha sabhā babhau / somyā samasamābhogā śāntavātyeva padminī //MU_6,70.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17722: anapekṣyaiva ca praśnam uvācātha munīśvaraḥ / bodhayanti balād eva sānukampā hi sādhavaḥ //MU_6,70.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17723: vasiṣṭhaḥ: rājan raghukulākāśaśaśāṅka raghunandana / hyo mayā dhyānanetreṇa sa bhikṣuḥ prekṣitaś ciram //MU_6,70.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17724: dhyānenāhaṃ ciraṃ bhrāntas tādṛgbhikṣudidṛkṣayā / dvīpāni sapta vipulāṃs tathaiva kulaparvatān //MU_6,70.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17725: yāvat kutaścid apy eva bhikṣur labdho na tādṛśaḥ / kathaṃ kila manorājyaṃ bahir apy upalabhyate //MU_6,70.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17726: tatas tribhāgaśeṣāyāṃ rātrau punar ahaṃ dhiyā / uttarāśāntaraṃ yāto velāvāta ivārṇavam //MU_6,70.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17727: cīnanāmātha tatrāsti śrīmāñ janapado mahān / valmīkopari tatrāsti vihāro jinasaṃśrayaḥ //MU_6,70.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17728: tasmin vihāre svakuṭīkośe kapilamūrdhajaḥ / bhikṣur dīrghaśayā nāma sthita evaṃparodayaḥ //MU_6,70.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17729: ekaviṃśatirātraṃ ca tasyaivaṃsthitiśālinaḥ / dṛḍhārgaḍaṃ gṛhaṃ dhyānabhaṅgabhītā viśanti no //MU_6,70.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17730: bhṛtyāḥ prāyaḥ kila tathā sa tiṣṭhati subhikṣukaḥ / adyaivaṃ tasya sampannaṃ niyater īdṛśī sthitiḥ //MU_6,70.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17731: rātrayo dhyānaniṣṭhasya gatās tasyaikaviṃśatiḥ / sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tathā citte 'nubhūtavān //MU_6,70.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17732: kasmiṃścit prāktane kalpe bhikṣur evaṃ purābhavat / adya tv iha dvitīyo 'sti tṛtīyo nopalabhyate //MU_6,70.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17733: mayā tu punar anviṣṭaś cetasā caturātmanā / tādṛg bhikṣus tṛtīyo 'nyo jagatpadmodarālinā //MU_6,70.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17734: asmāt sargāt tu no labdhas tṛtīyas tādṛgāśayaḥ / athānye līlayā sargā mayā samprekṣitās tataḥ //MU_6,70.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17735: yāvat kasmiṃścid ākāśakośaśāyini sargake / tṛtīyo vidyate bhikṣur brāhmaṇaś cedṛśakramaḥ //MU_6,70.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17736: evaṃ tenaiva tenaiva sanniveśena bhūriśaḥ / bhaviṣyanty abhavan santi padārthās sargasantatau //MU_6,70.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17737: asyāṃ sabhāyām api ye munayo brāhmaṇā nṛpāḥ / bhāvyam evaṃsamācārais tair anyair apy anekaśaḥ //MU_6,70.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17738: nāradenāmunā bhāvyaṃ punar anyena cānagha / evam evātriṇā bhāvyaṃ punar anyena cādhunā //MU_6,70.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17739: evaṃ kalatrakarmabhyāṃ yuktenānena bhūriśaḥ / evaṃjanmādinā bhāvyaṃ vyāsena ca śukena ca //MU_6,70.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17740: janakena punar bhāvyaṃ kratunā pulahena ca / agastyena pulastyena bhṛguṇāṅgirasāpi ca //MU_6,70.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17741: eta eva tathānye ca evaṃrūpakriyāspadam / cirāc cirād bhaviṣyanti māyeyaṃ vitatā yataḥ //MU_6,70.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17742: sadṛśācārajanmānas ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ / bhūyo bhūyo vivartante sargeṣv apsv iva vīcayaḥ //MU_6,70.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17743: atyantasadṛśāḥ kecit kecid ardhasamakramāḥ / kecid īṣatsamāḥ kecin na kadācit punas tathā //MU_6,70.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17744: evam eṣātivitatā māyā manasi mohinī / kṣaṇo nehāsti no kalpaḥ pratipattir hi jṛmbhate //MU_6,70.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17745: kvaikaviṃśatyahorātrā anantāḥ kva kuyonayaḥ / kva tāsām upalambho 'lam aho bhīmā manogatiḥ //MU_6,70.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17746: pratibhāmātram evedam itthaṃ vikasitaṃ sitam / nānākalahakallolacalaṃ prātar ivāmbujam //MU_6,70.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17747: jātaṃ saṃvedanād eva śuddhād idam aśuddhavat / saṃsārajālam akhilaṃ vahnir vahnikaṇād iva //MU_6,70.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17748: pratyekam evam uditaḥ pratibhāsaṣaṇḍaṣ ṣaṇḍāntareṣv api ca tatra vicitraṣaṇḍāḥ / sarve svayaṃ nanu ca te ca mitho na mithyā sarvātmani sphurati kāraṇakāraṇe 'smin //MU_6,70.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17750: daśarathaḥ: munināyaka taṃ bhikṣuṃ gatvā sambodhayantv amī / narā matprahitāś śīghraṃ cīnabuddhakuṭīgatam //MU_6,71.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17751: vasiṣṭhaḥ: rājaṃs tasya mahābhikṣos sa dehaḥ prāṇavarjitaḥ / kledaṃ vaivarṇyam āyāto nāsau jīvitabhājanam //MU_6,71.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17752: tasya bhikṣoś ca jīvo 'sau bhūtvā padmajasārasaḥ / jīvanmuktas sthito bhūyo nāsau saṃsṛtibhājanam //MU_6,71.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17753: tadgṛhe māsaparyante balān niṣkāsitārgaḍāḥ / antar ālokayiṣyanti bhikṣum akṣuṇṇamānasam //MU_6,71.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17754: anyenaiva sa dehena bhikṣur mukto vyavasthitaḥ / kathaṃ prabodhyate naṣṭaṃ tadvihāre śarīrakam //MU_6,71.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17755: eṣā guṇamayī māyā durbodhena duratyayā / nityaṃ satyāvabodhena sukhenaivātivāhyate //MU_6,71.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17756: asatyaiva kṛtārambhā hemnaḥ kaṭakatā yathā / pratibhāsaviparyāsamātrakāraṇakodayā //MU_6,71.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17757: paramātmana eveyam itthaṃ māyeti mīyate / taraṅgateva payasi prekṣāmātravināśinī //MU_6,71.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17758: jño 'pi dṛśyamayād dīrghasvapnāt svapnāntaraṃ vrajan / evaṃ nānyatvam āyāti vivekāt sarvagātmadṛk //MU_6,71.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17759: yo yo 'sya pratibhāsas syād ātmaiva sa sa bodhataḥ / sa evodeti saṃsārakarañjavanagulmadṛk //MU_6,71.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17760: pratyekaṃ bhūtam uditaṃ pṛthak saṃsāramaṇḍalam / bhikṣos svapnāntaram iva parād vīcir ivāmbhasaḥ //MU_6,71.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17761: prasṛtaḥ padmajād eva jagatsvapno 'yam āditaḥ / tathaivātha svacittotkarūḍhas sarvajanaṃ prati //MU_6,71.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17762: āpitāmaham ābhāti sargas svapnavilāsavat / pratyekam uditas tena brahmāṇḍānīha koṭiśaḥ //MU_6,71.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17763: sphuran parasmin pratyekaṃ jīvaḥ paśyati vibhramam / hṛdaye 'rthasamarthaṃ ca svapnavad dīrgham āntaram //MU_6,71.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17765: pātālaṃ brahmalokaṃ vā cic camatkṛtiśālinī / cittāṃśaspandamātreṇa kṛtvā kṛtvaiva saṃsthitā //MU_6,71.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17766: cit spandarūpiṇī jīvanāmnāgatyātmanātmani / anyatrānyeva luṭhati bhūtvā sambhramabhāriṇī //MU_6,71.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17767: bibheṣi paramātmātmā paramātmana eva kim / jīvadehādināmno 'smāt pratibimbād ivārbhakaḥ //MU_6,71.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17768: brahmaṇy eva paraṃ brahma jagaddṛṣṭyaiva sat sthitam / śuddhākāśam ivākāśe jale jalam ivāmalam //MU_6,71.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17769: loko brahmaṇa evāyaṃ jagadrūpeṇa tiṣṭhataḥ / bibhety anyatayopāttāt pratibimbād ivārbhakaḥ //MU_6,71.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17770: spande 'spandīkṛte bodhāc citas sañjñā vilīyate / sāpy alaṃ pariṇāmena līyate 'gnau ghṛtaṃ yathā //MU_6,71.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17771: citspanda eva citspande sarvātmātmani jṛmbhate / spandāspandau jṛmbhaṇādi kalpitaṃ nātra vāstavam //MU_6,71.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17772: na spando 'stīha nāspando naikatā nāpi ca dvitā / śuddhacinmātram evāsti sarvaṃ cāsti yathāsthitam //MU_6,71.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17773: pareṇa pariṇāmena sargāhantārthayoś śame / cinmātram api nāsty eva nāstīty api na vidyate //MU_6,71.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17774: bhedabhāvanayodeti bhedaḥ prakṛtilāñchanaḥ / abhedabodhād akhile galite śiṣyate param //MU_6,71.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17775: nānātehāsty abodhena so 'bodho 'sty anavekṣaṇāt / prekṣakaś caiva nāsty eva tasmān niśśaṅkatā parā //MU_6,71.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17776: nātas svapno na jāgracchrīr na suṣuptaṃ na turyatā / na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti nānyad vā kalanātmakam //MU_6,71.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17777: śāntir ekā jagannāmnī śāntāv iyam avasthitā / abodho 'satya evātaḥ kva dṛśyadraṣṭṛdarśanam //MU_6,71.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17778: spando 'py aspanda evāsyā nissaṅkalpatayā citeḥ / na spandāspandayor bhinnā saṅkalparahitaiva cit //MU_6,71.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17779: dvitvaikyādikalārūpas saṅkalpaś cittabhāvanam / sa cābhāvanamātreṇa galati brahma śiṣyate //MU_6,71.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17780: ciccandrabimbe saṅkalpakalaṅkas sphuratīva yaḥ / nāsau kalaṅkas tad viddhi cidghanasya ghanaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,71.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17781: cidghanaś ca na san nāsat sthīyatāṃ tat tate pade / ity aśeṣamahābodhasārasaṅgrahaṇaṃ kṛtam //MU_6,71.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17782: ciccandrabimbāt saṅkalpakalaṅko 'mṛtavigrahāt / tvayā bhāvena sammṛṣṭo bhāvābhāvakṣayātmanā //MU_6,71.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17783: bhāvābhāvādikalanāṃ nītvā cinmayatāṃ citā / śamollāsavilāsānte samam āssva yathāsukham //MU_6,71.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17784: spandāspandau kalpanākalpanāṃśau cittvān nānyau cit tv anāmā niraṃśā / sarvākārānāvṛtiś śāntasattā sattvāpūrṇaikārṇavābhā sthiteti //MU_6,71.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17787: vasiṣṭhaḥ: suṣuptamaunavān bhūtvā dhūtvā dvitvaikarūpiṇīm / kalanāṃ kānta cidrūpas tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabhya tat padam //MU_6,72.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17788: rāmaḥ: vāṅmaunam akṣamaunaṃ ca kāṣṭhamaunaṃ ca vedmy aham / suṣuptamaunaṃ mauneśaṃ brahman brūhi kim ucyate //MU_6,72.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17789: vasiṣṭhaḥ: dvividhaḥ procyate rāma munir munivarair iha / ekaḥ kāṣṭhatapasvī ca jīvanmuktas tathetaraḥ //MU_6,72.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17790: abhāvitātmā śuṣkāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ baddhaniścayaḥ / haṭhāj jitendriyagrāmo munis syāt kāṣṭhatāpasaḥ //MU_6,72.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17791: yathābhūtam idaṃ buddhvā bhāvitātmātmani sthitaḥ / lokopamo 'pi tṛpto 'ntar yas sa muktamunis smṛtaḥ //MU_6,72.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17792: etayor yo bhaved bhāvaś śāntayor munināthayoḥ / cittaniścayarūpātmā maunaśabdena sa smṛtaḥ //MU_6,72.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17793: catuṣprakāram āhus tan maunaṃ maunavido janāḥ / vāṅmaunam akṣamaunaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ sauṣuptam eva ca //MU_6,72.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17794: vāṅmaunaṃ vacasāṃ rodho balād indriyanigrahaḥ / akṣamaunaṃ parityāgaś ceṣṭānāṃ kāṣṭhasañjñakam //MU_6,72.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17795: manomaunaṃ pañcamaṃ yat tan mṛte kāṣṭhatāpase / bhavet suṣuptamaunākhyaṃ jīvanmukte hi jīvati //MU_6,72.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17796: triṣu maunaviśeṣeṣu viṣayaḥ kāṣṭhatāpasaḥ / suṣuptamaunāvasthāyāś caturthyāś caiva muktadhīḥ //MU_6,72.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17797: vāṅmaunaṃ maunam ity eva siddhaṃ tac ca manaḥkalā- / malinaṃ jīvabandhāya tatrasthāḥ kāṣṭhatāpasāḥ //MU_6,72.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17798: haṭhād vā yogayuktyaiva yas svākṣāṇāṃ vinigrahaḥ / tad akṣamaunam ity āhus tatrasthāḥ kāṣṭhatāpasāḥ //MU_6,72.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17799: asmaran saṃsmaran vāpi dṛśyaṃ vāgdvayam aspṛśan / apaśyann eva paśyantīṃ kāṣṭhamaunī hi tiṣṭhati //MU_6,72.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17800: prasphuraccittakalanam etan maunatrayaṃ smṛtam / sambhavaty ajñamuniṣu na tu tajjñeṣu līlayā //MU_6,72.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17801: nātropādeyatā jñānām etan maunatrayaṃ kila / līlayā helayā vāpi tajjñāḥ kurvanti vā na vā //MU_6,72.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17802: idaṃ suṣuptamaunaṃ tu jīvanmuktamatisthitam / apunarjanmane jantoś śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam //MU_6,72.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17803: nātra saṃyamyate vāṇī trividhā nāpi cojjhyate / nollāsyante na jīyante samastendriyasaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,72.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17804: nānātākalaneyaṃ hi na valgati na śāmyati / ceto na ceto nāceto na san nāsan na khaṃ na gauḥ //MU_6,72.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17805: avibhāgam anāyāsaṃ yad anādyantam āsitam / dhyāyato dhāvataś caiva sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat //MU_6,72.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17806: yathābhūtam imaṃ buddhvā jagannānātvavibhramam / yad āsitam asaṅgehaṃ sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat //MU_6,72.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17807: anekasaṃvidrūpātma caikam evedam ātatam / ity āsitam anantaṃ yat sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat //MU_6,72.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17808: ākāśaṃ naiva cākāśaṃ sarvam asmi na cāsmi ca / iti sthitaṃ samaṃ śāntaṃ yat tan maunaṃ suṣuptavat //MU_6,72.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17809: sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ nirālambaṃ śāntaṃ vijñaptimātrakam / na san nāsad iti svastham āsitaṃ maunam uttamam //MU_6,72.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17810: bhāvābhāvadaśonmeṣaviśeṣair vitathotthitaiḥ / saṃvido yad anāmarśas tan maunaṃ paramaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,72.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17811: asataiva satevāntaś cetasā vṛttirūpiṇā / yad anāvartanaṃ saṃvidvṛttes tan maunam akṣayam //MU_6,72.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17812: nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti na mano na ca mānasam / iti saṃvidasaṃvittir avicchinnātimaunatā //MU_6,72.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17813: aham asmi jagac cāsti tv astiśabdārthamātrakam / sattāsāmānyam eveti sauṣuptaṃ maunam ucyate //MU_6,72.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17814: sattvāt saṃvida evānyās svapnādikalanāḥ kutaḥ / anantam eva sauṣuptaṃ sarvaṃ maunam atas tatam //MU_6,72.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17815: suṣuptamaunam evedam anantatvāt prabodhavat / turyam evāmalaṃ viddhi turyātītam athāpi vā //MU_6,72.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17816: suṣuptaikasamādhānas tathā turyasamādhikaḥ / turyātītasamādhir vā jāgraty api bhaveta vai //MU_6,72.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17817: turyastha eva sakalāmalaśāntavṛttir jāgraty api vyavaharan nipuṇaṃ svapitvā / nityaṃ sadeha uta vāpi videha eva brāhmaṃ nabho bhava tad eva kilāsi sādho //MU_6,72.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17818: om ity apāstabhavavāsanam ekam āssva na tvaṃ na cāham iti kiñcid ihāsti satyam / sarvaṃ ca vidyata itīha śilāntarābhaṃ jñas tiṣṭha cidgaganakośakalaikaniṣṭhaḥ //MU_6,72.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17821: rāmaḥ: kutaś śatatvam āyātaṃ rudrāṇāṃ munināyaka / ye gaṇās te ca kiṃ rudrā uta neti vadasva me //MU_6,73.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17822: vasiṣṭhaḥ: svapnānāṃ bhikṣuṇā dṛṣṭaṃ śataṃ śataśarīrakam / sarvam uddeśato jñātam ata uktaṃ na tan mayā //MU_6,73.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17823: yad ākārāś śataṃ svapne tat tad gaṇaśataṃ smṛtam / tad eva tad rudraśataṃ rudrā api gaṇābhidhāḥ //MU_6,73.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17824: rāmaḥ: ekasmād bhagavaṃś cittāt kathaṃ cittaśataṃ kṛtam / tatsvapnaśatarudreṇa dīpād dīpaśataṃ yathā //MU_6,73.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17825: vasiṣṭhaḥ: nirāvaraṇasadbhāvā yad yathā kalpayanti ye / tat tathāśu bhavaty eva na sāvaraṇasaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,73.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17826: sarvātmanas sarvagatvād yad yathā yatra bhāvyate / tathānubhūyate tatra tat tat tajjñena nādhiyā //MU_6,73.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17827: rāmaḥ: kapālamālābharaṇo bhasmasnāyī digambaraḥ / śmaśānanilayo brahman kāmukaś ca maheśvaraḥ //MU_6,73.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17828: vasiṣṭhaḥ: maheśvarāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ jīvanmuktaśarīriṇām / na kriyāniyamo 'stīha sa hy ajñeṣv eva kalpitaḥ //MU_6,73.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17829: ajñās tv ajitacittatvāt kriyāniyamanaṃ vinā / gardhān mātsyena nyāyena paraṃ duḥkhaṃ prayānti hi //MU_6,73.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17830: tajjñās tv iṣṭeṣv aniṣṭeṣu na nimajjanti vastuṣu / jitendriyatvād buddhatvān nirvāsanatayānayā //MU_6,73.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17831: kākatālīyavad rūḍhāṃ kriyāṃ kurvanti te sadā / na kurvanty api vā kecin naiṣāṃ kvacid api grahaḥ //MU_6,73.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17832: kākatālīyavad viṣṇur evaṃkarmoditaḥ parāt / evaṃkarmā trinayana evaṃkarmāmbujodbhavaḥ //MU_6,73.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17833: na nindyam asti nānindyaṃ nopādeyaṃ na heyakam / na cātmīyaṃ na ca paraṃ karma jñaviṣayaṃ kvacit //MU_6,73.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17834: agnyādīnāṃ yathauṣṇyādi sargādau rūḍhim āgatam / harādīnāṃ tathā karma dvijātīnāṃ ca jātayaḥ //MU_6,73.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17835: sarge prarūḍhim āyāte saṅketavaśataḥ pṛthak / anubhūtaphalais svārthāḥ kalpanāḥ kalpitās tataḥ //MU_6,73.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17836: videhamuktaviṣayaṃ turyaṃ maunam ito mayā / noktaṃ te pañcamaṃ maunaṃ videhasya raghūdvaha //MU_6,73.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17837: khād apy atitarām accham ātmākāśaṃ cidātmakam / tatra prāptiḥ paraṃ śreyas sā kathaṃ prāpyate śṛṇu //MU_6,73.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17838: samyagjñānāvabodhena nityam ekasamādhinā / saṅkhyayaivāvabuddhā ye te sāṅkhyā yoginas smṛtāḥ //MU_6,73.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17839: prāṇādyanilasaṃśāntau yuktā ye padam āgatāḥ / anāmayam anādyantaṃ te smṛtā yogayoginaḥ //MU_6,73.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17840: upādeyaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śāntaṃ padam akṛtrimam / tat kaiścit saṅkhyayā prāptaṃ kaiścid yogena dehataḥ //MU_6,73.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17841: ekaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati / yat sāṅkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ paraṃ yogais tad eva hi //MU_6,73.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17842: yatra prāptā manovṛttir atyantaṃ nopalabhyate / vāsanāvāgurākrāntā tad viddhi paramaṃ padam //MU_6,73.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17843: vāsanāṃ cittam evāhuḥ kāraṇaṃ tad dhi saṃsṛteḥ / tad akāraṇatām eti vilīya bhavakarmasu //MU_6,73.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17844: manaḥ paśyati vai dehaṃ bālo vetālakaṃ yathā / ātmānaṃ vilayaṃ nītvā na bhūyas taṃ prapaśyati //MU_6,73.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17845: mano mudhaivābhyuditam asad evānavekṣaṇāt / svapne svamaraṇākāraṃ prekṣyamāṇaṃ na vidyate //MU_6,73.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17846: mano'bhāvān na saṃsāraḥ kvāmodaḥ kusumaṃ vinā / upadeśyopadeśādi bandhamokṣau ca tat kutaḥ //MU_6,73.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17847: ekatattvaghanābhyāsaḥ prāṇānāṃ vilayas tataḥ / manovinigrahaś ceti mokṣaśabdārthakāraṇam //MU_6,73.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17848: rāmaḥ: yadi hi prāṇavilayo mune mokṣasya kāraṇam / mṛtā eva hi mucyante tan manye sarvajantavaḥ //MU_6,73.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17849: vasiṣṭhaḥ: triṣv eteṣu prayogeṣu manaḥpraśamanaṃ varam / sādhyaṃ viddhi tad evāśu yathā bhavati tac chivam //MU_6,73.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17850: yadā nirvāsanaṃ prāṇās tyajantīdaṃ śarīrakam / tadā na bhūyas tanmātrair yānti vyomani saṅgamam //MU_6,73.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17851: vāsanāṃśātmakāny eva viddhi tanmātrakāṇi vai / tadātmakair manovadbhiḥ prāṇāś śliṣyanti netaraiḥ //MU_6,73.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17852: savāsanās tu yady ete prāṇā muñcanti dehakam / tad vyomavāyusaṃśleṣaṃ yānti duḥkhāya gandhavat //MU_6,73.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17853: manas sāmbur ivāmbhodo na śāmyati savāsanam / nāmanaskās sambhavanti prāṇās sūryā ivātviṣaḥ //MU_6,73.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17854: na jahāti manaḥ prāṇān vinā jñānena karhicit / tṛṇāntareṇaiva vinā tṛṇāgram iva tittiriḥ //MU_6,73.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17855: jñānād avāsanībhāvaṃ svanāśaṃ prāpya vai manaḥ / prāṇaspandaṃ ca nādatte tataś śāntir hi śiṣyate //MU_6,73.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17856: jñānāt sarvapadārthānām asattvaṃ samudety alam / tato 'ṅga vāsanānāśād viyogaḥ prāṇacetasoḥ //MU_6,73.36//
GSP27moksop_u:17857: tato na paśyati manaḥ praśāntaṃ dehatāṃ punaḥ / svanāśena padaṃ prāptaṃ vāsanaiva mano viduḥ //MU_6,73.37//
GSP27moksop_u:17858: ceto hi vāsanāmātraṃ tadabhāvaḥ paraṃ padam / tac ca sampadyate jñānāj jñānam āhur vicāraṇam //MU_6,73.38//
GSP27moksop_u:17859: ity asyās saṃsṛte rāma paryantas sampravartate / svayaṃ vivekamātreṇa rajjusarpabhramākṛteḥ //MU_6,73.39//
GSP27moksop_u:17860: ekārthābhyasanaprāṇarodhacetaḥparikṣayāḥ / ekasminn eva saṃsiddhe saṃsidhyanti parasparam //MU_6,73.40//
GSP27moksop_u:17861: tālavṛntaparispande śānte śānto yathānilaḥ / prāṇānilaparispande śānte śāntaṃ tathā manaḥ //MU_6,73.41//
GSP27moksop_u:17862: prāṇāś śarīravilaye prayānti vyomavāyutām / yathāvāsitam evedaṃ manaḥ paśyanti tatra ca //MU_6,73.42//
GSP27moksop_u:17863: yathā videhāḥ paśyanti prāṇā vyomani dehakam / samanaskās tathācāraṃ sarvaṃ cānubhavanti te //MU_6,73.43//
GSP27moksop_u:17864: śānte vātaparispande yathā gandhaḥ praśāmyati / tathā śānte manasspande śāmyanti prāṇavāyavaḥ //MU_6,73.44//
GSP27moksop_u:17865: avinābhāvinī nityaṃ jantūnāṃ prāṇacetasī / kusumāmodavan miśre tilataile iva sthite //MU_6,73.45//
GSP27moksop_u:17866: manasas spandanaṃ prāṇaḥ prāṇasya spandanaṃ manaḥ / ete viharato nityam anyo'nyaṃ rathasārathī //MU_6,73.46//
GSP27moksop_u:17867: ādhārādheyavat tv ete ekābhāve vinaśyataḥ / kurutaś ca svanāśena kāryaṃ mokṣākhyam uttamam //MU_6,73.47//
GSP27moksop_u:17868: ekatattvaghanābhyāsāc chāntaṃ śāmyaty alaṃ manaḥ / tallayatvāt svabhāvasya tena prāṇo 'pi śāmyati //MU_6,73.48//
GSP27moksop_u:17869: vicārya yad anantātmatattvaṃ tanmayatāṃ nayet / manas tatas tallayatas tad eva bhavati sthiram //MU_6,73.49//
GSP27moksop_u:17870: yad evātitarāṃ śreyo 'nupalambhopalambhayoḥ / dvayor apy asatos tatra śeṣe vāpi sthiro bhava //MU_6,73.50//
GSP27moksop_u:17871: ekasmin sudṛḍhe tattve tāvad bhāvaṃ vibhāvayet / bhāvo 'bhāvatvam āyāti svābhyāsād yāvad ātatam //MU_6,73.51//
GSP27moksop_u:17872: pratyāhāravaśāc cetas svayaṃ bhogyakṣayād iva / vilīyate saha prāṇaiḥ param evāvaśiṣyate //MU_6,73.52//
GSP27moksop_u:17873: yadekatānaṃ bhavati cetas tad bhavati kṣaṇāt / śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaughaṃ cirābhyāsasvabhāvataḥ //MU_6,73.53//
GSP27moksop_u:17874: avidyeyaṃ tu nāstīti buddhvā yuktiyutaṃ dhiyā / jñānād eva parāvāptis tadabhyāsas tato varam //MU_6,73.54//
GSP27moksop_u:17875: citte śānte śāmyatīyaṃ saṃsāramṛgatṛṣṇikā / jarām upagate meghe mihikā mahatī yathā //MU_6,73.55//
GSP27moksop_u:17876: cittamātram avidyeti kuru tenaiva tatkṣayam / tadrūpanāma cittātmānubhāvo hi paraṃ padam //MU_6,73.56//
GSP27moksop_u:17877: muhūrtam eva nirvāṇaṃ yadi cetaḥ pare pade / tat tatpariṇataṃ viddhi tatraivāsvādam āgatam //MU_6,73.57//
GSP27moksop_u:17878: yadi sāṅkhyena viśrāntaṃ ceto yogena vā pade / kṣaṇaṃ tat sattvatāṃ yātaṃ na bhūyaḥ parijāyate //MU_6,73.58//
GSP27moksop_u:17879: ceto vigalitāvidyaṃ sattvaśabdena kathyate / dagdhaṃ saṃsārabījaṃ tan na dadyād aṅkuraṃ punaḥ //MU_6,73.59//
GSP27moksop_u:17880: jñaś cidvigalitāvidyas sattvasthaś śāntavāsanaḥ / samaṃ śūnyopamaṃ śāntaṃ jyotiḥ paśyati śāmyati //MU_6,73.60//
GSP27moksop_u:17881: vigalitājñapadaṃ vimalaṃ manas subhaga sattvam itīha hi kathyate / na punar eti kalāmalinaṃ padaṃ kanakatām iva tāmram upāgatam //MU_6,73.61//
GSP27moksop_u:17884: vasiṣṭhaḥ: jīvo 'jīvībhavaty āśu yāti cittam acittatām / vicārād ity avidyānto mokṣa ity abhidhīyate //MU_6,74.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17885: mṛgatṛṣṇājalam iva sargo 'hantādi dṛśyate / asad eva manāg eva tad vicārāt pralīyate //MU_6,74.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17886: saṃsṛtisvapnaviśrāntau vetālodāhṛtān imān / praśnān ākarṇaya śubhān prasaṅgāt smṛtim āgatān //MU_6,74.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17887: asti vindhyamahāṭavyāṃ vetālo vipulākṛtiḥ / sa kiñcin maṇḍalaṃ gardhād ājagāma jighatsayā //MU_6,74.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17888: sa vetālo 'vasat pūrvaṃ kasmiṃścit sajjanāspade / bahubalyupahāreṇa nityatṛptatayā sukhī //MU_6,74.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17889: nirnimittaṃ nirāgaskaṃ na tenāsau purogatam / kṣudhito 'pi naraṃ hanti saṅgo hi nyāyadaiśikaḥ //MU_6,74.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17890: sa kālenāṭavīgeho jagāma nagarāntaram / nyāyayuktyā janaṃ bhoktuṃ kṣudhā samabhicoditaḥ //MU_6,74.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17891: tatra prāpa sa bhūpālaṃ rātricaryāvinirgatam / tam āha ghanaghoreṇa śabdenograniśācaraḥ //MU_6,74.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17892: vetālaḥ: rājaṃl labdho 'si bhīmena vetālena mayādhunā / kva gacchasi vinaṣṭo 'si bhavān bhojanam adya me //MU_6,74.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17893: rājā: bho rātricara nirnyāyaṃ māṃ ced atsi balād iha / tat te sahasradhā mūrdhā sphuṭiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ //MU_6,74.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17894: vetālaḥ: na tvām admy aham anyāyaṃ nyāyo 'yaṃ tu mayocyate / rājāsi sakalāśāś ca pūraṇīyās tvayārthinām //MU_6,74.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17895: mamemām arthitāṃ rājan sambhavārthaṃ prapūraya / praśnān imān mayoktāṃs tvaṃ samyag vyākhyātum arhasi //MU_6,74.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17896: kasya sūryasya raśmīnāṃ brahmāṇḍāny aṇavaḥ kṛśāḥ / kasmin sphuranti pavane mahāgaganareṇavaḥ //MU_6,74.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17897: svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ gacchañ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / tyajan na tyajati svacchaṃ kas svarūpaṃ prabhāsuram //MU_6,74.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17898: rambhāstambho yathā pattramātram eva punaḥ punaḥ / antar antas tathāntaś ca tathā ko 'ṇus sa eva hi //MU_6,74.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17900: kasyānavayavasyaiva paramāṇumahāgireḥ / śilāntar nibiḍaikāntarūpo majjā jagattrayī //MU_6,74.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17901: iti kathayasi cen na me durātmaṃs tad iha nigīrya bhavantam ātmaghātin / phalam iva tava maṇḍalaṃ graseyaṃ prasabham upetya jagad yathā kṛtāntaḥ //MU_6,74.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17904: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktavati vetāle vaktuṃ praśnān vihasya saḥ / uvāca vacanaṃ rājā dantāṃśudhavalānanaḥ //MU_6,75.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17905: rājā: asti cittiktatātmedaṃ brahmāṇḍamaricaṃ phalam / uttarottarasaṃvṛttabhūtatvakpariveṣṭitam //MU_6,75.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17906: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi phalānāṃ yatra santi hi / asty uccais tādṛśī śākhā vipulā calapallavā //MU_6,75.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17907: tādṛśīnāṃ sahasrāṇi śākhānāṃ yatra santy atha / tādṛśo 'sti mahāvṛkṣo durlakṣyo vipulākṛtiḥ //MU_6,75.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17908: yatra santi sahasrāṇi tādṛśānāṃ mahīruhām / tādṛśaṃ vanam asty uccair anantatarugulmakam //MU_6,75.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17909: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi vanānāṃ yatra santy atha / tādṛg asti bṛhac chṛṅgam atyuccair bharitākṛti //MU_6,75.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17910: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śṛṅgāṇāṃ yatra santy atha / tādṛśo 'sti mahāśailaḥ pūritākhiladiktaṭaḥ //MU_6,75.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17911: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śailānāṃ yatra santy atha / tādṛśo 'sty ativistīrṇo deśo vipulakoṭaraḥ //MU_6,75.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17912: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi deśānāṃ yatra santy atha / tādṛg asti bṛhad dvīpaṃ mahāhradanadīvṛtam //MU_6,75.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17913: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi dvīpānāṃ yatra santy atha / tādṛg asti mahīpīṭhaṃ vicitraracanānvitam //MU_6,75.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17914: tādṛśīnāṃ sahasrāṇi pṛthvīnāṃ yatra santy atha / tādṛg asti jagat sphāraṃ mahābhuvanapañjaram //MU_6,75.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17915: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi jagatāṃ yatra santy atha / tādṛg asti mahac cāṇḍaṃ caṇḍāḍambarapīṭhavat //MU_6,75.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17916: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi yatrāṇḍāṇāṃ taraṅgakaḥ / tādṛśo 'virataspando vipulo 'sty atha sāgaraḥ //MU_6,75.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17917: tādṛksāgaralakṣyāṇi taraṅgo yatra pelavaḥ / tādṛśas svavilāsātmā nirmalo 'sti mahārṇavaḥ //MU_6,75.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17918: tādṛṃśy abdhisahasrāṇi yasyodarajalāny atha / tādṛśo 'sti pumān kaścid atyuccair bharitākṛtiḥ //MU_6,75.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17919: tādṛśānāṃ nṛṇāṃ lakṣair yasya mālorasi sthitā / pradhānaṃ sarvasattānāṃ tādṛśo 'sty aparaḥ pumān //MU_6,75.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17920: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi puruṣāṇāṃ mahātmanām / sphuranti maṇḍale yasya svatanūruhajālavat //MU_6,75.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17921: tādṛśo 'sti mahādityas sa tapaty āsu dṛṣṭiṣu / yā etāḥ kalanās sarvās tā etās tasya dīptayaḥ //MU_6,75.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17922: asyādityasya raśmīnāṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ trasareṇuvat / eṣa citsūrya ity uktas sarvam etat tapaty asau //MU_6,75.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17923: vijñānātmaiṣa paramo bhāskaro bhāvibhāsanaḥ / ime ye bhuvanābhogās tasyaiva trasareṇavaḥ //MU_6,75.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17924: vijñānaparamārkasya bhāsā bhānti bhavanti ca / imā jagadaharlakṣmyas tv aharlakṣmyo raver iva //MU_6,75.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17925: vijñānamātrakacitātmani jantujāte trailokyamaṇḍapagaṇe ca vikāsabhāji / nirmajjanodbhavanasambhramabhāvalekhās santīva neha hi manāg api śāntam āssva //MU_6,75.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17928: rājā: kālasattā nabhassattā spandasattā ca cinmayī / śuddhacetanasattātha sarvam ityādi pāvanam //MU_6,76.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17929: paramātmamahāvāyau rajas sphurati cañcalam / kusumāntar ivāmodas tadatadrūpakaṃ svataḥ //MU_6,76.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17930: jagadākhye mahāsvapne svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ vrajet / rūpaṃ tyajati no śāntaṃ brahma śāntatvabṛṃhitam //MU_6,76.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17931: saṅkalpaparibṛṃheyam anantasphuraṇā svataḥ / yathā yathābhibṛṃhābhir bṛṃhaty ābṛṃhitā tathā //MU_6,76.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17932: saṅkalpaś ca parād asmān manāg api na bhidyate / cinmayatvāt tataḥ kiñcin na bṛṃhāsti na bṛṃhaṇam //MU_6,76.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17933: rambhāstambho yathā pattramātram evāntarāntarā / antar antas tathedaṃ hi viśvaṃ brahma vivarty atha //MU_6,76.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17934: sabrahmātmādibhiś śabdair yad etair abhidhīyate / śūnyam avyapadeśyaṃ tan na nakiñcin na kiñcana //MU_6,76.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17935: yā yā vibhāvyate sattā sā sānubhavanirmitā / rambhāstambhavad evātaś cinmātram amalaṃ tatam //MU_6,76.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17936: sūkṣmatvād apy alabhyatvāt paramātmā paro 'ṇukaḥ / anantatvād asāv eva prokto mervādidhūlimān //MU_6,76.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17937: aṇor apy atyanantasya puro 'sya jagadādy api / paramāṇuvad ābhāti pramitatvād arūpavat //MU_6,76.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17938: paro 'ṇur eṣo 'labhyatvāt pūrakatvān mahāgiriḥ / sarvāvayavarūpo 'pi nirastāvayavaḥ pumān //MU_6,76.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17939: asya vijñaptimātrasya majjāmātraṃ jagattrayī / vijñānamātramadhyaṃ hi sādho viddhi jagattrayam //MU_6,76.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17940: vijñānamātram akalākalitaṃ jaganti śāntaṃ svabhāvasukumāram anantarūpam / vetālabālaka padaṃ tad alaṅghanīyam evaṃsmayas samanubhāvaya śāntam āssva //MU_6,76.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17943: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti rājamukhāc chrutvā vetālaś śāntim āyayau / bhāvitātmatayā tatra vicāroditayā dhiyā //MU_6,77.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17944: upaśāntavapur bhūtvā gatvaikāntam aninditaḥ / babhūvāvicaladhyānī vismṛtya viṣamāṃ kṣudham //MU_6,77.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17945: etad rāma mayoktaṃ te vetālapraśnajālakam / evaṃkrameṇa cidaṇāv evedaṃ saṃsthitaṃ jagat //MU_6,77.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17946: cidaṇoḥ kośagaṃ viśvaṃ vicāreṇa vilīyate / kopo vetālakasyeva śiṣyate yat paraṃ tu tat //MU_6,77.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17947: saṃhṛtya sarvataś cittaṃ stimitenāntarātmanā / pravāhāpatitaṃ kurvan niricchas tiṣṭha śāntadhīḥ //MU_6,77.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17948: ākāśaviśadaṃ kṛtvā manasaiva mano muniḥ / tiṣṭhaikaśamaśāntātmā vyomavadviśadāśayaḥ //MU_6,77.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17949: sthirabuddher amūḍhasya yathāprāptānuvartinaḥ / rājño bhagīrathasyeva dussādham api sidhyati //MU_6,77.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17950: sampūrṇaśāntamanasaḥ paritṛptavṛtter nityaṃ same susamam ātmani tiṣṭhato 'ntaḥ / sidhyanti durlabhatarā api vāñchitārthā gaṅgāvatāra iva sāgarakhātṛnaptuḥ //MU_6,77.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17952: vetālopākhyānaṃ samāptam nāma sargaḥ aṣṭasaptatitamas sargaḥ
GSP27moksop_u:17953: rāmaḥ: yathā cittacamatkṛtyā rājño gaṅgāvatāraṇam / bhagīrathasya sampannaṃ tan me kathaya bhoḥ prabho //MU_6,78.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17954: vasiṣṭhaḥ: āsīd bhagīratho nāma rājā paramadhārmikaḥ / bhuvas samudradvīpāyā maṇḍanātilakopamaḥ //MU_6,78.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17955: saṅkalpānantaraṃ prāpur yathābhimatam arthinaḥ / candraprasannavadanād yasmāc cintāmaṇer iva //MU_6,78.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17956: sādhūnāṃ yo vyavasthārthaṃ dhanāny avirataṃ dadau / tṛṇamātram upādatte karaṃ tṛṇamaṇir yathā //MU_6,78.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17957: vajrasāram api protam ajvalann eva yo 'bhinat / ayomaṇir ayoyantram iva durjanaceṣṭitam //MU_6,78.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17958: adhūmo hy adahañ śīto vitaikṣṇyo hārdam apy alam / tamo 'haran nṛṇāṃ naiśaṃ yo maṇir veśmanām iva //MU_6,78.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17959: kirann agnikaṇāsāram abhitas svapratāpajam / madhyāhnasūryakāntāgnir iva jvalati yo 'riṣu //MU_6,78.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17960: mṛduśītasukhasparśo yas samāhlādayan mahīm / sve jane dravati snigdhas sendur indumaṇir yathā //MU_6,78.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17961: jagadyajñopavītasya svargapātālavāhinaḥ / gaṅgāvāhasya yenorvyāṃ tṛtīyaḥ pūrito guṇaḥ //MU_6,78.9//
GSP27moksop_u:17962: agastyaśoṣito 'mbhodhir gaṅgāpūreṇa pūritaḥ / yena duṣpūrarūpo 'pi mahāsārtho 'rthinām iva //MU_6,78.10//
GSP27moksop_u:17963: gaṅgāsopānapaddhatyā yena pātālavāsinaḥ / yojitā brahmaṇo loke bāndhavā lokabandhunā //MU_6,78.11//
GSP27moksop_u:17964: brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ jahnuṃ tapasārādhayaṃś ca yaḥ / bhūyo bhūyo yayau khedaṃ na mūrtavyavasāyavat //MU_6,78.12//
GSP27moksop_u:17965: yauvane vartamānasya tasya bhūmipater atha / pravicārayato lokayātrāṃ paryākulām imām //MU_6,78.13//
GSP27moksop_u:17966: svavirāgacamatkāravicārakaṇikodabhūt / cetasy api sutāruṇye daivād vallī marāv iva //MU_6,78.14//
GSP27moksop_u:17967: ekānte cintayām āsa mahīpatir asāv atha / jagadyātrām imāṃ nityam asamañjasasaṅkulām //MU_6,78.15//
GSP27moksop_u:17968: punar dinaṃ punaś śyāmā dānādānāśanaṃ punaḥ / tad eva śuktavirasaṃ lajjyate karma kurvatā //MU_6,78.16//
GSP27moksop_u:17969: yena prāptena loke 'smin nāprāptam avaśiṣyate / tat kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ manye śeṣaṃ karmaviṣūcikā //MU_6,78.17//
GSP27moksop_u:17970: punaḥ punaḥ paryuṣitaṃ karma kurvan na lajjate / mūḍhabuddhir amūḍhas tu kaḥ kuryāt kila bālavat //MU_6,78.18//
GSP27moksop_u:17971: athaikadodvignamanāḥ kadācit tryuttulaṃ gurum / ekānte saṃsṛter bhītas samapṛcchad bhagīrathaḥ //MU_6,78.19//
GSP27moksop_u:17972: bhagīrathaḥ: antaśśūnyāsu suciraṃ bhraman saṃsāravṛttiṣu / araṇyānīṣv ivaitāsu bhṛśaṃ khinnā vayaṃ vibho //MU_6,78.20//
GSP27moksop_u:17973: jarāmaraṇamohādirūpāṇāṃ bhavakāriṇām / bhagavan sarvaduḥkhānāṃ katham antaḥ prajāyate //MU_6,78.21//
GSP27moksop_u:17974: tryuttulaḥ: cirasāmyātmanācchena nirvibhāgavilāsinā / rājañ jñeyāvabodhena pūrṇena bharitātmanā //MU_6,78.22//
GSP27moksop_u:17975: kṣīyante sarvaduḥkhāni truṭyanti granthayo 'bhitaḥ / saṃśayāś śamam āyānti sarvakarmāṇi cānagha //MU_6,78.23//
GSP27moksop_u:17976: jñeyaṃ tu vidur ātmānaṃ saṃśuddhajñaptirūpiṇam / sa ca sarvagato nityaṃ nāstam eti na codayam //MU_6,78.24//
GSP27moksop_u:17977: bhagīrathaḥ: cinmātraṃ sarvagaṃ śāntam asti nirmalam acyutam / dehādi netarat kiñcid iti vedmi munīśvara //MU_6,78.25//
GSP27moksop_u:17978: kiṃ tv atra pratipattir me sphuṭatām eti notarām / etāvanmātrasaṃvittis syām ahaṃ bhagavan katham //MU_6,78.26//
GSP27moksop_u:17979: tryuttulaḥ: jñānena jñeyaniṣṭhatvam eti ceto hṛdantare / tatas sarvavapur bhūtvā bhūyo jīvo na jāyate //MU_6,78.27//
GSP27moksop_u:17980: asaktir anabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putradāragṛhādiṣu / nityaṃ ca samacittatvam iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu //MU_6,78.28//
GSP27moksop_u:17981: ātmano 'nanyayogena sadbhāvanam anāratam / viviktadeśasevitvam aratir janasaṃsadi //MU_6,78.29//
GSP27moksop_u:17982: adhyātmajñānaniṣṭhatvaṃ tattvajñānārthadarśanam / etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā //MU_6,78.30//
GSP27moksop_u:17983: rāgadveṣakṣayākārāt saṃsāravyādhibheṣajāt / ahambhāvopaśāntau tu rājañ jñānam avāpyate //MU_6,78.31//
GSP27moksop_u:17984: bhagīrathaḥ: śarīre 'smiṃś ciraṃ rūḍho girau tarur ivoccakaiḥ / ahambhāvo mahābhogo vada me tyajyate katham //MU_6,78.32//
GSP27moksop_u:17985: tryuttulaḥ: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena tyaktvā bhogaughabhāvanam / gatvānviṣya citā tattvam ahaṅkāro vilīyate //MU_6,78.33//
GSP27moksop_u:17986: yantrāṇāṃ pañjaraṃ yāvad bhagnaṃ lajjādi nākhilam / akiñcanatvaśeṣeṇa sphuṭā tāvad ahaṅkṛtiḥ //MU_6,78.34//
GSP27moksop_u:17987: sarvam eva dhiyas tyaktvā yadi tiṣṭhasi niścalaḥ / tad ahaṅkāravilayī tvam eva paramaṃ padam //MU_6,78.35//
GSP27moksop_u:17988_0: śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaṇo vigatabhīs santyaktasarvaiṣaṇo gatvā nūnam akiñcanatvam ariṣu tyaktvā samagrāṃ śriyam / śāntāhaṅkṛtir astadehakalanas
GSP27moksop_u:17988_1: teṣv eva bhikṣām aṭan mām apy ujjhitavān alaṃ yadi bhavasy uccais tad uccair asi //MU_6,78.36 //
GSP27moksop_u:17991: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha tasya guror vaktrād ity ākarṇya bhagīrathaḥ / manasy āhitakartavyas svavyāpāraparo 'bhavat //MU_6,79.1//
GSP27moksop_u:17992: tataḥ katipayeṣv eva vāsareṣu gateṣv asau / agniṣṭomamakhaṃ cakre sarvatyāgaikasiddhaye //MU_6,79.2//
GSP27moksop_u:17993: gobhūmyaśvahiraṇyādi dadau dhanam aśeṣataḥ / dvijadevārtabandhubhyo guṇyaguṇyavicāravān //MU_6,79.3//
GSP27moksop_u:17994: divasatrayamātreṇa sarvam evaṃ parityajan / svavastramātraśeṣo 'sāv āsīd rājā bhagīrathaḥ //MU_6,79.4//
GSP27moksop_u:17995: atha sarvārthariktaṃ taṃ khinnaprakṛtipaurakam / sīmāntine tṛṇam iva rājyaṃ svam araye dadau //MU_6,79.5//
GSP27moksop_u:17996: ākrānte dviṣatā rājye pure sadmani maṇḍale / adhovāso'vaśeṣo 'sau nirjagāma svamaṇḍalāt //MU_6,79.6//
GSP27moksop_u:17997: yatra na jñāyate nāmnā yatra na jñāyate mukhāt / tatra grāmeṣv araṇyeṣu dūreṣūvāsa dhairyavān //MU_6,79.7//
GSP27moksop_u:17998: ity alpenaiva kālena praśāntasakalaiṣaṇaḥ / parameṇa śamenāsau prāpa viśrāntim ātmani //MU_6,79.8//
GSP27moksop_u:17999: bhraman dvīpāni bhūpīṭhe kadācit kālayogataḥ / bhūpena śatruṇā prāptaṃ svam eva prāpa tat puram //MU_6,79.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18000: tān evārīṃś ca tatrāsau pravāhāpatitakramam / paurāṃś ca mantriṇaś caiva śamī bhikṣām ayācata //MU_6,79.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18001: vividus te 'rayaḥ paurā mantriṇaś ca bhagīratham / pūjayām āsur atha taṃ saviṣādās saparyayā //MU_6,79.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18002: prabho rājyaṃ gṛhāṇeti prārthito 'py ariṇā muniḥ / nādade 'nādṛtāśeṣas tṛṇam apy aśanād ṛte //MU_6,79.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18003: katicid divasāṃs tatra nītvānyatra jagāma saḥ / bhagīratho 'yaṃ hā kaṣṭam iti lokena śocitaḥ //MU_6,79.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18004: athānyatropaśāntātmā pariviśrāntadhīs sukhī / ātmārāmaḥ kadācit tu sa prāpa tryuttulaṃ gurum //MU_6,79.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18005: svam eva svāgataṃ kṛtvā tena sārdhaṃ bhagīrathaḥ / kañcit kālam uvāsādrau vane grāme pure jane //MU_6,79.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18006: samatām upayātau tau guruśiṣyau samau sthitau / kalayām āsatus svasthau vinodaṃ dehadhāraṇam //MU_6,79.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18007: kim ayaṃ dhāryate dehaḥ kim anenojjhitena naḥ / yathākramaṃ yathācāraṃ tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsthitam //MU_6,79.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18008: iti niścitya tiṣṭhantau tau vanād vanagāminau / nanandatur anānandaṃ na sukhaṃ na ca madhyamam //MU_6,79.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18009: dhanāni nārīr vibhavān aiśvaryaṃ cāṣṭadhoditam / siddhair apy arpitaṃ tuṣṭair menāte jarjaraṃ tṛṇam //MU_6,79.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18010: svakarmaṇaiva deho 'yaṃ yāvadantam anicchayā / dhāraṇīya iti svena karmaṇaivātha tasthatuḥ //MU_6,79.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18011: abhinanandatur āgatam uttamau nijasamācaraṇakramajaṃ munī / sukham asaukhyam apīpsitavarjitau samasamau khasamau śaminau svataḥ //MU_6,79.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18014: vasiṣṭhaḥ: athaikadā puraśreṣṭhe kasmiṃścin maṇḍalāntare / anapatyaṃ nṛpaṃ mṛtyur aharat svam ivāmiṣam //MU_6,80.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18015: tatra prakṛtayaḥ khinnā naṣṭadeśakramā nṛpam / anviṣyanti sma saṃyuktaṃ guṇalakṣmyā viśālayā //MU_6,80.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18016: tā bhagīratham āsādya sthitaṃ bhikṣāśanaṃ pure / parijñāya samānīya sainyaṃ cakrur mahīpatim //MU_6,80.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18017: bhagīrathaḥ kṣaṇenaiva prāvṛṣīvāmbunā saraḥ / dhūlitas senayā gurvyā jhagity āropito gaje //MU_6,80.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18018: bhagīratho jagannātho jayatīti ghanāravaiḥ / nīrandhratām upājagmur girīndrāṇāṃ mahāguhāḥ //MU_6,80.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18019: tatra tat pālayantaṃ taṃ rājyaṃ rājānam ādṛtāḥ / ājagmuḥ prākprakṛtayaḥ prāhur itthaṃ mṛtādhipāḥ //MU_6,80.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18020: prakṛtayaḥ: rājann asmākam adhipo yas tvayā sa purā kṛtaḥ / mṛtyunā vinigīrṇo 'sau matsyenevāmiṣaṃ mṛdu //MU_6,80.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18021: tat tat pālayituṃ rājyaṃ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi / aprārthitopapannānāṃ tyāgo 'rthānāṃ tu nocitaḥ //MU_6,80.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18022: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti samprārthito rājā tad aṅgīkṛtya tadvacaḥ / sarvasāgaracihnāyās sa babhūva patir bhuvaḥ //MU_6,80.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18023: samaś śāntamanā maunī vītarāgo vimatsaraḥ / kāryakāryaikakaraṇaratir āhitavismayaḥ //MU_6,80.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18025: tadā kila svarganadī vahati sma na bhūtale / pitṝṇāṃ durlabhas so 'bhūt tena gaṅgājalāñjaliḥ //MU_6,80.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18026: bhagīrathenātha mahīm avatārayituṃ divaḥ / gaṅgāṃ gṛhīto niyamas tadā prabhṛti bhūbhṛtā //MU_6,80.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18027: tato rājyaṃ parityajya mantriṇāṃ bhūpatiś śamī / tapase kāryakāryeho jagāma gahanaṃ vanam //MU_6,80.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18028: tatra varṣasahasrais sa samārādhya punaḥ punaḥ / brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ jahnuṃ bhuvi gaṅgām ayojayat //MU_6,80.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18029: tataḥ prabhṛty amalataraṅgabhaṅginī jagatpateś śaśiviśadāṅgasaṅginī / nabhastalān nipatati gāṃ trimārgagā mahātmanām iva bahupuṇyasantatiḥ //MU_6,80.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18030_0: sphurattaraṅgabhaṅginī svaphenapuñjahāsinī prasannapuṇyamañjarī druteva dharmasantatiḥ / bhagīrathe mahīpatau yaśaḥpracāravīthikā
GSP27moksop_u:18030_1: tadādi sā trimārgagā mahītale babhūva ha //MU_6,80.17 //
GSP27moksop_u:18033: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etām avaṣṭabhya dṛśaṃ bhagīrathadhiyā vṛtām / samas svastho yathāprāptaṃ kāryam āhara śāntadhīḥ //MU_6,81.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18034: idaṃ pūrvaṃ parityajya kroḍīkṛtya tatas svayam / śāntam ātmani tiṣṭha tvaṃ śikhidhvaja ivācalaḥ //MU_6,81.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18035: rāmaḥ: ko 'sau śikhidhvajo nāma kathaṃ vā labdhavān padam / etat kathaya me brahman bhūyo bodhābhivṛddhaye //MU_6,81.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18036: vasiṣṭhaḥ: dvāpare 'bhavatāṃ pūrvam idānīṃ ca bhaviṣyataḥ / tenaiva sanniveśena dampatī snigdhanāgarau //MU_6,81.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18037: rāmaḥ: yat pūrvam āsīd bhagavaṃs tad idānīṃ tathaiva hi / bhaviṣyati kimarthaṃ vai vada me vadatāṃ vara //MU_6,81.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18038: vasiṣṭhaḥ: jagannirmāṇaniyater asyā brāhmyās svasaṃvidaḥ / īdṛśy eva sthitir nityam anivāryā svabhāvajā //MU_6,81.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18039: yad anyad bahuśo bhūtvā punar bhavati bhūriśaḥ / abhūtvaiva bhavaty anyat punaś ca na bhavaty alam //MU_6,81.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18040: anyat prāksanniveśasya sādṛśyena sphuraty alam / anyat prāksanniveśārdhasādṛśyena vivalgati //MU_6,81.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18041: sadṛśyo viṣamāś caiva yathā sarasi vīcayaḥ / tā evānyāś ca dṛśyante vyavasthās saṃsṛtau tathā //MU_6,81.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18042: tasmād rāghava bhūyo 'pi vakṣyamāṇo nareśvaraḥ / bhaviṣyati mahātejās tadvṛttāntam imaṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,81.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18043: dvāpare pūrvam abhavad atīte saptame manau / caturyuge caturthe tu sarge 'smin vāraṇākule //MU_6,81.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18044: jambudvīpe praśāntasya vindhyasyādūrasaṃsthite / mālavānāṃ pure śrīmāñ śikhidhvaja itīśvaraḥ //MU_6,81.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18045: dhairyaudāryadayāyuktaḥ kṣamāśamadamānvitaḥ / śūraś śubhasamācāro mānī guṇagaṇākaraḥ //MU_6,81.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18046: āhartā sarvayajñānāṃ jetā sarvadhanuṣmatām / kartā sakalakāryāṇāṃ bhartāpūrvavapur bhuvaḥ //MU_6,81.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18047: peśalas snigdhamadhuro vidagdhaḥ prītanāgaraḥ / sundaraś śīlasubhagaḥ pratāpī dharmavatsalaḥ //MU_6,81.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18048: veditā viditārthānāṃ dātā sakalasampadām / bhoktā saṃsaṅgarahitas suśrotā sakalaśruteḥ //MU_6,81.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18049: sa bhogaughān anādṛtya straiṇaṃ tṛṇavad utsṛjan / pitari svargam āpanne bāla evottamaujasā //MU_6,81.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18050: kṛtvā ṣoḍaśavarṣātmā kṛtvā digvijayaṃ vaśī / nūnaṃ saurājyasampattyā bhūmaṇḍalam ayojayat //MU_6,81.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18051: atiṣṭhad vigatāśaṅkaṃ pālayan dharmataḥ prajāḥ / dhīmān sa mantribhis sārdhaṃ yaśasā śuklayan diśaḥ //MU_6,81.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18052: atha gacchatsu varṣeṣu vasante prollasaty alam / puṣpeṣu jṛmbhamāṇeṣu sphuratsu śaśiraśmiṣu //MU_6,81.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18054: āmodini lasatpuṣpagulucchakavitānake / gāyatsu gahaneṣūccair mithuneṣv alināṃ mithaḥ //MU_6,81.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18056: kāntāṃ prati babhūvāsya navaṃ cetas samutsukam / kṣīvaṃ kusumasambhārasaugandhimadhurāsavaiḥ //MU_6,81.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18057: manorājyam idaṃ cakre sa vasantamadaidhitaḥ / udyānavanadolāsu līlākamalinīṣu ca //MU_6,81.25//
GSP27moksop_u:18058: kadā praṇayinīṃ mugdhāṃ bālābjamukulastanīm / kariṣye kāminīm aṅke paryaṅke kusumāṅkitām //MU_6,81.26//
GSP27moksop_u:18059: kadā kamalavallīnāṃ dolāsv alir ivālinīm / ālolatāṃ vineṣyāmi bālāṃ bhujalatānugām //MU_6,81.27//
GSP27moksop_u:18060: mṛṇālahārakundenduvṛndatalpābhilāṣiṇī / matkṛte madanātaptā kadā syād indusundarī //MU_6,81.28//
GSP27moksop_u:18061: iti cintāparo bhūtvā kusumāvalanonmukhaḥ / vijahāra vanānteṣu kusumopavaneṣu ca //MU_6,81.29//
GSP27moksop_u:18065: evam asya vidur bhavyā mantriṇo navaniścayam / iṅgitākāraveditvam eva mantripadaṃ param //MU_6,81.33//
GSP27moksop_u:18066: atha tasya vivāhāya mantrivargo vicāravān / surāṣṭrādhipatiṃ kanyāṃ yayāce yauvanānvitām //MU_6,81.34//
GSP27moksop_u:18067: rūpayauvanasampannāṃ bhāryātve vidhinottamām / upayeme sa tām ātmasadṛśīṃ pratimām iva //MU_6,81.35//
GSP27moksop_u:18068: cūḍāleti bhuvi khyātā nāmnā nṛpatisundarī / sā taṃ bhartāram āsādya reje phulleva padminī //MU_6,81.36//
GSP27moksop_u:18069: nīlanīrajanetrāṃ tāṃ cūḍālāṃ sa śikhidhvajaḥ / snehād vikāsayām āsa śobhayārka ivābjinīṃ //MU_6,81.37//
GSP27moksop_u:18070: avardhata tayoḥ prītir anyo'nyārpitacetasoḥ / hāvabhāvavilāsādyais sekair navalateva sā //MU_6,81.38//
GSP27moksop_u:18071: sa mantryarpitasarvārthas susukhī susthitaprajaḥ / rājahaṃsa ivābjinyā reme dayitayā tayā //MU_6,81.39//
GSP27moksop_u:18072: antaḥpureṣu dolāsu candanāguruvīthiṣu / mandāradāmadolāsu kadalīkandalīṣu ca //MU_6,81.40//
GSP27moksop_u:18073: purānteṣu vanānteṣu diganteṣu sarassu ca / jaṅgaleṣu dinānteṣu jambūjambīraśāliṣu //MU_6,81.41//
GSP27moksop_u:18074: babhūvāhlādakaṃ sarvaṃ tayor anyo'nyaceṣṭitam / sadvarṣaṇādhvarācārair dyubhūmyor iva kāntayoḥ //MU_6,81.42//
GSP27moksop_u:18075: nityam evāviyuktatvāt priyatvāc ceṣṭitasya ca / mithaḥ kalākalāpasya kovidau tau babhūvatuḥ //MU_6,81.43//
GSP27moksop_u:18076: svarūpam ekam evaitau dadhatur miśratāṃ gatau / anyo'nyaṃ hṛdayasthatvād iva saṅkrāntam akṣatam //MU_6,81.44//
GSP27moksop_u:18077: sarvaśāstrādivaidagdhyaṃ citrādy api mukhāt prabhoḥ / bālā bhāṇḍād ivāgṛhṇād āsīt sarvārthapaṇḍitā //MU_6,81.45//
GSP27moksop_u:18078: nṛttaṃ vādyādi geyādi cūḍālāvadanād asau / aśikṣata babhūvātha kalānām atikovidaḥ //MU_6,81.46//
GSP27moksop_u:18079: āmāvāsyāv ivendvarkāv anyo'nyaṃ vilasatkalau / mitho hṛdayasaṃsthau tau dvāv apy aikyam ivāsthitau //MU_6,81.47//
GSP27moksop_u:18080: tau saṃsthitāv ekarasāv ananyadayitāv ubhau / puṣpāmodāv ivābhinnau bhūtalasthau śivāv iva //MU_6,81.48//
GSP27moksop_u:18081: vaidagdhyasundaramatī sarvaśāstrārthakovidau / krīḍayeva bhuvaṃ prāptau kamalākamalādhavau //MU_6,81.49//
GSP27moksop_u:18082: snehāt prasannamadhurau samavijñānavedinau / anuvṛttiparāv āstāṃ lokavṛttāntatadvidau //MU_6,81.50//
GSP27moksop_u:18083: kalākalāpasampannau lasadrasarasāyanau / śītalasnigdhamugdhāṅgau śaśāṅkau dvāv ivoditau //MU_6,81.51//
GSP27moksop_u:18084: reje lasannṛpatibhogavilāsakāntam antaḥpureṣu mithunaṃ tad anuttamaśri / brahmābjaṣaṇḍakuhareṣv iva rājahaṃsayugmaṃ vikāsimadamanmathamandacāri //MU_6,81.52//
GSP27moksop_u:18087: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ bahūni varṣāṇi mithunaṃ nirbharaspṛham / reme yauvanalīlābhir anantābhir dine dine //MU_6,82.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18088: atha yāteṣu varṣeṣu bahuṣv āvṛttiśāliṣu / śanair galati tāruṇye bhinnakumbhād ivāmbhasi //MU_6,82.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18089: śāradasyeva parṇasya mithunasyāsya kālataḥ / īṣadvirāgo hṛdayaṃ samyakprāgrasam aspṛśat //MU_6,82.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18090: virāgavāsanākrāntam ekāntastham acintayat / mithunaṃ taj jagadyātrām imām ittham aśāśvatīm //MU_6,82.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18092: pātaḥ pakvaphalasyeva maraṇaṃ durnivāraṇam / himāśanir ivāmbhoje jarā nipatanonmukhī //MU_6,82.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18093: āyur galaty avirataṃ jalaṃ karatalād iva / prāvṛṣīva latātumbī tṛṣṇaikā dīrghatāṃ gatā //MU_6,82.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18094: śailanadyā raya iva samprayāty eva yauvanam / indrajālam ivāsatyaṃ jīvitaṃ kṣaṇasaṃsthiti //MU_6,82.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18095: sukhāni prapalāyante śarā iva guṇacyutāḥ / patanti ceto duḥkhāni dhṛṣṭā gṛdhrā ivāmiṣam //MU_6,82.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18096: budbudaḥ prāvṛṣīvāpsu śarīraṃ kṣaṇabhaṅguram / rambhāgarbha ivāsāro vyavahāro virāgadaḥ //MU_6,82.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18097: satvaraṃ yuvatā yātā kāntevāpriyakāminaḥ / balād aratir āyātā vairasyam iva pādapam //MU_6,82.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18098: tad iha syāt kusaṃsāre kiṃ nāma bata śobhanam / yad āsādya punaś ceto daśāsu na vidūyate //MU_6,82.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18099: iti nirṇīya yugmaṃ tat saṃsāravyādhibheṣajam / ciraṃ vicārayām āsa śāstram adhyātma sammatam //MU_6,82.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18100: ātmajñānaikamantreṇa saṃsṛtyākhyā viṣūcikā / saṃśāmyatīti niścitya tāv āstāṃ tatparāyaṇau //MU_6,82.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18101: taccittau tadgataprāṇau tatkathau tadvidāśrayau / tadvidekārcanaparau tadīhau tau babhūvatuḥ //MU_6,82.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18102: tatraivātighanābhyāsau bodhayantau parasparam / tatprītau tatsamārambhau cirakālaṃ babhūvatuḥ //MU_6,82.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18103: atha sāvirataṃ bālā ramaṇīyapadakramān / śrutvādhyātmavidāṃ vaktrāc chāstrārthāṃs tāraṇakṣamān //MU_6,82.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18104: itthaṃ vicārayām āsa svam ātmānam aharniśam / avyāpṛtā vyāpṛtā ca dhiyā dhavalayāśaye //MU_6,82.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18105: prekṣe tāvat svam ātmānaṃ kim idaṃ syām iti svayam / kasyāyaṃ jāgato mohaḥ katham abhyutthitaḥ kva vā //MU_6,82.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18106: dehas tāvaj jaḍo mūko nāham ity eva niścayaḥ / ābālam etat saṃsiddhaṃ mṛtau caivānubhūyate //MU_6,82.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18107: karmendriyagaṇaś cāsya na bhinno 'vayavātmakaḥ / avayavāvayavinor abhedāj jaḍa eva ca //MU_6,82.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18108: buddhīndriyagaṇo 'py evaṃ jaḍa eveti dṛśyate / preryate manasā yasmād yaṣṭyeva bhuvi loṣṭakaḥ //MU_6,82.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18109: manaś caiva jaḍaṃ manye saṅkalpātmakaśaktimat / kṣepaṇair iva pāṣāṇaḥ preryate buddhiniścayaiḥ //MU_6,82.23//
GSP27moksop_u:18110: buddhir niścayarūpaivaṃ jaḍāsatyeti niścayaḥ / khāteneva sarit svairam ahaṅkāreṇa vāhyate //MU_6,82.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18111: ahaṅkāro 'pi nissāro jaḍa evaṃ śavātmakaḥ / jīvena janyate yakṣo bāleneva bhramātmakaḥ //MU_6,82.25//
