GSP27moksop_u:18772: aham alpatapās sādhur varāko mānuṣaḥ kila / siddhayaḥ katham āyānti mām abhāgyaikabhājanam //MU_6,92.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18773: evaṃ vikalpasaṅkalpaiś ciram ajñaḥ parāmṛśan / na maṇigrahaṇe yatnam akaron maurkhyamohitaḥ //MU_6,92.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18774: na yadā yena labdhavyaṃ na tat prāpnoty asau tadā / cintāmaṇir avāpto 'pi durdhiyā helayojjhitaḥ //MU_6,92.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18775: iti tasmin sthite yāto maṇir uḍḍīya siddhayaḥ / tyajanti hy avamantāraṃ śarā guṇam ivojjhitāḥ //MU_6,92.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18776: hṛtvā prāksampadaḥ puṃsas sa yātas siddhayaḥ kila / āgatās samprayacchanti sarvaṃ yātā haranty alam //MU_6,92.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18777: pumān bhūyaḥ kriyāyatnaṃ cakre ratnendrasādhane / nodvijante hi kāryeṣu janā adhyavasāyinaḥ //MU_6,92.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18778: dadarśātha kacadrūpaṃ kācakhaṇḍam apaṇḍitaḥ / hasadbhir vañcakais siddhaiḥ puras tyaktam alakṣitaiḥ //MU_6,92.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18779: ayaṃ cintāmaṇir iti mūḍhas tasmin sa vastutām / bubudhe mohito hy ajño mṛdaṃ hemeti paśyati //MU_6,92.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18780: aṣṭau ṣaṣṭiṃ dviṣan mitraṃ rajjuṃ sarpaṃ sthalaṃ jalam / candrau dvau kurute citte śiśor moho 'mṛtaṃ viṣam //MU_6,92.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18781: taṃ dagdhamaṇim ādāya prāktanīṃ sa śriyaṃ jahau / sarvaṃ cintāmaṇer asmāt prāpyate kiṃ dhanair iti //MU_6,92.23//
GSP27moksop_u:18782: deśo 'yam asukho rūkṣo janaiḥ pāpibhir āvṛtaḥ / kiṃ tad gehaṃ hataprāyaṃ ke nāma mama bandhavaḥ //MU_6,92.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18783: dūraṃ gatvā yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi sampadā / ity ādāya maṇiṃ mūḍhaś śūnyaṃ kānanam āyayau //MU_6,92.25//
GSP27moksop_u:18784: tatra kācadalenāsau tena tām āpadaṃ yayau / kajjalādrer iva niśā maurkhyasyaivāṅga yā samā //MU_6,92.26//
GSP27moksop_u:18785: duḥkhāni maurkhyavibhavena bhavanti yāni naivāpadā na ca jarāmaraṇena tāni / sarvāpadāṃ śirasi tiṣṭhati maurkhyam ekaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ janasya vapuṣām iva keśajālam //MU_6,92.27//
GSP27moksop_u:18788: cūḍālā: athemam aparaṃ ramyaṃ vṛttāntaṃ śṛṇu bhūpate / paraṃ prabodhanaṃ buddhes sādho sadṛśam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,93.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18789: asti vindhyavane hastī mahāyūthapayūthapaḥ / agastyaruddhayā vṛddhyā vindhyenevaidhitas svataḥ //MU_6,93.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18790: vajrāśriviṣamau dīrghau stas tasya daśanau śitau / kalpānalaśikhātulyau sumerūnmūlanakṣamau //MU_6,93.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18791: sa baddho lohajālena hastipena cchalāditaḥ / munīndreṇeva vindhyādrir upendreṇeva vā baḍiḥ //MU_6,93.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18792: nibaddho yantraṇāpāśaśastrakumbhārpito gajaḥ / tāṃ jagāma vyathāṃ vīro na vāggocaram eti yā //MU_6,93.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18793: ripau hastipake dūrād guptaṃ paśyati vāraṇaḥ / ayassamudgake tasmin nināya divasatrayam //MU_6,93.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18794: khedān nigaḍanirbhedayatnavān sa jhaṇajjhaṇam / cakāra kiṅkiṇīkvāṇam upodghātai ratho yathā //MU_6,93.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18795: dantābhyāṃ yatnatas tābhyāṃ muhūrtadvitayena saḥ / babhañja śṛṅkhalājālaṃ svargārgaḍam ivāsuraḥ //MU_6,93.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18796: taṃ tasya nigaḍacchedam apaśyad dūrato ripuḥ / baḍes svargāvadalanaṃ harir merutaṭād iva //MU_6,93.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18797: tasyāvacchinnapāśasya mūrdhni tālataro ripuḥ / papātākramatas svargaṃ harir meror baḍer iva //MU_6,93.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18798: sa patan pādapān mohād aprāpya kariṇaś śiraḥ / papātordhvyāṃ phalaṃ pakvaṃ vātāhatam ivākulaḥ //MU_6,93.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18799: taṃ puraḥ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahebhaḥ karuṇāṃ yayau / sphuratsphāraguṇās santas santi tiryaggatāv api //MU_6,93.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18800: patitaṃ dalayāmīti kiṃ nāma mama pauruṣam / vāraṇo 'pīti kalayan na jaghāna ca taṃ ripum //MU_6,93.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18801: kevalaṃ nigaḍavyūhaṃ vidāryāśu jagāma ha / vitataṃ setum utsārya vipulaugha ivāmbhasaḥ //MU_6,93.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18802: tam anādṛtya mātaṅgo bhaṅktvā jālaṃ javād yayau / vidārya meghasaṅghātaṃ nabhasīva divākaraḥ //MU_6,93.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18803: gate gaje samuttasthau hastipas svasthadehadhīḥ / gajenaiva samaṃ tasya vyathā dūrataraṃ gatā //MU_6,93.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18804: prottālatālaviṭapāt sa tathā patito 'pi san / na bhedam āpa durbhedā manye dehā durātmanām //MU_6,93.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18805: vardhate prāvṛṣīvābdaḥ kukāryeṣv asatāṃ balam / atīvāsīt samutsāhī sa gajākramaṇe tadā //MU_6,93.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18806: vāraṇārir asiṃho 'sau gatebho duḥkham āyayau / āgatyopagate 'ntardhiṃ nidhāna iva nirdhanaḥ //MU_6,93.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18807: so 'nviyeṣa gajaṃ yatnād gulmakāntaritaṃ vane / payodapihitaṃ bhoktuṃ rāhur indum ivāmbare //MU_6,93.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18808: cireṇālabhatebhendraṃ kasmiṃścit kānane sthitam / viśrāmyantaṃ tarutale samarād iva nirgatam //MU_6,93.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18809: atha yatra sthito nāgas tatra tadbandhanakṣamam / parayā rājasāmagryā gajalampaṭarūpayā //MU_6,93.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18810: sa khātavalayaṃ cakre hastipaḥ kānane navam / sarvadikkaṃ vidhir bhūmau samudravalayaṃ yathā //MU_6,93.23//
GSP27moksop_u:18811: upary asthagayaj jīrṇalataughena sa taṃ śaṭhaḥ / śūnyaṃ tanvabhrajālena śaratkāla ivāmbaram //MU_6,93.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18812: dinaiḥ katipayair eva vāraṇo viharan vane / tasmin nipatitaḥ khāte śuṣkābdhāv iva parvataḥ //MU_6,93.25//
GSP27moksop_u:18813: vrajan sarpākṛtau kūpe pātālatalabhīṣaṇe / khāte śuṣkābdhikhātābhe gajaratnasamudgake //MU_6,93.26//
GSP27moksop_u:18814: iti bhūyo dṛḍhaṃ baddhas tena hastipakena saḥ / tiṣṭhaty adyāpi duḥkhena bhūsadmani yathā baḍiḥ //MU_6,93.27//
GSP27moksop_u:18815: ahaniṣyat puraivāsau yady agropagataṃ ripum / tan nālapsyata tad duḥkhaṃ gajaḥ khātanibandhanam //MU_6,93.28//
GSP27moksop_u:18816: maurkhyād āgāminaṃ kālaṃ vartamānakriyākramaiḥ / aśodhayan naro duḥkhaṃ yāti vindhyagajo yathā //MU_6,93.29//
GSP27moksop_u:18817: mukto 'smi śastranigaḍād iti tuṣṭo 'pi vāraṇaḥ / dūrastho 'pi punar baddho maurkhyaṃ kveva na bādhate //MU_6,93.30//
GSP27moksop_u:18818: maurkhyaṃ nibandhanam avaihi paraṃ mahātman bandho na bandha iha cetasi tadviyukte / ātmodaye trijagad ātmamayaṃ samastam aśve sthitasya sahayā nanu sarvabhūmiḥ //MU_6,93.31//
GSP27moksop_u:18821: śikhidhvajaḥ: maṇisādhanavanyebhabandhanādy amarātmaja / sūcitaṃ satkathājālaṃ punar me prakaṭīkuru //MU_6,94.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18822: cūḍālā: vākyārthadṛṣṭer niṣpattyā hṛdgṛhe cittabhittiṣu / śṛṇuṣva satkathācitraṃ citram unmīlayāmi te //MU_6,94.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18823: yo 'sau śāstrārthakuśalas tattvajñāne tv apaṇḍitaḥ / ratnasaṃsādhane proktas sa tvam eva mahīpate //MU_6,94.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18824: tajjño bhavasi śāstreṣu ravir merutaṭeṣv iva / tattvajñāne tu viśrānto na tvaṃ dṛṣad ivāmbare //MU_6,94.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18825: viddhi cintāmaṇiṃ sādho sarvatyāgam akṛtrimam / tam antaṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ saṃsādhayasi śuddhadhīḥ //MU_6,94.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18826: sarvatyāgena śuddhena sarvam āsādyate 'nagha / sarvatyāgo hi sāmrājyaṃ kiṃ cintāmaṇinā bhavet //MU_6,94.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18827: siddhas sa sarvasantyāgas sādho saṃsādhitas tava / kharvīkurvañ jagadbhūtiṃ vindhyasyātmodayo yathā //MU_6,94.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18828: santyaktaṃ bhavatā rājyaṃ sadāradhanabāndhavam / brahmaṇeva jagatsargavyāpāras svaniśāgame //MU_6,94.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18829: svadeśasyātidūrastham āgato 'sīmam āśramam / bhuvo 'ntam iva viśrāntyai vainateyas sakacchapaḥ //MU_6,94.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18830: kevalaṃ sarvasantyāge śeṣitāhammatis tvayā / mṛṣṭākhilakalaṅkena svasattevānilena khe //MU_6,94.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18831: manomātre hṛdas tyakte yāvat te yāti pūrṇatām / tyāgas tāvad vikalpas tvāṃ kham ambuda ivāvṛṇot //MU_6,94.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18832: nāyaṃ sa paramānandas sarvatyāgo mahodayaḥ / ko 'py uccair anya evāsau cirasādhyo mahān iti //MU_6,94.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18833: cintayeti gate vṛddhiṃ saṅkalpagrahaṇe śanaiḥ / vātyayeva vanaspande tyāgaḥ proḍḍīya te gataḥ //MU_6,94.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18834: tyāgitā syāt kutas tasya cintām apy āvṛṇoti yaḥ / pavanaspandayuktasya nisspandatvaṃ kutas taroḥ //MU_6,94.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18835: cintaiva cittam ity āhus saṅkalpetaranāmakam / tasyām eva sphurantyāṃ tu cittaṃ tyaktaṃ kathaṃ bhavet //MU_6,94.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18836: citte gṛhīte trijagajjālabījakaṇe kṣaṇāt / kathaṃ sampadyate sādho sarvatyāgo nirañjanaḥ //MU_6,94.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18837: saṅkalpagrahaṇenāntas tyāgaḥ proḍḍīya te gataḥ / śabdasaṃśravaṇenāṅga yathā grāmavihaṅgamaḥ //MU_6,94.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18838: niścintatvadhanaṃ sarvaṃ tyāga ādāya te gataḥ / āmantryāpūjito yāti yas sa duḥkhaṃ karoti hi //MU_6,94.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18839: sarvatyāgamaṇāv evaṃ gate kamalalocana / tapaḥkācamaṇir dṛṣṭas tvayā saṅkalpacakṣuṣā //MU_6,94.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18840: tvayā tasmiṃs tapasy eva duḥkhe dṛṣṭibhramodite / grāhyaikabhāvanā baddhā jalendau śiśunā yathā //MU_6,94.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18841: avāsanam anārabhya kṛtānandā savāsanā / ādyantamadhyaviṣamā duḥkhāyaiva tapaḥkriyā //MU_6,94.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18842: amitānandam utsṛjya susādhaṃ yaḥ pravartate / mite vastuni dussādhe svātmahā sa śaṭhas smṛtaḥ //MU_6,94.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18843: sarvatyāgas samārabhya na viniṣpāditas tvayā / tapoduḥkhaikatajjñena baddhena vanasadmani //MU_6,94.23//
GSP27moksop_u:18844: rājyabandhād viniṣkramya gajavad duḥkhapūrite / vanavāsābhidhe sādho baddho 'si dṛḍhabandhane //MU_6,94.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18845: dviguṇā eva te cintāś śītavātātapādayaḥ / bandhanād adhikaṃ manye vanavāsam ajānataḥ //MU_6,94.25//
GSP27moksop_u:18846: cintāmaṇir mayā prāpta ity alaṃ buddhavān asi / na labdhavān bhavān sādho sphaṭikasyāpi khaṇḍikām //MU_6,94.26//
GSP27moksop_u:18847: ity etad aṅga maṇiyatnakathāsamānaṃ samyaṅ mayā prakaṭitaṃ tava padmanetra / udbodhya bodham amalaṃ svayam eva buddhyā yad vacmi tat pariṇatiṃ kuru cittakośe //MU_6,94.27//
GSP27moksop_u:18850: cūḍālā: idānīṃ rājaśārdūla vastusampratipattaye / śṛṇu vindhyebhavṛttāntavivṛtiṃ smayakāriṇīm //MU_6,95.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18851: yo 'sau vindhyavane hastī so 'smin bhūmitale bhavān / yau vairāgyavivekau te tau tasya daśanau śitau //MU_6,95.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18852: yaś cāsau vāraṇākrāntitatparo hastipas sthitaḥ / tad ajñānaṃ tvadākrāntitatparaṃ tava duḥkhadam //MU_6,95.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18853: atiśakto 'py aśaktena duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam / hastī hastipakeneva rājan maurkhyeṇa nīyase //MU_6,95.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18854: yal loharajjusāreṇa vāraṇaḥ pariyantritaḥ / tad āśāpāśajālena bhavān āpadam āgataḥ //MU_6,95.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18855: āśā hi loharajjubhyo viṣamā vipulā dṛḍhā / kālena kṣīyate lohaṃ tṛṣṇā tu parivardhate //MU_6,95.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18856: yad baddhaṃ prekṣate vairī gajam ārād alakṣitaḥ / prekṣate tvāṃ tad ajñānaṃ krīḍārthaṃ baddham ekakam //MU_6,95.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18857: yad babhañja gajaś śastraśṛṅkhalājālabandhanam / tat tatyāja bhavān bhogabhūmiṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam //MU_6,95.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18858: kadācit sukaraṃ śastraśṛṅkhalājālabhedanam / na tv asya manasas sādho bhogāśāvinivāraṇam //MU_6,95.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18859: yad ibhe pāṭayaty uccair bandhaṃ hastipako 'patat / tvayi tyajati tad rājyam ajñānaṃ patitaṃ kṣatam //MU_6,95.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18860: yadā viraktaḥ puruṣo bhogāśāṃ tyaktum icchati / tadā prakampate 'jñānaṃ chedyavṛkṣapiśācavat //MU_6,95.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18861: yadā vivekī puruṣo bhogān santyajya tiṣṭhati / tadā palāyate 'jñānaṃ chinnavṛkṣapiśācavat //MU_6,95.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18862: bhogaughe nūnam unmukte pataty ajñānam asthiti / pādape krakacacchinne kulāyas tadgato yathā //MU_6,95.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18863: yadā vanaṃ prayātas tvaṃ tadājñānaṃ kṣataṃ tvayā / patitaṃ san na vihataṃ manastyāgamahāsinā //MU_6,95.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18864: tena bhūyas samutthāya smṛtvā paribhavaḥ kṛtaḥ / tapaḥprapañcakhāte 'smin gahane tvaṃ niyojitaḥ //MU_6,95.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18865: tadaivāghātayiṣyas tvaṃ yady ajñānaṃ yadā patat / rājyatyāgavidhau tat tvāṃ nāhaniṣyat kṣayaṃ gatam //MU_6,95.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18866: yat khātavalayas tena vairiṇā hastinaḥ kṛtaḥ / tat tapoduḥkham atulam ajñānena tavārpitam //MU_6,95.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18867: yāṃ tasya rājasāmagrīṃ gajārer āharan nṛpaḥ / sā tvadajñānanṛpateś cittabhūtir visāriṇī //MU_6,95.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18868: tvaṃ gajendras tapaḥkhāte dīrghe vanagato 'pi san / ajñānavairiṇā tena nikṣiptas tarasāciti //MU_6,95.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18869: yat khātavalayo bālalatābhir avaguṇṭhitaḥ / āvṛtaṃ tat tapoduḥkham īṣatsajjanavṛttibhiḥ //MU_6,95.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18870: ity adyāpi tapaḥkhāte duḥkhe hy asmin sudāruṇe / sthito 'si pātālatale nṛpa baddho yathā baḍiḥ //MU_6,95.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18871: gajas tvam āśā nigaḍāni vairī moho nikhātaḥ punar ugrabandhaḥ / mahītalaṃ vindhya udanta itthaṃ tvadīya uktaḥ kuru yat karoṣi //MU_6,95.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18874: yad uktaṃ nayaśālinyā tayā viditavedyayā / tadā cūḍālayā jñānaṃ tat kasmān norarīkṛtam //MU_6,96.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18875: sā hi tattvavidāṃ mukhyā yad yad vakti karoti ca / tat sarvaṃ satyam evāṅga tad anuṣṭheyam ādarāt //MU_6,96.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18876: atha ced vacanaṃ tasyās tvayā nānuṣṭhitaṃ nṛpa / tat sa sarvaparityāgaḥ kasmān na nipuṇīkṛtaḥ //MU_6,96.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18877: śikhidhvajaḥ: rājyaṃ tyaktaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktaṃ deśas tyaktas tathāvidhaḥ / dārās tyaktās tathāpy aṅga sarvatyāgo na kiṃ kṛtaḥ //MU_6,96.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18878: cūḍālā: dhanaṃ dārā gṛhaṃ rājyaṃ bhūmiś chattraṃ ca bāndhavāḥ / iti sarvaṃ na te rājan sarvatyāgo 'tra kas tava //MU_6,96.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18879: tavāsty evāparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ / taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām //MU_6,96.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18880: śikhidhvajaḥ: rājyaṃ cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vanam eva me / sālavṛkṣādigulmāḍhyaṃ tad apy etat tyajāmy aham //MU_6,96.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18881: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti rāma vadann eva kumbhavākyapracoditaḥ / nimeṣāntaramātreṇa vaśī vīraś śikhidhvajaḥ //MU_6,96.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18882: pramamārja vanāsthāṃ tāṃ hṛdas sudṛḍhaniścayaḥ / prāvṛḍvātas taṭagatāṃ rajorekhām ivātmanaḥ //MU_6,96.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18883: śikhidhvajaḥ: savṛkṣādivanaśvabhrād vipinād api vāsanā / parityaktā mayā nūnaṃ sarvatyāgas sthito mama //MU_6,96.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18884: kumbhaḥ: adres taṭavanaṃ śvabhraṃ salilaṃ pādapās sthalam / ityādi tava no sarvaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kathaṃ tava //MU_6,96.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18885: tavāsty evāparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ / taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām //MU_6,96.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18886: śikhidhvajaḥ: etac cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ svāśramo mune / vāpīsthaloṭajayutas tam evāśu tyajāmy aham //MU_6,96.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18887: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti rāma vadann eva kumbhavākyapracoditaḥ / nimeṣadhyānamātreṇa vaśī vīraś śikhidhvajaḥ //MU_6,96.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18888: pramamārjāśramāsthāṃ tāṃ saṃvidā śuddhayā hṛdi / sphurantīṃ sphuraṇenaiva rajorekhām ivānilaḥ //MU_6,96.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18889: śikhidhvajaḥ: savṛkṣoṭajavīrutkād vāsanā svāśramād api / parityaktā mayā nūnaṃ sarvatyāgas sthito mama //MU_6,96.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18890: kumbhaḥ: vṛkṣo vāpī sthalaṃ gulma uṭajaṃ vratatīvṛtiḥ / iti kiñcin na te sarvaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kutas tava //MU_6,96.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18891: tavāsty anyo 'parityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ / taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām //MU_6,96.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18892: śikhidhvajaḥ: etac cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhājanādi me / carmakuṭyakṣasūtrādi tat tāvat santyajāmy aham //MU_6,96.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18893: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvā sa samuttasthāv avikṣubdhamanāś śamī / viṣṭarād avadātātmā śṛṅgād iva śaradghanaḥ //MU_6,96.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18894: kumbhas tv ālokayann eva tatkriyāṃ saṃsthitas samām / āsane lokakāryeṣu sve syandana ivāṃśumān //MU_6,96.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18895: yat karoti karotv etad asyaitat pāvanaṃ param / iti tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ kumbhaś śikhidhvajam avaikṣata //MU_6,96.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18896: śikhidhvajas tu tat sarvaṃ bhāṇḍopaskaram āśramāt / ekatraivānayām āsa bhuvo vāry abdhibhūr iva //MU_6,96.23//
GSP27moksop_u:18897: tat saṃsthāpyendhanaiś śuṣkair jvalayām āsa pāvakam / karasañcāravān arkas sūryakāntataṭaṃ yathā //MU_6,96.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18898: bhāṇḍopaskarajātaṃ tad agnau tyaktuṃ viveśa saḥ / bṛsikāyāṃ jagad dagdhuṃ meruśṛṅge yathā raviḥ //MU_6,96.25//
GSP27moksop_u:18899: etāvantaṃ mayā kālaṃ vṛto yat tvaṃ vratipriya / ajātabuddhibhedena tenaivānṛṇyam astu te //MU_6,96.26//
GSP27moksop_u:18900: bhrāntau tu vinivartinyāṃ nādhunopakaroṣi me / devaputraprasādena daṇḍakāṣṭha namo 'stu te //MU_6,96.27//
GSP27moksop_u:18901: ity uktvā vaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ cikṣepāgnau śikhidhvajaḥ / gāṅgaṃ pravāham ādīrghaṃ vaḍavāgnāv ivārṇavaḥ //MU_6,96.28//
GSP27moksop_u:18902: prasaṅkhyātāny asaṅkhyāni janmānīva tvayā mayā / sakhi mantrapadāny adya yāhi nopakaroṣi me //MU_6,96.29//
GSP27moksop_u:18903: mantrāṭavyāṃ ciraṃ bhrāntaṃ vihṛtaṃ kāryavartmasu / dṛṣṭāni dharmasthānāni viśrāmyāmy adhunā sakhi //MU_6,96.30//
GSP27moksop_u:18904: ity akṣamālāṃ jvalane cikṣepoktvā śikhidhvajaḥ / kalpāntāgnāv iva vyomatārālīṃ pavano 'malām //MU_6,96.31//
GSP27moksop_u:18905: mayā naramṛgeṇa tvaṃ ciraṃ vanamṛgacyutam / abodhena dhṛtaṃ vṛttyā dayayeva mṛgājina //MU_6,96.32//
GSP27moksop_u:18906: idānīṃ gaccha sacchāya panthānas santu te śivāḥ / vahninā vyomatāṃ gaccha satāraṃ vyoma te samam //MU_6,96.33//
GSP27moksop_u:18907: unmocyāṅgāt karābhyāṃ ca dhṛtvā carma jahāv iti / nṛpo 'gnāv ambudaṃ vāto davavahnāv ivācalāt //MU_6,96.34//
GSP27moksop_u:18908: mayā dhṛtena bhavatā tvayā vāri dhṛtaṃ mama / sādho kamaṇḍalo samyakkṛte pratikṛtaṃ kṛtam //MU_6,96.35//
GSP27moksop_u:18909: sauhṛdasya manojñasya saujanyasya sthirasya ca / sādhutvasya ca sarvasya tvam ekaḥ paramāspadam //MU_6,96.36//
GSP27moksop_u:18910: yenaiva vahninā dehaṃ saṃśodhyābhyāgato 'si mām / tenaiva gaccha he mitra panthānas santu te śivāḥ //MU_6,96.37//
GSP27moksop_u:18911: ity uktvā śrotriyāyaiṣa kamaṇḍalum adāt tadā / agnaye mahate vāpi dātavyaṃ sādhu yad bhavet //MU_6,96.38//
GSP27moksop_u:18912: mūrkhasyeva matir gupte nityam eva vasasy adhaḥ / ucitā te gatiḥ keva bṛsike bhasmatāṃ vraja //MU_6,96.39//
GSP27moksop_u:18913: ity uktvādāya bṛsikām agnāv indhanavṛddhidām / śuddhyartham āsanārthaṃ cety agnau tatyāja bhāsure //MU_6,96.40//
GSP27moksop_u:18914: yat tyājyam acireṇaiva tyaktavyaṃ kila tat satā / upāyaḥ kriyate sadbhir upādeye mate sati //MU_6,96.41//
GSP27moksop_u:18915: śīghram agnāv idaṃ sarvaṃ bhāṇḍajālaṃ tyajāmy aham / ekavāraṃ dahann agnir dāhyaṃ bhavati tuṣṭaye //MU_6,96.42//
GSP27moksop_u:18916: sādho kriyopakaraṇa niṣkriyas tvāṃ tyajāmy aham / na khedas tv atra kartavyo 'nupayogyaṃ bibharti kaḥ //MU_6,96.43//
GSP27moksop_u:18917: ity uktavāñ jhagiti bhojanabhājanādyaṃ sarvaṃ juhāva vanavāsavilāsayogyam / tad bhāṇḍajālam anale samam eva rājā kalpāntatejasi jagaj jvalatīva kālaḥ //MU_6,96.44//
GSP27moksop_u:18920: vasiṣṭhaḥ: athotthāya dadāhāsau śuṣkaṃ tat parṇamandiram / ajñena svena manasā vṛthā saṅkalpyakalpitam //MU_6,97.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18921: śiṣṭaṃ yat kiñcid abhavat tatra tat sa śikhidhvajaḥ / asaṃrabdhamanā maunī krameṇa samayā dhiyā //MU_6,97.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18922: dadāha dūre cikṣepa tatyāja ca babhañja ca / bhāṇḍajātaṃ svavasanabhojanādy api ruṣṭavat //MU_6,97.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18924: āśramāt te mṛgakhagās tyaktaromantham udyayuḥ / sāgnidāhāt puravarād bhītabhītā janā iva //MU_6,97.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18925: bhāṇḍajātaṃ dahaty agnau saha śuṣkendhanena tat / kevalākṛtir asnehas tuṣṭimān āha bhūpatiḥ //MU_6,97.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18926: śikhidhvajaḥ: aho nu cirakālena devaputra prabodhitaḥ / sampannaḥ kevalaś śuddhas sukhito bodhavān aham //MU_6,97.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18927: kiṃ nāma kila vastv etad bhavet sāṅkalpikakramam / yad bhāṇḍopaskarasthānasadanādyavalambanam //MU_6,97.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18928: yāvad yāvat prahīyante vibandhā bandhahetavaḥ / tāvat tāvat samāyāti paramāṃ nirvṛtiṃ manaḥ //MU_6,97.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18929: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukhito 'smi jayāmy aham / vibandhāḥ prakṣayaṃ yātās sarvatyāgo mayā kṛtaḥ //MU_6,97.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18930: digambaro diksadano diksakho 'yam ahaṃ sthitaḥ / devaputra mahātyāgāt kim anyad avaśiṣyate //MU_6,97.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18931: kumbhaḥ: sarvam eva na santyaktaṃ tvayā rājañ śikhidhvaja / sarvatyāgaparānandaṃ mā mudhābhinayīkuru //MU_6,97.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18932: tavāsty evāparityaktas sarvasmād bhāga uttamaḥ / yaṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām //MU_6,97.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18933: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti śrutavatā tena kiñcit sañcintya bhūbhṛtā / idam uktaṃ mahābāho rāma rājīvalocana //MU_6,97.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18934: śikhidhvajaḥ: indriyavyālasaṅghāto raktamāṃsamayākṛtiḥ / śiṣyate sarvasantyāge deho me devatātmaja //MU_6,97.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18935: tad utthāya purassaṃsthabhṛgupātād avighnajāt / vināśātmakatāṃ nītvā sarvatyāgī bhavāmy aham //MU_6,97.16//
GSP27moksop_u:18936: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvā deham agrasthe śvabhre tyaktum asau javāt / karoti yāvad utthānaṃ tāvat kumbho 'bhyuvāca ha //MU_6,97.17//
GSP27moksop_u:18937: kumbhaḥ: rājan kim iti dehaṃ tvaṃ nirāgaskaṃ mahāvaṭe / tyajasy ajño hi vṛṣabhaḥ kupito hanti tarṇakam //MU_6,97.18//
GSP27moksop_u:18938: jaḍo varāko mūkātmā tapasvī dehako hy ayam / na kaścana tavaitasmai mā mudhaiva ruṣaṃ kuru //MU_6,97.19//
GSP27moksop_u:18939: ātmany evaiṣa mūḍhātmā dhyānavān iva tiṣṭhati / sañcālyate pareṇaiva taraṅgeṇeva kāṣṭhakam //MU_6,97.20//
GSP27moksop_u:18940: kṣobhayaty anya evainaṃ nigrahārho muhur balāt / tapasvinaṃ yathaikāntasaṃsthitaṃ mattataskaraḥ //MU_6,97.21//
GSP27moksop_u:18941: sukhaduḥkhānubhūtyā hi nāparādhi śarīrakam / nātmanaḥ phalapātāt sa spandair vṛkṣo 'parādhavān //MU_6,97.22//
GSP27moksop_u:18942: vātaḥ phalaśikhāpuṣpapātanaṃ kurute sphuran / taruṇā sādhunā sādhor aparāddhaṃ kim ātmanaḥ //MU_6,97.23//
GSP27moksop_u:18943: tyaktenāpi śarīreṇa kila tāmarasekṣaṇa / sarvatyāgo na te yāti niṣpattiṃ viṣamo hi saḥ //MU_6,97.24//
GSP27moksop_u:18944: bhṛgoḥ kevalam etat tvaṃ nirāgaskaṃ śarīrakam / mudhā kṣipasi no dehatyāgena tyāgitā bhavet //MU_6,97.25//
GSP27moksop_u:18945: yenāyaṃ kṣobhyate deho mattebheneva pādapaḥ / tat santyajasi cet pāpaṃ tan mahātyāgavān bhavān //MU_6,97.26//
GSP27moksop_u:18946: tasmiṃs tyakte bhavet tyaktaṃ sarvaṃ dehādi bhūpate / no cen nirdagdham apy etad bhūyo bhūyaḥ prarohati //MU_6,97.27//
GSP27moksop_u:18947: śikhidhvajaḥ: kenāyaṃ cālyate dehaḥ kiṃ bījaṃ janmakarmaṇām / kasmiṃs tyakte parityaktaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati sundara //MU_6,97.28//
GSP27moksop_u:18948: kumbhaḥ: sādho na dehatyāgena na rājyatyajanena ca / na coṭajādiploṣeṇa sarvatyāgo bhaven nṛṇām //MU_6,97.29//
GSP27moksop_u:18949: yat sarvaṃ sarvato yac ca tasmin sarvaikakāraṇe / sarvasmin samparityakte sarvatyāgaḥ kṛto bhavet //MU_6,97.30//
GSP27moksop_u:18950: śikhidhvajaḥ: sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ sārvaṃ heyaṃ tyājyaṃ ca sarvathā / sarvaṃ kim ucyate brūhi sarvatattvavidāṃ vara //MU_6,97.31//
GSP27moksop_u:18951: kumbhaḥ: sādho sarvakalādhāraṃ jīvaprāṇādināmakam / na jaḍaṃ nājaḍaṃ bhrāntaṃ cittaṃ sarvam iti smṛtam //MU_6,97.32//
GSP27moksop_u:18952: rājyāder atha dehāder āśramāder mahīpate / sarvasyaiva mano bījaṃ tarubījaṃ taror iva //MU_6,97.33//
GSP27moksop_u:18953: sarvasya bīje santyakte sarvaṃ tyaktaṃ bhavaty alam / sambhavāsambhavād bhūyas sarvatyāgo bhaved iti //MU_6,97.34//
GSP27moksop_u:18954: sarvaṃ dharmādy adharmādi rājyādi vipinādi ca / sacittasya paraṃ duḥkhaṃ niścittasya paraṃ sukham //MU_6,97.35//
GSP27moksop_u:18955: idaṃ vivartate sarvaṃ cittam eva jagattayā / dehādyākārajālena bījaṃ vṛkṣatayā yathā //MU_6,97.36//
GSP27moksop_u:18956: pādapaḥ pavaneneva bhūkampeneva parvataḥ / bhastrā bhastrāhinevāyaṃ dehaś cittena cālyate //MU_6,97.37//
GSP27moksop_u:18957: sarvabhūtopabhogyānāṃ jarāmaraṇajanmanām / mahāmaṇīnāṃ sudṛḍhaṃ cittaṃ viddhi samudgakam //MU_6,97.38//
GSP27moksop_u:18958: cittaṃ jīvo mano māyā prāṇaś cetyādibhir mune / kriyānurūpair abhidhāvyāpāraiś cittam ucyate //MU_6,97.39//
GSP27moksop_u:18959: cittaṃ sarvam iti prāhus tasmiṃs tyakte mahīpate / sarvādhivyādhisīmānte sarvatyāgaḥ kṛto bhavet //MU_6,97.40//
GSP27moksop_u:18960: cittatyāgaṃ vidus sarvatyāgaṃ tyāgavidāṃ vara / tasmin siddhe mahābāho satyaṃ kenāpi bhūyate //MU_6,97.41//
GSP27moksop_u:18961: citte tyakte layaṃ yāti dvaitam aikyaṃ ca sarvataḥ / kenacid bhūyate śāntaṃ svaccham ekam anāmayam //MU_6,97.42//
GSP27moksop_u:18962: asyāḥ kṣetraṃ viduś cittaṃ saṃsṛtes sasyasantateḥ / kṣetre tv akṣetratāṃ yāte śāleḥ ka iva sambhavaḥ //MU_6,97.43//
GSP27moksop_u:18963: cittam eva vicitrehaṃ bhāvābhāvavilāsinā / vivartate 'rthabhāvena jalam ūrmitayā yathā //MU_6,97.44//
GSP27moksop_u:18964: cittotsādanarūpeṇa sarvatyāgena bhūpate / sarvam āsādyate samyak sāmrājyeneva sarvadā //MU_6,97.45//
GSP27moksop_u:18965: sarvatyāgasya viṣayo yathaivānyo 'sti te tathā / tvam apy anyasya bhavasi tyāgin gṛhṇāsi cen nṛpa //MU_6,97.46//
GSP27moksop_u:18966: sūtraṃ muktāphaleneva jagajjālaṃ trikālagam / sarvam antaḥkṛtaṃ tena yena sarvaṃ samujjhitam //MU_6,97.47//
GSP27moksop_u:18967: yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ tasmiñ śūnye 'pi saṃsthitaṃ / jagat sarvaṃ trikālasthaṃ tantur muktāphale yathā //MU_6,97.48//
GSP27moksop_u:18968: sasneheneva dīpena tena sarvaṃ prakāśitam / sthitas sarvaṃ parityajya yaś śānto 'snehadīpavat //MU_6,97.49//
GSP27moksop_u:18969: asneheneva dīpena yena sarvaṃ tirohitam / sa rājate prakāśātmā samas sasnehadīpavat //MU_6,97.50//
GSP27moksop_u:18970: samastavastuniṣkāse yathā kham avaśiṣyate / sarvatyāge kṛte tādṛg vijñānam avaśiṣyate //MU_6,97.51//
GSP27moksop_u:18971: samastavastūdāso hi yathā khaṃ netaran nṛpa / sarvasantyāga evāṅga tathā nirvāṇam ucyate //MU_6,97.52//
GSP27moksop_u:18972: sarvatyāgo hi śūnyātmāpy āśrayas sarvasampadām / anantānām udārāṇāṃ kham ivedaṃ divaukasām //MU_6,97.53//
GSP27moksop_u:18973: sarvatyāgarasāpānāj jarāmaraṇabhītayaḥ / na kāścana prabādhante khasyeva malalekhikāḥ //MU_6,97.54//
GSP27moksop_u:18974: sarvatyāgo mahattvasya kāraṇaṃ nirmaladyuteḥ / sarvaṃ tyajati khaṃ yasmāt tasmāc chuddhaṃ sthiraṃ bṛhat //MU_6,97.55//
GSP27moksop_u:18975: sarvatyāgaḥ parānando duḥkham anyat sudāruṇam / ity om ity urarīkṛtya yad icchasi tad ācara //MU_6,97.56//
GSP27moksop_u:18976: sarvaṃ tyajati yas tasya sarvam evopatiṣṭhate / yathaivāmbu viśaty agnau tathaivāyāti vāridhau //MU_6,97.57//
GSP27moksop_u:18977: sarvatyāgāntar evāsti jñānam ātmaprasādakam / yac chūnyaṃ kila bhāṇḍasya tatra ratnādi tiṣṭhati //MU_6,97.58//
GSP27moksop_u:18978: sarvatyāgavaśād eva hatakāle kalāv api / śākyena vigatāśaṅkaṃ muninā meruvat sthitam //MU_6,97.59//
GSP27moksop_u:18979: sarvatyāgo mahārāja sarvasampatsamāśrayaḥ / na gṛhṇāti hi yaḥ kaścit sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate //MU_6,97.60//
GSP27moksop_u:18980: kṛtvā sarvaparityāgaṃ śāntas svaccho viyatsamaḥ / somyo bhavasi yadrūpas tadrūpo bhava bhūpate //MU_6,97.61//
GSP27moksop_u:18981: sarvaṃ parityajya mahānubhāva tyajasy alaṃ yena ca tad vihāya / tyāgaṃ ca sādānam alaṃ vimucya vimuktarūpo bhava bhūmipāla //MU_6,97.62//
GSP27moksop_u:18984: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evaṃ vadati vai kumbhe cittatyāgaṃ muhur muhuḥ / antar vicārayan somyo rājā vacanam abravīt //MU_6,98.1//
GSP27moksop_u:18985: śikhidhvajaḥ: hṛdayākāśavihago hṛdayadrumamarkaṭaḥ / bhūyo bhūyo nirastaṃ hi samāyāty eva māṃ manaḥ //MU_6,98.2//
GSP27moksop_u:18986: jānāmi naitad ādātuṃ matsyaṃ bāla ivākulam / tyāgam asya na jānāmi citram andha ivottamam //MU_6,98.3//
GSP27moksop_u:18987: cittasyādau svarūpaṃ me yathāvad bhagavan vada / tataś cittaparityāgaṃ yathāvad bhagavan vada //MU_6,98.4//
GSP27moksop_u:18988: kumbhaḥ: vāsanaiva mahārāja svarūpaṃ viddhi cetasaḥ / cittaśabdas tu paryāyo vāsanāyā udāhṛtaḥ //MU_6,98.5//
GSP27moksop_u:18989: tyāgas tv asyātisukaras susādhas spandanād api / ratād apy adhikānandaḥ kusumād api sundaraḥ //MU_6,98.6//
GSP27moksop_u:18990: mūrkhasya tu manastyāgo nūnaṃ dussādhatāṃ gataḥ / pukkasasyeva sāmrājyaṃ tṛṇasyeva sumerutā //MU_6,98.7//
GSP27moksop_u:18991: śikhidhvajaḥ: svarūpaṃ vedmi cittasya vāsanāmayam ākulam / tyāgo 'sya manye dussādho vajranirdalanād api //MU_6,98.8//
GSP27moksop_u:18992: saṃsṛtyāmodapuṣpasya duḥkhatailatilasya ca / jagadvālamṛṇālasya mohamārutakhasya ca //MU_6,98.9//
GSP27moksop_u:18993: śarīrayantravāhasya hṛtpadmabhramarasya ca / ayatnāc cetasas tyāgo yathā bhavati tad vada //MU_6,98.10//
GSP27moksop_u:18994: kumbhaḥ: sarvanāśo 'sya yas sādho cetasas saṃsṛtikṣayaḥ / sa eva cittasantyāga ity uktaṃ dīrghadarśibhiḥ //MU_6,98.11//
GSP27moksop_u:18995: śikhidhvajaḥ: cittatyāgād ahaṃ manye cittanāśas svasiddhaye / abhāvaś cetaso vyādheḥ katham asyānubhūyate //MU_6,98.12//
GSP27moksop_u:18996: kumbhaḥ: ahambījadrumaṃ cittaṃ saśākhāphalapallavam / unmūlaya samūlaṃ tvam ākāśaviśado bhavan //MU_6,98.13//
GSP27moksop_u:18997: śikhidhvajaḥ: cetasaḥ kiṃ mune mūlaṃ ko 'ṅkuraḥ kaś ca sambhavaḥ / kāś śākhāḥ ke ca vā skandhāḥ katham unmūlyate ca tat //MU_6,98.14//
GSP27moksop_u:18998: kumbhaḥ: ahamarthodayo yo 'yaṃ cidātmā vedanātmakaḥ / etac cittadrumasyāsya viddhi bījaṃ jagadgatam //MU_6,98.15//
GSP27moksop_u:18999: ahambhāvātmakaṃ vittvaṃ cittabījam udāhṛtam / paramātmapadakṣetraṃ netraṃ māyāmayasya tat //MU_6,98.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19000: etasmāt prathamodbhinnād yo 'ṅkuro 'nubhavākṛtiḥ / niścayātmā nirākāro buddhir ity eva socyate //MU_6,98.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19001: asya buddhyabhidhānasya yāṅkurasya prapīnatā / saṅkalparūpiṇī tasyāś cittaṃ nāma mano 'bhidhā //MU_6,98.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19002: jīvo mithyopalambhātmā śūnyātmāpy upalopamaḥ / stambhaḥ kāyo 'yam etasya snāyvasthirasarañjitaḥ //MU_6,98.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19003: deśād deśāntare dūre deśakālavido 'sya yāḥ / śākhās tāś cittavṛkṣasya dīrghā dūratarās tatāḥ //MU_6,98.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19004: indriyāṇy atha bhogāś ca bhāvābhāvamayormayaḥ / viṭapaughā mahānto 'sya śubhāśubhaphalākulāḥ //MU_6,98.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19005: īdṛśasyāsya cittasya durvṛkṣasya pratikṣaṇam / śākhāvilavanaṃ kurvan mūlakāṣe bharaṃ kuru //MU_6,98.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19006: śikhidhvajaḥ: cittadrumasya śākhādeḥ kurvāṇo 'haṃ vikartanam / kathaṃ karomi mūlasya niśśeṣaṃ kaṣaṇaṃ mune //MU_6,98.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19007: kumbhaḥ: vāsanā vividhāś śākhāḥ phalaskandhādinānvitāḥ / abhāvitā bhavanty antar lūnās saṃvidbalena te //MU_6,98.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19008: asaṃsaktamanā maunī śāntavādavicāraṇaḥ / samprāptakārī yas so 'ntar lūnacittalato bhavet //MU_6,98.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19009: cittadrumalatājālaṃ pauruṣeṇa vikartayan / yas tiṣṭhati sa mūlasya yogyo nikaṣaṇe bhavet //MU_6,98.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19010: gauṇaṃ śākhāvilavanaṃ mukhyaṃ mūlavikartanam / cittavṛkṣasya tena tvaṃ mūlakāṣaparo bhava //MU_6,98.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19011: mukhyatvena mahābuddhe mūladāham alaṃ kuru / cittakaṇṭakaṣaṇḍasya bhavaty evam acittatā //MU_6,98.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19012: śikhidhvajaḥ: ahambhāvātmanaś cittadrumabījasya he mune / ko 'nalo dāhyadahanasamartho 'rthakaro bhavet //MU_6,98.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19013: kumbhaḥ: rājan svātmavicāro 'yaṃ ko 'haṃ syām iti rūpadhṛt / cittadurdrumabījasya dahane dahanas smṛtaḥ //MU_6,98.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19014: śikhidhvajaḥ: mune mayā mahābuddhyā bahuśaḥ pravicāritam / yāvan nāhaṃ jagan norvī na ca maṇḍalamaṇḍalam //MU_6,98.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19015: nādres taṭaṃ na vipinaṃ na parṇasadanādi vā / jaḍatvān na ca dehādi na māṃsāsthyasṛgādi ca //MU_6,98.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19016: karmendriyāṇy api na ca na ca buddhīndriyāṇi ca / na mano nāpi ca matir nāhambhāvaś ca jāḍyataḥ //MU_6,98.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19017: kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni tathāhantvaṃ cidātmani / jaḍaṃ tv asadrūpatayā tena tan nāsmi he mune //MU_6,98.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19018: sanniveśaviśeṣātmaśabdārthādi pare pade / vidyate nātyanantatvān nabhasīva mahādrumaḥ //MU_6,98.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19019: jānann apīti bhagavann ahantvamalamārjanam / antar yadā na jānāmi tena tapye mahāmune //MU_6,98.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19020: kumbhaḥ: etāvanmātrakaṃ vṛndaṃ yadi na tvaṃ mahīpate / jaḍatvāt tan mahābuddhe yo 'si taṃ vada me navam //MU_6,98.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19021: śikhidhvajaḥ: cinmātram aham acchātmavedanaṃ viduṣāṃ vara / yatra bhāvās svadanty ete nirmīyante ca yena vā //MU_6,98.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19022: evaṃrūpasya me lagnaṃ nūnaṃ malam akāraṇam / sakāraṇaṃ cāham iti yat tat tyaktuṃ na vedmy aham //MU_6,98.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19023: asad etad anātmīyaṃ pramārṣṭuṃ malam ātmanaḥ / mune yadā na śakto 'smi tena tapye sudāruṇam //MU_6,98.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19024: kumbhaḥ: brūhi kiṃ tan mahābāho lagnaṃ tava malaṃ mahat / sthito 'si yena saṃsārī satā vāpy asatātha vā //MU_6,98.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19025: śikhidhvajaḥ: cittadrumasya yad bījam ahambhāvas sa me malam / tac ca tyaktuṃ na jānāmi tyaktaṃ tyaktam upaiti mām //MU_6,98.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19026: kumbhaḥ: kāraṇāj jāyate kāryaṃ yat tat sarvatra sad bhavet / anyat tv asad dvicandrābhaṃ dṛṣṭam eva na vidyate //MU_6,98.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19027: kāraṇāj jāyate kāryam ahambhāvātmakaṃ tataḥ / itikāraṇam anviṣya kathayāśu mamātmanā //MU_6,98.44//
GSP27moksop_u:19028: śikhidhvajaḥ: mune 'ham iti doṣasya vedanaṃ vedmi kāraṇam / tad yathopaśamaṃ yāti tan me vada munīśvara //MU_6,98.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19029: citaś cetyonmukhatvena duḥkhāyāham iti sthitaḥ / cetyopaśamanaṃ brūhi mune tadupaśāntaye //MU_6,98.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19030: kumbhaḥ: kāraṇaṃ kāraṇajño 'si vedanasya vadāśu me / tatas tvāṃ bodhayiṣyāmi kāraṇākāraṇakramam //MU_6,98.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19031: vedyavedanarūpasya cetyasañcetanasya ca / akāraṇaṃ kāraṇatāṃ yad gataṃ tava tad vada //MU_6,98.48//
GSP27moksop_u:19032: śikhidhvajaḥ: cetyacetanarūpasya vedyasaṃvedanākṛteḥ / iyaṃ padārthasatteha dehādyā kāraṇaṃ mune //MU_6,98.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19033: śarīrāditayodeti vedanaṃ vastusattayā / asatyābhāsayā spando yathā pavanalekhayā //MU_6,98.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19034: asattāṃ vastusattāyā nāvagacchāmy ahaṃ yayā / ahantvavedanaṃ cittabījaṃ samupaśāmyati //MU_6,98.51//
GSP27moksop_u:19035: kumbhaḥ: vidyate yadi dehādivastusattā tad asti te / abhāvād dehasattādeḥ kiṃniṣṭhaṃ tava vedanam //MU_6,98.52//
GSP27moksop_u:19036: śikhidhvajaḥ: yasyopalabhyate kiñcit svarūpaṃ kalanātmakam / asadrūpaṃ kathaṃ tat syāt prakāśas syāt kathaṃ tamaḥ //MU_6,98.53//
GSP27moksop_u:19037: hastapādādisaṃyuktaḥ kriyāphalavilāsavān / sadānubhūyamāno 'pi deho nāsti kathaṃ mune //MU_6,98.54//
GSP27moksop_u:19038: kumbhaḥ: kāraṇaṃ yasya kāryasya bhūmipāla na vidyate / vidyate neha tat kāryaṃ tatsaṃvittis tu vibhramaḥ //MU_6,98.55//
GSP27moksop_u:19039: kāraṇena vinā kāryaṃ vidyate na kadācana / vidyate yasya no bījaṃ tad dravyaṃ kveva jāyate //MU_6,98.56//
GSP27moksop_u:19040: akāranaṃ tu yat kāryaṃ sad ivāgre 'nubhūyate / tad draṣṭur vibhramaṃ viddhi mṛgatṛṣṇājalopamam //MU_6,98.57//
GSP27moksop_u:19041: avidyamānam eva tvaṃ viddhi mithyābhramoditam / nātiyatnavatāpy etan mṛgatṛṣṇāmbu labhyate //MU_6,98.58//
GSP27moksop_u:19042: asato dvīndubimbāder na yuktaṃ kāraṇekṣaṇam / vandhyātanayasarvāṅgamaṇḍanaṃ kasya rājate //MU_6,98.59//
GSP27moksop_u:19043: kāraṇena vinā kāryaṃ śarīrādy asthipañjaram / avidyamānam evedaṃ viddhy asambhavato nṛpa //MU_6,98.60//
GSP27moksop_u:19044: śikhidhvajaḥ: hastapādādiyuktasya śarīrasya munīśvara / nityam ālakṣyamāṇasya pitā kasmān na kāraṇam //MU_6,98.61//
GSP27moksop_u:19045: kumbhaḥ: kāraṇābhāvato rājan pitā nāma na vidyate / asato yat tu sañjātam asad eva tad ucyate //MU_6,98.62//
GSP27moksop_u:19046: padārthānāṃ ca kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bījam ucyate / sambhavaty aṅga jagati na bījena vināṅkuraḥ //MU_6,98.63//
GSP27moksop_u:19047: tasmān na kāraṇaṃ yasya kāryasyehopapadyate / bījābhāve hi tan nāsti tatsaṃvittis tu vibhramaḥ //MU_6,98.64//
GSP27moksop_u:19048: avaśyam eva yan nāsti nirbījaṃ tan matibhramaḥ / dvīndutvamarubhūmyambuvandhyāputradṛśā samaḥ //MU_6,98.65//
GSP27moksop_u:19049: śikhidhvajaḥ: pitāmahānāṃ putrāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca jagattraye / ādyaḥ pitāmahaḥ kasmāt pūrvotpanno na kāraṇam //MU_6,98.66//
GSP27moksop_u:19050: kumbhaḥ: ādyaḥ pitāmaho yas syāt so 'pi nāsty eva bhūpate / kāraṇābhāvato nityaṃ yadā kāryaṃ na kasyacit //MU_6,98.67//
GSP27moksop_u:19051: kāraṇasya svabījasya nityābhāvāt pitāmahaḥ / ādyas san dṛśyamāno 'pi bhramād anyo na vidyate //MU_6,98.68//
GSP27moksop_u:19052: mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvad bhrāntirūpa evāvabhāsate / pitāmaho 'rthakāritvam api tv asya bhramātmakam //MU_6,98.69//
GSP27moksop_u:19053: pitāmahāder etasya mithyāpratyayatas tv iti / ghanatā tu nivṛttaiva mārjayiṣyāmy athetarat //MU_6,98.70//
GSP27moksop_u:19054: tasmāc cidātmakatayātmani cinnabho yan nityaṃ svayaṃ kacati cāru tad eṣa devaḥ / tenaiva padmaja iti svayam ātmanātmā proktaḥ kharūpa iti śāntam idaṃ samastam //MU_6,98.71//
GSP27moksop_u:19057: śikhidhvajaḥ: ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ yady ayaṃ bhāsate bhramaḥ / arthakriyāsamarthaś ca tat sthitaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam //MU_6,99.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19058: kumbhaḥ: evaṃ jagadbhramasyāsya tānavaṃ tāvad āgatam / śilībhūtasya śītena salilasyeva sūṣmaṇā //MU_6,99.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19059: ajñānaṃ śithilībhūtam eva naṣṭaṃ vidur budhāḥ / na nāśena vinodeti pūrvasaṃsthānavicyutiḥ //MU_6,99.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19060: tanutvaṃ sargabodhasya yat tad eva hi kāraṇam / sargopaśamasampatteḥ pratipatteḥ pare pade //MU_6,99.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19061: tānavaṃ dṛśyate yasya tasyānukramatas svayam / pūrvasaṃsthānavigamāt praśamo 'py upapadyate //MU_6,99.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19062: anenaiva krameṇainaṃ tvam ādipuruṣaṃ nṛpa / bhramākārodayaṃ viddhi mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivoditam //MU_6,99.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19063: eṣā pitāmahābhāve 'py asatī bhūtasantatiḥ / na kadācana tat siddhaṃ yad asiddhena sādhyate //MU_6,99.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19064: ayaṃ bhūtopalambho hi mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivoditaḥ / vicārād vilayaṃ yāti śuktau rajatadhīr iva //MU_6,99.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19065: kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryam abhūtvā bhavatīti yat / mithyājñānād ṛte tasya na rūpam upapadyate //MU_6,99.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19066: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ prekṣitā ca na kadācana vidyate / mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasā kena ghaṭakāḥ paripūritāḥ //MU_6,99.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19067: śikhidhvajaḥ: sraṣṭur ādyasya paramaṃ brahma kasmān na kāraṇam / anantam ajam avyaktam īśvaraṃ śāntam acyutam //MU_6,99.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19068: kumbhaḥ: hetutvābhāvato brahma kāryatvābhāvatas tataḥ / advaitaikyāvikārātma na kāryaṃ na ca kāraṇam //MU_6,99.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19069: akartṛkarmakaraṇam akāraṇam abījakam / apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ brahma kartṛ kathaṃ bhavet //MU_6,99.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19070: akāraṇatvāt kāryatvarahitaṃ tad yadā bhavet / advaitaikyam anādyantaṃ tadā tadupalambhanam //MU_6,99.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19071: apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ yac chivaṃ śāntam avyayam / tat kathaṃ kasya keneva kartṛ bhoktṛ kadā bhavet //MU_6,99.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19072: ato nedaṃ kṛtaṃ kiñcij jagadādi na vidyate / na kartāsti na bhoktāsti sarvaṃ śāntam ajaṃ śivam //MU_6,99.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19073: kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ na kasyacid idaṃ jagat / akāryatvāc ca nāsty etat sarga itthaṃ na vidyate //MU_6,99.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19074: yadā na kasyacit kāryaṃ kāraṇasya jagat tadā / padārthābhāvasaṃsiddhis tatsiddhau kasya vedanam //MU_6,99.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19075: evaṃ tu vedanābhāve nāsty ahantvasya kāraṇam / ataś śuddho 'si mukto 'si kevoktir bandhamokṣayoḥ //MU_6,99.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19076: śikhidhvajaḥ: āṃ prabuddho 'smi bhagavan yuktam uktaṃ tvayottamam / kāraṇābhāvataḥ kartṛ neha brahmeti vedmy aham //MU_6,99.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19077: kartrabhāvāj jagan nāsti tena nāsti padārthadṛk / nātaś cittādi tadbījaṃ nāto 'hantādi kiñcana //MU_6,99.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19078: evaṃ sthite viśuddho 'smi vibuddho 'smi na cāsmi ca / namo mahyaṃ paraṃ naumi nakiñcid api bodhataḥ //MU_6,99.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19079: padārthavedanaṃ mithyaivāsad evāvabhāsate / ahamādy alam etena śāntam āse khakośavat //MU_6,99.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19080: jagatpadārthapravibhāgadṛṣṭis sadeśadikkālakalākriyaughā / aho nu kālena cireṇa śāntā brahmaiva vā nūnam avasthiteti //MU_6,99.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19081: śāmyāmi nirvāmi paraṃ sthito 'smi na yāmi nodemi na cāstam emi / tiṣṭhāmy aniṣṭhaṃ ca yathāsthitātmā śivaṃ śubhaṃ pāvanamaunam asmi //MU_6,99.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19084: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti brahmaṇi viśrāntim avāpya sa śikhidhvajaḥ / muhūrtam āsīt saṃśāntamanā nirvāṇadīpavat //MU_6,100.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19085: nirvikalpasamādhānapariṇatyāstam īyivān / svalīlayeti kumbhena sa jhagity eva bodhitaḥ //MU_6,100.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19086: kumbhaḥ: rājann ajñānanidrātaḥ prabuddho 'si śivas sthitaḥ / kāryaṃ nāstamayeneto na cānastamayena te //MU_6,100.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19087: sakṛd eva vibhātātmā tiṣṭhāniṣṭhapadātmakaḥ / kalākalananirmukto jīvanmukto 'ṅga sāmpratam //MU_6,100.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19088: vasiṣṭhaḥ: kumbhena bodhitas tv evaṃ sa babhūva prabodhavān / vinirgato rarājoccair mahāmohasamudgakāt //MU_6,100.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19089: viśrāntadhīḥ kṣaṇenaiva paśyan dṛśyasya vastunaḥ / asattām eva muktātmā līlayā samuvāca ha //MU_6,100.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19090: śikhidhvajaḥ: jñātaprāyam apīdaṃ tu yat pṛcchāmi tad ucyatām / bhūyo nipuṇabodhāya mama mānada mohahan //MU_6,100.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19091: śive śānte nirābhāse pare 'nullaṅghitātmani / draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyākhyo viśvātmā pratyayaḥ kutaḥ //MU_6,100.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19092: kumbhaḥ: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja rājase bodhabhāsvatā / etad eva hi te śiṣṭaṃ jñatāyās tad idaṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,100.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19093: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam / sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ kalpānte tat praṇaśyati //MU_6,100.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19094: tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam / mahākalpavilāsānte sat sāram avaśiṣyate //MU_6,100.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19095: cinmātram amalaṃ kāntam ābhātam amalaṃ nabhaḥ / samastakalanonmuktaṃ yuktaṃ paramayā śriyā //MU_6,100.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19096: yad ekoditam atyacchaṃ śāntam ātatam ujjvalaṃ / paramātmātmakaṃ tejas stimitaṃ jñaptimātrakam //MU_6,100.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19097: apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ samaṃ śivam aniṅganam / brahma nirvāṇam āpūrṇam āghūrṇad iva sampadā //MU_6,100.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19098: aṇīyasām aṇīyas tat sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām / garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasām api //MU_6,100.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19099: īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ sūkṣmaṃ tasyāgre yad idaṃ nabhaḥ / aṇoḥ pārśve mahāmerur iva sthūlātma lakṣyate //MU_6,100.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19100: īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ sthūlaṃ tasyāgre yad idaṃ jagat / paramāṇuvad ābhāti kvacid eva na bhāti vā //MU_6,100.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19101: īdṛśaṃ tad gariṣṭhaṃ ca jagadrājyaṃ yad akṣatam / buddhvaitad amalaṃ śāntaṃ jarattṛṇalavāyate //MU_6,100.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19102: īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ śreyas tasmin sati yad īśvare / jagatpadārthasārthaśrīs svasattodeti vedanāt //MU_6,100.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19103: tat sāram ekam eveha vidyate bhūpate tatam / ekam ekāntabuddhyāttaṃ naikam apy advitāvaśāt //MU_6,100.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19104: tasmād dvitīyā kalanā kācin nāma na vidyate / ātmatattvam alaṃ bhātaṃ tad evāpūrṇam akṣatam //MU_6,100.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19105: saṃsthitaṃ sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvākāram ivoditam / avācyatvād alabhyatvāt tan na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam //MU_6,100.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19106: pratyakṣāder agamyatvāt kim apy ekam tad uttamam / sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ sūkṣmam acchānubhavamātrakam //MU_6,100.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19107: tasyānākhyasya rūpasya nirgatasya pramādṛśaḥ / sato vāpy asato vāpi kathaṃ kāraṇatā bhavet //MU_6,100.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19108: yad vai na kasyacid bījam anākhyatvān na kāraṇam / na kiñcij jāyate tasmāt pramāṇātigatātmanaḥ //MU_6,100.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19109: akartṛkarmakaraṇam satyaṃ cidghanam akṣatam / ātmarūpam anābhāsaṃ svasaṃvedanalakṣaṇam //MU_6,100.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19110: tasmān na jāyate kiñcit parasmād brahmaṇo mune / kathaṃ kila vadāvyakte syāj janyajanakakramaḥ //MU_6,100.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19111: na kiñcij jāyate śānte na ca kiñcit pralīyate / svasattayā sthitaṃ brahma na bījaṃ na ca kāraṇam //MU_6,100.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19112: śuddhānubhavamātraṃ tat tasmād anyan na vidyate / kiñcij jagadahantādi tad evānantam asti hi //MU_6,100.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19113: śikhidhvajaḥ: śive jagadahantādi mune nāstīti vedmy aham / sargavedanam ābhāti katham etad vadāśu me //MU_6,100.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19114: kumbhaḥ: citsāraṃ tad anādyantaṃ tat svasaṃvidi tiṣṭhati / tat tadbhavanam atyacchaṃ tattāmātraṃ jagad viduḥ //MU_6,100.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19115: citsvātmakacanaṃ nāma yad asambhavacetyadṛk / tad ahaṃvedanaṃ viddhi virāḍātma jagat sthitam //MU_6,100.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19116: vātasya vātaspandasya yathā bhedo na vidyate / śūnyatvakhatvopamayoś cinmātrāhantvayos tathā //MU_6,100.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19117: jale 'sti deśakālātte yathormyādi sakāraṇam / pare 'sty adeśakālātte tathā jagad akāraṇam //MU_6,100.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19118: śikhidhvajaḥ: jalādau yat taraṅgādi tat sakāraṇam astv iha / pare jagadahantādi nākāraṇam avaimy aham //MU_6,100.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19119: kumbhaḥ: idānīṃ bhavatā jñātam etat satyaṃ mahīpate / idaṃ jagadahantādi neha kiñcana vidyate //MU_6,100.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19120: jagacchabdārtharahitaṃ jagad asti śivātmakam / vyomny eva nirmitaṃ śāntaṃ vyomnas sūkṣmatareṇa vā //MU_6,100.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19121: yathā nabhasi śūnyatvaṃ tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam / sadasadvasturūpeṇa na vā rūpeṇa kenacit //MU_6,100.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19122: evaṃrūpaṃ jagad idaṃ samyagjñānāc chivaṃ bhavet / samyagjñānaprabhāveṇa viṣam apy amṛtaṃ bhavet //MU_6,100.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19123: asamyagjñānam akhilaṃ jagad duḥkhapradaṃ param / viṣabuddhyāmṛtam api bhuktaṃ viṣarasāyate //MU_6,100.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19124: īśvaratvād yathā vetti yad yad eṣa cidīśvaraḥ / tat tathaivāśu bhavati tādṛgrūpatayā śivam //MU_6,100.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19125: yathā jvālābhramālā vā vicitrākāravibhramaiḥ / tiṣṭhaty ananyarūpaiva brahmasattā tathaiva hi //MU_6,100.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19126: yat paraṃ citsvarūpeṇa sthitam ātmani mantharam / tat tenedam ahantādi jagadādy eva lakṣyate //MU_6,100.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19127: kevalaṃ param evetthaṃ paramaṃ bhāsate śivam / kuto jagadahantādi praśna eveha nocitaḥ //MU_6,100.44//
GSP27moksop_u:19128: yad vastu vidyamānaṃ sat praśnas tatra virājate / prekṣitaṃ yat tu nāsty eva prekṣāpraśnena tatra kim //MU_6,100.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19129: sanniveśaṃ vinā sattā yathā hemno na vidyate / tathā jagadahambhāvaṃ vinā neśasya saṃsthitiḥ //MU_6,100.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19130: akāraṇatvān nāstīdaṃ brahmaivetthaṃ vijṛmbhate / ajṛmbhamāṇam evāhaṃjagattveneha saṃsthitam //MU_6,100.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19131: yanmayā eva tenaiva mithas sampreritāśayam / camatkurvanty amī bhāvāḥ pañceṣu mithunaughavat //MU_6,100.48//
GSP27moksop_u:19132: cinmātra eva cinmātraṃ cinmātreṇaiva cīyate / nānātmanevānānaiva svātmanātmāpy anātmavat //MU_6,100.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19133: pūrṇāt pūrṇam uddharanti pūrṇāt pūrṇāni cakrire / bhavanti pūrṇāt pūrṇāni pūrṇam evāvatiṣṭhate //MU_6,100.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19134: cinmātram eva kacati yac cinmātratayātmani / akacat tv eva tan nāma kacitaṃ sargavedanam //MU_6,100.51//
GSP27moksop_u:19135: ahaṃ citā cid evāsau bhavatīva svayaṃ svataḥ / abhavanty eva rūpaṃ svam atyajantī nirāmayam //MU_6,100.52//
GSP27moksop_u:19136: cito rūpam anādyantaṃ manorūpam anantakam / samrāṭcharīram ābhāsi bhavatīva svayambhuvaḥ //MU_6,100.53//
GSP27moksop_u:19137: paśyaty athāsad evedaṃ svarūpatvāt sad eva vā / bhāvanād ghanatām eti dṛśyaṃ bhavati ca kramāt //MU_6,100.54//
GSP27moksop_u:19138: śāntaṃ jagatprasararūpatayā svabhāvaśabdārthamuktam idam avyapadeśyam ekam / vastusthitaṃ nijacamatkaraṇāvalokarūpaṃ jagattvarahitānubhavātmatattvam //MU_6,100.55//
GSP27moksop_u:19141: kumbhaḥ: na vijñānamayo 'rtho 'sti na bāhyo nāpi śūnyatā / vedanāmātrasāratvād yathāvit so 'rtha ucyate //MU_6,101.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19142: dravatvaṃ salilasyeva vido vittvam akāraṇam / khātma nityam anantaṃ tad yathāsthitam avasthitam //MU_6,101.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19143: pratiyogivyavacchedābhāvatas svatvabhāvayoḥ / asattā tena na pare sattvabhāvavyavasthitau //MU_6,101.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19144: yadi kāraṇatāpattiyogyaṃ śāntaṃ paraṃ bhavet / aniṅganam anābhāsam apratarkyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet //MU_6,101.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19145: ato na kāraṇaṃ naiva bījaṃ brahma kadācana / kāryasya kasyacin nāma tena sargo na vidyate //MU_6,101.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19146: na cānyathopapattir hi sargasyāsyopapadyate / cinmātrakād ṛte tasmāj jaḍas sargo na vidyate //MU_6,101.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19147: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tac cidghanam avedhitam / asambhavajjagacchabdaśabdārtharasarañjanam //MU_6,101.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19148: kāryaṃ na kāraṇābhāvāt padārtha upapadyate / dvitvaikyādyātmakaṃ vyomapuṣpavat svānubhūtitaḥ //MU_6,101.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19149: vastu nāśaikaniṣṭhatvān na cājam upapadyate / upalambhe dhruvo nāśo janma naṣṭasya ca dhruvam //MU_6,101.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19150: atha vainaṃ sadā santaṃ nityaṃ naṣṭaṃ ca vetsi vā / padārthaughaṃ tad eṣo 'rtha ekarūpo 'tra kiṃ vyathā //MU_6,101.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19151: upalambhas tu yaś cāyaṃ sā cittattvacamatkṛtiḥ / cittattvamātrasattāsti dvitvam aikyaṃ ca nāsty alam //MU_6,101.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19152: ataḥ padārthasattāyā abhāve sati bhūpate / asambhave bhāvanasya nāhantābhāvanāsti te //MU_6,101.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19153: ahambhāvāsambhavataś cittam anyat kim ucyate / iti cittam ahaṃrūpaṃ nāsty ato bhava vinnabhaḥ //MU_6,101.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19154: nirvāsanaś śāntamanā maunī paranabhomayaḥ / sadeho vā videho vā bhava sthāyī calo 'tha vā //MU_6,101.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19155: sarvatvāc chuddhaviddṛṣṭeḥ padārthābhāvasiddhitaḥ / bhāvanābhāvataś citte nāsty evāham ataś śivam //MU_6,101.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19156: sarvaṃ brahmeti vedārthabhāvanād anubhūtitaḥ / cetitārthaikasatyatvāc cittaṃ nāma na vidyate //MU_6,101.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19157: tenāsi nirmalam akāraṇam ādimuktaṃ tad brahma śāśvatam aśeṣam anekam ekam / śūnyaṃ vināmayam asat sad anādimadhyaṃ sarvaṃ na kiñcid api cāssva yathāsthitaṃ sat //MU_6,101.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19160: śikhidhvajaḥ: cittaṃ nāstīti me bodho yathā yuktyā sphuṭo bhavet / tām anyām anyathā brūhi buddhaṃ na nipuṇaṃ mayā //MU_6,102.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19161: kumbhaḥ: cittaṃ nāsty eva rājarṣe kadācit kiñcana kvacit / yac cedaṃ cittavad bhāti tad brahmābhidham avyayam //MU_6,102.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19162: ajñajñātātmakaṃ yatra jagad eva na vidyate / tatrāhaṃ tvaṃ tad ityādikalanākalanāḥ kutaḥ //MU_6,102.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19163: nāsty eva jagad evedaṃ yat tv idaṃ kiñcanoditam / brahmaivātmani tad bhāti śṛṇv etad budhyate katham //MU_6,102.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19164: mahāpralayasargādāv evedaṃ noditaṃ jagat / nirdeśas tv ayam anyatra tvadbodhāya mayā kṛtaḥ //MU_6,102.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19165: upādānātmakādīnāṃ kāraṇānām abhāvataḥ / akāraṇaṃ ca bhāvānām aśeṣāṇām asambhavāt //MU_6,102.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19166: evam ajñāvabuddhātma jagad yasmān na vidyate / tasmād yad idam ābhāti bhāsanaṃ brāhmam eva tat //MU_6,102.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19167: anākhyo 'nākṛtir devaḥ karotīdam iti tv asat / bhāṣitaṃ nopapattyātma na satyenānubhūyate //MU_6,102.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19168: anākhyo 'pratighaḥ khātmā nirākāro ya īśvaraḥ / sa karoti jagantīti hāsāyaiva vaco 'dhiyām //MU_6,102.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19169: anenaiva prayogeṇa rājaṃś ceto na vidyate / jagad eva na sat sādho kutaś cittādi tadgatam //MU_6,102.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19170: ceto hi vāsanāmātraṃ vāsye tu sati vāsanā / vāsyaṃ jagat tad evāsad ataś cittāstitā kutaḥ //MU_6,102.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19171: yad idaṃ kacati brahma svayam ātmātmanātmani / kṛtaṃ tasyaiva tenaiva cittam ityādināmakam //MU_6,102.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19172: jagad dṛśyam idaṃ vāsyaṃ tad evotpannam eva no / kāraṇābhāvataḥ pūrvam evātaś cittatā kutaḥ //MU_6,102.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19173: ataś cidvyomamātrātma paramākāśanāmakam / sphāraṃ vedanam evedaṃ kacaty astīha no jagat //MU_6,102.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19174: yat kiñcit paramākāśam īṣat kacakacāyate / cidādarśe nijācchatvāt tac cittaṃ taj jagat kṛtam //MU_6,102.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19175: ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ity eṣā pratipattir na vāstavī / mithyā svapna ivābhātā nūnam apy arthakāriṇī //MU_6,102.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19176: vāsyasya jagato 'bhāvād yato nāsty eva vāsanā / atas tadātmakaṃ cittaṃ kīdṛśaṃ kva kutaḥ katham //MU_6,102.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19177: aprabuddhair avagataṃ caittaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ jagat / asad eva nirākāraṃ pūrvam utpannam eva no //MU_6,102.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19178: notpannaṃ kāraṇābhāvāt sargādāv eva sarvadā / lokaśāstrānubhavato na ca dṛśyasya vastunaḥ //MU_6,102.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19179: anāditvam ajatvaṃ vā sthairyaṃ vāpy upapadyate / sākārasyāsya jagatas sthūlasapratighākṛteḥ //MU_6,102.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19180: samastakāraṇābhāvāl lokaśāstrānubhūtibhiḥ / yujyante ca nirākartuṃ na mahāpralayodayāḥ //MU_6,102.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19181: śāstrānubhavavedārthasiddhān etāṃś ca yo 'pi vā / pralayādīn na santīti vakty unmattaka eva saḥ //MU_6,102.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19182: lokāś śāstrāṇi vedāś ca pramāṇaṃ yasya nāmateḥ / asatyoktes sumūḍhasya sa paśus taṃ na saṃśrayet //MU_6,102.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19183: na ca sapratighasyāsya dṛśyasyāpratighaṃ kvacit / kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ śaktaṃ sākārasya nirākṛtiḥ //MU_6,102.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19184: ittham ālakṣyamāṇaṃ san na cedaṃ nāvabhāsate / na ca nārthakriyākāri na caivettham idaṃ jagat //MU_6,102.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19185: tasmād idaṃ niraṃśasya cidvyomno 'pratighākṛteḥ / nirākṛter anantasya pūrvāt pūrvataraṃ sataḥ //MU_6,102.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19186: brahmaṇas sarvarūpasya śāntaṃ śāntasya yat samam / svata evātmakacanaṃ sargapralayarūpadhṛt //MU_6,102.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19187: svakaṃ vapus tat tenaiva jñātaṃ jagad idaṃ kṣaṇam / kṣaṇāntare tu buddhaṃ sad brahmaivāste nijātmani //MU_6,102.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19188: brahmaivedam atas sarvaṃ kva caittajagadādidhīḥ / kva cittādi kva dehādi kva dvaitaikyādikalpanāḥ //MU_6,102.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19189: sarvaṃ nirālambam ajaṃ praśāntam anādimadhyātma yathāsthitaṃ sat / idaṃ ca nānaiva na cāpi nānā yathāsthitaṃ tiṣṭha sukāṣṭhamaunaḥ //MU_6,102.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19192: śikhidhvajaḥ: naṣṭo mohas smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayā mune / sthito 'smi gatasandeho viśrāntamatir ātmavān //MU_6,103.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19193: jñātajñeyo mahāmaunī tīrṇamāyāmahārṇavaḥ / śānto 'ham anahaṃrūpo jñas sthito 'smi nirāmayaḥ //MU_6,103.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19194: aho nu suciraṃ kālaṃ prabhrānto 'ham avāntare / sthānam avyayam akṣubdham adhunā prāptavān aham //MU_6,103.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19195: evaṃ sthite mune nāsti sāhantādijagattrayam / mūrkhabuddham idaṃ bhāti yat tad brahmeti vedmy aham //MU_6,103.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19196: kumbhaḥ: jagad eva na yatrāsti tatrāhantvavibhāsanam / saṃsārāmbarasambhāraḥ kva kutaḥ kīdṛśaḥ katham //MU_6,103.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19197: yathāsthitavyavahṛtir maunī śāntamanā muniḥ / somyārṇavodarāvartaparispandavad āssva bhoḥ //MU_6,103.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19198: brahmarūpatayā śāntam idam asti yathāsthitam / ahaṃ jagad idaṃ ceti śabdārthātma nabho 'malam //MU_6,103.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19199: idam ādyantarahitaṃ sargasaṃhāranāmakam / ciccamatkṛtimātrātma nabhaḥ kacakacāyate //MU_6,103.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19200: sanniveśadṛśaś śāntau yad asti kanakaṃ yathā / jagadādyarthasaṃśāntau brahmedaṃ vidyate tathā //MU_6,103.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19201: yathā svayambhūs saṅkalpas svayaṃnāśas tathaiva hi / etau svavedanāyattau bandhamokṣau vyavasthitau //MU_6,103.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19202: aham ity eva saṅkalpo bandhāyātivināśine / nāham ity eva saṅkalpo mokṣāya vimalātmane //MU_6,103.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19203: yad bandhamokṣasaṅkalpaśabdārthānāṃ sadāsatām / svarūpavedanaṃ tat sat kevalatvaṃ ca kathyate //MU_6,103.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19204: anahaṃvedanaṃ siddhir ahaṃvedanam āpade / so 'ham evānaham iti śuddhabodho bhavātmavān //MU_6,103.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19205: asaṅkalpanamātreṇa samyagjñānodayātmanā / saṅkalpaḥ kṣīyate siddhyai svayam evāsadātmakaḥ //MU_6,103.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19206: apratarkyasvarūpe hi nāsti kāraṇatā śive / kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ padārtho 'pi na vidyate //MU_6,103.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19207: padārthābhāvasaṃsiddhau vedanaṃ nopapadyate / kāraṇābhāvato nityam ahambhāvasya nodayaḥ //MU_6,103.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19208: ahambhāvānudayatas saṃsāraḥ kasya kīdṛśaḥ / saṃsārābhāvatas sarvaṃ param evāvaśiṣyate //MU_6,103.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19209: yac cedaṃ bhāsate tat sat param evātmani sthitam / paraṃ pare parāpūrṇaṃ samam eva vijṛmbhate //MU_6,103.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19210: tena nistimitaṃ sarvaṃ śailotkīrṇam ivācalam / viddhi raśmimayākāram iva brahma jagat sthitam //MU_6,103.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19211: purasaṅkalpake naṣṭe saṅkalpanagarasya yat / rūpaṃ tad viddhi jagataḥ khād acchaṃ sadasanmayam //MU_6,103.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19212: chāyāpuruṣavat spandi śāntaṃ nirmananaṃ jagat / jagacchabdārtharahitaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_6,103.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19213: rūpālokamanaskārā nīrasā gatabhāvanāḥ / samyagjñānavato yasya nirvāṇaṃ taṃ vidur budhāḥ //MU_6,103.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19214: yathāsti vāto nisspando yathāsti kham anīlima / yathā hemāsanniveśam asti brahmājagat tathā //MU_6,103.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19215: nīrasā asadābhāsā jagatpratyayakāriṇaḥ / rūpālokamanaskārās santīme brahmarūpiṇaḥ //MU_6,103.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19216: ūrmiśabdārtharahitaṃ yādṛg ambu bahūrmy api / sargaśabdārtharahitaṃ tādṛg brahmāpi sargavat //MU_6,103.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19217: sarga eva paraṃ brahma paraṃ brahmaiva sargadṛk / sargaśabdārtharahito vākyārthas tv eṣa śāśvataḥ //MU_6,103.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19218: brahmaśabdārthasampattau sargaśabdārthadhīḥ kutaḥ / sargaśabdārthasampattau brahmaśabdārthadhīḥ kutaḥ //MU_6,103.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19219: samastaśabdaśabdārthabhāvanābhāvanodaye / śuddhaṃ kim api cidvyoma brahmaśabdena kathyate //MU_6,103.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19220: samyagdarśanasaṃsiddhāv ubhayor apy avedane / yac chiṣṭam ajaraṃ śāntaṃ tato vāg vinivartate //MU_6,103.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19221: saṃśāntasarvātmakavedanaugham astīdam ekātmakam accharūpam / yathāsthitaṃ sarvajagat kharūpaṃ pāṣāṇarūpaṃ ca paraṃ jñarūpam //MU_6,103.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19224: śikhidhvajaḥ: evaṃ caitan mahābuddhe yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ param / tādṛśaṃ kāryam evedaṃ jagad ity eva vedmy aham //MU_6,104.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19225: kumbhaḥ: yatra kāraṇatā tatra kāryaṃ samupapadyate / yan na kāraṇam evādau tasmāt kāryaṃ kuto bhavet //MU_6,104.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19226: nehāsti kāraṇaṃ kiñcin na ca kāryaṃ kadācana / vidyamānam idaṃ sarvaṃ śivaṃ śāntam ajaṃ jagat //MU_6,104.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19227: jāyate kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yat tat kāraṇavad bhavet / yan na jāyata eveha tasmin sadṛśatā kutaḥ //MU_6,104.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19228: bījam eva na yasyāsti tat kathaṃ vada jāyate / apratarkyam anākhyaṃ ca yan na tasyeha bījatā //MU_6,104.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19229: deśakālavaśāt sarvā hetumatyaḥ pramopamāḥ / akartṛ brahma viṣayaḥ pramākāraṇayoḥ katham //MU_6,104.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19230: akartṛkarmakaraṇe nāsti kāraṇatā śive / tasmād akāraṇaṃ nāsti jagacchabdārthavedanam //MU_6,104.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19231: brahmaiva svaṃ svarūpaṃ sad yat sthitaṃ dhārayat tatam / asamyagdarśiviṣayaṃ tad eva jagad ācitam //MU_6,104.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19232: cinmātram ajaraṃ śāntaṃ yad ekaṃ tat pragīyate / tenaivājaṃ jagadbrahma sac chāntaṃ budhyate vapuḥ //MU_6,104.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19233: asya sva eva yo bhāvaś cetasaḥ pṛthivīpate / sa eva nāśaḥ kathitaś cānubhūtaś ca paṇḍitaiḥ //MU_6,104.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19234: cittaṃ nāśasvabhāvaṃ tvaṃ viddhi nāśātmakaṃ nṛpa / kṣaṇanāśāya saṅkalpaś cittaśabdena kathyate //MU_6,104.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19235: asaṅkalpanamātreṇa samyagjñānodayaṃ vinā / saṅkalpaḥ kṣīyate siddhyai svayam evāsadātmakaḥ //MU_6,104.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19236: nāmnaivāṅgīkṛtābhāvaṃ yad avidyeti kathyate / vidyamānaṃ kathaṃ tat syāc cittaṃ tāmarasekṣaṇa //MU_6,104.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19237: hastāv utkṣipya yo brūte śūdro 'smīti bhṛśaṃ girā / kathaṃ sa vipro bhavati vipratvaṃ tasya kīdṛśam //MU_6,104.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19238: vivṛttadhātur atyuccair mṛto 'smīti virauti yaḥ / mṛtam evāṅga taṃ viddhi jīvitaṃ tasya tu bhramaḥ //MU_6,104.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19240: tat kathaṃ kila nāma syāt satyaṃ bhramabharātmakam / ajñānabhrāntir evātaś cittam ity eva kathyate //MU_6,104.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19241: ajñānam ucyate cittam asat sad iva saṃsthitam / mithyābhramaṃ nirākāraṃ keśoṇḍukam ivāmbare //MU_6,104.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19242: evam ajñānam evaitac cittaśabdena kathyate / tannāśaś cetaso nāśaś cittatyāgas sa eva ca //MU_6,104.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19243: śikhidhvajaḥ: ajñānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ deva kathaṃ caitad vinaśyati / samāseneti bhagavan vada me vadatāṃ vara //MU_6,104.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19244: kumbhaḥ: yad asaṃvedanaṃ samyag vastuno rājasattama / dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasya kumbhādes tad ajñānam iti smṛtam //MU_6,104.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19245: asaṃvedanam ajñānaṃ jñānaṃ saṃvedanaṃ bhavet / ajñānasya tv asaṃvitter jñānāt saṃvedanāt kṣayaḥ //MU_6,104.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19246: jalajñānaṃ mudhābhrāntis sādho marumarīciṣu / naitaj jalam iti jñānāt saṃvittiḥ pravilīyate //MU_6,104.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19247: idaṃ cittam iti prauḍhaṃ yad ajñānam alaṃ hṛdi / nāsti cittam iti jñānāt tat samūlaṃ vinaśyati //MU_6,104.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19248: yathā rajjvāṃ bhujaṅgatvam ajñānabhramasambhavam / na sarpo 'yam iti jñānād dhṛdi rūḍhāt praṇaśyati //MU_6,104.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19249: cittaṃ mano 'ham ity antar yāvad ajñānasambhavaḥ / tāvac cittaṃ mano māyā bhavaty eva na saṃśayaḥ //MU_6,104.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19250: cittaṃ nāsty aham ity antar yāvaj jñānodayo bhavet / tāvac cittaṃ mano māyā nāsty evātra na saṃśayaḥ //MU_6,104.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19251: mithyāyakṣabhramo yāvat tāvad yakṣo hi dṛśyate / mithyāyakṣabhrame śānte kuto yakṣasya sambhavaḥ //MU_6,104.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19252: na cittam asti no caittam ahaṅkārādisaṃyutam / kiñcid eva jagaty asmin saṃvid ekāsti nirmalā //MU_6,104.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19253: tayā saṅkalpacittādi kṛtam āsīd vimūḍhayā / yad yat saṅkalpya tat sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ prabuddhayā //MU_6,104.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19254: saṅkalpena yad āyāti tat saṅkalpena gacchati / pavanena mahābāho jvālājālam ivānale //MU_6,104.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19255: ātmatattvaikaghanayā tat tayā brahmasattayā / jagat sarvam abhivyāptaṃ samudra iva vāriṇā //MU_6,104.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19256: nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti na tvaṃ naite na cittakam / nendriyāṇi na cākāśam ātmaivaiko 'sti nirmalaḥ //MU_6,104.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19257: ghaṭādyākārarūpeṇa sa evāyaṃ vilokyate / idaṃ cittam ayaṃ cāham iti keva kukalpanā //MU_6,104.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19258: na jāyate na mriyate kiñcid asmiñ jagattraye / kevalaṃ vilasaty ātmā sadasadbhāvanātmanā //MU_6,104.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19259: sarvam ātmā paraṃ brahma sakṛt prakaṭam ātatam / dvitvaikatve na vidyete nirbhrāntir bhava satyataḥ //MU_6,104.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19260: sarvendriyaguṇākāras sann evāsi sakhe nabhaḥ / na dahyase mahābuddhe na ca kvacana lipyase //MU_6,104.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19261: na te vinaśyati sakhe na ca kiñcid vivardhate / nirmalākāśarūpasya caikasyānantarūpiṇaḥ //MU_6,104.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19262: icchānicchātmike śaktī ye tavāpi tvam eva te / na hy aṃśuvyatirekeṇa śaśāṅka upalabhyate //MU_6,104.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19263: tvam ajaram aparaṃ parasvabhāvaṃ sakṛd amalaṃ satataṃ sad ekarūpam / vigalitakalanaṃ kalākhyalīlaṃ samuditam ādyam ajaṃ tad ātmatattvam //MU_6,104.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19266: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti kumbhavaco rājā bhāvayaṃs tad akṛtrimam / sva evātmapade tasmin kṣaṇaṃ pariṇato 'bhavat //MU_6,105.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19267: babhūvāmīlitamanolocanaś śāntavāg abhīḥ / śilātalād ivotkīrṇo nisspandāvayavākṛtiḥ //MU_6,105.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19268: tato muhūrtamātreṇa prabuddhaṃ sphāritekṣaṇam / tam uvāca mahābāho cūḍālā kumbharūpiṇī //MU_6,105.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19269: kumbhaḥ: kaccid asmin pade sphāre śuddhe mṛduni nirmale / sutalpe nirvikalpānāṃ sukhaṃ viśrāntavān asi //MU_6,105.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19270: kaccid antaḥ prabuddho 'si kaccid bhrāntis tvayojjhitā / kaccij jñeyaṃ parijñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam eva vā //MU_6,105.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19271: śikhidhvajaḥ: bhagavaṃs tvatprasādena mahāvibhavabhūṣitā / mahatī padavī dṛṣṭā sarvasyordhve sthitā mayā //MU_6,105.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19272: satāṃ viditavedyānām aho bata mahātmanām / apūrvaikāmṛtamayas saṅgas sāraphalapradaḥ //MU_6,105.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19273: janmanāpi mayā labdhaṃ yan nāma na mahāmṛtam / tad adya tvatsamāsaṅgāt kṣaṇenāsāditaṃ svayam //MU_6,105.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19274: anantam ādyam amṛtam etat kamalalocana / kathaṃ nāsāditam abhūd etad ātmapadaṃ mayā //MU_6,105.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19275: kumbhaḥ: manasy upaśamaṃ yāte tyaktabhogaiṣaṇe sthite / kaṣāyapāke nirvṛtte sarvendriyagaṇasya ca //MU_6,105.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19276: yānti cetasi viśrāntiṃ vimalā daiśikoktayaḥ / yathā sitāṃśuke śuddhe bindavaḥ kuṅkumāmbhasaḥ //MU_6,105.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19277: kaṣāyāṇām anantānāṃ sambhṛtānāṃ śarīrake / svavāsanāsvarūpāṇām adya pākas tavoditaḥ //MU_6,105.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19278: dehān malāni sarvāṇi kālena kamalekṣaṇa / sādho vṛkṣāt phalānīva pākena vigalanty adhaḥ //MU_6,105.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19279: vāsanātmasu yāteṣu maleṣu vilayaṃ sakhe / yad vakti gurur antas tad viśatīṣur yathā bile //MU_6,105.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19280: kaṣāyapāke sampanne tvaṃ mayādya vibodhitaḥ / tenādyaiva tavājñānakṣayo jāto mahāmate //MU_6,105.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19281: adya pakvakaṣāyas tvam adyaivājñānasaṅkṣayī / adyaiva sopadeśyas tvam adyaivāsi prabuddhavān //MU_6,105.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19282: śubhāśubhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇām adya saṅkṣayaḥ / satsaṅgavyapadeśena tava niṣpattim āgataḥ //MU_6,105.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19283: yāvad asya dinasyaiṣa pūrvo bhāgo mahīpate / tāvac ceto hy aham iti tavājñānaṃ babhūva ha //MU_6,105.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19284: idānīṃ madvacobodhāc cetasi kṣayam āgate / hṛdayāt samparityakte samprabuddho 'si bhūpate //MU_6,105.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19285: hṛdi yāvan manassattā tāvad ajñānasaṃsthitiḥ / citte cittatayā tyakte jñānasyābhyudayo bhavet //MU_6,105.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19286: dvitvaikatvadṛśau cittaṃ tad evājñānam ucyate / etayor yo layo dṛṣṭyos taj jñānaṃ sā parā gatiḥ //MU_6,105.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19287: prabuddho 'si vimukto 'si tyaktaṃ cittaṃ tvayā nṛpa / sad eva sattayāttaṃ hi tvayā tyaktam asat padam //MU_6,105.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19288: vītaśoko nirāyāso nissaṅgo nityam ātmavān / mahodayo munir maunī kharūpas tiṣṭha nirmalaḥ //MU_6,105.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19289: śikhidhvajaḥ: evaṃ hi bhagavañ jantor mūrkhasyaivāsti cittabhūḥ / na prabuddhasya tajjñasya cittam asti kila prabho //MU_6,105.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19290: jīvanmuktās ta ete hi viharanti kathaṃ vada / avidyamānamanaso yuṣmadādyās tathā narāḥ //MU_6,105.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19291: iti me kathayāśeṣam anyaiś ca vacanāṃśubhiḥ / hārdaṃ tamo me nipuṇam evamprāyaiḥ pramārjaya //MU_6,105.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19292: kumbhaḥ: yathā vadasi dharmajña tat tathaiva hi nānyathā / cittaṃ hi jīvanmuktānāṃ nāsty aṅkura ivāśmanām //MU_6,105.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19293: punarjananayogyā yā vāsanā ghanavāsanā / sā proktā cittaśabdena na sā tajjñasya vidyate //MU_6,105.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19294: yayā vāsanayā tajjñā viharantīha karmasu / tāṃ tvaṃ sattvābhidhāṃ viddhi punarjananavarjitām //MU_6,105.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19295: jīvanmuktā mahātmānas sattvasthās saṃyatendriyāḥ / viharanti gatāsaṅgaṃ na cittasthāḥ kadācana //MU_6,105.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19296: mūḍhaṃ cittaṃ cittam āhuḥ prabuddhaṃ sattvam ucyate / aprabuddhā hi cittasthās sattvasthā hi mahādhiyaḥ //MU_6,105.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19297: bhūyaḥ prajāyate cittaṃ sattvaṃ bhūyo na jāyate / aprabuddhasya bandho 'sti na prabuddhasya bhūpate //MU_6,105.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19298: sattvavān asi sañjāto mahātyāgī sthito bhavān / aśeṣeṇa tvayā tyaktaṃ cittam adyeti vedmy aham //MU_6,105.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19299: samastavāsanāmukto rājan rājeva rājase / ākāśasāmyam āyātaṃ manye tava mune manaḥ //MU_6,105.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19300: śamaṃ prāpto 'si paramaṃ śuddhas samasamasthitiḥ / mandarāhananonmukto yathā kṣīramahārṇavaḥ //MU_6,105.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19301: parityaktā tvayā rājyād vāsanā tapasas tathā / kānanāc ca śarīrāc ca śubhāśubhaphalād api //MU_6,105.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19302: nirīho vigatāsaṅgas tyaktacitto vivāsanaḥ / sampannas tvaṃ mahābāho mahātyāgipadaṃ gataḥ //MU_6,105.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19303: ayaṃ sa hi mahātyāgas sarvaṃ yatra samujjhitam / svargāpavargacittādi tapodānaphalādy api //MU_6,105.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19304: prabuddhayeddhayā sādho dhiyā paramabodhayā / tapo nāma kiyanmātraduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ bhavet //MU_6,105.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19305: kṣayātiśayanirmuktaṃ yat sukhaṃ samatāmayam / tat sat tad vastu tat kiñcin na tu svargādi bhaṅguram //MU_6,105.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19306: bhāvābhāvatulārūḍhas sthitādhivyādhivedhitaḥ / svargo nāma kimānandas so 'pi sandeham āsthitaḥ //MU_6,105.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19307: aprāptasvārthasaṃsiddheḥ kriyākāṇḍaś śubho bhavet / yena nāsāditaṃ hema rītiṃ kiṃ sa parityajet //MU_6,105.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19308: cūḍālādisamāsaṅgād bhavej jñatvaṃ sukhena te / tat kimartham anarthe 'smin nimagnas tvaṃ tapomaye //MU_6,105.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19309: āśramādivikalpāṃśasādhyasyāsya kukarmaṇaḥ / ādyantau paśya sumate madhya eva ramasva mā //MU_6,105.44//
GSP27moksop_u:19310: yata ete samāyātā yasmin pariṇamanti ca / taporūpā vikalpāṃśās tatra baddhapado bhava //MU_6,105.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19311: cidvyomno nabhaso 'py acchāt sarve bhāvās samutthitāḥ / tatraiva ca layaṃ yānti tatraivāssva ramasva ca //MU_6,105.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19312: idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti saṅkalpā brahmabindavaḥ / bindūñ śikhidhvaja tyaktvā pūrṇameghaṃ samāśraya //MU_6,105.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19313: iṣṭaṃ me prārthayasveti yathaiva prārthyate sakhī / striyā tathaiva na kathaṃ dayitaḥ prārthyate svayam //MU_6,105.48//
GSP27moksop_u:19314: saṅkalparacitān etān bhāvān āpātabhāsurān / na gṛhṇanti mahātmānaḥ prājñā jalaravīn iva //MU_6,105.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19315: svargamokṣādiphaladaṃ yat kiñcit samam eva tat / tyaktvā samasamābhāso yo 'sy asāv eva vai bhava //MU_6,105.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19316: santaṃ sattvena nāśena naśyantaṃ vigataspṛhaḥ / padārthaugham imaṃ gṛhṇaṃs tiṣṭhāspanditacittabhūḥ //MU_6,105.51//
GSP27moksop_u:19317: aparispandacittasya saṃsṛtir neha bādhate / pauruṣaprabhavā sādho vipan nītimato yathā //MU_6,105.52//
GSP27moksop_u:19318: yāni yānīha duḥkhāni prasphuranti jagattraye / cetaścāpalajāny eva tāni tāni mahīpate //MU_6,105.53//
GSP27moksop_u:19319: sthiraṃ śāntaṃ gataspandaṃ yasya cittam acāpalam / sa vibhus sa mahānandī sāmrājyasya sa bhājanam //MU_6,105.54//
GSP27moksop_u:19320: atha cetasi tattvajña spandāspandau tad ekatām / nītvā tiṣṭha yathākāmam aikyam āgatya śāśvatam //MU_6,105.55//
GSP27moksop_u:19321: śikhidhvajaḥ: katham aikyavidhiṃ yātas spandāspandāv imau vibho / sarvasaṃśayavicchedakārinn etad vadāśu me //MU_6,105.56//
GSP27moksop_u:19322: kumbhaḥ: ekaṃ vastu jagat sarvaṃ cinmātraṃ vār ivāmbudhiḥ / tad eva spandate no vā śuddhaṃ vārīva vīcibhiḥ //MU_6,105.57//
GSP27moksop_u:19323: brahma cinmātram amalaṃ satyam ityādināmabhiḥ / yad gītaṃ tad idaṃ mūḍhaḥ paśyaty aṅga jagattayā //MU_6,105.58//
GSP27moksop_u:19324: nisspanda eva sarvasmin sarge tasmād dhi saṃsṛtiḥ / parispando hi vīcyādis tad aspandaṃ samaṃ param //MU_6,105.59//
GSP27moksop_u:19325: citas sa eva cet spandas tathāspandaś ca bhāvitaḥ / ekarūpatayā nāma tat tad apy acalaṃ śivam //MU_6,105.60//
GSP27moksop_u:19326: sargaś citspandamātrātmā samyagdṛṣṭo vilīyate / udety asamyagdṛṣṭātmā rajjvāṃ sarpabhramo yathā //MU_6,105.61//
GSP27moksop_u:19327: saspandā cic cidabhidhā nisspandā tv iyam ātatā / turyātītapadārūḍhā vācā vaktuṃ na pāryate //MU_6,105.62//
GSP27moksop_u:19329: etat kevalam ābhātaṃ svānubhūtigirātatam / kathyate svānubhūtes tu svayaṃ svaṃ rūpam ātmanā //MU_6,105.64//
GSP27moksop_u:19330: prāpto 'si bhāvaṃ svam anādimadhyam atraiva tiṣṭheṣṭapade niviṣṭaḥ / nīrūpanirbhedamahācidātmā jāto 'si sādho khalu vītaśokaḥ //MU_6,105.65//
GSP27moksop_u:19333: kumbhaḥ: iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ śikhidhvaja mahīpate / yathedam utthitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā ca pravilīyate //MU_6,106.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19334: etac chrutvā ca buddhvā ca matvā ca munināyaka / yathecchasi tathā tiṣṭha dṛṣṭaspaṣṭapadaḥ pade //MU_6,106.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19335: svargaṃ gacchāmy ahaṃ tatra kāle 'smin nārado muniḥ / brahmalokāt samāyāto bhavaty amarasaṃsadam //MU_6,106.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19336: na māṃ paśyati cet tatra tat kopam upagacchati / nodvejanīyā bhavyena guravo hi kadācana //MU_6,106.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19337: tyaktasaṅkalpalekhena na kiñcid abhivāñchatā / tvayātmany eva vastavyaṃ dṛṣṭir eṣaiva pāvanī //MU_6,106.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19338: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti yāvat prativacaḥ puṣpahastaś śikhidhvajaḥ / praṇāmāya dadāty eṣa tāvad antardhim āyayau //MU_6,106.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19339: pratibhāsagataṃ vastu yathaivāgre na dṛśyate / na dṛṣṭavāṃs tathā kumbham agre rājā śikhidhvajaḥ //MU_6,106.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19340: gate kumbhe mahīpālaḥ paraṃ vismayam āyayau / tad eva cintayaṃś citraṃ citrārpita ivābhavat //MU_6,106.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19341: iti sañcintayām āsa citraṃ vilasitaṃ vidheḥ / yat kumbhavyapadeśena bodhito 'smi cirād ayam //MU_6,106.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19342: kva nāradasutaḥ kumbhaḥ kvāhaṃ nāma śikhidhvajaḥ / kevalaṃ kālayuktyaivam ahaṃ sampratibodhitaḥ //MU_6,106.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19343: aho nu samyak kathitaṃ devaputreṇa yuktimat / aho nu samprabuddho 'smi mohanidrākulaś cirāt //MU_6,106.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19344: kvāham āsaṃ vinirmagnaḥ kriyājālakukardame / idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti mithyāvibhramam ācaran //MU_6,106.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19345: aho nu śītalā śuddhā śānteyaṃ padavī nijā / rasāyanadravākārā sattvaṃ śītayatīva me //MU_6,106.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19346: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam / cinmātram api necchāmi saṃsthito 'smi yathāsthitam //MU_6,106.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19347: evaṃ sañcintayan rājā evaṃnirvāsanāśayaḥ / śailād iva samutkīrṇo maunam evātha tasthivān //MU_6,106.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19348: tasminn eva tato maunī nissaṅkalpe nirāmaye / pratiṣṭhāṃ niścalāṃ prāpya sa tasthau giriśṛṅgavat //MU_6,106.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19349: sa tatra saṃśāntabhayo mahātmā cireṇa viśrāntim itas samātmā / cireṇa samprāptanijāmalātmā yogena suṣvāpa tadā cidātmā //MU_6,106.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19352: vasiṣṭhaḥ: nirvikalpasamādhānāt kāṣṭhakuḍyopamas sthitaḥ / evaṃ śikhidhvajo rāma cūḍālām adhunā śṛṇu //MU_6,107.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19353: śikhidhvajaṃ taṃ bhartāraṃ kumbhaveṣena tena sā / prabodhyāntardhim āgatya tatāra tarasā nabhaḥ //MU_6,107.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19354: devaputrākṛtiṃ vyomni jahau māyāvinirmitām / vidagdhamugdham ākāraṃ straiṇaṃ jagrāha sundaram //MU_6,107.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19355: nabhasā svapuraṃ prāpya viveśāntaḥpuraṃ kṣaṇāt / dṛśyā babhūva lokasya nṛpakarma cakāra sā //MU_6,107.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19356: vāsaratritayenāpi punar ambaram etya sā / babhūva kumbho yogena śikhidhvajavanaṃ yayau //MU_6,107.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19357: tathā tatraiva taṃ bhūpam apaśyad vanabhūmigā / nirvikalpasamādhisthaṃ samutkīrṇam iva drumāt //MU_6,107.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19358: aho nu khalu bho diṣṭyā viśrānto 'yam ihātmani / sthitas svasthas samaś śānta ity uvāca puraḥ prabhoḥ //MU_6,107.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19359: tad enaṃ tāvad etasmād bodhayāmi parāt padāt / idānīm eva kiṃ dehatyāgam eṣa karoti vai //MU_6,107.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19360: kañcit kālaṃ sphuritveha rājyena vipinena vā / samam eva gamiṣyāvas tyaktadehāv imau śamam //MU_6,107.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19361: tad yāvad eṣo vicalaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati / anenābhyāsayogena tāvad ābodhayāmy aham //MU_6,107.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19362: iti sañcintya cūḍālā siṃhanādaṃ cakāra sā / bhūyo bhūyaḥ prabhor agre vanecarabhayapradam //MU_6,107.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19363: na cacāla śilevādrau yadā nādena tena saḥ / bhūyo bhūyaḥ kṛtenāpi tadā sā taṃ vyacālayat //MU_6,107.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19364: cālitaḥ pātito 'py eṣa yadā na bubudhe nṛpaḥ / tadā sañcintayām āsa cūḍālā kumbharūpiṇī //MU_6,107.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19365: aho pariṇatas sādhus svapade bhagavān ayam / tad enaṃ hi kayā yuktyā sāmprataṃ bodhayāmy aham //MU_6,107.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19366: atha vainaṃ mahātmānaṃ kimarthaṃ bodhayāmy aham / videhaṃ bodham āsādya tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsukham //MU_6,107.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19367: aham apy aṅganādeham imaṃ tyaktvā paraṃ padam / apunarjananāyaiva gacchāmīha hi kiṃ mama //MU_6,107.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19368: iti sañcintya dehaṃ svaṃ tyaktum abhyudyatā satī / punas sañcintayām āsa cūḍālā sā mahāsatī //MU_6,107.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19369: ālokayāmi vai tāvad enaṃ dehaṃ mahīpateḥ / yady asya sattvaśeṣo 'sti bodhabījaṃ hṛdantare //MU_6,107.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19370: tat kālenaiṣa bhagavān samprabodham upaiṣyati / mūlakośarasālīnaṃ puṣpajālaṃ madhāv iva //MU_6,107.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19371: tadeha viharañ jīvanmukta eko bhavaty ayam / maiko bhavatv eṣa iti manye gacchāmi no śamam //MU_6,107.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19372: iti sañcintya cūḍālā sparśena nayanena ca / patim ālokya sāśaṅkam uvāca varavarṇinī //MU_6,107.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19373: asty eva sattvaśeṣo 'sya hṛdi sambodhakāraṇam / kāyo 'yam agaladrūpo nemaṃ dehaṃ tyajāmy aham //MU_6,107.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19374: rāmaḥ: bhṛśaṃ saṃśāntacittasya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamasthiteḥ / sattvaśeṣaḥ kathaṃ brahmañ jñāyate dhyānaśālinaḥ //MU_6,107.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19375: vasiṣṭhaḥ: prabodhakāraṇaṃ yasya durlakṣyāṇuvapur hṛdi / vidyate sattvaśeṣo 'ntar bīje puṣpaphalaṃ yathā //MU_6,107.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19377: kāyas samasamābhogo na glāyati na hṛṣyati / nāstam eti na codeti samam evāvatiṣṭhate //MU_6,107.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19378: dvitvaikatvādiyuktasya yasya praspandate manaḥ / tasya deho 'nyatām eti nāspandasya kadācana //MU_6,107.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19379: cittaspando hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇaṃ jagatas sthiteḥ / rāma bhāvavikārāṇāṃ kusumānāṃ yathā madhuḥ //MU_6,107.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19380: yasmin praspandate dehe cittaṃ sa hi muhur muhuḥ / harṣaglapanasammohavaśam eti raghūdvaha //MU_6,107.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19381: citte praśamam āyāte kāyo yas sattvavān sthitaḥ / bādhate nāmbarasyeva tasya bhāvavikārabhūḥ //MU_6,107.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19382: vīcyādi na yathodeti samāyā jalasantateḥ / tathā na dṛśyate doṣas samāyās sattvasaṃsthiteḥ //MU_6,107.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19383: sattvasyānupalambho 'sti nānyas svopaśamād ṛte / yāvad bhāvi samaṃ sattvaṃ kālāc chāmyati kevalam //MU_6,107.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19384: dehe yasmiṃs tu no cittaṃ nāpi sattvaṃ ca vidyate / sa tāpahimavad rāma pañcatvena vilīyate //MU_6,107.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19385: śikhidhvajasya deho 'sau niścitaṃ cetasojjhitaḥ / sattvāṃśena ca saṃyuktas tena na mlānibhājanam //MU_6,107.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19386: taṃ tathābhūtam ālokya bhartur dehaṃ varāṅganā / anujjhitavatī dehaṃ cintayām āsa satvaram //MU_6,107.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19387: cittattvaṃ sarvagaṃ śuddhaṃ praviśyābodhayāmy aham / bhaviṣyadbodhanaṃ kāntam eṣa tatra hi saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,107.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19388: na bodhayāmi yady enaṃ cirāt tad budhyate svayam / kim ihaikāvatiṣṭhe 'ham ity enaṃ bodhayāmy aham //MU_6,107.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19389: iti sañcintya cūḍālā dehaṃ kāraṇapañjaram / santyajya prāpa cittattve sthitim ādyantavarjite //MU_6,107.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19390: tatra sā cetanaspandaṃ kṛtvā sattvavataḥ prabhoḥ / svaṃ viveśa punar dehaṃ khān nīḍam iva pakṣiṇī //MU_6,107.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19391: kumbhākṛtir athotthāya niviṣṭā kusumasthale / sāma gātuṃ pravṛttā sā bhramarīvṛndasasvanā //MU_6,107.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19392: taṃ sāmasvanam ākarṇya cit sattvaguṇaśālinaḥ / bubudhe bhūpater dehe vasanta iva padminī //MU_6,107.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19393: dṛśaṃ vikāsayām āsa tāṃ tadārka ivābjinīm / gṛhītasattvasampattiś śikhidhvajamahīpatiḥ //MU_6,107.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19394: apaśyat kumbham agrasthaṃ sāmagāyanatatparam / pareṇa vapuṣā yuktaṃ sāmavedam ivāparam //MU_6,107.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19395: aho bata vayaṃ dhanyāḥ punaḥ prāpto munes sutaḥ / ity evodāharan rājā kumbhāya kusumaṃ dadau //MU_6,107.44//
GSP27moksop_u:19396: diṣṭyā sthitās smo bhagavaṃs tava cetasi pāvane / ke nāma na mahāsattvāḥ prasādeṣv aṅga hi sthirāḥ //MU_6,107.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19397: asmatpavitrīkaraṇam ekam āgamakāraṇam / tava pāpāpahaṃ brūhi dvitīyaṃ katarad bhavet //MU_6,107.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19398: kumbhaḥ: yataḥ prabhṛti yāto 'smi tvatsakāśād arindama / tataḥ prabhṛti ceto me tvayaiveha samaṃ sthitam //MU_6,107.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19399: na rame svargaraṅgeṣu devodyāneṣu cānagha / merumandarakūṭeṣu kailāsakuhareṣu ca //MU_6,107.48//
GSP27moksop_u:19400: tvatsaṅgam eva vāñchāmi subhagācārapeśalam / amṛtasyandasaṅkāśaṃ madhumāsam iva drumaḥ //MU_6,107.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19401: tasmād eveha tiṣṭhāmi samīpe tava sāmpratam / abhīṣṭaṃ yad yad evāṅga ramyāṇāṃ dhuri tat sthitam //MU_6,107.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19402: tvādṛśo bandhur āptaś ca suhṛn mitraṃ sakhā tathā / viśvāsyaś caiva śiṣyaś ca manye jagati nāsti me //MU_6,107.51//
GSP27moksop_u:19403: śikhidhvajaḥ: aho nu phalitaṃ puṇyapādapair naḥ kulācale / yad bhavān apy asaṅgo 'pi vāñchaty asmatsamāgamam //MU_6,107.52//
GSP27moksop_u:19404: idaṃ vanam ime vṛkṣā bhṛtyo 'yam aham ādṛtaḥ / rocate cen na te svargas tad iha sthīyatāṃ prabho //MU_6,107.53//
GSP27moksop_u:19405: bhavadvitīrṇayā yogayuktyā viśrāntavān aham / yathā sādho tathā manye svarge viśramaṇaṃ kutaḥ //MU_6,107.54//
GSP27moksop_u:19406: tām eva svasthitiṃ svacchām avalambya prakāśinīm / vihareha yathākāmaṃ svarge bhūmitale 'tha vā //MU_6,107.55//
GSP27moksop_u:19407: kumbhaḥ: pare pade mahānande kaccid viśrāntavān asi / idaṃ bhedamayaṃ duḥkhaṃ kaccit santyaktavān asi //MU_6,107.56//
GSP27moksop_u:19408: kaccid āpātaramyebhyas saṅkalpebhyo ratir bhṛśam / nirmūlatāṃ gatā rājann oghatīralateva te //MU_6,107.57//
GSP27moksop_u:19409: heyādeyadaśātītaṃ śāntaṃ samasamasthiti / yathāprāpteṣv anudvegi kaccit tava manas sthitam //MU_6,107.58//
GSP27moksop_u:19410: śikhidhvajaḥ: tvatprasādena bhagavan dṛṣṭā dṛśyātigā gatiḥ / prāptas saṃsārasīmānto labdho labdhavyaniścayaḥ //MU_6,107.59//
