GSP27moksop_u:19411: cirāyāticireṇaiva viśrāntās smo nirāmayāḥ / labdhaṃ labdhavyam akhilaṃ tṛptās smaś ciram akṣatāḥ //MU_6,107.60//
GSP27moksop_u:19412: nopadeṣṭavyam asmākaṃ kiñcid apy upayujyate / sarvatraivātitṛptās smas saṃsthitās smo gatajvaram //MU_6,107.61//
GSP27moksop_u:19413: jñātam ajñātam aprāptaṃ samprāptaṃ tyaktam āśritam / tvattvaṃ paratvaṃ mattvaṃ me khasyevāsti na kiñcana //MU_6,107.62//
GSP27moksop_u:19414: nissaṃsṛtir vigatamohabhayābhirāmo nityoditas samasamāśayasarvasomyaḥ / sarvātmakas sakalasaṅkalanāvimukta ākāśakośaviśadaś śamam āsthito 'smi //MU_6,107.63//
GSP27moksop_u:19417: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity adhyātmavicitrābhiḥ kathābhis tau parasparam / āsatāṃ vedyavettārau muhūrtatritayaṃ vane //MU_6,108.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19418: tata utthāya kasmiṃścit snātau sarasasārase / sarovare vane caiva vihṛtau nandanopame //MU_6,108.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19419: tenācāreṇa tābhiś ca kathābhis tau vanecarau / nītavantau dināny aṣṭau tāsu kānanavīthiṣu //MU_6,108.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19420: atha kumbha uvācānyad vanaṃ yāvo girāv iti / tad om iti nṛpo matvā tāv ubhau praviceratuḥ //MU_6,108.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19421: vanāny anekarūpāṇi jaṅgalāni taṭāni ca / sarāṃsi gulmajālāni śṛṅgāṇi gahanāni ca //MU_6,108.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19422: nadīr deśāṃs tathā grāmān nagarāṇi purāṇi ca / marūn ghorān girīn kuñjāṃs tīrthāny āyatanāni ca //MU_6,108.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19423: samam eva samasnehau samaveṣau sthitāv ubhau / samasattau samotsāhau sasnatus tasthatus tathā //MU_6,108.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19424: ānarcatuḥ pitṝn devān bubhujāte ca rāghava / samaṃ talpe ca śiśyāte samabuddhī babhūvatuḥ //MU_6,108.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19425: tamālavanaṣaṇḍeṣu mandāragahaneṣu ca / dampatī snigdhahṛdayau suhṛdau tau virejatuḥ //MU_6,108.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19426: idaṃ grāhyam idaṃ neti vikalpakalanā manaḥ / na jahāra tayo rāma vātyeva vibudhācalam //MU_6,108.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19427: viceratus tau suhṛdau kvacid dhūlividhūsarau / kvacic candanadigdhāṅgau kvacid bhasmānurañjitau //MU_6,108.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19428: kvacid divyāmbaradharau cīrāmbaradharau kvacit / kvacit pallavasañchannau kvacit kusumamaṇḍitau //MU_6,108.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19429: dinaiḥ katipayair eva gatacittatayā tayā / sattvodāttatayā caiva rājā kumbhavad ābabhau //MU_6,108.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19430: atha taṃ suragarbhābhaṃ cūḍālā sā śikhidhvajam / dṛṣṭvā śobhām upagataṃ cintayām āsa māninī //MU_6,108.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19431: ayaṃ patir anindyātmā tathemā vanabhūmayaḥ / iyaṃ sthitir anāyāsā yo na kāmī sa vañcitaḥ //MU_6,108.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19432: jīvanmuktadhiyāṃ bhoge yathāprāptam atiṣṭhatām / ekagrahātmikā tucchā mūḍhataivoditā bhavet //MU_6,108.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19433: nijaḥ patir anindyātmā nirādhitvaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ / gṛhāṇi puṣpajālāni sā hatā yā na kāminī //MU_6,108.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19434: vanapuṣpalatāgehe svāyatte bhartari priye / ramate yā na nirduḥkhā sā hataiva duraṅganā //MU_6,108.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19435: vaśyaṃ vivāhitaṃ kāntaṃ patim āsādya nirjane / strī satī yā na ramate tāṃ dhig astu duraṅganām //MU_6,108.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19436: samujjhatā yathāprāptam api vedyavidā satā / anindyaṃ svam udārārthaṃ kiṃ tajjñena kṛtaṃ bhavet //MU_6,108.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19437: tat kañcid racayāmy āśu prapañcaṃ prajñayā navam / yenāyaṃ bhūpatir bhartā ramate mayi mānadaḥ //MU_6,108.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19438: iti sañcintya cūḍālā kumbhaveṣadharā patim / prāha kānanagulmasthā kokilaṃ kokilā yathā //MU_6,108.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19439: kumbhaḥ: caitramāsasya śukle 'yaṃ pratipaddivasas suhṛt / adyāsthānaṃ mahārambhaṃ svarge bhavati vai hareḥ //MU_6,108.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19440: sannidhānaṃ mayā tatra kartavyaṃ pitur agrataḥ / yathāsthitā hi niyatir na santyājyā kadācana //MU_6,108.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19441: pratipālayitavyaṃ me tvayehādya vanāvanau / krīḍatā dhyānapuṣpābhyāṃ samudvegam agacchatā //MU_6,108.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19442: āgacchāmi dinānte 'dya nirvikalpaṃ nabhastalāt / svargād atitarām eva tvatsaṅgo mama tuṣṭaye //MU_6,108.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19443: ity uktvā mañjarīṃ kumbho dadau mitrāya kausumīm / prītaye svām iva prītiṃ kāntāṃ nandanavṛkṣajām //MU_6,108.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19444: āgantavyaṃ tvayā śīghram evaṃ vadati bhūpatau / pupluve ca vanād vyoma śaranmugdhapayodavat //MU_6,108.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19445: puṣpajālaṃ jahau vyoma vrajan kusumadāmajam / visāri vanavātena himaṃ haima ivāmbudaḥ //MU_6,108.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19446: śikhidhvajo vrajantaṃ taṃ dadarśādarśanaṃ gatam / unnidro 'bdaṃ yathā barhī satprītir hi sudustyajā //MU_6,108.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19447: śikhidhvajadṛśām ante vyomni kumbhavapur jahau / sānāvarteva vāriśrīr mugdhā svaṃ rūpam āyayau //MU_6,108.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19448: prāpa mañjaritākārakalpavṛkṣopamaṃ puram / sphuratpatākam ātmīyaṃ svargaramyaṃ divaḥ pathā //MU_6,108.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19449: antaḥpuram adṛśyaiva viveśa lalanākulam / madhumāsamahālakṣmīr lasallatam iva drumam //MU_6,108.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19450: rājakāryāṇy aśeṣāṇi tatra sampādya satvaram / śikhidhvajavanaṃ gantuṃ punar āpupluve nabhaḥ //MU_6,108.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19451: ullaṅghya gaganādhvānaṃ samaṃ dinakarāṃśubhiḥ / śikhidhvajavanaṃ śaile dadarśa gagane sthitā //MU_6,108.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19452: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kumbharūpaṃ tat punar jagrāha satvaram / śikhidhvajasya purataḥ papāta ca khapuṣpavat //MU_6,108.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19453: tatra mlānadyuti mukhaṃ cakārākhinnamānasam / induṃ sanīhāram iva yāmā khinnam ivāmbujam //MU_6,108.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19454: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛgākāraṃ samuttasthau śikhidhvajaḥ / babhūva khinnacetāś ca samuvācedam ādṛtaḥ //MU_6,108.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19455: devaputra namas te 'stu vimanā iva lakṣyase / kumbhas tvaṃ tyaja saṃrambham idam āsanam āsyatām //MU_6,108.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19456: santo viditavedyā ye te hi harṣaviṣādajām / nāśrayanti sthitiṃ svasthāḥ padmā iva jalārdratām //MU_6,108.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19457: tena smopaviśety ukte kumbha āhāsane viśan / girā viṣaṇṇayā śīrṇavaṃśasvanasamānayā //MU_6,108.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19458: yāvaddeham avasthāsu samacittatayaiva ye / karmendriyair na tiṣṭhanti na te tattvadhiyaś śaṭhāḥ //MU_6,108.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19459: ye hy atattvavido mūḍhā rājan bālatayaiva te / avasthābhyaḥ palāyante gṛhītābhyas svabhāvataḥ //MU_6,108.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19460: yāvattilaṃ yathā tailaṃ yāvaddehaṃ daśā tathā / yo na dehadaśām eti sa cchinatty asināmbaram //MU_6,108.44//
GSP27moksop_u:19461: eṣa dehadaśāduḥkhaparihāro hy anuttamaḥ / yat sāmyaṃ cetaso yogān na tu karmendriyasthiteḥ //MU_6,108.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19462: yāvaddehaṃ yathācāraṃ daśāsv aṅga vijānatā / karmendriyair hi sthātavyaṃ na tu buddhīndriyaiḥ kvacit //MU_6,108.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19463: parameṣṭhiprabhṛtayas sarva evoditāśayāḥ / dehāvasthāsu tiṣṭhanti niyater eṣa niścayaḥ //MU_6,108.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19464: ajñatattvajñabhūtādi dṛśyajātam idaṃ hi yat / tat sarvam eva niyatiṃ dhāvaty ambu yathāmbudhim //MU_6,108.48//
GSP27moksop_u:19465: tajjñā buddhyādisāmyena pāṇyādicalanena ca / niyatiṃ yāpayantīmāṃ yāvaddeham akhaṇḍitāḥ //MU_6,108.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19466: ajñās tu sarvakṣobheṇa sukhaduḥkhadaśāhatāḥ / niyatiṃ yāpayanty aṅga dehalakṣair vikhaṇḍitāḥ //MU_6,108.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19467: itthaṃ sukheṣu nanu duḥkhadaśāsu cetthaṃ sthātavyam ity adhigataṃ yad ihāṅga jīvaiḥ / tajjñājñabhūtanicayas sphuritas tad eva durlaṅghya eṣa niyato niyater vilāsaḥ //MU_6,108.51//
GSP27moksop_u:19470: śikhidhvajaḥ: evaṃ sthite mahābhāga katham udvegam īdṛśam / labdhavān asi devo 'pi svargād api sukhāspadāt //MU_6,109.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19471: kumbhaḥ: śṛṇu kāryam idaṃ citraṃ madīyaṃ vasudhādhipa / kathayāmi tavāśeṣaṃ svarge yad vṛttam adya me //MU_6,109.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19472: suhṛdy āveditaṃ duḥkhaṃ param āyāti tānavam / ghanaṃ jaḍaṃ kṛṣṇam api muktavṛṣṭir ivāmbudaḥ //MU_6,109.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19473: suhṛdā pṛcchatā sādhu ceto yāti prasannatām / snihyatopagatenāśu katakena jalaṃ yathā //MU_6,109.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19474: ahaṃ tāvad ito yāto bhavate puṣpamañjarīm / dattvā gaganam ullaṅghya samprāptaś ca triviṣṭapam //MU_6,109.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19475: tatra pitrā sahendrasya sabhāsthāne yathākramam / sthitvotthāya tathotthānakāle pitrā visarjitaḥ //MU_6,109.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19476: ihāgantum ahaṃ svargaṃ tyaktvā samprāptavān nabhaḥ / divākarahayais sārdhaṃ vahāmy anilavartmani //MU_6,109.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19477: athaikatra gato bhānur ekenānyena vartmanā / āgacchāmy aham ākāśasāgarāt patitākṛtiḥ //MU_6,109.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19478: athāgre vāripūrṇānāṃ meghānāṃ madhyavartmanā / apaśyaṃ munim āyāntam ahaṃ durvāsasaṃ javāt //MU_6,109.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19480: sthitaṃ sumeghacchāyāyāṃ śyāmāyāṃ vasudhātale / vegenābhisarantaṃ taṃ tapolakṣmīm iva priyām //MU_6,109.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19481: tasya kṛtvā namaskāram uktaṃ ca vahatā mayā / mune nīlābdavastras tvam abhisārikayā samaḥ //MU_6,109.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19482: ity ākarṇya cukopāsau mayi mānada mānahā / visphārya rakte nayane prāha gambhīranissvanam //MU_6,109.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19483: pautro 'smi padmajasyeti garvitas tvaṃ kim īdṛśaḥ / bhavyā hi natim āyānti guṇair vṛkṣāḥ phalair iva //MU_6,109.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19484: veśyābhisārikārūpo bhavān ity aśubhaṃ vacaḥ / mayi vakṣi durācāra mūḍha devakumāraka //MU_6,109.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19485: stanakeśavatī kāntā hāvabhāvavikāriṇī / gacchānena duruktena rātrau veśyā bhaviṣyasi //MU_6,109.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19486: iti śrutvāśubhaṃ vākyam ujjhitaṃ jarjaradvijāt / vimṛṣyāmi manāg yāvat tāvad antarhito muniḥ //MU_6,109.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19487: ity udvignamanās sādho samprāpto 'smi nabhastalāt / etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ sampanno 'smi niśāṅganā //MU_6,109.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19488: ativāhyaṃ dinānteṣu strītvam etan mayā katham / yonistanavatā rātrau vaktavyaṃ kiṃ mayā pituḥ //MU_6,109.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19489: saṃsṛtau bhavitavyānām aho nu viṣamā gatiḥ / aham apy anyavad daivād yūnām āmiṣatāṃ gataḥ //MU_6,109.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19490: kaṣṭaṃ madapahāreṇa kalaho jāyate 'dhunā / divi devakumārāṇāṃ kāmākuladhiyām iha //MU_6,109.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19491: gurudevadvijātīnāṃ lajjāparavaśātmanā / katham agre mayā samyak sthātavyaṃ yāminīstriyā //MU_6,109.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19492: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvā kṣaṇam ekaṃ sa tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā munes sutaḥ / dhairyam ālambya kumbho 'tra punar āha raghūdvaha //MU_6,109.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19493: kim ajña iva śocāmi kiṃ mama kṣatam ātmanaḥ / yathāgatam ayaṃ deho matto 'nyo 'nubhaviṣyati //MU_6,109.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19494: śikhidhvajaḥ: paridevanayā ko 'rtho devaputra tavaitayā / yad āyāti tad āyātu dehasyātmā na lipyate //MU_6,109.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19495: kānicid yāni duḥkhāni sukhāni vihitāni vā / tāni sarvāṇi dehasya dehino na tu kānicit //MU_6,109.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19496: yadi tvam api kāryāṇām akhedārho 'pi khidyasi / tad anyeṣām upāyas syāt ka ivāgamabhūṣaṇa //MU_6,109.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19497: khede 'khedocitaṃ vācyam iti kiṃ ca tvam uktavān / idānīṃ samatām etya tiṣṭhākhinno yathāsthitaḥ //MU_6,109.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19498: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tāv evamādibhir vākyair anyo'nyāśvāsanaṃ svayam / kṛtvā sthitau vane snigdhau suhṛdau khedinau mithaḥ //MU_6,109.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19499: athārkas tasya kumbhasya strītvam utpādayann iva / jagāmāstaṃ jagaddīpo dīpas snehakṣayād iva //MU_6,109.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19500: vyavahārabharais sārdhaṃ padmās saṅkocam āyayuḥ / mārgāś ca pathikais sārdhaṃ pānthastrīhṛdayāni ca //MU_6,109.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19501: dāśavad vihagān sarvān kurvad ekatra puñjitān / tārakāratnajālāḍhyaṃ bhuvanaṃ śyāmatāṃ yayau //MU_6,109.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19502: khaṃ hasann iva tārāḍhyaṃ vikāsaṃ kumudākaraḥ / yayāv unnādacakrāhvaṃ bhramadbhramarapeṭakaḥ //MU_6,109.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19503: suhṛdau tāv athotthāya sandhyām udyanniśākarām / vandayitvā tathā kṛtvā japyaṃ gulmāntare sthitau //MU_6,109.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19504: tataḥ kumbhaś śanais tatra straiṇam abhyāharan vapuḥ / śikhidhvajaṃ purassaṃsthaṃ provāca galadakṣaram //MU_6,109.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19505: patāmīva sphurāmīva dravāmīvāṅgayaṣṭibhiḥ / lajjayeva ca he rājan manye strītvaṃ vrajāmy aham //MU_6,109.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19506: paśyeme parivardhante rājan mama śiroruhāḥ / prasphurattārakāmālā dinānte timirā iva //MU_6,109.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19507: paśyemau mama jāyete pronmukhāv urasi stanau / korakāv iva padminyā vasante gaganonmukhau //MU_6,109.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19508: āgulpham eva lambāni sampadyante 'mbarāṇi me / dehād eva sakhe paśya striyā iva śanaiś śanaiḥ //MU_6,109.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19509: bhūṣaṇāny ururatnāni mālyāni vividhāni ca / paśyemāny aṅga jāyante svāṅgebhyo vṛkṣapuṣpavat //MU_6,109.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19510: paśyāyaṃ svayam evodyaccandrāṃśubharasundaraḥ / mūrdhni paṭṭāṃśuko jāto nīhāro 'drāv ivāṅga me //MU_6,109.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19511: sarvāṇi kāntāliṅgāni jātāni mama mānada / hā dhik kaṣṭaṃ viṣādo me kiṃ karomy aṅganāsmy aham //MU_6,109.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19512: hā dhik kaṣṭam aho sādho sthita evāham aṅganā / saṃvidānubhavāmy antar nitambaṃ jaghanānvitam //MU_6,109.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19513: vipine kumbha ity uktvā tūṣṇīṃ khinno babhūva ha / rājāpi ca tam ālokya tathaivāsīd viṣaṇṇadhīḥ //MU_6,109.44//
GSP27moksop_u:19514: muhūrtamātreṇovāca śikhidhvaja idaṃ vacaḥ / kaṣṭaṃ so 'yaṃ mahāsattvas sampanno varavarṇinī //MU_6,109.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19515: sādho viditavedyas tvaṃ jānāsi niyater gatim / avaśyabhāviny arthe 'smin mā khinnahṛdayo bhava //MU_6,109.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19516: āpatanti daśās tāta sudhiyāṃ dehamātrake / na cetasy adhiyāṃ tv etāś cittaṃ yānti sadehakam //MU_6,109.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19517: kumbhaḥ: evam astv anutiṣṭhāmi yāminīstrītvam ātmanaḥ / na khedam anugacchāmi niyatiḥ kena laṅghyate //MU_6,109.48//
GSP27moksop_u:19518: iti nirṇīya tau khedaṃ taṃ nītvā tanutāṃ mithaḥ / ekatalpe niśāṃ tūṣṇīṃ nītavantau cireṇa tām //MU_6,109.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19519: atha prabhāte tat svairaṃ vapur utsṛjya yauvatam / babhūva kumbhaḥ kumbhābhakucaprojjhitamūrtimān //MU_6,109.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19520: iti sā rājamahiṣī cūḍālā varavarṇinī / kumbhatvam āsthitā bhartuḥ paścāt strītvam upāgatā //MU_6,109.51//
GSP27moksop_u:19521: vijahāra vanānteṣu kumārī dharmiṇī niśi / kumbharūpadharā cāhni bhartrā mitreṇa saṃyutā //MU_6,109.52//
GSP27moksop_u:19522: kailāsamandarasumerumahendrasahyasānuṣv aviskhalitayogagamāgamā sā / sārdhaṃ priyeṇa suhṛdā vibhunā yathecchaṃ sragdāmahāravalitā vijahāra nārī //MU_6,109.53//
GSP27moksop_u:19525: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tataḥ katipayeṣv eva divaseṣu gateṣu sā / idaṃ provāca bhartāraṃ kumbharūpadharā satī //MU_6,110.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19526: rājan rājīvapattrākṣa mamedaṃ vacanaṃ śṛṇu / niśāyāṃ pratyahaṃ tāvat sthita evāham aṅganā //MU_6,110.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19527: tad icchāmy aṅganādharmaṃ nipuṇīkartum īdṛśam / bhartre kasmaicid ātmānaṃ vivāhena dadāmy aham //MU_6,110.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19528: tad bhavān eva me bhartā rocate bhuvanatraye / gṛhāṇa māṃ vivāhena bhāryātve niśi sarvadā //MU_6,110.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19529: ayatnopanataṃ sādho priyeṇa suhṛdā saha / strīsukhaṃ bhoktum icchāmi mā me vighnakaro bhava //MU_6,110.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19530: kramapravṛttam ā sṛṣṭes sukhasādhyaṃ manoramam / prakṛtaṃ kurvataḥ kāryaṃ doṣaḥ ka iva jāyate //MU_6,110.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19531: icchānicchādṛśor aikyāt samatvāt sarvavastuṣu / vayaṃ na secchā nānicchāḥ kurvas tenaitad īpsitam //MU_6,110.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19532: śikhidhvajaḥ: kṛtenānena kāryeṇa na śubhaṃ nāśubhaṃ sakhe / paśyāmi tan mahābuddhe yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_6,110.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19533: samatāṃ samprayātena cetasedaṃ jagattrayam / kharūpam eva paśyāmi yathecchasi tathācara //MU_6,110.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19534: kumbhaḥ: yady evaṃ tan mahīpāla lagnam adyaiva śobhanam / rākeyaṃ śrāvaṇasyāsya hyas sarvaṃ gaṇitaṃ mayā //MU_6,110.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19535: rātrāv adyodite candre paripūrṇakalāmale / janyatraṃ nau mahābāho dvayor eva bhaviṣyati //MU_6,110.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19538: niśi vyomagatās tārā bhartrā pūrṇendunā saha / āvayoḥ paripaśyantu karṇāntāgatalocanāḥ //MU_6,110.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19539: uttiṣṭhātmavivāhārthaṃ kurvaḥ kānanakoṭarāt / rājaṃś candanapuṣpādisambhāraṃ ratnasaṃyutam //MU_6,110.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19540: ity uktvā kumbha utthāya saha tena mahībhṛtā / kusumāvacayaṃ cakre tathā ratnādisañcayam //MU_6,110.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19541: tato muhūrtamātreṇa ratnasānau same śubhe / samālambhanapuṣpāḍhyās tābhyāṃ vai rāśayaḥ kṛtāḥ //MU_6,110.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19542: hārāmbaramaṇīndrādirāśayas te virejire / saubhāgyasyeva kāmena kośāḥ kālena sambhṛtāḥ //MU_6,110.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19543: tathā janyatrasambhāraṃ kṛtvā kāñcanakandare / yayatus tau mahāmitre snātuṃ mandākinīṃ nadīm //MU_6,110.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19544: tatrainaṃ snapayām āsa mahārājam athādarāt / gajakumbhopamaskandhaṃ kumbho maṅgalapūrvakam //MU_6,110.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19545: bhaviṣyadvanitārūpāṃ bhaviṣyatpatitāṃ gataḥ / cūḍālāṃ snapayām āsa kumbharūpadharāṃ priyām //MU_6,110.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19546: pūjayām āsatus snātau tatra devān pitṝn munīn / yathā kriyāphale 'nicchau kriyātyāge tathaiva tau //MU_6,110.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19547: nityaṃ jñānarasātṛptau vyavasthārthaṃ jagatsthiteḥ / cakrāte bhojanaṃ bhavyau tāv anyo'nyasamīritau //MU_6,110.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19548: kalpavṛkṣadugūlāni paridhāya sitāni tau / phalāni bhuktvā janyatrasthānam āyayatuḥ kramāt //MU_6,110.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19549: etāvatātra kālena tayor janyatrasotkayoḥ / priyaṃ kartum ivāstādrau jhagity evāviśad raviḥ //MU_6,110.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19550: atha sandhyākrame vṛtte kṛte japyāghamarṣaṇe / vivāhadarśanāyeva tārājāle kham āgate //MU_6,110.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19551: mithunaikasakhī yāmā kumudotkarahāsinī / prāleyajālaprakaraṃ vikirantī samāyayau //MU_6,110.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19552: ratnadīpān bahūn samyak kumbhas sānāv ayojayat / jyotīṃṣīndvarkayuktāni padmodbhava ivāmbarāt //MU_6,110.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19553: bhūṣayām āsa rājānaṃ strītvaṃ gacchan niśāmukhe / candanāgurukarpūrapūrair mṛgajakuṅkumaiḥ //MU_6,110.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19554: hārakeyūrakaṭakais tathā kalpalatāṃśukaiḥ / sragdāmair avataṃsaiś ca mālyaiś ca vividhombhitaiḥ //MU_6,110.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19555: tathā kalpalatāgucchair mandāraiḥ pārijātakaiḥ / santānair bahuratnaiś ca maulinā cendurūpiṇā //MU_6,110.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19556: etāvatātha kālena vadhūtvaṃ kumbha āyayau / ghanastanataṭākrānto babhūvāśu vilāsavān //MU_6,110.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19557: idaṃ sañcintayām āsa sampanno 'yam ahaṃ vadhūḥ / kāmāyātmā mayādeyaḥ kāryaṃ kālocitaṃ kila //MU_6,110.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19558: iyam asmi vadhūḥ kāntā bhartāyaṃ me puras sthitaḥ / gṛhāṇa kāma mām ehi kālo 'yaṃ tava hṛcchaya //MU_6,110.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19559: iti sañcintya bhartāram agrastham abhimaṇḍitam / udayantam ivādityaṃ ratiḥ kāmam ivāha sā //MU_6,110.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19560: ahaṃ madanikā nāma bhāryāsmi tava mānada / pataye te praṇāmo 'yaṃ sasnehaṃ kriyate mayā //MU_6,110.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19561: ity uktvā sānavadyāṅgī lajjāvanamitānanā / lolālakena śirasā praṇanāma nayāt patim //MU_6,110.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19562: uvācedaṃ ca he nātha tvaṃ māṃ bhūṣaya bhūṣaṇaiḥ / krameṇāgniṃ ca sañjvālya matpāṇigrahaṇaṃ kuru //MU_6,110.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19563: rājase 'titarāṃ nātha māṃ karoṣi smarāturām / rater vivāhe madanam abhibhūyādhitiṣṭhasi //MU_6,110.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19564: indor ivāṃśujālāni rājan mālyāni bhānti te / merugaṅgāpravāhābhāṃ dhatte hāras tavorasi //MU_6,110.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19565: mandārakusumaprotaiḥ kuntalair nṛpa rājase / kanakābjam ivālolair bhṛṅgaiḥ kesaradhūsaraiḥ //MU_6,110.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19566: ratnāṃśujālaiḥ kusumaiś śriyā sthairyeṇa tejasā / unnatyā ca vibho merum abhibhūyāvatiṣṭhase //MU_6,110.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19567: evamādi vadantau tau bhaviṣyannavadampatī / pracchannapūrvadāmpatyau mithas tuṣṭau babhūvatuḥ //MU_6,110.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19568: mahārājñīṃ madanikāṃ mahārājaś śikhidhvajaḥ / kāñcanāmalaparyaṅke niyojyābhūṣayat svayam //MU_6,110.44//
GSP27moksop_u:19569: avataṃsais tathā mālyair maṇimuktāvibhūṣaṇaiḥ / vastrair vilepanaiḥ puṣpair ucitasthānayojitaiḥ //MU_6,110.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19570: sā babhau bhūṣitā tanvī madanī madadāyinī / girijeva vivāhotkā kāmakānteva kāminī //MU_6,110.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19571: mahārājo mahārājñīṃ bhūṣayitvedam āha tām / rājase mṛgaśāvākṣi lakṣmīr iva navotthitā //MU_6,110.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19572: śakreṇa saha yac chacyā yal lakṣmyā hariṇā saha / yad gauryāś śambhunā sārdhaṃ tat te bhavatu maṅgalam //MU_6,110.48//
GSP27moksop_u:19573: padmakandāṅkuraradā lolanīlotpalekṣaṇā / āmodasubhagākārā tvaṃ sthitā padminīsamā //MU_6,110.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19574: suraktapallavakarā stabakastanadhāriṇī / tvam eva phaladā manye kāmakalpataror latā //MU_6,110.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19575: himaśītāvadātāṅgī jyotsnāprasarahāsinī / pūrṇenduśrīr ivodyuktā dṛṣṭaivāhlādayasy alam //MU_6,110.51//
GSP27moksop_u:19576: tad uttiṣṭha varārohe vedīṃ vaivāhikīṃ svayam / ratnapuṣpalatājālai racayāvo yathākramam //MU_6,110.52//
GSP27moksop_u:19577: ity uktvā dampatī kāntau racayām āsatus tadā / vedīm ātmavivāhāya mahendramaṇikandare //MU_6,110.53//
GSP27moksop_u:19578: muktājālais sajhāṅkāraiḥ puṣpottaṃsais saṣaṭpadaiḥ / ratnamālyais saṭāṅkārair vaijayantīpaṭaiś calaiḥ //MU_6,110.54//
GSP27moksop_u:19581: caturdikkaṃ caturbhiś ca nārikelamahāphalaiḥ / pūrṇakumbhatayā gāṅgavāripūraiḥ prakalpitaiḥ //MU_6,110.57//
GSP27moksop_u:19582: jvalayām āsatus tasyāṃ madhye candanadārubhiḥ / jvalanaṃ jvalitajvālaṃ dakṣiṇasthapradakṣiṇam //MU_6,110.58//
GSP27moksop_u:19583: pūrvābhimukham agnes tāv agre pallavaviṣṭare / niyojya dampatī kāntau tayor viviśatus svayam //MU_6,110.59//
GSP27moksop_u:19584: sa hutvā tilalājādi pāvakāya śikhidhvajaḥ / utthāyotthāpya kāntāṃ ca pāṇibhyāṃ svayam ādade //MU_6,110.60//
GSP27moksop_u:19585: anyo'nyaṃ śobhamānau tāv anyāv iva navau śivau / cakratur dampatī tasya pāvakasya pradakṣiṇam //MU_6,110.61//
GSP27moksop_u:19586: svadāyaṃ jñānasarvasvaṃ hṛdayaṃ prema cācalam / dadatus tau mitho mānyau smitakāntamukhaśriyau //MU_6,110.62//
GSP27moksop_u:19587: pradakṣiṇatrayaṃ kṛtvā lājān santyajya vahnaye / madbhāryām ambarād dṛṣṭvā karau tatyajatuḥ kramāt //MU_6,110.63//
GSP27moksop_u:19588: smayamānamukhau kāntau candrāv iva navoditau / pūrvoparacite puṣpatalpe viviśatur nave //MU_6,110.64//
GSP27moksop_u:19589: etasminn antare candraś caturbhāgaṃ nabhastalāt / śanair ākramayām āsa śobhāṃ draṣṭum ivaitayoḥ //MU_6,110.65//
GSP27moksop_u:19590: tasmin sānau latācchidrair draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭīr ivābhitaḥ / lolais sañcārayām āsa karān indur varāṅgane //MU_6,110.66//
GSP27moksop_u:19591: tais tais tatra kathālāpair indāv abhyudite tathā / tāv āsāṃ cakratuḥ kāntau dampatī tu muhūrtakam //MU_6,110.67//
GSP27moksop_u:19592: athotthāya jvaladratnadīpāṃ kāñcanakandarām / svayaṃ pūrvoparacitāṃ guptāṃ viviśatuḥ priyau //MU_6,110.68//
GSP27moksop_u:19593: navaṃ dadṛśatus tatra talpaṃ kusumakalpitam / parito vyāptam utphullair hemapaṅkajarāśibhiḥ //MU_6,110.69//
GSP27moksop_u:19594: mandārādibhir anyaiś ca puṣpair mlānivivarjitaiḥ / uccakaiḥ puṃpramāṇena nirmitaṃ kusumais samaiḥ //MU_6,110.70//
GSP27moksop_u:19596: pratibimbam anantasya ratnabhittāv iva sthitam / sugandham unnataṃ kāntaṃ viśarārutayojjhitam //MU_6,110.72//
GSP27moksop_u:19597: mithunaṃ puṣparāśau tat papāta dhavalāmale / tasmin samasamābhoge kṣīrode mandaro yathā //MU_6,110.73//
GSP27moksop_u:19598: tais tais tataḥ praṇatipeśalavāgvilāsais tatkālakāryasubhagaiḥ praṇayopacāraiḥ / satkāntayor navanavena tayos sukhena dīrghā muhūrta iva sā rajanī jagāma //MU_6,110.74//
GSP27moksop_u:19601: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha sūryāṃśuraṅgeṇa rañjite bhuvanodare / śikhidhvajāṅganā bhūyo madanī kumbhatāṃ yayau //MU_6,111.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19602: evaṃ mahendradaryāṃ tāv ubhau kumbhaśikhidhvajau / svayaṃ vivāhitāv iṣṭau sampannau navadampatī //MU_6,111.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19603: vilesatur vicitrāsu pratyahaṃ vanarājiṣu / prapakvaphalabhārāsu puṣpapallavinīṣu ca //MU_6,111.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19604: divā priyatare mitre yāminyām iṣṭadampatī / prabhādīpāv iva śliṣṭau na viyuktau babhūvatuḥ //MU_6,111.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19605: remāte vanakuñjeṣu guhāsu ca mahībhṛtām / tamālasālaṣaṇḍeṣu mandāragahaneṣu ca //MU_6,111.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19607: dinais tribhis tribhir gatvā nidrāṃ gatavati priye / cūḍālā rājakāryāṇi kṛtvā svāny āyayau punaḥ //MU_6,111.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19608: tau divā suhṛdau rātrau dampatī kumbhabhūmipau / nānākusumasaṃvītau tasthatur muditau mithaḥ //MU_6,111.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19609: māsam ekaṃ mahendrādrisānau saralasaṅkule / ratnakuḍye guhāgehe pūjitau surakinnaraiḥ //MU_6,111.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19610: hastalabhyoditendau ca mandāravanamālite / evaṃ śuktimataḥ pṛṣṭhe pakṣaṃ pakṣaṃ latāgṛhe //MU_6,111.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19611: māsadvayam ṛkṣavato girer dakṣiṇatas taṭe / pārijātavane devapuṣpastabakamaṇḍape //MU_6,111.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19612: jambūṣaṇḍatale meroḥ pāde jambūnadītaṭe / jāmbūnadamaye māsaṃ jambūphalarasāvanau //MU_6,111.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19613: daśottarakurūṇāṃ ca maṇḍale divasāni tau / kailāsasyottarastheṣu saptaviṃśativāsarān //MU_6,111.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19614: evam anyeṣu deśeṣu vicitreṣu mahībhṛtām / sthitavantau mahābhāgau suhṛdau snigdhadampatī //MU_6,111.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19615: tato yāteṣu māseṣu śanaiḥ katipayeṣu sā / cūḍālā cintayām āsa devaputrakarūpiṇī //MU_6,111.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19616: suropabhogabhāreṇa parīkṣe 'haṃ śikhidhvajam / mā kadācana ceto 'sya bhogeṣu ratim eṣyati //MU_6,111.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19617: iti sañcintya cūḍālā māyayā svāmino vane / āgataṃ darśayām āsa sasurāpsarasaṃ harim //MU_6,111.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19618: indram abhyāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā parivārasamanvitam / yathāvat pūjayām āsa vanasaṃsthaś śikhidhvajaḥ //MU_6,111.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19619: śikhidhvajaḥ: ātmanaḥ kiṃ kṛtā dūrād abhyāgamakadarthanā / devarāja prasādān me yathāvad vaktum arhasi //MU_6,111.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19620: indraḥ: ime vayam ihānītās tvadguṇātiśayena khāt / hṛdi lagnena sūtreṇa khagā dūragatā iva //MU_6,111.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19621: uttiṣṭha svargam āgaccha tatra sarve tvadunmukhāḥ / tvadguṇaśravaṇāścaryās sthitā devagaṇāṅganāḥ //MU_6,111.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19622: ime rathā idaṃ yānam ayam uccaiśśravā hayaḥ / ayam airāvaṇo nāgo yathābhimatam āśraya //MU_6,111.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19623: pādukāgulikākhaḍgarasādīdam athāpi ca / gṛhītvā siddhamārgeṇa svīkuru svargamaṇḍalam //MU_6,111.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19624: ākalpaṃ vaibudhā bhogās tvayā vibudhasadmani / jīvanmuktena bhoktavyās tena tvām aham āgataḥ //MU_6,111.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19625: vimānayanti samprāptāṃ na tiraskaraṇaiś śriyam / nābhivāñchanti cāprāptāṃ tvādṛśās sādhusādhavaḥ //MU_6,111.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19626: avighnam āgatenādya sukhaṃ viharatā tvayā / svargaḥ pavitratāṃ yātu hariṇeva jagattrayam //MU_6,111.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19627: śikhidhvajaḥ: svargaṃ svargasamācāraṃ vedmi devādināyaka / kiṃ tu sarvatra me svargo niyato na tu kutracit //MU_6,111.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19628: sarvatraiva hi tuṣyāmi sarvatraiva rame prabho / avāñchanatvān manasas sarvatrānandavān aham //MU_6,111.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19629: niyataṃ kiñcid ekatra sthitaṃ svargakam īdṛśam / śakra gantuṃ na jānāmi nājñātaṃ ca karomy aham //MU_6,111.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19630: indraḥ: sādho viditavedyānāṃ paripūrṇadhiyāṃ satām / sajjanācaritaṃ yuktaṃ manye bhogopasevanam //MU_6,111.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19631: deveśe proktavaty evaṃ tūṣṇīm eva sthite nṛpe / kim evaṃ nopayāmy eva tvām iti proktavān hariḥ //MU_6,111.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19632: bāḍham ity eva kālena vadatīṣac chikhidhvaje / kalyāṇaṃ te 'stu kumbheti vadann antardhim āyayau //MU_6,111.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19633: tad devavṛndam akhilaṃ tridaśeśayuktaṃ tatra kṣaṇād alam adṛśyam abhūd vilīnam / kallolajālam iva vārinidhau praśāntavāte sphuranmakaraphenaphaṇīndraśabdam //MU_6,111.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19636: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tāṃ māyāṃ śamam ānīya cūḍālā samacintayat / diṣṭyā bhogecchayā nāyaṃ hriyate vasudhādhipaḥ //MU_6,112.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19637: śāntas samasamābhoga eva śakrasamāgame / asambhramam ahelaṃ ca kṛtavān vyavahāritām //MU_6,112.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19638: bhūya eva prapañcena vimṛśāmy enam ādarāt / rāgadveṣapradhānena kenacid buddhihāriṇā //MU_6,112.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19639: iti sañcintya sā rātrāv indāv abhyudite vane / gṛhītamaṇḍanā nūnaṃ kāntā madanikā satī //MU_6,112.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19640: vāte vahati puṣpāḍhye madirāmodamāṃsale / sandhyājapyapare nadyās tīrasaṃsthe śikhidhvaje //MU_6,112.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19641: santānakalatāgehaṃ nīrandhraṃ puṣpagucchakaiḥ / śuddhāntaṃ vanadevīnāṃ praviveśa madānvitā //MU_6,112.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19642: tatra saṅkalpite puṣpaśayane mālyamālitā / kaṇṭhe saṅkalpitaṃ kāntaṃ śiḍgam ādāya saṃsthitā //MU_6,112.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19643: āgatyānviṣya kuñjān sa pradadarśa śikhidhvajaḥ / latāgehe madanikākaṇṭhe śiḍgaṃ manoharam //MU_6,112.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19646: mithunaṃ tad dadarśātha mithaḥ prahasitānanam / anyo'nyavadanāsaktaṃ channaṃ kalpalatāṃśukaiḥ //MU_6,112.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19647: ālolamālyaśayanaṃ madanāturam ākulam / aṅgarāgacchalenātmarāgam anyo'nyam arpayat //MU_6,112.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19648: ratyunmukhaṃ ghanānandam uddāmamadamanmatham / parasparāhataṃ puṣpair vakṣobhyāṃ pīḍitastanam //MU_6,112.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19649: tad ālokyāvikāreṇa cetasā sa tutoṣa ca / aho sukhaṃ sthitau śiḍgāv ity āha sa śikhidhvajaḥ //MU_6,112.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19650: tiṣṭhatho 'ṅga yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ śiḍgau yathāsthitam / vighnaṃ mā kuruthaḥ prītāv ity uktvā nirjagāma saḥ //MU_6,112.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19651: tato muhūrtamātreṇa prapañcaṃ svam upekṣya sā / niryayau darśayantī svaṃ ratiyuddhākulaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,112.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19652: upaviṣṭaṃ dadarśainaṃ nṛpaṃ hemaśilātale / samādhisaṃstham ekānte manāgvikasitekṣaṇam //MU_6,112.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19653: taṃ pradeśam upāgatya lajjāvanamitānanā / tūṣṇīm āsit kṣaṇaṃ khinnā mlānā madanikāṅganā //MU_6,112.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19654: kṣaṇāc chikhidhvajo dhyānād viratas tām uvāca ha / prasannamadhuraṃ vākyam idam akṣubdhayā dhiyā //MU_6,112.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19655: tanvi kiṃ śīghram eva tvaṃ vighnitānandam āgatā / ānandāyaiva bhūtāni yatante yāni kānicit //MU_6,112.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19656: bhūyas toṣaya taṃ gaccha kāntaṃ praṇayavṛttibhiḥ / parasparepsitasneho durlabho hi jagattraye //MU_6,112.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19657: aham etena cārthena nodvegaṃ yāmi mānini / yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke tad tad deyaṃ vijānatā //MU_6,112.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19658: ahaṃ kumbhaś ca tanvaṅgi vītarāgāv iha sthitau / durvāsaśśāpajā bālā tvaṃ yad icchasi tat kuru //MU_6,112.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19659: madanikā: evam eṣa mahābhāga strīpumbhāvo hi cañcalaḥ / kāmo hy aṣṭaguṇas strīṇāṃ na kopaṃ kartum arhasi //MU_6,112.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19660: abalāham anenāsmi krāntā gahanakānane / tvayi sandhyājapapare kiṃ karomi varākikā //MU_6,112.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19661: abalā vākyamātreṇa tāvan naranirodhanam / karoti yāvac chiḍgena nāṅge sve viniveśitā //MU_6,112.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19662: striyās sundara yātāyāḥ parapuṃsāṅgasaṅgamam / manyur niṣedha ākrandas satītvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyati //MU_6,112.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19663: abalā strī tathā bālā mūḍhāham aparādhinī / kṣantum arhasi māṃ nātha kṣamāvanto hi sādhavaḥ //MU_6,112.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19664: śikhidhvajaḥ: manyur mama na bāle 'ntar vidyate kha iva drumaḥ / kevalaṃ sādhunindyatvān necchāmi tvām aham vadhūm //MU_6,112.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19665: suhṛttvena vanānteṣu pūrvavat samam aṅgane / vītarāgatayā nityaṃ tapasaiva ramāvahe //MU_6,112.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19666: [vasiṣṭhaḥ:] evaṃ samatayā tatra sthite tasmiñ śikhidhvaje / cūḍālā cintayām āsa tatsatyenoditāśayā //MU_6,112.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19667: aho bata paraṃ sāmyaṃ bhagavān ayam āgataḥ / vītarāgabhayakrodho jīvanmukto 'vatiṣṭhati //MU_6,112.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19668: nainaṃ haranti bhogāśā na mahatyo 'pi siddhayaḥ / na sukhāni na duḥkhāni nāpado na ca sampadaḥ //MU_6,112.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19669: cintitās sakalā eva prayānty enam aninditāḥ / manye maharddhayaḥ kāntā nārāyaṇam ivāparam //MU_6,112.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19670: ātmavṛttāntam akhilaṃ tad enaṃ smārayāmy aham / kumbharūpam idaṃ tyaktvā cūḍālaiva bhavāmy aham //MU_6,112.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19671: iti sañcintya cūḍālā cūḍālāvapur akṣatam / darśayām āsa tatrāśu tyaktvā madanikāvapuḥ //MU_6,112.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19672: tasmān madanikādehāc cūḍālā nirgateva sā / babhāv indvamalā muktā nirgateva samudgakāt //MU_6,112.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19673: tāṃ dadarśānavadyāṅgīṃ puraḥ praṇayapeśalām / kānto madanikām eva cūḍālāṃ dayitāṃ sthitām //MU_6,112.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19674: samuditām iva mādhavapadminīm upagatām iva bhūmitalāc chriyam / prakaṭitām iva ratnasamudgakāt paridadarśa nijāṃ dayitāṃ nṛpaḥ //MU_6,112.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19677: vasiṣṭhaḥ: atha tāṃ dayitāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayotphullalocanaḥ / śikhidhvaja uvācedam āścaryākulayā girā //MU_6,113.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19678: kā tvam utpalapattrākṣi kutaḥ prāptāsi sundari / kimīhāsi kiyatkālaṃ kimartham iha tiṣṭhasi //MU_6,113.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19679: aṅgena vyavahāreṇa smitenānunayena ca / mama jāyā vilāsena cūḍālevopalakṣyase //MU_6,113.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19680: cūḍālā: evam eva prabho viddhi cūḍālāsmi na saṃśayaḥ / akṛtrimena dehena labdho 'sy adya mayā svayam //MU_6,113.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19681: kumbhādidehanirmāṇas tvāṃ bodhayitum eṣa me / prapañcaś śataśākhatvam iha yāto vanāntare //MU_6,113.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19682: yadā rājyaṃ parityajya mohena tapase vanam / tvam agās tatprabhṛty eva tvadbodhāyāham udyatā //MU_6,113.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19683: anena kumbhadehena mayaivaṃ tvaṃ vibodhitaḥ / māyayā na tu kumbhādi kiñcit satyaṃ mahīpate //MU_6,113.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19684: buddho viditavedyas tvaṃ dhyānenaitad akhaṇḍitam / sarvaṃ paśyasi tattvajña dhyānenāśv avalokaya //MU_6,113.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19685: atha cūḍālayety ukte baddhvā parikaraṃ nṛpaḥ / ātmodantam aśeṣeṇa dhyānenālam avaikṣata //MU_6,113.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19686: ā svarājyaparityāgāc cūḍālādarśanāvadhim / sarvaṃ muhūrtadhyānena svātmodantaṃ dadarśa saḥ //MU_6,113.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19687: ā rājyasamparityāgād vartamānakṣaṇakramam / sarvam ālokya bhūpālo virarāma samādhitaḥ //MU_6,113.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19688: samādhivirato harṣavikāsinayanāmbujaḥ / visārya tarasā bāhū pulakojjvalatāṃ gataḥ //MU_6,113.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19689: galadaṅgaṃ lasatsneham udyadbāṣpaṃ sphuratspṛham / āliliṅga ciraṃ kāntāṃ nakulo nakulīm iva //MU_6,113.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19690: tayor āliṅgane tasmiṃs tatra bhāvo babhūva yaḥ / na sa vāsukijihvābhir vaktuṃ varṣair hi śakyate //MU_6,113.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19691: citrasthāv iva paṅkena kṛtāv iva galattanū / śailād iva samutkīrṇau śliṣṭāv āstāṃ ciraṃ priyau //MU_6,113.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19692: muhūrtena galadgharmajālau pulakapīvarau / bāhū viślathatām īṣan ninyatus tau śanaiḥ priyau //MU_6,113.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19693: amṛtāpūrṇahṛdayaṃ saṃśūnyahṛdayopamam / unmuktabhujam āstāṃ tāv alakṣyasthitalocanam //MU_6,113.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19694: ghanānandaḥ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā tūṣṇīṃ praṇayapeśalam / kāntācibukasaṃlagnakaraḥ provāca bhūpatiḥ //MU_6,113.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19695: aho nu madhuras snigdhaḥ kāntaś ca kulayoṣitām / puṇyaś caritaniṣṣyandas svādavān amṛtād api //MU_6,113.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19696: kiyatpramāṇaṃ tanvaṅgi tvayā bālendumugdhayā / anubhūtaś ciraṃ kleśo bhartur arthena dāruṇaḥ //MU_6,113.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19697: evaṃ duruttarād asmāt saṃsārakuharād aham / uttārito yayā buddhyā sā hi kenopamīyate //MU_6,113.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19698: arundhatī śacī gaurī gāyatrī śrīs sarasvatī / samastāḥ pelavāyante tanvyās sattvaguṇaśriyā //MU_6,113.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19699: dhīśrīkāntikṣamāmaitrīkaruṇādyāsu sundari / kāntāsv ākārakāntāsu prathamaivāsi lakṣyase //MU_6,113.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19700: pareṇādhyavasāyena tvayāham avabodhitaḥ / kena pratyupakāreṇa tulām eṣyanti me guṇāḥ //MU_6,113.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19701: mohād anādigahanād anantaviṣamād api / patim adhyavasāyinyas tārayanti kulastriyaḥ //MU_6,113.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19702: śāstrārthagurumantrādi na tathottāraṇakṣamam / yathaitās snehaśālinyo bhartṝṇāṃ kulayoṣitaḥ //MU_6,113.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19703: sakhā bhrātā suhṛd bhṛtyo gurur mantro dhanaṃ sukham / śāstram āyatanaṃ dāsyas sarvaṃ bhartuḥ kulastriyaḥ //MU_6,113.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19704: sarvadā sarvayatnena pūjanīyāḥ kulāṅganāḥ / lokadvayasukhaṃ samyak sarvaṃ tāsu pratiṣṭhitam //MU_6,113.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19705: niricchāyāḥ prayātāyāḥ pāraṃ saṃsāravāridheḥ / katham asyopakārasya kariṣye te pratikriyām //MU_6,113.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19706: manye kulāṅganāloko loke sarvas tvayādhunā / nārīsaujanyacarcāsu vyapadeśyo bhaviṣyati //MU_6,113.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19707: tvāṃ nirmitavato dhātur guṇajālātiśāyinīm / manye prakupitā nūnam arundhatyādikās striyaḥ //MU_6,113.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19708: satītvarūpasaujanyaguṇaratnasamudgike / ehi me tvadguṇotkasya punar āliṅganaṃ kuru //MU_6,113.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19709: ity uktvā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ cūḍālāṃ sa śikhidhvajaḥ / āliliṅga punar gāḍhaṃ nakulo nakulīm iva //MU_6,113.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19710: cūḍālā: deva śuṣkakriyājālapare tvayy ākulātmani / tathābhūvaṃ bhṛśam ahaṃ tvadarthaṃ duḥkhitā kila //MU_6,113.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19711: tena tvadavabodhātmā svārtha evopapāditaḥ / mayā tad atra kiṃ devaḥ karoti mayi śaṃsanam //MU_6,113.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19712: śikhidhvajaḥ: tvayā yathā varārohe svārthas sampāditaś śubhaḥ / tathedānīṃ satāṃ sarvās sādhayantu kulastriyaḥ //MU_6,113.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19713: cūḍālā: buddhyaṃśaikāntaviśrāntajagajjālaka deva he / adya taṃ prāktanaṃ kaccin mohaṃ samanupaśyasi //MU_6,113.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19714: idaṃ karomi nedaṃ tu prāpnomīdam itas tv iti / antar hasasi tāṃ kaccid āśāpelavatāṃ dhiyaḥ //MU_6,113.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19715: tās tucchatṛṣṇākalanās tās saṅkalpakukalpanāḥ / tvayi nādyāvalokyante deva vyomnīva parvatāḥ //MU_6,113.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19716: kas tvam adyāṅgasampannaḥ kiṃniṣṭho 'si kim īhase / kathaṃ paśyasi pāścātyaṃ dehāvasthākramaṃ prabho //MU_6,113.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19717: śikhidhvajaḥ: sumanaḥpūrṇanīlābjamālāsāravilokane / yasya tvam eva tajjñāsi tad evāham upasthitaḥ //MU_6,113.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19718: nirīho 'smi niraṃśo 'smi nabhassvaccho 'smi nisspṛhaḥ / śāntāhamartharūpo 'smi cirāyāham ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_6,113.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19719: tāṃ daśām upayāto 'smi yataś caṇpakavarṇini / pratibhānti mahānto 'pi śocyā harijinādayaḥ //MU_6,113.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19720: nakiñcinmātracinmātraniṣṭho 'smi svastha āsthitaḥ / bhrameṇālaṃ vimukto 'smi saṃsāreṇālilocane //MU_6,113.44//
GSP27moksop_u:19721: na tuṣṭo 'smi na khinno 'smi nāyam asmi na cetarat / na sthūlo 'smi na sūkṣmo 'smi sarvam asmi ca sundari //MU_6,113.45//
GSP27moksop_u:19722: tejobimbāt prayātena bhittāv apatitena ca / kṣayātiśayamuktena prakāśenāsmi vai samaḥ //MU_6,113.46//
GSP27moksop_u:19723: śānto 'smi sāmyam evāsmi svaccho 'smi vigatāmayaḥ / parinirvāṇa evāsmi sad asmy atisatīvrate //MU_6,113.47//
GSP27moksop_u:19724: yat tad asti tad evāsmi vaktuṃ śaknomi netarat / taraṅgataralāpāṅge gurus tvaṃ me namo 'stu te //MU_6,113.48//
GSP27moksop_u:19725: prasādena viśālākṣyās tīrṇo 'smi bhavasāgarāt / punar malaṃ na gṛhṇāmi śatadhmātasuvarṇavat //MU_6,113.49//
GSP27moksop_u:19726: svasthaś śānto mṛdur dānto vītarāgo niraṃśadhīḥ / sarvātītas sarvagaś ca kham ivāyam ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_6,113.50//
GSP27moksop_u:19727: evaṃ sthite mahāsattva prāṇeśa hṛdayapriya / kim idānīṃ prabho brūhi rocate te mahāmate //MU_6,113.51//
GSP27moksop_u:19728: śikhidhvajaḥ: pratiṣedhaṃ na jānāmi na jānāmy abhivāñchanam / yad ācarasi tanvi tvaṃ kadācid vedmi tan na vā //MU_6,113.52//
GSP27moksop_u:19729: manmano nāśakalanāṃ tathā sthitikalāṃ priye / na kāñcid anusandhātuṃ jānāty ambarasuvratam //MU_6,113.53//
GSP27moksop_u:19730: yad eva kiñcij jānāsi tad eva kuru sundari / tad eva dhārayiṣyāmi pratibimbaṃ yathā maṇiḥ //MU_6,113.54//
GSP27moksop_u:19731: cetasā vigatecchena yathāprāptam anindite / na staumi na ca nindāmi yad icchasi tad ācara //MU_6,113.55//
GSP27moksop_u:19732: cūḍālā: yady evaṃ tan mahābhāga samākarṇaya manmatam / ākarṇya jīvanmuktātmaṃs tad evāhartum arhasi //MU_6,113.56//
GSP27moksop_u:19733: sarvatraikyāvabodhena maurkhyakṣayabhuvādhunā / niricchās tāvad ākāśaviśadās saṃsthitā vayam //MU_6,113.57//
GSP27moksop_u:19734: yādṛg eṣaṇam asmākam tādṛg etad aneṣaṇam / eṣaṇāneṣaṇe bhedaś cinmātrollasane hi kaḥ //MU_6,113.58//
GSP27moksop_u:19735: tasmād ādyantamadhyeṣu ye vayaṃ puruṣottama / maurkhyam eva parityajya ta eveme sthitā iha //MU_6,113.59//
GSP27moksop_u:19736: sāmprataṃ prakṛtenemaṃ kālaṃ nītvā krameṇa vai / videhatāṃ prayāsyāmaḥ prabho kālena kenacit //MU_6,113.60//
GSP27moksop_u:19737: śikhidhvajaḥ: vayam ādyantamadhyeṣu kīdṛśās tarale vada / moham ekaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhāmaḥ katham eva vā //MU_6,113.61//
GSP27moksop_u:19738: cūḍālā: vayam ādyantamadhyeṣu rājāno rājasattama / moham ekaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhāmaḥ punar eva te //MU_6,113.62//
GSP27moksop_u:19739: sva eva nagare rājā bhava tvaṃ svāsane sthitaḥ / lalāmabhūtā kāntānāṃ mahiṣī te bhavāmy aham //MU_6,113.63//
GSP27moksop_u:19740: sanṛpā mattavāstavyā nṛtyannavavarāṅganā / sapatākā dhvanattūryā puṣpaprakariṇī purī //MU_6,113.64//
GSP27moksop_u:19741: lasadvallyā samañjaryā raṇatṣaṭpadayā samā / madhumāsavanāvalyā cirād bhavatu naḥ prabho //MU_6,113.65//
GSP27moksop_u:19742: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti cūḍālayā prokte vihasya sa śikhidhvajaḥ / provāca madhuraṃ vākyam akṣubdhaṃ vigatatvaram //MU_6,113.66//
GSP27moksop_u:19743: śikhidhvajaḥ: evaṃ cet tad viśālākṣi svāyattā nas triviṣṭape / siddhabhogabhuvas tāsu nivasāmo na kiṃ priye //MU_6,113.67//
GSP27moksop_u:19744: cūḍālā: na rājan mama bhogeṣu vāñchā na ca vibhūtiṣu / svabhāvasya vaśād eva yathāprāpte rame nṛpa //MU_6,113.68//
GSP27moksop_u:19745: na sukhāya mama svargo na rājyaṃ nāpi nākitā / yathāsthitam avikṣubdhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi svasthaceṣṭitā //MU_6,113.69//
GSP27moksop_u:19746: idaṃ sukham idaṃ neti manane kṣayam āgate / samam eva pade śānte tiṣṭhāmīha yathāsukham //MU_6,113.70//
GSP27moksop_u:19747: śikhidhvajaḥ: yuktam uktaṃ viśālākṣi tvayaitat samayā dhiyā / ko vārthaḥ kila rājyasya grahe tyāge 'pi vā bhavet //MU_6,113.71//
GSP27moksop_u:19748: sukhaduḥkhadaśācintāṃ tyaktvā vigatamatsaram / yathāsaṃsthānam evemau tiṣṭhāvas svasthatāṃ gatau //MU_6,113.72//
GSP27moksop_u:19749: iti tatra kathālāpakathanena tayor dvayoḥ / kāntayoś ciradampatyor vāsaras tanutāṃ yayau //MU_6,113.73//
GSP27moksop_u:19750: athotthāya dinācāraṃ yathāprāptam aninditau / sotkaṇṭhāv apy anutkaṇṭhau cakratuḥ kāryakovidau / svargasiddhim anādṛtya tasthatuḥ pūrṇacetasau //MU_6,113.74//
GSP27moksop_u:19751: ekasminn eva śayane tais taiḥ praṇayaceṣṭitaiḥ / sā vyatīyāya rajanī tayor jīvadvimuktayoḥ //MU_6,113.75//
GSP27moksop_u:19752: tad bhogamokṣasukham uttamayos tayos svam ācetatoḥ praṇayavākyavilāsagarbham / utkaṇṭhitaṃ praṇayinor ghanatāṃ nayantī dīrghā muhūrtavad asau rajanī jagāma //MU_6,113.76//
GSP27moksop_u:19755: vasiṣṭhaḥ: tatas samudite sūrye vitamasy ambare sthite / samudgakād iva jaganmaṇāv asmin vinirgate //MU_6,114.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19756: vikasaty aruṇopānte cakṣuṣīvāmbujākare / ācāreṣv iva lokeṣu prasṛteṣv arkaraśmiṣu //MU_6,114.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19757: dampatī tau samutthāya kṛtasandhyākramau sthitau / pattrāsane mṛdusnigdhe kāntau kāñcanakandare //MU_6,114.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19760: saṅkalpopanate saiṃhe svabhiṣiktaṃ suviṣṭare / sthitaṃ provāca tanvī sā cūḍālā devarūpiṇī //MU_6,114.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19761: kevalaṃ maunam utsṛjya tejaś śāntam idaṃ prabho / aṣṭānāṃ lokapālānāṃ tejāṃsy āhartum arhasi //MU_6,114.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19762: cūḍālayeti sa prokto vane rājā śikhidhvajaḥ / vadann evaṃ karomīti mahārājatvam āyayau //MU_6,114.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19763: atha pratīhārapade tiṣṭhantīm āha māninīm / mahādevīpade rājñi tvāṃ karomy abhiṣekinīm //MU_6,114.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19764: ity uktvāsana āsthāpya mahādevīpade tadā / abhiṣiktāṃ nṛpaḥ kṛtvā meghavāg āha tāṃ priyām //MU_6,114.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19765: priye kamalapattrākṣi kṣaṇāt saṅkalpasambhavam / mahāvibhavam uddāmaṃ sainyam āhartum arhasi //MU_6,114.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19766: iti kāntavacaś śrutvā cūḍālā varavarṇinī / sainyaṃ saṅkalpayām āsa prāvṛḍghanam ivodbhaṭam //MU_6,114.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19767: sainyaṃ dadṛśatus tat tau vājivāraṇasaṅkulam / patākāpūritākāśanīrandhrīkṛtakānanam //MU_6,114.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19771: tatra gandhadvipavare kṛtapārthivamandire / rakṣite dṛptasāmantair ārūḍhau nṛpadampatī //MU_6,114.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19772: tataś śikhidhvajo rājā mahiṣyā samam iṣṭayā / padātirathasambādhaṃ karṣann atibalo balam //MU_6,114.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19773: cacālācalacālinyā senayā rabhasenayā / bhinantyā tarasā śailān vātyayevāśu toyadān //MU_6,114.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19774: tasmān mahendraśailendrāc calitas sa mahīpatiḥ / pathi paśyan girīn deśān nadīr grāmān sajaṅgalān //MU_6,114.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19775: darśayaṃś ca priyāyās tam ātmavṛttāntasañcayam / prāpālpenaiva kālena svāṃ purīṃ svargaśobhanām //MU_6,114.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19776: tatra te tasya sāmantās tadāgamanam ādṛtāḥ / vividur jayaśabdena nirjagmuś coditāśayāḥ //MU_6,114.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19777: ekatāṃ samprayātena tāratūryaninādinā / baladvayena tenāsau viveśa nagaraṃ nṛpaḥ //MU_6,114.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19778: lājapuṣpāñjalivrātair āvṛṣṭaḥ paurayoṣitām / vaṇiṅmārgagato 'paśyat puraṃ paramabhūṣitam //MU_6,114.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19779: patākādhvajasambādhaṃ muktājālamanoramam / nṛttagītaparastrīkaṃ svargaṃ bhūmāv iva cyutam //MU_6,114.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19780: praviśyātha gṛhaṃ tais tais saṃyutaṃ nṛpamaṅgalaiḥ / samyak sammānayām āsa praṇataṃ prakṛtivrajam //MU_6,114.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19781: purotsavaṃ bhṛśaṃ kṛtvā dinasaptakam uttamam / akarod rājakāryāṇi mānitāntaḥpuro nṛpaḥ //MU_6,114.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19782: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi rājyaṃ kṛtvā mahītale / saha cūḍālayā rājā virato dehadhāraṇāt //MU_6,114.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19783: deham utsṛjya nirvāṇam asneha iva dīpakaḥ / apunarjanmane rāma jagāmeti mahāmatiḥ //MU_6,114.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19784: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi samadṛṣṭitayā tayā / rājyaṃ tathānuśiṣyāsau nirvāṇapadam āptavān //MU_6,114.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19785: vigatabhayaviṣādo mānamātsaryamuktaḥ prakṛtasahajakarmā saktanīrāgabuddhiḥ / iti sa susamadṛṣṭir mṛtyum āryo 'tha jitvā daśaśiśirasahasrāṇy ekarājyaṃ cakāra //MU_6,114.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19786_0: bhuktvā bhogān anantān bhuvi sakalamahī pālacūḍāmaṇitve sthitvā vai dīrghakālaṃ param amṛtapadaṃ prāptavāṃs tad yathaiṣaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:19786_1: evaṃ rāmāgataṃ tvaṃ prakṛtam anusaran kāryajātaṃ viśokas tiṣṭhottiṣṭha svayatnāt prasabham anubhavan bhogamokṣāgryalakṣmīm //MU_6,114.32 //
GSP27moksop_u:19789: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śikhidhvajakathānakam / anena gaccha mārgeṇa na kadācana khidyase //MU_6,115.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19790: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya rāghavāghavighātinīm / nityaṃ nīrāgayā buddhyā tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabdhatatpadaḥ //MU_6,115.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19791: yathā śikhidhvajo rājyaṃ kṛtavān evam īdṛśaḥ / rāma vyavaharan rājye bhogamokṣamayo bhava //MU_6,115.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19792: śikhidhvajakrameṇaiva yathā bodham avāptavān / kaco bṛhaspateḥ putras tathā budhyasva rāghava //MU_6,115.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19793: rāmaḥ: bṛhaspater bhagavataḥ putro 'sau bhagavān kacaḥ / yathā prabuddho bhagavan samāsena tathā vada //MU_6,115.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19794: vasiṣṭhaḥ: śṛṇu rājan kathaṃ śrīmāñ śikhidhvajavad eva saḥ / prabodhaṃ paramaṃ yāto devadaiśikajaḥ kacaḥ //MU_6,115.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19795: bālabhāvāt samuttīrṇas saṃsārottaraṇonmukhaḥ / kacaḥ padapadārthajño bṛhaspatim abhāṣata //MU_6,115.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19796: kacaḥ: bhagavan sarvadharmajña kathaṃ saṃsṛtipañjarāt / asmān nirgamyate brūhi jantunā jīvatantunā //MU_6,115.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19797: bṛhaspatiḥ: anarthamakarāgārād asmāt saṃsārasāgarāt / uttīryate nirudvegaṃ sarvatyāgena putraka //MU_6,115.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19798: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity ākarṇya kaco vākyaṃ pituḥ paramapāvanam / sarvam eva parityajya jagāmaikāntakānanam //MU_6,115.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19799: bṛhaspates tadgamanaṃ nodvegāya babhūva ha / saṃyoge ca viyoge ca mahānto hi samāśayāḥ //MU_6,115.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19800: atha varṣeṣu yāteṣu triṣu pañcasu cānagha / punaḥ prāpa mahāraṇye kasmiṃścit pitaraṃ kacaḥ //MU_6,115.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19801: paripūjyābhivandyainaṃ samāliṅgitaputrakam / apṛcchad vākpatiṃ bhūyas sa kacaḥ klāntayā girā //MU_6,115.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19802: kacaḥ: adyedam aṣṭamaṃ varṣaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kṛto mayā / tathāpi tāta viśrāntiṃ nādhigacchāmy aninditām //MU_6,115.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19803: vasiṣṭhaḥ: evam ārtamanasy asmin kace vadati kānane / sarvam eva tyajety uktvā vākpatir divam udyayau //MU_6,115.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19804: gate tasmin kaco dehād valkalādy apy aśeṣataḥ / tatyājāmbudavarṣādi śaradīva nabhastalam //MU_6,115.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19805: uvāsaiko diganteṣu śāntaś śūnyavapuś śvasan / gatendvabhrārkatāreṇa śaradvyomnā samopamaḥ //MU_6,115.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19806: punar varṣatrayeṇaiṣa kasmiṃścit kānanāntare / dūyamānamanāḥ prāpa tam eva pitaraṃ gurum //MU_6,115.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19807: kṛtapūjākramo bhaktyā samāliṅgitaputrakam / apṛcchat tam asau bhūyaḥ khedagadgadayā girā //MU_6,115.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19808: kacaḥ: tāta sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ kanthāveṇulatādy api / tathāpi nāsti viśrāntis svapade kiṃ karomy aham //MU_6,115.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19809: bṛhaspatiḥ: cittaṃ sarvam iti prāhus tat tyaktvā putra rājase / cittatyāgaṃ vidus sarvatyāgaṃ tyāgavido janāḥ //MU_6,115.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19810: vasiṣṭhaḥ: ity uktvā vākpatiḥ putraṃ pupluve tarasā nabhaḥ / anviyeṣa kacaś cittaṃ parityaktum akhinnadhīḥ //MU_6,115.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19811: cintayann apy asau cittaṃ yadā veda na kānane / tadā sañcintayām āsa dhiyedam aviṣaṇṇayā //MU_6,115.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19812: [kacaḥ:] padārthavṛndaṃ dehādi na sarvam iti kathyate / tad etat kiṃ kva vā vyarthaṃ nirāgaskaṃ tyajāmy aham //MU_6,115.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19813: pitus sakāśaṃ gacchāmi jñātuṃ cittamahāripum / jñātvā ca tat tyajāmy āśu tatas tiṣṭhāmi vijvaram //MU_6,115.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19814: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti sañcintya sa kaca uttatāra triviṣṭapam / vākpatiṃ prāpya sasnehaṃ vavande praṇanāma ca //MU_6,115.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19815: papraccha cainam ekānte kiṃ cittaṃ bhagavan mama / svarūpaṃ brūhi cittasya yenaitat santyajāmy aham //MU_6,115.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19816: bṛhaspatiḥ: cittaṃ nijam ahaṅkāraṃ viduś cittavido janāḥ / antar yo 'yam ahambhāvo jantos tac cittam ucyate //MU_6,115.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19817: kacaḥ: manye 'sya duṣkaras tyāgo na siddhim upagacchati / katham eṣa kila tyaktuṃ yujyate yogināṃ vara //MU_6,115.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19818: bṛhaspatiḥ: api puṣpāvadalanād api locanamīlanāt / sukaro 'haṅkṛtityāgo na kleśo 'tra manāg api //MU_6,115.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19819: kacaḥ: trayastriṃśanmahākoṭīpramāṇasya mahāmate / guro gīrvāṇavṛndasya katham etad vadāśu me //MU_6,115.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19820: bṛhaspatiḥ: yathaitad eva tanaya tathā śṛṇu vadāmi te / ajñānamātrasaṃsiddhaṃ vastu jñānena naśyati //MU_6,115.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19821: vastuto nāsty ahaṅkāraḥ putra mithyābhramo hy asau / asan sann iva sampanno bālavetālavac chaṭhaḥ //MU_6,115.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19822: yathā rajjvāṃ bhujaṅgatvaṃ marāv ambumatir yathā / mithyāvabhāsāt sphurati tathā mithyāpy ahaṅkṛtiḥ //MU_6,115.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19823: asad eva yathā dvitvaṃ mohād indor vilokyate / tathā sphuraty ahaṅkāro nasatyo nāma satyavat //MU_6,115.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19824: ekam ādyantarahitaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ tatam / khād apy atitarām acchaṃ vidyate sarvavedanam //MU_6,115.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19825: sarvatra sarvadā sarvaprakāraṃ sarvajantuṣu / tad evaikaṃ kacaty ambu vilolāsv iva vīciṣu //MU_6,115.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19826: atra ko 'yam ahambhāvaḥ kuto vā katham utthitaḥ / kvābdher jāto rajorāśiḥ kvānalād utthitam jalam //MU_6,115.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19827: ayaṃ so 'ham iti vyarthaṃ pratyayaṃ tyaja putraka / tucchaṃ parimitākāraṃ dikkālavivaśīkṛtam //MU_6,115.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19828: dikkālādyanavacchinnaṃ svacchaṃ nityoditaṃ tatam / sarvārthamayam ekārthaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ bhavān //MU_6,115.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19829: phalakusumadalānāṃ sarvadiksaṃsthitānāṃ rasa iva jagatāṃ tvaṃ saṃsthitas sarvadaiva / vimalataracidātmā nityam evātyanantaḥ ka iva kila tavāhaṃniścayo bhāvamūrte //MU_6,115.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19832: vasiṣṭhaḥ: iti prāpya paraṃ yogam upadeśam anuttamam / jīvanmukto babhūvāsau tato devaguros sutaḥ //MU_6,116.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19833: nirbhāvo nirahaṅkāraś chinnagranthiḥ praśāntadhīḥ / kaco yathā sthito rāma tathā tiṣṭhāvikāravān //MU_6,116.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19834: ahaṅkāram asad viddhi mainam āśraya mā tyaja / asataś śaśaśṛṅgasya kila tyāgagrahau kutaḥ //MU_6,116.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19835: asambhavaty ahaṅkāre kva te maraṇajanmanī / nabhaḥkṣetratayā vyuptaṃ kena saṅgṛhyate phalam //MU_6,116.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19836: niraṃśaṃ śāntasaṅkalpaṃ sarvabhāvātmakaṃ tatam / paramād apy aṇos sūkṣmaṃ cinmātraṃ tvaṃ nirāmayam //MU_6,116.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19837: yathāmbhasas taraṅgādi yathā hemno 'ṅgadādi vā / tad evātad ivābhāsaṃ tathāhambhāvanaṃ citaḥ //MU_6,116.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19838: abodhena jagat sarvaṃ māyāmayam iva sthitam / bodhena sakalaṃ brahmarūpaṃ sampadyate 'nagha //MU_6,116.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19839: dvitvaikatvamatī tyaktvā śeṣasthas sukhito bhava / mā duḥkhito bhava vyarthaṃ tvaṃ mithyāpuruṣo yathā //MU_6,116.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19840: māyeyam atiduṣpārā sāṃsārī sāratāṃ gatā / śaradā mihikevāśu bodhenāyāti tānavam //MU_6,116.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19841: rāmaḥ: paramām āgato 'smy antas tṛptiṃ jñānāmṛtena te / avagrahabhayākrāntas svāsāreṇeva cātakaḥ //MU_6,116.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19842: amṛteneva sikto 'ham antar gacchāmi śītatām / uparīva samastānāṃ tiṣṭhāmy atulasampadām //MU_6,116.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19843: na tṛptim adhigacchāmi vacasāṃ vadatas tava / aindavīnāṃ marīcīnāṃ cakoras tṛṣito yathā //MU_6,116.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19844: tṛpto 'pi bhūyaḥ pṛcchāmi tvāṃ praśnam imam īśvara / ko nāma tṛpto 'py agrasthaṃ na pibaty amṛtāsavam //MU_6,116.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19845: kim ucyate muniśreṣṭha mithyāpuruṣanāmakam / vastv avastūkṛtajagadvastujātaṃ vadāśu me //MU_6,116.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19846: vasiṣṭhaḥ: mithyāpuruṣabodhāya śṛṇu rāghava śobhanām / imām ākhyāyikāṃ hāsajananīṃ madudīritām //MU_6,116.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19847: asti kaścin mahābāho māyāyantramayaḥ pumān / bālapelavadhīr mūḍho gūḍho maurkhyeṇa kevalam //MU_6,116.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19848: sa ekānte kvacij jātaś śūnye tatraiva tiṣṭhati / keśoṇḍukam iva vyomni mṛgatṛṣṇeva vā marau //MU_6,116.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19849: tasmād anyan na tatrāsti yad asti ca sa eva tat / yac cānyat tat sadābhāsaṃ na sa paśyati durmatiḥ //MU_6,116.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19850: saṅkalpas tasya sañjātas tatra vṛddhim upeyuṣaḥ / khasyāhaṃ kham ahaṃ khaṃ me khaṃ rakṣāmīti niścalaḥ //MU_6,116.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19851: khaṃ sthāpayitvā rakṣāmi vastv iṣṭaṃ rakṣyam ādarāt / iti sañcintayan vyomarakṣārtham so 'karod gṛham //MU_6,116.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19852: tasya kośe babandhāsthāṃ rakṣitaṃ khaṃ mayety asau / gṛhākāśena santuṣṭas sthitas sa raghunandana //MU_6,116.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19853: atha kālena tat tasya gṛhaṃ nāśam upāyayau / ṛtvantareṇartur iva vāteneva taraṅgakaḥ //MU_6,116.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19854: hā gṛhākāśa naṣṭaṃ tvaṃ hā kva yātam asi kṣaṇāt / hā hā bhagnam asi svaccham ity athaitac chuśoca saḥ //MU_6,116.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19855: iti śokaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā punas tatraiva durmatiḥ / kūpaṃ cakre kharakṣārthaṃ kūpākāśaparo 'bhavat //MU_6,116.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19856: tato nāśaṃ sa kālena nītaḥ kūpo 'pi tasya vai / kūpākāśamahāśokavidhuro 'sau tato 'bhavat //MU_6,116.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19857: kūpākāśapralāpānte kumbhaṃ tatraiva so 'karot / kumbhākāśaparo bhūtvā svayaṃ nirvṛtim āyayau //MU_6,116.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19858: kumbho 'pi tasya kālena nāśaṃ nīto raghūdvaha / yām eva diśam ādatte durbhagas sāpi naśyati //MU_6,116.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19859: kumbhākāśapralāpānte kharakṣārthaṃ cakāra saḥ / kuṇḍaṃ tatraiva tenāsau kuṇḍākāśaparo 'bhavat //MU_6,116.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19860: kuṇḍam apy asya kālena kānane nāśam āyayau / tejaseva tamas tena kuṇḍākaśāṃ śuśoca saḥ //MU_6,116.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19861: kuṇḍakākāśaśokānte kharakṣārthaṃ cakāra saḥ / catuśśālaṃ mahāśālaṃ tadākāśaparo 'bhavat //MU_6,116.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19862: tad apy asya jahārāśu kālaḥ kavalitaprajaḥ / jīrṇaṃ parṇaṃ yathā vātas sa tacchokaparo 'bhavat //MU_6,116.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19863: catuśśālakhaśokānte kharakṣārthaṃ cakāra ha / kusūlam ambudākāraṃ tadākāśaparas sthitaḥ //MU_6,116.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19864: tad apy asya jahārāśu kālo vāta ivāmbudam / kusūlākāśaśokena tenāsau paryatapyata //MU_6,116.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19866: evaṃ sthitas sa śaṭhadhīr gaganaṃ guhāyāṃ gṛhṇan gṛhe na gaganena kilātmabuddhyā / duḥkhāntaraṃ ghanataraṃ ghanaduḥkhajālād āyāti yāti ca gater gatim aṅga mūḍhaḥ //MU_6,116.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19869: rāmaḥ: mithyānaraprasaṅgena kiṃ māyāpuruṣaḥ prabho / kathito 'yaṃ tvayā vyomarakṣaṇaṃ ca kim ucyate //MU_6,117.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19870: vasiṣṭhaḥ: śṛṇu rāma yathābhūtam etat prakaṭayāmi te / mithyāpuruṣavṛttāntakathanaṃ kathayādhunā //MU_6,117.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19871: māyāyantramayaḥ prokto yaḥ pumān raghunandana / enaṃ taṃ tvam ahaṅkāraṃ viddhi śūnyāmbarotthitam //MU_6,117.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19872: yasminn ākāśakoṇe 'smin sādho jagad idaṃ sthitam / tad anantam asac chūnyaṃ sargādau bhavati svayam //MU_6,117.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19873: antassthitasudurlakṣyabrahmavyomno 'tha śabdakhāt / tasmād udety ahaṅkāraḥ pūrvaṃ spanda ivānilāt //MU_6,117.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19874: vṛddhiṃ yātas sa gagane kalpayaty ātmatāṃ śaṭhaḥ / anātmātmābhimānena tenāsau yatate tataḥ //MU_6,117.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19875: anātmātmaikarakṣārthaṃ dehān nānāvidhān asau / bhūyo bhūyo 'pi nirnaṣṭān dṛṣṭvedaṃ kurute jagat //MU_6,117.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19876: sa eva māyāpuruṣo mithyāpuruṣa eva saḥ / asann evodito vyartham ahaṅkāro 'pi māyayā //MU_6,117.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19877: gṛhakuṇḍacatuśśālakumbhādīn dehakān asau / kṛtvā rakṣita ātmeti yāti tadvyomni bhāvanām //MU_6,117.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19878: ahaṅkārasya tasyāsya nāmānīmāni rāghava / śṛṇu yair jagadārambhavibhramair moham ety asau //MU_6,117.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19879: jīvo buddhir manaś cittaṃ māyā prakṛtir ity api / saṅkalpaḥ kalanā kālaḥ kalā cety api viśrutaiḥ //MU_6,117.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19880: evamādyais tathānyaiś ca nāmabhir bahutāṃ gataiḥ / sahasrarūpo 'haṅkāraḥ kalpitārthair vijṛmbhate //MU_6,117.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19881: bhūtākāśe tate śūnye jagannirmitibhiś ciram / sukhaduḥkhāny anubhavan mithyaiva puruṣas sthitaḥ //MU_6,117.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19882: yathaiṣa mithyāpuruṣo rakṣan vyomātmaśaṅkayā / ghaṭākāśādiṣu śliṣṭam evaṃ mā kleśavān bhava //MU_6,117.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19883: ākāśād api vistīrṇaś śuddhas sūkṣmaś śivaś śubhaḥ / ya ātmā sa kathaṃ kena rakṣyate gṛhyate tathā //MU_6,117.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19884: hṛdayākāśamātrasya ghaṭākāśasamasthiteḥ / vyarthaṃ bhūtāni śocanti naṣṭa ātmeti saṅkṣaye //MU_6,117.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19885: ghaṭādiṣu praṇaṣṭeṣu yathākāśam akhaṇḍitam / tathā deheṣu naṣṭeṣu dehī nityam alopakaḥ //MU_6,117.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19886: śuddhacinmātra ātmāyam ākāśād apy aṇor aṇuḥ / svānubhūtyaṃśamātraṃ hi khavad rāma na naśyati //MU_6,117.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19887: na jāyate na mriyate kvacit kiñcit kadācana / jagadvivartarūpeṇa kevalaṃ brahma jṛmbhate //MU_6,117.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19888: sarvam ekam idaṃ śāntam ādimadhyāntavarjitam / bhāvābhāvavinirmuktam iti matvā sukhī bhava //MU_6,117.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19889: sarvāpadāṃ nilayam adhruvam asvatantram āsannapātam avivekam asāram ajñam / bodhād ahaṅkṛtipadaṃ sakalaṃ vimucya śeṣe subaddhapada uttamatāṃ prayāsi //MU_6,117.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19892: vasiṣṭhaḥ: parasmād brahmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ prathamam utthitam / mananātmakam ābhogi tatstham eva sthitiṃ gatam //MU_6,118.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19893: puṣpakośa ivāmodo mahormir iva sāgare / raśmijālam ivāditye mano brahmaṇi rāghava //MU_6,118.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19894: tasyādṛśyātmatattvasya vismṛtyaiva gataṃ sthitim / nānyayuktyā gataṃ rāma jātaṃ rajjubhujaṅgavat //MU_6,118.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19895: ādityavyatirekeṇa yo bhāvayati rāghava / raśmijālam idaṃ hy etat tasyānyad iva bhāsvataḥ //MU_6,118.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19896: kanakavyatirekeṇa keyūraṃ yena bhāvitam / keyūram eva tat tasya na tasya kanakaṃ hi tat //MU_6,118.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19897: salilavyatirekeṇa taraṅgo yena bhāvitaḥ / taraṅgabuddhir evaikā sthitā tasya na vāridhīḥ //MU_6,118.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19898: salilāvyatirekeṇa taraṅgo yena bhāvyate / ambusāmānyasambuddhir nirvikalpas sa ucyate //MU_6,118.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19899: kanakāvyatirekeṇa keyūraṃ yena bhāvyate / kanakaikamahābuddhir nirvikalpas sa ucyate //MU_6,118.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19900: pāvakavyatirekeṇa jvālālī yena bhāvyate / tasyāgnibuddhir galati jvālādhīr eva tiṣṭhati //MU_6,118.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19901: jvālājālena lolena rañjitā sā tathā sthitiḥ / tām evāsthāṃ samādhatte tadgatā vyākulā matiḥ //MU_6,118.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19902: pāvakāvyatirekeṇa jvālālī yena bhāvyate / tasyāgnibuddhir evāsti nirvikalpas sa ucyate //MU_6,118.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19903: yo nirvikalpas sa mahān sa saṅkṣīṇamanā muniḥ / prāptavyaṃ tena samprāptaṃ nāsau majjati vastuṣu //MU_6,118.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19904: nānātām akhilāṃ tyaktvā śuddhacinmātrakoṭare / saṃvedanavinirmuktaṃ saṃvittyaṃśo bhavānagha //MU_6,118.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19905: svayam ātmātmanaivāśu śaktiṃ saṅkalpanāmikām / yadā karoti sphuritāṃ spandaśaktim ivānilaḥ //MU_6,118.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19906: tadā pṛthag ivābhāsaṃ saṅkalpakalanāmayam / mano bhavati viśvātma bhāvayaty ākṛtiṃ svayam //MU_6,118.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19907: tat saṅkalpātmakaṃ ceto yathedam akhilaṃ jagat / saṅkalpayati saṅkalpi tathaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt //MU_6,118.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19908: kīṭatvam abjajatvaṃ ca merutvam aṇutāṃ tathā / mano yātam ahaṅkārabuddhicittādināmakam //MU_6,118.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19909: svasaṅkalpād viriñcitvam etya ceto jagatsthitim / tanoti tasyāṃ tadanu nānātāṃ gacchati svayam //MU_6,118.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19910: saṅkalpamayam evedaṃ jagad ābhogi dṛśyate / na satyaṃ na ca mithyaiva svapnajālam ivotthitam //MU_6,118.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19911: jantor yathā manorājyaṃ vividhārambhabhāsuram / brāhmaṃ tathedaṃ vitataṃ manorājyaṃ vijṛmbhate //MU_6,118.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19912: yathā na vitathas svapnaḥ pratibhāsān na cāpi san / tathā brāhmaṃ manorājyaṃ jagan nāsan na san mune //MU_6,118.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19913: mithyāvabhāsamātraṃ hi yad idaṃ ghanatāṃ gatam / yathābhūtārthabhāvitvāt tad etat pravilīyate //MU_6,118.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19914: paramārthena dṛṣṭaṃ cet tad idaṃ naiva kiñcana / dṛṣṭaṃ tv aparamārthena prayāti śataśākhatām //MU_6,118.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19915: laharyūrmitaraṅgāmbukalanārhaṃ parisphuran / yathāmbudhir vapur dhatte svabhāvena tathā vibhuḥ //MU_6,118.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19916: kurvan karmasahasrāṇi kartā citspandanād ṛte / nāpūrvaṃ kurute kiñcit kaścid bhedam atas tyaja //MU_6,118.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19917: paśyañ chṛṇvan spṛśañ jighran vadan vyavaharan svapan / nāpūrvaṃ kurute kiñcit satyam ity eva bhāvaya //MU_6,118.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19918: yad yat karoṣi tat tattvaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ tatam / brahma prabṛṃhitākāraṃ tasmād anyan na vidyate //MU_6,118.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19919: padārthajāte sarvasmin saṃvitsāratayā sthite / saṃvid evedam akhilaṃ jagan nānyāsti kalpanā //MU_6,118.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19920: saṃvitsphuraṇamātre 'smiñ jagajjālakanāmani / idam anyad idaṃ cānyad iti mithyāgrahaḥ kutaḥ //MU_6,118.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19921: sambhavād akhilākāreṇaikasyā eva saṃvidaḥ / saṃvedyam api nāsty eva bandhamokṣāv ataḥ kutaḥ //MU_6,118.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19922: mokṣo 'yam eṣa khalu bandha iti prasahya cintā nirasya sakalā vikalābhimānaḥ / maunī vaśī vigatamānamado mahātmā kurvan svakāryam anahaṅkṛtir eva tiṣṭha //MU_6,118.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19925: vasiṣṭhaḥ: mahākartā mahābhoktā mahātyāgī bhavānagha / sarvāś śaṅkāḥ parityajya dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam //MU_6,119.1//
GSP27moksop_u:19926: rāmaḥ: kim ucyate mahākartā mahātyāgī kim ucyate / kim ucyate mahābhoktā samyak kathaya me prabho //MU_6,119.2//
GSP27moksop_u:19927: vasiṣṭhaḥ: etad vratatrayaṃ rāma purā candrārdhamaulinā / bhṛṅgīśāyottamaṃ proktaṃ yenāsau vijvaras sthitaḥ //MU_6,119.3//
GSP27moksop_u:19928: sumeror uttare śṛṅge pūrvaṃ śaśikalādharaḥ / atiṣṭhad agnisaṅkāśe samagraparivāravān //MU_6,119.4//
GSP27moksop_u:19929: tam apṛcchan mahātejā jñānajijñāsayā svataḥ / bhṛṅgīśaḥ praṇato rāma baddhāñjalir umāpatim //MU_6,119.5//
GSP27moksop_u:19930: bhṛṅgīśaḥ: bhagavan devadeveśa sarvajña parameśvara / yad ahaṃ paripṛcchāmi kṛpayā tad vadāśu me //MU_6,119.6//
GSP27moksop_u:19931: saṃsāraracanāṃ nātha taraṅgataralām imām / avalokya vimuhyāmi tattvaviśrāntivarjitaḥ //MU_6,119.7//
GSP27moksop_u:19932: kam antarniścayaṃ kāntam urarīkṛtya susthiram / asmiñ jagajjīrṇagṛhe tiṣṭhāmi vigatajvaram //MU_6,119.8//
GSP27moksop_u:19933: īśvaraḥ: sarvāś śaṅkāḥ parityajya dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam / mahātyāgī mahākartā mahābhoktā bhavānagha //MU_6,119.9//
GSP27moksop_u:19934: bhṛṅgīśaḥ: kim ucyate mahātyāgī mahābhoktā kim ucyate / kim ucyate mahākartā samyak kathaya me prabho //MU_6,119.10//
GSP27moksop_u:19935: īśvaraḥ: dharmādharmodayāpāyaśaṅkāvirahitāśayaḥ / yaḥ karoti yathāprāptaṃ mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.11//
GSP27moksop_u:19936: rāgadveṣau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ dharmādharmau phalāphale / yaḥ karoty anapekṣyaiva mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.12//
GSP27moksop_u:19937: maunavān nirahambhāvo nirmāno muktamatsaraḥ / yaḥ karoti gatodvegaṃ mahākartā sa ucate //MU_6,119.13//
GSP27moksop_u:19938: śubhāśubheṣu kāryeṣu dharmādharmakuśaṅkayā / matir na lipyate yasya mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.14//
GSP27moksop_u:19939: sarvatra vigatasneho yas sākṣivad avasthitaḥ / niricchaṃ vartate kārye mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.15//
GSP27moksop_u:19940: udvegānandarahitas samayā svacchayecchayā / na śocate yo nodeti mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.16//
GSP27moksop_u:19941: yaḥ kāryakāle matimān asaṃsaktamanā muniḥ / kāryānurūpavṛttistho mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.17//
GSP27moksop_u:19942: svabhāvenaiva yasyāntas samatāṃ na jahāti dhīḥ / śubhāśubhaṃ hy ācarato mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.18//
GSP27moksop_u:19943: janmasthitivināśeṣu sodayāstamayeṣv alam / samam eva mano yasya mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.19//
GSP27moksop_u:19944: na kiñcana dveṣṭi ca yo na kiṃ ca stauti yas svayam / bhuṅkte ca prakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.20//
GSP27moksop_u:19945: nādatte 'py ādadānas san nācaraty ācarann api / bhuñjāno 'pi na yo bhuṅkte mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.21//
GSP27moksop_u:19946: sākṣivat sakalaṃ lokavyavahāram akhinnadhīḥ / yaḥ paśyaty apayātecchaṃ mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.22//
GSP27moksop_u:19947: sukhair duḥkhaiḥ kriyāyogair bhāvābhāvair bhramapradaiḥ / yasya notkrāmati matir mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.23//
GSP27moksop_u:19948: jarāmaraṇam āpac ca rājyaṃ dāridryam eva ca / ramyam eveti yo vetti mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.24//
GSP27moksop_u:19949: mahānti sukhaduḥkhāni yaḥ payāṃsīva sāgaraḥ / samas samupagṛhṇāti mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.25//
GSP27moksop_u:19950: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭiś candrabimbād ivāṃśavaḥ / nāpayānty aniśaṃ yasmān mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.26//
GSP27moksop_u:19951: kaṭv amblaṃ lavaṇaṃ tiktam amṛṣṭaṃ mṛṣṭam uttamam / adhamaṃ yo 'tti sāmyena mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.27//
GSP27moksop_u:19952: sarasaṃ nīrasaṃ caiva surataṃ virataṃ tathā / yaḥ paśyati samas somyo mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.28//
GSP27moksop_u:19953: kṣāre khaṇḍaprakāre ca śubhe vāpy aśubhe tathā / samatā susthitā yasya mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.29//
GSP27moksop_u:19954: idaṃ bhojyam abhojyaṃ cety evaṃ tyaktvā vikalpitam / gatābhilāṣaṃ yo bhuṅkte mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.30//
GSP27moksop_u:19955: āpadaṃ sampadaṃ moham ānandam avaraṃ varam / yo bhuṅkte samayā buddhyā mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.31//
GSP27moksop_u:19956: dharmādharmau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ cintā maraṇajanmanī / dhiyā yeneti santyaktaṃ mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.32//
GSP27moksop_u:19957: sarvecchās sakalāś śaṅkās sarvehās sarvaniścayāḥ / dhiyā yena parityaktā mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.33//
GSP27moksop_u:19958: dehasya manaso buddher indriyāṇāṃ jagatsthiteḥ / nūnaṃ yenojjhitā sattā mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.34//
GSP27moksop_u:19959: na me deho na janmāpi yuktāyukte na karmaṇā / iti niścayavān yo 'ntar mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.35//
GSP27moksop_u:19960: yena dharmam adharmaṃ ca manomananam īhitaṃ / sarvam antaḥ parityaktaṃ mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.36//
GSP27moksop_u:19961: mano dhyānaṃ tapastejas tvattāmatte śubhāśubhe / tyaktvā yo 'vasthitas svastho mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.37//
GSP27moksop_u:19962: svamanomananaṃ mānyo nābhivāñchati nojjhati / yo 'vāsanas sarvam idaṃ mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.38//
GSP27moksop_u:19963: yāvatī dṛśyakalanā sakaleyaṃ vilokyate / sā yena suṣṭhu santyaktā mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.39//
GSP27moksop_u:19964: yo 'kāmakāmī nirdvandvas sukhaduḥkheṣv aloladhīḥ / dhīras svastho mṛdur dānto mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.40//
GSP27moksop_u:19965: kurvann api ca kāryāṇi suṣuptasamavṛttitām / na santyajati yaḥ pūrṇo mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.41//
GSP27moksop_u:19966: ity uktaṃ devadevena bhṛṅgīśāya purānagha / etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya tiṣṭha rāma yathāsthitaḥ //MU_6,119.42//
GSP27moksop_u:19967: śrīmatkapālaśakalāvalimadhyabaddhakhaṇḍendumaṇḍitajaṭāśirasā hareṇa / ity uktam ujjvalamaṇīndraśilaikaśṛṅge merau jvalajjvalanarūpiṇi rāmabhadra //MU_6,119.43//
GSP27moksop_u:19968: etāṃ dṛśaṃ samavalambya vilāsakāntakāryaṃ kuru kramagataṃ samayaiva buddhyā / nityodito 'si vimalo 'si nirāmayo 'si śaṅkāṃ parityaja sukhī bhava yo 'si so 'si //MU_6,119.44//
